question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10‚Ç¨).¬†Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0‚Ç¨ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: ¬øSe efectuar√° mi domiciliaci√≥n si tengo pocos fondos?
answer: Si tu saldo disponible no cubre el importe de la domiciliaci√≥n el d√≠a en que ocurre, este volver√° a tu cuenta y se te cobrar√° una¬†comisi√≥n de 9 ‚Ç¨ (3¬†‚Ç¨ para cuentas con IBAN alem√°n). En el caso de quedarte con saldo negativo, se cargar√° a tu cuenta un inter√©s del 7,5% anual. No es posible aplazar una domiciliaci√≥n.Para evitar esto en el futuro, puedes ingresar dinero (pesta√±a nueva) de diferentes maneras en tu cuenta o comprobar instant√°neamente si eres elegible para un Descubierto directamente en la app (disponible en Alemania y Austria).Para pa√≠ses miembros no pertenecientes a la zona euro: si est√°s creando una domiciliaci√≥n en tu moneda local, es el banco receptor quien dicta el cambio de divisa y el importe deducido de tu cuenta N26.Consulta la lista de pa√≠ses:BulgariaCroaciaRep√∫blica ChecaDinamarcaHungr√≠aIslandiaLiechtensteinNoruegaPoloniaRuman√≠aSueciaSuiza¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26.¬†Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre este tema (pesta√±a nueva).

question: ¬øPor qu√© me han cobrado por una domiciliaci√≥n?
answer: Las domiciliaciones devueltas por¬†saldo insuficiente¬†tienen un coste de 9 ‚Ç¨ (3¬†‚Ç¨ para cuentas con IBAN alem√°n) tal y como explicamos en nuestros¬†T√©rminos y Condiciones (pesta√±a nueva). Si tu saldo disponible est√° en negativo debido a esta comisi√≥n, el inter√©s del¬†descubierto¬†ser√° de 7%.Puedes evitar esta comisi√≥n asegur√°ndote de que hay fondos suficientes para pagar las domiciliaciones antes de las 18:00 del mismo d√≠a h√°bil ingresando dinero en tu cuenta (pesta√±a nueva).Te aconsejamos utilizar¬†transacciones SEPA¬†inmediata,¬†MoneyBeam¬†(entre cuentas N26) o¬†CASH26¬†(si est√°s en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, Grecia o Italia) o con la opci√≥n tarjeta de d√©bito o cr√©dito (pesta√±a nueva) para transferir la cantidad. Con estos m√©todos, la cantidad aparecer√° en tu saldo disponible de manera inmediata.Adem√°s, si no reconoces una domiciliaci√≥n puedes solicitar el reembolso desde la app.Para pa√≠ses miembros no pertenecientes a la zona euro: si est√°s creando una domiciliaci√≥n en tu moneda local, es el banco receptor quien dicta el cambio de divisa y el importe deducido de tu cuenta N26.Consulta la lista de pa√≠ses:BulgariaCroaciaRep√∫blica ChecaDinamarcaHungr√≠aIslandiaLiechtensteinNoruegaPoloniaRuman√≠aSueciaSuiza

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details.Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Security.Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: How to block contactless payments on my card?
answer: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If you‚Äôre experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

question: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
answer: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.‚ÄùAll of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

question: ¬øC√≥mo funcionan los pagos contactless?
answer: Los pagos contactless (pesta√±a nueva) de tu tarjeta funcionan a trav√©s de una comunicaci√≥n de campo cercano (NFC). Si tienes problemas con los pagos contactless, ten en cuenta lo siguiente:Comprueba si los pagos contactless est√°n activados en los ajustes de tu tarjeta.Si tu tarjeta es nueva, no olvides utilizarla en un cajero o con chip y PIN antes. Solo a partir de entonces podr√°s utilizarla tambi√©n para hacer pagos contactless.Los pagos contactless de tu tarjeta (NFC) de hasta 50 ‚Ç¨ no necesitan PIN. Si el importe supera los 50 ‚Ç¨ o las transacciones acumuladas superan los 150 ‚Ç¨, tendr√°s que introducir el PIN de tu tarjeta.Preg√∫ntale al comerciante si su lector de tarjetas es compatible con los pagos contactless.Las tarjetas N26 Metal solo tienen NFC en el dorso de la tarjeta. Procura acercar el dorso de tu tarjeta al lector para utilizar el NFC (si acercas el anverso, no funcionar√°).Procura sostener tu tarjeta directamente encima de la superficie compatible con NFC del lector. Si has alejado la tarjeta demasiado r√°pido o no la has acercado lo suficiente, int√©ntalo de nuevo.Si el contactless sigue sin funcionar, intenta utilizar la modalidad chip y PIN para efectuar el pago.

question: ¬øQu√© es el formulario web de N26 para solicitudes relacionadas con el RGPD?
answer: Proteger los datos personales y financieros de nuestros clientes es una de nuestras m√°ximas prioridades y, por ello, proporcionamos una herramienta segura para tramitar estas solicitudes. Nuestro formulario web para solicitudes relacionadas con el RGPD, permite a todos los clientes o exclientes (que ya han cerrado su cuenta) de N26 y a sus representantes autorizados contactar con N26 de manera segura para solicitar informaci√≥n sobre sus datos personales.¬øC√≥mo funciona?El formulario web (pesta√±a nueva) debe utilizarse cuando un cliente o excliente de N26 desee ejercer sus derechos en virtud del Reglamento General de Protecci√≥n de Datos (RGPD), en su propio nombre o a trav√©s de un representante autorizado.En particular, podr√°s ejercer:Tu derecho de acceso como interesado, en virtud del art. 15 del RGPD (pesta√±a nueva)Tu derecho de supresi√≥n (¬´derecho al olvido¬ª), en virtud del art. 17 del RGPD (pesta√±a nueva)Tu derecho de oposici√≥n, en virtud del art. 21 del RGPD (pesta√±a nueva)Recibir√°s una respuesta de nuestro equipo especializado en un plazo m√°ximo de 30 d√≠as naturales.Al rellenar el formulario, se te pedir√° que indiques:¬†Tu pa√≠s de residenciaTu relaci√≥n con N26 (cliente, excliente, representante autorizado del mismo)El tipo de solicitudNombre, apellidos y direcci√≥n de emailComo excliente de N26 o representante autorizado, ¬øtengo que proporcionar algo m√°s?Los exclientes y sus representantes autorizados est√°n obligados a subir m√°s documentos para verificar su identidad y garantizar que el destinatario de los datos realmente tiene derecho a recibirlos.Estos son los documentos necesarios:Del excliente: copia del DNI / pasaporteDel representante autorizado: copia del DNI / pasaporte y un poder firmadoCuando hayas rellenado el formulario, haz clic en Enviar para enviar tu solicitud.¬øPor qu√© es necesaria una revisi√≥n manual del DNI / Pasaporte para exclientes o representantes autorizados de N26?Principalmente, solicitamos una copia del DNI / Pasaporte con fines de validaci√≥n de identidad y para garantizar que los datos personales, incluida la informaci√≥n financiera, no caigan en manos equivocadas. Se lleva a cabo una revisi√≥n manual del DNI cuando es necesario verificar la identidad de una persona y no nos es posible hacerlo de acuerdo a nuestros procesos de verificaci√≥n estandarizados. Dado que la identidad de los exclientes y representantes autorizados no se puede verificar a trav√©s de sus interacciones en nuestra WebApp o App, ya que no tienen acceso a ellas, debemos poder verificar su identidad utilizando medios alternativos.¬øPreguntas o dudas sobre este tema?Puedes ponerte en contacto con nuestro equipo de Atenci√≥n al Cliente a trav√©s de support@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva).

question: ¬øC√≥mo puedo hacer de N26 mi cuenta principal?
answer: Podemos ayudarte a convertir N26 en tu cuenta principal moviendo tus movimientos cotidianos desde otra cuenta: informaremos a cada entidad en donde tengas pagos domiciliados (como suscripciones mensuales o facturas) o a quien transfiera dinero a tu cuenta (como alg√∫n empleado), y les explicaremos c√≥mo configurar las √≥rdenes permanentes o bien c√≥mo transferir los fondos restantes. Lee a continuaci√≥n como hacer de N26 tu cuenta principal:Servicio de cambio de cuenta ofrecido por finleap connect GmbHJunto con nuestro socio finleap connect GmbH (pesta√±a nueva), te ofrecemos una plataforma para cambiar f√°cilmente tu cuenta bancaria online. Se trata de un proceso autom√°tico y totalmente gratuito. Inicia sesi√≥n en tu app m√≥vil de N26 y pulsa Mi cuenta > Cambio de cuenta. Pulsa Iniciar ahora y sigue las instrucciones.Tambi√©n puedes utilizar este formulario (pesta√±a nueva) e iniciar sesi√≥n con tus datos bancarios anteriores. Cuando hayas rellenado toda la informaci√≥n obligatoria, tardaremos entre 5 y 7 d√≠as h√°biles en enviar todas las cartas de notificaci√≥n. Puede que las empresas que te cobran o abonan pagos tarden m√°s tiempo en cambiar tus datos bancarios para futuras transacciones.

question: C√≥mo hacer una donaci√≥n con N26
answer: N26 siembre ha colaborado con organizaciones humanitarias para combatir el hambre y la desigualdad. A partir de ahora, hacer una donaci√≥n desde tu cuenta de N26 ser√° todav√≠a m√°s f√°cil.¬†Ya puedes enviar una donaci√≥n a una selecci√≥n de organizaciones ben√©ficas directamente desde tu app N26. El importe total se enviar√° por transferencia bancaria a la organizaci√≥n ben√©fica que hayas elegido.Para enviar una donaci√≥n a una organizaci√≥n ben√©fica, sigue los siguientes pasos:Desde la pantalla de inicio de tu aplicaci√≥n, pulsa en Enviar dineroSelecciona Donar y ContinuarEscoge una organizaci√≥n ben√©fica de la lista¬†Selecciona Continuar para hacer una donaci√≥nIntroduce el importe de tu donaci√≥n y confirma la transacci√≥n con tu PINNota: En muchos casos, basta con un justificante de pago para reclamar la desgravaci√≥n fiscal de tu donaci√≥n en la declaraci√≥n de la renta de las personas f√≠sicas. No obstante, si necesitas un certificado oficial de donaci√≥n de la ONG, te rogamos que contactes directamente con la ONG (junto con tu justificante de pago), ya que solo las ONG pueden emitir certificados de donaci√≥n, no N26.

question: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
answer: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easy‚Äì‚Äìall you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once you‚Äôre there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.¬†Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit card¬†With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phone‚Äîthere‚Äôs no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of ‚Ç¨900 within 24 hours.¬†How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of ‚Ç¨50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once you‚Äôre ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.¬†Here‚Äôs what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you don‚Äôt make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and you‚Äôll need to generate a new one.¬†If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You don‚Äôt need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.¬†N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).¬†

question: How can I prevent fraud via SMS?
answer: Did you get a text message followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt.How does the scam work?You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one¬†https://app.n26.com/login (new tab)The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App > My Account > Settings > Security > Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,¬† send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comDo I need to confirm a transaction to be able to receive a refund?Absolutely not! We would never instruct you to authorise a transaction that you did not initiate. Never confirm transactions if you do not recognise a recipient's name or IBAN in the case of debit transfers; an email or phone number in the case of a MoneyBeam payment; and a merchant's name in the case of a card transaction.How to recognise N26 official communications?We will never send you links via SMS: never trust an SMS from us that contains a link!¬†N26 usually sends verification codes via "AUTHMSG"; these codes will always originate from this sender. These codes are used to access the App or to associate the device with the account. Never share your OTP (One Time Password) codes with anyone!Our primary means of communication are live chat, email and our premium customer phone line.We do not call our customers, unless (in very specific cases) a call has been requested by a customer themselves.Therefore, if after clicking on a link, you‚Äôre informed that you will be contacted shortly by an N26 agent due to an unsuccessful operation, be wary of impending phone calls!How do scammers find out my personal information?In today‚Äôs day and age, it‚Äôs likely that your personal data is publicly available online. Think social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. It‚Äôs often the case that sensitive data is left unsecured. Scammers exploit people's vulnerability by collecting information and using it to their advantage.

question: ¬øCu√°nto tiempo tarda una transferencia con Wise?
answer: Esperamos volver a habilitar esta funcionalidad el 20 de marzo. Te mantendremos informado si esto cambia.Una vez creas la transferencia con Wise, obtienes una fecha estimada de finalizaci√≥n.Si una transferencia con Wise falla, te enviaremos un mensaje push inform√°ndote. La cantidad volver√° a estar disponible en tu saldo al cabo de unos d√≠as.Wise no cobra comisiones extra por un pago devuelto y nosotros tampoco. Sin embargo, algunos bancos que intervienen en la operaci√≥n s√≠ que lo hacen. En ese caso Wise restar√° esa comisi√≥n de la cantidad total devuelta, tal y como est√° escrito en sus¬†Condiciones de Uso (pesta√±a nueva).Razones principales por las que falla una transferencia:Errores en los detalles de la transferencia (al introducir el nombre del destinatario o su informaci√≥n bancaria, por ejemplo).Caracteres especiales o demasiados caracteres en el nombre del destinatario o campo de referencia.Has sobrepasado los l√≠mites o los pagos online no est√°n activados en los ajustes de tu tarjeta.No se pueden realizar transferencias en moneda extranjera con las cuentas N26 Business o N26 Business You, ni tampoco si la cuenta del destinatario es una cuenta comercial.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:¬†üë§¬†My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: ¬øPor qu√© no funciona mi verificaci√≥n por foto?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†V√°lido en todas las regiones excepto AlemaniaPrimero aseg√∫rate de tener activada la geolocalizaci√≥n y luego revisa esta¬†gu√≠a (pesta√±a nueva)¬†para ayudarte a tomar las mejores fotos.La mayor√≠a de las¬†verificaciones¬†por foto fallan debido a una mala calidad de imagen.Completa el proceso en un entorno con luz y con un tel√©fono con buena c√°mara.Si estas utilizando un dispositivo Android, aseg√∫rate de tener un buen enfoque autom√°tico.Enciende o apaga el flash en funci√≥n de la luz que haya a tu alrededor.S√°cate el selfie como una foto de pasaporte (la c√°mara debe estar al mismo nivel que tus ojos).Aseg√∫rate de ser la √∫nica persona que aparece en la foto.Comprueba tu documento.Solo aceptamos fotos de tu documento de identidad original (las fotocopias no est√°n permitidas).Coloca tu documento en una superficie plana y aseg√∫rate de que todos los datos est√©n visibles y legibles.Solo aceptamos documentos de identificaci√≥n nacionales (los permisos de residencia o las licencias para conducir no valen).El documento no puede estar da√±ado ni caducado.Si te sacas un selfie y una foto a tu documentaci√≥n y al primer intento no sale bien, puedes volver a probar.Una vez que el proceso de verificaci√≥n est√© completo y tu cuenta tenga el saldo m√≠nimo requerido (pesta√±a nueva), te enviaremos tu Mastercard N26. La¬†entrega puede tardar hasta 14 d√≠as, o hasta 30 d√≠as si vives en alguna de las islas de Espa√±a, en Ceuta o en Melilla.El chat est√° disponible todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

question: What are Cards for Spaces?
answer: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds in¬†the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space:¬†You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select ‚ÄòMain account‚Äô or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

question: ¬øC√≥mo vincular o desvincular mi smartphone a mi cuenta?

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
„Éª Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.¬†Remember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app‚Äîyou‚Äôll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you‚Äôll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).¬†To unpair your old smartphone:Go to üë§ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to üë§ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you‚Äôll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10‚Ç¨ to activate the card).¬†An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10‚Ç¨ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‚ÄòGet an additional card‚Äô.Select ‚ÄòVirtual‚Äô at the top, then tap ‚ÄòChoose‚Äô at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‚ÄòGenerate virtual card‚Äô.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‚Äòcards‚ÄôLocate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‚Äòcard details‚ÄôYou will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: What is Phishing?
answer: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If you‚Äôd like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. We‚Äôll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‚Äòeml‚Äô file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.¬†Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can‚Äôt use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:¬†Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.¬†Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the ‚Äúphone spoofing‚Äù technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that‚Äôs being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps they‚Äôre offering limited-time promotional deals. It‚Äôs important to note that just because ‚ÄúN26‚Äù is part of the URL, this doesn‚Äôt necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect you‚Äôre on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesn‚Äôt, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.¬†

Plazos¬ª.Cuando hayas seleccionado la transacci√≥n que quieres fraccionar, se te dirigir√° a los siguientes pasos para confirmar el uso de ¬´N26 a Plazos¬ª:Primero, se te proporcionar√° informaci√≥n continuaci√≥n, confirmarDespu√©s de confirmar tu plan de N26 a Plazos, se te reembolsar√° el total del importe de compra a tu cuenta principal. El resto de los pagos se cobrar√°n autom√°ticamente de tu cuenta principal en la fecha de vencimiento cada mes (recibir√°s recordatorios 1 d√≠a antes del vencimiento de cada pago).¬øC√≥mo se administra N26 a Plazos?Puedes administrar tu N26 a Plazos accediendo a esta secci√≥n de la app, seleccionando el men√∫ de opciones (los 3 puntos de la parte superior derecha de la lista de transacciones) y, a continuaci√≥n, yendo a ¬´N26 a Plazos¬ª. Ah√≠ podr√°s ver:El saldo total pendiente de pagoLas cuotas actualesLos detalles de las cuotasEl calendario de amortizaci√≥nLa opci√≥n de amortizar el importe total
¬øC√≥mo decidimos su solicitud de Cuotas N26?Con el fin de poder decidir de manera r√°pida y eficientemente sobre su solicitud de N26 a Plazos, debemos su solvencia de conformidad con la ley. Para ello, generaremos una calificaci√≥n crediticia interna. Dentro del proceso de puntuaci√≥n calculamos la probabilidad de que usted como cliente cumpla con sus obligaciones de pago. Para tales c√°lculos procesamos sus datos personales: su salario, sus gastos, obligaciones existentes, experiencias de relaciones contractuales anteriores, reembolso de cr√©ditos anteriores seg√∫n lo acordado. Su puntuaci√≥n es el resultado de un procedimiento matem√°tico-estad√≠stico. Con base en los datos procesados ‚Äã‚Äãy el resultado respectivo del proceso de calificaci√≥n interna, determinamos si podemos ofrecerle N26 a Plazos y establecemos las condiciones que podemos ofrecerle. Por lo tanto, nuestro proceso de puntuaci√≥n es necesario para gestionar la oferta de nuestros contratos de cr√©dito (como N26 a Plazos) de acuerdo con el Art. 22 (2) (a) y Art. 6 (1) (b) del RGPD.Entendemos que esta informaci√≥n debe ser suficiente para que usted pueda comprender el proceso de toma de decisiones validado matem√°ticamente y estad√≠sticamente que ofrecemos para realizar y responder de manera r√°pida y eficiente a su solicitud de N26 a Plazos.En cualquier caso, puede ponerse en contacto con nosotros aqu√≠ y explicar por qu√© cree que es posible que a√∫n no hayamos considerado suficientemente su punto de vista en nuestra decisi√≥n y por qu√© deber√≠amos tener en cuenta la informaci√≥n adicional necesaria.Una vez que se ponga en contacto con nosotros con respecto a la respectiva decisi√≥n automatizada, la decisi√≥n ser√° revisada por uno de nuestros empleados. Sin embargo, esto no garantiza una decisi√≥n diferente de N26.

question: Configuraci√≥n de la comunicaci√≥n de marketing
answer: Como cliente de N26, puedes activar o desactivar nuestras Comunicaciones de Marketing en la app del m√≥vil y la WebApp de N26, por lo que puedes elegir si quieres recibir ofertas personalizadas de productos y funciones de N26, as√≠ como noticias sobre las ofertas de los asociados de N26 y otras recomendaciones. Puedes acceder a la Configuraci√≥n de las Comunicaciones de Marketing en la app del m√≥vil y la WebApp de la siguiente manera: Mi cuentaConfiguraci√≥n de la appComunicaciones de MarketingA continuaci√≥n, te explicamos cada bot√≥n de comunicaciones de marketing para que puedas administrar mejor la configuraci√≥n que desees. Encontrar√°s informaci√≥n sobre el tratamiento de datos asociado en la Pol√≠tica de Privacidad de N26.Notificaciones push:Si activas las notificaciones push, recibir√°s ofertas personalizadas de productos y funciones de N26, noticias sobre ofertas de los asociados de N26 y otras recomendaciones a trav√©s de notificaciones push. Si desactivas las notificaciones push, dejar√°s de recibir esos contenidos a trav√©s de notificaciones push. Nota: Activar/desactivar el bot√≥n solo afecta a contenidos relacionados con ofertas personalizadas de productos y funciones de N26, ofertas de los asociados de N26 y otras recomendaciones, pero no afecta a ning√∫n otro contenido que puedas recibir mediante notificaciones push. Por ello, aunque desactives esta opci√≥n, seguir√°s recibiendo notificaciones push que contengan informaci√≥n relevante para el uso de tu cuenta bancaria de N26 (p. ej., transacciones recientes, nuevas funciones de tu cuenta bancaria). question: ¬øC√≥mo bloquear una domiciliaci√≥n?

Las firmas digitales se pueden crear a trav√©s de proveedores como ¬´DocuSign¬ª.Por √∫ltimo, es importante recordar que la cancelaci√≥n de una domiciliaci√≥n solo bloquea los pagos; no supone la cancelaci√≥n del contrato que tengas con el comerciante.¬øC√≥mo puedo bloquear una domiciliaci√≥n?Sigue estos pasos, rellena el formulario y ponte en contacto con nuestro equipo de atenci√≥n al cliente mediante chat o tel√©fono:Desc√°rgate este formulario (pesta√±a nueva) y rell√©nalo.Rellena el formulario e indica qu√© quieres bloquear (p. ej., identificaci√≥n de acreedor, referencia del mandato y bloqueo completo). Ten en cuenta que puedes consultar parte de esta informaci√≥n en las domiciliaciones anteriores del mismo comerciante de tu lista de transacciones.Aseg√∫rate de incluir una firma (firma manual, electr√≥nica o digital).Entonces tendr√°s que ponerte en contacto con nuestro equipo de atenci√≥n al cliente mediante chat (te podr√°n verificar sin problemas) o tel√©fono, para que nuestros especialistas puedan ayudarte a finalizar el proceso. ¬°Rellenar el formulario de antemano acelerar√° el proceso!

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you‚Äôre able to see what‚Äôs going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you‚Äôve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.¬†Sometimes you‚Äôll see both payments at the same time‚Äìthe authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn‚Äôt expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).¬†Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: ¬øC√≥mo funciona N26 Business Smart?
answer: V√°lido para Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Pa√≠ses Bajos, Polonia, Portugal, Noruega, Suecia.N26 Business Smart cuesta 4,90 ‚Ç¨ al mes y est√° dise√±ada para usuarios aut√≥nomos que ejercen su profesi√≥n por cuenta propia. question: How to protect my identity?
answer: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: ¬øPor qu√© mi transferencia sigue pendiente en la app N26?
answer: Necesitar√°s tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n para completar cualquier transferencia, aunque sea con¬†MoneyBeam o transferencias programadas. Tu transferencia permanecer√° pendiente hasta que la confirmes o la canceles mediante una notificaci√≥n push en la app.Tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n no es el mismo que el¬†PIN de tu tarjeta, aunque puedes poner el mismo n√∫mero en los dos. El primero lo creas una vez que¬†vincules tu smartphone, mientras que el PIN de la tarjeta lo eliges al momento de activarla.Si introduces el PIN de confirmaci√≥n err√≥neamente 6 veces seguidas, el PIN se bloquear√° por motivos de seguridad. Podr√°s restaurar el PIN¬†cambi√°ndolo desde la app.

question: How to set Rules for Spaces?
answer: Within your Spaces, you can set your own Rules! Rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your Spaces to save money and organise your finances.¬†If you want to set a Rule through the Web App, here‚Äôs what you need to know:Process a Spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.To delete a Rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. You‚Äôll see all the active rules. Clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.If you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the Space you created the rule in, and then create a new one.If you want to set a Rule through an Android device, you have two options:From Spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm 2. After setting a Space Transfer > select Repeat > choose frequency and date > confirm¬†If you want to set a Rule through an iOS device, this is what you need to do:¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†From Spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirm¬†¬†Please be aware that both Spaces Rules and Standing Orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 UTC). This means if you have a Rule and Standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both.If you have Standing Orders that are dependent on your Rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the Standing Order is set for the day after the Rule. This also means that if you want to prioritise your Standing Orders they need to be set for the day before your Rules.Please note that, if you have an activated Overdraft, a Rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

question: ¬øDebo declarar impuestos en Estados Unidos?
answer:
Como banco con licencia legal, reportamos la informaci√≥n fiscal de las cuentas en Estados Unidos directamente al Internal Revenue Service, de acuerdo con FATCA, que es una legislaci√≥n dise√±ada por el departamento de tesorer√≠a y el IRS de EE.UU. para incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas de EE.UU. utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.Encuentra m√°s informaci√≥n sobre FATCA (pesta√±a nueva)aqu√≠ (pesta√±a nueva).¬†Dentro del contexto de FATCA, una persona de EE.UU. se define, entre otras cosas, como: un ciudadano de los EE.UU. (incluidos los de doble nacionalidad)un residente en los EE.UU., por ejemplo el poseedor de la Tarjeta Verde, o alguien que cumple con el ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (consulta que es a continuaci√≥n).Si no est√°s seguro de si eres una persona de los EE.UU. puedes consultar a un asesor fiscal.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù significa:Que has estado f√≠sicamente en los EE.UU. 183 d√≠as o m√°s en el a√±o de calendario actual. √ìQue has estado f√≠sicamente presente en los EE.UU. 183 d√≠as o m√°s en los tres √∫ltimos a√±os de calendario. Para calcularlo, se hace de la siguiente forma:
(31 d√≠as o m√°s en el a√±o de calendario actual) + (el n√∫mero de d√≠as con presencia f√≠sica en EE.UU. en el √∫ltimo a√±o) dividido entre 3 + ( el n√∫mero de d√≠as con presencia f√≠sica en EE.UU. en el pen√∫ltimo a√±o) dividido entre 6.Adem√°s, si tu cuenta muestra algunos de los siguientes puntos:Ciudadan√≠a o residencia en EE.UU.Lugar de nacimiento en EE.UU. Direcci√≥n de residencia en EE.UU. N√∫mero de tel√©fono de EE.UU.Ordenes de transferencias o pagos permanentes a direcciones de EE.UU.Si se cumplen esos requisitos, estamos obligados a tratarte como una persona de los Estados Unidos, a no ser que presentes lo siguiente:El formulario W-8BEN o un documento similar yUn pasaporte de otro pa√≠s que no sea EE.UU. u otro documento certificado por otro gobierno que muestre que tu nacionalidad es otra.Si has nacido en EE.UU., un documento que certifique la perdida de tu nacionalidad estadounidense.

question: ¬øC√≥mo verificar mi identidad?
answer: Como banco, necesitamos saber qui√©n eres. Por ello necesitas demostrar tu identidad mediante un pasaporte o un carnet de identidad cuando te das de alta o al usar ciertos productos.Nunca te pediremos que verifiques tu identidad a nombre de otras personas o empresas. Aqu√≠ tenemos una recopilaci√≥n de consejos para ayudarte a proteger tu identidad.Puedes verificar tu identidad de dos formas diferentes y hemos recopilado algunos consejos para cada una de ellas:¬†foto y¬†v√≠deo. El m√©todo con el que demuestras tu identidad depende de tu nacionalidad, de tu pa√≠s de residencia y del tipo de documento que utilices:Vivo en Alemania (pesta√±a nueva)Vivo en Espa√±a (pesta√±a nueva)Vivo en Italia (pesta√±a nueva)Vivo en otro pa√≠s (pesta√±a nueva)Como banco plenamente acreditado y regulado, N26 debe ce√±irse a las estrictas normativas y directrices del sector en lo referente a la verificaci√≥n de los clientes potenciales. Estas var√≠an dependiendo del pa√≠s, por lo que solo podemos llevar a cabo el proceso de verificaci√≥n de identidad con los documentos de identidad espec√≠ficos que se exigen en cada pa√≠s.Si tus documentos de identidad no son los exigidos, actualmente no podremos ofrecerte una cuenta en nuestra entidad. Dicho esto, a√±adimos nuevos documentos a esta lista constantemente, por lo que te recomendamos que en el futuro vuelvas a comprobar si se ha a√±adido el tuyo.El chat est√° disponible todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?¬†When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?¬†¬†First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.What if I can‚Äôt remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can‚Äôt receive SMS for other reasons?If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.Why can‚Äôt I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: ¬øC√≥mo proteger mi identidad?
answer: Para proteger y ayudar a evitar el mal uso de tus datos personales, te recomendamos tener esto en cuenta:N26 nunca va a¬†verificar tu identidad¬†en nombre de otras personas o empresas.¬†Esto incluye verificaciones para contratos de alquiler de vivienda, l√≠neas de cr√©dito u ofertas de trabajo (incluyendo ofertas de N26). Completa el proceso de verificaci√≥n s√≥lo si quieres abrir una cuenta de N26 para ti mismo.Como titular de la cuenta, solo t√∫ debes crear y tener acceso a tus credenciales de inicio de sesi√≥n.¬†As√≠ que nunca abras una cuenta N26 con un correo y contrase√±a predefinidos. Si lo haces, estas credenciales pueden utilizarse para conseguir tu informaci√≥n legal y personal. Tampoco debes iniciar sesi√≥n nunca en una cuenta N26 que no sea la tuya.Nunca env√≠es tu carnet de identidad ni tu pasaporte a desconocidos o destinatarios no verificados.N26 podr√≠a solicitar ciertos documentos cuando alguna de tus transacciones est√© pasando un control rutinario.¬†Env√≠a dicha documentaci√≥n solo a direcciones de email verificadas de N26.N26 nunca te preguntar√° tu usuario, contrase√±a o c√≥digo PIN fuera de la app N26.¬†No proporciones nunca esta informaci√≥n en una app o p√°gina web externa, incluso si parece estar relacionada con N26.Si alguna vez te sientes inseguro, has recibido una solicitud sospechosa de un tercero o piensas que tus credenciales de N26 podr√≠an estar comprometidos, por favor no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros.

question: ¬øC√≥mo solicitar el reembolso y cancelaci√≥n de una domiciliaci√≥n?
answer: El reembolso de una domiciliaci√≥n bancaria no anula el contrato suscrito con el comerciante.Puedes solicitar la devoluci√≥n de una domiciliaci√≥n bancaria SEPA en la app hasta 8 semanas despu√©s de que se haya cargado. question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We‚Äôve made a¬†video (new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: ¬øC√≥mo utilizar los Espacios?
answer: Para empezar a utilizar tus espacios, tendr√°s que ir a la secci√≥n ¬´Espacios¬ª de la app del m√≥vil o la WebApp de N26. question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.¬†Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What‚Äôs a ‚Äúbanking day‚Äù?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn‚Äôt arrived ‚Äî where is it?So what if you‚Äôve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn‚Äôt come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: Wie kann ich mein Smartphone mit meinem Konto verkn√ºpfen oder trennen?
answer:
F√ºr die Nutzung deines N26 Kontos brauchst du eines der folgenden Smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s oder neuer, mindestens auf iOS 11 geupdated)
„Éª Android (6.0 oder neuer)Die Amazon Fire und Oxygen OS Versionen sind zurzeit leider nicht mit N26 kompatibel.Beachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verkn√ºpfen kannst.Wann muss ich mein Smartphone verkn√ºpfen?Du musst dein Smartphone verbinden bzw. entkoppeln, wenn du ein neues Konto bei N26 einrichtest, ein neues Endger√§t nutzt oder deine Telefonnummer wechselst.Wie kann ich mein N26 Konto mit meinem Handy verbinden?Smartphone zum ersten Mal verkn√ºpfenFolge dieser Anleitung, um dein Smartphone zum ersten Mal mit deinem Konto zu verbinden:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein ‚Äì du wirst automatisch aufgefordert, deine Telefonnummer zu best√§tigen.Du erh√§ltst einen 4-stelligen Verkn√ºpfungscode per SMS (neuen Tab). Sobald du ihn eingibst, wird dein Handy automatisch verkn√ºpft.Neues Endger√§t verkn√ºpfenBeachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verkn√ºpfen kannst.Falls du dein N26 Konto mit einem neuen Handy verbinden willst, musst du aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden (neuen Tab) zuerst dein altes Smartphone entkoppeln.So entkoppelst du dein altes Smartphone:Gehe auf üë§ Mein Konto (in der mobilen App) oder √ºber die Web App (neuer Tab) (neuen Tab)Tippe auf SicherheitTippe auf Smartphone entkn√ºpfen.Falls du auf dein altes Smartphone nicht mehr zugreifen kannst:Logge dich unter üë§ Mein Konto einTippe auf SicherheitPr√ºfe dein E-Mail-Postfach f√ºr weitere Anweisungen.Falls du dich √ºber ein neues Ger√§t in deinem Konto anmeldest, erh√§ltst du zwei Codes per SMS:Einen 6-stelligen Code zum EinloggenEinen 4-stelligen Code zum Verkn√ºpfen deines SmartphonesDen 6-stelligen Anmeldecode brauchst du, um dich in dein Konto einzuloggen. question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‚Äòlookalike audiences‚Äô are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: Come posso effettuare l'accesso con l'autenticazione a due fattori?
answer: L‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattori √® una procedura che si basa sull‚Äôuso di due o pi√π elementi di sicurezza. Oltre all‚Äôuso della password personale, con l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori avrai bisogno di confermare l‚Äôaccesso tramite un dispositivo associato oppure un codice che riceverai via sms.¬†¬†¬†Clicca qui per scoprire di pi√π sull‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattoriCome effettuo l‚Äôaccesso con l‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattori?Quando eseguirai l‚Äôaccesso al tuo conto N26 da web app oppure da un dispositivo non associato, ti verr√† richiesto di confermare una notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato. In alternativa, potrai richiedere la ricezione di un codice via sms sul numero di telefono registrato con noi per confermare l‚Äôaccesso al conto.Questa procedura garantisce che soltanto tu possa accedere al tuo conto N26.Quando esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 dal tuo dispositivo associato, l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori ha luogo automaticamente. √à sufficiente accedere utilizzando le tue credenziali.Quali sono i requisiti?Innanzitutto, dovrai aggiornare all‚Äôultima versione sia il sistema operativo del tuo telefono che l‚Äôapp N26. Se ancora non riesci ad accedere al conto ma hai accesso all‚Äôindirizzo email associato al conto, resetta la tua password.¬†Se non hai accesso al tuo indirizzo email, contattaci via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.Cosa devo fare se non ricordo la mia password?Clicca qui per sapere come impostare la tua password.Non riesco ad accedere al mio dispositivo associato. Come posso eseguire il login al mio conto?Se non puoi accedere al tuo dispositivo associato ma puoi utilizzare il numero di telefono registrato, esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 e richiedi un codice di autenticazione.Per fare questo:Accedi alla webapp oppure alla versione mobile di un dispositivo non associato.Quando viene richiesto di confermare l‚Äôaccesso dal dispositivo associato, seleziona Aiuto.Seleziona Invia Codice SMS.Quando riceverai il codice, inseriscilo nel campo dedicato.In questo modo, avrai completato l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori e sarai in grado di associare di nuovo il tuo dispositivo.Cosa devo fare se ho un nuovo numero o non posso ricevere SMS per altri motivi?Se non hai accesso al tuo numero registrato perch√© hai un nuovo numero oppure non sei pi√π in possesso del telefono, contatta la nostra assistenza clienti via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.E se il mio telefono non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp N26?Se hai un dispositivo che non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp, non potrai eseguire l‚Äôaccesso al conto attraverso la versione mobile dell‚Äôapp tramite quel telefono. Potrai utilizzare la versione web per visualizzare informazioni relative al tuo conto. Per fare questo, dovrai confermare il tuo tentativo di accesso attraverso un codice di verifica che verr√† inviato via sms sul numero di telefono associato al tuo conto.Potrai continuare ad effettuare pagamenti e prelievi con la tua Mastercard. Trasferimenti e bonifici, invece, potranno essere eseguiti solo averli confermati tramite l‚Äôapp N26.

question: How to use EasyFlex Savings?
answer: Please note: As of the 16th of September, 2022, new sign-ups to EasyFlex Savings are no longer possible for the time being. If you signed up to EasyFlex Savings before that date, this doesn't affect you and you can continue using this product as usual. With EasyFlex Savings you can earn interest on your savings whilst staying flexible. The minimum deposit is 500‚Ç¨. After that there are no limits on how much you can deposit or withdraw from your EasyFlex Savings. This means there is no fixed saving term and you can access your funds at any time. Transferring money from and to your EasyFlex Savings account takes up to 2 business days. Tap on Explore in the Homescreen of your App, scroll down and tap EasyFlex Savings to open it.FAQsWhat does EasyFlex Savings cost?We charge no fixed fee and nothing on the interest you earn. If you have more than 50.000‚Ç¨ on your N26 account, EasyFlex Savings is a great way to avoid our deposit (new tab) fee whilst earning something extra.¬†How often is the interest paid?Your earned interest is paid to your EasyFlex Savings account every quarter (3 months). You can choose to withdraw it, or keep it in your EasyFlex Savings to earn even more interest.Is the interest rate fixed?No. Your interest rate may vary, depending on the partner bank. We always strive to be transparent and offer you the most competitive rates, so we‚Äôll be sure to let you know if your interest rate changes at any time.Do I need to pay income tax on the interest earned in my savings account?You must declare your earned interest as part of your personal income tax declaration to the responsible tax authority. Whether you need to pay income tax on your earned interest will depend on your personal circumstances. You will receive an annual statement from our partner bank in your in-app inbox each year, which will show you the total interest amount that you need to declare.How does N26 provide the EasyFlex Savings service?We partnered up with Raisin who are also known as WeltSparen to offer EasyFlex Savings as a completely digital service. Our partner bank for this product is the Norwegian Komplett Bank.Is my money safe in EasyFlex Savings?Yes. You are covered by the applicable Deposit Guarantee Scheme that protects your funds up to ‚Ç¨100.000 (paid out in the Norwegian Krone equivalent).

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.¬†If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won‚Äôt be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Disponible en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Pa√≠ses Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia y El Reino Unido.
