question: FATCA - La raz√≥n por la que pedimos cierta informaci√≥n a nuestros clientes
answer: N26, al igual que toda instituci√≥n financiera, est√° obligado a informar al Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos y a su Servicio de Impuestos Internos (IRS, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) de cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de quienes denominan ¬´personas estadounidenses¬ª, que vienen a ser tanto los ciudadanos de dicha nacionalidad como los residentes fiscales en EE.UU.FATCA es el acr√≥nimo de Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, o Ley de cumplimiento tributario de las cuentas extranjeras, una normativa que lucha contra el fraude fiscal. Introducido por el IRS, el prop√≥sito de FATCA es incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas estadounidenses utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.Encuentra m√°s informaci√≥n sobre FATCA en la web del IRS (pesta√±a nueva).EE.UU. cuenta con un sistema de impuestos que incluye tambi√©n a ciudadanos que no son residentes en EE.UU., a diferencia de la mayor√≠a de los pa√≠ses del mundo que solo cobran impuestos a los ciudadanos residentes, pero no a los ciudadanos que viven y trabajan en el extranjero.¬†Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:¬øEres un ciudadano o posees la Carta Verde de Estados Unidos?¬øEst√°s sujeto a pagar impuestos en Estados Unidos?¬†Estar ‚Äò‚Äôsujeto a pagar impuestos‚Äô‚Äô en EE.UU. no significa necesariamente que tengas que pagar impuestos all√≠. Significa que seg√∫n de EE.UU. tienes que rellenar un formulario y declarar tus impuestos internacionales al IRS, incluso si no tienes que pagar los impuestos en EE.UU.¬† 3. Si la respuesta es s√≠, ¬øCu√°l es tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal en Estados Unidos?Este n√∫mero (pesta√±a nueva) puede ser tanto tu n√∫mero de la Seguridad Social en EE.UU. (SSN) o tu N√∫mero Individual de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal (ITIN).¬†Adem√°s, si tu cuenta muestra EE.UU. como lugar de nacimiento, un n√∫mero de tel√©fono de EE.UU. o estableces una transferencia programada a EE.UU., tenemos que asumir, de acuerdo con la legislaci√≥n FATCA, que est√°s sujeto a esta normativa, a no ser que nos confirmes de forma espec√≠fica lo contrario.¬†En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaci√≥n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesi√≥n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuraci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaci√≥n.¬†¬†

question: Chi pu√≤ aprire un conto N26 Business?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Vale per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia e Svizzera.Come funzionano i conti N26 Business?N26 offre un‚Äôampia gamma di conti Business (nuova tabella), pensati per i possessori di partita IVA (freelance e liberi professionisti e ditte individuali), con una Mastercard associata che d√† diritto fino allo 0,5% di cashback mensile su tutti i pagamenti effettuati per fini commerciali.(Il cashback offerto con i conti N26 Business √® diverso dal cashback di Stato, attivabile al momento con tutte le Mastercard N26).Oltre ad N26 Business (nuova tabella), se sei interessato ad una copertura Allianz e ad altri vantaggi Premium, potrai scegliere tra N26 Business You (nuova tabella) , N26 Business Metal (nuova tabella) e N26 Business Smart (nuova tabella).¬†I conti N26 Business (nuova tabella) sono riservati esclusivamente a:liberi professionisti iscritti ad un albo o ordine professionale (ad esempio architetti, avvocati, farmacisti, infermieri...)freelance, ovvero lavoratori autonomi e imprenditori individuali in possesso di una partita IVA (come designer, fotografi, elettricisti o i titolari di B&B e casa vacanza con partita IVA)ditte individuali iscritte al Registro Imprese della Camera di CommercioNon √® possibile invece intestare un conto N26 Business a:¬†Societ√† di persone (ad es. S.n.c e S.a.s.)¬†Societ√† di capitali (ad es. s.r.l. e S.p.A.)¬†enti e soggetti dotati di personalit√† e soggettivit√† giuridica.¬†Ti ricordiamo inoltre che non √® possibile passare da un conto N26 Standard o Premium ad un conto N26 Business, e viceversa. Che cos‚Äô√® la partita IVA e dove posso trovarla?La Partita Iva √® un codice numerico di 11 cifre, che serve ad identificare il titolare di una data attivit√† professionale in modo univoco, come il codice fiscale personale.¬†Per la legge italiana, chiunque svolga un‚Äôattivit√† continuativa per pi√π di 30 giorni, infatti, ha l‚Äôobbligo di apertura di partita IVA. Questa pu√≤ essere di due tipi: in regime fiscale ordinario o forfettario, a seconda dei ricavi e delle spese sostenute per l'attivit√†.L‚Äôapertura della partita IVA avviene tramite la presentazione di un apposito modulo presso l‚ÄôAgenzia delle Entrate:Modello AA9/12 (nuova tabella) per le persone fisiche;Modello AA7/10 (nuova tabella) per le societ√†.Il modulo dovr√† essere presentato o inviato online tramite il portale dell'Agenzia delle Entrate (nuova tabella) entro 30 giorni dall‚Äôavvio dell‚Äôattivit√† professionale.Non appena la domanda di apertura verr√† approvata e completata, riceverai il Certificato di attribuzione della partita IVA contenente il relativo codice a te assegnato per posta e sull‚Äôarea riservata del portale dell'Agenzia delle Entrate (nuova tabella). Che cos‚Äô√® il codice ATECO e dove posso trovarlo?Il codice ATECO √® una sigla alfanumerica che serve a classificare un‚Äôattivit√† commerciale e ad assegnare a tale impresa un livello di rischio, secondo la classificazione ATECO 2007 (nuova tabella) attualmente in vigore.Il codice dovr√† essere inserito al momento della richiesta di apertura della partita IVA, allo scopo di comunicare all‚ÄôAgenzia delle Entrate la tipologia dell‚Äôattivit√† che si andr√† a svolgere.¬†Sar√† possibile inoltre aggiungere diversi codici ATECO con l‚Äôapertura di ulteriori partite IVA.Puoi trovare il codice ATECO sulCertificato di attribuzione della partita IVA o sulla Visura Camerale nel caso di ditte individuali.

question: ¬øCu√°nto tarda una transferencia?
answer: Las transferencias SEPA inmediatas entrantes a cuentas de N26 son inmediatas, siempre y cuando se env√≠en desde un banco que admite transferencias inmediatas. No obstante, las transferencias pueden retrasarse si tienen que verificarse debido a las normativas bancarias SEPA.Las transferencias SEPA ordinarias entrantes tardan un m√°ximo de 2 d√≠as laborables. Ten en cuenta que, si se hace una transferencia justo antes de un fin de semana o de un d√≠a festivo, el plazo obviamente se prolongar√° a un m√°ximo de 3 d√≠as laborables.Las transferencias SWIFT entrantes tardan hasta 4 d√≠as laborables en recibirse.¬†Las transferencias SEPA inmediatas salientes llegan al instante. Las transferencias SEPA ordinarias tardan hasta 2 d√≠as laborables. Las transferencias en divisas extranjeras con nuestro socio Wise tardan hasta 4 d√≠as laborables. No ofrecemos transferencias SWIFT salientes.¬øQu√© es un ¬´d√≠a laborable bancario¬ª?Un d√≠a laborable bancario equivale a dos d√≠as laborables debido a los horarios de apertura de los bancos participantes. Todo d√≠a de la semana que no sea festivo se considera un d√≠a laborable.Mi transferencia no ha llegado: ¬ød√≥nde est√°?Bueno... ¬øqu√© pasa si has tenido en cuenta todo lo que te hemos indicado anteriormente y la transferencia todav√≠a no ha llegado? En ese caso, solo el banco emisor puede iniciar una investigaci√≥n interna.Por desgracia, desde N26 no podemos investigar las transferencias entrantes, sino solo las salientes. Pero puedes consultar esta lista de posibles motivos por los que una transferencia puede fallar.Informaci√≥n adicionalEl sistema con el que enviamos todas nuestras transferencias SEPA se llama TARGET2 (pesta√±a nueva), procesan los pagos todos los d√≠as laborables de 07:00 a 18:00 GMT y cierran los siguientes d√≠as: 1 de enero (A√±o Nuevo), Viernes Santo, Lunes de Pascua, Primero de Mayo, 25 de diciembre (Navidad) y 26 de diciembre.

question: Wie sperre ich den Magnetstreifen auf meiner Karte?
answer: Es gibt mehrere M√∂glichkeiten, eine Kartenzahlung zu t√§tigen: kontaktlos (durch ein Dranhalten deiner Karte an ein Zahlungsterminal), mit Chip & PIN sowie per Magnetstreifen, bei der deine Karte durch ein Leseger√§t gezogen wird. Obwohl Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen immer seltener werden, verlangen einige H√§ndler immer noch, dass du mit dieser Methode bezahlst.Warum sollte ich Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen sperren?Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen machen einen relativ hohen Anteil an betr√ºgerischen Kartentransaktionen aus. Einige H√§ndler verf√ºgen √ºber betr√ºgerische Systeme, um die Daten deiner Karte zu kopieren und sie anschlie√üend f√ºr betr√ºgerische Transaktionen zu verwenden. Dieser Vorgang wird als "Skimming" bezeichnet. Durch die Sperrung von Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen kannst du dich vor diesem Risiko sch√ºtzen.Wie kann ich Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen sperren/entsperren?Um Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen zu deaktivieren, gehe wie folgt vor:¬†Gehe auf Karten.¬†Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gew√ºnschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Magnetstreifen.Schalte die Funktion Magnetstreifen aktivieren aus.Hier kannst du auch die Sperrung des Magnetstreifens wieder aufheben. Die von dir vorgenommenen √Ñnderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gew√§hlte Karte angewendet.

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you‚Äôve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that‚Äôs needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you‚Äôd like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

answer: Wenn du ein N26 Standard-Konto er√∂ffnest, erh√§ltst du kostenlos eine virtuelle Karte (vorausgesetzt, du hast ein einmaliges Mindestguthaben von 10 ‚Ç¨, um die Karte zu aktivieren).Beim Online-Shopping ist eine Virtual Card ideal: Du kannst deine zus√§tzlichen Kartendaten unbesorgt in Apps und Onlineshops angeben und Abozahlungen separat von anderen Ausgaben verwalten. Gut zu wissen: Kunden von N26 Standard haben die M√∂glichkeit, eine physische Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨ zu bestellen (ohne ein Upgrade auf ein Premium-Abo vornehmen zu m√ºssen).Wie kann ich meine virtuelle Karte bestellen und aktivieren?Logge dich in dein Konto ein und √∂ffne den Tab "Karten" in der unteren rechten Ecke.Tippe auf "Zusatzkarte erhalten".W√§hle oben "Virtuell" und tippe dann unten auf "Ausw√§hlen".Lies dir die Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen durch, stimme ihnen zu und tippe dann auf "Virtuelle Karte erstellen".F√ºge deine virtuelle Karte zu Apple Pay oder Google Pay hinzu oder √ºberspringe diesen Schritt.Wie verwende ich meine virtuelle Karte?Bezahlen im Gesch√§ft mit Apple oder Google Pay: Verbinde deine virtuelle Karte entweder mit Apple oder Google Pay, je nach Ger√§t.Bargeld abheben: Sobald du deine virtuelle Karte mit deinem Apple oder Google Wallet verkn√ºpft hast, kannst du Bargeld an Geldautomaten abheben, die dies kontaktlos erm√∂glichen. Du kannst auch CASH26 nutzen, um Bargeld einzuzahlen oder abzuheben (DE, AT, IT, ES und GR).Online einkaufen: Alle Details zu deiner virtuellen Karte kannst du in deiner N26 App einsehen (Kartennummer, Ablaufdatum und CVV-Nummer). Und zwar folgenderma√üen:Logge dich in deiner mobilen App von N26 ein.W√§hle ‚ÄòKarten‚Äô.Gehe zu deiner virtuellen Karte (wenn du mehrere hast, musst du dazu ggf. nach links wischen).W√§hle ‚ÄòKartendetails‚Äô.Du musst dann deine Best√§tigungs-PIN eingeben oder dich biometrisch einloggen, bevor dir deine Kartendaten 60 Sekunden lang angezeigt werden.Die virtuelle Mastercard ist nur f√ºr N26 Standard-Konten verf√ºgbar, die ab Februar 2021 er√∂ffnet werden, und f√ºr alle N26 Premiumkonten ab dem 9. Oktober 2021.

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: How to close my account?
answer: We‚Äôre sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We‚Äôd love to keep you as a customer‚Äîtell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.¬†If you‚Äôve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here‚Äôs what to do:Make your account balance ‚Ç¨0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is ‚Ç¨0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You‚Äôll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you‚Äôre unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or ‚Äúas soon as possible‚ÄùYour full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we‚Äôll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: ¬øC√≥mo saber el PIN de mi tarjeta o de mi cuenta?
answer: Lo primero es aclarar que, en N26, hay dos c√≥digos PIN diferentes: el PIN de confirmaci√≥n y el PIN de la tarjeta. ¬°Ah! Y los dos los creas t√∫.El PIN de confirmaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva) lo creas cuando vinculas tu m√≥vil a la cuenta por primera vez (suele ser en cuanto la abres) y sirve para confirmar las transferencias y cualquier otra operaci√≥n que hagas desde la app.Se puede cambiar desde Mi cuenta > Seguridad > Cambiar c√≥digo PIN.El PIN de la tarjeta (pesta√±a nueva) lo creas cuando recibes y activas la tarjeta. La app te pide que elijas un PIN para la tarjeta, que sirve para sacar dinero del cajero y pagar en tiendas. Se puede cambiar desde Tarjetas > Configuraci√≥n de tarjeta > Cambiar PIN. Y no olvides hacer una retirada en un cajero para que se grabe el cambio de PIN (similar a cuando la activas por primera vez).Cosas importantes:Nosotros no te enviamos ning√∫n PIN por correo ni te lo diremos nunca por email, tel√©fono o chat. Solo t√∫ conoces los c√≥digos PIN asociados a tu cuenta y solo t√∫ los deber√≠as conocer.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ning√∫n PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcci√≥n u otra combinaci√≥n con d√≠gitos repetidos o secuencias (como, por ejemplo: 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el n√∫mero que has elegido no es v√°lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaci√≥n diferente.Puedes ver m√°s informaci√≥n espec√≠fica sobre cada uno de ellos en los links de arriba.

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?

question: Deposit fee

question: ¬øPor qu√© N26 hace controles en las transacciones?
answer: Tenemos la responsabilidad de realizar controles rutinarios en cuentas y transacciones para asegurar la seguridad de tu cuenta (ver¬†GwG ¬ß 10 (pesta√±a nueva)). Estos controles se basan en transacciones individuales y los inicia nuestro sistema de forma autom√°tica.Como consecuencia, podemos llegar a pedirte alg√∫n documento. Si recibes una solicitud de este tipo, simplemente env√≠a los documentos necesarios v√≠a Mensajes de N26. No habr√° excepciones ni forma de pasar por alto dichos controles. Este es un proceso est√°ndar para todos los bancos que nos permite asegurar la seguridad a nuestros clientes. Tanto el proceso como el resultado son confidenciales y se tratan de forma interna, lo cual nos ayuda a garantizar la seguridad para nuestros clientes y sus transacciones.Aqu√≠ tienes algunos consejos que te ahorrar√°n tiempo en el proceso:El documento que necesitas se especifica en el correo que has recibido de N26. Estos documentos nos los puedes enviar escaneados, en fotos o en capturas de pantalla (siempre y cuando el documento est√© claramente legible). Env√≠a tambi√©n una descripci√≥n detallada. S√© concreto en tus respuestas, detalles y documentos. Si tus documentos no corroboran claramente tus declaraciones o si omites detalles, tendremos que preguntar otra vez.Responde lo antes posible y dentro del plazo que se indica en el mensaje. Puedes usar el email que has recibido de N26 para responder directamente y adjuntar los documentos.El servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente de N26 no tiene m√°s informaci√≥n sobre este tema.Debes proporcionar¬†documentos v√°lidos¬†dependiendo de tu situaci√≥n, a continuaci√≥n puedes ver algunos ejemplos:Has recibido ayuda econ√≥mica de tu familia para alg√∫n proyecto o has heredado propiedades o dinero: un contrato de concesi√≥n o pr√©stamo, un documento oficial de herencia o un documento oficial de la fuente del pr√©stamo (como por ejemplo los documentos de venta de una propiedad para financiar el pr√©stamo o los extractos bancarios de los parientes que lo otorgan. Has vendido una propiedad o acciones en el mercado de valores: el contrato que muestra el acuerdo o el documento oficial del notario respecto a la transacci√≥n de la propiedad. Has recibido o enviado dinero para pagar facturas o alg√∫n producto: documentos que demuestren el saldo disponible confirmando la procedencia del dinero o documentos que muestren el uso del dinero para dicho dep√≥sito.Has recibido el finiquito de tu antigua empresa: documentos que prueben el cese de la actividad, detallando el pago y/o un extracto bancario de tu antigua empresa.

question: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†
You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†
What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: How to make N26 my main account?
answer:
We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: we‚Äôll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and we‚Äôll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.There are three ways to switch your bank accounts over to N26:Account switching service powered by finleap connect GmbHTogether with our partner finleap connect GmbH (new tab) we‚Äôre offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. It‚Äôs an automated process and completely free. Log into your N26 mobile app and tap on My account > Switch to N26. Tap Start now and follow the instructions.Alternatively, you can use our¬†form (new tab)¬†and log in with your previous bank account details. Once you‚Äôve filled in all required information, it‚Äôll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Account switching service supportYou could also inform your payment partners yourself. To do this, fill out the letter to notify your payment partners (new tab) and send it to them. You could also request the¬†termination of your bank account (new tab) with your previous bank by filling out the form and sending it to them.This service is also free. If you need help with this process, contact our Customer Support via chat.Mandatory account switching service as per ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz)All German licensed banks are required to offer a bank account switching service as part or ¬ß21 ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz). To initiate this service, please download and print the¬†account switching form (new tab) and send it to: N26 Bank GmbH
Kontowechsel

10179 BerlinOnce we‚Äôve received your request, we‚Äôll process it within 7 business days. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.We charge a fee of up to ‚Ç¨20 for this service, depending on your individual request.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: ¬øPor qu√© me han cobrado dos veces?
answer: Ofrecemos banking en tiempo real, lo que significa que puedes ver todo lo que ocurre en tu cuenta en todo momento; y esto incluye las autorizaciones. Hay dos tipos de transacciones que se dan durante una compra, tanto en tienda como online:Autorizaci√≥n: un importe bloqueado o una reserva hecha por un comercio; ya sea el caf√© que te tomas por la ma√±ana, la reserva de un hotel o un coche de alquiler (incluyendo dep√≥sitos de seguridad).Presentaci√≥n del pago: el importe real que se deduce de tu cuenta; ese caf√© ya se ha cobrado del todo, o te han devuelto el dep√≥sito de seguridad tras tu estancia en el hotel, cobr√°ndote solo el precio de la habitaci√≥n.Una vez que la autorizaci√≥n se ha confirmado, no podemos cancelarla ni revocarla. En este momento solo pueden pasar tres cosas con tu autorizaci√≥n: que se convierta en una presentaci√≥n, que se rechace o que caduque. En los √∫ltimos dos casos, ver√°s que el dinero vuelve a tu cuenta autom√°ticamente en un m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as.En ocasiones podr√≠as ver ambas transacciones a la vez, la autorizaci√≥n y la presentaci√≥n del pago; lo que ocurre cuando el lector de tarjetas del comerciante se desconecta o tiene problemas t√©cnicos durante el pago. Al final, la autorizaci√≥n acabar√° caducando y, si no caducase en 12 d√≠as, podremos ayudarte a¬†recuperar tu dinero.Doble cargo en gasolineras y autopistasEn algunas autopistas espa√±olas (como Acesa) esto sucede muy a menudo debido al sistema de pagos que utilizan.Tambi√©n es com√∫n que esto pase en algunas gasolineras espa√±olas, sobre todo en las m√°s peque√±as.Recuerda:Las cantidades bloqueadas como dep√≥sito por alquiler de coche pueden tardar hasta 30 d√≠as en volver a tu cuenta (en vez de 12).Algunos comerciantes hacen autorizaciones de verificaci√≥n (normalmente cantidades muy peque√±as), con el objetivo de comprobar si tu tarjeta est√° activa y tiene fondos. Este dinero siempre acabar√° volviendo a tu saldo disponible.La cantidad de una autorizaci√≥n podr√≠a acabar siendo diferente a la de la presentaci√≥n final por¬†varias razones.

question: What's a garnishment?
answer: If you owe money to a third party, a fiscal authority or another kind of authority your account might be garnished. But what is a garnishment?A garnishment is a regulatory measure (normally effected by court) that seizes funds directly on your account as you owe them to a third party or to fiscal authorities so you cannot spend your funds in a different way.What happens in case of a garnishment?We are legally obligated to seize your account as soon as we receive a garnishment and transfer order from the creditor. Furthermore, we are obligated to transfer the garnishment amount to the creditor. We do this 4 weeks after receiving the garnishment or transfer order, unless you choose an alternative solution in this period.If we receive a garnishment we'll send you an in-app message to Messages from N26 with the following informationDateName of the creditor (and name of their legal attorney)Reference numberGarnishment amountYour account will remain seized until the entire claim has been settled. This means that you can‚Äôt make any payments with your N26 account. As soon as the garnishment is lifted, we‚Äôll notify you in your ‚ÄúMessages from N26‚Äù mailbox. If you have any questions about garnishment, please contact your creditor or the competent enforcement court.

question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Black, Amber and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 Metal (new tab):If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: ¬øC√≥mo revocar mi consentimiento para aparecer visible como usuario de N26?
answer:
Para procesar las transferencias instant√°neas a trav√©s de MoneyBeam o utilizar los Espacios Compartidos, N26 asocia tu informaci√≥n de contacto con otros usuarios de N26.Ser visible para los dem√°s usuarios de N26 te permite utilizar todas las funciones de la cuenta, como por ejemplo MoneyBeam, con la que puedes enviar dinero a tiempo real sin necesidad de introducir un IBAN y solo seleccionando un contacto de tu lista. Adem√°s, tambi√©n puedes solicitar a un contacto que te env√≠e dinero y este puede aceptar o rechazar tu petici√≥n. Tener la visibilidad activa, tambi√©n te permite utilizar los Espacios Compartidos con alguien que elijas de tu lista.En este art√≠culo te explicamos como aparecer visible para otros usuarios de N26. Si aceptas aparecer visible como usuario de N26, todos los contactos guardados en tu m√≥vil que tengan una cuenta N26, aparecer√°n en la lista de contactos de la app N26. question: How does N26 Business work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: What are the benefits of N26 You?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

¬øPor qu√© he recibido este email?En N26, la seguridad es nuestra m√°xima prioridad. question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal¬†contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you‚Äôre now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you‚Äôll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.¬†RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.¬† At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of ‚Ç¨10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Have you been victim of a fraud? Contact us.
answer:
Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please help us save you time and contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you‚Äôre an N26 customer and have an authorized or unauthorized card transaction which you want to dispute, please use our dedicated and complete service in the N26 mobile app. The hotline above exclusively helps in case of transfers to a suspicious account with an N26 IBAN.Did you get a SMS followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt. This is how the fraud works:You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one (new tab) The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App> My Account> Settings >Security> Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,¬† send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comIn the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab).I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behaviour.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.Useful links:What is phishing?What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: ¬øC√≥mo bloqueo la banda magn√©tica de mi tarjeta?
answer: Hay muchas formas de realizar un pago con tarjeta: contactless (‚Äútocando‚Äù con la tarjeta), con chip y PIN, y con la banda magn√©tica, donde tienes que pasar la tarjeta por un lector. Pese a que las transacciones con banda magn√©tica son cada vez menos habituales, algunos negocios todav√≠a te exigen pagar utilizando este m√©todo.¬øPor qu√© deber√≠a bloquear las transacciones con banda magn√©tica?Los pagos mediante banda magn√©tica representan un alto porcentaje de transacciones con tarjeta realizadas de un modo fraudulento. Algunos comercios tienen sistemas fraudulentos para copiar los datos de tu tarjeta, que luego utilizan para realizar transacciones fraudulentas; a este proceso se le denomina ‚Äúcard skimming‚Äù. Si bloqueas las transacciones con banda magn√©tica, estar√°s a salvo de este peligro.¬øC√≥mo puedo bloquear y desbloquear las transacciones con banda magn√©tica?Para bloquear las transacciones con banda magn√©tica, debes hacer lo siguiente:¬†Ve a Tarjetas.¬†Si tienes varias tarjetas, desliza a la derecha hasta que encuentres la tarjeta que quieras.Pulsa Configuraci√≥n.Pulsa Banda magn√©ticaCambia la opci√≥n Activar banda magn√©tica.¬†En esta misma opci√≥n tambi√©n puedes volver a desbloquear la banda magn√©tica. Los cambios que lleves a cabo se aplicar√°n de inmediato a la tarjeta que hayas escogido.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.¬†¬†Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules¬†As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.¬†Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.¬†Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.¬†For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating ‚Äúpermanent home‚Äù as a stronger form of attachment than ‚Äútemporary residence‚Äù). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number¬†Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country‚Äôs tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.¬†¬†The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities¬†As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.¬†Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.¬†We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.¬†Our recommendation¬†Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.¬†We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù, indicate whether you‚Äôre a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you‚Äôre tax resident in more than one country), click ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.¬†

question: ¬øCu√°nto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustituci√≥n de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?

El env√≠o fuera de estos pa√≠ses (pesta√±a nueva) puede conllevar un coste adicional.¬†¬øCu√°nto tardar√°?Todas las tarjetas de sustituci√≥n de tarjetas que caducan o han caducado se env√≠an mediante un env√≠o est√°ndar. Tarda hasta 15 d√≠as h√°biles y es gratuito. En zonas rurales o de dif√≠cil acceso puede tardar m√°s.
