question: ¬øPor qu√© me han cobrado m√°s de lo esperado?
answer: Todas las transacciones se hacen en tiempo real. Te avisaremos cada vez que haya una transacci√≥n entrante o saliente mediante una notificaci√≥n push.En ocasiones, una transacci√≥n puede resultar sospechosa debido a que la cantidad final es diferente a la cantidad original. Esto puede deberse a varias razones:Un comerciante puede bloquear una cantidad superior a la del precio del servicio a modo de dep√≥sito (ocurre a menudo en las estaciones de servicio, con el alquiler de veh√≠culos o con reservas de hotel). La diferencia entre el dep√≥sito y el precio del servicio se ingresar√° en tu cuenta cuando pase la fecha de vencimiento.Los tipos de cambio pueden dar lugar a ligeras variaciones en las transacciones en moneda extranjera.En ambos casos, no cobramos ning√∫n inter√©s por la diferencia de las cuant√≠as. Pero da por sentado que si una transacci√≥n no se ha autorizado por ti, el propietario de la cuenta, te ayudaremos a¬†recuperar tu dinero.

question: ¬øPor qu√© tengo que enviar m√°s documentos?
answer: Cuando hayas iniciado el proceso de verificaci√≥n para abrir tu cuenta bancaria N26 y recibas un email que te pida informaci√≥n adicional para continuar con tu registro, lee la siguiente informaci√≥n que te ayudar√° con la solicitud.N26 es un banco regulado y, en determinadas circunstancias, puede que necesitemos informaci√≥n adicional de nuestros clientes para continuar con el registro. Lo que te solicitamos es un procedimiento est√°ndar que se ajusta a los requisitos legales y reglamentarios. Necesitamos que nos proporciones documentos espec√≠ficos para abrir una cuenta bancaria en N26.Somos conscientes de que esta informaci√≥n es muy personal y la informaci√≥n que nos env√≠es se mantendr√° estrictamente confidencial. Y solo se utilizar√° para cumplir con nuestras obligaciones legales.¬øQu√© documentos tengo que enviar?Cuando inicies el proceso de verificaci√≥n y recibas un email que te solicita m√°s informaci√≥n, tendr√°s que responder al email que recibiste con la siguiente informaci√≥n. Te informamos de que solo tienes que enviar los documentos que enumeramos en el email. A continuaci√≥n, te ofrecemos una lista de lo que te pedimos:Justificante de residencia: Ejemplo: Factura de gas, agua o luz (de menos de 3 meses de antig√ºedad). O certificado de registro.Justificante salarial: Ejemplo: Contrato laboral, n√≥mina o declaraci√≥n de bienes y rentas (si nos env√≠as uno de estos dos √∫ltimos, te rogamos que taches los datos relativos a tu confesi√≥n religiosa y tu estado civil si aparecen en ellos)Motivo por el que resides en el pa√≠s X: Ejemplo: Documentaci√≥n de visado, justificante de estudios, fuente de riqueza:Ejemplo: Contratos, extractos bancarios, informaci√≥n relativa a la venta de bienes, ganancias patrimoniales o herencias¬øC√≥mo puedo enviaros esta informaci√≥n?Te informamos de que nuestro sistema est√° dise√±ado por defecto para proteger la entrega de correos electr√≥nicos mediante cifrado TLS o una conexi√≥n superior. Es decir, que si tu servidor de correo electr√≥nico acepta el cifrado TLS entrante o una conexi√≥n superior, los emails que intercambies con nosotros se cifrar√°n a trav√©s de la red (de extremo a extremo). Si tu servidor de correo electr√≥nico no admite el cifrado TLS o una conexi√≥n superior, puede que el email que nos env√≠es no est√© cifrado, por lo que te recomendamos que utilices la opci√≥n de env√≠o postal f√≠sico, que es una forma m√°s segura de intercambiar informaci√≥n, a la siguiente direcci√≥n: N26 GmbH, Sign-up document, Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.Si escoges el env√≠o por email, consulta las instrucciones que se te indican en el email que has recibido a este respecto.¬†Si decides responder por email, te rogamos que env√≠es copias escaneadas, fotograf√≠as y/o capturas de pantalla, con una descripci√≥n detallada de cada documento. Todo debe ser claro, legible y no superar los 15 MB en total.Recibir√°s tu respuesta durante los pr√≥ximos 3 d√≠as laborables.Importante: Enviar informaci√≥n falsa y/o inexacta es un delito. Si lo haces, no podremos aceptar tu solicitud.

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?¬†When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?¬†¬†First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.What if I can‚Äôt remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can‚Äôt receive SMS for other reasons?If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.Why can‚Äôt I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
answer: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.‚ÄùAll of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

question: Why do I pay the church tax?
answer: We‚Äôre legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.You‚Äôre entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through an¬†Erkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk (new tab)¬†form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.Further information is available on the website of the¬†German Federal Central Office for Taxation (new tab).

question: ¬øQu√© es el phishing?
answer:
El phishing es una herramienta sencilla y eficaz que los hackers emplean para enga√±ar a la gente y conseguir que les env√≠en informaci√≥n personal confidencial. Una vez que se hacen con ella, la utilizan para cometer distintos tipos de fraudes haci√©ndose pasar por sus v√≠ctimas. Si quieres saber m√°s,lee la entrada de nuestro blog sobre c√≥mo reconocer y evitar los ataques de phishing (pesta√±a nueva). (pesta√±a nueva)C√≥mo denunciar emails y mensajes sospechososN26 nunca te enviar√° mensajes de texto ni emails que contengan advertencias con un tiempo limitado para que inicies sesi√≥n en tu cuenta y compartas informaci√≥n confidencial. Nunca te enviaremos un ultim√°tum ni te pediremos que te identifiques ni que verifiques tus datos fuera de nuestros canales de comunicaci√≥n seguros.Emails sospechososSi recibes un email sospechoso, no hagas clic en ning√∫n enlace ni descargues el contenido del mensaje. Para poder investigar el caso, te pedimos que:Reenv√≠es el email sospechoso a nuestra direcci√≥n de correo support@n26.com;Si puedes, guarda el email sospechoso como un archivo .eml y env√≠anoslo. La mayor√≠a de proveedores de correo electr√≥nico guardan los emails con este formato cuando te los descargas. Si nos env√≠as el mensaje en este formato, podremos localizar el verdadero origen del mensaje sospechoso para denunciarlo a las autoridades pertinentes. Si no consigues guardar el email en este formato, no pasa nada. Puedes limitarte a reenviar el email sospechoso a la direcci√≥n de correo antes mencionada.¬†No nos env√≠es capturas de pantalla, por favor, ya que no podemos utilizar esa informaci√≥n. Por √∫ltimo, borra el correo de tu bandeja de entrada.Mensajes de texto sospechososSi recibes un mensaje de texto sospechoso, no hagas clic en ning√∫n enlace ni facilites ning√∫n tipo de informaci√≥n.Para poder investigar el asunto, te pedimos que hagas lo siguiente:¬†Haz una captura del mensaje recibido y env√≠ala a support@n26.com.Aseg√∫rate de que se vea el mensaje completo, incluido el n√∫mero de tel√©fono desde donde se ha enviado el mensaje y la fecha y hora.Cuando te confirmemos que has recibido un SMS phishing, bloquea el n√∫mero que te lo ha enviado.Por √∫ltimo, borra el mensaje del m√≥vil.¬†Llamadas telef√≥nicas sospechosas
Si recibes una llamada sospechosa, provenga o no de uno de nuestros n√∫meros de tel√©fono, no proporciones datos personales ni relativos a tu cuenta ni a la tarjeta asociada a la misma. Te recordamos que, en algunos casos, con la t√©cnica de ¬´falseamiento del tel√©fono¬ª, los estafadores pueden modificar el n√∫mero de tel√©fono del remitente para que parezca id√©ntico al del banco.Por este motivo, si sospechas que has sido v√≠ctima de una estafa telef√≥nica o has proporcionado tus datos personales, contacta inmediatamente con el Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente a trav√©s de support@n26.com.C√≥mo denunciar un sitio web falsoPuede que en alg√∫n momento te topes con un sitio web ilegal en el que se anuncien servicios de N26 de forma fraudulenta. Tambi√©n puede que veas nuestro logo en webs supuestamente afiliadas. Puede que ofrezcan pr√©stamos, promociones u ofertas de tiempo limitado. Ten en cuenta que el hecho de que ¬´N26¬ª aparezca en la URL del sitio web en cuesti√≥n no significa que dicha web sea leg√≠tima.Si tienes la sospecha de estar en un sitio web fraudulento, te sugerimos que te tomes un momento para hacer lo siguiente:Comprueba la barra de direcciones y aseg√∫rate de que en la URL aparezca lo siguiente: https://app.n26.com/login. Si no es el caso, copia la URL y den√∫nciala inmediatamente a support@n26.com.¬†

question: ¬øC√≥mo usar Bizum en N26?
answer: Bizum es una plataforma de pagos integrada en la app de N26 que conecta tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono con tu cuenta bancaria y permite enviar y recibir dinero al instante entre clientes de diferentes bancos, utilizando √∫nicamente el n√∫mero de tel√©fono del destinatario.¬†Con Bizum tambi√©n puedes solicitar dinero a alguien, enviando notificaciones a quien ser√° el remitente. Una vez que acepte tu solicitud, recibir√°s el dinero de forma inmediata.Requisitos para usar Bizum con tu cuenta N26:Tener un IBAN (pesta√±a nueva) espa√±ol (ES)Tener acceso al n√∫mero de tel√©fono registrado en tu cuenta bancaria (pesta√±a nueva). Recuerda siempre mantener tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono actualizado.¬†Tener tu smartphone vinculado a la app N26 (pesta√±a nueva). ¬øC√≥mo activar BIZUM en N26?¬°Es muy f√°cil! Tienes que ir a la pantalla de Inicio de la app y pulsar en ¬´Enviar dinero¬ª , luego haz click en ¬´Empezar¬ª. Tendr√°s que confirmar tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono y luego habr√°s completado el registro.¬†¬øQu√© hacer si no es posible completar el registro en Bizum porque el n√∫mero de tel√©fono ya est√° siendo usado en otra cuenta?Esto puede suceder por diversos motivos, te recomendamos:¬†Verificar que tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono est√© actualizado en N26.Ten en cuenta que, hasta el momento, solo es posible tener Bizum vinculado a una √∫nica cuenta bancaria. Por lo tanto, si ya lo est√°s usando en otra cuenta, tendr√°s que desvincularlo o seguir los pasos de Portabilidad que explicamos m√°s abajo para usar Bizum con N26.Si tu situaci√≥n no es ninguna de las dos anteriormente mencionadas, te recomendamos que contactes con nuestro Servicio de Atenci√≥n al cliente desde la app para mayor asistencia. Portabilidad: ¬øC√≥mo traer tu cuenta de Bizum a N26 desde otro banco?Durante la activaci√≥n de Bizum en N26, despu√©s de ingresar tus datos personales, la app identificar√° si ya est√°s registrado en Bizum con otro Banco. Para poder activarlo en N26, tendr√°s que introducir un c√≥digo que te enviaremos por SMS.¬†¬øC√≥mo funciona Bizum?¬†Ve a la pantalla de Inicio y pulsa en ¬´Enviar dinero¬ª o ¬´Recibir dinero¬ª, seg√∫n lo que quieras hacer, selecciona la opci√≥n ¬´Bizum¬ª, introduce el tel√©fono de tu contacto y la cantidad que quieras enviar o solicitar, ¬°y ya est√°! El dinero enviado llegar√° al instante, y el solicitado, cuando se acepte la notificaci√≥n.L√≠mites:¬†¬øCu√°ntas transacciones de Bizum puedes hacer?¬†Cada cliente puede recibir un m√°ximo de 60 transferencias por Bizum al mes y realizar tantos env√≠os como quiera.¬øCu√°nto dinero se puede enviar a trav√©s de Bizum?¬†Los l√≠mites de Bizum (pesta√±a nueva) son lo siguientes:El importe¬† de cada transacci√≥n puede ser desde 0,50 ‚Ç¨ hasta 500 ‚Ç¨¬†Se pueden enviar o recibir hasta un m√°ximo de 2.000 ‚Ç¨ al d√≠aSe puede enviar un m√°ximo de 5.000 ‚Ç¨ y recibir un m√°ximo de 60.000 ‚Ç¨ al mes¬øC√≥mo desactivar Bizum en N26?Tienes que acceder desde la app N26 a la secci√≥n de ¬´Mi cuenta¬ª , luego hacer pulsar en ¬´Configuraci√≥n de Bizum¬ª, y por √∫ltimo en ¬´Desactivar¬ª. Necesitar√°s el PIN de confirmaci√≥n para completar este procedimiento.¬†¬øQu√© hacer si cambio mi n√∫mero de tel√©fono?¬†Primero ser√° necesario que actualices tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono (pesta√±a nueva) desde la app N26.¬†Luego, si ya hab√≠as completado el registro en Bizum, tendr√°s que desactivarlo tal como mencionamos en el apartado anterior y volver a registrarte. De esta forma, el sistema actualizar√° tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono tambi√©n en Bizum.¬†

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: ¬øPor qu√© mi cuenta est√° bloqueada temporalmente?
answer: Conforme a la legislaci√≥n bancaria europea, N26 debe llevar a cabo inspecciones t√©cnicas rutinarias de las cuentas de sus clientes. Como entidad regulada, eso nos ayuda a garantizar que el dinero de tu cuenta de N26 est√° seguro y protegido.La mayor√≠a de las veces, estas inspecciones son muy r√°pidas y t√∫ no te das cuenta de que se realizan. A veces pueden requerir m√°s tiempo, durante el cual el acceso a tu cuenta puede estar bloqueado.Un equipo especializado en inspecciones t√©cnicas de este tipo supervisa el proceso y trabaja lo m√°s r√°pido posible para minimizar las interrupciones. Por ese motivo, nuestro equipo deAtenci√≥n al Cliente no podr√° proporcionarte m√°s informaci√≥n sobre tu cuenta a trav√©s del chat ni acelerar el proceso.Te pedimos un poco de paciencia mientras finalizamos el proceso. Nuestro equipo contactar√° contigo cuando finalice la inspecci√≥n t√©cnica.

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don‚Äôt recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?¬†Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.¬†¬†N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant‚Äôs part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn‚Äôt receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26¬†You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.¬†Go to the ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute¬†Tap ‚ÄòGet help with this transaction‚Äô and follow the steps provided.¬†Important:¬†If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you‚Äôll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You‚Äôll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.¬†¬†If you select a transaction but the ‚ÄòGet help‚Äô button doesn‚Äôt appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you‚Äôll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you‚Äôve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you‚Äôll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we‚Äôve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich Dauerauftr√§ge?
answer: Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine √úberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.Bevor du die √úberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein H√§kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die √úberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. Zun√§chst gibst du den Empf√§nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im n√§chsten Schritt das H√§kchen bei: ‚ÄúAls Dauerauftrag merken?‚Äù. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall f√ºr deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.So kannst du deine bestehenden Dauerauftr√§ge in der App sehen und verwalten:Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte √ºber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.Ein blaues Fenster √∂ffnet sich, in dem du "Dauerauftr√§ge" ausw√§hlen kannst.Hier kannst du deine Dauerauftr√§ge l√∂schen oder ver√§ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu l√∂schen, tippe auf den gew√ºnschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.‚ÑπÔ∏è Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgef√ºhrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszuf√ºhren. Du kannst die √úberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der n√§chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments is currently only available for customers who‚Äôve opened their account in Germany and Spain.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.Unlike most installment products that function at point of sale, N26 Installments provides you with flexibility by allowing you to split the transaction directly in the N26 app, for any eligible transaction.N26 Installments CharacteristicsN26 Installments has the following characteristics, please note rates are dependent on your financial situation. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual interest rate: From 7.49% - 11.99% (financial situation dependent)Actual Effective cost of 3-6 month installments loan: from 1.87% to 6%. Example:If you split an eligible purchase of ‚Ç¨100 into 3 monthly installments with an annual interest rate of 7.49%, your actual effective cost will be much lower‚Äîat 1.87%. That means you'll only be charged ‚Ç¨1.87 interest to split that purchase with N26 Installments. And if you opt for a 6 month repayment period, the actual effective cost will be 3.75%, meaning that you‚Äôll only pay ‚Ç¨3.75 on your installment loans.Eligible purchase amount: ‚Ç¨20 - ‚Ç¨1000Installments duration: Between 3 to 6 monthsMerchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!How to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‚ÄòExplore‚Äô tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‚ÄòOptions‚Äô (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚ÄôWhen you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚Äô:First you will be provided with information about ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚Äô Then you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you‚Äôll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We‚Äôll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you‚Äôll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in fullAdditional Info:Split several purchases: You can split several past purchases, as long as their total combined amounts (and total sum of unpaid installments) are within the credit limit between ‚Ç¨20 and ‚Ç¨1000.Missed a payment? We‚Äôll send you a reminder if you have any outstanding payments, and we‚Äôll also try to charge the outstanding payment again on the next day after the missed payment date. You can manually pay back your installments by tapping on ‚ÄòMissed payments‚Äô in the N26 Installments section of your N26 app.Late fees: There are no late payment fees, and you‚Äôll only be charged interest on your installments payment.Pay your N26 Installments at any time: Simply head to the N26 Installments section in your N26 app, select the purchase, and tap on ‚ÄòRepay full amount‚Äô to fully pay off the amount. There are no early repayment feesWhat happens if I don‚Äôt pay my installments back? You‚Äôll receive info cards and Secure Inbox reminders. We‚Äôll retry to charge the missed payment until day 104. After that, we‚Äôll write-off the loan and hand over the debt to a collection agency. Schufa will also be informed.Why can‚Äôt I see this offer in my app?N26 Installments is currently only available for customers who‚Äôve opened their account in Germany and in the event of a specific amount of transactions within the last few months. If you‚Äôre eligible, you‚Äôll find the product under your ‚ÄòExplore‚Äô tab in the N26 app. If not, please keep using your N26 account and check again in a few months to see if you‚Äôre eligible.If you find N26 Installments in your app but can't see any purchases to split, your transactions in the 4 weeks might not meet the eligibility criteria to use the feature.How do we decide on your N26 Installments request and N26 Credit request?In order to swiftly and efficiently decide on your request for N26 Installments we evaluate your creditworthiness. In order to evaluate your creditworthiness, we generate an internal credit score. Within the scoring process we calculate how probable it is that you as a customer meet your payment obligations. For such calculations we process personal data such as credit agencies‚Äô information and, in case of N26 Installment also your salary, your expenses, existing obligations, your job, duration of employment, experiences of former contractual relations, repayment of former credits as agreed upon. Your scoring is the result of a mathematical-statistical procedure. Based on the data processed and the respective outcome of the internal scoring process, we determine whether we may offer you a N26 Account or N26 Installments and establish the conditions we can offer you for those products. Therefore, our scoring process is necessary to offer you an account with us (Payment services framework agreement - N26 Account) and to manage the offer of our credit contracts to you (as N26 Installments) according to Art. 22 (2) (a) GDPR. This information should already be helping you to understand the mathematically and statistically validated decision making process we offer to swiftly and efficiently perform and reply to your request for N26 Installments. You can get in touch with us here and explain why you think that we may have not yet sufficiently considered your point of view in our decision and why we should take further necessary information into account.After you get in touch with us regarding the respective automated decision, the decision will be reviewed by one of our employees. However, this does not guarantee a different decision by N26.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: How to get a loan?
answer: Applies to Germany and FranceWith N26 Credit, we‚Äôve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between ‚Ç¨1.000 to ‚Ç¨50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.For Younited Credit, you will receive a referral link that will take you from the app to continue the process with Younited.Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products : We‚Äôll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (you‚Äôll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if you‚Äôve used N26 for less than 6 months).Prove your identity: We‚Äôll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if you‚Äôre a non-EU citizen, you‚Äôll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.Edit your answers during the application process: Once you‚Äôre happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and we‚Äôll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you won‚Äôt be able to request another loan during that time.Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, you‚Äôll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if you¬†change your plan¬†or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.For more information, see the N26 Credit¬†T&Cs (new tab).

question: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
answer:
Du hast per Bank√ºberweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen Betr√ºger √ºberwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.¬†Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlie√ülich f√ºr die oben beschriebenen F√§lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vort√§uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren daf√ºr vorgesehenen vollumf√§nglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschlie√ülich bei Bank√ºberweisungen an ein verd√§chtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verd√§chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link √∂ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empf√§ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu √∂ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)¬†Die ge√∂ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie au√üerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, f√ºr N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verd√§chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zus√§tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu best√§tigen. Best√§tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der Zahlungsempf√§nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verd√§chtigen Link ge√∂ffnet habe?√Ñndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zun√§chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort √§ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Login‚ÄìBildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den n√§chsten Schritten.Falls du pers√∂nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto gesch√ºtzt bleibt. Bitte schicke au√üerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zur√ºckbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-f√ºr-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. W√§hle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal best√§tigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls n√∂tig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie sch√ºtze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug sch√ºtzen kannst:Nutze ausschlie√ülich Geldautomaten von vertrauensw√ºrdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauensw√ºrdigen Shops und Webseiten√Ñndere regelm√§√üig deine Online-Passw√∂rter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verd√§chtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich au√üerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragen√Ñndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn m√∂glich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet.¬†Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
N√ºtzliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintr√§chtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

question: ¬øQu√© hago si pierdo la tarjeta o si mis datos se han visto expuestos?

(pesta√±a nueva)Te aconsejamos que bloquees tu tarjeta de inmediato si detectas algo sospechoso. Siempre est√°s a tiempo de desbloquearla despu√©s.

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose¬†RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: ¬øQu√© hacer si mi cuenta pudiera verse comprometida?
answer:
Si crees que tu cuenta puede estar en peligro, primero cambia tu contrase√±a; despu√©s, hay varias medidas que puedes tomar en funci√≥n de la situaci√≥n:¬øQu√© hago si detecto una transacci√≥n sospechosa en mi cuenta?Si adviertes una transacci√≥n sospechosa, consulta nuestro art√≠culo sobre ¬øC√≥mo disputar una transacci√≥n?Despu√©s ponte en contacto con el equipo de atenci√≥n al cliente de inmediato, ya sea directamente en la app de N26 o por email a support@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva).Si prefieres hablar por tel√©fono, puedes ped√≠rnoslo en el chat. Organizaremos una llamada a tu n√∫mero con un margen de una hora para que podamos hablar detenidamente sobre el tema. Cuando ya est√©s en contacto con uno de nuestros agentes, expl√≠cale a fondo la situaci√≥n; cada detalle cuenta.
Te aseguramos que vamos a tomar todas las medidas necesarias para asistirte en esta situaci√≥n.Adem√°s de nuestras obligaciones legales para la prevenci√≥n del fraude y con miras a mejorar continuamente nuestras defensas de seguridad, contamos con un equipo especializado que analiza cada caso de fraude individualmente. Los casos de fraude en s√≠ suelen ser relativamente complicados y requieren un trato detallado. Seg√∫n la complejidad del caso, puede tomar desde un par de d√≠as hasta varias semanas.Por √∫ltimo, si tienes pruebas o fuertes sospechas de que han podido hackear tu cuenta, te recomendamos que tambi√©n pongas una denuncia en la polic√≠a.¬øQu√© hago si pierdo la tarjeta o si creo que los datos de mi tarjeta est√°n expuestos?Si pierdes tu tarjeta de N26, te la roban o crees que los datos de tu tarjeta est√°n expuestos, bloquea la tarjeta inmediatamente en la app de N26 y pide una nueva para mantener tu dinero a salvo.¬øQu√© pasa si pierdo mi dispositivo vinculado? ¬øOtras personas podr√°n acceder a mi cuenta?Si pierdes o te roban el dispositivo vinculado a tu cuenta, no te preocupes, porque solo se puede acceder a la app de N26 introduciendo la contrase√±a correcta, tu huella digital o tu reconocimiento facial. Nuestro equipo de atenci√≥n al cliente te ayudar√° a vincular un nuevo dispositivo a tu cuenta N26 cuando lo tengas.¬øSe te ocurre algo que pueda mejorar la seguridad en N26?Para m√°s informaci√≥n sobre c√≥mo protegemos tu cuenta en caso de fraude, visita nuestro art√≠culo del blog (pesta√±a nueva). Echa un vistazo tambi√©n a nuestra p√°gina sobre la Seguridad en N26 (pesta√±a nueva) para ver nuestro compromiso por proteger tu dinero y tu cuenta.Nuestras l√≠neas est√°n abiertas todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu m√≥vil ni a la WebApp, tambi√©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

question: Chargeback: cos'√® e come contestare una transazione con carta
answer: Nel tuo estratto conto mensile di N26 c‚Äô√® una transazione che non hai mai effettuato? Hai ordinato online qualcosa che non √® mai arrivato? Hai effettuato un prelievo ATM e non sono state erogate le banconote richieste? Non preoccuparti, questo articolo ti aiuter√† a capire come risolvere la questione.Cos'√® il chargeback?Per chargeback si intende il rimborso di un pagamento effettuato con carta relativo a una transazione erronea da parte dell'esercente. L'importo addebitato viene rimborsato non appena la controversia √® stata risolta a favore di chi ha effettuato il pagamento.N26 offre un servizio di chargeback tramite Mastercard che ti permette di contestare transazioni che non hai effettuato o per le quali qualcosa √® andato storto con l'esercente. Ad esempio, se hai ordinato dei prodotti online ma non li hai ricevuti nella data prevista, potresti avere diritto ad una procedura di chargeback e richiedere il rimborso dei tuoi soldi.Come contestare una transazione con N26?Puoi contestare una transazione dalla tua app N26 o tramite N26 Web.Vai alla schermata principale e seleziona la transazione che desideri contestare.Dopodich√© seleziona Chiedi aiuto per questa transazione.¬†Importante:¬†Se la tua controversia √® legata a una transazione non autorizzata, dovrai prima bloccare e riordinare la tua carta per prevenire ulteriori frodi, poi potremo procedere con la tua richiesta. Potrai riordinare la tua carta e bloccare quella vecchia direttamente dall'app.Se selezioni una transazione ma non sei in grado di visualizzare il pulsante di Aiuto, significa che la transazione √® ancora in fase di preautorizzazione senza essere un addebito. Leggi questo articolo per saperne di pi√π (nuova tabella).¬†¬†Solo nel caso in cui il tuo conto fosse gi√† chiuso e non avessi pi√π accesso all'app, ti preghiamo di contattare il Supporto Clienti all'indirizzo email collegato al tuo conto scrivendo a support@n26.com (nuova tabella).In questo articolo abbiamo preparato una serie di Domande frequenti sul chargeback (nuova tabella).

question: ¬øPor qu√© hay una lista de espera para contratar una cuenta?
answer: Para sentar unas bases a√∫n m√°s s√≥lidas de nuestro negocio en el futuro, trabajamos en la experiencia de nuestro servicio, las ofertas de productos y los procesos para convertirnos en un banco todav√≠a mejor en los pr√≥ximos a√±os.¬†Ante la abrumadora demanda de productos bancarios digitales de N26, vamos a limitar temporalmente el n√∫mero de nuevas cuentas bancarias que podemos ofrecer cada mes.¬†Por ello, hemos tenido que interrumpir temporalmente la entrada de nuevos clientes en determinados mercados. Te animamos a que te inscribas en nuestra lista de espera y te contactaremos en cuanto podamos ofrecerte la cuenta que deseas contratar.¬øEsta interrupci√≥n afectar√° a los clientes actuales?¬†Esta interrupci√≥n temporal de las nuevas contrataciones no afectar√° a los clientes actuales de N26. Puedes esperar la misma experiencia bancaria digital de la que has disfrutado siempre en tu m√≥vil: fluida, segura y protegida.Estamos trabajando para simplificar el proceso lo m√°s r√°pido posible para cualquiera que intente registrarse y esperamos poder abrir nuevas cuentas para todos los clientes muy pr√≥ximamente.¬øC√≥mo sabr√© cu√°ndo puedo volver a abrir una cuenta?Si has intentado abrir una cuenta y no has podido hacerlo, la mejor forma de mantenerte informado/a es inscribirte en nuestra lista de espera. Te contactaremos en cuanto podamos ofrecerte la cuenta que desees.Como seguimos experimentando una enorme demanda de nuestros productos y queremos ofrecerles a todos los clientes de nuestra lista de espera un acceso equitativo a la experiencia bancaria de N26, les contactamos por orden de inscripci√≥n en cuanto podamos ofrecerles una cuenta.¬†¬øPuedo abrir una cuenta N26 en mi pa√≠s?

question: ¬øPor qu√© motivos podr√≠an bloquear o cerrar mi cuenta de N26 y qu√© puedo hacer al respecto?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è De ser necesario terminar la relaci√≥n comercial (pesta√±a nueva), N26 se basar√° en lo establecido en el punto 13* de las Condiciones Generales Comerciales (pesta√±a nueva) que establecen el v√≠nculo entre el cliente y el banco.¬†Hay varias razones por las que N26 podr√≠a bloquear o cerrar una cuenta. Estas se centran en par√°metros operativos y decisiones de negocio basadas en pol√≠ticas de riesgo, as√≠ como en el cumplimiento de obligaciones derivadas de las leyes; como las que previenen el blanqueo de capitales, la financiaci√≥n del terrorismo, el fraude fiscal y el uso abusivo o fraudulento de la cuenta; por las que se podr√≠a limitar el acceso a la cuenta y, en √∫ltima instancia, cerrarla.Entre otras circunstancias, las causas de cierre pueden ser:¬†el uso inapropiado de la cuenta,¬†el incumplimiento grave de alguno de los T√©rminos y Condiciones,¬†cualquier comportamiento contrario a las normas generales de conducta previstas entre el cliente y el banco.¬†Tambi√©n se podr√≠a limitar el acceso a la cuenta o a una parte de los fondos cuando nos veamos obligados a ello por parte de las autoridades competentes.Se ha limitado el acceso a mi cuenta, ¬øc√≥mo puedo contactar con N26 al respecto?Para cumplir con todas las normas a las que estamos sujetos como entidad bancaria regulada, tenemos la obligaci√≥n de realizar revisiones peri√≥dicas sobre algunas de las transacciones y cuentas de nuestros clientes. A veces, como resultado de estas revisiones podr√≠amos limitar el acceso a tu cuenta de N26.Ten en cuenta que este proceso es totalmente leg√≠timo y busca garantizar la seguridad de nuestros clientes y sus cuentas. Si dicho proceso llegara a aplicarse, te enviar√≠amos un email inform√°ndote de los pasos a seguir. Es normal que puedas tener preguntas y estamos aqu√≠ para ayudarte, por lo que es importante que te comuniques respondiendo directamente al email (pesta√±a nueva) en el que se te notifica del proceso, como te indicamos a continuaci√≥n:Inicia sesi√≥n en tu app N26.Ve a Mi cuenta > Ayuda > Mensajes de N26.Abre el mensaje en cuesti√≥n y pulsa el bot√≥n Responder que hay al final del mensaje.Si ya no puedes acceder a tu cuenta, puedes responder directamente desde la bandeja de entrada de tu email.Me han notificado del cierre de mi cuenta, ¬øqu√© hago?Si tienes consultas sobre el estado de tu cuenta o sobre los fondos restantes, ponte en contacto respondiendo directamente al email en el que se te notifica del cierre, siguiendo los pasos que acabamos de indicar.Te pedimos que tengas en cuenta que nuestros especialistas de Atenci√≥n al Cliente no podr√°n asistirte v√≠a chat, ya que la informaci√≥n que tienen al respecto es muy limitada porque, por motivos legales y de protecci√≥n de datos, no podemos compartir cierta informaci√≥n a trav√©s del chat. ¬†* En caso de haber abierto la cuenta antes del 17/04/2019 y tener un IBAN que empieza por DE, la informaci√≥n se establece en el punto 19 de las respectivas Condiciones Generales Comerciales (pesta√±a nueva).

question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren‚Äôt sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you‚Äôve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to üë§ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten
answer: Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!¬†Wenn du deine Adresse bereits best√§tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: How does N26 Business Smart work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs ‚Ç¨4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‚ÄòDirect Debits‚Äô: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don‚Äôt have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space‚Äôs IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‚ÄòSpace Settings‚Äô and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' ¬ª¬†Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' ¬ª¬†Accept the T&C's ¬ª¬†Enter your confirmation PIN ¬ª¬†Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‚Äòcog icon‚Äô)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on ‚ÄúSend money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúBank transfer‚ÄùSelect the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.¬†With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we‚Äôre able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We‚Äôre going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.¬†Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: Perch√© il mio conto √® temporaneamente bloccato?
answer: In conformit√† con il quadro regolamentare europeo per le banche, N26 √® tenuta a effettuare controlli tecnici di routine sui conti dei suoi clienti. Essendo un‚Äôistituzione regolamentata, questo fa s√¨ che i depositi contenuti sul tuo conto N26 siano al sicuro.La maggior parte delle volte questi controlli avvengono molto rapidamente, senza che tu possa vederli. A volte possono richiedere un tempo pi√π lungo, durante il quale potresti temporaneamente non poter accedere al tuo conto.A supervisionare questo processo c‚Äô√® un team dedicato, specializzato nella conduzione di revisioni tecniche di questo tipo e che lavora diligentemente per ridurre al minimo qualsiasi interruzione. Per questo motivo, il Supporto Clienti di N26 non √® in grado di fornire ulteriori informazioni sul tuo conto tramite¬† chat o di accelerare il processo.Ti preghiamo di avere pazienza mentre completiamo questi passaggi. Il nostro team ti contatter√†¬† non appena il processo di revisione tecnica sar√† completato.

question: ¬øC√≥mo presentar una reclamaci√≥n?

Investigaremos tu caso y nos pondremos en contacto contigo a trav√©s del correo electr√≥nico registrado en tu cuenta para compartir los hallazgos de la investigaci√≥n y el resultado de tu reclamaci√≥n.¬†Nuestro equipo de Atenci√≥n al Cliente podr√° ayudarte a remitir tu reclamaci√≥n a trav√©s del chat mencionado anteriormente, pero si deseas enviar tu reclamaci√≥n a trav√©s de tu correo electr√≥nico podr√°s hacerlos las siguientes direcciones:Atenci√≥n en Ingl√©s: complaints@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva)Atenci√≥n en Castellano: reclamaciones.es@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva), o si tu cuenta tiene un IBAN que comienza con (DE) a reclamaciones@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva)Por favor ten en cuenta que estas direcciones de correo electr√≥nico son de uso exclusivo para la gesti√≥n de reclamaciones y quejas. De lo contrario, nuestro departamento de Atenci√≥n al Cliente (pesta√±a nueva) est√° disponible todos los d√≠as y te ayudar√° a resolver tus dudas a la brevedad.Si deseas enviar una reclamaci√≥n asegurate de incluir los siguientes detalles en tu correo electr√≥nico:Una descripci√≥n detallada de tu reclamaci√≥n y del producto o servicio involucrado.La fecha en la que comenz√≥ el incidente motivo de la reclamaci√≥nToda la documentaci√≥n suplementaria que ayude a respaldar su petici√≥n (ejemplo: capturas de pantalla, correos electr√≥nicos enviados, etc.)Una descripci√≥n de la resoluci√≥n que espera obtener tras la reclamaci√≥nLe pedimos que tenga en cuenta que solo podremos atender reclamaciones sobre una cuenta cuando nos contacta desde el correo electr√≥nico registrado en su cuenta N26.¬†Si la reclamaci√≥n es enviada por un representante legal deber√° estar acompa√±ada del correspondiente mandato emitido por un notario.Excepcionalmente y en caso de que no tenga acceso a enviar la reclamaci√≥n a trav√©s de los medios telem√°ticos previstos, le recomendamos que revise en los t√©rminos y condiciones de su cuenta o el reglamento de la sucursal para obtener m√°s informaci√≥n sobre las opciones de env√≠o en formato no digital. Nuestra direcci√≥n postal alemana es:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinSobre el tratamiento de tu reclamaci√≥n: Nos pondremos en contacto contigo a trav√©s del correo electr√≥nico registrado en tu cuenta y en caso de que necesitemos m√°s detalles sobre la reclamaci√≥n los solicitaremos tambi√©n por correo electr√≥nico.Plazo de resoluci√≥n de las reclamacionesTodas las reclamaciones que traten asuntos vinculados a servicios de pago, se resolver√°n en un plazo m√°ximo de 15 d√≠as h√°biles de acuerdo a lo determinado en las normas de PSD2 vigentes. Este plazo ser√° prorrogable hasta un mes en casos excepcionales y siempre que te comuniquemos el motivo de la pr√≥rroga.Para el resto de las reclamaciones los plazos de resoluci√≥n ser√°n los siguientes:Alemania y Austria - 15 d√≠as h√°bilesResto de pa√≠ses europeos - 15 d√≠as h√°bilesIrlanda - 40 d√≠as h√°bilesFrancia - 56 d√≠asReino Unido - 56 d√≠as¬†Espa√±a - 60 d√≠asItalia - 60 d√≠asDe no tener una respuesta por tu parte a nuestra comunicaci√≥n relacionada con tu solicitud, procederemos a cerrarla. En caso de recibir una respuesta posterior, abriremos una nueva solicitud y te indicaremos el nuevo n√∫mero de referencia de tu reclamaci√≥n.Si no quedas satisfecho/a con el resultado de tu reclamaci√≥nUna vez vencido el plazo y en caso de no estar conforme con el resultado de tu reclamaci√≥n, siempre podr√°s someterla a los organismos correspondientes seg√∫n los T√©rminos y Condiciones de tu cuenta N26:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinLegislaci√≥n aplicableEn materia de legislaci√≥n espa√±ola aplicable a la protecci√≥n de clientela y normas de transparencia, puedes encontrar toda la informaci√≥n necesaria en la p√°gina oficial del Banco de Espa√±a (pesta√±a nueva).Reglamento:Reglamento para la defensa del Cliente de N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en Espa√±a. (pesta√±a nueva)

question: Bank documents‚Äîa guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason‚Äîyou can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they‚Äôre perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here‚Äôs how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and‚Äîif you wish‚Äîit can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here‚Äôs how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you‚Äôve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You‚Äôll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient‚Äôs full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation‚Äîthe PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information‚Äîfull name, legal address, IBAN and BIC‚Äîspecific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?

Es gibt verschiedene M√∂glichkeiten, dich mit unserem Kundenservice in Verbindung zu setzen. Die beste M√∂glichkeit ist, einen sicheren Chat zu √∂ffnen, w√§hrend du in der App eingeloggt bist. question: Warum bekomme ich keinen Kredit?
answer: Bei der Beantragung eines N26 Credit fragen wir dich im Rahmen unserer Pr√ºfung nach deiner pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wenn N26 nicht dein¬†Hauptkonto¬†ist, musst du dich sicher in dein Online-Bankkonto bei einer anderen Bank einloggen, um mit dem Antrag fortzufahren.F√ºr dein zweites Bankkonto akzeptieren wir nur Banken aus dem Land, aus dem du dich bewirbst (so k√∂nnen z. B. franz√∂sische Kunden nur ein franz√∂sisches Bankkonto und deutsche Kunden nur ein deutsches Bankkonto hinzuf√ºgen).Wir schauen uns auch deine aktuelle SCHUFA-Kreditw√ºrdigkeit an. Diese Anfrage wird auf deiner SCHUFA-Auskunf notiert, ist aber nur f√ºr dich sichtbar und wirkt sich nicht negativ auf deines SCHUFA-Score aus. Aber nicht nur dein SCHUFA Score ist ausschlaggebend: Wir ben√∂tigen auch Informationen √ºber dein monatliches Einkommen, unter Ausschluss von Zahlungen der √∂ffentlichen Hand (z. B. Arbeitslosen- oder Kindergeld).Sobald du einen¬†Antrag¬†an uns gesendet hast, kannst du deine Antworten 90 Tage lang nicht mehr √§ndern (auch dann nicht, wenn sich deine Bonit√§t verbessert). Du musst dann bis zum Ablauf der 90 Tage warten, um einen weiteren Kredit zu beantragen.Das Ergebnis wird automatisch berechnet. Wir k√∂nnen keine manuelle √úberpr√ºfung vornehmen, ob wir dir einen anbieten k√∂nnen.Kontaktiere uns gerne f√ºr weitere Informationen.

question: ¬øC√≥mo contactar con N26?
answer:
Hay varias formas de contactar con nuestro Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente, pero la mejor opci√≥n es abrir un chat seguro cuando inicias sesi√≥n en la app. Esto nos permitir√° verificar tu identidad y proporcionarte informaci√≥n y asistencia espec√≠ficas.Estamos disponibles todos los d√≠as, de 7:00 a 23:00 (CET), domingos y festivos incluidos.C√≥mo contactarnos a trav√©s de la appC√≥mo chatear con nosotrosAbrir un chat de ayudaEl chat se iniciar√° en cuanto inicies sesi√≥n.Como llamarnos

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: Wie kann ich den Nachweis √ºber die Herkunft der Gelder f√ºr mein Konto erbringen?
answer: Als voll lizenzierte Bank muss N26 routinem√§√üige technische Pr√ºfungen der Kundenkonten durchf√ºhren. Als reguliertes Institut k√∂nnen wir so sicherstellen, dass das Geld auf N26 Konten sicher und gesch√ºtzt bleibt.Mitunter kann es vorkommen, dass wir uns aufgrund der Ergebnisse dieser Routinepr√ºfungen an einen Kontoinhaber wenden m√ºssen, um einen Nachweis √ºber die Herkunft der Gelder auf dem Konto zu erhalten, dies ist eine Praxis im Einklang mit den deutschen Bankvorschriften.Wenn dies der Fall ist, werden wir dich ausschlie√ülich √ºber die E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren, die mit deinem N26 Konto verkn√ºpft ist. In dieser E-Mail erh√§ltst du klare Anweisungen, wie du diese Dokumente einreichen kannst, z. B. Scans oder Fotos von Quittungen, Gehaltsabrechnungen, Rechnungen oder Zahlungsaufforderungen.Sei stets aufmerksam und vergewissere dich, dass solche E-Mails von N26 kommen ‚Äì wir werden dich nie nach deinen N26 Kontodaten, deinem Passwort oder anderen Daten fragen, die du im Rahmen deines Verifizierungsprozesses mitgeteilt hast.
