Tambi√©n puedes descargar en formato PDF la informaci√≥n bancaria. Para hacerlo, entra a tu cuenta desde la¬†WebApp (pesta√±a nueva)¬†y haz clic en el icono de la nube en la esquina superior derecha de las¬†Transacciones.Todos nuestros c√≥digos IBAN (pesta√±a nueva) espa√±oles empiezan por ES seguido de un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, luego nuestro c√≥digo de entidad financiera 1563 2626, despu√©s 2 d√≠gitos de control y, por √∫ltimo, tu n√∫mero de cuenta de 10 d√≠gitos.Sin embargo, nuestro IBAN alem√°n empieza por (DE), el italiano por (IT) seguido de un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, luego nuestro¬†c√≥digo de entidad financiera 10011001 y terminan con tu¬†n√∫mero de cuenta¬†de 10 d√≠gitos (empieza por 26).Si tienes tu dispositivo vinculado y una tarjeta activa, ahora puedes ver toda la informaci√≥n de tu tarjeta desde tu app N26, permiti√©ndote realizar pagos por internet sin la necesidad de tener tu tarjeta f√≠sica N26 MasterCard contigo. Para esto, simplemente sigue las instrucciones a continuaci√≥n:Ve a Tarjetas y pulsa en 'Configuraci√≥n de la tarjeta', busca tu tarjeta activa y haz clic en 'Detalles de la tarjeta'Usa tu reconocimiento dactilar, facial o PIN de desbloqueo del tel√©fono para mostrar los detalles completos de su tarjetaLa pantalla estar√° disponible durante 1 minuto.

question: ¬øC√≥mo cambiar el PIN de la tarjeta?
answer: Si no sabes cu√°l es tu PIN, recuerda que en N26 no te enviamos tu c√≥digo PIN por correo, sino que t√∫ creas el PIN de tu tarjeta en el momento de activarla. Si lo has olvidado o simplemente quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo f√°cilmente en cuesti√≥n de segundos desde tu app N26.Primero aseg√∫rate de que tu m√≥vil est√° vinculado a tu cuenta (pesta√±a nueva) y de que has activado tu tarjeta (pesta√±a nueva). Despu√©s abre tu app N26 y haz lo siguiente:Entra en la pesta√±a Tarjetas;ve a Configuraci√≥n de la tarjeta y selecciona la tarjeta en cuesti√≥n;selecciona Cambiar PIN;introduce el token de tu tarjeta, que es un n√∫mero de 10 d√≠gitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta (o por atr√°s, en las tarjetas N26 You y Metal);elige tu nuevo PIN y confirma.Por √∫ltimo, tienes que hacer una retirada en un cajero para que se grabe el cambio (similar a cuando la activas por primera vez).PIN incorrecto o no v√°lidoPor motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ning√∫n PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcci√≥n u otra combinaci√≥n con d√≠gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el n√∫mero que has elegido no es v√°lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaci√≥n diferente.Si introduces un PIN incorrecto tres veces seguidas, la tarjeta se bloquear√° autom√°ticamente por motivos de seguridad. Si te pasa esto, abre un chat con Atenci√≥n al Cliente desde la app para que te ayudemos.El c√≥digo PIN de tu tarjeta no es el mismo que tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva), pero si t√∫ quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.Si has cambiado el PIN pero te da error al pagar, revisa el paso 6 m√°s arriba.

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs ‚Ç¨9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

question: What does the court ruling BGH XI ZR 26/20 mean for N26 customers?
answer: On April 27, 2021, the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (Bundesgerichtshof, BGH) ruled on [translation] ‚Äúthe impermissibility of clauses that feign the consent of a customer to changes in the Terms & Conditions of a bank.‚ÄùAm I entitled to a reimbursement?On the bases of this ruling, customers with a private membership plan (N26 Standard/Smart/You/Metal), created before March 12, 2020, are entitled to reclaim the ‚ÄúGambling Fee‚Äù introduced and charged by us. For those customers who are entitled to reclaim it, the fee (for the customer group in question) has no longer been charged since November 5, 2021.Customers who registered after March 12, 2020 actively consented to the ‚ÄúGambling Fee‚Äù included in the Terms & Conditions, which were already updated at this time, which is why these customers are not entitled to a reimbursement of said ‚ÄúGambling Fee‚Äù. Customers with an N26 Business membership plan (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/Business You/Business Metal) are furthermore not entitled to reclaim this fee, as they do not fall under the customer group covered by the ruling (consumers).Requesting a reimbursement as a current customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to login to the N26 app and launch a verified live chat in the app or web app.Requesting a reimbursement as a former customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to send an email to support@n26.com (new tab). For a direct, simple resolution please follow these guidelines:Subject of email: ‚ÄúReimbursement pursuant to BGH XI ZR 26/20‚ÄùSend the email from your registered email address.Include your full name in the email as well as an alternative IBANAttach a clear, double-sided photo/scan of one of your ID documents, including the edges.Please include your consent to the following: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú

answer: Si vives en Dinamarca, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Noruega, Polonia, Suecia o Suiza tienes la posibilidad de abrir una cuenta con nosotros. Una cuenta en euros, un IBAN alem√°n, transferencias SEPA o Moneybeam.Conversi√≥n de moneda con la tarjeta de d√©bito Mastercard. Servicio de atenci√≥n al cliente en espa√±ol, ingl√©s, alem√°n, italiano o franc√©s. Env√≠o gratuito de la primera tarjeta Mastercard o env√≠o expr√©s por 20‚Ç¨.Transferencias a otras divisas con Wise. (Para cuentas Est√°ndar). Con las cuentas Business no se pueden hacer¬†transferencias en moneda extranjera (pesta√±a nueva)¬†desde la app, sino que tendr√≠as que visitar la p√°gina de¬†Wise (pesta√±a nueva)¬†para ello.5 retiradas gratuitas en la zona euro (1.7% de comisi√≥n para retiradas en otra divisa.)0.1% de reembolso de tus pagos con tarjeta (con la cuenta Business) y del 0,5%¬†(con la Metal Business) de forma mensual.2 espacios adem√°s de la cuenta principal. Un bonus por cada amigo que se abre la cuenta con tu invitaci√≥n de nuestra promoci√≥n ''Invita a un amigo''.Pagos ''sin contacto'' utilizando Google Pay y Apple Pay.Consejos para las transacciones entrantes y salientes:Para recargar tu cuenta con tu moneda local, te recomendamos convertirla utilizando Wise (desde la app o su website (pesta√±a nueva).), o a trav√©s de tu banco local. Te recomendamos escoger tu divisa local para obtener la mejor tasa de cambio en los pagos con tu tarjeta Mastercard o en retiradas de efectivo (en caso contrario se pueden aplicar alguna comisi√≥n). Para enviar transferencias a cuenta en Euros, usa la app para hacer una transferencia SEPA. Para cuentas que nos son en euros, utiliza Wise desde la app.**Ten en cuenta que Wise no est√° disponible para cuentas N26 Business (solo es posible realizar transferencias SEPA en euros.)

question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as ‚ÄúDocuSign‚Äù.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

answer: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001 and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password? (new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.¬†¬†Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules¬†As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.¬†Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.¬†Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.¬†For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating ‚Äúpermanent home‚Äù as a stronger form of attachment than ‚Äútemporary residence‚Äù). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number¬†Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country‚Äôs tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.¬†¬†The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities¬†As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.¬†Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.¬†We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.¬†Our recommendation¬†Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.¬†We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù, indicate whether you‚Äôre a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you‚Äôre tax resident in more than one country), click ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.¬†

question: Warum ist mein Online-Einkauf fehlgeschlagen?
answer: Manche Online-Zahlungen m√ºssen per Push-Nachricht best√§tigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine √úbersicht √ºber die m√∂glichen Ursachen f√ºr eine fehlgeschlagene Online-Zahlung und wie du sie beheben kannst.Du kannst nur so viel Geld ausgeben wie du auf deinem Konto hast. Zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein oder beantrage einen Dispokredit, um √ºber genug Guthaben zu verf√ºgen.Falls du eine Online-Zahlung per Push-Nachricht best√§tigen musst, stelle sicher, dass dein Smartphone verkn√ºpft ist. Du kannst Zahlungen nur auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t best√§tigen.Falls du die Push-Nachricht f√ºr die Zahlungen innerhalb von 5 Minuten nicht best√§tigen konntest, starte den Bezahlvorgang noch mal.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verkn√ºpfte Smartphone gesendet.√úberpr√ºfe deine Karteneinstellungen. Online- und Auslandszahlungen m√ºssen aktiviert sein.Stelle sicher, dass du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast. Falls du die Zahlung per WLAN nicht abschlie√üen kannst, benutze deine mobilen Daten und versuche es erneut.Falls du iOS benutzt, deaktiviere den Nicht-St√∂ren-Modus.Deaktiviere alle Adblocker in deinem Browser.Wenn du Probleme hast, mit deiner Karte zu zahlen, kannst du folgende Schritte befolgen, um eine Fehlerbehebung durchzuf√ºhren:Geh in die Karteneinstellungen, der Karte mit der du etwas zahlen m√∂chtestSetzte alle Limits auf 0 EUR und deaktiviere online und AuslandszahlungenSperre deine KarteLog dich aus der app aus und anschlie√üend wieder einEntsperre deine KarteSetze deine Limits wieder auf die alte Verf√ºgungWarte 5 Minuten und versuche erneut zu zahlenSolltest du anschlie√üend weitere Probleme mit der Zahlung haben gibt es folgende M√∂glichkeiten:Ein Sicherheitsmechanismus ist angesprungen und du musst bis zu 12 Stunden warten beim gleichen H√§ndler eventuell bis zu 24 Stunden, bis du deine Karte wieder verwenden kannst.¬†Es besteht auch die M√∂glichkeit, dass die Transaktion nicht von unserer Seite zur√ºckgewiesen wurde. In diesem Fall hat entweder der Zahlungspartner deine Karte abgelehnt oder konnte keine Verbindung mit unserem System herstellen.¬†Um dies auszuschlie√üen kannst du uns gerne kontaktieren.Gut zu wissen:¬†Die Maestro-Karte kann nicht f√ºr Online-Zahlungen verwendet werden.¬†Falls der Betrag auf der Website des Anbieters von dem Betrag in der Push-Mitteilung abweicht, kann das an Kursschwankung bei der Umrechnung einer Fremdw√§hrung in Euro liegen.Falls du dennoch Probleme mit der Online-Zahlung hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. (neuen Tab)

question: Wie benutzt man Spaces?
answer: Um deine Spaces zu nutzen, musst du den Bereich 'Spaces' in deiner mobilen App oder Web-App von N26 aufrufen. Auf der 'Spaces'-Startseite kannst du Spaces einsehen, eingeben und erstellen.Erstelle einen Space:Tippe auf der "Spaces"-Startseite auf "Einen neuen Space erstellen".W√§hle eine der untenstehenden Optionen aus:"F√ºr ein Ziel sparen" ‚Äì Gib einen Sparzielbetrag und ein Zieldatum ein (optional)."Geld teilen" ‚Äì Erm√∂glicht dir die Erstellung eines "Shared Space"."Jetzt erstellen, sp√§ter entscheiden" ‚Äì Erstelle einfach einen Space, dem du sp√§ter Ziele oder Regeln hinzuf√ºgen kannst.Personalisiere anschlie√üend deinen Space mit einem Namen und einem Bild.Dir steht nun mit dem Space ein Unterkonto zur Verf√ºgung, um deine Finanzen besser kontrollieren zu k√∂nnen. Jetzt kannst du deine "Spaces" nutzen!Geld zwischen Spaces verschieben:Halte dein "Hauptkonto" oder einen anderen Space gedr√ºcktZiehe dann das Geld in den Space, in den du es verschieben m√∂chtest, und lass los.Anschlie√üend kannst du den Betrag best√§tigen, woraufhin dein Kontostand sofort aktualisiert wird.Sperre deinen Space:Du kannst einen Space jederzeit √ºber deine mobile und Web-App sperren und entsperren. Du kannst kein Geld in einen oder aus einem gesperrten Space bewegen.Begib dich in den Space, den du sperren/entsperren m√∂chtest.Tippe auf "Verwalten".W√§hle anschlie√üend "Spaces sperren" oder "Spaces entsperren".Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.Der Space wird sofort gesperrt oder entsperrt.Blende den Kontostand deines Spaces aus:Du kannst den Betrag innerhalb des Spaces vom Gesamtkontostand deines Kontos ausblenden.Begib dich in den Space, f√ºr den du den Kontostand ausblenden m√∂chtest.Tippe auf das Zahnradsymbol "Einstellungen" (obere rechte Ecke).W√§hle "Kontostand des Spaces ausblenden".Verwalte deine Spaces:Du kannst Regeln und Sparziele anlegen und die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel" aktivieren. Klicke in der Rubrik "Space" auf "Verwalten".Um ein Sparziel zu erstellen, w√§hle "Mein Ziel erstellen" (du kannst dies auch sp√§ter noch bearbeiten).Gib einfach einen Zielbetrag und ein F√§lligkeitsdatum ein und dann "Ziel festlegen".Um Aufrundungen zu aktivieren/deaktivieren, w√§hle "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Aktiviere "Aufrundungsregel aktivieren".Du erh√§ltst die M√∂glichkeit, dein Kleingeld mit den Faktoren x1, x2, x3 und x5 des Betrags zu multiplizieren, der von deinen restlichen Kartentransaktionen abgezogen wird.Du kannst innerhalb eines Spaces Regeln anlegen, um automatisch Geld zwischen deinen Spaces und deinem Hauptkonto zu bewegen:Tippe auf "Eine Regel erstellen".W√§hle die Spaces oder das Hauptkonto, zwischen denen du Geld √ºberweisen m√∂chtest.W√§hle den Betrag, den du verschieben m√∂chtest.W√§hle die H√§ufigkeit und das Datum und best√§tige dann deine Auswahl.Du kannst diese Regel auch l√∂schen, indem du auf Bearbeiten und dann auf dasL√∂schsymbol neben der Regel tippst.

question: Account in conjunction with ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG
answer: The account ICW ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.¬†¬†Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form you‚Äôll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto Klosterstra√üe 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract we‚Äôll open a Basiskonto for you. You‚Äôll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.¬†

question: Wie sperre ich die kontaktlose Bezahlfunktion meiner Karte?
answer: Derzeit nur f√ºr iOS-Nutzer in der mobilen App verf√ºgbar.¬†Kontaktloses Bezahlen ist sehr praktisch. Vielleicht bevorzugst du es jedoch, diese Zahlungsmethode zu deaktivieren, um unberechtigte Transaktionen mit deiner Karte zu verhindern. Deshalb kannst du jetzt gezielt NFC-Zahlungen f√ºr deine Karte deaktivieren:Gehe auf Karten.Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gew√ºnschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Schalte die Funktion Kontaktlose Bezahlung aus.Die von dir vorgenommenen √Ñnderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gew√§hlte Karte angewendet. Beachte bitte, dass sich diese Einstellungen auf deine physische Karte beziehen. Zur Verwaltung deiner Einstellungen f√ºr Google Pay und Apple Pay haben wir spezielle Artikel f√ºr dich zusammengestellt. Falls de Probleme mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlfunktion hast, lerne hier, wie du sie beheben kannst.

question: Come posso proteggere la mia identit√†?
answer: Per proteggere ed evitare l'uso improprio dei tuoi dati personali, tieni presente che:Non ti chiederemo mai di verificare la tua identit√† per conto di altre persone o societ√†. Ci√≤ include verifiche per contratti di affitto di appartamenti, linee di credito o offerte di lavoro (compresi i lavori con N26). Completa il processo di verifica solo se desideri aprire un conto bancario N26.Come proprietario dell'account, solo tu dovresti creare e avere accesso ai tuoi dati di accesso.Non creare mai un conto bancario N26 con un indirizzo email e una password predefiniti. Se usi le credenziali di accesso che ti sono state fornite, queste credenziali possono essere utilizzate per raggiungere le tue informazioni personali e legali. Inoltre, non accedere mai ad un account N26 che non √® il tuo.Non inviare mai i dati del tuo documento di identit√† a destinatari sconosciuti o non verificati.N26 pu√≤ richiedere determinati documenti quando una transazione √® soggetta a un controllo di routine. Invia una documentazione valida solo agli account di posta elettronica N26 verificati.N26 non chieder√† mai il nome utente, la password o i codici PIN al di fuori dell'app N26. Non fornire mai queste informazioni in un sito Web o un'app esterna, anche se sembra correlata a N26.Se avessi ricevuto una richiesta sospetta da una terza parte o pensi che i tuoi dati di accesso N26 possano essere compromessi, non esitare a contattarci.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Security.Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.¬†Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.¬†In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

question: Meine Karte l√§uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?
answer: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erh√§ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.¬†Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren m√∂chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine pers√∂nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Wenn deine Karte bald abl√§uft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu best√§tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.¬†Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit g√ºltig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die M√∂glichkeit, deine Adresse zu best√§tigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gem√§√ü den √∂rtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don‚Äôt recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?¬†Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.¬†¬†N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant‚Äôs part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn‚Äôt receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26¬†You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.¬†Go to the ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute¬†Tap ‚ÄòGet help with this transaction‚Äô and follow the steps provided.¬†Important:¬†If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you‚Äôll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You‚Äôll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.¬†¬†If you select a transaction but the ‚ÄòGet help‚Äô button doesn‚Äôt appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you‚Äôll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you‚Äôve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you‚Äôll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we‚Äôve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
answer: Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App nutzen wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.Hier erf√§hrst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter üë§ Mein Konto > Pers√∂nliche Details > Pers√∂nliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein H√§kchen setzen bei "Anderen N26 Kunden in meinen Kontakten erlauben, mich f√ºr √úberweisungen einfach zu finden".

question: Perch√© devo inviare altri documenti?
answer: Dopo aver avviato il processo di verifica per aprire il tuo conto corrente N26 e aver ricevuto un'email da parte nostra con la richiesta di ulteriori informazioni per procedere con la tua registrazione, leggi le informazioni sottostanti come supporto per andare avanti con la procedura.N26 √® una banca regolamentata e in alcune situazioni potremmo aver bisogno di informazioni aggiuntive dai nostri clienti per procedere con l'iscrizione. Si tratta di una richiesta standard conforme ai requisiti legali e normativi. Dovrai fornirci documenti specifici per aprire un conto corrente N26.Sappiamo che queste informazioni sono molto personali e ti assicuriamo che le informazioni che ci invii rimarranno rigorosamente riservate. Inoltre, verranno utilizzate solo per adempiere ai nostri obblighi legali.Quali documenti devo inviare?Per i titolari di un conto con IBAN ItalianoSe sei possessore di un conto corrente N26 con IBAN italiano e hai ricevuto una comunicazione da parte nostra con la richiesta di fornire documentazione aggiuntiva, ti preghiamo gentilmente di rispondere al messaggio entro la scadenza indicata. Qui di seguito, ti indichiamo i documenti che potrebbero essere necessari al fine di verificare le informazioni richieste. Ti ricordiamo che, se non risponderai alla nostra richiesta o se i documenti inviati non saranno validi o leggibili, alcune funzionalit√† del tuo conto potrebbero essere ristrette.¬†1. Un documento che attesti la tua residenza, come ad esempio:Certificato di residenzaDocumentazione per il vistoDocumentazione su attivit√† di studio in corso (iscrizione all'universit√† o a un corso professionale a lungo termine)Libretto di circolazione del tuo veicoloQualsiasi altro documento emesso negli ultimi 90 giorni e intestato a tuo nome che possa provare il tuo indirizzo di residenzaI residenti in Italia possono scaricare il certificato di residenza a questo indirizzo (nuova tabella) se in possesso di SPID/CIE o CNS, selezionando ‚Üí Certificati ‚Üí "Richiedi per te stesso" ‚Üí ‚Äúdi Residenza‚Äù ‚Üí "In bollo con esenzione dal pagamento dell'imposta fino al 31/12/2022 ai sensi dell'art. 62, comma 3, del CAD"‚Üí e selezionare ‚ÄúDesidero ricevere il certificato alla email‚Äù per riceverlo via email o ‚ÄúDesidero scaricare il certificato‚Äù per scaricarlo.2. Un documento che attesti il tuo indirizzo di domicilio, se differente da quello di residenza, come ad esempio:Bolletta del gas, acqua, internet o luce emessa negli utlimi 90 giorni e intestata a tuo nomeContratto di affittoQualsiasi altro documento intestato a tuo nome che possa provare il tuo indirizzo di domicilio3. Qualsiasi documento che possa certificare la principale fonte di reddito, come ad esempio:Contratto di lavoro o busta paga pi√π recenteDichiarazione dei redditi (Certificazione Unica o Modello 730 o Modello Redditi Persone Fisiche)Prova della pensione di vecchiaia o del sussidio di disoccupazione (NASpI/Reddito di Cittadinanza)Ricevuta di prestazione occasionaleStato patrimoniale e reddituale (es. estratto conto bancario)Locazione immobiliare/atto di compravendita immobiliare/redditi passivi/rendite maturate sostenute da eventuali atti pubblici e/o contrattiDichiarazione rilasciata dal principale fornitore di servizi relativi a valute virtuali (VASP) utilizzato dalla data di apertura del conto4. Qualsiasi documento che possa certificare la tua principale origine dei tuoi fondi, se aggiuntiva o diversa dalla tua fonte di reddito, come ad esempio:Estratto conto bancario e/o estratto conto deposito/intermediazione titoliInformazioni su vendite di asset finanziari, plusvalenzeEredit√†/Lascito/DonazioneTrust/Fondo PatrimonialeAltri contratti che possano certificare l'origine dei tuoi fondi5. Se hai un conto N26 business, abbiamo anche bisogno di un documento che attesti la tua partita IVA, come ad esempio:Certificato Attribuzione Partita IVAEstratto dalla Camera di Commercio / Visura Camerale (solo per ditte individuali)Una fattura emessa negli ultimi 90 giorni a nome della tua societ√† unicaTi assicuriamo che i tuoi dati rimarranno strettamente riservati e verranno utilizzati solo nell'esecuzione delle attivit√† prescritte dalla legge.Come posso inviarvi queste informazioni?Prima di tutto, accedi alla tua app mobile N26, seleziona l‚Äôicona Supporto > Messaggi da N26.Qui troverai la nostra comunicazione. Ti preghiamo di leggere attentamente le istruzioni riportate nel messaggio, e di selezionare Rispondi.¬†Quando risponderai, dovrai inviare scansioni, fotografie e/o screenshot di ogni documento richiesto, con una descrizione dettagliata.¬†Tutto deve essere chiaro e leggibile e non superare i 25 MB totali.Importante: inviare informazioni false e/o inaccurate √® un reato penale. Se le informazioni non sono veritiere o incomplete non potremo accettare la tua richiesta.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password? (new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. question: Was ist eine Sicherheitsfu√üzeile und warum haben wir eine solche eingef√ºgt?
answer: Eine Sicherheitsfu√üzeile ist eine personalisierte Nachricht, die am Ende von E-Mails und digitalen Dokumenten eingef√ºgt wird und als Echtheitssiegel dienen soll.Durch das Hinzuf√ºgen deines vollst√§ndigen Namens am Ende jeder E-Mail m√∂chten wir dir helfen, zwischen legitimen E-Mails von N26 und Phishing-E-Mails von Betr√ºgern zu unterscheiden.¬†Auch wenn eine Sicherheitsfu√üzeile nicht eindeutig beweisen kann, dass eine E-Mail von einer verifizierten Quelle stammt, tr√§gt sie dazu bei, das Risiko von Deceptive Pishing ‚Äì der h√§ufigsten Art von Phishing-Angriffen ‚Äì zu verringern.Was ist Deceptive Phishing?Deceptive Phishing ist der illegale Versand von generischen Phishing-E-Mails an eine gro√üe Anzahl unbekannter Personen mit dem Ziel, unter Vort√§uschung falscher Angaben an vertrauliche Informationen zu gelangen.Wie wird dies erreicht?¬†Betr√ºger kontaktieren ihre Zielpersonen unter dem Vorwand, f√ºr renommierte Unternehmen zu arbeiten. Den Zielpersonen wird dann mit Markenbildern, zeitkritischen Szenarien und irref√ºhrender Sprache ein falsches Gef√ºhl der Sicherheit vorgegaukelt. Sobald sie an der Angel h√§ngen, versuchen die Betr√ºger, ihre Opfer dahingehend zu manipulieren, dass sie auf ihre Forderungen eingehen.Wie kannst du dich sch√ºtzen?Achte besonders auf E-Mails, die du von Banken, Kunden, Arbeitgebern usw. erh√§ltst. Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, etwas zu unternehmen, handele nie aus einem Impuls heraus, sondern √ºberlege immer genau, bevor du handelst.¬†Wenn du das Gef√ºhl hast, dass etwas nicht stimmt, solltest du dieses Gef√ºhl Ernst nehmen. Achte auf Rechtschreib- und Grammatikfehler, fahre mit dem Mauszeiger √ºber versteckte URLs (klicke nicht darauf), √ºberpr√ºfe die Absenderangaben und informiere dich genauer dar√ºber ‚Äì ein schneller Online-Check kann dir helfen, die Identit√§t eines Absenders zu verifizieren.Wenn du eine verd√§chtige E-Mail, einen verd√§chtigen Smartphone-Anruf und/oder eine verd√§chtige SMS im Namen von N26 erhalten hast, leite dein Anliegen an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com weiter. Wenn du Fragen zu deinem Konto kl√§ren m√∂chtest, kannst du √ºber unsere mobile App mit uns chatten.Erfahre mehr √ºber:Wie du verd√§chtige Phishing-Angriffe meldest (neuen Tab)Wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und verhindern kannst (neuen Tab)So sch√ºtzt du dich vor Social Engineering (neuen Tab)

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death?¬†In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased‚Äôs bank accounts.¬†The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: sucesiones@n26.comFax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en Espa√±a¬†-Sucesiones-
Paseo de la Castellana 43
28046 Madrid, ESPANAN26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en Espa√±a¬†
c/o N26 Bank GmbH¬†-Sucesiones-
Rungestr. 22¬†
10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on:¬†Who is the deceased?¬†If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account. Please always provide us with the official version: Certificado literal de defunci√≥n.How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.¬† A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance or establishment of an¬† inventory) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.¬†We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.¬†Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you.¬†What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?¬†¬†Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.¬†However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en Espa√±a is located in Spain.¬†As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be disabled. As well as any regular payments such as standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates will not be executed anymore.Further, please be aware we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax of the assets belonging to the estate. It might be necessary to complete a certain set of questions in order to release assets with N26.We also recommend getting in touch with the relevant tax authorities in your country, in order to fulfil local tax requirements (if any).¬†We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased‚Äôs account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?¬†There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.¬†It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.¬†Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.¬†For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.¬†
I am the heir or beneficiary, how can I obtain a certificate of assets (Certificado de Posiciones)?¬†
For the probate proceedings in Spain a certificate from the bank is regularly needed. The so-called ‚ÄúCertificado de Posiciones‚Äù is a summary of the account status on the day of death. N26 can provide beneficiaries with this document:If you are mentioned in the deceased‚Äôs testament¬†or you can claim your rights on the applicable succession law.¬†In most cases the following documentation shall be present:¬†¬†A certificate from the Spanish testament register entry is needed: Certificaci√≥n de Registro General de Actos de √öltima Voluntad (RGAUV)¬†¬†if the RGAUV-certificate is positive and a testament has been made by the deceased, we need a copy of that testament¬†If the RGAUV-certificate is negative and no testament has been established, we require documents that prove your family relationship with the deceased. These can be for instance birth or marriage certificates¬†For legal reasons, we may require further documentation on which the beneficiaries will be informed. N26 will communicate all necessary steps accordingly and individually.¬†Please note that balance statements or regular account confirmations (downloaded from the N26 App or within the customers online banking) do not fulfil the requirements of a certificate of assets (Certificado de Posiciones).

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here‚Äôs how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. ¬† * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‚ÄòDirect Debits‚Äô: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don‚Äôt have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space‚Äôs IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‚ÄòSpace Settings‚Äô and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' ¬ª¬†Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' ¬ª¬†Accept the T&C's ¬ª¬†Enter your confirmation PIN ¬ª¬†Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‚Äòcog icon‚Äô)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on ‚ÄúSend money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúBank transfer‚ÄùSelect the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.¬†If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won‚Äôt be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

question: Come si crea uno Spazio Condiviso?
answer: Per creare uno Spazio Condiviso:Crea uno Spazio nella sezione Spaces della tua app N26.Seleziona l‚Äôicona +, nell‚Äôangolo in alto a destra della pagina, e clicca su 'Risparmiare insieme'.Cerca e seleziona l‚Äôutente N26 da invitare nella tua lista di contatti. Se l'utente N26 non appare nella tua lista di contatti, ti raccomandiamo di contattare la persona in questione e verificare che abbia dato il consenso per essere visibile ad altri utenti N26 tramite app. Per rendersi visibili bisogna entrare nella sezione: Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali> Informazioni personali.Leggi e accetta le condizioni generali del servizio e clicca su ‚ÄúRilascia la procura‚Äù.Inserisci il tuo PIN di confermaConferma la notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato per inviare l‚Äôinvito al partecipante.Scopri di pi√πCosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

question: Chargeback: Wie du eine Kartenzahlung stornieren kannst
answer: Du hast auf deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug von N26 eine Kartenzahlung entdeckt, die du nicht get√§tigt hast? Oder hast du etwas online bestellt, aber nie erhalten? Keine Sorge! Dieser Artikel hilft dir, genau diese Probleme zu l√∂sen.Was bedeutet Chargeback?¬†Das Chargeback-Verfahren bezeichnet eine Ausgleichsbuchung. Dabei wird der Betrag, den der H√§ndler f√§lschlicherweise abgebucht hat, auf die bei der Zahlung genutzte Karte zur√ºckgebucht. Der Ausgleich wird geleistet, sobald der Erstattungsantrag des K√§ufers erfolgreich abgewickelt wurde.¬†N26 bietet das Chargeback-Verfahren √ºber Mastercard an. So kannst du Transaktionen stornieren lassen, die nicht von dir get√§tigt wurden oder bei denen der H√§ndler etwas Falsches gebucht hat. Falls du zum Beispiel online einen Artikel bestellt, diesen aber nicht zum angegebenen Lieferdatum erhalten hast, kannst du √ºber Chargeback von Mastercard dein Geld zur√ºckverlangen.So funktioniert das Chargeback-Verfahren mit N26Du kannst eine Transaktion √ºber die N26 Web-App oder die mobile App stornieren lassen.Gehe in den Home Bereich und w√§hle die Transaktion aus, die du reklamieren m√∂chtest.Dann w√§hle Erhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung.Wichtig:¬†Falls du das Chargeback-Verfahren aufgrund einer unautorisierten Buchung nutzen willst, musst du zuerst deine Karte sperren und eine neue Karte bestellen, um weiteren Kartenmissbrauch zu verhindern. Vorher k√∂nnen wir deinen Erstattungsantrag nicht bearbeiten. Du hast die M√∂glichkeit, deine alte Karte direkt in der App zu sperren und im Anschluss eine neue zu bestellen.Du hast eine Transaktion ausgew√§hlt, die Option ‚ÄúErhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung‚Äù wird jedoch nicht angezeigt? Dann ist die Transaktion noch nicht vollst√§ndig autorisiert und du musst warten, bis daraus eine Buchung wird. In diesem Artikel erf√§hrst du, was Autorisierungen und Buchungen sind (neuen Tab).Falls du dein Konto bereits geschlossen und keinen Zugang zur App hast, dann schreibe unserem Support eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab) von deiner bei der Registrierung genutzten E-Mail-Adresse.Antworten auf h√§ufig gestellte Fragen rund um das Chargeback-Verfahren haben wir in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) f√ºr dich aufgelistet.¬†

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: ¬øC√≥mo cancelar mi suscripci√≥n Premium?
answer:
Las suscripciones a las cuentas N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal ¬†tienen una duraci√≥n inicial de un a√±o y se renuevan autom√°ticamente despu√©s de los primeros 12 meses. Despu√©s, pasan a ser indefinidas.Puedes cancelar la renovaci√≥n autom√°tica en cualquier momento, durante los primeros 12 meses de suscripci√≥n.Despu√©s de esta renovaci√≥n, la suscripci√≥n pasa a ser indefinida, pero puedes cancelarla cuando lo desees.En este art√≠culo te explicamos la diferencia entre revocaci√≥n, cancelaci√≥n de la suscripci√≥n y cancelaci√≥n de la renovaci√≥n de tu suscripci√≥n. Tienes 3 opciones:Revocar el contrato de tu suscripci√≥n durante el plazo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as (este es un plazo legal, puedes solicitarlo poni√©ndote en contacto con nosotros).Cancelar la renovaci√≥n de tu contrato cuando quieras antes de que finalice el primer contrato de 12 meses poni√©ndote en contacto con nosotros a trav√©s del chat.Cancelar el contrato de tu suscripci√≥n cuando lo desees (puedes cancelarlo de inmediato y sin limitaciones contactando con nosotros a trav√©s del chat).Pasar de una cuenta Premium a otra Premium Si quieres, ahora puedes cambiar de una cuenta premium a otra de categor√≠a inferior sin necesidad de pasarte a una cuenta Est√°ndar para conservar todos tus Espacios, redondeos, ingresos, tarjetas y pagos actuales.Para ello, inicia sesi√≥n en la app del m√≥vil, ve a Mi cuenta y abre los datos de tu Suscripci√≥n. Seleccionando Modificar Suscripci√≥n podr√°s elegir otra suscripci√≥n premium que se ajuste a tus necesidades.¬†Revocaci√≥nPuedes revocar el contrato de tu suscripci√≥n durante el plazo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as. Este plazo comienza en cuanto se cobra la primera comisi√≥n mensual. Solo tienes que contactarnos y te ayudaremos. Si revocas cualquiera de nuestros planes premium, podr√°s volver a contratar la misma u otra categor√≠a.Cancelar la renovaci√≥n de tu contratoTu suscripci√≥n premium N26 tiene un periodo inicial de 12 meses.¬† Pasados los primeros 12 meses, el contrato se renovar√° autom√°ticamente y pasar√° a tener un per√≠odo indefinido, a menos que te pongas en contacto con nosotros y pidas cancelar la renovaci√≥n.Puedes solicitarlo en cualquier momento antes de tu fecha de renovaci√≥n de 12 meses; adem√°s, te notificaremos de la renovaci√≥n por email 8 semanas antes de que se cumplan estos 12 meses.Si decides cancelar tu renovaci√≥n, podr√°s seguir utilizando tu Mastercard N26 y todas las ventajas de tu suscripci√≥n premium hasta que expire tu contrato. Tambi√©n seguir√°s disfrutando de tu seguro (para N26 You y N26 Metal) mientras sigas pagando la comisi√≥n del contrato. Despu√©s, se te emitir√° una tarjeta virtual en la fecha del aniversario del contrato en cuanto pases a una cuenta gratuita. El saldo m√≠nimo obligatorio es de 10 ‚Ç¨. No hace falta que contactes con nosotros, se tramitar√° autom√°ticamente.Cancelar tu contrato cuando lo deseesSi quieres rescindir tu contrato una vez transcurrido el plazo de 14 d√≠as, cont√°ctanos. Si escoges esta opci√≥n con N26 You o N26 Metal, dejar√°s de tener las ventajas del seguro y tus tarjetas premium Smart, You y Metal tambi√©n se desactivar√°n.Si quieres cerrar tu cuenta de forma permanente, consulta nuestro art√≠culo sobre ¬øC√≥mo cerrar la cuenta?Preguntas Frecuentes sobre la cancelaci√≥n de una cuenta premium de N26¬øTengo que cerrar mi cuenta para cancelar mi suscripci√≥n premium?
No. Simplemente puedes cambiar tu suscripci√≥n en la app N26 y tu nueva cuenta se crear√° al instante.¬øQu√© pasa con mi IBAN si cancelo su suscripci√≥n premium?
Cambiar tu suscripci√≥n no afecta a tus datos bancarios, por lo que tu IBAN se mantendr√° sin cambios.

question: ¬øQu√© es una cuenta N26 Business?
answer: N26 Business es una soluci√≥n sencilla y asequible para todas tus necesidades financieras comerciales. La cuenta N26 Business es una cuenta corriente digital, segura e intuitiva que puedes contratar en cuesti√≥n de minutos. Es sencilla, transparente y gratuita*; te permite recibir pagos de clientes, enviar dinero y pagar con seguridad, separando tus finanzas comerciales completamente de tus finanzas personales. Nuestras cuentas comerciales est√°n concebidas para aut√≥nomos y profesionales independientes que trabajan por cuenta propia (es decir, que no puedes tener el nombre de una empresa en tu cuenta ni tu tarjeta). Actualmente, no se puede cambiar de una cuenta personal a una comercial, as√≠ que decide qu√© cuenta es m√°s adecuada para ti antes de abrirla.¬øQu√© incluye una cuenta N26 Business?Nuestra cuenta N26 Business incluye las siguientes ventajas y funciones:Cuenta Business gratuita*: Puedes abrir una cuenta N26 Business online de forma gratuita, sin comisiones de administraci√≥n (*a partir de un saldo de 50 000 ‚Ç¨, puede aplicarse una comisi√≥n de custodia).Tarjeta virtual: La cuenta incluye una tarjeta virtual gratuita con fines exclusivamente comerciales. La tarjeta virtual tiene un n√∫mero PAN completo y puede vincularse a tu wallet de Apple o Google para realizar compras online o en establecimientos. Tambi√©n puedes retirar dinero con Apple o Google Pay en cajeros con funci√≥n contactless.Mastercard f√≠sica de N26: Por 10 ‚Ç¨ m√°s, puedes recibir una Mastercard f√≠sica de N26 Est√°ndar (te advertimos de que necesitar√°s un saldo m√≠nimo de 10 ‚Ç¨ en tu cuenta para posibilitar la fabricaci√≥n y el env√≠o de la tarjeta).Tarjeta Maestro: Si tambi√©n necesitas una tarjeta para tus gastos privados y est√°s sujeto a los T√©rminos y condiciones de DE, AT y NL, puedes pedir una tarjeta Maestro por otros 10 ‚Ç¨ adicionales.Pagos y transferencias: Puedes enviar y recibir transferencias SEPA empleando tu app m√≥vil de N26. Adem√°s, puedes realizar env√≠os instant√°neos de dinero a otros clientes de N26 a trav√©s de MoneyBeam. A diferencia de otras cuentas, las transferencias en monedas extranjeras no pueden realizarse a trav√©s de la app con N26 Business. Para eso, puedes visitar Wise (pesta√±a nueva).Reembolsos Business: Cada mes, recibir√°s un reembolso del 0,1 % por cada pago que hayas realizado con la tarjeta.No obstante, los pagos de empresa a empresa (B2B) no son compatibles con la cuenta N26 Business.

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select ‚ÄúSend Money‚Äù then choose ‚ÄúBank Transfer‚Äù. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: ¬øC√≥mo retirar e ingresar dinero en efectivo con CASH26?
answer: Disponible para las cuentas abiertas en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, Italia y Grecia.Lo √∫nico que necesitas es tu m√≥vil vinculado. Abre el mapa de CASH26 en la app y haz zoom para encontrar el establecimiento m√°s cercano. Una vez en el establecimiento, crea un c√≥digo de barras CASH26 y ens√©√±alo en la pantalla de tu m√≥vil a la persona que haya en el mostrador, diciendo que quieres depositar o retirar dinero con nuestro socio Viacash:¬øC√≥mo sacar dinero sin tarjeta con CASH26?Desde la pesta√±a Tarjetas de tu app N26, selecciona CASH26 > Retirada.Elige la cantidad que quieres retirar (m√°ximo 200¬†‚Ç¨/retirada y 900¬†‚Ç¨/24¬†horas).Introduce tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva) y confirma la transacci√≥n en la notificaci√≥n push. Muestra el c√≥digo de barras en la pantalla de tu m√≥vil. La persona que te atienda lo escanear√° y te dar√° el dinero.¬øC√≥mo ingresar dinero en efectivo en N26?Desde la pesta√±a Tarjetas de tu app N26, selecciona CASH26 > Dep√≥sito.Elige la cantidad que quieres ingresar (m√≠nimo 50¬†‚Ç¨).Introduce tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva) y confirma la transacci√≥n en la notificaci√≥n push. Muestra el c√≥digo de barras en la pantalla de tu m√≥vil a la persona que te atienda para que lo escanee y entr√©gale el dinero. Puede tardar hasta 10 minutos en verse reflejado en el saldo de tu cuenta en la app N26.¬°Importante!El c√≥digo de barras dura solo 10 minutos. Si no lo usas a tiempo, caducar√° y tendr√°s que generar uno nuevo. Si te equivocas en la cantidad, puedes borrarlo pulsando el icono de la papelera en la esquina superior derecha (o dejar que caduque) y generar uno nuevo.No es necesario que realices ninguna compra en el establecimiento para depositar o retirar dinero.Lee este otro art√≠culo para conocer los detalles y los l√≠mites de CASH26.

question: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift r√ºckg√§ngig machen?
answer: Eine R√ºcklastschrift bedeutet nicht, dass dein Vertrag mit dem H√§ndler gek√ºndigt wurde.Du hast die M√∂glichkeit, eine Lastschrift in der App bis zu 8 Wochen nach der Belastung selbst r√ºckg√§ngig zu machen. Nachdem du in der App auf R√ºcklastschrift getippt hast, dauert es bis zu 2 Bankarbeitstage, bis Lastschriftbetrag wieder gutschrieben wird.Lastschrift in meinem Hauptkonto r√ºckg√§ngig machen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 ein√ñffne deine Umsatzliste und w√§hle die entsprechende Lastschrift ausTippe auf R√ºcklastschriftLastschrift in einem Space mit IBAN (Unterkonto) r√ºckg√§ngig machen:Du kannst in der App auch eine SEPA-R√ºcklastschrift f√ºr deine Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN beantragen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf Spaces (Unterkonten)Gehe zum Space, in dem du eine Lastschrift r√ºckg√§ngig machen willstW√§hle die entsprechende Transaktion ausTippe auf R√ºcklastschrift*F√ºr L√§nder mit einer anderen Hauptw√§hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Das gilt f√ºr folgende L√§nder: Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tschechien, D√§nemark, Ungarn, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Rum√§nien, Schweden, Schweiz

question: Where can I use my Maestro card?
answer: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLet‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed.
