question: Come collegare o scollegare il mio smartphone al conto?
answer:
Dovrai associare uno smartphone quando crei un conto per la prima volta, se hai acquistato un nuovo dispositivo o se hai cambiato numero di telefono.Tieni presente che se cambi solo la tua SIM ma mantieni il tuo telefono, non sar√† necessario associare nuovamente il tuo dispositivo.Controlla i Requisiti di sistema per l‚Äôapp N26 (nuova tabella).Come faccio ad associare il mio smartphone al conto?Per associare un nuovo smartphone al tuo conto N26, ti servir√† la tua N26 Mastercard fisica. Come associare uno smartphone per la prima voltaPer collegare il tuo smartphone a un conto N26 per la prima volta:effettua l'accesso all'app N26. Ti verr√† chiesto in automatico di confermare il tuo numero di telefono;inserisci il codice di 4 cifre che ti invieremo via SMS (nuova tabella) per collegare il tuo telefono.Se vuoi collegare un nuovo dispositivo, devi prima scollegare il tuo vecchio smartphone per motivi di sicurezza (nuova tabella).Come dissociare il tuo vecchio dispositivoaccedi a üë§ Il mio conto sulla tua app N26¬†clicca su Sicurezza;seleziona Dissocia il telefonoQualora non avessi accesso al tuo vecchio telefono:Accedi all tua WebAppaccedi a üë§ Il mio conto;clicca su Sicurezza;Seleziona Dissocia il telefonoriceverai subito un'email contenente maggiori informazioni.Come associare un nuovo dispositivo
Ricorda: puoi collegare solo uno smartphone alla volta per ogni conto. Segui i passaggi indicati sopra per scollegare il tuo vecchio telefono.Accedi alla tua app N26Verifica i tuoi dati di accesso con il codice SMS a 6 cifreSeleziona ‚ÄúAssocia ora il dispositivo‚ÄùApri l‚Äôemail di convalida che riceverai sul tuo dispositivoClicca su ‚ÄúConferma‚Äù nel messaggioSarai poi reindirizzato alla tua app, dove dovrai richiedere un nuovo codice via SMSInserisci il codice di 4 cifre che ti invieremo via SMSInserisci il tuo PIN di confermaIl tuo dispositivo √® adesso associato al conto.

question: Warum war eine Zahlung h√∂her als erwartet?
answer: Ganz gleich, ob es sich um eine Kartenzahlung oder eine Lastschrift handelt ‚Äì wenn eine Zahlung h√∂her ausf√§llt als urspr√ºnglich gedacht, kommt dir das erst einmal verd√§chtig vor. Es gibt jedoch ein paar Gr√ºnde, warum der tats√§chlich abgebuchte Betrag vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:¬†¬†Es handelt sich um eine Transaktion inklusive einer KautionEs handelt sich um eine Transaktion in einer Fremdw√§hrungIn beiden F√§llen kann es so aussehen, als sei eine Zahlung zu hoch. Sehen wir uns die beiden Szenarien genauer an:¬†Du f√§hrst in den Urlaub und mietest am Flughafen ein Auto. Du bezahlst die Mietwagengeb√ºhr mit deiner N26 Mastercard. Der abgebuchte Betrag f√§llt jedoch h√∂her aus, weil die Autovermietung auch die Kaution f√ºr den Mietwagen autorisiert, also geblockt hat. Wenn du am Ende deines Urlaubs den Mietwagen unversehrt zur√ºckbringst, erlischt die Autorisierung und der Betrag ist auf deinem Konto nach maximal 30 Tagen wieder voll verf√ºgbar. Mehr √ºber den Unterschied zwischen Autorisierungen und tats√§chlichen Buchungen erf√§hrst du hier.Du bestellst ein Produkt in einem Onlineshop und zahlst mit deiner Karte. Der Onlineshop sitzt au√üerhalb der Eurozone und bietet ausschlie√ülich Zahlungen in Fremdw√§hrungen an, zum Beispiel Dollar oder Pfund. Je nach aktuellem Wechselkurs kann der gebuchte Betrag auf deinem Konto von der urspr√ºnglichen Summe abweichen. Dies l√§sst sich aufgrund von Schwankungen auf dem Devisenmarkt nicht vermeiden. Mehr zu √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen erf√§hrst du hier.In beiden F√§llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen f√ºr die Differenz.Keines der beiden Szenarien trifft zu und du bist sicher, dass du zu viel bezahlt hast? Wenn die Transaktion sicher nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen.

question: Warum wurde meine √úberweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgef√ºhrt?
answer: Du brauchst deine Best√§tigungs-PIN f√ºr alle Transaktionen, egal ob¬†MoneyBeam, Dauerauftr√§ge oder¬†CASH26. Deine √úberweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App best√§tigst oder abbrichst.Deine Best√§tigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deiner¬†Karten-PIN, aber du kannst f√ºr beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du dein¬†Smartphone verkn√ºpft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die Best√§tigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).Wenn du deine Best√§tigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der App¬†wiederherstellen.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.¬†Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.¬†
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Kann ich ein Konto er√∂ffnen, wenn ich au√üerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
answer: Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen. Wir bieten dir:Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.Ein Konto in Euro, eine deutsche IBAN und √úberweisungen per SEPA oder MoneyBeam.Einen g√ºnstigen Wechselkurs mit deiner Mastercard Debitkarte.Kostenloser Versand deiner Mastercard oder Expressversand f√ºr 25‚Ç¨.√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit Wise (neuen Tab) (mit dem Standard-Konto).3-5 geb√ºhrenfreie Abhebungen am Geldautomaten (1.7% Geb√ºhr auf Abhebungen in Fremdw√§hrungen).0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).2 zus√§tzliche Spaces zu deinem HauptkontoEinen Bonus f√ºr alle Freunde, die du √ºber unser Freundschaftswerbungsprogramm erfolgreich zu N26 einl√§dst.Kontaktlose Zahlungen mit Google Pay und Apple Pay.Tipps f√ºr ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:Damit du stets den g√ºnstigsten Wechselkurs erh√§ltst, empfehlen wir dir, bei Eink√§ufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine Landesw√§hrung auszuw√§hlen (andernfalls k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen).Um Geld in deiner Landesw√§hrung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-√úberweisung √ºber die Wise-Website (neuen Tab), unser Partner f√ºr Geldtransfers in Fremdw√§hrungen. Alternativ kannst du auch √ºber deine √∂rtliche Bank Geld √ºberweisen.Ausgehende √úberweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach √ºber die Standardfunktion in der N26 App t√§tigen. √úberweisungen auf Konten in Fremdw√§hrungen kannst du √ºber Wise auch in der App t√§tigen.**Bitte beachte: Wise ist nicht f√ºr N26 Business verf√ºgbar (nur SEPA-√úberweisungen in Euro).

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:‚Ç¨1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs‚Ç¨5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500‚Ç¨ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050‚Ç¨ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:‚Ç¨20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Come gestire la mia visibilit√† come utente N26?
answer: Per poterti offrire l'accesso a tutte le opzioni presenti nell'app, N26 associa i tuoi dati con altri utenti N26.Per gestire il tuo consenso ad essere visibile come utente N26, puoi andare nell‚Äôapp su üë§ Il mio conto > Profilo > Informazioni personali. Successivamente dovrai solo spuntare o rimuovere la spunta dalla casella ‚ÄúConsenti ai miei contatti che utilizzano N26 di trovarmi facilmente per effettuare bonifici.‚ÄùGli utenti N26 che hanno deciso di rendersi visibili appariranno nella tua lista contatti. Allo stesso tempo, se ti sei reso visibile, anche tu apparirai nella lista contatti di altri utenti N26.¬†Perch√® devo essere visibile ad altri utenti N26?Puoi avere accesso a tutte i nostri prodotti presenti nell'app, come ad esempio Moneybeam, che ti permette di trasferire denaro in maniera instantanea senza utilizzare un IBAN, ma solo selezionando un nome dalla tua lista dei contatti. Viceversa, puoi anche richiedere un trasferimento da uno dei tuoi contatti, il quale dovr√† solo accettare (o declinare) la richiesta. Renderti visibile ti permetter√†, inoltre, di usare Spazi Condivisi, sottoconti tramite i quali potrai condividere denaro con altri utenti N26.

question: How does N26 Business work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Who is a Politically Exposed Person?
answer:
A politically exposed person is a natural person who occupies or has ceased to occupy important public offices less than a year ago. Their family members and people with whom they have close relations should also be included in this category.Individuals who occupy or have occupied important public office are:President of the Republic, President of the Council, Minister, Vice-Minister and Undersecretary, President of the Region, Regional Councillor, Mayor of a provincial capital or metropolitan city, Mayor of a municipality with a population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants and similar offices in foreign states;Member of Parliament, Senator, Member of the European Parliament, Regional Councillor and similar offices in foreign states;Member of the central governing bodies of political parties;Judge of the Constitutional Court, magistrate of the Court of Cassation or the Court of Auditors, State Councillor, other members of the Administrative Justice Council for the Sicilian Region and similar offices in foreign states;Member of the governing bodies of central banks and independent authorities;Ambassador, charg√© d'affaires and equivalent offices in foreign States, senior officer of the armed forces and similar offices in foreign States;Member of the administrative, management or control bodies of companies controlled, even indirectly, by the Italian State or by a foreign State or controlled, predominantly or wholly, by the Regions, by provincial capitals and metropolitan cities and by municipalities with a total population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants;General Manager of ASL and of the hospital company, of the university hospital company and of the other bodies of the national health service.Director, deputy director and member of the management body or equivalent functions in international organizations.
Family members of politically exposed persons are:¬†parents;¬†spouse or person in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation;children and their spouses and persons linked to their children in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation.The persons with whom PEPs are known to have close relations are:natural persons linked to the politically exposed person due to the joint effective ownership of legal entities or other close business relationship;natural persons who only formally hold total control of a notoriously established entity, de facto, in the interest and for the benefit of a politically exposed person.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand¬†N26 Insurance¬†allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù banner you find.¬†You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.¬†How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.¬†Am I eligible?¬†N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can‚Äôt sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: Wie verkn√ºpfe ich mein N26 Konto mit PayPal?
answer:
Wenn du m√∂chtest, kannst du dein N26 Konto mit deinem PayPal-Konto verkn√ºpfen und so von einer Reihe von Vorteilen profitieren.Du kannst in Echtzeit dein Konto aufladen sowie schnelle Zahlungen senden und empfangen ‚Äì und zwar auch absolut sichere Weise, ohne deine Bankdaten oder die Nummer deiner N26 Karte angeben zu m√ºssen.Hier erf√§hrst du, wie du dein N26 Konto mit PayPal √ºber dessen Website verkn√ºpfen kannst:Klicke oben auf der Seite auf Wallet.W√§hle Karte oder Konto verkn√ºpfen.Klicke auf Konto verkn√ºpfen.Folge den bereitgestellten Anweisungen.
Wenn du stattdessen die mobile PayPal-App nutzt:Klicke oben rechts auf Einstellungen.W√§hle Karte oder Konto verkn√ºpfen.Klicke auf das Pluszeichen (+) und w√§hle Konto aus.Gib deine Bankdaten ein und best√§tige diese.
Achte darauf, deinen Vor- und Nachnamen genau so einzugeben, wie er auf deinem N26 Konto erscheint, da sonst die Verkn√ºpfung mit PayPal fehlschl√§gt.Sobald dein N26 Konto best√§tigt ist, erhebt PayPal zwei geringe Geb√ºhren, die dir dann innerhalb von 2‚Äì3 Werktagen auf dein Konto zur√ºckerstattet werden.An diesem Punkt musst du einfach die H√∂he der zur√ºckerstatteten Geb√ºhren eintragen, dich in dein PayPal-Konto einloggen und die Verkn√ºpfung deines N26 Kontos von deinem Wallet aus best√§tigen.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.¬†Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What‚Äôs a ‚Äúbanking day‚Äù?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn‚Äôt arrived ‚Äî where is it?So what if you‚Äôve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn‚Äôt come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.¬†Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.¬†
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Why isn‚Äôt my photo verification working?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review the¬†guide (new tab)¬†we‚Äôve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photo¬†verifications¬†fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure you‚Äôre the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn‚Äôt go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.¬†

question: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
answer:
Du hast per Bank√ºberweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen Betr√ºger √ºberwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.¬†Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlie√ülich f√ºr die oben beschriebenen F√§lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vort√§uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren daf√ºr vorgesehenen vollumf√§nglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschlie√ülich bei Bank√ºberweisungen an ein verd√§chtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verd√§chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link √∂ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empf√§ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu √∂ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)¬†Die ge√∂ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie au√üerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, f√ºr N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verd√§chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zus√§tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu best√§tigen. Best√§tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der Zahlungsempf√§nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verd√§chtigen Link ge√∂ffnet habe?√Ñndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zun√§chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort √§ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Login‚ÄìBildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den n√§chsten Schritten.Falls du pers√∂nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto gesch√ºtzt bleibt. Bitte schicke au√üerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zur√ºckbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-f√ºr-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. W√§hle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal best√§tigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls n√∂tig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie sch√ºtze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug sch√ºtzen kannst:Nutze ausschlie√ülich Geldautomaten von vertrauensw√ºrdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauensw√ºrdigen Shops und Webseiten√Ñndere regelm√§√üig deine Online-Passw√∂rter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verd√§chtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich au√üerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragen√Ñndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn m√∂glich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet.¬†Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
N√ºtzliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintr√§chtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as ‚ÄúDocuSign‚Äù.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. question: Demande de remboursement : qu‚Äôest-ce que c‚Äôest et comment contester une transaction par carte ?
answer:
Votre relev√© bancaire mensuel N26 comporte-t-il une transaction par carte que vous n‚Äôavez pas effectu√©e ? Vous avez pass√© une commande en ligne, mais ne l‚Äôavez jamais re√ßue ? Le paiement est rembours√© une fois que le litige est r√©solu en faveur de la personne payante.N26 propose un service de demande de remboursement (nouvel onglet) avec la Mastercard, qui vous permet de contester des transactions que vous n‚Äôavez pas effectu√©es ou si vous rencontrez un probl√®me de paiement avec un commer√ßant. Par exemple, si vous avez command√© des produits en ligne et que vous ne les avez pas re√ßus √† la date de livraison pr√©vue, vous pouvez faire une demande de remboursement.Comment contester une transaction avec N26 ?Vous pouvez contester une transaction en contactant le Service Client N26 depuis votre espace client en ligne N26 ou sur l‚Äôapplication mobile.V√©rifiez que la transaction a bien √©t√© d√©bit√©e et qu'il ne s'agit pas d'une autorisation : sur l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil de votre application N26, appuyez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne des trois barres en haut √† droite, puis sur Relev√©s. S√©lectionnez ensuite le mois correspondant √† la transaction que vous souhaitez contester.
Si la transaction figure dans votre relev√© bancaire, c'est qu'elle a d√©j√† d√©bit√©e et vous pouvez continuer √† l‚Äô√©tape suivante. Si elle n‚Äôy se trouve pas, c'est qu'il ne s'agit encore que d'une autorisation (nouvel onglet) et qu'il faut attendre qu‚Äôelle soit d√©bit√©e pour pouvoir la contester.Sur l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil, appuyez sur Mon compte > Aide > LiveChat ou T√©l√©phone (si vous disposez d'un compte N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal).Important:¬†Si vous contestez une transaction √† cause d‚Äôune transaction non autoris√©e, vous devrez bloquer votre carte et en recommander une pour que nous puissions traiter votre demande, ceci afin d‚Äô√©viter les risques de fraude suppl√©mentaire. Vous pouvez bloquer votre carte et en commander une nouvelle directement dans l‚Äôapplication N26.Si vous avez d√©j√† cl√¥tur√© votre compte et que vous n‚Äôavez pas acc√®s √† l‚Äôapplication N26, vous devez contacter notre Service Client (support@n26.com) depuis l‚Äôadresse email que vous avez utilis√©e pour cr√©er votre compte N26.Retrouvez ici les questions fr√©quentes concernant les demandes de remboursement (nouvel onglet).

question: Warum wurde mir eine Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet?
answer: Geldautomatengeb√ºhren k√∂nnen aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden anfallen:F√ºr jede Auszahlung, die √ºber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨. Gut zu wissen:Um geb√ºhrenfreie Automaten in deiner N√§he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche (neuen Tab) verwenden. question: ¬øPuede N26 cerrar mi cuenta?
answer:
En resumidas cuentas: s√≠.N26, como banco plenamente acreditado, debe llevar a cabo inspecciones t√©cnicas rutinarias de las cuentas de sus clientes. Como entidad regulada, esto nos ayuda a asegurar que los fondos mantenidos en las cuentas de N26 est√©n seguros y protegidos.A veces, los resultados de estas inspecciones rutinarias pueden obligarnos a rescindir nuestra relaci√≥n comercial con un titular de una cuenta.Cuando este sea el caso, el titular de la cuenta ser√° informado de la situaci√≥n por email. En cada circunstancia, N26 se pondr√° en contacto contigo √∫nicamente en la direcci√≥n de email asociada a tu cuenta de N26. En este email se proporcionar√°n instrucciones claras sobre los pr√≥ximos pasos que debes dar.Presta atenci√≥n y comprueba que este tipo de emails provengan de N26. Solamente nos pondremos en contacto contigo en la direcci√≥n de email asociada a tu cuenta de N26 y nunca a trav√©s de SMS o m√≥vil; adem√°s, nunca te pediremos los detalles de tu cuenta de N26, contrase√±a o detalles de tu tarjeta.
¬øC√≥mo puede N26 cerrar mi cuenta?Podemos cerrar tu cuenta de 3 maneras: con notificaci√≥n previa de 2 meses, de 14 d√≠as, o de forma inmediata. Estas cancelaciones son definitivas: Atenci√≥n al cliente no puede proporcionarte informaci√≥n sobre el trasfondo de casos individuales ni tampoco puede cambiar la decisi√≥n. T√∫ tambi√©n puedes rescindir tu relaci√≥n comercial con nosotros en cualquier momento, de forma inmediata y sin ninguna justificaci√≥n. Antes de la rescisi√≥n se deber√° pagar, eso s√≠, cualquier comisi√≥n del contrato que quede pendiente.2 meses de preavisoTenemos derecho a rescindir cualquier relaci√≥n comercial con 2 meses de preaviso sin ninguna justificaci√≥n (consulta la secci√≥n 13 (1) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,¬†consulta la secci√≥n 19 (1) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva)¬†o ¬ß 675h del C√≥digo Civil Alem√°n).14 d√≠as de preavisoTambi√©n podemos rescindir nuestra relaci√≥n comercial con una notificaci√≥n previa de 14 d√≠as si hay una causa razonable debida al incumplimiento de las obligaciones contractuales (consulta la secci√≥n 13 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,¬†consulta la secci√≥n 19 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva)). Dichas causas incluyen pero no se limitan a:Utilizar una cuenta personal para fines comerciales.¬†Seg√∫n nuestros T√©rminos y Condiciones de uso, una cuenta privada solo puede utilizarse para fines personales. Cualquier transferencia que est√© relacionada con honorarios profesionales por la prestaci√≥n de servicios y/o la venta de productos, est√° considerada como una transacci√≥n comercial. Si quieres utilizar tu cuenta con este prop√≥sito, por favor reg√≠strate para una cuenta¬†N26 Business¬†o¬†N26 Business You.Proporcionar informaci√≥n incorrecta o insuficiente para los controles rutinarios.¬†Somos un banco, por eso hacemos¬†controles rutinarios¬†de vez en cuando. Si no proporcionas la informaci√≥n correcta o suficiente sobre la transacci√≥n en cuesti√≥n, tenemos derecho a cesar nuestra relaci√≥n comercial para as√≠ cumplir con las regulaciones financieras Alemanas.Tener un comportamiento abusivo con alg√∫n miembro de N26.¬†No toleramos los comportamientos abusivos contra nuestros empleados. Tanto una amenaza de da√±o f√≠sico como cualquier otro tipo de abuso en general, puede considerarse un delito de acuerdo con la legislaci√≥n alemana y se denunciar√° a las autoridades competentes sin excepci√≥n.Cancelaci√≥n inmediataPodr√≠amos incluso rescindir nuestra relaci√≥n comercial inmediatamente de forma extraordinaria (consulta la secci√≥n 13 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,¬†consulta la secci√≥n 19 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva)). Esto quiere decir en cualquier momento, sin notificaci√≥n previa y sin un periodo de cancelaci√≥n, en caso de que haya una causa razonable de rescisi√≥n. Esto incluye pero no se limita a:Proporcionar extractos incorrectos a N26 sobre tu situaci√≥n econ√≥mica, especialmente cuando solicitas un cr√©dito.No puedes pagar tu pr√©stamo o cualquier otra deuda que tengas con N26.No cumples las condiciones de N26 en lo referido a los pr√©stamos (consulta la provisi√≥n o aumento de fianzas, secci√≥n 13 (2) de nuestros¬†T&C (pesta√±a nueva)).

question: Cos'√® un footer di sicurezza e perch√© ne abbiamo incluso uno?
answer: Una nota di sicurezza √® un messaggio personalizzato apposto alla fine delle email e dei documenti digitali che funge da sigillo di autenticit√†.Aggiungendo il tuo nome completo alla fine di ogni email, il nostro obiettivo √® aiutarti a distinguere le email legittime inviate da N26 dalle email di phishing inviate dai truffatori.¬†Anche se una nota o footer di sicurezza non pu√≤ darti la certezza assoluta che un'email provenga da una fonte verificata, aiuta a mitigare il rischio di phishing ingannevole, il tipo pi√π comune di attacco di phishing.Cos'√® il phishing ingannevole?Il phishing ingannevole √® la pratica illecita per cui si inviano email di phishing generiche a grandi quantit√† di persone sconosciute con l'obiettivo di ottenere informazioni riservate con scuse ingannevoli.Come √® possibile?¬†I truffatori si mettono in contatto con i propri bersagli dicendo di lavorare per aziende molto conosciute. Le vittime hanno cos√¨ un falso senso di sicurezza dovuto all'immagine del marchio e vengono attirati con urgenze temporali e linguaggio ingannevole. I truffatori cercano poi di manipolare le vittime che hanno preso di mira per soddisfare le loro richieste.Come puoi proteggerti?Presta particolare attenzione alle email che ricevi da banche, clienti, datori di lavoro, ecc. Se ti viene chiesto di fare qualcosa, non agire impulsivamente: rifletti bene prima di agire.¬†Se hai la sensazione che qualcosa non quadri, non ignorare il sospetto. Fai caso a errori di ortografia e grammatica, passa il cursore sopra (senza cliccare) gli URL nascosti, controlla i dettagli del mittente e fai qualche ricerca: un controllo online veloce pu√≤ aiutarti a verificare l‚Äôidentit√† del mittente.Se hai ricevuto un'email, una telefonata e/o un SMS a nome di N26, inoltra i tuoi dubbi al nostro Supporto Clienti all'indirizzo support@n26.com. Se vuoi comunicarci problemi legati al tuo conto, scrivici tramite la nostra app mobile.Scopri di pi√π su:Come segnalare email e messaggi sospetti (nuova tabella)Hai ricevuto un messaggio o una telefonata sospetta? (nuova tabella)Social engineering: impara a proteggerti dai tentativi di frode (nuova tabella)

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM‚Äôs nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can‚Äôt reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2‚Ç¨.

question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around ‚Ç¨2. For the time being, we‚Äôre unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here‚Äôs a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:¬†AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could‚Äôve been charged an ATM fee.

question: Wie kann ich meinen Kreditantrag widerrufen?
answer: Der Widerruf von¬†N26 Credit¬†Darlehen ist kostenlos und innerhalb von 14 Tagen nach Unterzeichnung eines Kreditvertrages m√∂glich.Wir ben√∂tigen eine schriftliche Best√§tigung deiner Widerrufsanfrage, daher ist es am besten, wenn du mit uns chattest. Ab hier k√ºmmern wir uns darum; wir benachrichtigen dich per E-Mail, wenn der Vertrag aufgehoben wurde.Bitte stelle sicher, dass der volle Betrag deines Guthabens auf deinem Konto verf√ºgbar ist, bis der Widerruf abgeschlossen ist.Wenn dein Guthaben von einem unserer Partner ausgezahlt wird, wende dich bitte direkt an diesen. Wir arbeiten mit auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Deutschland und Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in Frankreich zusammen.

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:‚Ç¨1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs‚Ç¨5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500‚Ç¨ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050‚Ç¨ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:‚Ç¨20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Wie melde ich mein N26 Konto f√ºr meine Steuerzahlungen in Frankreich an?

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards: 45‚Ç¨Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: Wie kann ich mein Konto schlie√üen?
answer: Du willst dein N26 Girokonto k√ºndigen? Das finden wir nat√ºrlich schade. Hier erf√§hrst du, mit welchen einfachen Schritten du dein N26 Bankkonto schlie√üen kannst.¬†Wenn du ein Premiumkonto hast, kannst du auch einfach auf ein Standard Konto wechseln, statt dein Konto komplett zu k√ºndigen (neuen Tab).Wenn du dir aber sicher bist, dass du dein N26 Girokonto komplett k√ºndigen m√∂chtest, folge bitte diesen Schritten:Wenn du noch Geld auf deinem Girokonto hast, solltest du es zuerst auf ein anderes Konto √ºberweisen. Wenn dein Kontostand negativ ist, musst du Geld auf dein Konto laden (neuen Tab). K√ºndige dein N26 Girokonto erst, wenn dein Gesamtsaldo null ist ‚Äì das macht den Prozess sehr viel einfacher.Klicke hier (neuen Tab), um die online Kontok√ºndigung anzufangen (neuen Tab). Im Formular m√ºssen folgende Informationen beinhaltet sein:Einen Antrag f√ºr die Schlie√üung des N26 Kontos zu einem bestimmten Datum oder ‚Äúso bald wie m√∂glich‚Äù,dein Name,deine N26 IBAN,solltest du noch Geld auf dem Konto haben: eine andere IBAN aus dem SEPA-Raum, auf den wir dein Restguthaben √ºberweisen k√∂nnen.

question: Come proteggere il mio conto?
answer: La sicurezza del tuo conto e il tuo dati personali sono la nostra priorit√†. Se ritieni che i tuoi dati di accesso di N26 possano essere compromessi o che qualcuno stia provando a contattarci per tuo conto, √® fondamentale cambiare immediatamente la password del tuo conto N26.Per fare ci√≤, effettua il log in nella tuo app e vai a Il mio conto > Sicurezza > Modifica la password di accesso. Per favore scegli una password sicura e non condividerne mai i dettagli con nessuno. In quanto titolare del conto, dovresti essere l'unico a creare e ad avere accesso ai tuoi dati. Per ulteriori consigli su come proteggere il tuo conto, ti invitiamo a leggere l'articolo "Come proteggere la mia identit√†?".Se ritieni che il tuo conto sia stato compromesso o manomesso, per favore contattaci immediatamente. Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

question: ¬øQu√© es IBAN para Espacios?
answer: Con nuestra funci√≥n IBAN para Espacios, tus Espacios ser√°n m√°s √∫tiles todav√≠a. Los Espacios, por s√≠ mismos, no pueden recibir transferencias ni utilizarse para abonar domiciliaciones bancarias. Sin embargo, cuando le asignas un IBAN (pesta√±a nueva) a un Espacio, puedes recibir transferencias directamente en el Espacio y utilizarlo para abonar domiciliaciones bancarias con su IBAN asignado.¬øC√≥mo funciona?IBAN para Espacios permite a los clientes de los planes premium (N26 Smart, You o Metal) que hayan abierto su cuenta N26 en Alemania y posean un IBAN (pesta√±a nueva) con c√≥digo DE asignar un IBAN √∫nico a un Espacio, de forma que pueda recibir y enviar determinadas transferencias.A continuaci√≥n, te ofrecemos un resumen de las funciones que disfrutar√°s si a√±ades un IBAN a tu Espacio o Espacios:A√±adir un IBAN a tus Espacios: Puedes asignarle un IBAN √∫nico a un Espacio nuevo o prexistente. Los Espacios compartidos no pueden tener un IBAN asignado.Varios Espacios con IBAN: Puedes crear hasta 10 Espacios, cada uno de ellos con su IBAN particular, para ejercer un control a√∫n mayor sobre tus finanzas. Te advertimos de que, cuando hayas creado 3 Espacios, se activar√° un plazo de 24 horas durante el cual no podr√°s asignarle un nuevo IBAN √∫nico a un Espacio.Recibir transferencias: Puedes recibir transferencias directamente en un Espacio con un IBAN asignado.Enviar transferencias: Puedes hacer transferencias directamente desde un Espacio con un IBAN asignado.Pagar domiciliaciones bancarias: Puedes utilizar el IBAN √∫nico de tu Espacio para abonar domiciliaciones bancarias directamente desde tu Espacio. Si no tienes fondos suficientes para sufragar el importe de la domiciliaci√≥n bancaria, la transferencia se rechazar√° y se cobrar√° una comisi√≥n en tu cuenta principal.Ver los datos del IBAN de tus Espacios: Puedes ver el IBAN de cada Espacio y, despu√©s, puedes utilizarlo para recibir transferencias de cr√©dito y abonar domiciliaciones bancarias. Para ello, solo tienes que iniciar sesi√≥n en la app del m√≥vil o la web app, ir a la secci√≥n ¬´Espacios¬ª y seleccionar el Espacio del que quieres consultar el IBAN. Si accedes a los ¬´Ajustes del Espacio¬ª, podr√°s ver el IBAN y el BIC en la parte superior de la pantalla.C√≥mo a√±adirle un IBAN a un Espacio:Puedes a√±adirles un IBAN (pesta√±a nueva) a tus Espacios siguiendo estos pasos:Inicia sesi√≥n en la app del m√≥vil de N26Pulsa ¬´Espacios¬ª para acceder al men√∫ de EspaciosSelecciona el Espacio al que quieres asignar un IBAN √∫nicoPulsa el ¬´s√≠mbolo de la rueda¬ª de la parte superior derecha de la pantalla para ir a los ¬´Ajustes del Espacio¬ªSigue las pautas que te indica la app:Selecciona ¬´Crear IBAN¬ª >Lee la informaci√≥n y pulsa ¬´A√±adir IBAN a...¬ª >Acepta los T&C >Introduce tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n >Pulsa ¬´Aceptar¬ª en la √∫ltima pantalla.C√≥mo eliminar el IBAN de un Espacio:Para eliminar el IBAN (pesta√±a nueva) de un Espacio tendr√°s que eliminar el propio Espacio y traspasar el saldo restante (de haberlo) a tu cuenta principal o a otro Espacio. Para eliminar un Espacio con IBAN, haz lo siguiente:Inicia sesi√≥n en la app del m√≥vil de N26Pulsa ¬´Espacios¬ªSelecciona el Espacio con IBAN que quieres eliminar (recuerda que, al hacerlo, eliminar√°s el Espacio por completo y deber√°s traspasar el saldo restante)Ve a ¬´Ajustes del Espacio¬ª (haz clic en el ¬´icono de la rueda¬ª de la parte superior derecha)En ¬´Administrar¬ª, tendr√°s la opci√≥n ¬´Vaciar y eliminar espacio¬ªP√∫lsala y confirma que deseas eliminar el EspacioSelecciona tu cuenta principal u otro Espacio para traspasar el saldo restantePor √∫ltimo, pulsa ¬´Eliminar¬ª en la pantalla para confirmar.Puedes enviar transferencias SEPA desde los Espacios a los que hayas asignado un IBAN. Para ello, te rogamos que sigas las siguientes pautas:Ve al Espacio desde el que quieres efectuar una transferencia y pulsa ¬´Enviar dinero¬ªSelecciona ¬´Transferencia bancaria¬ªSelecciona el contacto al que deseas enviar dineroConfirma el importe que quieres enviar e introduce una referencia (opcional)Introduce tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n y pulsa Confirmar para finalizar la transferencia

question: Quand est-ce que je recevrai ma carte ?
answer: Voici les d√©lais de livraison normaux une fois que nous avons confirm√© l'envoi de votre carte :15 jours ouvr√©s pour la livraison standard gratuite. Afin de suivre l'avanc√©e de l‚Äôexp√©dition (produite, envoy√©e, date maximale de r√©ception), il vous suffit d'acc√©der √† la page d'accueil de votre application N26 (o√π figure la liste de vos transactions).3 jours ouvr√©s pour la livraison express. Vous recevrez un lien de suivi de livraison par email en plus de pouvoir suivre l'avanc√©e de l‚Äôexp√©dition (produite, envoy√©e, date maximale de r√©ception) depuis la page d'accueil de votre application N26. Consultez notre article afin d‚Äôen savoir plus sur la livraison express.Nous vous recommandons de patienter jusqu'√† ce que le d√©lai estim√© soit d√©pass√© avant de nous contacter √† ce sujet.Votre premi√®re carte est totalement gratuite si :vous venez d'ouvrir votre compte N26 et attendez votre premi√®re carte¬†(√† l‚Äôexception de N26 Standard*)vous venez de souscrire √† un compte premium.Pour les cartes suivantes, des frais de remplacement de carte peuvent √™tre factur√©s.Comment vous assurer que votre carte est en chemin ?1. Si vous venez d'ouvrir un compte, la v√©rification de votre identit√© doit tout d'abord √™tre valid√©e. Il vous suffit de vous connecter √† votre compte N26 afin de terminer ce processus et donc activer votre compte.2. question: CRR Disclosure Report
answer: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).¬†¬†Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an ‚Äúappropriate medium‚Äù and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

question: ¬øPor qu√© no he recibido la recompensa de la invitaci√≥n?

question: Comment fonctionnent les ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù ?
answer:
La s√©curit√© de vos donn√©es personnelles est notre priorit√©. Pour cette raison, nous avons cr√©√© une bo√Æte de r√©ception au sein de l‚Äôapplication N26, appel√©e Message. Elle nous permet de communiquer avec vous en toute s√©curit√©, notamment lorsque nos messages contiennent des informations personnelles. Nous utiliserons toujours votre adresse e-mail pour communiquer des informations g√©n√©rales.Que sont vos informations personnelles ?Vos informations personnelles sont toutes les informations qui vous concernent en tant que personne et qui vous identifient ou peuvent permettre de vous identifier. Il peut s'agir de vos coordonn√©es bancaires, de votre adresse (e-mail ou postale), de vos pi√®ces d'identit√©, d‚Äôun justificatif de domicile, mais aussi des notifications concernant vos int√©r√™ts sur d√©couvert ou encore le r√©sum√© de vos virements permanents.Comment fonctionne cette bo√Æte de r√©ception ? Quand nous vous envoyons un message vers votre bo√Æte de r√©ception Messages, nous vous en informons via une notification envoy√©e sur votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√© et par email √† l‚Äôadresse li√©e √† votre compte N26.
Depuis votre espace en ligne, vous en √™tes √©galement inform√© gr√¢ce √† une banni√®re informative qui s‚Äôaffiche au dessus de la liste de vos transactions.Pour communiquer, nous d√©marrons une conversation depuis votre bo√Æte de r√©ception Messages, et nous vous demanderons de r√©pondre directement dans cette conversation.Cette fonction est disponible dans notre application mobile, en cliquant sur l'ic√¥ne Aide en haut √† droite. Assurez-vous d‚Äôavoir t√©l√©charg√© la derni√®re version de l‚Äôapplication pour pouvoir y acc√©der. Vous ne pouvez pas commencer une conversation avec N26 mais vous pourrez nous r√©pondre d√®s que nous vous aurons envoy√© un premier message. Si vous devez nous envoyer des documents, s√©lectionnez Attacher un document et assurez-vous que l‚Äôensemble de vos pi√®ces jointes n‚Äôexc√®de pas 25 MB. Messages ne remplace pas notre Livechat et vous pouvez toujours nous envoyer un email. Si vous avez besoin de nous contacter, visitez notre page Comment contacter N26 ? Si nous avons besoin de confirmer votre identit√© pour pouvoir r√©pondre √† vos questions, nous vous inviterons √† d√©marrer une conversation par Livechat.

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it‚Äîyou can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you‚Äôve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‚ÄòCards‚Äô from the bottom right-handTap ‚ÄòCard Settings‚Äô and select the relevant cardSelect ‚ÄòReset PIN‚ÄôEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction‚Äîin a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences‚Äîsuch as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn‚Äôt accepted, simply try again a different combination.¬†If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you‚Äôve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We‚Äôve made a¬†video (new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card: 30‚Ç¨Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card 65‚Ç¨

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don‚Äôt currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You‚Äôll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

question: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
answer: Als Bank m√ºssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zul√§ssiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto er√∂ffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen m√∂chtest.Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identit√§t √ºber andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine Identit√§t zu sch√ºtzen.Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gew√§hlt wird, h√§ngt von deiner Nationalit√§t, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:Ich lebe in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Spanien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Italien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in einem anderen Land (neuen Tab)Als voll lizenzierte und regulierte Bank muss sich N26 bei der Verifizierung der Identit√§t aller potenziellen Kunden an strenge Branchenstandards und Richtlinien halten. Da diese je nach Nationalit√§t variieren, k√∂nnen wir den wichtigen Schritt der Identit√§tspr√ºfung nur mit bestimmten Arten von Ausweisdokumenten f√ºr bestimmte Nationalit√§ten durchf√ºhren.Wenn deine Ausweisdokumente derzeit nicht von uns akzeptiert werden, hei√üt das, dass wir dir aktuell kein Konto bei uns anbieten k√∂nnen. Wir f√ºgen jedoch laufend neue Ausweisdokumente zu dieser Liste hinzu. Es lohnt sich also, regelm√§√üig einen Blick darauf zu werfen, ob dein Ausweisdokument bereits hinzugef√ºgt wurde.Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschlie√üen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: How to make N26 my main account?
answer: We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: we‚Äôll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and we‚Äôll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.This is how you can make N26 your main account:Account switching service powered by finleap connect GmbHTogether with our partner finleap connect GmbH (new tab) we‚Äôre offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. It‚Äôs an automated process and completely free. Log into your N26 mobile app and tap on My account > Switch to N26. Tap Start now and follow the instructions.Alternatively, you can use our¬†form (new tab)¬†and log in with your previous bank account details. Once you‚Äôve filled in all required information, it‚Äôll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

question: ¬øC√≥mo pedir mi tarjeta con env√≠o express?
answer: El env√≠o express es una buena opci√≥n si necesitas la tarjeta con urgencia, o bien si el correo postal ha fallado por alguna raz√≥n.Tendr√°s la opci√≥n de elegir env√≠o express al momento de seleccionar el m√©todo de env√≠o.
