Tambi√©n puedes usar el enlace de seguimiento para informar a DHL directamente sobre los detalles de la direcci√≥n de entrega, o para cambiar la direcci√≥n si sabes que no vas a poder estar ah√≠ en el momento de la entrega.¬øCu√°nto cuesta el env√≠o expr√©s?Tarjetas N26 Standard, Smart y You:Primera tarjeta al abrir tu cuenta: 25 ‚Ç¨Solicitar una nueva tarjeta: 30 ‚Ç¨Tarjeta extra N26 You: 30 ‚Ç¨Tarjetas de Metal N26:Primera tarjeta al abrir tu cuenta: 25 ‚Ç¨Solicitar una nueva tarjeta 65 ‚Ç¨

question: What are the benefits of N26 Smart?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra Virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces (new tab): 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces (new tab): Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.You can compare N26 Smart with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these (new tab) in mind when considering N26 Smart:The N26 Smart Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay. Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Smart fee in order to receive the card.

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: How to use Bizum with N26?
answer: Bizum is a payment platform integrated into the N26 app that connects your phone number with your bank account. It allows you to send and receive moneyinstantly between customers of different banks, using only the recipient's phone number.With Bizum you can also request money from someone, sending notifications to the sender. Once your request is accepted, you will receive the money immediately.Requirements to use Bizum with your N26 account:Have a Spanish IBAN (new tab) (ES)Have access to the phone number registered in your bank account (new tab). Always remember to keep your phone number up to date.Have your smartphone paired to the N26 app (new tab).How to activate Bizum on N26?Super easy! Go to the Home app screen and click on ‚ÄúSend money‚Äù, then click on ‚ÄúGet started‚Äù. You will have to confirm your phone number and then you will have completed the registration.What to do if it is not possible to complete the registration in Bizum because the phone number is already in use in another account?This can happen for various reasons, we recommend:Check that your phone number is up to date on N26.Keep in mind that, so far, it is only possible to have Bizum linked only to one bank account. Therefore, if you are already using it on another account, you will have to unlink it from there or follow the Portability steps explained below to use Bizum on N26.If your situation is not one of the two mentioned above, we recommend that you contact our Customer Service from the app for further assistance.Portability: How to bring your Bizum account to N26 from another bank?During the activation of Bizum in N26, after entering your personal data, the app will identify if you are already registered in Bizum with another Bank. In order to activate it on N26, you will have to enter a code that we will send you by text message.How does Bizum work?Go to the Home screen and click on ‚ÄòSend money‚Äô or ‚ÄòReceive money‚Äô, depending on what you want to do; enter your friend‚Äôs phone number and the amount. The money you send will arrive instantly, and the requested money will enter your account as soon as the notification is accepted.Limits:How many Bizum transactions can you make?You can receive a maximum of 60 transfers by Bizum per month and make as many shipments as they want.How much money can be sent through Bizum?Bizum's limits are as follows:The amount of each transaction can be from ‚Ç¨0.50 to ‚Ç¨500.You can send or receive up to a maximum of ‚Ç¨2,000 per dayYou can send a maximum of ‚Ç¨5,000 and receive a maximum of ‚Ç¨60,000 per month.How to deactivate Bizum on N26?You have to go to the ‚ÄúMy account‚Äù section from the N26 app, then click on ‚ÄúBizum settings‚Äù, and finally on ‚ÄúDe-activate‚Äù. You will need the confirmation PIN to complete this procedure.What to do if I change my phone number?You will first need to update your phone number (new tab) from the N26 app.¬†Then, if you had already completed the registration in Bizum, then you will have to deactivate it as mentioned above and register again. In this way, the system will update your phone number in Bizum as well.

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don‚Äôt currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You‚Äôll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

question: Wie √ºberweise ich in Fremdw√§hrungen?
answer: Wir arbeiten mit Wise zusammen, um einfache √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen (neuen Tab) zu erm√∂glichen. Wise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte Geb√ºhren.Um eine √úberweisung mit Wise durchzuf√ºhren, logge dich zun√§chst in deiner mobilen App ein:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.W√§hle Auslands√ºberweisung.F√ºge einen neuen Empf√§nger hinzu oder w√§hle einen bestehenden Kontakt aus. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzuf√ºgst, kannst du die gew√ºnschte W√§hrung ausw√§hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. Gib den Betrag und die Bankverbindung des Empf√§ngers an.Schlie√üe die √úberweisung mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN ab.Wenn wir deine gew√ºnschte W√§hrung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die Wise Website (neuen Tab)f√ºr eine noch gr√∂√üere Auswahl. Du kannst dich mit deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse einloggen, indem du auf Passwort vergessen? klickst. Du wirst eine E-Mail von Wise erhalten, mit der du dein Passwort erstellen kannst. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die √úberweisung abschlie√üen. Bitte beachte, dass du zuerst dein Wise-Konto mithilfe der N26 App erstellen musst, indem du versuchst, den Anweisungen in der N26 App f√ºr Fremdw√§hrungs√ºberweisungen zu folgen. Andernfalls wirst du nicht die E-Mail von Wise f√ºr die Zur√ºcksetzung deines Passworts erhalten.Bitte beachte auch, dass mit dem N26 Business, Business You und N26 Business Metal Konto in der App weder √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen, noch √úberweisungen an Unternehmen m√∂glich sind.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Das bedeutet zum Beispiel, dass nach Indien keine USD-Transaktionen ausgef√ºhrt werden k√∂nnen.

question: ¬øC√≥mo proteger mi cuenta?
answer: La seguridad de tu cuenta y tu informaci√≥n personal es nuestra m√°xima prioridad.Si alguna vez tienes la sensaci√≥n de que los credenciales de acceso a tu cuenta N26 pueden estar comprometidos, o de que alguien est√° intentando hacerse pasar por ti, es crucial que cambies la contrase√±a de tu cuenta N26 inmediatamente.Para hacerlo, inicia sesi√≥n en la app y ve a Mi cuenta > Seguridad > Cambiar contrase√±a de inicio de sesi√≥n. Por favor, crea una contrase√±a segura y no reveles tus credenciales a nadie.Como titular de la cuenta, t√∫ y solo t√∫ deber√≠as conocer tus credenciales de inicio de sesi√≥n. Te recomendamos que visites nuestro art√≠culo ¬øC√≥mo proteger mi identidad? para ver consejos sobre la protecci√≥n de tu identidad.Si crees que tu cuenta puede estar comprometida o que se ha alterado algo, por favor, ponte en contacto con nosotros inmediatamente.Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu m√≥vil ni a la WebApp, tambi√©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

question: Why do I need to update my personal information?
answer: Starting from mid-August 2022, we will contact our customers residing in Italy and holders of an N26 account with Italian Iban, with the aim of verifying and keeping their personal information up to date.As a bank, we are required by law to keep our customers' personal information correct and up-to-date, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing.This process involves the periodic verification and updating of personal data and the compilation of a due diligence questionnaire, which includes additional financial information about our customers.What information do I need to update?When you receive our communication regarding this, by logging in to your N26 app, you will be immediately directed to the process of updating your personal information.Before proceeding, make sure you have updated the app to the latest version available. The operation can only be done through the app associated with your smartphone (it will not be displayed when you log in from the WebApp).First of all, you will be asked to verify and confirm your personal data:Name and surnamePlace and date of birthNationalityGenderTax informationIn the next step, you will then need to validate your legal address and your shipping address, if different.As a last step, you will be asked to fill in the due diligence questionnaire, in order to ensure the integration and updating of relevant information required by banking legislation. This is a quick procedure, the operation will only take you a few minutes.Remember, the update and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Please note that, in accordance with the legislation in force, the updating of your data and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Furthermore, the processing of your data is subject to the European regulation on data protection and privacy (GDPR). You can find more information on our privacy policy (new tab).What is the due diligence questionnaire?The anti-money laundering legislation referred to in Legislative Decree 231/2007 requires the bank to regularly collect updated information on its customers, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing. and as a condition for maintaining relationships and transactions between customers and the bank.For this reason, we will submit a short questionnaire, within your N26 app, where we will ask you to answer a series of questions regarding your net worth, your current employment, the origin of the funds in your account and the use you make of your N26 account.We will check the data you have entered and, if necessary, we will contact you at a later time. For this, please make sure you have your app updated to the latest version available and always monitor incoming communications in the "Messages from N26" from the "Support" section of your app.What happens if I don't complete the procedure as required?We suggest you to complete the transaction as soon as possible, so that you can continue to have full access to all the features of your N26 account.In the event that the information is not updated within a reasonable period, N26 will be obliged to refrain from continuing the contractual relationship with the customer (Article 42 of Legislative Decree 231/2007).After the first 30 days, you will still be able to complete the questionnaire, but we will be forced to temporarily limit certain features of your account (e.g. incoming payments, such as salary) until you have met this regulatory requirement.

question: What to do if my card is lost or it‚Äôs been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.¬†Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).¬†You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
answer: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in üë§ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

question: Deposit fee
answer: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000‚Ç¨, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.¬†Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000‚Ç¨, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.¬†The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.¬†If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you don‚Äôt want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:¬†Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business Metal¬† (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

question: Come posso richiedere un'assicurazione N26?
answer: La nuova Assicurazione N26 on-demand consente a tutti i clienti N26 di ottenere una copertura per smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch e altri dispositivi elettronici contro furti, rapine, danni accidentali o causati da liquidi. Puoi acquistare l'assicurazione direttamente dalla tua app N26 e disdirla quando vuoi.Come funziona?Se desideri sottoscrivere un'Assicurazione N26 on-demand per dispositivi elettronici, ti basta effettuare il login nell'app N26, andare su Esplora e cliccare sul banner con su scritto "Assicurazione".Dopodich√© ti verr√† chiesto di inserire alcuni dettagli relativi al tuo dispositivo, selezionare la fatturazione mensile o annuale e confermare la richiesta. La copertura per il tuo smartphone sar√† attiva dal giorno seguente all'acquisto della polizza e pu√≤ essere disdetta in qualsiasi momento dalla tua app mobile N26 o tramite WebApp.Come posso richiedere un risarcimento?Una volta iniziata la procedura di indennizzo nell'app N26 verrai reindirizzato per registrare la richiesta sul portale online di Simplesurance (nuova tabella). Accedi con il tuo numero del certificato e il PIN che puoi trovare nel certificato dell'assicurazione ricevuto nei Messaggi da N26.Ti preghiamo di notare che ogni cliente pu√≤ presentare al massimo 2 richieste di risarcimento all'anno. Dopo il secondo reclamo andato a buon fine, l'assicurazione scade automaticamente.Per ulteriori informazioni, fai sempre riferimento al documento con i Termini e Condizioni che verr√† inviato ai tuoi Messaggi nell'app subito dopo aver acquistato la tua polizza. Inoltre, puoi sempre contattarci all'indirizzo support@simplesurance.de per qualsiasi domanda riguardo la tua polizza o la tua richiesta di indennizzo.Sono idoneo?L'Assicurazione N26 √® disponibile per tutti i clienti. I clienti N26 Metal non possono sottoscrivere un'assicurazione per il cellulare, tuttavia questa √® gi√† inclusa nella loro sottoscrizione N26 Metal. Assicurati di aver installato l'ultima versione dell'app N26. Attualmente, l'Assicurazione N26 √® disponibile per i clienti N26 in Austria, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Paesi Passi, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna e Germania.Questa polizza non copre i dispositivi acquistati al di fuori dell'Europa.

question: Warum funktioniert meine Video-Verifizierung nicht?
answer: Einige Tipps f√ºr eine erfolgreiche Video-Verifizierung:Die meisten Anrufe scheitern aufgrund einer schwachen Internetverbindung oder schlechter Bildqualit√§t (z.B. zu verschwommen oder unterbelichtet). Bitte f√ºhre den Anruf in einer hellen Umgebung durch, verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera und stelle sicher, dass du eine schnelle Internetverbindung hast.Bitte gehe sicher, dass du die einzige Person im Video bist.Du musst in einem unserer unterst√ºtzten L√§nder leben, um ein Konto bei uns er√∂ffnen zu k√∂nnen.Wir akzeptieren nur nationale Ausweise und Reisep√§sse (F√ºhrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zul√§ssig). Stelle au√üerdem sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbesch√§digt ist.Sobald deine Identit√§tspr√ºfung abgeschlossen ist, ben√∂tigst du noch einen Mindestbetrag auf deinem Konto, damit deine Karte automatisch produziert und geliefert wird. Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: Rapport CRR
answer: De quoi s‚Äôagit-il ?Le r√®glement sur les exigences de fonds propres (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) est un texte europ√©en. Il pr√©voit notamment l‚Äôobligation pour les √©tablissements de cr√©dit de publier un rapport annuel (art. 433 du CRR).Pourquoi le rapport n‚Äôest-il pas publi√© dans notre Support Center ou ailleurs sur notre site internet ?N26 Bank GmbH n‚Äôest pas oblig√©e de publier le rapport CRR sur son site internet. L‚Äôart. 434 CRR (nouvel onglet) exige uniquement des √©tablissements de cr√©dit un ¬´ support appropri√© ¬ª de leur choix.N26 Bank GmbH publie son rapport CRR sur www.bundesanzeiger.de (nouvel onglet).

question: How to close my account?
answer: We‚Äôre sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We‚Äôd love to keep you as a customer‚Äîtell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.¬†If you‚Äôve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here‚Äôs what to do:Make your account balance ‚Ç¨0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is ‚Ç¨0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You‚Äôll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you‚Äôre unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or ‚Äúas soon as possible‚ÄùYour full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we‚Äôll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: ¬øQu√© es Tarjetas para Espacios?
answer: Con nuestra nueva funci√≥n Tarjetas para Espacios, tus subcuentas individuales adquirir√°n una nueva funcionalidad que te permitir√° vincular tu Mastercard de N26 a uno de tus Espacios y gastar directamente desde ah√≠.¬øC√≥mo funciona?Tarjetas para Espacios les permite a los clientes de N26 que tengan una suscripci√≥n premium (N26 Smart, You o Metal) vincular su tarjeta Mastercard f√≠sica o virtual a un Espacio y utilizar los fondos de¬†la subcuenta para gastos personales. A continuaci√≥n, te ofrecemos un resumen de las funciones disponibles para vincular tu Mastercard de N26 a un Espacio:¬†Podr√°s vincular tu tarjeta Mastercard a uno de tus Espacios y de nuevo a tu cuenta principal con un solo clicPuedes vincular m√°s de una tarjeta a un Espacio o a varios EspaciosSi vinculas una tarjeta f√≠sica a un Espacio, esto te permitir√° utilizar Apple y Google Pay autom√°ticamente con esa tarjetaEsta funci√≥n todav√≠a no est√° disponible para los Espacios Compartidos¬øC√≥mo puedo vincular mi tarjeta a un Espacio?Podr√°s vincular tus tarjetas virtuales y f√≠sicas actuales al Espacio que elijas.Hay 3 formas de hacerlo:En la pesta√±a Tarjetas encontrar√°s, debajo de cada tarjeta, un bot√≥n para seleccionar el Espacio que hayas escogido.En Configuraci√≥n de la tarjeta tambi√©n puedes seleccionar el espacio que hayas escogido y vincularlo a tu tarjeta.En cada configuraci√≥n de un Espacio, podr√°s seleccionar la tarjeta que quieras vincular a ese Espacio concreto.Cuando quieras volver a vincular tu tarjeta a tu cuenta principal o a otro Espacio, solo tienes que seleccionar Cuenta principal u otro Espacio en el men√∫ desplegable.

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs ‚Ç¨9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Was ist meine PIN?
answer: Das Wichtigste zuerst: Bei N26 gibt es zwei verschiedene PIN-Codes ‚Äì deine Best√§tigungs-PIN und deine Karten-PIN. Gut zu wissen: Du kannst beide PINs selbst erstellen.Mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) best√§tigst du alle Aktionen, die du in der App machst ‚Äì zum Beispiel √úberweisungen, Passwort√§nderungen, CASH26 etc. Du erstellst die Best√§tigungs-PIN in der App, wenn du dein Konto zum ersten Mal mit deinem Smartphone verkn√ºpfst.Du kannst sie hier √§ndern: Mein Konto > Sicherheit > √Ñndere deinen Best√§tigungscode.Deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) brauchst du beim Geldabheben oder wenn du in einem Gesch√§ft mit Karte zahlen willst. Du erstellst deine Karten-PIN in der App, gleich nachdem du deine N26 Karte erhalten und aktiviert hast. Du kannst sie hier √§ndern: Karten > Einstellungen > PIN zur√ºcksetzen. Falls du in Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland oder Estland lebst, musst du Bargeld abheben, um deine neue PIN zu best√§tigen.Wichtig:Wir senden dir niemals eine PIN per Post oder √ºber einen unserer Kommunikationskan√§le. Nur du selbst solltest deine PINs kennen.Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder einer Kombination aus Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1994, 1331 oder 1234) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gew√ºnschte Nummer nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Weitere Informationen √ºber diese PINs findest du in den entsprechenden Support Center Artikeln, die wir oben f√ºr dich verlinkt haben.

question: ¬øQu√© es un pie de p√°gina de seguridad y por qu√© hemos incluido uno?
answer: Un pie de p√°gina de seguridad es un mensaje personalizado que se a√±ade al final de los emails y documentos digitales, con la finalidad de actuar como sello de autenticidad.Al a√±adir tu nombre completo al final de cada correo, nuestro objetivo es ayudarte a diferenciar entre los emails aut√©nticos enviados por N26 y los emails de phishing enviados por estafadores.¬†Aunque un pie de p√°gina de seguridad no puede demostrar con certeza que un email procede de una fuente verificada, ayuda a reducir el riesgo de phishing enga√±oso, el tipo m√°s com√∫n de ataque de phishing.¬øQu√© es el phishing enga√±oso?El phishing enga√±oso es una pr√°ctica ilegal que consiste en enviar correos gen√©ricos de phishing a grandes cantidades de personas desconocidas, con el objetivo de obtener informaci√≥n confidencial haci√©ndose pasar por otras personas.¬øC√≥mo lo consiguen?¬†Los estafadores contactan con sus v√≠ctimas fingiendo trabajar para empresas conocidas. Proporcionan a las v√≠ctimas una falsa sensaci√≥n de seguridad con la imagen de la marca y lenguaje enga√±oso, fingiendo que se ha producido una situaci√≥n urgente. Una vez captadas, los estafadores intentan manipular a sus v√≠ctimas para que satisfagan sus exigencias.¬øC√≥mo puedes protegerte?Presta mucha atenci√≥n a los emails que recibes de bancos, clientes, empleadores, etc. Si te piden que hagas algo, nunca act√∫es de forma impulsiva; piensa bien antes de hacer nada.¬†Si sospechas que hay algo que no cuadra, hazle caso a tu instinto. F√≠jate en si hay faltas de ortograf√≠a y gram√°tica, pasa el rat√≥n por encima de las URL ocultas (sin hacer clic en ellas), comprueba los datos del remitente e investiga: una verificaci√≥n r√°pida online te ayudar√° a verificar la identidad del remitente.Si has recibido un email, llamada telef√≥nica o SMS sospechosos en nombre de N26, comun√≠cale tus sospechas a nuestro Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente a trav√©s de support@n26.com. Si quieres hablar de problemas relacionados con tu cuenta, chatea con nosotros a trav√©s de la app del m√≥vil.Obt√©n m√°s informaci√≥n sobre:C√≥mo denunciar las sospechas de ataques de phishing (pesta√±a nueva)¬øC√≥mo mantener seguros mis datos bancarios online? (pesta√±a nueva)¬øHas recibido un mensaje sospechoso? (pesta√±a nueva)

question: Pourquoi dois-je envoyer des documents suppl√©mentaires ?
answer: Une fois que vous avez commenc√© le processus de v√©rification pour ouvrir votre compte bancaire N26 et que vous recevez un email de notre part vous demandant des informations suppl√©mentaires pour donner suite √† votre demande d‚Äôouverture de compte, veuillez lire les informations ci-dessous.N26 est une banque agr√©√©e. Dans certains cas, nous avons besoin d‚Äôinformations suppl√©mentaires de nos clients pour donner suite √† la demande d‚Äôouverture de compte. Il s‚Äôagit d‚Äôune demande standard conforme aux exigences l√©gales et r√©glementaires. Nous vous demanderons de nous fournir des documents sp√©cifiques pour ouvrir un compte bancaire N26.Nous sommes conscients que ces informations rev√™tent un caract√®re tr√®s personnel. Les informations que vous nous communiquez resteront donc strictement confidentielles. Ces informations ne seront utilis√©es que pour remplir nos obligations l√©gales.Quels documents dois-je envoyer ?Apr√®s avoir entam√© le processus de v√©rification et re√ßu un email de notre part vous demandant des informations suppl√©mentaires, vous devrez r√©pondre √† l‚Äôemail que nous vous avons envoy√© en fournissant les informations ci-dessous. Vous ne devrez envoyer que les documents mentionn√©s dans l‚Äôemail. Voici une liste des documents que nous pouvons vous demander :Justificatif de domicile : Exemple : Facture de gaz, d‚Äôeau ou d‚Äô√©lectricit√© (datant de moins de 3 mois). Ou certificat d‚Äôimmatriculation.Justificatif de revenus : Exemple : Un contrat de travail, un bulletin de paie ou une d√©claration de patrimoine et de revenus (si vous nous envoyez l‚Äôun de ces deux derniers documents, veuillez noircir toutes les donn√©es relatives √† vos convictions religieuses et √† votre situation familiale, le cas √©ch√©ant)Raison pour laquelle vous r√©sidez dans le pays X : Exemple : Visa, certificat de scolarit√©, source de richesse :Exemple : Contrats, relev√©s bancaires, informations sur la cession d‚Äôactifs, les plus-values ou les successionsComment puis-je vous communiquer ces informations ?Notre syst√®me est con√ßu, par d√©faut, pour s√©curiser l‚Äô√©change d‚Äôemails gr√¢ce au chiffrement TLS ou au niveau de s√©curit√© de connexion plus √©lev√©. Ainsi, si votre serveur de messagerie √©lectronique prend en charge un chiffrement TLS entrant ou un niveau de s√©curit√© de connexion plus √©lev√©, les emails √©chang√©s avec nous sont chiffr√©s sur le r√©seau (de bout en bout). Si votre serveur de messagerie √©lectronique ne prend pas en charge le chiffrement TLS ou un niveau de s√©curit√© de connexion plus √©lev√©, l‚Äôemail que vous nous envoyez peut ne pas √™tre chiffr√©. C‚Äôest pourquoi nous vous conseillons d‚Äôutiliser l‚Äôoption de livraison par courrier physique, qui sera un moyen plus s√ªr de partager des informations, √† l‚Äôadresse suivante¬†: N26 GmbH, Document pour l‚Äôouverture d‚Äôun compte, Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.Si vous choisissez la r√©ception par email, veuillez consulter les instructions fournies dans l‚Äôemail que vous avez re√ßu √† ce sujet.¬†Si vous d√©cidez de r√©pondre par email, veuillez √©galement joindre des copies scann√©es, des photographies et/ou des captures d‚Äô√©cran, avec une description d√©taill√©e de chaque document. Tous les documents doivent √™tre clairs et lisibles et leur taille totale ne peut d√©passer 15¬†Mo.Nous vous r√©pondrons dans un d√©lai de 3¬†jours ouvrables.Important¬†: La communication d‚Äôinformations fausses et/ou inexactes constitue une infraction p√©nale. Dans ce cas, nous ne pourrons pas accepter votre demande.

question: Wann kommt meine Karte?
answer: Die Standardlieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos, wenn es sich um deine erste Karte nach der Kontoer√∂ffnung (au√üer bei N26 Standard*) oder einem Upgrade zu einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft handelt. Bei entlegeneren Lieferadressen kann es l√§nger dauern. Um √ºber die Kartenlieferung auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe ganz einfach zum Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App. Falls die Karte nicht zugestellt werden kann und an uns zur√ºckgeschickt wird, informieren wir dich per E-Mail.Die Express-Lieferung dauert bis zu 3 Werktage. Zus√§tzlich zum Banner im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App, kannst du den Fortschritt der Kartenlieferung mit dem Tracking-Link verfolgen, den wir dir per E-Mail schicken. Erfahre mehr √ºber die Express-Lieferung.Bitte warte, bis der gesch√§tzte Lieferzeitraum verstrichen ist, bevor du etwas tust. Die erste Karte nach der Kontoer√∂ffnung oder einem Upgrade zu einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft ist immer kostenlos. F√ºr folgende Karten kann eine Ersatzgeb√ºhr gelten.Wie kann ich sicherstellen, dass meine Karte unterwegs ist?Du musst deine Verifizierung abschlie√üen, damit deine Kontoer√∂ffnung abgeschlossen wird. Stelle sicher, dass du dich verifiziert hast, indem du dich in die N26 App einloggst. Sobald die Verifizierung abgeschlossen ist, wird dein Konto er√∂ffnet und du kannst deine N26 Karte erhalten.√úberpr√ºfe deine Lieferanschrift. Falls deine Lieferanschrift Fehler hatte, berichtige sie bitte direkt (neuen Tab) in der mobilen N26 App unter: üë§ Mein Konto > Pers√∂nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Beachte folgende Hinweise:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, f√ºge diesen unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls erforderlich, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und T√ºrnummer unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in Erw√§gung und gib die k√ºnftige Wohnadresse an.Falls es sich um deine erste N26 Karte handelt, kontaktiere uns bitte via Live Chat direkt aus der mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, bestelle bitte eine neue direkt in der N26 App.Deine erste Karte f√ºr dein N26 Smart, You oder Metal Konto ist kostenlos. Beim N26 Standard Konto erh√§ltst du eine kostenlose digitale Karte (es sei denn, du entscheidest dich daf√ºr, eine physische Karte f√ºr 10¬†‚Ç¨ zu bestellen). Deine Karte wird produziert und versendet, sofern dein Kontostand nach Abbuchung der ersten monatlichen Geb√ºhr mindestens 0¬†‚Ç¨ betr√§gt. Wenn du ein Upgrade auf eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft abgeschlossen hast, wird die erste Monatsgeb√ºhr sofort abgebucht. Hast du dich direkt bei der Anmeldung f√ºr eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft entschieden, wird die erste Monatsgeb√ºhr abgebucht, sobald du genug Geld zur Begleichung der Geb√ºhr aufs Konto geladen hast, sp√§testens jedoch 15¬†Tage, nachdem du deine Identit√§t nachgewiesen hast. Wenn die erste Monatsgeb√ºhr abgebucht wurde und dein Konto einen negativen Kontostand aufweist, musst du dein Konto aufladen, um die Produktion und den Versand deiner Karte zu veranlassen.Du wirst in der App unter "Nachrichten" und durch einen Banner auf dem Home Bildschirm √ºber den Lieferstatus informiert. Bitte beachte:Das einmalige Mindestguthaben ist keine Geb√ºhr, sondern eine notwendige Voraussetzung, um die Produktion und Auslieferung deiner Karte zu veranlassen.Bei Expressversand wird eine Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 25¬†‚Ç¨ von deinem Konto abgebucht, sobald die Karte versendet wird. Bitte sorge f√ºr einen ausreichenden Kontostand, um diese Geb√ºhr(en)zu decken.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterst√ºtzen. Erfahre mehr √ºber die digitalen Nutzungsm√∂glichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Warum habe ich meine Karte nicht im gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraum erhalten?√úberpr√ºfe den gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraum im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App oder in deinem Online-Banking. Falls der angegebene Zeitraum verstrichen ist, kontaktiere uns bitte via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab).

question: Warum habe ich meinen Verkn√ºpfungscode nicht per SMS erhalten?
answer: F√ºr iOS-Nutzer, die unsere Pairing-SMS nicht erhalten, ist evtl. eine SMS-Filter-Funktion aktiviert. Um unsere Nachricht in iMessage wiederzufinden, gehen Sie oben links auf die Option "Filter" und w√§hlen Sie den Ordner Unbekannte Absender aus.Du brauchst einen Verkn√ºpfungscode, um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verkn√ºpfen. Falls du die SMS mit dem Code nicht erh√§ltst, kannst du einen neuen bis zu f√ºnf Mal in der App anfordern. Bitte warte 30 Sekunden, bevor du es nochmal versuchst. Wenn du bereits alle f√ºnf Codes angefordert hast und die Verkn√ºpfung noch immer nicht funktioniert, werden weitere Anfragen aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden f√ºr 24 Stunden blockiert. Wenn das geschieht, kannst du entweder warten, oder unseren Customer Support per Chat kontaktieren - wir helfen dir gerne weiter. Wenn deine L√§ndervorwahl au√üerhalb der EU liegt, ist es wahrscheinlich dass du die SMS mit dem Code nicht bekommst und du uns kontaktieren musst.

question: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zur√ºckzahlen kann?
answer: Wir bieten R√ºckzahlungspl√§ne an, wenn du deinen¬†Dispo¬†oder dein Darlehen mit¬†N26 Credit¬†nicht zur√ºckzahlen kannst. Das kann passieren, wenn dein Dispo storniert wurde oder du mehr als zwei Monate gebraucht hast, um deinen negativen Saldo auszugleichen.So geht es: Chatte mit uns und schlage einen detaillierten Plan vor, wie du deinen Dispokredit oder dein Darlehen in Raten zur√ºckzahlen willst, z. B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht m√∂glich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt zur√ºckzuzahlen.Bitte beachte, dass wir dir keinen R√ºckzahlungsplan anbieten k√∂nnen, wenn dein Konto bereits geschlossen ist.Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.√úbrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es √ºber einen l√§ngeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle K√ºndigungsdaten sind endg√ºltig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zur√ºck. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein Inkassob√ºro weitergeleitet.Obiges gilt nur f√ºr Kredite mit N26. F√ºr Kredite von auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) oder Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) wende dich bitte direkt an den jeweiligen Partner.

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it‚Äîthis can be done at any time (see below). We‚Äôll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn‚Äôt affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you‚Äôll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month‚Äôs time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you‚Äôll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you‚Äôve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven‚Äôt received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you‚Äôve proved your identity, we‚Äôll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you‚Äôve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee.¬†You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, we‚Äôll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

question: Garnishment: What can I do?
answer:
Has your account been frozen due to a garnishment order? In this article you‚Äôll learn what you can do to settle your outstanding debt and unfreeze your account if it is garnished. First, please carefully read the message we sent you under ‚ÄúMessages from N26‚Äù in your N26 app. After that, you have three options:Option 1: Settle the debt from your N26 accountProvided you have sufficient funds in your N26 account, you can pay the garnishment amount with a transfer order. Please note that the transfer order must also cover all interest and fees associated with the garnishment. We can only release your account when this is done.¬†This is what you have to do:Download the transfer order form (new tab)Print out the form¬†Fill out the transfer order completely and sign it¬†Email us a scan or photo to support@n26.com (new tab). Please use the email address you have on file with us for this.You can also send us the copy directly from your ‚ÄúMessages from N26‚Äù mailbox as a reply to our original message. Please note that the attachment in your mailbox can‚Äôt be larger than 25 MB.Your messages will be securely encrypted during transmission. If you still prefer to send us the form by mail, you can send it to the following address:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 BerlinIt can take approximately 5 business days to process your transfer order. Please don‚Äôt contact us regarding the current processing status, to avoid unnecessarily prolonging the processing time. We‚Äôll inform you as soon as you can fully access your account by sending a message to your ‚ÄúMessages from N26‚Äù mailbox.Option 2: Settle the claim from another bank accountYou don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your N26 bank account to settle the garnishment claim and unlock your account? You can, of course, settle the claim from another bank account after consulting with your creditor. Your creditor must inform us after the transfer has been received that the garnishment has been lifted. They can inform us either by fax at (030) 364 285 089 or by mail to the following address:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 BerlinPlease note:We only accept and process information to remove the garnishment that we receive directly from your creditor. Unfortunately, we can‚Äôt accept information or documents from you.If you want to tell us something about your garnishment, you can send us a message from your ‚ÄúMessages from N26‚Äù mailbox. However, please don‚Äôt send us any further information, to avoid unnecessarily prolonging the processing time.If your account is still frozen despite the payment, it can be for two reasons: the creditor hasn‚Äôt sent us the necessary documents yet or the processing period of approximately 5 business days hasn‚Äôt passed yet.If you agree with the creditor on an instalment and they send us a suspension notice, this is unfortunately not enough to unfreeze your account.Option 3: Convert your account to a P-account.Are you wondering what else you can do if your account is garnished? There is a third option: converting your account into a P-account. This is a garnishment protection account ‚Äì a normal bank account in which a certain monthly amount remains unaffected by garnishment, and you have free access to this amount.Please note that the application for and operation of a garnishment protection account will be reported to Schufa AG. In this case, we must cancel any existing overdraft facility or other credit. You can find out how to apply for a P-account and what else you should pay attention to here.¬†Account garnishment: How do we proceed?¬†If you don‚Äôt use any of the above options within the next 4 weeks, in case of garnishment we have to pay out any remaining balance on your account to your creditor up to the amount of the claim. After that, we can unlock your account again.

question: Warum sind einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen f√ºr mich nicht verf√ºgbar?
answer: Wir arbeiten mit vielen Partnern zusammen. Bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen setzen voraus, dass du auch deren Anforderungen erf√ºllst. B. bestimmte P√§sse, denen Sicherheitsmerkmale fehlen).Du bist in den Vereinigten Staaten¬†steuerpflichtig. In diesem Fall kannst du bestimmte Anlage- oder Sparprodukte nicht nutzen. Wenn dies nicht der Fall ist, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat, damit wir deine Kontodaten einsehen k√∂nnen. M√∂glicherweise musst du deine Telefonnummer wechseln, wenn sie mit einer nordamerikanischen Vorwahl beginnt (+1).

question: Where to find your Tax ID
answer: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If you‚Äôre from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authorities‚Äô database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TIN‚Äôs are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

question: Perch√© non ho ricevuto il mio codice di associazione?
answer: Gli utenti iOS che non ricevono il nostro SMS per associare il dispositivo, potrebbero avere abilitato il filtro SMS. Per trovare il nostro messaggio in iMessage, vai all'opzione Filtri in alto a sinistra e seleziona la cartella Mittenti sconosciuti.Il codice di associazione √® richiesto per¬†collegare il tuo smartphone. Se per qualsiasi motivo non hai ricevuto il tuo codice di associazione tramite SMS, puoi richiederlo fino a cinque volte tramite l'app. Aspetta gentilmente 30 secondi prima di richiederne uno nuovo.Se hai gi√† richiesto tutti e cinque i codici e l'operazione non √® ancora riuscita, i tuoi tentativi verranno bloccati, per ragioni di sicurezza, per le successive 24 ore. Se ci√≤ accade, puoi decidere di aspettare, oppure contattare il nostro servizio clienti che sar√† felice di aiutarti. Se il tuo codice postale √® al di fuori dell'UE, √® probabile che dovrai contattarci per ricevere un codice di associazione.

question: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
answer:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird ‚ÄúBesitzer‚Äù genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das hei√üt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers √ºber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verf√ºgen.Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space
ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.kann √ºber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verf√ºgen.kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.kann einen Shared Space schlie√üen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).
Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces √ºber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verf√ºgen k√∂nnen.Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden f√ºr Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

question: Spiccioli
answer: Con la funzione ‚Äú‚Äù, i clienti Premium possono far arrotondare tutte le transazioni con carta alla cifra tonda in euro pi√π prossima, mettendo ogni volta da parte la differenza in uno spazio a scelta.Gli arrotondamenti non ti faranno andare in scoperto. Se il tuo saldo non √® sufficiente a coprire l‚Äôarrotondamento, questo non verr√† effettuato.Puoi avere solo un arrotondamento attivo alla volta quando trasferisci il denaro in uno spazio di tua preferenza.Puoi disattivare la funzione ‚Äú‚Äù in qualsiasi momento.Se chiudi uno spazio per cui sono abilitati gli arrotondamenti, la funzione ‚ÄúRound-Up‚Äù verr√† disattivata fino a quando non la riattiverai.Come utilizzare ?Abilitare gli arrotondamenti √® facile e veloce. Basta accedere nell'app mobile N26 o nella WebApp (nuova tabella):Vai a Spaces.Seleziona lo spazio separato dal conto principale su cui vuoi attivare gli arrotondamenti.Seleziona Gestisci > Gestisci regole per arrotondare i pagamenti.Sposta la levetta sul verde per impostare le regole per arrotondare i pagamenti.Seleziona il tuo moltiplicatore, poi Conferma.Inizia a risparmiare gi√† dal tuo prossimo acquisto con la carta di debito N26!

question: Warum ist N26 sicher?
answer: Zum Schutz deines Kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige Sicherheitsarchitektur:Sichere Anmeldung:¬†Die Zugangsdaten der mobilen App und der¬†WebApp (neuen Tab)¬†bestehen aus einem Benutzernamen und einem Passwort oder einer Fingerabdruck-/Gesichtserkennung (abh√§ngig von deinem Smartphone). Bitte w√§hle ein¬†sicheres Passwort¬†und gib deine Zugangsdaten nicht an Dritte weiter.Best√§tigungs-PIN:¬†Dies ist ein¬†4-stelliger Code, den du jedes Mal ben√∂tigst, wenn du eine √úberweisung durchf√ºhrst oder dein Smartphone verkn√ºpfst/trennst. Du richtest diese PIN erstmalig ein, wenn du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft hast. Danach kannst du sie in der App selbst √§ndern.Push-Nachrichten:¬†F√ºr jede eingehende und ausgehende Zahlung wird eine Push-Nachricht an dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone gesendet. Sie dient auch zur Best√§tigung und zum Abschluss deiner Transaktionen. Au√üerdem haben wir¬†3D Secure¬†eingerichtet, um dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug zu sch√ºtzen.Jedes Mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige Sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. Aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner Kartennummer, deinem Card Verification Code (CVV), Passwort und deiner Karten- oder Best√§tigungs-PIN fragen.Wir haben weitere Schritte eingef√ºhrt, um deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu sch√ºtzen: Wir speichern so wenige Informationen √ºber dich wie m√∂glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und l√∂schen diese Daten, sobald sie f√ºr das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung nicht mehr ben√∂tigt werden. Du kannst deine¬†pers√∂nlichen Daten¬†bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner Kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du in unserer¬†Datenschutzerkl√§rung (neuen Tab).

question: Bank documents‚Äîa guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason‚Äîyou can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they‚Äôre perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here‚Äôs how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and‚Äîif you wish‚Äîit can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here‚Äôs how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you‚Äôve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You‚Äôll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient‚Äôs full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation‚Äîthe PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information‚Äîfull name, legal address, IBAN and BIC‚Äîspecific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: ¬øC√≥mo dar mi opini√≥n o sugerir un nuevo producto?
