question: Warum habe ich meinen Freundschaftsbonus noch nicht erhalten?
answer: Sobald deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen des¬†Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms¬†erf√ºllt haben, best√§tigen wir deinen Bonus. Du kannst den Status in deiner mobilen App oder¬†WebApp (neuen Tab)¬†einsehen.In den meisten F√§llen hast du den Werbebonus noch nicht erhalten, weil noch keine Zahlung mit der Mastercard Transaktionen in H√∂he von mindestens dem Wert der Pr√§mie Bei eine Pr√§mie von 15 ‚Ç¨ muss die Kartentransaktion z. B. 15 ‚Ç¨ oder h√∂her sein. Stelle sicher, dass du deine Freunde √ºber diese Voraussetzung informierst.Es kann bis zu 60 Tage dauern, bis der Bonus ausgezahlt wird.N26 beh√§lt sich das Recht vor, den Empfehlungsbonus im Fall eines Versto√ües gegen unsere¬†AGB (neuen Tab) einzubehalten.

question: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
answer: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.¬†This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select ‚ÄúSend Money‚Äù then choose ‚ÄúBank Transfer‚Äù. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees¬†is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),¬†then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you‚Äôll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: PSD2 - un Open Banking seguro
answer: ¬øQu√© es la PSD2?La Segunda Directiva de Servicios de Pago (PSD2, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) es una directiva europea actualizada que te permite acceder a la informaci√≥n de tu cuenta e iniciar pagos de forma segura a trav√©s de terceros proveedores regulados.¬†Esto significa que puedes permitir que terceros proveedores accedan a la informaci√≥n de tu cuenta a trav√©s de una interfaz creada para conseguir lo siguiente:Habilitar un servicio de informaci√≥n sobre cuentas (AIS, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) para extraer los datos de tus cuentas bancarias y luego agruparlos y gestionarlos desde un mismo sitio a trav√©s de terceros proveedores;¬†Pagar de forma segura en cualquier caja o p√°gina web que tenga Servicio de Iniciaci√≥n de Pagos (SIP).Del intercambio de datos se encarga nuestro socio Token.io.¬øC√≥mo funciona?Al utilizar un servicio de pago provisto por terceros como un servicio de informaci√≥n de cuentas o un servicio de iniciaci√≥n de pagos, Token.io te redirigir√° a la app de N26 para que confirmes la solicitud de acceso.En nuestra Pol√≠tica de Privacidad (pesta√±a nueva) te informamos sobre la finalidad, las partes involucradas y las bases legales del procesamiento de datos necesario para cumplir con nuestras obligaciones de acuerdo con los nuevos cambios de la directiva europea de servicios de pago.Preguntas frecuentes¬øPor qu√© no puedo asociar mi cuenta con cualquier tercero proveedor?¬†Si un tercero proveedor no ha adoptado nuestra interfaz dedicada, este tendr√° que hacerlo directamente con nuestro socio Token.io.¬†¬øC√≥mo puedo revocar una autorizaci√≥n de acceso que conced√≠ a un tercero proveedor con anterioridad?¬†En este caso, tienes que contactar directamente con el proveedor correspondiente y solicitar la revocaci√≥n del permiso que le hab√≠as concedido.¬†* Esta informaci√≥n aplica a todos los pa√≠ses del Espacio Econ√≥mico Europeo.

question: Chargeback: Wie du eine Kartenzahlung stornieren kannst
answer: Du hast auf deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug von N26 eine Kartenzahlung entdeckt, die du nicht get√§tigt hast? Oder hast du etwas online bestellt, aber nie erhalten? Keine Sorge! Dieser Artikel hilft dir, genau diese Probleme zu l√∂sen.Was bedeutet Chargeback?¬†Das Chargeback-Verfahren bezeichnet eine Ausgleichsbuchung. Dabei wird der Betrag, den der H√§ndler f√§lschlicherweise abgebucht hat, auf die bei der Zahlung genutzte Karte zur√ºckgebucht. Der Ausgleich wird geleistet, sobald der Erstattungsantrag des K√§ufers erfolgreich abgewickelt wurde.¬†N26 bietet das Chargeback-Verfahren √ºber Mastercard an. So kannst du Transaktionen stornieren lassen, die nicht von dir get√§tigt wurden oder bei denen der H√§ndler etwas Falsches gebucht hat. Falls du zum Beispiel online einen Artikel bestellt, diesen aber nicht zum angegebenen Lieferdatum erhalten hast, kannst du √ºber Chargeback von Mastercard dein Geld zur√ºckverlangen.So funktioniert das Chargeback-Verfahren mit N26Du kannst eine Transaktion √ºber die N26 Web-App oder die mobile App stornieren lassen.Gehe in den Home Bereich und w√§hle die Transaktion aus, die du reklamieren m√∂chtest.Dann w√§hle Erhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung.Wichtig:¬†Falls du das Chargeback-Verfahren aufgrund einer unautorisierten Buchung nutzen willst, musst du zuerst deine Karte sperren und eine neue Karte bestellen, um weiteren Kartenmissbrauch zu verhindern. Vorher k√∂nnen wir deinen Erstattungsantrag nicht bearbeiten. Du hast die M√∂glichkeit, deine alte Karte direkt in der App zu sperren und im Anschluss eine neue zu bestellen.Du hast eine Transaktion ausgew√§hlt, die Option ‚ÄúErhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung‚Äù wird jedoch nicht angezeigt? Dann ist die Transaktion noch nicht vollst√§ndig autorisiert und du musst warten, bis daraus eine Buchung wird. In diesem Artikel erf√§hrst du, was Autorisierungen und Buchungen sind (neuen Tab).Falls du dein Konto bereits geschlossen und keinen Zugang zur App hast, dann schreibe unserem Support eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab) von deiner bei der Registrierung genutzten E-Mail-Adresse.Antworten auf h√§ufig gestellte Fragen rund um das Chargeback-Verfahren haben wir in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) f√ºr dich aufgelistet.¬†

question: Warum wurde mir eine Lastschriftgeb√ºhr berechnet?
answer: Wenn eine Lastschrift aufgrund unzureichender Deckung* deines Kontos zur√ºckgeht, wird gem√§√ü unseren Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen (neuen Tab) eine Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨ erhoben. Wenn dein Kontostand durch diese Geb√ºhr in das Soll f√§llt, werden auch √úberziehungszinsen in H√∂he von 8.9% f√§llig. Du kannst diese Geb√ºhren vermeiden, indem du sicher stellst, dass du gen√ºgend Geld auf deinem Konto hast, um eingehende Lastschriften bis 18 Uhr am selben Werktag abzudecken.Da SEPA-√úberweisungen mehr als einen Tag dauern k√∂nnen, empfehlen wir dir, den f√§lligen Betrag mit MoneyBeam (zwischen N26 Konten) oder CASH26 (wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Spanien, Griechenland oder Italien wohnst) zu √ºberweisen. Bei beiden Methoden wird der Betrag sofort deinem Konto gutgeschrieben. Und wenn du eine Lastschrift nicht anerkennst, kannst du sie in der App r√ºckg√§ngig machen.IBANs f√ºr Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Lastschrift√ºberweisung abgewiesen und dir eine Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3 ‚Ç¨ berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht m√∂glich ist, deinen Space zu √ºberziehen.*F√ºr L√§nder mit einer anderen Hauptw√§hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienD√§nemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRum√§nienSchwedenSchweiz

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don‚Äôt recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?¬†Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.¬†¬†N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant‚Äôs part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn‚Äôt receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26¬†You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.¬†Go to the ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute¬†Tap ‚ÄòGet help with this transaction‚Äô and follow the steps provided.¬†Important:¬†If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you‚Äôll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You‚Äôll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.¬†¬†If you select a transaction but the ‚ÄòGet help‚Äô button doesn‚Äôt appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you‚Äôll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you‚Äôve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you‚Äôll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we‚Äôve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: CRS - Perch√© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
answer: Secondo il Common Reporting Standard (CRS),¬† N26, in quanto istituto finanziario, √® obbligato a fornire informazioni alle autorit√† fiscali dell‚ÄôUnione Europea sui conti di utenti che hanno la residenza fiscale in altro paese.Il CRS √® stato implementato dall‚ÄôOCSE e disciplina le modalit√† attraverso le quali deve avvenire la scambio automatico delle informazioni fiscali (AEOI). Lo scopo del CRS √® quello di permettere alle autorit√† fiscali di avere una chiara comprensione delle risorse finanziarie dei residenti depositate all‚Äôestero in modo da poter combattere l‚Äôevasione fiscale. Oltre 90 paesi hanno aderito all‚Äôiniziativa di condividere informazioni sulle risorse finanziarie e sulle entrate dei residenti in conformit√† con il CRS.¬†Per determinare se un conto debba essere riportato alle autorit√† fiscali per adempiere alle finalit√† del CRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:¬†¬†Residenza fiscale:Di norma, si √® soggetti a tasse nel paese in cui si ha la residenza e le tasse vengono calcolate su tutte le entrate percepite. Se hai la residenza in pi√π di un paese, normalmente esistono degli accordi bilaterali tra i paesi che aiutano a determinare in quale paese √® necessario pagare le tasse. Pu√≤ succedere di essere soggetti a tasse in pi√π di un paese nell‚Äôarco dell‚Äôanno. In tal caso, √® necessario fornire tutte le informazioni rilevanti (residenze fiscali e relativo numero di identificazione fiscale) alle autorit√† fiscali.¬†¬†Numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN)¬†L‚Äôemissione e il formato del numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN) differisce a seconda del paese. La Commissione Europea offre indicazioni chiare sul TIN da riportare.¬†Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. Baster√† eseguire l‚Äôaccesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.¬†

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (‚Äútapping‚Äù your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:¬†Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen.

question: Todesfall & Nachlassabwicklung
answer:
Wie kann ich N26 √ºber einen Todesfall informieren?¬†Im Trauerfall m√ºssen sich die Nachkommen mit vielen b√ºrokratischen Aufgaben auseinandersetzen. Eine davon ist die Abwicklung der Bankkonten des oder der Verstorbenen.Der einfachste Weg, uns zu kontaktieren, ist per E-Mail. Alternativ ist es nat√ºrlich¬† m√∂glich, eine Anfrage per Brief oder (ggf. per Fax) zu stellen:E-Mail: nachlass@n26.com¬†Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH¬†- Nachlassbearbeitung¬†
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 Berlin, GERMANYWir ben√∂tigen diese Informationen:¬†Wer ist der Verstorbene?¬†F√ºge bitte m√∂glichst eine Sterbeurkunde bei, da wir nur so ein zugeh√∂riges Bankkonto sicher identifizieren k√∂nnen.¬†Wie k√∂nnen wir die Erben oder Hinterbliebenen kontaktieren? Vor allem die Angabe einer E-Mail-Adresse und/oder Postanschrift erleichtert uns die Kontaktaufnahmen. Ein telefonischer R√ºckruf ist grunds√§tzlich nicht m√∂glich.Gibt es weitere Informationen, die wir bereits wissen sollten?¬†Wenn bereits ein besonderes Verfahren anh√§ngig ist (z.B. die Ausschlagung der Erbschaft) oder dazu bereits Unterlagen vorliegen, kann es hilfreich sein, die Informationen bereits mit uns zu teilen.¬†Wir werden uns mit dir oder den Beg√ºnstigten in Verbindung setzen und √ºber das weitere Vorgehen informieren.¬†Bitte sieh davon ab, uns Originaldokumente per Post zuzusenden. Wann immer wir ein Original ben√∂tigen, werden wir diese explizit anfragen.¬†Was passiert mit einem N26 Konto, wenn der Kontoinhaber stirbt?¬†¬†Aufgrund regionaler Unterschiede kann die Vorgehensweise je nach Land variieren.Sobald wir vom Tod eines unserer Kunden erfahren, werden die zugeh√∂rigen Karten und das Online-Banking sowie jeglicher Zugang zur App gesperrt.Bitte beachte, dass Dauerauftr√§ge oder SEPA-Lastschriftmandate auf dem Konto in der Regel auch nach dem Tod des Kontoinhabers weiter bestehen. Erben oder Berechtigte m√ºssen diese widerrufen oder l√∂schen lassen.Dar√ºber hinaus sind alle deutschen Banken grunds√§tzlich gesetzlich verpflichtet, das in Deutschland f√ºr die Erbschaftsteuer zust√§ndige Finanzamt √ºber das zum Nachlass geh√∂rende Verm√∂gen zu informieren.Wir teilen den Beg√ºnstigten in jedem Fall mit, welche Unterlagen sie vorlegen m√ºssen, um das Konto des Verstorbenen bei N26 schlie√üen und Guthaben √ºberweisen zu k√∂nnen.¬†Ich bin Kunde, kann ich f√ºr den Fall meines Todes vorsorgen?¬†Es gibt verschiedene M√∂glichkeiten, wie du sicherstellen kannst, dass dein Verm√∂gen im Todesfall nach deinen W√ºnschen verteilt wird. Das Testament ist eine der g√§ngigsten M√∂glichkeitenJedem, der sich intensiver mit der Erstellung eines Testaments besch√§ftigt, raten wir, sich von einem Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater beraten zu lassen. Das gilt vor allem dann, wenn gr√∂√üere Verm√∂genswerte vererbt werden sollen.¬†Unser Kundenservice oder die Experten unserer Nachlass- und Rechtsabteilung k√∂nnen dir hierzu jedoch keine Beratung anbieten.Vollmacht f√ºr den Todesfall:¬†Wenn du deinen Wohnsitz in Deutschland hast, endet eine von dir¬† ausgestellte Vollmacht (auch eine Bankvollmacht) nicht automatisch mit deinem Tod. Die Vollmacht bietet daher eine gute Vorsorgem√∂glichkeit.¬†Es ist ratsam, bereits zu Lebzeiten eine solche Vollmacht zu erteilen. Sie kann die Abwicklung von Nachlasskonten erheblich erleichtern.Allerdings sollte die Vollmachtsurkunde im Original bei der Bank vorhanden sein. N26 bietet hierf√ºr ein eigenes Formular an. Wende dich dazu gern an unseren Kundenservice.¬†Achtung: In den meisten L√§ndern ist eine solche Vollmacht gesetzlich nicht vorgesehen. Daher wird dieser Service nur f√ºr Verbraucher und Kunden mit Wohnsitz in Deutschland angeboten!F√ºr n√§here Informationen zu deiner konkreten Situation wende dich bitte an einen Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater oder an eine andere geeignete Beratungsstelle.

question: CRR Disclosure Report
answer: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).¬†¬†Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an ‚Äúappropriate medium‚Äù and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be¬†visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:¬†Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is ‚Ç¨1000 per transaction and ‚Ç¨5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).¬†¬†¬†To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our¬†friend referral program.

question: Cosa fare se il mio IBAN N26 non √® accettato?
answer: L‚ÄôIBAN include il codice paese DE, due cifre di controllo, le otto cifre del codice sort della banca e le dieci cifre del tuo numero di conto. Per esempio: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.I paesi aderenti dell‚Äôarea SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area - Area unica dei pagamenti in euro) hanno concordato il sistema IBAN per semplificare i pagamenti nazionali e internazionali e ridurre il rischio di errore nelle comunicazione e nell‚Äôelaborazione delle transazioni.I commercianti e i datori di lavoro che non accettano i codici IBAN di altri Stati membri dell‚ÄôArea Economica Europea violano la legge europea del 1¬∞ febbraio 2016 (Articolo 9 del Regolamento UE 260/2012 (nuova tabella)).Se hai subito discriminazioni sulla base dell‚ÄôIBAN, contatta direttamente l'autorit√† nazionale (nuova tabella) competente del tuo Paese¬† (nuova tabella)e denuncia l‚Äôepisodio. Fornisci i tuoi contatti, il nome del commerciante o dell'azienda che non ha accettato l‚ÄôIBAN e una breve descrizione dell‚Äôaccaduto (incluso uno screenshot del rifiuto o altra documentazione rilevante).Nel caso in cui il tuo IBAN non sia accettato da operatori di telefonia, internet o pay tv, puoi inviare un reclamo a ConciliaWeb (nuova tabella), la piattaforma dell'Autorit√† per le garanzie nelle comunicazioni. (Solo per clienti residenti in Italia, in possesso di Carta di Identit√† Elettronica o SPID (nuova tabella)).

question: Quels sont les documents demand√©s pour la v√©rification de mon identit√© ?
answer: En tant qu‚Äô√©tablissement bancaire, nous devons v√©rifier votre identit√©. C‚Äôest pourquoi nous proc√©dons √† une v√©rification d‚Äôidentit√© √† partir de votre passeport ou d‚Äôune pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√©, accept√©s par nos services lorsque vous ouvrez un compte ou que vous utilisez certains produits.Nous ne vous demanderons jamais de prouver¬†votre identit√© au nom de particuliers ou autres entit√©s.Nous avons aussi publi√© des¬†astuces pour vous aider √† prot√©ger votre identit√©.La v√©rification de votre identit√© se fait soit par appel¬†vid√©o, soit √† partir de¬†photos, selon le document d‚Äôidentit√© avec lequel vous ouvrez votre compte.D√®s que vous aurez indiqu√© votre nationalit√© et le type de document d'identit√© (passeport ou carte d‚Äôidentit√©) que vous souhaitez utiliser, nous vous indiquerons la solution la plus adapt√©e √† votre cas.En cliquant ici, vous pouvez afficher la liste des documents d'identit√© accept√©s pour la v√©rification de votre identit√© :Je vis en Allemagne (nouvel onglet)Je vis en Espagne (nouvel onglet)Je vis en Italie (nouvel onglet)Je vis dans un autre pays (nouvel onglet)En tant que banque agr√©√©e et r√©glement√©e, N26 doit respecter les normes et directives rigoureuses lors de la v√©rification de l‚Äôidentit√© de tous les clients potentiels. Celles-ci varient selon les pays, c‚Äôest pourquoi nous ne pouvons proc√©der √† la v√©rification de l‚Äôidentit√© qu‚Äô√† partir de pi√®ces d‚Äôidentit√© sp√©cifiques en fonction de la nationalit√© de la personne concern√©e.Si votre pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© n'est pas prise en charge, nous ne serons pas en mesure de vous proposer un compte pour le moment. Toutefois, nous ajoutons constamment de nouvelles pi√®ces d‚Äôidentit√© √† cette liste. Nous vous conseillons de v√©rifier r√©guli√®rement si vous √™tes d√©sormais √©ligible √† l'ouverture d'un compte.Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 7:00 √† 23:00 h.

question: Wie sch√ºtzt N26 mein Geld?
answer: Gesetzliche EinlagensicherungDie¬† (neuen Tab)Entsch√§digungseinsrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH (neuen Tab) sch√ºtzt alle Einlagen¬†bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†in den Mitgliedsstaaten der Europ√§ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz ist N26 gesetzlich verpflichtet, Mitglied einer Einlagensicherung zu sein. N26 ist Mitglied der Entsch√§digungseinrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH.Wie erkennt und √ºberwacht N26 Betrugsversuche?N26 verf√ºgt √ºber ein Spezialteam, das sich auf die √úberwachung und Identifizierung verd√§chtiger Transaktionen auf unserer Plattform konzentriert. Mithilfe fortschrittlicher statistischer Modelle und Algorithmen sowie Verhaltensanalyse sorgt unser Team daf√ºr, dass dein Geld stets in sicheren H√§nden ist.Was unternimmt N26, wenn betr√ºgerisches Verhalten bei einem Kunden festgestellt wird?Wenn unser Expertenteam Unregelm√§√üigkeiten aufdeckt, ergreifen wir alle gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen Ma√ünahmen zur Schadensbegrenzung. Dazu z√§hlen mitunter die Schlie√üung der Konten und die Meldung derselben an die Beh√∂rden. Falls verd√§chtige Transaktionen auf Geldw√§sche, Terrorismusfinanzierung oder eine andere Straftat hinweisen, meldet N26 diese Aktivit√§ten unverz√ºglich der deutschen Zentralstelle f√ºr Finanztransaktionsuntersuchungen (‚ÄúFinancial Transaction Investigation Unit‚Äù; FIU) oder lokalen Aufsichtsbeh√∂rden.Wie hat N26 in die Sicherheit der Bank investiert?Ende 2019 haben wir unser Trust-and-Safety-Team zusammengestellt. Dessen Mitglieder sind im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit t√§tig und f√ºr den Schutz der Nutzer sowie deren Daten gegen Cyberkriminalit√§t verantwortlich. Dar√ºber hinaus hat N26 die Gr√∂√üe des eigenen AML-Teams und der Einheit f√ºr Finanzkriminalit√§t verdoppelt sowie Transaktions√ºberwachungsprozesse und -plattformen etabliert. Diese Ma√ünahmen erm√∂glichen es uns, sch√§dliche Aktivit√§ten auf Grundlage historischer Daten aufzudecken und zu verhindern. So k√∂nnen wir Kriminellen immer einige Schritte voraus sein. Wir investieren stark in Technologie und KI. Neben Verhaltensanalyse setzen wir auch auf fortschrittliche statistische Modelle und Algorithmen.

question: Come salvare i dati del destinatario di un bonifico?
answer: Ogni volta che effettui un bonifico tramite app a favore di un nuovo contatto (dalla schermata della Home scegli la scheda Invia denaro, Bonifico bancario, quindi "aggiungi nuovo destinatario"), alcuni dettagli come il nome del destinatario e l'IBAN vengono automaticamente salvati nell'elenco dei contatti per i bonifici futuri.¬†Puoi anche cancellare i contatti:iOS: clicca sui tre puntini a sinistra per cancellare il contatto.Android: clicca sui tre puntini a sinistra per cancellare il contatto.Ricorda che la cancellazione di un contatto non implica l'eliminazione della relativa cronologia.

question: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: We offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your¬†overdraft¬†or loan with¬†N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

question: What are Instant transfers?
answer: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipient‚Äôs bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you won‚Äôt have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49‚Ç¨Spain - 1,99‚Ç¨Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99‚Ç¨The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000‚Ç¨ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000‚Ç¨ per day). If you‚Äôre using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If you‚Äôre paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiver‚Äôs details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

question: What are the benefits of N26 Smart?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra Virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces (new tab): 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces (new tab): Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.You can compare N26 Smart with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these (new tab) in mind when considering N26 Smart:The N26 Smart Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay. Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Smart fee in order to receive the card.

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Insights¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50 or cumulative transactions above 150‚Ç¨ you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Cosa fa N26 con le mie informazioni finanziarie?
answer: Questo materiale √® stato preparato esclusivamente per fini informativi e non intende fornire e non dovrebbe essere utilizzato per consulenze fiscali, legali o contabili.N26 raccoglie le tue informazioni principalmente per due motivi: per soddisfare i requisiti di conoscenza del cliente e per la segnalazione obbligatoria alle amministrazioni fiscali competenti.¬†Obbligo di identificare i nostri clienti in base alle cosiddette norme "Know Your Customer".Come qualsiasi istituto finanziario, ai sensi delle leggi fiscali applicabili, siamo tenuti a raccogliere da te informazioni rilevanti in materia fiscale al fine di identificarti. Questi includono principalmente il tuo nome, indirizzo di residenza, paese o paesi di residenza fiscale, codice fiscale o equivalente, nonch√© luogo e data di nascita.Di seguito troverai le informazioni generali relative alle definizioni di residenza fiscale e numero di identificazione fiscale.Residenza fiscaleIn linea generale, un individuo ha un solo Paese di residenza (indirizzo di residenza). Tuttavia, un individuo pu√≤ risiedere a fini fiscali in due o pi√π Paesi. Questo perch√© i Paesi utilizzano criteri diversi (forme di vincolo) per determinare la residenza fiscale. Questi criteri possono includere, ma non solo, la presenza fisica prolungata, la nazionalit√†, la propriet√† di beni, ecc. Se esiste un trattato fiscale tra i Paesi, le disposizioni decisive normalmente contenute in tale trattato assegneranno la residenza fiscale a uno dei Paesi in questione.Ad esempio, se hai una abitazione permanente nel Paese A e una residenza temporanea nel Paese B, le disposizioni decisive previste dal trattato fiscale tra i Paesi A e B possono stabilire che sei residente fiscale nel Paese A, dove hai una abitazione permanente, piuttosto che nel Paese B, dove hai una residenza temporanea (trattando la "abitazione permanente" come una forma di vincolo pi√π forte della "residenza temporanea"). L‚Äôanalisi per determinare la residenza fiscale si basa sui fatti e, in caso di dubbi, devi chiarirlo con l‚Äôamministrazione fiscale e/o il tuo consulente fiscale.Codice fiscale:Il numero di identificazione del contribuente (codice fiscale) √® una combinazione unica di lettere o numeri assegnata dal Paese di residenza fiscale. Il TIN ti identifica ai fini dell‚Äôapplicazione delle leggi fiscali del tuo paese di residenza fiscale. I TIN sono utili anche per identificare i contribuenti che investono in altri Paesi. Le specifiche del TIN (cio√® il numero di lettere, i numeri e la loro sequenza) sono stabilite dalle amministrazioni fiscali di ciascun paese. Sebbene la maggior parte dei paesi emettano i TIN, alcuni non lo fanno.¬†Il portale dello scambio automatico dell'OCSE (nuova tabella) fornisce informazioni utili sui TIN (in particolare, dove trovarli e le loro specifiche) rilasciati da molti Paesi che partecipano allo scambio automatico di informazioni in materia fiscale. In caso di dubbio sul tuo TIN, per√≤, ti consigliamo di consultare il tuo consulente fiscale o l‚Äôamministrazione fiscale.Obbligo di comunicare alle autorit√† fiscali competenti le informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti di alcuni clienti.Come qualsiasi istituto finanziario siamo tenuti a segnalare regolarmente le informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti all'amministrazione fiscale responsabile. A seconda del tuo IBAN, l'amministrazione fiscale di destinazione potrebbe essere quella tedesca, italiana, spagnola o francese.Le segnalazioni pi√π importanti sono quelle previste dal Common Reporting Standard (nuova tabella) (CRS) e dal Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (nuova tabella) (FATCA). Se sei residente fiscale in un Paese che applica il CRS e/o negli Stati Uniti, l'autorit√† fiscale ricevente scambia le informazioni ricevute da N26 con il tuo Paese di residenza fiscale nell'ambito delle procedure di scambio automatico di informazioni previste dal CRS e dal FATCA.Per permettere a N26 di adempiere ai suoi obblighi di segnalazione, in particolare quelli per quanto riguarda il CRS e il FATCA, dobbiamo raccogliere informazioni fiscalmente rilevantiaccurate e aggiornate (i cosiddetti dati di autocertificazione). I dati dell'autocertificazione comprendono il nome, l'indirizzo di residenza, paese o paesi di residenza fiscale, il codice fiscale, il luogo e la data di nascita. Se sei residente fiscale negli Stati Uniti (U.S. Person), dovresti fornire anche il tuo TIN statunitense (nuova tabella). A questo link (nuova tabella) √® possibile trovare maggiori informazioni sul FATCA e su ci√≤ che √® necessario fare per determinare se si √® un soggetto statunitense (U.S. Person) e quindi se si deve fornire il proprio TIN statunitense.Siamo tenuti a effettuare controlli regolari per assicurarci che le tue informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti memorizzate nel nostro sistema siano corrette (cosiddetta "due diligence continua"). Se la due diligence dovesse rivelare inesattezza, ti contatteremo per ottenere informazioni accurate e aggiornate.La nostra raccomandazioneTieni presente che siamo tenuti, in ultima istanza, ad applicare misure restrittive sul tuo conto nel caso in cui non fossimo in grado di ottenere informazioni accurate e aggiornate ai fini CRS e FATCA sopra descritti entro le scadenze applicabili.Ti consigliamo di controllare e aggiornare regolarmente le tue informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti. Non dimenticare che non farlo pu√≤ avere anche conseguenze dirette nei tuoi confronti, come ad esempio l'applicazione di sanzioni da parte dell'amministrazione fiscale. Per verificare e aggiornare le tue informazioni nella tua app N26:Vai a Dettagli del conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscaliClicca su "Aggiungi nuovo Paese fiscale", indica se sei un soggetto statunitense (U.S. Person) e segui le istruzioni.Per aggiungere un ulteriore Paese fiscale (se sei residente fiscale in pi√π di un paese), clicca su "Aggiungi nuovo Paese fiscale" e segui le istruzioniRimuovere il Paese fiscale esistente √® possibile solo dopo aver aggiunto un nuovo Paese fiscaleInformazione importantePuoi sempre controllare le informazioni fiscali che abbiamo attualmente su di te andando su: Dettagli del conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscaliIn ogni caso i tuoi dati personali verranno conservati in sicurezza e utilizzati esclusivamente per adempiere a requisiti CRS, FATCA e simili.Non possiamo darti consigli sulla tua situazione fiscale. In caso di dubbi, √® bene discutere la questione con un consulente fiscale e/o con l'amministrazione fiscale.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you‚Äôll want to go to the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a new space‚Äô in the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepageSelect one of the below options:‚ÄòSaving for a goal‚Äô - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‚ÄòSharing money‚Äô - Allows you to create a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.‚ÄòCreate now, decide later‚Äô - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let‚Äôs start using ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‚ÄòMain Account‚Äô or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‚Äòmanage‚ÄôThen press ‚ÄòLock Space‚Äô or ‚ÄòUnlock Space‚ÄôEnter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‚ÄòSettings‚Äô cog (top-right corner)Select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‚ÄòManage‚Äô:To create a savings goal, select ‚ÄòCreate my goal‚Äô (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‚ÄòSet goal‚ÄôTo enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‚ÄòManage Round-UpsToggle ‚ÄòEnable Round-Ups‚ÄôYou will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a rule‚ÄôChoose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: Est-ce que je peux commander un ch√©quier ?
answer: En tant que banque mobile, tous les services que propose N26 s'effectuent de fa√ßon num√©rique depuis votre mobile ou sur votre espace client en ligne.¬†Pour cette raison, N26 n'√©met pas de ch√©quiers car nous proposons d'autres moyens pratiques de r√©aliser vos transactions en toute simplicit√©, sans avoir √† vous d√©placer en agence.Vous pouvez alimenter votre compte et effectuer des paiements :Par virement bancairePar MoneyBeam (les virements instantan√©s entre comptes N26)Par carte bancaireEn domiciliant votre salaire en fournissant votre RIB √† votre employeur

question: Come posso restituire un bonifico SEPA al mandante?
answer: A partire dal 17 marzo 2020, i clienti di altre banche potrebbero richiedere il riaccredito di bonifici SEPA inviati ai conti di clienti N26.Tramite la propria banca, il mandante di un bonifico SEPA pu√≤, quindi, richiedere al beneficiario la restituzione dell‚Äôimporto inviato. Questa richiesta apparir√† sotto forma di notifica push sul dispositivo associato del cliente N26.¬†Cos√¨ come avviene con la conferma di un bonifico in uscita tramite l‚Äôapp di N26, visualizzerai l‚Äôopzione di rifiutare oppure accettare di restituire l‚Äôimporto. La richiesta verr√† automaticamente rifiutata se ignorata per 15 giorni.Se, invece, la richiesta viene accettata, l‚Äôimporto verr√† inviato al mandante. Considera, inoltre, che una volta accettata la richiesta, non sar√† possibile modificare la propria scelta. Se sul conto principale non √® presente un saldo sufficiente, non si potr√† accettare la richiesta.¬†

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‚ÄòSharing Money‚ÄôRead the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù will pop-up. Tap ‚Äúsign‚ÄùCheck both ‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù and ‚ÄúPower of attorney‚Äù, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: ¬øPor qu√© es seguro N26?
answer: Para proteger tu cuenta utilizamos una arquitectura de seguridad de 3 capas:Inicio de sesi√≥n seguro.¬†Al iniciar sesi√≥n con la aplicaci√≥n o con la¬†Web App (pesta√±a nueva), se requiere introducir el usuario y la contrase√±a o reconocimiento dactilar o facial (dependiendo de tu smartphone). Por favor, elige una¬†contrase√±a segura¬†y no reveles tus datos a nadie.PIN de confirmaci√≥n.¬†Se trata de un¬†c√≥digo de 4 d√≠gitos¬†que necesitar√°s cada vez que hagas una transferencia o quieras vincular o desvincular tu m√≥vil. Este lo estableces cuando hayas conectado tu smartphone a tu cuenta por primera vez. Podr√°s¬†modificarlo¬†t√∫ mismo desde la app cuando quieras.Mensajes push.¬†Para cualquier pago entrante o saliente, un mensaje push aparecer√° en el¬†smartphone que est√© vinculado, al igual que para confirmar y finalizar una transacci√≥n. Tambi√©n implementamos¬†3D Secure¬†para protegerte contra el fraude en compras online.Cada vez que contactes con nosotros te haremos una serie de preguntas de seguridad para asegurarnos de que eres t√∫. Pero, por supuesto, nunca te preguntaremos el n√∫mero de tu tarjeta, el c√≥digo de verificaci√≥n (CVV), la contrase√±a ni los PIN de confirmaci√≥n o de la tarjeta.Tambi√©n hemos tomado medidas para proteger tu informaci√≥n: almacenamos¬†la m√≠nima informaci√≥n imprescindible sobre ti, solo durante el tiempo m√≠nimo al que estamos obligados por ley, y la borramos cuando deja de ser necesaria para nuestros productos o servicios. Puedes¬†descargar tu informaci√≥n personal¬†hasta 6 meses despu√©s del cierre de tu cuenta. Encontrar√°s m√°s informaci√≥n en nuestra¬†Pol√≠tica de Privacidad (pesta√±a nueva).

question: Hai ricevuto un messaggio o una telefonata sospetta?
answer: Nel pieno della pandemia globale, EasyJet ha rivelato che le informazioni personali e i dettagli di viaggio di 9 milioni di clienti erano stati rubati in un cyberattacco altamente sofisticato. Nella prima met√† del 2021, i dati personali di pi√π di 530 milioni di utenti Facebook provenienti da oltre 100 paesi sono stati messi in vendita online. Alcuni giorni dopo, altri 500 milioni di utenti LinkedIn hanno visto le loro informazioni personali apparire sul Dark Web. Questi dati includevano informazioni come nomi, date di nascita, numeri di telefono e indirizzi email.Cosa c'entra questo con N26? Nonostante ci√≤ non abbia alcun impatto diretto su N26, o sulla sicurezza del tuo conto bancario, i cyber-criminali possono utilizzare le informazioni ottenute da attacchi rivolti ad altre aziende per perpetrare attacchi di phishing su larga scala.Il phishing √® una tecnica utilizzata per ottenere dati sensibili, che possono poi essere utilizzati per scopi fraudolenti. Prendendo le sembianze di entit√† fidate, i truffatori sono in grado di manipolare le persone affinch√© condividano i loro dati personali. Lo fanno prendendo di mira le proprie vittime attraverso i canali di comunicazione digitale che tutti noi usiamo quotidianamente, come email, SMS, telefonate e social media.In quanto banca digitale che sta crescendo in popolarit√†, i clienti di N26 in passato sono stati presi di mira da campagne di phishing, durante le quali i truffatori inviavano messaggi spesso contenenti link a siti web che assomigliano molto alla WebApp di N26. Anche se all'apparenza possono sembrare convincenti, questi siti web sono fraudolenti e in nessun modo collegati a N26. In alcuni casi, gli aggressori possono falsificare il nostro short code inviato tramite SMS, il che pu√≤ far apparire i loro messaggi nello stesso thread di SMS inviati in precedenza da N26. Lo stesso discorso vale per le telefonate, in quanto i truffatori sono in grado di camuffare il numero di telefono del mittente e di renderlo uguale a quello della banca.Se pensi di essere stato vittima di una truffa online o telefonica, o avessi semplicemente il sospetto che i tuoi dati personali siano compromessi, contatta subito il nostro Supporto Clienti a support@n26.com.Cosa sta facendo N26 a questo proposito? Il nostro personale addetto alla sicurezza monitora continuamente i futuri attacchi, in modo da poter assicurare che qualsiasi sito web fraudolento venga disattivato il pi√π rapidamente possibile, e facendo s√¨ che noi come azienda possiamo proteggere il tuo conto.Mentre noi continuiamo a prendere precauzioni per proteggere i tuoi conti e le tue informazioni personali, anche tu puoi fare molte cose per proteggerti. Ecco alcune cose da tenere a mente se hai ricevuto un messaggio sospetto:Se hai ricevuto un SMS da qualcuno che sostiene di rappresentare N26, ricorda sempre che noi non ti contatteremo mai attraverso questi canali.Se hai ricevuto una telefonata sospetta da un presunto rappresentante di N26, ricorda che noi non ti chiederemo mai di fornirci i dati di accesso del tuo conto o i dettagli della tua carta. I messaggi di testo che ti invitano a chiamare un numero sono sempre di natura fraudolenta. Non cliccare su nessun link e non fornire nessun dato personale. Non ti daremo mai istruzioni per fare qualcosa tramite SMS.Se hai dubbi sulle informazioni che sono state condivise con te, o sospetti di essere stato condotto su un sito fraudolento, procedi con cautela. Se ti √® stato chiesto di chiamare un numero, o di inviare un messaggio a un indirizzo email, cerca le informazioni di contatto e vedi se corrisponde a un'azienda legittima.Se non sei sicuro, fai uno screenshot del messaggio e mettiti in contatto con il nostro staff del Supporto Clienti tramite l'opzione di chat nella tua app N26, o invialo a support@n26.com. Siamo sempre qui per aiutarti!

question: Can I have my pension credited to my N26 account?
answer:
N26 Bank AG - Sign-ups before 26/03/2020 with German IBANHaving your pension credited to your N26 account is very simple.
This is what you need to do:Fill out online and sign the form provided by INPS;After filling out and signing the form, please send it to support@n26.com via email (please remember to use your registered email account to send the form). We will fill out the rest of the form and send it back to you in a few days.
Please note that you might find references to Citibank N.A in the form. Citibank N.A is an intermediary bank that credits INPS pensions to bank accounts located abroad. N26 Bank AG, Italian Branch - Sign-ups after and including 26/03/2020 with Italian IBANUnfortunately, at the moment it is not possible to receive pension to the N26 account for customers with an Italian IBAN. We will update all our customers and provide additional details and instructions as soon as the service is available.In case you encounter payment delays please contact our Customer Support via chat.

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They‚Äôre able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that‚Äôs growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you‚Äôve received an unexpected message:If you‚Äôve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you‚Äôve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you‚Äôre ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We‚Äôre always here to help!

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above ‚Ç¨150 will be charged with a 12.50‚Ç¨ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than ‚Ç¨150.The maximum fee is ‚Ç¨100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
answer: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in üë§ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: ¬øC√≥mo cambiar los l√≠mites de mi tarjeta?

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

question: N26 Cashless - Competition for Italian customers
answer:
What is it?N26 Cashless is a new promotion designed for N26 customers residing in Italy whose purpose is to encourage the use of the N26 debit card for digital payments.The competition will be active from March 1st to June 30th, 2021.Who can participate?
Registration for N26 Cashless is open and automatic for all N26 customers residing in Italy (except N26 Business customers) and who have given their consent to marketing communications.In order to participate in the promotion and prize draw, customers must:Have an open and active N26 accountNot have incurred in foreclosures, seizures or other limitations of the current accountThe mentioned conditions are valid for the entire duration of the competition and failure to comply may lead to exclusion from the final prize draw.How does it work?
N26 customers enrolled in the program will reach the threshold to participate in the final prize draws by making transactions with their Mastercard associated with the N26 account via POS (either contactless, or with chip and pin) or with Apple Pay and Google Pay.Online payments and ATM withdrawals are excluded from the transaction count.What are the prizes?Based on the number of transactions carried out during the period of validity of the competition (1st March - 30th June 2021), participants will be able to access the draws for 3 prizes:At least 20 transactions > 20‚Ç¨ Amazon gift card At least 50 transactions > 50‚Ç¨ Amazon gift card At least 90 transactions > 90‚Ç¨ Amazon gift card If participants make a number of transactions that correspond to different thresholds, they participate in the drawing of prizes for both thresholds reached.(For example, if you carry out 60 payments during the duration of the competition, you participate in the draw for both 20‚Ç¨ and 50‚Ç¨ Amazon voucher.)The prize draw will take place by August 31, 2021.In the event of a win, customers will receive an official communication within their "Messages" inbox of ‚Äã‚Äãthe N26 App.Prize competition valid from 01/03/2021 to 30/06/2021. Prize money 4,160 ‚Ç¨ F.C. VAT. To consult the complete rules, visit www.n26.com (new tab). Amazon.co.uk Gift Card is not a sponsor of this promotion. Restrictions applied. More details on amazon.it/gc-legal (new tab).

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: What to do if my card is lost or it‚Äôs been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.¬†Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).¬†You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: Come noleggiare un‚Äôauto con la tua carta N26
answer:
Generalmente, per poter noleggiare un‚Äôauto √® obbligatorio che il guidatore principale sia in possesso di una carta di credito. Tuttavia, considerato il crescente utilizzo di altre tipologie di carte da parte dei consumatori, alcune compagnie di autonoleggio hanno introdotto la possibilit√† di noleggiare auto anche con le carte di debito.
Con la tua carta Mastercard N26, quindi, sarai in grado di noleggiare auto presso un numero sempre crescente di compagnie. Qui di seguito troverai i nomi di alcune delle agenzie alle quali potrai rivolgerti:AlamoAvisCentauroEnterpriseEuropcarFireflyJoy rentLocautoMaggioreSicilyByCarThrifty car rentalPrima di noleggiare un veicolo, ti suggeriamo di contattare la compagnia di tuo interesse: le condizioni per il noleggio sono a discrezione delle singole agenzie, quindi i requisiti possono variare a livello locale e nazionale.Ricorda, inoltre, di verificare se l‚Äôagenzia accetta carte di debito non solo al momento della prenotazione, ma anche al momento del ritiro del veicolo. In aggiunta, a volte pu√≤ essere richiesto che la carta abbia i dati in rilievo.
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:nel caso in cui venga addebitato un importo imprevisto o ingiustificato, sar√† necessario contattare ed, eventualmente, avviare una contestazione direttamente con l‚Äôagenzia in questione. Nel caso la contestazione abbia un esito negativo, possiamo offrire la nostra assistenza per avviare una nuova contestazione tramite Mastercard.sulla carta di debito verr√† addebitato (e non autorizzato, come avviene per le carte di credito) il deposito cauzionale, il cui importo varia a seconda delle tipologia di auto e dall‚Äôagenzia. La cauzione sar√†, poi, riaccreditato sul tuo conto dopo la restituzione dell‚Äôauto e la verifica delle sue condizioni.

Notre formulaire web N26 pour les demandes relatives au RGPD permet √† tous les clients et anciens clients N26 (dont le compte est d√©sormais cl√¥tur√©) et √† leurs repr√©sentants autoris√©s de contacter N26 en toute s√©curit√© en cas de questions sur les donn√©es personnelles.¬†Comment √ßa marche ?Le formulaire web (nouvel onglet) doit √™tre utilis√© lorsqu‚Äôun client ou un ancien client N26 souhaite exercer ses droits lui-m√™me ou par l‚Äôinterm√©diaire d‚Äôun repr√©sentant autoris√© en vertu du R√®glement g√©n√©ral sur la protection des donn√©es (¬´ RGPD ¬ª).Vous pourrez notamment (nouvel onglet)Le droit d‚Äôopposition, en vertu de l‚Äôarticle 21 du RGPD (nouvel onglet)Vous devriez recevoir une r√©ponse de notre √©quipe dans un d√©lai de 30 jours calendaires.Lorsque vous votre adresse emailEn tant qu‚Äôancien client N26 ou repr√©sentant autoris√©, dois-je fournir d‚Äôautres informations?Les anciens clients et leurs repr√©sentants autoris√©s sont tenus de t√©l√©charger copie de la pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© / du passeportRepr√©sentants autoris√©s : copie de la pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© / du passeport et une procuration sign√©eUne fois le formulaire rempli dans son Un examen manuel de l'identit√© est effectu√© lorsqu'il est n√©cessaire de v√©rifier l'identit√© d'une personne, et qu'il ne nous est pas possible de le faire conform√©ment √† notre cadre de v√©rification standardis√©. √âtant donn√© que l'identit√© des anciens clients et repr√©sentants autoris√©s n'est pas v√©rifiable via leurs interactions avec notre Espace client en ligne ou notre application, nous devons √™tre en mesure de v√©rifier leur identit√© en utilisant d'autres moyens.Vous avez des questions √† ce sujet ?N'h√©sitez pas √† contacter notre service client √† l'adresse suivante : support@n26.com (nouvel onglet).

question: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
answer: Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es √§ndern m√∂chtest, w√§hle in der App beim Login¬†Vergessen?¬†oder¬†Passwort vergessen? (neuen Tab)¬†in der¬†WebApp (neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen f√ºr unsere Passw√∂rter. Wir berechnen die St√§rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur Passw√∂rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von ‚Äúschwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnern‚Äù.Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, f√ºge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen Gro√ü- und Kleinschreibung variierst.Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vor√ºbergehend gesperrt.
