question: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
answer: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50 or cumulative transactions above 150‚Ç¨ you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don‚Äôt currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You‚Äôll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9.

question: What are Cards for Spaces?
answer: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds in¬†the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space:¬†You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select ‚ÄòMain account‚Äô or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

question: How to invite friends to join N26?
answer: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
answer: You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app.

question: ¬øC√≥mo funciona Apple Pay?
answer: Disponible en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia, SuizaApple Pay te permite realizar pagos con tu tel√©fono m√≥vil y as√≠ no tener que llevar tu tarjeta Mastercard a todas partes.Hemos creado un¬†v√≠deo (pesta√±a nueva)¬†para ayudarte a configurar tu Mastercard N26 con Apple Pay.Aqu√≠ tienes algunos consejos a tener en cuenta:La regi√≥n de tu iPhone coincide con el pa√≠s al que fue enviada tu primera tarjeta Mastercard (puedes chequear tu regi√≥n entrando en Ajustes, despu√©s en General y finalmente en Idioma y Regi√≥n de tu iPhone).Si has perdido tu iPhone y no eres capaz de encontrarlo utilizando Encontrar Mi iPhone, siempre puedes acceder a tu iCloud y eliminar todos los dispositivos con Apple Pay mediante un ordenador, ya sea Mac o PC. Adem√°s, deber√≠as encender el Modo Perdido para bloquear tu Mastercard en Apple Pay. Los pagos con tu tarjeta f√≠sica seguir√°n funcionando.Si tu Mastercard N26 desaparece inesperadamente de Apple Wallet, puede que sea porque has cerrado tu sesi√≥n de iCloud, desactivado el C√≥digo de Acceso o el Touch ID, restablecido los ajustes de f√°brica a trav√©s de iTunes, o eliminado todo el contenido y configuraci√≥n de tu dispositivo. En cualquier caso, siempre puedes volver a a√±adir tu tarjeta. Ten en cuenta que tu tarjeta no se eliminar√° si actualizas el sistema operativo, restableces la configuraci√≥n personal o apagas el modo Encontrar Mi iPhone.Para compras en tienda o bien online, deber√°s autorizar tus pagos v√≠a Touch ID o utilizando el C√≥digo de Acceso. Si est√°s utilizando Apple Watch, las autorizaciones se realizar√°n haciendo doble clic en el bot√≥n lateral. Si est√°s utilizando un Mac, la autorizaci√≥n se realizar√° mediante el Touch ID que hay en la Touch Bar que encontrar√°s en el extremo superior derecho del teclado.Aseg√∫rate de que tu dispositivo cumple los requisitos t√©cnicos necesarios visitando Apple Support (pesta√±a nueva).Si eres un usuario de N26 Metal o N26 Business You, podr√≠a pasar que la imagen de tu tarjeta que se muestra en el Apple Wallet diga N26 You (para los clientes de Metal) y N26 Business (para los clientes de Business You). Ya estamos trabajando para resolver esto, pero de momento puedes estar tranquilo que esto no afecta a la usabilidad de Apple Pay ni a tu membres√≠a premium.

question: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
answer: Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine f√§llige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zur√ºckgegeben und dir wird eine¬†Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨¬†berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus ger√§t, werden √úberziehungszinsen in der H√∂he von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verz√∂gert werden.Um diese Geb√ºhr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App pr√ºfen, ob dir ein¬†Dispokredit¬†zur Verf√ºgung steht.IBANs f√ºr Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Lastschrift√ºberweisung abgewiesen und dir eine Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3 ‚Ç¨ berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht m√∂glich ist, deinen Space zu √ºberziehen.*F√ºr L√§nder mit einer anderen Hauptw√§hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienD√§nemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRum√§nienSchwedenSchweizDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Was ist MoneyBeam?
answer: Durch einen MoneyBeam kannst du deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld senden, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Du kannst auch einen MoneyBeam von deinen Kontakten anfragen, um Geld zu erhalten. Um MoneyBeam nutzen zu k√∂nnen, m√ºssen du und deine Kontakte als N26 Nutzer sichtbar sein.Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden:¬†Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeamW√§hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder f√ºge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einGib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein und best√§tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erh√§ltst.¬†Um einen MoneyBeam anzufragen:Tippe auf Geld erhalten > MoneyBeam anfragenW√§hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder f√ºge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einSobald der Kontakt deine Anfrage best√§tigt, erh√§ltst du deinen angefragten BetragDas Limit f√ºr MoneyBeams liegt bei 1000‚Ç¨ pro Transaktion und 5000‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Ein GIF als zus√§tzlichen Verwendungszweck hinzuf√ºgen:Wenn du MoneyBeam nutzt, kannst du GIFs als zus√§tzlichen Text beim Verwendungszweck versenden. Sobald der MoneyBeam abgeschlossen ist, wird dem Empf√§nger auf dem Startbildschirm ein Film-Emoji als Pr√§fix auf der eingehenden √úberweisung angezeigt, sodass er wei√ü, dass an die √úberweisung ein GIF angeh√§ngt ist. Der Empf√§nger kann das GIF zusammen mit dem Verwendungszweck in den √úberweisungsdaten einsehen.Die GIFs werden dir direkt von Giphy, Inc. zur Verf√ºgung gestellt und nicht von N26. Bitte beachte, dass Giphy ein US-amerikanisches Unternehmen ist, das deine personenbezogenen Daten in den USA verarbeitet. Informationen dar√ºber, wie Giphy deine personenbezogenen Daten verarbeitet, findest du in der Datenschutzrichtlinie von Giphy (neuen Tab).¬†¬†Um einen MoneyBeam mit einem GIF zu senden:Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeam.W√§hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder f√ºge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einW√§hle GIF hinzuf√ºgen und suche nach dem GIF, das du hinzuf√ºgen m√∂chtest, entweder per Suchfeld oder einfach scrollend.Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein und best√§tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erh√§ltst.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren‚Äôt sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you‚Äôve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to üë§ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: Quelles sont mes limites de d√©penses ?
answer: Paiements par carte en magasin et en lignePlafond quotidien¬†: 5¬†000¬†‚Ç¨Plafond mensuel¬†: 20¬†000¬†‚Ç¨Retraits au distributeur automatique de billetsUn plafond quotidien de 1¬†000¬†‚Ç¨ s‚Äôapplique aux pays suivants¬†: Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Italie, Islande, Lettonie, Liechtenstein, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Su√®de et Suisse.Un plafond quotidien de 400¬†‚Ç¨ s‚Äôapplique aux pays suivants¬†: Togo, Congo, B√©nin, C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire, Kenya, Cameroun, Nigeria, S√©n√©gal, Alg√©rie, R√©publique centrafricaine, Gambie, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisie et Ouganda.Le plafond hebdomadaire de 2¬†500¬†‚Ç¨ s‚Äôapplique √† tous les pays (sauf France).Un plafond hebdomadaire de 1 050 ‚Ç¨ s'applique en FranceVirementsPlafond journalier pour les virements MoneyBeam¬†: 1¬†000¬†‚Ç¨Virements SEPA entrants¬†: Illimit√©¬†Virements SEPA sortants¬†: Illimit√©Virements SEPA instantan√©s entrants¬†: 100¬†000¬†‚Ç¨ par virementVirements SEPA instantan√©s sortants : 2 000 ‚Ç¨ par virementCash26Le montant maximum est de 200¬†‚Ç¨ par retrait et de 900¬†‚Ç¨ par 24¬†heures. Aucun montant minimum de retrait n‚Äôest impos√©.Le montant minimum est de 50¬†‚Ç¨ par d√©p√¥t et le montant maximum est de 999¬†‚Ç¨ par 24¬†heures.Les retraits et d√©p√¥ts sont limit√©s √† 999 ‚Ç¨ pendant 24 heures.

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50 or cumulative transactions above 150‚Ç¨ you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?¬†When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?¬†¬†First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.What if I can‚Äôt remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can‚Äôt receive SMS for other reasons?If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.Why can‚Äôt I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it‚Äîthis can be done at any time (see below). We‚Äôll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn‚Äôt affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you‚Äôll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month‚Äôs time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you‚Äôll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you‚Äôve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven‚Äôt received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you‚Äôve proved your identity, we‚Äôll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you‚Äôve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee.¬†You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, we‚Äôll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

question: Posso aprire un conto N26 nel mio paese?

question: Unterst√ºtzt N26 SWIFT-√úberweisungen?

(Das bedeutet, sie gilt nicht f√ºr das N26 Metal und N26 Business Metal Konto.)Wenn du dein Konto nach dem 07.07.2021 angemeldet hast gilt die Geb√ºhr unabh√§ngig von deiner IBAN f√ºr das N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You, N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You Konto. (Das bedeutet, sie gilt nicht f√ºr das N26 Metal und N26 Business Metal Konto.

question: Was sind ‚ÄúNachrichten‚Äù?
answer: Die Sicherheit deiner Daten hat f√ºr uns h√∂chste Priorit√§t. Deshalb haben wir einen Posteingang direkt in deiner N26 App erstellt, an den wir Nachrichten schicken k√∂nnen. Alle Inhalte, die personenbezogene Daten enthalten, werden an Nachrichten geschickt. Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse benutzen wir weiterhin f√ºr allgemeine Informationen. Was sind personenbezogene Daten?Personenbezogene Daten sind solche Daten, die dich identifizierbar machen oder anhand derer man dich identifizieren k√∂nnte. Dazu z√§hlen deine Kontodaten, deine Adresse (E-Mail oder postalisch), Ausweisdokumente, Meldebescheinigung, aber auch Mitteilungen √ºber anfallende Dispokreditzinsen oder √ºber Dauerauftr√§ge.Wie funktioniert‚Äôs?Wenn wir dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken, erh√§ltst du eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t und eine E-Mail an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn du dich in die WebApp einloggst, wirst du ebenfalls durch eine Info-Karte √ºber neue Nachrichten informiert.Wir werden dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken und bitten dich, direkt von dort zu antworten.Diese Funktion ist in unserer mobilen App verf√ºgbar, indem du oben rechts auf das Support-Symbol klickst.¬†Stelle sicher, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast.Du kannst keine E-Mail-Unterhaltung starten, aber du kannst antworten, sobald wir dir die erste Nachricht geschickt haben. Wenn es darum geht, uns ein Dokument zu schicken, w√§hle Datei anh√§ngen. Bitte stelle sicher, dass die gesamte Gr√∂√üe der Anh√§nge pro Nachricht nicht gr√∂√üer ist als 25 MB.Nachrichten ersetzt nicht unseren Live Chat und du kannst uns weiterhin per E-Mail von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren. Wie du als erstes mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst, erf√§hrst du in unserem Artikel: Wie kontaktiere ich N26? Falls wir dich f√ºr dein Anliegen verifizieren m√ºssen, bitten wir dich, einen Chat mit uns zu starten.

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?¬†N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business¬†and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.¬†¬†What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.¬†In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank¬Æ sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.¬†How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account¬†
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint¬Æ ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.¬†
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.¬†¬†I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000‚Ç¨,¬†and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500‚Ç¨. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Warum wurde mir eine Lastschriftgeb√ºhr berechnet?
answer: Wenn eine Lastschrift aufgrund unzureichender Deckung* deines Kontos zur√ºckgeht, wird gem√§√ü unseren Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen (neuen Tab) eine Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨ erhoben. Wenn dein Kontostand durch diese Geb√ºhr in das Soll f√§llt, werden auch √úberziehungszinsen in H√∂he von 8.9% f√§llig. Du kannst diese Geb√ºhren vermeiden, indem du sicher stellst, dass du gen√ºgend Geld auf deinem Konto hast, um eingehende Lastschriften bis 18 Uhr am selben Werktag abzudecken.Da SEPA-√úberweisungen mehr als einen Tag dauern k√∂nnen, empfehlen wir dir, den f√§lligen Betrag mit MoneyBeam (zwischen N26 Konten) oder CASH26 (wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Spanien, Griechenland oder Italien wohnst) zu √ºberweisen. Bei beiden Methoden wird der Betrag sofort deinem Konto gutgeschrieben. Und wenn du eine Lastschrift nicht anerkennst, kannst du sie in der App r√ºckg√§ngig machen.IBANs f√ºr Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Lastschrift√ºberweisung abgewiesen und dir eine Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3 ‚Ç¨ berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht m√∂glich ist, deinen Space zu √ºberziehen.*F√ºr L√§nder mit einer anderen Hauptw√§hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienD√§nemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRum√§nienSchwedenSchweiz

question: Comment obtenir un relev√© bancaire
answer: Le relev√© bancaire est un document qui contient le solde total de votre compte N26 et toutes les op√©rations entrantes et sortantes (virements, pr√©l√®vements, paiements par carte, etc.). Il contient √©galement le nom et le pr√©nom du titulaire du compte, l‚ÄôIBAN et le BIC.Depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile N26 (au format PDF) : appuyez sur les trois traits en haut √† droite de l‚Äô√©cran d'accueil, puis sur Relev√©s.Vous pouvez √©galement obtenir un relev√© bancaire d‚Äôun de vos sous-comptes Espaces : allez dans Espaces, choisissez un espace, appuyez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne des param√®tres dans le coin en haut √† droite et s√©lectionnez Relev√©s.Sur votre ordinateur depuis l‚Äôespace client en ligne N26 (au format PDF) : cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne de t√©l√©chargement (nouvel onglet)* et s√©lectionnez le mois en question dans la section Relev√©s de compte.Sur votre ordinateur depuis l‚Äôespace client en ligne N26 (au format CSV): cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne de t√©l√©chargement (nouvel onglet)* de fichiers au format CSV, s√©lectionnez les dates de d√©but et de fin souhait√©es et cliquez sur T√©l√©charger en .csv. ¬† * Sur l'√©cran d'accueil de votre espace client en ligne, l‚Äôic√¥ne de t√©l√©chargement est le carr√© avec une fl√®che vers le bas qui se trouve √† gauche du bouton Recevoir.

question: Come usare Apple Pay?
answer: Disponibile in Italia, Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Irlanda, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia, SvizzeraApple Pay ti permette di effettuare pagamenti tramite il tuo dispositivo per non essere costretto ad avere la tua Mastercard sempre con te.Questo video (nuova tabella)¬†ti mostrer√† come aggiungere la tua Mastercard N26 al tuo Apple Wallet. Se il pagamento non va a buon fine, ecco alcune informazioni da considerare:L‚Äôarea del tuo iPhone corrisponde al Paese in cui √® stata inviata la Mastercard (√® possibile controllare l‚Äôarea selezionando Impostazioni, Generale e Lingua e Area geografica nel telefono).Se hai perso il tuo iPhone e non riesci a ritrovarlo, con Trova il mio iPhone, e puoi sempre accedere al tuo iCloud e rimuovere tutti i dispositivi Apple Pay dal browser Web di un Mac o PC. Inoltre, √® necessario attivare la¬†Modalit√† smarrito per bloccare la Mastercard per Apple Pay. I pagamenti con la carta fisica saranno comunque possibili.Se la Mastercard N26 viene inaspettatamente rimossa dall'Apple Wallet, potrebbe essere dovuto al fatto che ti sei disconnesso da iCloud, hai spento Passcode o Touch ID, hai resettato il dispositivo riportandolo alle impostazioni di fabbrica tramite iTunes o hai eliminato tutti i contenuti e le impostazioni dal dispositivo. In tutti i casi, √® sufficiente aggiungere di nuovo la carta. Tieni presente che la carta non viene rimossa se aggiorni il sistema operativo, se reimposti le impostazioni personali del dispositivo o se spegni Trova il mio iPhone.Per gli acquisti in negozio o online devi autorizzare il pagamento tramite Touch ID o il Passcode. Se utilizzi un Apple Watch, le autorizzazioni avvengono facendo doppio clic sul pulsante laterale. Se utilizzi un Mac, autorizza il pagamento con Touch ID o tramite la Touch Bar nell'angolo in alto a destra della tastiera.Se sei un cliente N26 Metal o N26 Business You, pu√≤ accadere che l'immagine della carta visualizzata nel tuo Apple Wallet venga visualizzata come una carta N26 You (per clienti Metal) o come carta N26 Business (per clienti Business You). Stiamo lavorando per risolvere questo problema. Ti assicuriamo che ci√≤ non altera l'utilizzo di Apple Pay o la tua iscrizione premium.Assicurati che il tuo dispositivo soddisfi i requisiti tecnici visitando il Supporto Apple (nuova tabella).iPhone 6 o successivo, iPhone SE: disponibile in apps, negozi e sul webApple Watch associato con iPhone 5 o succesivo: disponibile in apps e negoziiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: disponibile in apps e sul webMacs introdotti nel 2012 o dopo (Macs al di fuori del MacBook Pro con Touch Bar e Touch ID necessitano di un iPhone o Apple Watch: disponibile sul web

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: Pourquoi le distributeur automatique a enregistr√© mon retrait sans d√©livrer mon argent ?
answer: Lorsque vous effectuez un retrait en distributeur automatique, il arrive parfois qu‚Äôil ne vous d√©livre pas votre argent mais que le montant du retrait soit d√©duit du solde de votre compte.Dans un premier temps, v√©rifiez les¬†plafonds de votre carte¬†en allant dans la rubrique üë§¬†Mon compte¬†puis dans la section¬†Param√®tres de votre carte¬†de votre application mobile. V√©rifiez que les retraits en distributeurs automatiques soient activ√©s.Si nous ne pouvons pas toujours conna√Ætre la raison de l‚Äô√©chec, nous pouvons vous aider √† r√©cup√©rer le montant de votre retrait. Ce dernier a √©t√© d√©duit du solde de votre compte car le distributeur automatique a √©mis une empreinte de paiement (le montant du retrait est temporairement bloqu√©). Comme l‚Äôop√©ration n‚Äôa pas fonctionn√©, cette empreinte de paiement expirera en quelques heures ou dans un d√©lai maximal de 12 jours ouvr√©s. Le montant sera alors √† nouveau disponible sur votre compte.Si le montant correspondant √† votre retrait appara√Æt toujours sur votre compte au bout de 12 jours ouvr√©s, cela veut dire que le montant a bien √©t√© d√©duit de votre compte. Nous vous invitons √† remplir un¬†formulaire de contestation. Nous ferons alors les d√©marches n√©cessaires pour r√©gler ce litige.En attendant, nous vous invitons √† effectuer un retrait d‚Äôesp√®ces dans un autre distributeur automatique.Je n‚Äôai pas pu retirer d‚Äôargent au distributeur. Que dois-je faire?Vous avez voulu retirer de l‚Äôargent au DAB mais cela n‚Äôa pas fonctionn√© ? Le montant que vous avez voulu retirer appara√Æt sur votre compte comme une simple autorisation, dans un premier temps. Si la transaction a √©chou√©, l‚Äôautorisation correspondant au montant qui appara√Æt dans votre liste de transaction expirera¬† et il sera re-cr√©dit√© sur votre compte dans un d√©lai maximum de 12 jours ouvr√©s.¬†Si l‚Äôautorisation n‚Äôexpire pas et que vous voyez qu‚Äôelle appara√Æt sur votre relev√© de compte, nous vous invitons √† remplir un formulaire de contestation (nouvel onglet), afin de demander un remboursement.¬†

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select ‚ÄúSend Money‚Äù then choose ‚ÄúBank Transfer‚Äù. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
answer: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in üë§ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

question: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: Posso scaricare l‚Äôapp N26 sul mio smartphone?
answer: Qualsiasi versione di un‚Äôapp pu√≤ essere utilizzata per 180 giorni dal suo rilascio. Durante questo periodo vengono rilasciate nuove versioni. Ti preghiamo di aggiornare sempre l‚Äôapp alla versione pi√π recente, cos√¨ da poter godere della migliore esperienza cliente possibile. L‚Äôapp N26 √® scaricabile dall‚ÄôApp Store (nuova tabella)¬†Apple o dal¬†Google Play Store (nuova tabella).Ti preghiamo di notare che tutti i telefoni devono soddisfare alcuni requisiti minimi per garantire il corretto funzionamento. Tali requisiti sono elencati qui di seguito:iPhone:modello 5s o pi√π recenteiOS 12 o superioreTrovi la tua versione di iOS in "Impostazioni" > "Generali" > "Info"Android:Android 6.0 e superiore I requisiti minimi per Android sono (la versione Android √® visibile in Impostazioni > Info sul telefono):Supporto nativo dei Servizi Google

question: Wie kann ich mit N26 spenden?
answer: N26 hat sich immer an der Seite humanit√§rer Organisationen im Kampf gegen Hunger und Ungerechtigkeit engagiert. Ab jetzt gestaltet sich das Spenden von deinem N26 Konto aus noch einfacher.¬†Du kannst jetzt eine Spende an eine von uns ausgew√§hlte Liste von gemeinn√ºtzigen Organisationen senden, direkt von deiner N26 App aus. question: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintr√§chtigt wurde?
answer:
Betrugshotline - Kontaktiere uns.Du hast per Bank√ºberweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen Betr√ºger √ºberwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.¬†Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlie√ülich f√ºr die oben beschriebenen F√§lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vort√§uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du denkst, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, √§ndere¬†als Erstes¬†dein Passwort.¬†Danach¬†kannst du je nach Situation verschiedene Ma√ünahmen ergreifen:Was sollte ich tun, wenn mir eine Transaktion auf meinem Konto verd√§chtig vorkommt?Wenn du eine verd√§chtige Transaktion bemerkst, erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?"
Danach solltest du sofort unser Kundenserviceteam kontaktieren, entweder direkt √ºber die N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Wenn du lieber telefonieren m√∂chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zur√ºck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erkl√§re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.Um unsere Sicherheitsma√ünahmen auch √ºber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.Die einzelnen F√§lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir au√üerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,Was sollte ich tun, wenn ich meine Karte verloren habe oder denke, dass meine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden?Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast, sie dir gestohlen wurde oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, solltest du deine Karte sofort in deiner N26 App sperren und eine neue beantragen, damit dein Geld sicher bleibt.Was passiert, wenn ich mein gekoppeltes Ger√§t verloren habe? K√∂nnte in diesem Fall jemand auf mein Konto zugreifen?Wenn du dein gekoppeltes Ger√§t verloren hast oder es dir gestohlen wurde, kannst du dich darauf verlassen, dass man auf deine N26 App nur unter Eingabe des richtigen Passworts oder mit Fingerabdruck- oder Gesichtserkennung zugreifen kann. Wenn du ein neues Ger√§t hast, hilft dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne dabei, es mit deinem N26 Konto zu koppeln.Was ist, wenn ich eine Idee habe, um die Sicherheit bei N26 zu verbessern?Mehr dar√ºber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall sch√ºtzen, erf√§hrst du in unserem Blog (neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel √ºber Sicherheit bei N26 (neuen Tab).Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM‚Äôs nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can‚Äôt reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2‚Ç¨.

question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren‚Äôt sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you‚Äôve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to üë§ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You‚Äôll have to activate your card whether it‚Äôs your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you‚Äôve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you‚Äôre activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction ‚Äî in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail ‚Äî for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card ‚Äî you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you‚Äôll still be able to activate that new card.

question: How to use Google Pay?

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS ‚Üí Certificates ‚Üí "Request for yourself" ‚Üí flag "of Residence" ‚Üí "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" ‚Üí and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.¬†Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: Deposit fee
answer: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000‚Ç¨, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.¬†Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000‚Ç¨, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.¬†The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.¬†If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you don‚Äôt want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:¬†Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business Metal¬† (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.¬†You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9.

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†

question: Why isn't my video verification working?
answer: Tips for a successful video¬†verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll¬†need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery¬†of your card.¬†Please note that this is not a fee: your¬†first card¬†after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries¬†take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.
