question: D√©c√®s et succession
answer:
Comment puis-je signaler un d√©c√®s √† N26¬†?¬†En cas de d√©c√®s, les descendants doivent s‚Äôacquitter de nombreuses t√¢ches administratives. L‚Äôune d‚Äôentre elles est le r√®glement du solde des comptes bancaires du d√©funt.¬†Le moyen le plus simple de contacter N26 √† ce sujet est par email. Il est √©galement possible d‚Äôenvoyer une demande par courrier ou par fax (le cas √©ch√©ant)¬†:
Email¬†: service.succession@n26.comFax¬†: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH -Service Succession-
Rungestr. 22¬†
10179 Berlin, ALLEMAGNEVeuillez nous communiquer les informations suivantes¬†:¬†Qui est le d√©funt¬†?¬†Si possible, veuillez joindre un certificat de d√©c√®s, car c‚Äôest la mani√®re la plus fiable d‚Äôidentifier tout compte bancaire associ√©.¬†Comment contacter les b√©n√©ficiaires¬†?Nous vous prions de bien vouloir indiquer le nom, l‚Äôadresse et l‚Äôadresse email de la personne √† contacter, afin que nous puissions contacter les b√©n√©ficiaires. Malheureusement, un rappel n‚Äôest pas possible.Y a-t-il quelque chose que nous devrions d√©j√† savoir¬†?Si vous √™tes confront√© √† des proc√©dures ou si vous disposez de documents sp√©cifiques, il peut √™tre utile de nous les transmettre.¬†Nous vous contacterons, vous ou les b√©n√©ficiaires, pour vous informer de la suite de la proc√©dure.¬†Nous sommes parfois sollicit√©s par un notaire charg√© de la succession. Dans ce cas, nous fournirons au notaire toutes les informations n√©cessaires pour vous faciliter la t√¢che. Nous vous recommandons de communiquer nos coordonn√©es √† tout notaire charg√© de la succession.¬†Veuillez ne pas nous envoyer de documents originaux par courrier pour le moment. Si nous avons besoin d‚Äôun original, nous vous en informerons, vous ou votre notaire.¬†Qu‚Äôadvient-il d‚Äôun compte N26 si le titulaire du compte d√©c√®de¬†?En raison de diff√©rences r√©gionales entre les lois et les r√©glementations, la proc√©dure peut varier d‚Äôun pays √† l‚Äôautre.¬†Cependant, tout compte ouvert aupr√®s de N26 Bank GmbH est situ√© en Allemagne.¬†En ce qui concerne les relations entre la banque du d√©funt et les b√©n√©ficiaires, d‚Äôautres exigences l√©gales peuvent s‚Äôappliquer dans votre pays d‚Äôorigine.D√®s que nous apprenons le d√©c√®s de l‚Äôun de nos clients, les cartes et les transactions en ligne associ√©es ainsi que tout acc√®s √† l‚Äôapplication seront bloqu√©s.Les ordres de virement permanent ou les mandats de pr√©l√®vement automatique SEPA subsistent g√©n√©ralement apr√®s le d√©c√®s du titulaire du compte. Les h√©ritiers ou repr√©sentants autoris√©s doivent les r√©voquer ou les supprimer.¬†De plus, nous sommes en principe l√©galement tenus d‚Äôinformer les autorit√©s fiscales allemandes responsables des droits de succession des biens de la succession.Dans tous les cas, nous indiquerons aux b√©n√©ficiaires ou √† leur notaire les documents √† fournir pour r√©gler le solde du compte N26 du d√©funt.
En tant que client, puis-je prendre des mesures de pr√©caution en cas de d√©c√®s¬†?¬†Il existe diff√©rents moyens de s‚Äôassurer que vos biens seront r√©partis selon vos souhaits.¬†
C‚Äôest pourquoi il est vivement recommand√© de demander l‚Äôassistance juridique d‚Äôun avocat, d‚Äôun notaire ou d‚Äôun conseiller fiscal pour toute personne souhaitant r√©diger un testament. Cela vaut en particulier pour la transmission d‚Äôun patrimoine important.¬†Notre Service Client ou les experts de notre service d‚Äôhomologation ne peuvent pas vous donner davantage de conseils √† ce sujet.¬†Pour plus d‚Äôinformations sur une situation particuli√®re, veuillez vous adresser √† un service de conseil sp√©cialis√©.¬†

question: Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.

Vous serez invit√©(e) √† vous identifier en d√©verrouillant votre appareil par identification biom√©trique ou avec le code de votre smartphone.Les donn√©es compl√®tes de votre carte apparaissent pendant 1 minute avant de dispara√Ætre automatiquement.

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app‚Äì‚Äìno debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store‚Äì‚Äìit‚Äôs that simple. Plus, you don‚Äôt have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you‚Äôll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.¬†If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of ‚Ç¨2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.

question: Where to find your Tax ID
answer: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If you‚Äôre from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authorities‚Äô database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TIN‚Äôs are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

Seul votre nom est inscrit √† l‚Äôavant de la carte, les d√©tails de votre carte sont imprim√©s au verso : vous y trouverez votre num√©ro de carte, sa date d‚Äôexpiration, le code de v√©rification CVV et le Token, le code d‚Äôidentification de votre carte √† 10 chiffres.Si vous √™tes d√©j√† un utilisateur N26 et que vous passez √† N26 You, les frais d'adh√©sion mensuels de 9,90 ‚Ç¨ par mois sont pr√©lev√©s directement sur votre compte N26, en fonction de la date √† laquelle vous avez activ√© votre N26 You Mastercard (par exemple si vous avez activ√© votre carte le 5 janvier, nous continuerons √† vous facturer le 5 de chaque mois). question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We‚Äôve made a¬†video (new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†the Cards tab¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50 or cumulative transactions above 150‚Ç¨ you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: Adresse de r√©sidence et imp√¥ts en France
answer:
Si vous vivez actuellement en France, vous √™tes probablement un r√©sident fiscal fran√ßais.¬†En r√®gle g√©n√©rale, votre r√©sidence fiscale est le pays/la juridiction dans lequel/laquelle vous vivez.¬†Dans certains cas, vous pouvez √™tre r√©sident fiscal dans plusieurs pays/juridictions √† la fois ou ne pas √™tre r√©sident fiscal fran√ßais.Pour en savoir plus sur la r√©sidence fiscale, veuillez consulter votre conseiller fiscal ou le portail de l‚Äô√©change automatique d‚Äôinformations de l‚ÄôOCDE (nouvel onglet).
Si votre r√©sidence fiscale se situe hors de France, nous pouvons √™tre l√©galement tenus de transmettre certaines informations concernant vos comptes financiers √† la Direction des finances publiques. Celle-ci peut √©changer ces informations avec les autorit√©s fiscales d‚Äôune ou plusieurs autres juridictions en vertu d‚Äôaccords intergouvernementaux pour l‚Äô√©change d‚Äôinformations sur vos comptes financiers ou du droit local.¬†
En tant qu‚Äô√©tablissement financier, nous ne sommes pas autoris√©s √† fournir des conseils fiscaux.¬†Votre conseiller fiscal sera peut-√™tre en mesure de vous aider √† r√©pondre √† des questions sp√©cifiques li√©es √† votre r√©sidence fiscale. Vous trouverez √©galement plus d‚Äôinformations, notamment une liste des juridictions qui ont sign√© des accords d‚Äô√©change automatique d‚Äôinformations, ainsi que des d√©tails sur les informations demand√©es, sur le portail de l‚Äô√©change automatique d‚Äôinformations de l‚ÄôOCDE (nouvel onglet).
Le d√©cret n¬∞ 2016-1683 du 5¬†d√©cembre¬†2016, bas√© sur la Norme commune de d√©claration (¬´¬†NCD¬†¬ª) de l‚ÄôOCDE, exige que N26 France collecte et d√©clare √† la Direction des finances publiques certaines informations sur un titulaire de compte dont la r√©sidence fiscale se situe hors de France.¬†Chaque juridiction a ses propres r√®gles pour d√©finir la r√©sidence fiscale, et les juridictions ont fourni des informations sur la mani√®re de d√©terminer si vous √™tes r√©sident dans la juridiction concern√©e sur le site internet suivant¬†: Portail de l‚Äô√©change automatique d‚Äôinformations de l‚ÄôOCDE.¬† (nouvel onglet)

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.¬†With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we‚Äôre able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We‚Äôre going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.¬†Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: ¬øC√≥mo declarar mi cuenta N26 para los impuestos en Francia?
answer: (aplica a los residentes en Francia)De acuerdo con el C√≥digo de Impuesto General Franc√©s, todos los residentes franceses estar√°n obligados a declarar cualquier cuenta bancaria que hayan abierto, usado o cerrado el √∫ltimo a√±o sobre el a√±o en el que hayan recibido ingresos, esto incluye tu cuenta en N26. Para hacerlo:En tu declaraci√≥n de impuestos, marca la casilla de Cuenta Extranjera abierta, usada o cerrada (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Completa el¬†formulario Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (pesta√±a nueva) y a√±√°delo a tu declaraci√≥n de impuestos.Puedes encontrar m√°s informaci√≥n sobre c√≥mo declarar tu cuenta N26 (pesta√±a nueva) en nuestro blog.

question: ¬øC√≥mo funciona Espacios?
answer: Espacios es una funcionalidad de las cuentas premium que te permite definir objetivos, crear y personalizar espacios y transferir dinero entre ellos al instante. Espacios est√° disponible en la app y en la¬†WebApp (pesta√±a nueva).Adem√°s de tu cuenta (o espacio) principal, puedes crear y eliminar tantos espacios adicionales como desees, pero el n√∫mero de espacios que puedes tener activos simult√°neamente depender√° de tu tipo de cuenta: hasta 10 espacios adicionales con N26 You, N26 Smart y N26 Metal.Los extractos bancarios de tu cuenta principal incluir√°n todas las transacciones enviadas a un espacio o recibidas del mismo. Puedes descargar dichos extractos desde la p√°gina de confirmaci√≥n.√önicamente tu cuenta principal podr√≠a tener un saldo negativo (si tienes disponibilidad de un¬†descubierto). Los saldos de tus Espacios no pueden ser negativos, de modo que solo puedes transferir lo que est√° disponible en un espacio en particular.Solo puedes usar el saldo de tu cuenta principal para las transacciones con tarjeta, por lo que deber√≠as transferir fondos hacia tu cuenta principal antes de realizar una compra, si fuera necesario.Para mover el dinero entre espacios, mant√©n pulsado sobre un espacio, arr√°stralo y su√©ltalo sobre otro. Una vez elijas la cantidad y confirmes, el balance se actualizar√° inmediatamente.Puedes bloquear y desbloquear los espacios siempre que quieras desde la app, para ello s√≥lo necesitas tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n. Aunque tengas un espacio bloqueado, seguir√°s teniendo la posibilidad de transferirle dinero. Si lo que necesitas es retirar dinero de ese espacio, primero tendr√°s que desbloquearlo. Si quieres, tambi√©n puedes ocultar del balance principal la cantidad que tienes en el espacio. Para ello, entra en el espacio, pincha en los 3 puntos de la esquina superior derecha y despu√©s sobre ''Ocultar el espacio del saldo''.Ahora puedes bloquear transferencias desde un espacio espec√≠fico. Simplemente vaya a la configuraci√≥n del espacio, toque Bloquear transferencias a la cuenta principal u otros espacios e ingrese su PIN de confirmaci√≥n.Ahora tambi√©n puedes eliminar un espacio, incluso con una tarjeta vinculada a √©l, desde la configuraci√≥n del espacio.Hace poco hemos a√±adido una nueva funci√≥n para Espacios que se llama Reglas.RedondeoLa funci√≥n del Redondeo permite a los usuarios premium redondear cada pago con tarjeta a la cifra entera inmediatamente superior y transferir la diferencia al espacio que elijan.El redondeo no te har√°n incurrir en descubierto, de modo que solo se realizar√° mientras tengas saldo suficiente para cubrir el redondeo.Solo puedes tener un redondeo activo al mismo tiempo, que se transferir√° al Espacio que t√∫ elijas.Puedes desactivar la funci√≥n del Redondeo en cualquier momento.Si cierras el espacio donde tengas habilitado el redondeo, la funci√≥n se deshabilitar√° hasta que vuelvas a habilitarla desde un espacio activo.

question: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas obtenir de cr√©dit ?
answer: Lors de votre demande de cr√©dit, nous vous posons une s√©rie de questions sur votre situation personnelle et financi√®re. Il vous sera probablement demand√© de vous connecter √† votre autre compte bancaire directement depuis l‚Äôapplication N26 pour continuer votre demande (obligatoire en Allemagne, si votre compte N26 n'est pas votre compte principal).Cet autre compte doit exclusivement √™tre un compte que vous d√©tenez aupr√®s d‚Äôune banque du pays depuis lequel vous faites votre demande de cr√©dit. Si vous faites votre demande en France, le compte secondaire pris en compte dans l‚Äô√©valuation de votre demande de cr√©dit devra ainsi √™tre dans une banque fran√ßaise, en Allemagne le compte secondaire devra √™tre allemand.(Pour l‚ÄôAllemagne) Nous contr√¥lons √©galement votre score de cr√©dit actuel aupr√®s de l'organisme Schufa, m√™me si nous poss√©dons d√©j√† des informations vous concernant qui nous ont d√©j√† √©t√© fournies par Schufa. Notre demande d‚Äôinformations aupr√®s de cet organisme n'exerce aucune influence sur votre score lui-m√™me. Votre score de cr√©dit n‚Äôest pas l‚Äôunique crit√®re de notre √©valuation, nous v√©rifions aussi vos revenus mensuels sans compter les aides sociales (ch√¥mage, allocations familiales, etc).Une fois la demande de cr√©dit envoy√©e via l‚Äôapplication, vous ne pourrez pas modifier votre demande pendant 90 jours, et ce, m√™me si votre situation √©volue entre temps. Il vous faudra donc attendre la suppression de votre premi√®re requ√™te pour faire une nouvelle demande de cr√©dit.Votre √©ligibilit√© √† l‚Äôobtention d‚Äôun cr√©dit est √©tudi√©e par un syst√®me automatique int√©gr√© √† notre application.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: Comment √™tre visible aupr√®s des autres utilisateurs N26 ?
answer: Pour pouvoir utiliser toutes les fonctionnalit√©s de votre application, vous et vos contacts devez √™tre visibles en tant qu‚Äôutilisateur N26.¬† Lorsque vous nous autorisez √† le faire, nous acc√©dons √† votre r√©pertoire pour identifier vos contacts qui utilisent √©galement N26.Pour modifier votre visibilit√© en tant que client N26 aupr√®s de vos contacts, vous pouvez √† tout moment activer ou d√©sactiver cette option depuis votre application N26. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Mon compte > Information personelles > Coordonn√©es. Vous pouvez ensuite cocher ou d√©cocher la case ‚Äúj‚Äôaccepte d‚Äô√™tre facilement identifiable par mes contacts qui utilisent N26 pour recevoir des virements."Parmi tous vos contacts, ceux qui sont √©galement clients N26 seront visibles dans votre liste de contacts de l‚Äôapplication N26. De la m√™me fa√ßon, vous apparaitrez dans leur liste de contacts, vous identifiant comme √©tant client N26. Pourquoi √™tre visible aupr√®s des autres utilisateurs N26 ?Vous pouvez notamment effectuer des transactions en temps r√©el sans saisir d‚ÄôIBAN gr√¢ce √† Moneybeam, en s√©lectionnant seulement le nom du destinataire dans votre liste de contacts. Vous pouvez √©galement demander de l'argent aux personnes de votre liste de contacts qui n'ont plus qu'√† accepter (ou refuser) votre demande.De plus, en √©tant visible aupr√®s des autres utilisateurs vous pouvez utiliser les Espaces Partag√©s. Cette fonctionnalit√© vous permet de partager des espaces avec d'autres utilisateurs N26 s√©lectionn√©s dans votre liste de contacts.

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Deposit fee
answer: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000‚Ç¨, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.¬†Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000‚Ç¨, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.¬†The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.¬†If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you don‚Äôt want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:¬†Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business Metal¬† (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‚Äòlookalike audiences‚Äô are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We‚Äôre sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We‚Äôd love to keep you as a customer‚Äîtell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.¬†If you‚Äôve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here‚Äôs what to do:Make your account balance ‚Ç¨0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is ‚Ç¨0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You‚Äôll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you‚Äôre unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or ‚Äúas soon as possible‚ÄùYour full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we‚Äôll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
answer: Wof√ºr steht PSD2?Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) ist eine √ºberarbeitete europ√§ische Richtlinie und erm√∂glicht dir, √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzuf√ºhren.Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern √ºber eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:Du kannst √ºber einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenf√ºhren und sie √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen Zahlungsausl√∂sedienst (ZAD) nutzen.Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund √ºber unseren Partner Token.io.Wie funktioniert's?Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen Zahlungausl√∂sedienst, wirst Du √ºber Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu best√§tigen.¬†In unserer Datenschutzerkl√§rung (neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich √ºber die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen f√ºr die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der √ºberarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erf√ºllen.FAQsWarum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zun√§chst √ºber unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.Wie kann ich eine Zugriffsbest√§tigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt habe, widerrufen?Um eine Zugangsbest√§tigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.*gilt f√ºr alle L√§nder im EWR.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10‚Ç¨).¬†Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0‚Ç¨ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
answer: Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:CASH26 (verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland): Zahle Bargeld √ºber unsere Partnergesch√§fte direkt auf dein Konto ein. MoneyBeam: Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Anschlie√üende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 450 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.Apple Pay oder Google Pay (neuen Tab): Lade Geld auf dein N26 Konto, indem du Apple Pay (f√ºr iOS-Ger√§te) oder GPay (f√ºr Android-Ger√§te) verwendest. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Anschlie√üende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 450 ‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto √ºberweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.SEPA-√úberweisung: Die √úberweisung muss in Euro und innerhalb des SEPA-Raums erfolgen. Daf√ºr brauchst du nur deine IBAN und deinen Namen, wie er auf deinem registrierten Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, eingeben. Bitte beachte auch dabei folgende Punkte:Wenn du per SEPA-√úberweisung Geld auf dein N26 Konto einzahlst, stelle sicher, dass der Empf√§ngername deinem Namen entspricht so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, das du bei der Kontoer√∂ffnung f√ºr deine Verifizierung verwendet hast. (Insbesondere, wenn du ein N26 Business Konto hast - wir akzeptieren keine Firmennamen.)Eine eingehende √úberweisung wird in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeit√ºberweisung get√§tigt wurde, andernfalls ben√∂tigt eine √úberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag bzw. zwei Werktage. Ab 1. Juli 2020 gilt f√ºr eingehende SEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisung ein Limit von 100.000‚Ç¨. F√ºr normale eingehende SEPA-√úberweisungen besteht kein Limit.In Frankreich muss die erste Zahlung auf dein N26 Konto von einem Konto erfolgen, das dir geh√∂rt. (In allen anderen L√§ndern ist es nicht n√∂tig, dass das andere Bankkonto dir geh√∂rt.)6. iDEAL: (nur in den Niederlanden) f√ºr Kunden mit niederl√§ndischen AGB verf√ºgbar und mit einem iDEAL Konto. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Weitere Einzahlungen kosten 1,5 % des eingezahlten Betrags. 7. GiroPay (sofort): Nur in Deutschland verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden, die den deutschen AGB unterliegen und die √ºber ein GiroPay-Konto verf√ºgen.8. EPS (sofort): Nur in √ñsterreich verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden, die den √∂sterreichischen AGB unterliegen und die √ºber ein EPS-Konto verf√ºgen.9. Bancontact (sofort): Nur in Belgien verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden, die den belgischen AGB unterliegen und die √ºber ein Bancontact-Konto verf√ºgen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: Comment verrouiller ma carte N26 ?
answer: Vous pouvez verrouiller et d√©verrouiller votre carte √† tout moment depuis votre application mobile N26. Rendez-vous dans la section Cartes puis Param√®tres de votre carte. S√©lectionnez la carte concern√©e, puis cliquez sur Verrouiller.Dans la m√™me section, vous pouvez √©galement d√©cider de bloquer les paiements par carte, en ligne et/ou √† l‚Äô√©tranger.Cela vous permet d‚Äôavoir un contr√¥le total sur votre carte et de vous prot√©ger contre les¬†transactions frauduleuses. Vous devriez toujours verrouiller votre carte si quelque chose semble suspicieux ou si vous l‚Äô√©garez momentan√©ment. Vous pourrez la d√©verrouiller plus tard si tout va bien.Si vous n‚Äôavez pas acc√®s √† votre application mobile N26, ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter √† votre espace client en ligne, vous pouvez √©galement demander √† bloquer votre carte bancaire ou les transactions sortantes de votre compte en nous appelant au +33 1 88 45 02 39.

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.¬†If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won‚Äôt be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).¬†In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000‚Ç¨,¬†and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500‚Ç¨. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard‚Äôs exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn‚Äôt charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard‚Äôs rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.¬†Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.¬†

question: Dove trovare il codice di identificazione fiscale
answer: Il tuo Codice di Identificazione Fiscale (TIN, dall'inglese Tax Identification Number) √® univoco, e rilasciato dall'autorit√† fiscale al momento della registrazione nel paese in cui tu, come individuo, sei un contribuente.Dove trovare il TIN pu√≤ variare a seconda del paese in cui sei soggetto alla tassazione. Ti preghiamo di notare che il TIN di ogni paese pu√≤ essere diverso. Ad esempio, se sei nel Regno Unito puoi pensare al tuo TIN come al tuo National Insurance Number (NIN). per i cittadini tedeschi:Se sei residente in Germania e sei registrato presso le autorit√† fiscali locali, ti verr√† fornito un TIN a 11 cifre ovvero Steueridentifikationsnummer. Non confondere questo con il tuo Codice Fiscale a 9 cifre, o Steuernummer.I TIN non sono riportati nei documenti di riconoscimento ufficiali, ma puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:La lettera che hai ricevuto dall'Ufficio Federale Centrale delle Imposte per il rilascio del tuo TIN o IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Calcolo dei redditiDichiarazione dei redditi da lavoro dipendenteScopri di pi√π su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini francesi:Se sei residente in Francia e sei obbligato a dichiarare le tasse l√¨, le autorit√† fiscali francesi emetteranno un TIN a 13 cifre o SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) una volta che ti sarai registrato nel database delle autorit√† fiscali. Questi numeri iniziano con 0, 1, 2 o 3.Puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Sul tuo modello di dichiarazione dei redditi prestampatoInoltre, puoi trovarlo sui tuoi avvisi fiscali e di imposta sulla propriet√†Scopri di pi√π su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini italiani:Se sei residente in Italia, il TIN o Codice fiscale (composto da 16 caratteri) √® valido solo se registrato nell'Anagrafe tributaria italiana gestita dall'Agenzia delle Entrate. Se non hai un TIN, dovrai presentare la richiesta in qualsiasi ufficio dell'Agenzia delle Entrate.I TIN non sono riportati nei documenti di riconoscimento ufficiali, ma puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Il TIN √® presente sulla tua tessera sanitaria personale (Tessera sanitaria/Codice Fiscale).Puoi trovare il tuo TIN anche sulla tua carta TIN.Scopri di pi√π su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini spagnoli:Se sei residente in Spagna, il tuo TIN √® unico a fini fiscali e doganali. Il tuo TIN spagnolo √® composto da nove caratteri (l'ultimo carattere √® una lettera ai fini di controllo). I TIN vengono emessi dal Ministero dell'Interno e possono variare a seconda che tu sia una persona fisica con cittadinanza spagnola o meno.A seconda delle tue circostanze, puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Carta d'identit√† personaleCarta d'identit√† elettronicaCarta di residenza per stranieriNuova patente (dal 2004)Carta di identificazione fiscaleTessera previdenzialeScopri di pi√π su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella).Informazione importante:Il formato del codice fiscale che pu√≤ essere inserito nell'app N26 dipende dal paese in cui ti trovi. Ci√≤ significa che se risiedi in Germania devi inserire il tuo TIN tedesco.Puoi controllare le informazioni fiscali che hai salvato sul tuo conto andando su:Il mio conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscali.Se hai inserito il paese in cui sei soggetto d'imposta ma non il tuo numero d'identificazione fiscale, rimuovi il paese dalla lista che ti viene mostrata nell'applicazione, inserisci nuovamente il paese e inserisci nuovamente il tuo numero d'identificazione fiscale.Scopri di pi√π su come utilizziamo le tue informazioni fiscali qui (nuova tabella).

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before.
