question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.¬†If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won‚Äôt be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

question: Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôun compte N26 Business ?
answer: Le compte N26 Business est une solution simple et abordable pour tous vos besoins financiers quotidiens. Le compte N26 Business est un compte courant num√©rique s√ªr et intuitif que vous pouvez ouvrir en quelques minutes. Simple, transparent et gratuit*, ce compte N26 Business vous permet de recevoir des paiements de vos clients, d‚Äôenvoyer de l‚Äôargent et de d√©penser en toute confiance tout en gardant vos finances professionnelles compl√®tement s√©par√©es de vos finances personnelles. Nos comptes Business sont con√ßus pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les ind√©pendants qui exercent leur activit√© en nom propre (le nom de votre soci√©t√© ne peut donc pas figurer sur votre compte ou votre carte). Il est actuellement impossible de passer d‚Äôun compte personnel √† un compte Business. Vous devez donc vous assurer que ce compte vous convient avant de l‚Äôouvrir. Que comprend un compte N26 Business ?Notre compte N26 Business pr√©sente les avantages et fonctionnalit√©s suivants :Compte Business gratuit* : Le compte N26 Business peut √™tre ouvert gratuitement en ligne sans frais de tenue de compte (*si le solde du compte est de 50 000 ‚Ç¨ ou plus, des droits de garde peuvent √™tre pr√©lev√©s).Carte virtuelle N26 : Ce compte N26 Business vous donne droit √† une carte virtuelle gratuite destin√©e √† un usage professionnel uniquement. Cette carte virtuelle gratuite comporte un num√©ro PAN complet et peut √™tre ajout√©e √† vos portefeuilles Apple ou Google pour les achats en ligne et en magasin. Vous pouvez √©galement utiliser des distributeurs automatiques de billets sans contact pour retirer de l‚Äôargent avec Apple ou Google pay.Carte physique N26 Mastercard : Pour 10 ‚Ç¨ suppl√©mentaires, vous pouvez recevoir une carte physique N26 Mastercard (veuillez noter que vous devez disposer d‚Äôau moins 10 ‚Ç¨ sur votre compte pour la fabrication et l‚Äôenvoi de la carte).Carte Maestro : Si vous avez √©galement besoin d‚Äôune carte pour vos d√©penses priv√©es, les clients bas√©s en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas peuvent commander une carte Maestro pour 10 ‚Ç¨ suppl√©mentaires.Paiements et virements : Vous pouvez effectuer et recevoir des virements SEPA en utilisant votre application mobile N26. Vous pouvez √©galement envoyer de l‚Äôargent instantan√©ment √† d‚Äôautres clients N26 en utilisant Moneybeam. Contrairement √† d‚Äôautres comptes, les virements en devise √©trang√®re ne sont pas possibles avec N26 Business depuis l‚Äôapplication. En revanche, vous pouvez le faire sur Wise (nouvel onglet).Cashback avec N26 Business : Vous recevez 0,1 % de cashback tous les mois sur vos paiements effectu√©s en utilisant la carte. Veuillez noter que les paiements B2B (business to business) ne peuvent pas √™tre effectu√©s avec un compte N26 Business.

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you‚Äôre able to see what‚Äôs going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you‚Äôve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.¬†Sometimes you‚Äôll see both payments at the same time‚Äìthe authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn‚Äôt expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).¬†Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
answer: Brauchst du Hilfe oder hast du eine Frage?¬†Wenn du Hilfe mit deinem Konto ben√∂tigst, eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren willst oder pers√∂nliche Daten aktualisieren willst, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter!Eine Beschwerde einreichenWir bedauern, dass du eine Beschwerde einreichen m√∂chtest. Wir werden dein Anliegen pr√ºfen und dir unsere Ergebnisse und die endg√ºltige Antwort per E-Mail √ºbermitteln.Unser Kundenservice kann dir beim Einreichen einer Beschwerde per Live-Chat behilflich sein. M√∂chtest du die Beschwerde jedoch per E-Mail einreichen, schreibe bitte an eine der folgenden E-Mail-Adressen in deiner bevorzugten Sprache:Deutsch beschwerden@n26.com (neuen Tab)Englisch complaints@n26.com (neuen Tab)Bitte beachte: Diese Adressen sind lediglich f√ºr die Einreichung einer Beschwerde gedacht. F√ºr Kundenanfragen bitten wir dich, den Kundenservice (neuen Tab) zu kontaktieren. Unser Kundenservice ist t√§glich f√ºr dich da und kann dein Problem schnell l√∂sen.Wenn du eine Beschwerde einreichst, ben√∂tigen wir folgende Informationen von dir:Das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung, mit dem bzw. mit der¬† du nicht zufrieden bistEine Beschreibung des Sachverhalts und wann das Problem aufgetreten istDu kannst auch Unterlagen einreichen, die im Zusammenhang mit deiner Beschwerde stehen¬†Das gew√ºnschte Ergebnis der BeschwerdeWir k√∂nnen kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur an die E-Mail-Adresse √ºbermitteln, die mit deinem N26-Konto verkn√ºpft ist.¬†Wird die Beschwerde durch einen Vertreter eingereicht, muss ihr auch ein spezielles notariell beglaubigtes Vollmachtsformular beigef√ºgt sein.Bitte kontaktiere uns via App oder per E-Mail, da wir dir nicht helfen k√∂nnen, wenn du unser B√ºro aufsuchst. Falls du uns nicht via App oder per E-Mail kontaktieren kannst, schicke uns bitte eine schriftliche Beschwerde (per Brief) an folgende Adresse:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWir best√§tigen dir den Erhalt deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail und pr√ºfen anschlie√üend den Sachverhalt. Sofern wir weitere Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen, wird sich unser Complaint Management Team direkt per E-Mail an dich wenden und dir erkl√§ren, welche Informationen wir zus√§tzlich brauchen. Sobald unser Team dein Anliegen gepr√ºft hat, teilen wir dir per E-Mail eine endg√ºltige Entscheidung mit.Bearbeitungszeit einer BeschwerdeAlle Beschwerden, die Zahlungsdienste wie √úberweisungen und Kartentransaktionen betreffen, werden innerhalb von 15 Werktagen gem√§√ü der Europ√§ischen Richtlinie √ºber Zahlungsdienste II (PSD2) gel√∂st. Falls wir mehr Zeit bei der Bearbeitung deiner Beschwerde ben√∂tigen, dann werden wir dich dar√ºber informieren. Wir m√ºssen dich innerhalb von 35 Werktagen √ºber unsere Entscheidung informieren.F√ºr alle anderen Beschwerden gelten unterschiedliche Fristen. Diese sind abh√§ngig von den AGB jenes Landes, in dem du dein N26-Konto er√∂ffnet hast.¬†Deutschland und √ñsterreich - 15 WerktageAndere europ√§ische L√§nder - 15 WerktageIrland - 40 WerktageFrankreich - 56 KalendertageVereinigtes K√∂nigreich - 56 KalendertageSpanien - 60 KalendertageItalien - 60 KalendertageWenn wir keine Antwort von dir erhalten, schlie√üen wir m√∂glicherweise deine Beschwerde. Wenn du dich zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt wieder meldest, erstellen wir einen neuen Fall und teilen dir die neue Referenznummer f√ºr deine Beschwerde mit.Wenn du mit dem Ausgang deiner Beschwerde unzufrieden bistSolltest du mit der von uns angebotenen L√∂sung nicht zufrieden sein, hast du die M√∂glichkeit, dich an eine unabh√§ngige dritte Instanz zu wenden. Es stehen dir beispielsweise folgende Schlichtungsstellen zur Verf√ºgung:die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbankdie Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin)Eine vollst√§ndige Liste von Streitbeilegungs- und Schlichtungsstellen findest du in unserem Imprint (neuen Tab).

question: N26 supporta i bonifici SWIFT?
answer: S√¨, ma per il momento solo bonifici SWIFT in entrata.I bonifici SWIFT in uscita non sono ancora possibili. Seguici sui social media #N26 e sul nostro Blog (nuova tabella) per essere tra i primi a sapere se ci saranno dei cambiamenti.Scopri qui come effettuare bonifici in valuta estera con N26.Scopri qui quanto tempo occorre per un bonifico SWIFT in entrata.Quanto costa un bonifico SWIFT?Per i bonifici in entrata superiori a 150 ‚Ç¨ verr√† applicata una commissione di 12,50 ‚Ç¨ + lo 0,1% dell‚Äôimporto ricevuto.Non si applicano commissioni ai bonifici in entrata inferiori a 150 ‚Ç¨.La commissione massima √® di 100 ‚Ç¨ per transazione.A chi viene applicata la commissione?Se hai aperto un conto prima del 07/07/2021 e hai un IBAN tedesco, la commissione viene applicata a te se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart o Business You. (Ci√≤ significa che non viene applicata a N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal e N26 Business Metal.)Se hai aperto un conto prima del 07/07/2021 e hai un IBAN spagnolo, la commissione viene applicata se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You. (Ci√≤ significa che non viene applicata ai conti N26 Metal o N26 Business Metal.)Se hai aperto un conto dopo il 07/07/2021, la commissione viene applicata indipendentemente dal tuo IBAN se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You. (Ci√≤ significa che non viene applicata ai conti N26 Metal o N26 Business Metal.)

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you‚Äôll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10‚Ç¨ to activate the card).¬†An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10‚Ç¨ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‚ÄòGet an additional card‚Äô.Select ‚ÄòVirtual‚Äô at the top, then tap ‚ÄòChoose‚Äô at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‚ÄòGenerate virtual card‚Äô.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‚Äòcards‚ÄôLocate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‚Äòcard details‚ÄôYou will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
answer: Verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, D√§nemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz, √ñsterreich, Estland, Griechenland, Lettland, Litauen, Niederlande, Portugal.Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht st√§ndig bei dir tragen.Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterst√ºtzen, sowie in Online-Shops verf√ºgbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die N√§he des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, w√§hle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs per¬†Push-Nachricht¬†auffordern, deine Zahlung zu best√§tigen.So geht's:Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzuf√ºgen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und w√§hle Hinzuf√ºgen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder h√∂her sowie ein NFC-f√§higes Smartphone.Logge dich in die N26 App ein un gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Zu Google Pay hinzuf√ºgen. Du wirst dann zur Google Pay App weitergeleitet. Einige Tipps:Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzuf√ºgst.Falls dein Smartphone mit einer Schutzh√ºlle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise nicht, wenn die Schutzh√ºlle zu dick ist.Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal¬†contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you‚Äôre now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you‚Äôll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.¬†RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.¬† At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of ‚Ç¨10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
answer: Gli Spazi Condivisi rappresentano un modo nuovo e facile per utenti N26 di condividere denaro. Questi Spazi possono essere utili per suddividere il costo delle utenze, per pianificare una vacanza oppure per organizzare l‚Äôacquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o parente.Spazi Condivisi √® un‚Äôopzione disponibile per gli utenti N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You e N26 Business Metal), i quali possono creare uno Spazio e invitare altri utenti a prenderne parte.Tutti gli utenti N26 possono essere invitati a partecipare ad uno Spazio.Il proprietario dello Spazio diventa proprietario del denaro depositato.Il proprietario dello Spazio pu√≤ invitare fino a 10 partecipanti oppure decidere di rimuoverli.IBAN italiano e Spazi CondivisiSpazi Condivisi √® un nuovo, semplice, modo per i clienti N26 di condividere le spese e mettere soldi da parte insieme. Questi spazi separati dal conto principale possono essere utilizzati per qualsiasi scopo, dal pagamento delle bollette alla pianificazione delle vacanza fino all'acquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o un familiare.Puoi utilizzare gli Spazi Condivisi con il tuo IBAN italiano: basta seguire i passaggi sull'app N26 per Spazi Condivisi e invitare i tuoi amici stretti e parenti a iniziare a utilizzare questa funzionalit√†.Spazi Condivisi √® disponibile per i clienti N26 premium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You e N26 Business Metal) che possono sia creare Spazi Condivisi che invitare altri partecipanti nei loro spazi.I partecipanti devono avere un conto N26, il tipo di sottoscrizione non √® rilevante.I clienti N26 Standard e N26 Business Standard possono partecipare a due Spazi Condivisi al massimo.Il proprietario dello spazio condiviso √® anche il proprietario del denaro che vi √® depositato.Il proprietario pu√≤ invitare fino a 10 partecipanti e rimuoverli dal suo spazio separato dal conto principale in qualsiasi momento.Come creare Spazi Condivisi:Per creare degli Spazi Condivisi segui questi passaggi (se hai gi√† una conto premium con N26):Apri la tua app N26 e vai nella sezione Spaces nella barra di navigazione in basso. Tocca l'icona + e clicca su 'Risparmiare insieme'.Leggi le informazioni contenute in Scopri di pi√π e clicca su Continua.Dai un nome al tuo spazio condiviso. Cerca e seleziona dalla lista dei contatti i clienti N26 che desideri invitare. Se la persona che vuoi invitare ha un conto N26 ma non appare sulla lista dei contatti, ti consigliamo di chiedergli se ha dato il consenso per essere visibile ad altri clienti N26 tramite l'app nella sezione il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni personali.Se necessario, inserisci il loro nome completo come dovrebbe apparire sulla lista.Dopodich√© dovrai leggere e firmare i Termini e condizioni:Apparir√† il pop-up "Firma Elettronica Avanzata". Tocca "Firma".Spunta entrambe le voci "Firma Elettronica Avanzata" e "Procura", poi conferma.Inserisci il PIN di conferma e dai l'ok.A questo punto puoi inviare l'invito ai tuoi contatti N26. Potrai iniziare subito ad aggiungere denaro o a gestire lo spazio condiviso per includere pi√π persone.

question: Was ist das N26 Webformular f√ºr DSGVO-Anfragen?
answer: Der Schutz der personenbezogenen und finanziellen Daten unserer NutzerInnen genie√üt bei uns oberste Priorit√§t. Daher stellen wir unser N26 Webformular zur Verf√ºgung, das es allen N26 NutzerInnen, ehemaligen N26 NutzerInnen (deren Konto inzwischen geschlossen ist) und ihren Bevollm√§chtigten erm√∂glicht, uns auf einem sicheren Weg zu kontaktieren, wenn sie Fragen zu ihren personenbezogenen Daten haben.Wie funktioniert das?Das Webformular (neuen Tab) sollte verwendet werden, wenn N26 NutzerInnen oder ehemalige N26 NutzerInnen ihre Rechte gem√§√ü der Datenschutzgrundverordnung ("DSGVO") selbst oder durch eine bevollm√§chtigte Person aus√ºben m√∂chten.Du kannst insbesondere folgende Rechte wahrnehmen:Recht auf Zugriff der betroffenen Person nach Art. 15 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf L√∂schung ("Recht auf Vergessenwerden") gem√§√ü Art. 17 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf Widerspruch nach Art. 21 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Du kannst innerhalb von maximal 30 Kalendertagen mit einer Antwort von unserem zust√§ndigen Team rechnen.Wenn du das Webformular ausf√ºllst, wirst du aufgefordert, Folgendes einzugeben:Dein WohnsitzlandDeinen N26 Status (NutzerIn, ehemalige/r NutzerIn, Bevollm√§chtigte/r)Deinen AntragstypName, Nachname und E-Mail AdresseMuss ich als ehemalige/r N26 NutzerIn oder als Bevollm√§chtigte/r noch etwas angeben?Ehemalige NutzerInnen und ihre Bevollm√§chtigten m√ºssen weitere Unterlagen hochladen, um ihre Identit√§t nachzuweisen und sicherzustellen, dass der Empf√§nger der Daten tats√§chlich dazu berechtigt ist.Folgende Unterlagen sind erforderlich:Ehemalige NutzerInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / ReisepassesBevollm√§chtigte VertreterInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / Reisepasses und eine unterschriebene Bevollm√§chtigung¬†Sobald das Formular vollst√§ndig ausgef√ºllt ist, klicke auf Senden und sende deine Anfrage ab.Warum ist f√ºr ehemalige N26 KundInnen und Bevollm√§chtigte eine manuelle √úberpr√ºfung des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses notwendig?Wir fragen eine Kopie des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses an, um die Identit√§t zu √ºberpr√ºfen und sicherzustellen, dass personenbezogene Daten und finanzielle Informationen nicht in falsche H√§nde gelangen. Eine solche manuelle √úberpr√ºfung ist erforderlich, wenn die Identit√§t einer Person √ºberpr√ºft werden muss und unser standardisiertes Verfahren zur Identit√§tspr√ºfung nicht angewendet werden kann. Da die Identifizierung von ehemaligen KundInnen und Bevollm√§chtigten nicht in der App oder der Web-App vorgenommen werden kann, da sie keinen Zugang darauf haben, m√ºssen wir hier auf eine manuelle √úberpr√ºfung zur√ºckgreifen.¬†Fragen oder Bedenken hierzu?Unser Kundenservice hilft dir gerne weiter. Schreibe uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They‚Äôre able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that‚Äôs growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you‚Äôve received an unexpected message:If you‚Äôve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you‚Äôve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you‚Äôre ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We‚Äôre always here to help!

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?¬†N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business¬†and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.¬†¬†What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.¬†In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank¬Æ sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.¬†How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account¬†
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint¬Æ ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.¬†
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.¬†¬†I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: Comment utiliser la version num√©rique de ma carte ?
answer: Effectuez des achats avec votre smartphoneAjoutez simplement votre carte N26 √† votre compte Apple Pay ou Google Pay afin d'effectuer des achats aupr√®s de commer√ßants acceptant ce moyen de paiement. Vous pouvez activer cette fonctionnalit√© avant m√™me que votre carte n'arrive chez vous mais aussi une fois que vous aurez re√ßu et activ√© votre carte.Il vous suffit de suivre les √©tapes suivantes : Connectez-vous √† votre compte N26Allez dans l'onglet "Cartes"S√©lectionnez "Param√®tres de la carte" puis choisissez celle que vous souhaitez utiliser (en faisant glisser l'√©cran √† gauche si vous avez plusieurs cartes)S√©lectionnez "Ajouter √† Cartes" ou "Ajouter √† G Pay".A noter :Si vous recommandez une carte ou adh√©rez √† un compte premium (et attendez donc votre nouvelle carte) sans bloquer votre carte actuelle, vous devrez utiliser Apple Pay ou Google Pay avec celle-ci en attendant que votre nouvelle carte arrive.Acc√©dez aux informations de votre carte, directement depuis l'application N26.Si vous avez besoin d'acc√©der aux informations de votre carte mais que vous ne l'avez pas avec vous, il vous suffit d'acc√©der √† votre application N26. Pour ce faire, il est n√©cessaire :- d'avoir le smartphone synchronis√© √† votre compte.- d'avoir activ√© cette carte.Voici les √©tapes √† suivre :Ouvrez l‚Äôapplication et allez dans l‚Äôonglet ‚ÄúCartes"S√©lectionnez ‚ÄúParam√®tres de la carte‚Äù afin de trouver votre carte active (si vous en avez plusieurs, faites glisser l‚Äô√©cran vers la gauche).Une fois la carte choisie, s√©lectionnez ‚ÄúInformations de la carte‚Äù. Vous serez invit√© √† vous identifier en d√©verrouillant votre appareil par identification biom√©trique ou avec le code de votre smartphone.Les donn√©es compl√®tes de votre carte apparaissent pendant 1 minute avant de dispara√Ætre automatiquement.

question: FATCA - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin de certaines informations de votre part ?
answer:
En tant qu‚Äô√©tablissement de cr√©dit, N26 est tenue de communiquer directement au D√©partement du Tr√©sor des Etats-Unis et √† l‚ÄôInternal Revenue Service (IRS) des informations sur les comptes d√©tenus par les contribuables am√©ricains ou par des entit√©s √©trang√®res dans lesquelles les contribuables am√©ricains d√©tiennent une participation substantielle selon le FATCA.¬†FATCA signifie Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act et est une l√©gislation con√ßue pour pr√©venir l'√©vasion fiscale. Introduit par l'IRS, l'objectif du FATCA est d'encourager une meilleure conformit√© fiscale en emp√™chant les personnes am√©ricaines d'utiliser des banques √©trang√®res et d'autres organisations financi√®res afin d'√©viter l'imposition am√©ricaine sur leurs revenus et leurs actifs. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations sur le FATCA sur le site Web de l'IRS : www.irs.gov (nouvel onglet)En effet, contrairement √† la plupart des autres pays, le syst√®me fiscal am√©ricain pr√©l√®ve l'imp√¥t sur le revenu des personnes r√©sidant sur le territoire national, mais √©galement des citoyens am√©ricains vivant √† l‚Äô√©tranger. √Ä l‚Äôinverse, dans une majorit√© de pays, seules les personnes r√©sidant sur le territoire national sont soumises aux imp√¥ts du pays de r√©sidence. Les expatri√©s en sont donc exempt√©s.Dans le cadre du FATCA, et pour que nous puissions d√©terminer avec pr√©cision si votre compte doit faire l‚Äôobjet d‚Äôune d√©claration aupr√®s du fisc am√©ricain, nous vous demanderons de nous communiquer les informations suivantes :Si vous √™tes citoyen des √âtats-Unis (binationaux compris) ou si vous √™tes titulaire d‚Äôune carte verte en cours de validit√©
Si vous √™tes imposable aux √âtats-Unis
√ätre ¬´assujetti √† l'imp√¥t¬ª aux √âtats-Unis ne signifie pas n√©cessairement que vous payez l'imp√¥t sur le revenu des particuliers aux √âtats-Unis. Cela signifie que la loi fiscale am√©ricaine vous oblige √† produire une d√©claration de revenus et √† d√©clarer vos revenus (mondiaux) √† l'IRS, m√™me si vous ne payez aucun imp√¥t am√©ricain.
Votre num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale am√©ricain (nouvel onglet) (si vous √™tes effectivement imposable aux √âtats-Unis)
Vous pouvez dans ce cas nous fournir votre num√©ro de s√©curit√© sociale am√©ricain (SSN en anglais) ou votre Num√©ro individuel de contribuable am√©ricain (ITIN en anglais).De plus, si votre compte indique un lieu de naissance am√©ricain ou un num√©ro de t√©l√©phone am√©ricain ou si vous mettez en place un ordre de virement permanent aux √âtats-Unis, la l√©gislation FATCA nous oblige √† supposer que vous √™tes soumis au FATCA, jusqu'√† ce que vous nous prouviez le contraire.Si votre situation fiscale vient √† changer, vous pourrez √† tout moment modifier les informations concern√©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

question: Bankdokumente ‚Äì Diese Belege sind verf√ºgbar
answer:
N26 hei√üt nicht ohne Grund die mobile Bank ‚Äì du kannst¬† deinen Kontoauszug, deine Bankdaten und andere Bankdokumente automatisch herunterladen. Bei den folgenden Bankdokumenten handelt es sich um offizielle Dokumente, die ohne Unterschrift g√ºltig sind:Dein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, auf dem du deinen aktuellen Kontostand sowie eingehende und ausgehende Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto einsehen kannst. Auch dein vollst√§ndiger Name, deine IBAN und deine BIC stehen auf dem Bankdokument. So kannst du es herunterladen.Deine Bankdaten (oder: Kontobest√§tigung) belegen, dass dein Bankkonto unter deinem Namen registriert ist. Dieses Bankdokument beinhaltet deinen vollen Namen, dein Geburtsdatum, deine IBAN und BIC, das Datum der Kontoer√∂ffnung und ‚Äì falls gew√ºnscht ‚Äì deinen aktuellen Kontostand und deine Kartennummer (die beiden letzten Angaben sind in der Regel nicht zu sehen). So kannst du deine Bankdaten anfordern.Die Geb√ºhrenabrechnung ist ein Dokument, auf dem alle von N26 erhobenen Geb√ºhren des letzten Jahres aufgelistet sind.In der Web-App: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*, tippe auf Entgeltaufstellung, w√§hle je nach Bedarf 6 Monate oder 12 Monate und klicke im Anschluss auf Anfrage. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden erh√§ltst du eine PDF in deinem Posteingang unter Nachrichten von N26.Der √úberweisungsbeleg best√§tigt, dass du eine Zahlung von deinem N26 Konto get√§tigt hast. Darin enthalten sind dein vollst√§ndiger Name, deine (im N26 Konto registrierte) Adresse, deine IBAN und BIC, der √úberweisungsbetrag, das Datum, der Verwendungszweck sowie der vollst√§ndige Name, die IBAN und die BIC des Empf√§ngers.In der mobilen und der WebApp: Gehe im Home-Bereich auf die √úberweisung und w√§hle √úberweisungsbest√§tigung herunterladen. Die PDF wird automatisch erstellt.Die Kartenzahlungsbest√§tigung wird genutzt, um eine Zahlung mit deiner N26 Mastercard zu best√§tigen. Du kannst den Kontoauszug des entsprechenden Monats vorweisen.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire in Franz√∂sisch) ist ein Bankdokument speziell f√ºr franz√∂sische Beh√∂rden. Es enth√§lt die wichtigsten Bankdaten, wie deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen, deine Adresse sowie IBAN und BIC.In der WebApp: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab) Symbol*, scrolle runter bis RIB - Relev√© d‚ÄôIdentit√© Bancaire und klicke auf den Anfrage Button. ¬† 
* Das Download Symbol ist ein Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil. Es befindet sich links vom ‚ÄòGeld erhalten‚Äô Button.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10‚Ç¨).¬†Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0‚Ç¨ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Bank information‚Äîyour N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‚ÄòAdd Money‚Äô button.

question: Chi sono le Persone Politicamente Esposte?
answer:
Le Persone Politicamente Esposte sono persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche. Sono da includere in questa categoria anche i loro familiari e le persone con le quali intrattengono stretti legami d‚Äôaffari.Per persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche si intendono:Presidente della Repubblica, Presidente del Consiglio, Ministro, Vice-Ministro e Sottosegretario, Presidente di Regione, Assessore regionale, Sindaco di capoluogo di provincia o citt√† metropolitana, Sindaco di comune con popolazione non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Deputato, senatore, parlamentare europeo, consigliere regionale e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Membro degli organi direttivi centrali di partiti politici;Giudice della Corte Costituzionale, magistrato della Corte di Cassazione o della Corte dei conti, consigliere di Stato, altri componenti del Consiglio di Giustizia Amministrativa per la Regione siciliana e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Membro degli organi direttivi delle banche centrali e delle autorit√† indipendenti;Ambasciatore, incaricato d'affari e cariche equivalenti in Stati esteri, ufficiale di grado apicale delle forze armate e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Componente degli organi di amministrazione, direzione o controllo delle imprese controllate, anche indirettamente, dallo Stato italiano o da uno Stato estero o controllate, in misura prevalente o totalitaria, dalle Regioni, da comuni capoluoghi di provincia e citta' metropolitane e da comuni con popolazione complessivamente non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti;Direttore generale di ASL e di azienda ospedaliera, di azienda ospedaliera universitaria e degli altri enti del servizio sanitario nazionale.Direttore, vicedirettore e membro dell'organo di gestione o soggetto svolgenti funzioni equivalenti in organizzazioni internazionali;Vengono identificati come familiari di persone politicamente esposte:¬†i genitori;¬†il coniuge o la persona legata in unione civile o convivenza di fatto;i figli e i loro coniugi e le persone legate ai figli in unione civile o convivenza di fatto.
I soggetti con i quali le PEP intrattengono notoriamente stretti rapporti sono:le persone fisiche legate alla persona politicamente esposta per via della titolarit√† effettiva congiunta di enti giuridici o di altro stretto rapporto di affari;le persone fisiche che detengono solo formalmente il controllo totalitario di un'entit√† notoriamente costituita, di fatto, nell'interesse e a beneficio di una persona politicamente esposta.

question: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
answer: From the 17th March, customers from other banks can request‚Äîat their bank institution‚Äîthe return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, you‚Äôll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your Main Account, you‚Äôll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).¬†If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I‚Äôve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.¬†What if I‚Äôve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.¬†Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: What's an insolvency and what can I do?
answer: An insolvency is a situation in which the debtor is unable to fulfil his financial obligation to the creditor(s). How this is going to affect your N26 account depends on whether you have a p-account and whether we received an insolvency application or insolvency opening. FAQWhy is my account seized although I have a clearance (unseizing) from my insolvency manager?Your account is seized because we received a garnishment. If the garnishment is issued by one of the insolvency creditors, the insolvency manager has to inform us accordingly. In this case we will unseize your account. If, however, the garnishment is based on a claim which emerged only after the insolvency proceedings, the seizure will be maintained. Since we cannot be sure if the garnishment is valid or not, your account will be seized again until we've received a written confirmation to release your account from your insolvency manager.The insolvency manager ordered for my account to be released/ the insolvency proceedings are over. Why does my account remain seized?In order to release the account we require written confirmation from the insolvency manager directly. It can take a few days until they send it to us and we receive it. Until then your account remains seized. If you have a p-account, you can use your funds to the extent of your monthly allowance.Is it possible to convert my p-account back to my normal account whilst I have an active insolvency?You can revert your p-account to a normal bank account at any time. We recommend that you make sure we have a written confirmation to release your account from the insolvency manager.Is it possible to pay out a new garnishment whilst I have active insolvency proceedings?In that case you can only issue a transfer order for the new garnishment in agreement with the insolvency manager.

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death?¬†In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased‚Äôs bank accounts.¬†The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: service.succession@n26.comFax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH -Service Succession-
Rungestr. 22¬†
10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on:¬†Who is the deceased?¬†If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account.¬†How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.¬† A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?If you are facing certain proceedings or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.¬†We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.¬†Occasionally we‚Äôre inquired by a notary in charge of the succession. In this case we will provide the notary with all necessary information for your convenience. We recommend providing any notary in charge with our address details.¬†Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you or your notary in charge.¬†What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?¬†¬†Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.¬†However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH is located in Germany.¬†When it comes to the relationship between the deceased‚Äôs bank and the beneficiaries, other legal requirements may be applicable than usually in your home country.As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be blocked.Please note that standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates on the account generally continue to exist after the death of the account holder. Heirs or authorised representatives must have these revoked or deleted.¬†Further, we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax in Germany of the assets belonging to the estate.We will notify the beneficiaries or their notary in charge in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased‚Äôs account with N26.
I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?¬†There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.¬†It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.¬†Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.¬†For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.¬†

question: Transferencias inmediatas con MoneyBeam
answer: Haciendo un MoneyBeam, puedes enviarles dinero a tus contactos en tiempo real y sin necesidad de introducir tus datos bancarios. Tambi√©n puedes pedirles un MoneyBeam a tus contactos para recibir dinero de ellos. Para poder utilizar MoneyBeam, t√∫ y tus contactos ten√©is que ser visibles como usuarios de N26.Para enviar un MoneyBeam:¬†Pulsa Enviar dinero > MoneyBeamSelecciona a un contacto de tu lista o agr√©galo introduciendo su n√∫mero de tel√©fono o direcci√≥n de email.Indica el importe y el concepto de la transacci√≥nIndica tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n y confirma el mensaje push que recibir√°s.¬†Para solicitar un MoneyBeam:Pulsa Recibir dinero > Solicitar MoneyBeamSelecciona a un contacto de tu lista o agr√©galo introduciendo su n√∫mero de tel√©fono o direcci√≥n de email.Indica el importe y el concepto de la transacci√≥nCuando tu contacto confirme tu solicitud, recibir√°s el importe solicitado.El l√≠mite de los MoneyBeams es de 1000 ‚Ç¨ por transacci√≥n y de 5000‚Ç¨ cada 24 horas.A√±ade un GIF como referencia adicional:Puedes enviar GIF como texto de referencia adicional cuando utilices MoneyBeam. Cuando se complete el MoneyBeam, el beneficiario podr√° ver un emoji animado como prefijo de la transferencia recibida en la pantalla de inicio para informarle de que la transferencia tiene un GIF adjunto. El beneficiario puede ver el gif en los datos de la transferencia junto con el texto de referencia.Giphy, Inc. te proporciona los GIF directamente, y no N26. Ten en cuenta que Giphy es una empresa estadounidense que puede tratar tus datos personales en EE. UU. Encontrar√°s informaci√≥n sobre c√≥mo trata Giphy tus datos personales cuando adjuntas y env√≠as GIF en la Pol√≠tica de Privacidad de Giphy (pesta√±a nueva).¬†¬†Para enviar un MoneyBeam con un GIF:Selecciona Enviar dinero y, a continuaci√≥n, MoneyBeam.Selecciona a un contacto de tu lista o a√±ade uno introduciendo su n√∫mero de m√≥vil y su direcci√≥n de email.Introduce un importe y una referencia.Selecciona A√±adir GIF y busca o desliza el GIF que quieres a√±adirIntroduce tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n y confirma la notificaci√≥n push que recibir√°s.

question: Was ist eine Insolvenz und was kann ich tun?
answer: Eine Insolvenz bezeichnet die Situation eines Schuldners, der nicht mehr in der Lage ist, seine Zahlungsverpflichtungen gegen√ºber einem Gl√§ubiger zu erf√ºllen. Das hat Folgen f√ºr dein N26 Konto, die vom Status deines Kontos und vom Stadium des Insolvenzverfahrens abh√§ngen. Dein Konto kann ein P-Konto sein (oder nicht) und das Insolvenzverfahren kann im Stadium des Antragsverfahrens oder Er√∂ffnungsverfahrens sein. FAQWarum wurde mein Konto gesperrt, obwohl ich eine Freigabe vom Insolvenzverwalter habe?Dein Konto ist gesperrt, weil uns ein Pf√§ndungs- und √úberweisungsbeschluss f√ºr dein Konto zugestellt wurde. Kommt die Pf√§ndung von einem deiner Insolvenzgl√§ubiger, dann muss uns der Insolvenzverwalter dar√ºber in Kenntnis setzen und die Sperre wird aufgehoben. Wenn es sich um eine Forderung handelt, die erst nach nach Beendigung des Insolvenzverfahrens entstanden ist, dann ist die Pf√§ndungsma√ünahme zul√§ssig und die Sperre bleibt aufrechterhalten. Da wir wir nicht sicher sind, ob die neue Pf√§ndungsma√ünahme g√ºltig ist oder aufgrund des Insolvenzverfahrens zur√ºckzuweisen ist, bleibt dein Konto wieder gesperrt, bis wir vom Insolvenzverwalter eine schriftliche Freigabeerkl√§rung f√ºr dein Konto erhalten haben.¬†Der Insolvenzverwalter hat die Freigabe des Kontos angeordnet/ das Insolvenzverfahren ist beendet. Warum bleibt mein Konto gesperrt?¬†¬†Um die Sperre aufzuheben, ben√∂tigen wir ein offizielles Schreiben von dem Insolvenzverwalter. Es kann sein, dass es einige Tage dauert, bis der Insolvenzverwalter uns dieses Schreiben zusendet und es bei uns eingeht. Bis dahin bleibt dein Konto¬†gesperrt. Falls du ein P-Konto hast, kannst du √ºber dein Guthaben im Rahmen des Pf√§ndungsfreibetrages verf√ºgen.Ist es m√∂glich, bei aktiver Insolvenz mein P-Konto in mein normales Konto umzuwandeln?Du kannst jederzeit den Pf√§ndungsschutz von deinem Konto entfernen. Wir empfehlen dir zuvor sicher zu stellen, dass uns eine Freigabe deines Insolvenzverwalters f√ºr dein Konto vorliegt.Ist es m√∂glich, eine neue Pf√§ndung in einem aktiven Insolvenzverfahren auszuzahlen?Die Ausf√ºhrung des √úberweisungsauftrages kann nur mit Zustimmung des Insolvenzverwalters erfolgen.¬†

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand¬†N26 Insurance¬†allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù banner you find.¬†You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.¬†How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.¬†Am I eligible?¬†N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can‚Äôt sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‚ÄòSharing Money‚ÄôRead the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù will pop-up. Tap ‚Äúsign‚ÄùCheck both ‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù and ‚ÄúPower of attorney‚Äù, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: How to revoke my loan application?
answer: N26 Credit¬†revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.We‚Äôll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so it‚Äôs best to chat with us about this. We‚Äôll take it from there and let you know via email when it‚Äôs done.Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs ‚Ç¨9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.
