Dazu geh√∂ren √úberpr√ºfungen f√ºr Wohnungsmietvertr√§ge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschlie√ülich Stellen bei N26). F√ºhre den Verifizierungsprozess nur durch, wenn du ein N26 Bankkonto f√ºr dich selbst er√∂ffnen m√∂chtest.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen k√∂nnen.¬†Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, k√∂nnen diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine pers√∂nlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. question: Come richiedere il rimborso di un addebito diretto?
answer: Il rimborso di un addebito diretto non annulla il contratto che hai con l'esercente.Puoi richiedere un rimborso per l'addebito diretto SEPA direttamente nell'app fino a 8 settimane dopo l'addebito. Le addebito diretto sar√† accreditato sul tuo conto entro 2 giorni bancari.Richiesta di rimborso per un addebito diretto sul mio conto principale:Effettua l'accesso nell'app mobile N26Apri l'elenco delle transazioni e seleziona l'addebito diretto in questioneSeleziona RimborsoRichiesta di rimborso per l'addebito diretto nel mio spazio IBAN (sottoconto):Puoi anche richiedere il rimborso per un addebito diretto nel tuo Spaces per cui √® stato assegnato un IBAN:Effettua l'accesso nell'app mobile N26Premi SpacesVai allo spazio per cui desideri rimborsare un addebito direttoSeleziona la transazione di addebito diretto in questioneSeleziona Rimborso**Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sar√† la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verr√† riscosso da noi. Di seguito puoi trovare l'elenco dei paesi:BulgariaCroaziaRepubblica CecaDanimarcaUngheriaIslandaLiechtensteinNorvegiaPoloniaRomaniaSveziaSvizzera

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.¬†You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏èVerf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Island und Liechtenstein.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus drei neuen Farben: Bernstein, Schwarz und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in Gesch√§ften, vermeide versteckte Bankgeb√ºhren und profitiere von geb√ºhrenfreien Auslands√ºberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst dar√ºber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit geb√ºhrenfrei Bargeld in jeder W√§hrung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: R√ºckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, f√ºr Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Versp√§tung des aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten f√ºr medizinische R√ºcktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erh√§ltst eine Versicherung f√ºr Such- und Rettungsma√ünahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unf√§llen w√§hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz f√ºr Sch√§den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Du kannst N26 Metal mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Denke an Folgendes, wenn du dich f√ºr N26 Metal (neuen Tab)interessierst:Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach deiner Identit√§tspr√ºfung berechnet. question: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: What is a N26 Flex account?
answer: Our N26 Flex account is neither an N26 Standard or premium membership account. We offer you the Flex account if your SCHUFA credit score isn't sufficient for you to open an N26 Standard account. You cannot select the N26 Flex account yourself. It will be visible to you before you open your account and the decision of offering you the Flex account is taken automatically based on your SCHUFA credit score, which we receive from SCHUFA when you try to open your account with us. If you think we have not considered your correct SCHUFA credit score and want to have a human review of this automated decision, you can get in touch with us by email to support@n26.com from the email address you signed up with requesting a review of the decision before accepting the N26 Flex account offer. Please note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account sign-up process.Once you reach out to us, we can let you know if your SCHUFA credit score was the reason for offering you the Flex account. You can then contact SCHUFA regarding your SCHUFA credit score, in case you want to confirm with SCHUFA if your credit score correctly reflects your creditworthiness.We will only be able to offer you an N26 standard (new tab) account or a premium membership (new tab) account once your SCHUFA credit score is updated to a higher score. You can then try again and see if we can offer you an N26 standard (new tab) account or a premium membership (new tab) account.If you want to have a human review of this automated decision, please reach out to support@n26.com from the email address you signed up with requesting a review of the decision before accepting the N26 Flex account offer. Please note:The N26 Flex account has a monthly fee of ‚Ç¨6. You will be informed about the monthly fee before opening your account and we will debit this fee directly from your account. The first fee will be debited once your account balance reaches at least ‚Ç¨6 or after 15 days, whichever happens first, and then monthly after thatThe N26 Flex account cannot be combined with an N26 Business, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal, N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal account.Cash withdrawals at ATMs or one of our 9,000 CASH26 (new tab) partner stores each cost ‚Ç¨2. Both withdrawal types are debited immediately.

question: Wie kann ich mein Konto schlie√üen?
answer: Du willst dein N26 Girokonto k√ºndigen? Das finden wir nat√ºrlich schade. Hier erf√§hrst du, mit welchen einfachen Schritten du dein N26 Bankkonto schlie√üen kannst.¬†Wenn du ein Premiumkonto hast, kannst du auch einfach auf ein Standard Konto wechseln, statt dein Konto komplett zu k√ºndigen (neuen Tab).Wenn du dir aber sicher bist, dass du dein N26 Girokonto komplett k√ºndigen m√∂chtest, folge bitte diesen Schritten:Wenn du noch Geld auf deinem Girokonto hast, solltest du es zuerst auf ein anderes Konto √ºberweisen. Wenn dein Kontostand negativ ist, musst du Geld auf dein Konto laden (neuen Tab). K√ºndige dein N26 Girokonto erst, wenn dein Gesamtsaldo null ist ‚Äì das macht den Prozess sehr viel einfacher.Klicke hier (neuen Tab), um die online Kontok√ºndigung anzufangen (neuen Tab). Du musst dich anmelden, um deine Identit√§t zu verifizieren. Die Anwendung leitet dich dann durch die Kontoschlie√üung.Zerst√∂re deine Bankkarte ‚Äì zum Beispiel, indem du sie mit einer Schere zerschneidest. Du solltest den Chip sowie den Magnetstreifen zerst√∂ren. Entsorge die Teile separat.Probleme mit der Kontoschlie√üung?Wenn du eine italienische IBAN hast oder dich nicht einloggen kannst, sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an (neuen Tab)support@n26.com (neuen Tab) ‚Äì direkt von der E-Mail-Adresse, die du bei der Registration f√ºr dein N26 Konto verwendet hast. H√§nge der E-Mail dieses K√ºndigungsschreiben (neuen Tab) an. Im Formular m√ºssen folgende Informationen beinhaltet sein:Einen Antrag f√ºr die Schlie√üung des N26 Kontos zu einem bestimmten Datum oder ‚Äúso bald wie m√∂glich‚Äù,dein Name,deine N26 IBAN,solltest du noch Geld auf dem Konto haben: eine andere IBAN aus dem SEPA-Raum, auf den wir dein Restguthaben √ºberweisen k√∂nnen.

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal¬†contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you‚Äôre now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you‚Äôll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.¬†RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.¬† At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of ‚Ç¨10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: How to repay my loan early?
answer: You can always repay your¬†N26 Credit¬†loan early. Keep in mind that an early repayment fee of up to 1% applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is up to 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and we‚Äôll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

question: Chargeback: H√§ufig gestellte Fragen zu Reklamationen
How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
answer: Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du immer siehst, was in deinem Konto passiert. Es gibt zwei Transaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem Gesch√§ft oder im Internet stattfinden:Autorisierungen: Ein Betrag, der von einem Einzelh√§ndler oder Verk√§ufer blockiert oder reserviert wird. Das kann alles M√∂gliche sein ‚Äì von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschlie√ülich Kautionen).Buchungen: Der tats√§chliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endg√ºltig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zur√ºckerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zur√ºckgegeben.Sobald eine Autorisierung best√§tigt wird, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Danach passiert eins dieser drei Dinge: Die Autorisierung wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verf√§llt (und kehrt nach sp√§testens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºck. Bei Kautionen f√ºr Autovermietungen kann es bis zu 30 Werktage dauern.)¬†Bitte beachte:Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endg√ºltige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung w√§hrend des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Aber keine Sorge ‚Äì am Ende erlischt die Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen noch nicht passiert ist, helfen wir dir dabei, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen (neuen Tab).Autorisierungen f√ºr Verifizierungen sind in der Regel sehr kleine Betr√§ge, mit denen gepr√ºft wird, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. im Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zur√ºck√ºberwiesen.Die H√∂he einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden (neuen Tab) von der endg√ºltigen Buchung abweichen.
