question: D√≥nde encontrar su identificaci√≥n fiscal
answer: Tu N√∫mero de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal (NIF) es √∫nico para ti y lo expiden las autoridades fiscales cuando te registras en el pa√≠s en el que eres contribuyente.D√≥nde encontrar tu NIF puede variar dependiendo del pa√≠s en el que est√°s sujeto al pago de impuestos. Te advertimos de que el nombre del NIF de cada pa√≠s puede variar. Por ejemplo, si eres del Reino Unido, tu NIF es como tu n√∫mero de la Seguridad Social (NIN).D√≥nde encontrar tu NIF para residentes alemanes:Si resides en Alemania y te registraste en la agencia tributaria local, se te proporcionar√° un NIF o Steueridentifikationsnummer de 11 d√≠gitos. No lo confundas con tu n√∫mero fiscal o Steuernummer de 9 d√≠gitos.Aunque los NIF no se indican en los documentos de identidad oficiales, podr√°s encontrarlo en los siguientes lugares:La carta que recibiste de la Agencia Federal Tributaria Central que emite tu NIF o IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Liquidaci√≥n del IRPFDomiciliaci√≥n de la n√≥minaSi quieres m√°s informaci√≥n sobre tu NIF o si necesitas solicitarlo, puedes obtener m√°s informaci√≥n aqu√≠ (pesta√±a nueva).D√≥nde encontrar tu NIF para residentes franceses:Si resides en Francia y est√°s obligado a hacer la declaraci√≥n de la renta all√≠, la Agencia Tributaria francesa te expedir√° un NIF o SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) de 13 d√≠gitos en cuanto te hayas registrado en la base de datos de la Agencia Tributaria. Estos n√∫meros empiezan por 0, 1, 2 o 3.Encontrar√°s el NIF en los siguientes lugares:En el formulario preimpreso de la declaraci√≥n de la rentaAdem√°s, puedes encontrarlo en las notificaciones fiscales y del impuesto sobre bienes inmueblesSi quieres m√°s informaci√≥n sobre tu NIF o si necesitas solicitarlo, puedes obtener m√°s informaci√≥n aqu√≠ (pesta√±a nueva).D√≥nde encontrar tu NIF para residentes italianos:Si resides en Italia, el NIF o Codice fiscale (que consta de 16 caracteres) solo ser√° v√°lido si est√° inscrito en el Registro Tributario italiano administrado por la Agencia Tributaria italiana (Agenzia delle Entrate). Si no tienes NIF, deber√°s solicitarlo en cualquiera de las oficinas de la Agencia Tributaria italiana.Aunque los NIF no se indican en los documentos de identidad oficiales, podr√°s encontrarlo en los siguientes lugares:El NIF se encuentra en tu tarjeta sanitaria personal (N√∫mero de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).Tambi√©n encontrar√°s tu NIF en tu tarjeta NIF.Si quieres m√°s informaci√≥n sobre tu NIF o si necesitas solicitarlo, puedes obtener m√°s informaci√≥n aqu√≠ (pesta√±a nueva).D√≥nde encontrar tu NIF para residentes espa√±oles:Si resides en Espa√±a, tu NIF es √∫nico a efectos fiscales y aduaneros. Tu NIF espa√±ol est√° compuesto por nueve caracteres (el √∫ltimo car√°cter es una letra de control). Los NIF los expide el Ministerio del Interior y pueden variar dependiendo de si eres una persona f√≠sica con nacionalidad espa√±ola o no.Encontrar√°s tu NIF en los siguientes lugares dependiendo de tu situaci√≥n:Documento Nacional de IdentidadDNI electr√≥nicoTarjeta de Identidad de ExtranjeroNuevo permiso de conducir (desde 2004)Tarjeta de Identificaci√≥n FiscalTarjeta de la Seguridad SocialSi quieres m√°s informaci√≥n sobre tu NIF o si necesitas solicitarlo, puedes obtener m√°s informaci√≥n aqu√≠ (pesta√±a nueva).Informaci√≥n importante:El formato de identificaci√≥n fiscal que puedes introducir en tu app N26 depender√° del pa√≠s en el que residas. Es decir, que si resides en Alemania, deber√°s introducir tu NIF alem√°n.Puedes consultar la informaci√≥n fiscal que hayas guardado en tu cuenta accediendo a:Mi cuenta > Informaci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n fiscal.Si has introducido el pa√≠s en el que est√°s sujeto a impuestos pero no tu NIF, elimina este pa√≠s de la lista que se te muestra en la app, vuelve a introducir el pa√≠s e introduce tu NIF de nuevo.Puedes consultar m√°s informaci√≥n sobre qu√© hacemos con tus datos fiscales aqu√≠ (pesta√±a nueva).

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Comment puis-je commander une carte additionnelle ?
answer: Cliquez ici, si vous souhaitez remplacer une carte, plut√¥t que de commander une carte additionnelle.Comment commander une carte additionnelle:Connectez-vous √† votre compte N26Acc√©dez √† : D√©couvrirChoisissez : Carte additionnelle > MastercardChoisissez le coloris de votre choix et le mode de livraisonCliquez sur : Valider et payerLa carte additionnelle co√ªte 10 ‚Ç¨ avec un envoi standard et 25 ‚Ç¨ avec une livraison express. Pour d√©clencher la production et l‚Äôenvoi de la carte, le solde de votre compte doit √™tre de 10 ‚Ç¨ minimum. Vous pouvez obtenir plus d‚Äôinformations ici.‚ÑπÔ∏è La carte additionnelle est disponible pour les clients avec une adh√©sion pr√©mium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, France, Italie, Espagne, Autriche, Danemark, Islande, Liechtenstein, Norv√®ge, Pologne, Su√®de, Belgique, Estonie, Finlande, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Lettonie, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Pays-Bas.

question: How to report an insurance claim?
answer: Your¬†N26 You (new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal (new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest ‚ÄúSplit the bill‚Äù feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you‚Äôre sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, tap it and choose ‚ÄòSplit the bill‚ÄôAdd the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you‚Äôll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can‚Äôt be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card: 30‚Ç¨Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card 65‚Ç¨

question: CRR Disclosure Report
answer: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).¬†¬†Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an ‚Äúappropriate medium‚Äù and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

question: How to contact N26?
answer:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while you‚Äôre logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once you‚Äôre logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Don‚Äôt have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you don‚Äôt have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while you‚Äôre logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We won‚Äôt be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.¬†

question: Comment utiliser les Espaces ?
answer: Pour utiliser vos espaces, acc√©dez √† la rubrique ¬´ Espaces ¬ª de votre application mobile N26 ou espace client en ligne. Dans la rubrique ¬´ Espaces ¬ª, vous pouvez afficher, rejoindre et cr√©er des Espaces.Cr√©er un espace :Appuyez sur ¬´ Cr√©er un nouvel espace ¬ª dans la rubrique ¬´ Espaces ¬ªS√©lectionnez l‚Äôune des options suivantes :¬´ √âconomiser pour un projet ¬ª : saisissez le montant de l‚Äôobjectif d‚Äô√©pargne et la date cible (facultatif).¬´ √âconomiser √† plusieurs ¬ª : vous cr√©ez ainsi un ¬´ Espace Partag√© ¬ª.¬´ Cr√©ez-le maintenant, d√©cidez plus tard ¬ª : cr√©ez simplement un espace auquel vous pourrez ajouter des objectifs ou des r√®gles automatiques.Personnalisez ensuite votre espace avec un nom et une image.Vous disposez d√©sormais d‚Äôun sous-compte espace pour mieux contr√¥ler vos finances. Commen√ßons maintenant √† utiliser les ¬´ Espaces ¬ª !D√©placer de l‚Äôargent entre vos espaces :Maintenez enfonc√© le bouton ¬´ compte courant ¬ª ou un autre espace.Puis d√©placez votre argent vers l‚Äôespace souhait√©.Vous pouvez ensuite confirmer le montant et le solde est imm√©diatement mis √† jour.Verrouillez votre espace :Vous pouvez verrouiller et d√©verrouiller un sous-compte √† tout moment depuis votre application mobile et espace client en ligne. Vous ne pouvez pas transf√©rer de l‚Äôargent vers ou depuis un espace verrouill√©.Acc√©dez √† l‚Äôespace que vous souhaitez verrouiller/d√©verrouiller.Appuyez sur ¬´ G√©rer ¬ª.Appuyez ensuite sur ¬´ Verrouiller un sous-compte ¬ª ou ¬´ D√©verrouiller un sous-compte ¬ª.Saisissez votre code de validation.Le sous-compte sera imm√©diatement verrouill√© ou d√©verrouill√©.Masquez le solde de votre espace :Pour masquer le solde de votre espace du solde total de votre compte :Allez dans l‚Äôespace dans lequel vous souhaitez masquer le solde.Appuyez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne en forme de roue dent√©e ¬´ Param√®tres ¬ª (dans le coin sup√©rieur droit).S√©lectionnez ¬´ Masquer le solde de l‚Äôespace ¬ª.G√©rez vos espaces :Vous pouvez cr√©er des r√®gles automatiques, des objectifs d‚Äô√©pargne et activer la fonctionnalit√© ¬´ G√©rer les arrondis ¬ª. Dans l‚Äôespace, appuyez sur ¬´ G√©rer ¬ª :Pour cr√©er un objectif d‚Äô√©pargne, s√©lectionnez ¬´ Cr√©er un objectif ¬ª (vous pouvez √©galement le modifier ult√©rieurement).Saisissez simplement le montant de l‚Äôobjectif et la date d‚Äô√©ch√©ance, puis cliquez sur ¬´ Confirmer l‚Äôobjectif ¬ª.Pour activer/d√©sactiver les arrondis, s√©lectionnez ¬´ G√©rer les arrondis ¬ª.Activez l‚Äôoption ¬´ Activer les arrondis ¬ª.Vous aurez la possibilit√© de multiplier votre petite monnaie par x1, x2, x3 et x5 le montant transf√©r√© du reste de vos transactions par carte.Vous pouvez d√©finir vos r√®gles automatiques dans un espace pour transf√©rer automatiquement de l‚Äôargent entre vos espaces et votre compte courant. Pour cela :Appuyez sur ¬´ Cr√©er une nouvelle r√®gle ¬ª.Choisissez les espaces ou le compte courant entre lesquels vous souhaitez effectuer un virement.Saisissez le montant du transfert.Choisissez la fr√©quence et la date, puis confirmez.Vous pouvez √©galement supprimer cette r√®gle en appuyant sur modifier puis sur l‚Äôic√¥ne de suppression √† c√¥t√© de la r√®gle.

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you‚Äôve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that‚Äôs needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you‚Äôd like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Insights¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: Bank information‚Äîyour N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‚ÄòAdd Money‚Äô button.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.¬†Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?¬†Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you‚Äôre asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.¬†If you have a feeling that something is off, don‚Äôt ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don‚Äôt click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender‚Äôs identity.If you‚Äôve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you‚Äôd like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: Come faccio a fornire la prova dell'origine dei fondi per Il mio conto?
answer: In quanto banca in possesso di piena licenza bancaria, N26 √® tenuta a effettuare controlli tecnici di routine sui conti dei clienti. Essendo un'istituzione regolamentata, ci√≤ ci aiuta a garantire che i depositi contenuti nei conti N26 siano al sicuro.A volte, i risultati di questi controlli di routine possono comportare la necessit√† di contattare il titolare di un conto per chiedere la prova dell'origine dei fondi nel conto in questione, in quanto pratica in linea con la regolamentazione bancaria tedesca.Se ci√≤ dovesse accadere, ti contatteremo sempre e solo all'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26. In questa email verranno fornite istruzioni chiare su come poter inviare questi documenti, che possono includere scansioni o foto di ricevute, buste paga, fatture o istruzioni di pagamento.Fai sempre attenzione e verifica che queste email provengano da N26: non chiederemo mai le coordinate bancarie del tuo conto N26, la password o qualsiasi dato condiviso durante il processo di verifica.

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be¬†visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:¬†Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is ‚Ç¨1000 per transaction and ‚Ç¨5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).¬†¬†¬†To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our¬†friend referral program.

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You‚Äôll have to activate your card whether it‚Äôs your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you‚Äôve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you‚Äôre activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction ‚Äî in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail ‚Äî for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card ‚Äî you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you‚Äôll still be able to activate that new card.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you‚Äôve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that‚Äôs needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you‚Äôd like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM‚Äôs nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can‚Äôt reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2‚Ç¨.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).¬†¬†How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you‚Äôll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don‚Äôt arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date¬†
In this scenario, Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.¬†You received a delivery, but it doesn‚Äôt correspond with what you ordered¬†
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn‚Äôt receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,¬†I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:¬†Amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.¬†If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help‚Äì‚Äìthis is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:¬†Dear XX,¬†I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:¬†Merchant name: {insert merchant name}¬†Amount of original, authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.¬†The merchant told me that they‚Äôve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven‚Äôt received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.¬†How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That‚Äôs why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits‚Äì‚Äìall right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‚ÄòDiscreet Mode (new tab)‚Äô option to securely access your account in public.¬†Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you‚Äôre always aware of what‚Äôs happening on your account. Plus, we‚Äôre always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.¬†How does card fraud occur?¬†A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that‚Äôs been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:¬†You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase¬†Your online shopping account is hacked¬†Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúCard transfer‚ÄùChoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per top-up, for a maximum of 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùChoose an amount¬†Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: Kann ich meine Karte mit Expressversand schneller bekommen?
answer: Die Expresslieferung ist eine gute Wahl, wenn du deine Karte schnell ben√∂tigst. Wenn du deine erste Karte bestellst oder eine neue Karte bestellst, steht auch die Option Expressversand zur Verf√ºgung. Die Karte ist nicht nur schneller bei dir, du erh√§ltst auch noch einen Tracking-Link per E-Mail. Wenn du bei der Zustellung nicht zu Hause bist und dein Postfach nicht erreichbar ist, wird die Karte an einen Zugangspunkt in deiner N√§he geliefert (den du √ºber den Tracking-Link findest). Die Karte bleibt nur f√ºr eine begrenzte Zeit dort, danach wird sie an uns zur√ºckgesandt. Wir informieren dich in diesem Fall per E-Mail.Wenn du die Expresslieferung w√§hlst, beachte bitte:Deine N26 Standard-, N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Karte wird innerhalb von drei Werktagen ausgeliefert. Die Zustellung erfolgt zwischen 8 und 12 Uhr.Lieferungen k√∂nnen per DHL Express in alle von uns unterst√ºtzten L√§nder innerhalb Europas erfolgen. Lieferungen in andere L√§nder sind derzeit nicht m√∂glich.Wenn Expresslieferung als Versandart ausgew√§hlt wurde, kann die Lieferung nicht storniert oder ge√§ndert werden.Falls du die Expresslieferung gew√§hlt hast und dein Konto nun schlie√üen willst, wird die Geb√ºhr f√ºr die Expresslieferung dennoch f√§llig.Wenn deine Karte nicht innerhalb von 3-5 Werktagen nach deiner Bestellung eingetroffen ist, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte den Tracking-Link auf m√∂gliche Updates. Du kannst den Tracking-Link auch verwenden, um DHL direkt √ºber die Details deiner Lieferadresse zu informieren oder die Sendung umzuleiten, wenn du zum Zeitpunkt der Lieferung nicht zuhause bist.Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 10‚Ç¨ inklusive Standardversand oder 30‚Ç¨, wenn du dich f√ºr eine Expresslieferung entscheidest. Wie viel kostet die Expresslieferung?N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 YOU-Karten:Erste Karte bei Kontoer√∂ffnung: 25‚Ç¨Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 30‚Ç¨N26-YOU-Zusatzkarte: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal-Karten:Erste Karte bei Kontoer√∂ffnung: 25‚Ç¨Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 65‚Ç¨

question: Was ist ein N26 Standard-Konto?
answer: Das N26 Standard-Konto ist ein sicheres und intuitives digitales Girokonto, das du in wenigen Minuten direkt von deinem Smartphone aus er√∂ffnen kannst. Es ist wunderbar einfach und transparent und erm√∂glicht es dir, Geld problemlos und sicher zu empfangen, zu senden und auszugeben. Das N26 Standard-Konto ist kostenlos* und bietet dir eine einfache und erschwingliche L√∂sung f√ºr alle deine finanziellen Bed√ºrfnisse. Was sind die Vorteile eines ein N26 Standard-Kontos?Unser N26 Standard-Konto bietet die folgenden Vorteile und Funktionen:Kostenloses* Girokonto: Die Nutzung unseres N26 Standard-Kontos ist kostenlos (*ab einem Guthaben von 50.000 ‚Ç¨ oder h√∂her kann ein Verwahrentgelt (neuen Tab) anfallen).Virtuelle Karte: Das Konto beinhaltet eine kostenlose virtuelle Karte mit einer vollst√§ndigen PAN-Nummer und kann zusammen mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay online oder im Gesch√§ft f√ºr Eink√§ufe verwendet werden.Physische N26 Mastercard: F√ºr eine zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨ kannst du eine physische N26 Standard-Debitkarte anfordern (bitte beachte, dass dein Konto nach der Bestellung einmalig mindestens 10 ‚Ç¨ Guthaben aufweisen muss, um die Produktion und den Versand der Karte auszul√∂sen).Zahlungen und √úberweisungen: Du kannst SEPA-√úberweisungen mit der mobilen App von N26 senden und empfangen. Au√üerdem kannst du √ºber Moneybeam sofort Geld an andere N26 Kunden senden.Weitere Finanzprodukte: Wenn sie f√ºr dich erh√§ltlich sind, kannst du auch unsere weiteren Finanzprodukte beantragen, z. B. Overdraft, Kredit, N26 Savings usw.CASH26: Abheben und Einzahlen von Bargeld mit CASH26 (AGB f√ºr DE, AT und IT).Kundenservice: Du kannst dich mit unserem tollen Kundenservice-Team in Verbindung setzen, indem du die Chat-Funktion in der App nutzt oder einen Chat √ºber unsere Website oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab) startest.¬†Eine Anleitung zur Er√∂ffnung eines N26 Standard-Kontos findest du in diesem Artikel.Unser neues N26 Standard-Konto ist mit einer kostenlosen virtuellen Debitkarte ausgestattet. Mit einem aktiven Standard-Konto kannst du online und im Gesch√§ft bezahlen. Au√üerdem kannst du deine virtuelle Karte zu deinem Apple oder Google Pay Wallet hinzuf√ºgen.¬†W√§hrend der Registrierung werden dir 2 Optionen angezeigt:Virtuelle Karte: Du kannst eine virtuelle Karte ausw√§hlen, die ohne Mindestguthaben aktiviert werden kann (wenn du dich zu Beginn f√ºr eine virtuelle Karte entscheidest, kannst du dir f√ºr 10 ‚Ç¨ sp√§ter immer noch eine physische N26 Debitkarte zulegen).Physische Karte: F√ºr denselben Preis von 10 ‚Ç¨ kannst du dich auch von Anfang an f√ºr eine physische N26 Debitkarte entscheiden (bitte beachte aber, dass du bei dieser Option auch sp√§ter keine virtuelle Karte bekommen kannst).¬†Die Details zu deiner virtuellen Karte kannst du in deiner N26 App finden, darunter deine vollst√§ndige PAN-Nummer und alles, was du f√ºr den Online-Einkauf wissen musst.

question: Was tun bei Verlust oder Missbrauch meiner Karte?
answer: Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, kannst du deine Karte jederzeit in deiner N26 App sperren und wieder entsperren.Sperre die Karte vor√ºbergehend oder deaktiviere sie dauerhaft (je nach Fall) und beantrage eine neue in der N26 App oder der Web-App.Falls deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, folge diesen Schritten:Gehe auf die Registerkarte Karten.Wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du vor√ºbergehend deaktivieren oder sperren m√∂chtest.Tippe auf Sperren.Falls du deine Karte endg√ºltig sperren willst, w√§hle schlie√ülich Karteneinstellungen und dann Eine neue Karte beantragen.So hast du die volle Kontrolle √ºber deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen sch√ºtzen.Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verd√§chtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie sp√§ter jederzeit wieder entsperren.

question: What are the benefits of N26 Smart?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra Virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces (new tab): 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces (new tab): Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.You can compare N26 Smart with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these (new tab) in mind when considering N26 Smart:The N26 Smart Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay. Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Smart fee in order to receive the card.

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here‚Äôs how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. ¬† * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose¬†RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select ‚ÄúSend Money‚Äù then choose ‚ÄúBank Transfer‚Äù. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
answer: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

question: How to use Bizum with N26?
answer: Bizum is a payment platform integrated into the N26 app that connects your phone number with your bank account. It allows you to send and receive moneyinstantly between customers of different banks, using only the recipient's phone number.With Bizum you can also request money from someone, sending notifications to the sender. Once your request is accepted, you will receive the money immediately.Requirements to use Bizum with your N26 account:Have a Spanish IBAN (new tab) (ES)Have access to the phone number registered in your bank account (new tab). Always remember to keep your phone number up to date.Have your smartphone paired to the N26 app (new tab).How to activate Bizum on N26?Super easy! Go to the Home app screen and click on ‚ÄúSend money‚Äù, then click on ‚ÄúGet started‚Äù. You will have to confirm your phone number and then you will have completed the registration.What to do if it is not possible to complete the registration in Bizum because the phone number is already in use in another account?This can happen for various reasons, we recommend:Check that your phone number is up to date on N26.Keep in mind that, so far, it is only possible to have Bizum linked only to one bank account. Therefore, if you are already using it on another account, you will have to unlink it from there or follow the Portability steps explained below to use Bizum on N26.If your situation is not one of the two mentioned above, we recommend that you contact our Customer Service from the app for further assistance.Portability: How to bring your Bizum account to N26 from another bank?During the activation of Bizum in N26, after entering your personal data, the app will identify if you are already registered in Bizum with another Bank. In order to activate it on N26, you will have to enter a code that we will send you by text message.How does Bizum work?Go to the Home screen and click on ‚ÄòSend money‚Äô or ‚ÄòReceive money‚Äô, depending on what you want to do; enter your friend‚Äôs phone number and the amount. The money you send will arrive instantly, and the requested money will enter your account as soon as the notification is accepted.Limits:How many Bizum transactions can you make?You can receive a maximum of 60 transfers by Bizum per month and make as many shipments as they want.How much money can be sent through Bizum?Bizum's limits are as follows:The amount of each transaction can be from ‚Ç¨0.50 to ‚Ç¨500.You can send or receive up to a maximum of ‚Ç¨2,000 per dayYou can send a maximum of ‚Ç¨5,000 and receive a maximum of ‚Ç¨60,000 per month.How to deactivate Bizum on N26?You have to go to the ‚ÄúMy account‚Äù section from the N26 app, then click on ‚ÄúBizum settings‚Äù, and finally on ‚ÄúDe-activate‚Äù. You will need the confirmation PIN to complete this procedure.What to do if I change my phone number?You will first need to update your phone number (new tab) from the N26 app.¬†Then, if you had already completed the registration in Bizum, then you will have to deactivate it as mentioned above and register again. In this way, the system will update your phone number in Bizum as well.
