question: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

question: Come si usa Spaces?
answer: Per iniziare a usare i tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale, dovrai entrare nella sezione "Spaces" dell'app mobile N26 o su N26 web. Nella schermata principale di "Spaces" puoi visualizzare, inserire e creare gli Spaces.Creare uno spazio:Vai su "Crea un nuovo spazio" nella schermata principale di "Spaces".Seleziona una delle opzioni sottostanti:"Risparmia per un obiettivo" - Inserisci l'importo dell'obiettivo di risparmio e la data in cui vuoi raggiungerlo (opzionale)."Condividi denaro" - Permette di creare uno "Spazio condiviso"."Crea ora, decidi dopo" - Crea in modo semplice e veloce uno spazio a cui puoi aggiungere obiettivi o regole in un secondo momento.E ora puoi personalizzare il tuo spazio con un nome e un'immagine.Ecco che adesso hai uno spazio separato dal tuo conto principale per controllare meglio le tue finanze! Ora cominciamo a usare "Spaces"!Spostare denaro tra gli spazi:Clicca su "Conto principale" o su un altro spazio separato da esso.Trascina e rilascia la somma di denaro nello spazio desiderato.Ora puoi confermare l'importo e il saldo verr√† aggiornato immediatamente.Blocca il tuo spazio:Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno spazio in qualsiasi momento dalla tua app mobile e web. Non √® possibile spostare denaro dentro o fuori uno spazio bloccato.Vai nello spazio che desideri bloccare/sbloccare.Seleziona il pulsante "Gestisci".Clicca su "Blocca spazio" o su "Sblocca spazio".Inserisci il PIN di conferma.Lo spazio verr√† bloccato o sbloccato immediatamente.Nascondi il saldo del tuo spazio:Potrai nascondere l'importo dello spazio dal saldo totale del tuo conto.Entra nello spazio di cui vuoi nascondere il saldo.Vai sulla rotella "Impostazioni" (in alto a destra).Seleziona "Nascondi il saldo dello spazio"Gestisci i tuoi spazi separati:Puoi creare regole, obiettivi di risparmio e attivare la funzionalit√† Spiccioli. All'interno dello spazio vai su "Gestisci":Per creare un obiettivo di risparmio, seleziona "Crea il mio obiettivo" (puoi modificarlo anche in seguito).Basta inserire un importo e una data di scadenza e poi cliccare su "Imposta obiettivo".Per abilitare/disabilitare gli arrotondamenti seleziona "Gestisci Spiccioli".Muovi la levetta "Abilita Spiccioli".Hai la possibilit√† di moltiplicare il tuo resto per x1, x2, x3 e x5; l'importo corrispondente verr√† separato dalle altre transazioni della tua carta.All'interno di uno spazio, puoi impostare delle regole per spostare automaticamente il denaro tra i tuoi spazi e il conto principale:Vai su "Crea una Regola".Scegli gli spazi o il conto principale tra cui desideri trasferire il denaro.Seleziona l'importo che vuoi spostare.Scegli la frequenza e la data, quindi conferma.Puoi anche cancellare questa regola selezionando modifica e poi l'icona di cancellazione accanto alla regola.

question: Come posso far accreditare la pensione sul mio conto N26?
answer:
N26 Bank AG - Conti aperti prima del 26/03/2020 con IBAN tedesco:Far accreditare la tua pensione sul tuo conto N26 √® molto semplice. 
Ecco cosa devi fare:Compila online e firma l‚Äôapposito modulo fornito da INPS (nuova tabella);Invia il modulo compilato e firmato via email a support@n26.com (ricorda di inviare l‚Äôemail dall‚Äôindirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26).Provvederemo a compilare la parte spettante alla banca e ti spediremo nuovamente il modulo via email entro pochi giorni.
 
Nel modulo potresti trovare riferimenti a Citibank N.A., l‚Äôistituto che provvede all'accredito delle pensioni INPS all‚Äôestero.N26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana - Conti aperti dal 26/03/2020 con IBAN italianoAl momento non √® possibile accreditare la pensione sul conto N26 per i clienti con IBAN italiano. Sar√† nostra premura aggiornare tutti i nostri clienti e fornire tutti i dettagli e le istruzioni in merito non appena il servizio sar√° disponibile.
 
Nel caso dovessi riscontrare dei ritardi nel pagamento ti chiediamo gentilmente di contattare il nostro Supporto Clienti via chat.

question: Comment utiliser MoneyBeam?
answer: Gr√¢ce √† MoneyBeam, vous pouvez transf√©rer de l‚Äôargent √† vos contacts en temps r√©el sans devoir saisir de coordonn√©es bancaires. Avec MoneyBeam, vous pouvez √©galement demander de l‚Äôargent √† vos contacts. Pour utiliser MoneyBeam, vous et vos contacts doivent √™tre visibles en tant que clients N26.Pour envoyer de l‚Äôargent avec MoneyBeam :¬†Cliquez sur Envoyer > Envoyer un MoneyBeamChoisissez un contact dans votre liste ou ajoutez-en un en indiquant son num√©ro de t√©l√©phone et son adresse email.Saisissez le montant et l‚Äôusage.Tapez votre code de validation et confirmez la notification push que vous recevez.¬†Pour recevoir de l‚Äôargent avec MoneyBeam :Cliquez sur Recevoir > Demander un MoneyBeamChoisissez un contact dans votre liste ou ajoutez-en un en indiquant son num√©ro de t√©l√©phone et son adresse email.Saisissez le montant et l‚Äôusage.D√®s que le contact confirme la demande, vous recevrez le montant demand√©.La limite de paiement avec MoneyBeam est de 1000 ‚Ç¨ par transaction et de 5000 ‚Ç¨ sur une dur√©e de 24 h.Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis tout en gagnant de l‚Äôargent ? D√©couvrez notre programme de parrainage.Ajoutez un GIF comme r√©f√©rence suppl√©mentaire :Vous pouvez envoyer des GIF comme r√©f√©rence suppl√©mentaire lorsque vous utilisez MoneyBeam. Une fois le MoneyBeam termin√©, le b√©n√©ficiaire pourra voir un √©moji de film sur l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil, lui indiquant que le virement re√ßu inclut un GIF. Le b√©n√©ficiaire peut visualiser le GIF dans les d√©tails du virement, ainsi que le texte de r√©f√©rence.Les GIF vous sont fournis directement par Giphy, Inc. et non par N26. Giphy est une soci√©t√© am√©ricaine qui peut traiter vos donn√©es personnelles aux √âtats-Unis. Pour en savoir plus sur la mani√®re dont Giphy traite vos donn√©es personnelles lorsque vous joignez et envoyez des GIF, consultez la Politique de confidentialit√© de Giph (nouvel onglet)y.¬†¬†Pour envoyer un MoneyBeam avec un GIF :Cliquez sur Envoyer, puis Envoyer un MoneyBeam.Choisissez un contact dans votre liste ou ajoutez-en un en indiquant son num√©ro de t√©l√©phone et son adresse email.Saisissez le montant et l‚Äôusage.S√©lectionnez Joindre un GIF, puis recherchez ou faites d√©filer le GIF que vous souhaitez joindre.Tapez votre code de validation et confirmez la notification push que vous recevez.

question: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
answer: Was ist starke Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA)?SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem sie Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einf√ºhrt. Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login √ºber zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Wahrscheinlich bist du damit vertraut, zum Login nur dein pers√∂nliches Passwort einzugeben. Um die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abzuschlie√üen, musst du zus√§tzlich deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t oder durch einen SMS-Code best√§tigen.Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, wirst du aufgefordert, deinen Login-Versuch durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t zu best√§tigen. Alternativ kannst du einen SMS-Code anfordern, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich vom verkn√ºpften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass sich der Login-Prozess bei deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t nicht ver√§ndert.Mehr Informationen dar√ºber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?Warum wird Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung eingef√ºhrt?SCA wird im Rahmen der Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie PSD2 eingef√ºhrt, die f√ºr alle europ√§ischen Banken gilt. Mit PSD2 wird die Sicherheit der Daten und Kundenkonten erh√∂ht.Erfahre mehr √ºber PSD2 in unserem Blogpost (neuen Tab).

question: How to find my IBAN or account number?
answer: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001 and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
answer: Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:CASH26 (verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland): Zahle Bargeld √ºber unsere Partnergesch√§fte direkt auf dein Konto ein. MoneyBeam: Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Anschlie√üende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 450 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.Apple Pay oder Google Pay (neuen Tab): Lade Geld auf dein N26 Konto, indem du Apple Pay (f√ºr iOS-Ger√§te) oder GPay (f√ºr Android-Ger√§te) verwendest. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Anschlie√üende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 450 ‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto √ºberweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.SEPA-√úberweisung: Die √úberweisung muss in Euro und innerhalb des SEPA-Raums erfolgen. Daf√ºr brauchst du nur deine IBAN und deinen Namen, wie er auf deinem registrierten Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, eingeben. Bitte beachte auch dabei folgende Punkte:Wenn du per SEPA-√úberweisung Geld auf dein N26 Konto einzahlst, stelle sicher, dass der Empf√§ngername deinem Namen entspricht so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, das du bei der Kontoer√∂ffnung f√ºr deine Verifizierung verwendet hast. (Insbesondere, wenn du ein N26 Business Konto hast - wir akzeptieren keine Firmennamen.)Eine eingehende √úberweisung wird in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeit√ºberweisung get√§tigt wurde, andernfalls ben√∂tigt eine √úberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag bzw. zwei Werktage. Ab 1. Juli 2020 gilt f√ºr eingehende SEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisung ein Limit von 100.000‚Ç¨. F√ºr normale eingehende SEPA-√úberweisungen besteht kein Limit.In Frankreich muss die erste Zahlung auf dein N26 Konto von einem Konto erfolgen, das dir geh√∂rt. (In allen anderen L√§ndern ist es nicht n√∂tig, dass das andere Bankkonto dir geh√∂rt.)6. iDEAL: (nur in den Niederlanden) f√ºr Kunden mit niederl√§ndischen AGB verf√ºgbar und mit einem iDEAL Konto. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Weitere Einzahlungen kosten 1,5 % des eingezahlten Betrags. 7. GiroPay (sofort): Nur in Deutschland verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden, die den deutschen AGB unterliegen und die √ºber ein GiroPay-Konto verf√ºgen.8. EPS (sofort): Nur in √ñsterreich verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden, die den √∂sterreichischen AGB unterliegen und die √ºber ein EPS-Konto verf√ºgen.9. Bancontact (sofort): Nur in Belgien verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden, die den belgischen AGB unterliegen und die √ºber ein Bancontact-Konto verf√ºgen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password? (new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?¬†When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?¬†¬†First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.What if I can‚Äôt remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can‚Äôt receive SMS for other reasons?If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.Why can‚Äôt I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
answer: Verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, D√§nemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz, √ñsterreich, Estland, Griechenland, Lettland, Litauen, Niederlande, Portugal.Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht st√§ndig bei dir tragen.Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterst√ºtzen, sowie in Online-Shops verf√ºgbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die N√§he des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, w√§hle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs per¬†Push-Nachricht¬†auffordern, deine Zahlung zu best√§tigen.So geht's:Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzuf√ºgen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und w√§hle Hinzuf√ºgen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder h√∂her sowie ein NFC-f√§higes Smartphone.Logge dich in die N26 App ein un gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Zu Google Pay hinzuf√ºgen. Du wirst dann zur Google Pay App weitergeleitet. Einige Tipps:Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzuf√ºgst.Falls dein Smartphone mit einer Schutzh√ºlle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise nicht, wenn die Schutzh√ºlle zu dick ist.Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

question: J'ai √©t√© d√©bit√© d'un montant excessif √† la station service
answer:
N26 fonctionne en temps r√©el. Vous recevez ainsi des notifications push vous informant d√®s qu‚Äôune transaction appara√Æt sur votre compte.Lorsque vous effectuez une transaction dans une station essence, il se peut que le montant qui semble √™tre d√©bit√© de votre compte (celui qui appara√Æt dans la notification push) ne corresponde pas au montant affich√© √† la pompe √† essence.¬†
Cela arrive lorsque la station service √©met une empreinte bancaire sur votre carte de d√©bit N26, c'est √† dire qu'elle bloque le montant maximal qu'elle peut d√©livrer (g√©n√©ralement entre 100 et 150 ‚Ç¨) en guise de caution afin de s'assurer que vous disposez bien des fonds sur votre compte pour r√©gler la transaction finale.¬†Cette somme n'est en r√©alit√© pas d√©bit√©e de votre compte m√™me si elle appara√Æt comme telle sur la liste de vos transactions dans l'application N26, o√π elle sera marqu√©e comme √©tant "En attente".¬†La diff√©rence entre l'empreinte et le montant r√©el de la transaction r√©appara√Æt normalement sur votre relev√© bancaire dans les heures qui suivent la transaction (g√©n√©ralement sous 48h). Si la diff√©rence ne vous est pas rembours√©e pass√© ce d√©lai, n'h√©sitez pas √† contacter notre Service Client.Si la transaction √©choue et qu'elle appara√Æt sur la liste de vos transactions dans l'application N26, il s'agit d'une empreinte qui expirera dans un d√©lai de 12 jours maximum. La somme bloqu√©e vous sera alors restitu√©e automatiquement.

question: Was ist N26 Business?
answer: Verf√ºgbar in √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Slowakei Spanien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Es ist aktuell noch nicht m√∂glich, zwischen verschiedenen Konten zu wechseln, daher musst du entscheiden, ob N26 Business das Richtige f√ºr dich ist:Das N26 Business Konto ist f√ºr¬†Selbst√§ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur f√ºr den gesch√§ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt.¬†Du erh√§ltst jeden Monat (0,1 % | 0,5 %) Cashback auf alle mit deiner Karte get√§tigten Zahlungen. Alle w√§hrend des Monats erhaltenen Zahlungsr√ºckerstattungen werden vom Gesamtzahlungsbetrag abgezogen, um den Cashback zu berechnen.¬†Die R√ºckerstattungen beziehen sich m√∂glicherweise auf eine Zahlung im selben oder im Vormonat. Der Vorgang beginnt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis dies auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht m√∂glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu f√ºhren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte f√ºr private Ausgaben ben√∂tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine¬†Maestrocard¬†zu ordern (erh√§ltlich in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden).Der Cashback wird monatlich ausgestellt, die daf√ºr berechtigten Transaktionen eines bestimmten Monats werden im darauffolgenden Monat verarbeitet, beginnend am 15. Tag. Bitte rechne damit, dass es bis zu 7 Tage dauern kann, bis die Cashback-Gutschrift in deinem N26 Business Konto erscheint.Wie beim N26 Bankkonto ist das Konto¬†geb√ºhrenfrei¬†und wir decken bestimmte Bargeldabhebungen im Rahmen unserer¬†Fair Use Policy¬†ab. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Konten sind √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit N26 Business nicht aus der App m√∂glich. Das kannst du √ºber¬†TransferWise (neuen Tab)¬†machen.Firmenlastschriften (Business to Business oder B2B) sind mit dem N26 Business Konto nicht m√∂glich.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: How to apply for an overdraft?
answer:
Available in Germany and AustriaYou can apply for an overdraft only in the N26 mobile app. You‚Äôll know whether you qualify in real-time with no paperwork needed. You can apply for an N26 Overdraft as follows:Login the N26 mobile app.From the Homescreen, tap on the Explore-tab.Scroll down to Financial Products.Swipe to the side and tap on N26 Overdraft and follow the steps shown in the app.There you can also change the limits of your overdraft, view the interest you‚Äôve accumulated or cancel your overdraft at any time. We offer an 10.15% p.a. interest rate deduct the interest from your account at the end of every quarter.When you apply for N26 Overdraft, we look at information on your personal and financial situation. We then decide automatically on your eligibility for N26 Overdraft and the limit
amount we can offer you, based on a mathematical-statistical method and our risk appetite
practiced at each moment in time. In this regard:We take into account several factors and assess the personal data we have about
you to make our decision on your N26 Overdraft application, as better detailed in our
Privacy PolicyIf you want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility or on the limits for
your N26 Overdraft and want to have a human review of this automated decision,
you can get in touch with us by contacting our Customer Support team, either via live
chat through your N26 mobile app, web app or via the N26 Support Center. Kindly
note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered
to your N26 account or from your Secure Inbox in your app.If you decide to activate your N26 Overdraft, we will report this to SCHUFA.Why didn't I get an overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method in order to assess and decide if we can offer you an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time.If you followed the steps above and didn‚Äôt get an overdraft, it means we probably can‚Äôt offer you an overdraft at the moment. The latter might particularly be the case if you have an active garnishment or previously did not fulfil your financial obligations. Making your N26 account your main account (new tab) also has a positive effect on your eligibility.If you live in Germany, when deciding on your N26 Overdraft eligibility and limits we look at
your SCHUFA Score, which can be up to 3 years old. If it‚Äôs older, we will request your most
recent SCHUFA Score after you have gone through our N26 Overdraft application flow. This
might appear on your SCHUFA report, but does not affect your SCHUFA score and will only
be visible to you. In this case, you may not be offered a N26 Overdraft. If you live in Austria,
we look at your CRIF Score.If you can‚Äôt get an overdraft, you can try again at a later point in time. In any case, if you are
not eligible for a N26 Overdraft, we will notify you as soon as you become eligible. If you
want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility, please see above how to get in
touch with us.If you have further questions, please open a live chat directly in the N26 mobile app or your
Online Banking.You can find more information in our Overdraft Terms & Conditions (new tab).Why can‚Äôt I get a higher overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method model in order to determine the amount limit we can offer you for an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time and depends on the personal and financial information we have about you and our risk appetite at each moment in time.We will notify you as soon as we may grant you a higher limit for your N26 Overdraft. If you want to challenge the automated decision on the limit we can offer you, please see above how to get in touch with us. In this case, please reach out to us before accepting the overdraft limit we offered you.Why was my Overdraft limit reduced or cancelled?We routinely review the overdrafts we offer to ensure sustainable overdraft protection for all our customers. This change is not necessarily permanent, and you may be able to request an increase in your overdraft limit in the future. If you need further information, please reach out to our Customer Support Team.Can my overdraft limit change? / Why did my limit get reduced?We routinely review the overdraft limits we offer to ensure adequate protection for our customers. We may reduce or cancel limits if:We make a change to our credit policyYou repeatedly forget to repay your overdraft for more than 90 daysYou repeatedly repay your overdraft lateYour credit score decreases significantlyYou use your overdraft for fraudulent or illegal activityIf changes are implemented that affect you, we will naturally ensure that you are informed.What happens if I cancel my Overdraft whilst having a negative account balance?Your overdraft balance and interest becomes due immediatelyYou lose the ability to borrow money when your account balance is 0To reenable, you will have to apply for overdraft again, reactivation is not always guaranteedAfter cancellation, you will have to repay your overdraft immediately to avoid any additional fees towards N26 caused by delay in repayment. You will also start receiving reminders to top up.¬†Can I request a limit increase?While we don‚Äôt currently offer credit limit increases, we‚Äôre working to make this possible in the future.What can I do if I can‚Äôt pay back the money before the deadline?Limit change does not affect your current outstanding balance. You can continue to pay back the outstanding balance at least once every 90 days, as long as your usage is below your maximum limit.

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).¬†In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†
You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†
What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe‚Äôre sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your complaint and provide our findings and final response via email.¬†Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)French litiges@n26.com (new tab)Spanish reclamaciones.es@n26.com (new tab), or reclamaciones@n26.com (new tab) if you have a German (DE) IBANItalian reclami@n26.com (new tab) or through a certified email message (PEC) to reclami@pec.n26.com (new tab)Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.¬†If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.¬†Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days¬†Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days¬†United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days¬†Spain - 60 Calendar Days¬†Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties, such as:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.

question: Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ ist?
answer: Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, kann dein Kontostand negativ sein, solange du dich innerhalb deines √úberziehungsrahmen bewegst.Ansonsten kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn N26-Geb√ºhren zu bezahlen sind wie z.B. f√ºr unsere Express-Lieferung oder unsere Premium-Mitgliedschaften.¬†Au√üerdem kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn Offline-Kartenzahlungen eingehen und abgebucht werden m√ºssen. Dies sind z.B. Zahlungen auf Flugzeugen oder Schiffen, die zum Zeitpunkt der Zahlungsautorisierung nicht deinem Kontostand gegen√ºbergestellt werden k√∂nnen, aber trotzdem abgebucht werden m√ºssen.¬†Gem√§√ü unserer AGB hast du dich verpflichtet, dein Konto auszugleichen. Du erh√§ltst eine Erinnerung per E-Mail und wir bitten dich, dein Konto so schnell wie m√∂glich auszugleichen. Solange dein Kontostand negativ ist, kannst du keine weiteren Zahlungen oder Abhebungen t√§tigen.Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ bleibt?Dein Konto bleibt weitere 60 Tage aktiv, nachdem es negativ geworden ist. In diesem Zeitraum:Bekommst du zwei Erinnerungen.Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, wird dieser nach der zweiten Erinnerung gek√ºndigt und du musst den Betrag sofort zur√ºckzahlen (oder du kannst einen R√ºckzahlungsplan beantragen).Wenn du ein N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You Konto hast, werden alle Leistungen nach 60 Tagen gek√ºndigt und dein Konto in ein Standardkonto umgewandelt.Wenn du nach diesen 60 Tagen nicht handelst, kann dein Konto geschlossen werden.

question: Was tun bei einer Kontopf√§ndung?
answer:
Dein Konto wurde aufgrund eines Pf√§ndungsbeschlusses gesperrt? In diesem Artikel erf√§hrst du, was du bei einer Kontopf√§ndung tun kannst, um deine ausstehenden Schulden zu begleichen und dein Konto zu entsperren. Lies dir bitte als Erstes die Nachricht, die wir dir unter ‚ÄúNachrichten von N26‚Äù in deiner N26 App geschickt haben, sorgf√§ltig durch. Danach hast du drei Optionen:Option 1: Begleiche die Forderung von deinem N26 KontoSofern du genug Guthaben auf deinem N26 Konto hast, kannst du den Pf√§ndungsbetrag mit einem √úberweisungsauftrag bezahlen. Bitte beachte, dass der √úberweisungsauftrag auch alle Zinsen und Geb√ºhren abdecken muss, die mit der Pf√§ndung einhergehen. Nur dann k√∂nnen wir dein Konto freischalten.¬†So gehst du vor:Lade das Formular f√ºr den √úberweisungsauftrag (neuen Tab) herunterDrucke das Formular aus¬†F√ºlle den √úberweisungsauftrag vollst√§ndig aus und unterschreibe ihn¬†Sende uns einen Scan oder ein Foto per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab). Nutze daf√ºr bitte deine bei uns hinterlegte E-Mail-Adresse.Du kannst uns die Kopie auch direkt von deinem Postfach ‚ÄúNachrichten von N26‚Äù als Antwort auf unsere urspr√ºngliche Nachricht schicken. Bitte beachte, dass der Anhang in deinem Postfach nicht gr√∂√üer als 25 MB sein darf.Deine Nachrichten werden bei der √úbertragung sicher verschl√ºsselt. Falls du uns das Formular dennoch lieber per Post schicken willst, kannst du die folgende Adresse nutzen:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 BerlinDie Bearbeitung des √úberweisungsauftrags kann etwa 5 Werktage dauern. Um die Bearbeitungszeit nicht unn√∂tig zu verl√§ngern, sieh bitte von einer Kontaktaufnahme bez√ºglich des aktuellen Bearbeitungsstatus ab. Sobald du wieder frei √ºber dein Konto verf√ºgen kannst, informieren wir dich mit einer Nachricht an dein Postfach ‚ÄúNachrichten von N26‚Äù.Option 2: Begleiche die Forderung von einem anderen BankkontoDu hast nicht genug Guthaben auf deinem N26 Girokonto, um die Forderungen aus der Pf√§ndung zu begleichen und dein Konto freizuschalten? Nat√ºrlich kannst du die Forderung nach R√ºcksprache mit deinem Gl√§ubiger auch von einem anderen Bankkonto ausgleichen. Dein Gl√§ubiger muss uns nach √úberweisungseingang dar√ºber informieren, dass die Pf√§ndung aufgehoben wurde. Er kann uns entweder per Fax unter (030) 364 285 089 oder per Post an die folgende Adresse informieren:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 BerlinBitte beachte:Wir akzeptieren und bearbeiten f√ºr die Pf√§ndungsaufhebung ausschlie√ülich Informationen, die wir direkt von deinem Gl√§ubiger erhalten. Informationen oder Unterlagen von dir k√∂nnen wir leider nicht akzeptieren.Wenn du uns etwas zu deiner Pf√§ndung mitteilen m√∂chtest, kannst du uns eine Nachricht von deinem Postfach ‚ÄúNachrichten von N26‚Äù schicken. Bitte sieh jedoch davon ab, uns weitere Informationen zu schicken, um die Bearbeitungszeit nicht unn√∂tig zu verl√§ngern.Falls dein Konto trotz der Zahlung noch immer gesperrt ist, kann das zwei Gr√ºnde haben: der Gl√§ubiger hat uns die n√∂tigen Unterlagen noch nicht zugeschickt oder die Bearbeitungsfrist von etwa 5 Werktagen ist noch nicht verstrichen.Falls du dich mit dem Gl√§ubiger auf eine Ratenzahlung einigst und er uns eine sogenannte Ruhendstellung schickt, ist diese leider nicht ausreichend, um dein Konto zu entsperren.Option 3: Wandle dein Konto in ein P-Konto umDu fragst dich, was du bei einer Kontopf√§ndung noch tun kannst? Es gibt eine dritte Option: die Umwandlung deines Kontos in ein sogenanntes P-Konto. Dabei handelt es sich um ein Pf√§ndungsschutzkonto ‚Äì ein normales Girokonto, auf dem ein bestimmter Monatsbetrag von einer Pf√§ndung unber√ºhrt bleibt und √ºber den du frei verf√ºgen kannst.Bitte beachte, dass die Beantragung und F√ºhrung eines Pf√§ndungsschutzkontos der Schufa AG gemeldet wird. Einen eventuell bestehenden Dispositionskredit oder anderen Kredit m√ºssen wir in diesem Falle k√ºndigen. Wie du ein P-Konto beantragen kannst und worauf du dabei noch achten solltest, erf√§hrst du hier (neuen Tab).¬†Kontopf√§ndung: Was tun wir?¬†Solltest du innerhalb der n√§chsten 4 Wochen keine der oben genannten Optionen nutzen, sind wir bei einer Pf√§ndung verpflichtet, jedes eventuell noch bestehende Guthaben auf deinem Konto bis zur Forderungsh√∂he an deinen Gl√§ubiger auszuzahlen. Danach k√∂nnen wir dein Konto wieder freischalten.

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees¬†is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),¬†then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you‚Äôll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.¬†Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.¬†

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‚Äòowner‚Äô or the person who created the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‚Äòvisible‚Äô to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner‚Äôs contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô add participant flow.You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‚Äòlearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚Äòinvite new member‚Äô button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the ‚Äúlegal screen‚Äù so be sure to read all the information within the ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C‚Äôs then tap ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô button.Tap ‚ÄòSend invite‚Äô on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‚Äòsend invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don‚Äôt recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?¬†Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.¬†¬†N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant‚Äôs part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn‚Äôt receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26¬†You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.¬†Go to the ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute¬†Tap ‚ÄòGet help with this transaction‚Äô and follow the steps provided.¬†Important:¬†If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you‚Äôll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You‚Äôll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.¬†¬†If you select a transaction but the ‚ÄòGet help‚Äô button doesn‚Äôt appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you‚Äôll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you‚Äôve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you‚Äôll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we‚Äôve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: Wie √§ndere ich meine Kartenlimits?
answer: Deine Limits f√ºr Kartenzahlungen und Abhebungen kannst du in der mobilen N26 App oder in deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab) einstellen. question: What's a garnishment and what can I do in Spain?
answer: What is a garnishment?A garnishment is an order coming from a Court or from Public entities, directed to seize the funds from the customer's account to satisfy a debt owed by a debtor (customer) to a creditor. As a consequence, N26 has the legal obligation to retain the balances in your account to be later transferred to the creditor (public entity or to the account specified by the court).Creditors can be the Tax Office, the Social Security or any public administration office and the Courts as a result of a judicial process.When we block the balance in your account as a result of the garnishment, you will receive a message in your secure inbox with the following information:Creditor¬†Garnishment number¬†Balance to be garnished¬†Balance withheldWhat can I do in this situation?We recommend that you contact the creditor in the first instance in order to reach a payment agreement or to have the garnishment lifted if they consider it appropriate. N26 cannot take any action in this regard as we are legally obligated to apply the funds‚Äô seizure and transfer it if we do not receive a release order within the time determined by law.Salary and state‚Äôs aid protectionIf you receive your salary in your N26 account, a special protection must be applied over a certain percentage depending on your income. However, you will have to report this situation to the creditor who will notify N26 about the lifting of the corresponding balances.How long does it take for N26 to transfer the seized funds to the creditor?The transfer of the funds is executed at different times depending on the type of creditor who has ordered the garnishment. Normally it is 20 days (Courts or Spanish Tax Office) and 10 days for liens coming from Social Security. The amount will be transferred directly to the entity or the court that issued the order. These funds cannot be transferred to third parties or the debtor in any case (the only exception is if the garnishment is lifted before the payout time frame).

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They‚Äôre able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that‚Äôs growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you‚Äôve received an unexpected message:If you‚Äôve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you‚Äôve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you‚Äôre ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We‚Äôre always here to help!

question: How to top up my account?
answer: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000‚Ç¨ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of ‚Ç¨ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard‚Äôs exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn‚Äôt charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard‚Äôs rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it‚Äîthis can be done at any time (see below). We‚Äôll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn‚Äôt affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you‚Äôll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month‚Äôs time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you‚Äôll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you‚Äôve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven‚Äôt received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you‚Äôve proved your identity, we‚Äôll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you‚Äôve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee.¬†You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, we‚Äôll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

question: Pubblico personalizzato
answer: Trattamento dei dati nell'ambito di Facebook Custom AudiencesCustom Audiences ci consente di creare segmenti di ‚Äúpubblico personalizzato‚Äù e ‚Äúpubblico simile‚Äù. Il ‚Äúpubblico personalizzato‚Äù √® composto da clienti N26 e utenti Internet, per la visualizzazione di contenuti personalizzati, o di soli utenti Internet, cos√¨ da escludere gli utenti che sono clienti N26 da alcuni dei nostri annunci. Il ‚Äúpubblico simile‚Äù ci consente di definire un gruppo target pertinente per il quale gli annunci pubblicitari visualizzati siano di maggiore interesse rispetto ad altri utenti di Facebook. Il cosiddetto "pubblico simile" assomiglia di pi√π ai nostri clienti rispetto all'utente medio di Facebook. Le finalit√† di utilizzo della funzionalit√† sono quelle di non mostrare annunci non pertinenti agli utenti che sono gi√† clienti N26. Per beneficiare di quanto descritto sopra, forniamo a Facebook una versione con hash dell'indirizzo e-mail N26. Il cosiddetto "hashing" √® una forma di pseudonimizzazione che crittografa l'indirizzo e-mail in modo che non sia pi√π possibile utilizzarlo per identificare gli utenti. Facebook abbina il suddetto indirizzo e-mail al potenziale indirizzo e-mail di Facebook. Dopo la fase di abbinamento, indipendentemente dall'esito, tutti gli indirizzi e-mail con hash vengono eliminati da Facebook entro 6-8 ore. Facebook non condivide questi dati con terze parti o con altri inserzionisti, n√© concede loro accesso a tali dati. Sono disponibili ulteriori informazioni nella nuova scheda Facebook Custom Audiences (nuova tabella). Facebook Ireland Limited trasferisce i dati a Facebook Inc., USA. Ai sensi del Regolamento UE 2016/679 ("GDPR"), gli USA sono classificati come Paese sprovvisto di un livello adeguato di protezione dei dati personali; ci√≤ implica, tra l'altro, la possibilit√† per le agenzie governative statunitensi di accedere ai dati dell'utente senza che siano disponibili contromisure efficaci.√à possibile revocare il proprio consenso al trattamento dei dati ai sensi dell'art. 6 comma 1 lett. a del GDPR in qualsiasi momento, tramite l'app Web e l'app N26. Elaborazione dei dati nell'ambito di Google Customer MatchCustomer Match ci consente di creare segmenti di ‚Äúpubblico personalizzato‚Äù e ‚Äúpubblico simile‚Äù. Il ‚Äúpubblico personalizzato‚Äù √® costituito da clienti N26 e utenti Internet per visualizzare contenuti personalizzati, o da soli utenti Internet per escludere gli attuali clienti N26 da alcuni dei nostri annunci nella rete di ricerca di Google, nella scheda Shopping, Gmail, YouTube e Google Display Network in quanto non vogliamo mostrare loro annunci pubblicitari irrilevanti. Il ‚Äúpubblico simile‚Äù ci consente di definire un gruppo target pertinente per il quale gli annunci pubblicitari visualizzati siano di maggiore interesse rispetto ad altri utenti di Google. Il cosiddetto "pubblico simile" assomiglia di pi√π ai nostri clienti rispetto all'utente medio di Google.Per beneficiare di quanto sopra, forniamo a Google una versione con hash dell'indirizzo e-mail N26. Il cosiddetto "hashing" √® una forma di pseudonimizzazione che crittografa l'indirizzo e-mail in modo che non sia pi√π possibile utilizzarlo per identificare gli utenti. Google abbina il suddetto indirizzo e-mail al potenziale indirizzo e-mail dell'account Google. Se l'indirizzo e-mail non corrisponde, Google pu√≤ comunque utilizzarlo come parte di un controllo di conformit√† alle norme, ma non potr√† utilizzarlo in altro modo per Customer Match o qualsiasi altro prodotto Google. I dati vengono conservati da Google per non pi√π di 48 ore al fine di creare i segmenti di pubblico di Customer Match e, una volta decorso tale termine, vengono tempestivamente cancellati Google non condivide questi dati con terze parti o con altri inserzionisti, n√© concede accesso a tali dati. Per maggiori informazioni, consultare l'articolo di supporto nella nuova scheda How Google uses Customer Match data (nuova tabella).Google Ireland Limited trasferisce i dati a Google LLC, USA. Ai sensi del Regolamento UE 2016/679 ("GDPR"), gli USA sono classificati come Paese sprovvisto di un livello adeguato di protezione dei dati personali; ci√≤ implica, tra l'altro, la possibilit√† per le agenzie governative statunitensi di accedere ai dati dell'utente senza che siano disponibili contromisure efficaci.√à possibile revocare il proprio consenso al trattamento dei dati ai sensi dell'art. 6 comma 1 lett. a del GDPR in qualsiasi momento, tramite l'app Web e l'app N26.

question: Quanto costa un conto N26?
answer: Il conto N26 √® gratuito.*A seconda della regione, potrebbero essere applicati costi aggiuntivi:Prezzi in Germania (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Austria (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Francia (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Spagna (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Italia (nuova tabella)Prezzi nel resto d‚ÄôEuropa (nuova tabella)*Se soddisfi i nostri¬†requisiti minimi (nuova tabella). Se non possiamo offrirti un conto N26, potresti aprire un conto¬†N26 Flex.

question: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
answer: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.‚ÄùAll of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

question: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Coordinate bancarie: certificato di titolarit√† di conto corrente
answer: Che cos'√® il certificato di titolarit√† di conto corrente?Un certificato di titolarit√† di conto corrente, noto anche come attestazione bancaria o conferma del conto, √® un documento che dichiara che il tuo conto √® registrato a tuo nome. Questa dichiarazione contiene tutte le tue coordinate bancarie, ovvero il tuo nome e cognome, la data di nascita, l'IBAN del tuo conto e la data in cui hai creato il conto.Come opzione, puoi richiedere di visualizzare il saldo del tuo conto corrente e il numero delle tue carte attive, che saranno parzialmente nascosti da asterischi, per ovvie ragioni di sicurezza.Come richiedere il certificato di titolarit√† di conto corrente?Da N26 Web: clicca sull'icona di download (nuova tabella)* e seleziona Scarica informazioni bancarie. Il PDF viene creato automaticamente.Per richiedere il certificato di titolarit√† con il saldo e il numero della carta: clicca sull'icona di download (nuova tabella)* sotto Conferma del conto, seleziona se vuoi aggiungere il tuo saldo attuale e/o il numero delle tue carte attive e clicca su Richiedi. Riceverai il PDF nella sezione Messaggi di N26 entro 24 ore.* L'icona di download √® il quadrato con una freccia che punta verso il basso, posizionato a sinistra del pulsante 'Trasferire denaro sul conto'.
