question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand¬†N26 Insurance¬†allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù banner you find.¬†You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.¬†How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.¬†Am I eligible?¬†N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can‚Äôt sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around ‚Ç¨2. For the time being, we‚Äôre unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here‚Äôs a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:¬†AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could‚Äôve been charged an ATM fee.

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees¬†is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),¬†then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you‚Äôll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: Wie kann ich Feedback geben oder ein neues Produkt vorschlagen?
answer: Wir bei N26 m√∂chten Banking einfach, transparent und flexibel machen. Deshalb freuen wir uns jederzeit √ºber Kundenfeedback, um N26 weiterzuentwickeln. Du vermisst ein bestimmtes Feature in der App und fragst dich ‚ÄúWie kann ich Feedback geben‚Äù? Schreib uns einfach eine E-Mail an ideas@n26.com (neuen Tab)! √úber diese Adresse sammeln wir alle Verbesserungsvorschl√§ge, Ideen und W√ºnsche.Je nach Nachfrage ber√ºcksichtigen wir deine Vorschl√§ge in der Produktentwicklung. In der Vergangenheit haben wir auf diese Weise schon einige neue Features eingef√ºhrt ‚Äì Feedback geben lohnt sich also!¬†√úbrigens f√ºhren wir regelm√§√üige Umfragen durch, an denen du anonym teilnehmen kannst. Und solltest du mal unzufrieden sein, kannst du uns auch eine Beschwerde schicken. Ganz gleich, wie du Feedback geben willst ‚Äì wir sind dankbar, dass du dir die Zeit nimmst!¬†¬†

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Security.Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: Why isn't my video verification working?

question: Wie lange dauert eine √úberweisung?
answer: Eingehende SEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisungen auf N26 Konten erfolgen in Echtzeit, solange sie von einer Bank stammen, die Echtzeit√ºberweisungen unterst√ºtzt. √úberweisungen k√∂nnen jedoch manchmal verz√∂gert werden, wenn sie aufgrund von SEPA-Banking-Vorschriften √ºberpr√ºft werden m√ºssen.Gew√∂hnliche SEPA-√úberweisungen gehen innerhalb von h√∂chstens zwei Werktagen ein. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Zeitrahmen auf maximal drei¬†Werktage verl√§ngert, wenn die √úberweisung kurz vor einem Wochenende oder Feiertag vorgenommen wird.Eingehende SWIFT-√úberweisungen dauern bis zu vier Werktage, bis sie eintreffen.Ausgehende SEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisungen erfolgen in Echtzeit. Gew√∂hnliche ausgehende SEPA-√úberweisungen dauern bis zu zwei Werktage. Ausgehende √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit unserem Partner Wise dauern bis zu vier Werktage. Ausgehende SWIFT-√úberweisungen werden nicht unterst√ºtzt.Was ist ein "Bankarbeitstag"?Ein Bankarbeitstag entspricht aufgrund der √ñffnungszeiten der beteiligten Banken zwei Werktagen. Jeder Tag unter der Woche, der kein Feiertag ist, gilt als Werktag.Warum ist meine √úberweisung nicht angekommen?Was passiert, wenn alles Obenstehende ber√ºcksichtigt wurde und die √úberweisung immer noch nicht ausgef√ºhrt wurde? In solchen F√§llen kann nur die auftraggebende Bank eine interne Nachforschung einleiten.Leider k√∂nnen wir bei N26 keine eingehenden √úberweisungen untersuchen, nur ausgehende √úberweisungen. Dessen ungeachtet findest du hier eine Liste der m√∂glichen Gr√ºnde, warum eine √úberweisung fehlschlagen k√∂nnte.Weitere InformationenAll unsere SEPA-√úberweisungen werden √ºber ein System namens TARGET2 (neuen Tab) abgewickelt. Dieses System bearbeitet Bankzahlungen werktags von 7:00 Uhr bis 18:00 Uhr europ√§ischer Standardzeit. An den folgenden Tagen macht TARGET2 Urlaub: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. Dezember (1. Weihnachtsfeiertag) und 26. Dezember (2. Weihnachtsfeiertag).

question: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?

question: CRS - La raz√≥n por la que pedimos cierta informaci√≥n a nuestros clientes
answer: N26, al igual que toda instituci√≥n financiera, est√° obligado a remitir informaci√≥n a las Administraciones Tributarias sobre cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de los residentes fiscales en otro pa√≠s.La¬†Normativa CRS¬†(Common Reporting Standard o Est√°ndar Com√∫n de Reporte) es un sistema de intercambio autom√°tico de informaci√≥n tributaria entre los pa√≠ses adheridos, elaborado por la OCDE (Organizaci√≥n para la Cooperaci√≥n y el Desarrollo Econ√≥micos).Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:¬øEn qu√© pa√≠s o pa√≠ses declaras impuestos?¬†¬†Tienes tu residencia fiscal en un pa√≠s extranjero y por lo tanto declaras impuestos en este pa√≠s, donde tienes tu residencia personal. Si vives en m√°s de un pa√≠s, hay reglas para la determinaci√≥n de la residencia incluidas en los convenios fiscales y las leyes tributarias del pa√≠s relevante, que nos ayudar√°n a determinar tu residencia fiscal. Puede que hayas tenido tu residencia fiscal en m√°s de un pa√≠s a lo largo de un a√±o, en ese caso, vamos a necesitar conocer tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal de cada uno de estos pa√≠ses para poder enviar tu informaci√≥n a las autoridades correspondientes.¬†2. ¬øCu√°l es tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal (TIN) de cada pa√≠s?La emisi√≥n y el formato del N√∫mero de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal (TIN) depende cada pa√≠s. En los pa√≠ses de la Uni√≥n Europea, la Comisi√≥n Europea ha publicado una gu√≠a con los documentos de cada pa√≠s (pesta√±a nueva), lo que puede ayudarte a identificar cu√°l es el tuyo.¬†En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaci√≥n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesi√≥n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuraci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaci√≥n.¬†¬†

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

Wenn du ein Android-Ger√§t verwendest, tippe einfach auf den Namen des Teilnehmers.Tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf dem n√§chsten Bildschirm und tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".So trittst du einem Shared Space bei:Tippe in der Spaces-√úbersicht auf "ausstehend" und das Shared Spaces Symbol.Lies dir die Aufkl√§rung zu Shared Spaces durch und gehe zur n√§chsten Seite √ºber Kontovollmachten.Sieh dir die Informationen zur Kontovollmacht (die rechtliche √úbersicht) an. Sobald du die AGB durchgelesen und verstanden hast, tippe auf das K√§stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.Best√§tige auf deinem verkn√ºpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Kontovollmacht akzeptieren".Du brauchst gen√ºgend freie Spaces, um eine Einladung zu einem Shared Space annehmen zu k√∂nnen. Sonst kannst du nur weitermachen, wenn du einen anderen Space l√∂schst.Es ist auch nicht m√∂glich, einen Space mit demselben Namen oder Bild wie dem des Shared Spaces zu verwenden. Du kannst Einladungen nur annehmen, wenn du den Namen oder das Bild des anderen Spaces √§nderst.So verl√§sst du einen Space:Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.Tippe in den Einstellungen auf "Shared Space verlassen".Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf der n√§chsten Seite und tippe auf "Space verlassen":Shared Spaces lassen sich durch die N26 App oder WebApp erstellen und bearbeiten.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it‚Äîyou can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you‚Äôve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‚ÄòCards‚Äô from the bottom right-handTap ‚ÄòCard Settings‚Äô and select the relevant cardSelect ‚ÄòReset PIN‚ÄôEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction‚Äîin a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences‚Äîsuch as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn‚Äôt accepted, simply try again a different combination.¬†If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you‚Äôve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: What to do if my card is lost or it‚Äôs been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.¬†Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).¬†You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?

question: Pourquoi mon compte est-il temporairement bloqu√© ?
answer: Conform√©ment √† la r√©glementation bancaire europ√©enne, N26 doit effectuer des contr√¥les de routine sur les transactions afin d‚Äôassurer la s√©curit√© des comptes de clients. En tant qu‚Äôinstitution r√©glement√©e, cela nous permet de prot√©ger les fonds de votre compte N26.G√©n√©ralement, ces contr√¥les sont effectu√©s tr√®s rapidement, sans m√™me que vous vous en aperceviez. Parfois, cela peut prendre plus de temps et votre compte peut alors √™tre temporairement indisponible.Ce processus est supervis√© par une √©quipe sp√©cialis√©e dans la conduite de contr√¥les de cette nature, qui travaille assid√ªment pour limiter les d√©sagr√©ments. Pour cette raison, notre Service Client N26 n‚Äôest pas en mesure de fournir des informations suppl√©mentaires concernant votre compte sur le Livechat, ni d‚Äôacc√©l√©rer la proc√©dure.Veuillez faire preuve de patience pendant que nous effectuons ces d√©marches. Notre √©quipe vous contactera d√®s la fin de la proc√©dure de contr√¥le.

question: How to create a Shared Space?

To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Quanto tempo occorre per inviare denaro con Wise?
answer:
Una volta creato un trasferimento Wise, visualizzerai la data stimata per il trasferimento. Prima di inviare il bonifico, assicurati sempre che i dati del beneficiario siano corretti.Se il trasferimento Wise non va a buon fine, ti invieremo un messaggio push al riguardo. L‚Äôimporto ritorner√† sul tuo conto pochi giorni dopo.Non √® possibile annullare personalmente un bonifico, ma se avrai bisogno di farlo potrai metterti in contatto con il supporto Wise, che lo far√† per te. Tieni presente che il trasferimento pu√≤ essere annullato solo fino a quando Wise non ha movimentato i tuoi fondi. Una volta che il denaro √® stato inviato al destinatario, non √® pi√π possibile cancellare il bonifico.
 
I dettagli del destinatario possono essere modificati solo prima che Wise elabori il tuo bonifico e trasferisca il denaro. Dopo che i tuoi soldi sono stati spostati, i dettagli del destinatario non possono pi√π essere modificati. Se avessi bisogno di assistenza, ti consigliamo di metterti in contatto con il supporto di Wise.Wise non addebita alcuna commissione extra in caso di pagamento restituito e nemmeno noi. Tuttavia, alcune banche partecipanti addebitano commissioni, nel qual caso Wise detrarr√† tale importo dal denaro restituito conformemente alle relative¬†Condizioni di utilizzo (nuova tabella).Ragioni comuni del mancato trasferimento:Errore nei dettagli del trasferimento (ad es. quando si inseriscono il nome del destinatario o le informazioni del conto).Caratteri speciali o troppi caratteri nel nome del destinatario o nel campo di riferimento.Limiti raggiunti o pagamenti online non attivi nelle impostazioni della carta.Non sono possibili trasferimenti in valuta estera con il conto N26 Business or N26 Business You o se il destinatario √® un conto business.

question: Wie kann ich mein Konto sch√ºtzen?

Falls du jemals den Verdacht hast, dass deine N26 Login-Daten nicht mehr sicher sind oder dass jemand einen Chat in deinem Namen er√∂ffnet, ist es √§u√üerst wichtig, dass du sofort dein N26 Anmeldepasswort √§nderst. Logge dich daf√ºr in die App ein und gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort √§ndern. Mehr Informationen dar√ºber, wie du deine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen kannst, findest du in unserem Artikel ‚ÄúWie kann ich meine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen?‚Äù.Wenn du glaubst, dass dein Konto in irgendeiner Form gef√§hrdet ist oder unerlaubte √Ñnderungen vorgenommen wurden, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‚ÄòForgot Password‚Äô to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
answer: Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gem√§√ü FATCA verpflichtet, dem ‚ÄúInternal Revenue Service‚Äù (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen gef√ºhrt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rige ausl√§ndische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden.¬†Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier. (neuen Tab)Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger unter anderem so definiert:Staatsangeh√∂riger der USA (auch bei doppelter Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit)Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer g√ºltigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù erf√ºllt (siehe unten).Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù bedeutet:Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.ODERDu warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.Dar√ºber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enth√§lt:US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USAGeburtsort in den USAPostanschrift oder Postfach in den USAUS-amerikanische RufnummerDauerauftr√§ge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wirdF√ºr den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US Staatsangeh√∂rigen anzusehen:Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine √§hnliche Eigenerkl√§rung undeinen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Nationalit√§t eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der Best√§tigung √ºber den Verlust deiner Staatsb√ºrgerschaft.

question: Que faire si j‚Äôai perdu ma carte ou si les donn√©es de ma carte ont √©t√© compromises ?
answer: Si vous avez perdu votre carte ou si vous pensez que vos donn√©es ont √©t√© compromises, vous pouvez la verrouiller et la d√©verrouiller √† tout moment depuis l'application N26.Verrouillez la carte temporairement ou d√©sactivez-la d√©finitivement en recommandant une nouvelle carte dans l'application N26 ou l'espace client en ligne (nouvel onglet).Si vos donn√©es ont √©t√© compromises, veuillez suivre les √©tapes suivantes :Acc√©dez √† l‚Äôonglet "Cartes"Faites d√©filer vers la droite avec votre doigt jusqu'√† ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez d√©sactiver ou verrouiller temporairement.S√©lectionnez "Param√®tres de la carte"Enfin, si vous souhaitez bloquer d√©finitivement votre carte, s√©lectionnez "Commander une nouvelle carte".De cette fa√ßon, vous avez le contr√¥le total de votre carte et vous pouvez vous prot√©ger contre les transactions non-autoris√©es.Si vous avez le moindre soup√ßon, vous devez imm√©diatement verrouiller votre carte. Vous pourrez toujours la d√©verrouiller par la suite.

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?¬†N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Warum ist der Zugriff auf mein Konto vor√ºbergehend gesperrt?
answer: Gem√§√ü den europ√§ischen Bankvorschriften muss N26 routinem√§√üige technische √úberpr√ºfungen von Kundenkonten durchf√ºhren. Als reguliertes Institut k√∂nnen wir so sicherzustellen, dass das Geld auf deinem N26 Konto sicher und gesch√ºtzt bleibt.In den meisten F√§llen erfolgen diese Pr√ºfungen innerhalb k√ºrzester Zeit, ohne dass du davon etwas mitbekommst. Gelegentlich kann dies aber auch l√§nger dauern, sodass du vor√ºbergehend keinen Zugriff auf dein Konto hast.Dieser Prozess wird von einem eigens daf√ºr zust√§ndigen Team √ºberwacht, das auf die Durchf√ºhrung solcher technischen √úberpr√ºfungen spezialisiert ist und alles daran setzt, Unterbrechungen m√∂glichst kurz zu halten. Aus diesem Grund ist es unserem Kundenservice-Team von N26 nicht m√∂glich, weitere Ausk√ºnfte zu deinem Konto per Live-Chat zu erteilen oder den Vorgang zu beschleunigen.Wir bitten dich um etwas Geduld, w√§hrend wir den Vorgang abschlie√üen. Unser Team wird sich bei dir melden, sobald der technische √úberpr√ºfungsprozess abgeschlossen ist.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10‚Ç¨).¬†Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0‚Ç¨ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: Relazione informativa CRR
answer: Di cosa si tratta?La Direttiva sui requisiti patrimoniali (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) √® una direttiva UE. Tra le altre cose, stabilisce l'obbligo per gli istituti di credito di pubblicare una relazione informativa su base annuale (art. 433 del CRR).Perch√© la relazione informativa non √® stata pubblicata nel nostro Support Center o su qualche altra pagina del sito web?N26 Bank GmbH non √® obbligata a pubblicare la relazione CRR sul proprio sito web. L'art. 434 del CRR (nuova tabella) prevede che la pubblicazione avvenga esclusivamente su un "mezzo di comunicazione appropriato", delegando dunque la decisione a ciascun istituto di credito.N26 Bank GmbH pubblica il suo CRR su www.bundesanzeiger.de (nuova tabella).

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death?¬†In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased‚Äôs bank accounts.¬†The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: servizio.successioni@n26.comPEC: successioni@pec.n26.com¬†Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana¬† -Servizio Successioni-
Via Filippo Sassetti 32¬†- 20124 Milano (MI), ITALIAN26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana¬†
c/o N26 Bank AG¬†-Servizio Successioni-
Klosterstr. 62¬†- 10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on:¬†Who is the deceased?¬†If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account.¬†How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.¬† A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?¬†If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance or establishment of an¬† inventory) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.¬†We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.¬†Please refrain from sending us original documents via post at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you.¬†What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?¬†¬†Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.¬†However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH, Succursale Italiana is located in Italy.¬†As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be disabled. As well as any regular payments such as standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates will not be executed anymore.Further, please be aware we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax of the assets belonging to the estate. It might be necessary to complete a certain set of questions in order to release assets with N26.We recommend getting in touch with the relevant tax authorities in your country, in order to fulfil local tax requirements (if any).¬†We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased‚Äôs account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?¬†There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.¬†Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.¬†For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.¬†

question: Wie lade ich Freunde zu N26 ein?
answer: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald du dein Konto vollst√§ndig er√∂ffnet hast. question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: Comment partager les d√©penses avec MoneyBeam ?

La fonctionnalit√© sera disponible pour Android dans les prochaines semaines.Partagez la note √† plusieursGr√¢ce √† notre derni√®re fonctionnalit√© ¬´ Partagez la note √† plusieurs ¬ª, vous pouvez facilement partager les d√©penses entre amis et membres de la famille depuis votre application N26. Qu‚Äôil s‚Äôagisse de partager l‚Äôaddition au restaurant ou de participer √† un cadeau d‚Äôanniversaire, vous pouvez l‚Äôutiliser pour tout achat partag√© avec d‚Äôautres personnes. Vous pouvez partager les d√©penses avec n‚Äôimporte qui, qu‚Äôil soit ou non client N26.Comment utiliser ¬´ Partagez la note √† plusieurs ¬ªVous devez d‚Äôabord effectuer un achat avec votre carte N26. question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.¬†Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.¬†
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Pourquoi je ne peux pas acc√©der √† certains services ou produits ?
answer: Nous collaborons avec diff√©rents partenaires afin de proposer des services financiers innovants suppl√©mentaires. Certains de nos partenaires, tout comme N26, doivent v√©rifier votre identit√©, c‚Äôest pourquoi nous leur fournissons les informations √† notre disposition concernant votre identit√©, √† condition que vous nous ayez pr√©alablement donn√© votre accord.Voici les raisons les plus fr√©quentes pour lesquelles vous ne pouvez pas acc√©der √† certains produits ou fonctionnalit√©s :Vos documents d‚Äôidentit√© ont expir√© ou ne sont pas accept√©s (c‚Äôest par exemple le cas pour certains passeports qui ne disposent pas de tous les √©l√©ments de s√©curit√© n√©cessaires).Vous √™tes¬†imposable (nouvel onglet)¬†aux Etats-Unis. Dans ce cas l√† vous ne pourrez pas utiliser nos produits d‚Äôinvestissement ou d‚Äô√©pargne. Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas imposable aux Etats-Unis, il est possible que vous deviez changer votre num√©ro de t√©l√©phone s‚Äôil commence par le code pays nord-am√©ricain (+1). Si le probl√®me persiste, veuillez contacter notre Service Client depuis le Livechat de votre application afin que nous puissions vous aider.Le produit ou service en question n'est pas encore disponible dans votre pays.

question: ¬øC√≥mo recibir mensajes push?
answer: Te mandamos mensajes push para finalizar transferencias (como por ejemplo¬†MoneyBeam) o para confirmar servicios (como¬†CASH26). Si no est√°s recibiendo estos mensajes, primero verifica que las notificaciones est√°n activadas tanto en tu m√≥vil como en la app. Despu√©s prueba nuestras soluciones dependiendo del tel√©fono que tengas:iOSElimina la aplicaci√≥n y reinicia tu smartphone. question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: Only available to customers who have opened their account in Italy with a German (DE) IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks, giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note, interest rates are dependent on the credit risk assessment made by N26. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual Interest Rate: From 7.99% to 13.99% (credit risk scoring dependent)Eligible Purchase Amount: From ‚Ç¨20 - ‚Ç¨200N26 Installments Duration: The N26 Installments duration is from 3 to 6 months, with the first installment taken out immediately after confirmation and the option of early loan repayment (the interest rate is charged monthly).Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment How to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‚ÄòExplore‚Äô tab and tap on 'N26 Installments' under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‚ÄòOptions‚Äô (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚ÄôWhen you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using N26 Installments:First you will be provided with information about N26 InstallmentsThen you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept all checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you‚Äôll be credited an amount equal to the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We‚Äôll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you‚Äôll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your loan with N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in full

question: ¬øC√≥mo dividir gastos compartidos con MoneyBeam?
answer: Elegibilidad: todos los mercados de la UE, disponible para iOS. question: What does the court ruling BGH XI ZR 26/20 mean for N26 customers?
answer: On April 27, 2021, the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (Bundesgerichtshof, BGH) ruled on [translation] ‚Äúthe impermissibility of clauses that feign the consent of a customer to changes in the Terms & Conditions of a bank.‚ÄùAm I entitled to a reimbursement?On the bases of this ruling, customers with a private membership plan (N26 Standard/Smart/You/Metal), created before March 12, 2020, are entitled to reclaim the ‚ÄúGambling Fee‚Äù introduced and charged by us. For those customers who are entitled to reclaim it, the fee (for the customer group in question) has no longer been charged since November 5, 2021.Customers who registered after March 12, 2020 actively consented to the ‚ÄúGambling Fee‚Äù included in the Terms & Conditions, which were already updated at this time, which is why these customers are not entitled to a reimbursement of said ‚ÄúGambling Fee‚Äù. Customers with an N26 Business membership plan (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/Business You/Business Metal) are furthermore not entitled to reclaim this fee, as they do not fall under the customer group covered by the ruling (consumers).Requesting a reimbursement as a current customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to login to the N26 app and launch a verified live chat in the app or web app.Requesting a reimbursement as a former customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to send an email to support@n26.com (new tab). For a direct, simple resolution please follow these guidelines:Subject of email: ‚ÄúReimbursement pursuant to BGH XI ZR 26/20‚ÄùSend the email from your registered email address.Include your full name in the email as well as an alternative IBANAttach a clear, double-sided photo/scan of one of your ID documents, including the edges.Please include your consent to the following: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees¬†is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),¬†then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you‚Äôll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: ¬øPor qu√© no he recibido el c√≥digo de sincronizaci√≥n por SMS?
answer: Para los clientes de iOS que no reciban nuestros SMS de vinculaci√≥n: puede que tengas activada la funci√≥n que filtra nuestros SMS. Si no has recibido el SMS con el c√≥digo de sincronizaci√≥n por alguna raz√≥n, puedes volver a solicitarlo desde la app hasta 5 veces (espera al menos 30 segundos entre una y otra).Si ya lo has solicitado las 5 veces y sigues sin recibirlo, la app no te dejar√° solicitar otro en 24 horas por motivos de seguridad. Si eso pasa, puedes elegir entre esperar las 24 horas o contactar con nuestro servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente por chat para que te ayudemos.Si tu prefijo internacional pertenece a un pa√≠s de fuera de la UE, es probable que necesites contactarnos para recibirlo.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (‚Äútapping‚Äù your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:¬†Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen.

question: Where can I use my Maestro card?

question: Was ist MoneyBeam?
answer: Durch einen MoneyBeam kannst du deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld senden, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Du kannst auch einen MoneyBeam von deinen Kontakten anfragen, um Geld zu erhalten. Um MoneyBeam nutzen zu k√∂nnen, m√ºssen du und deine Kontakte als N26 Nutzer sichtbar sein.Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden:¬†Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeamW√§hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder f√ºge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einGib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein und best√§tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erh√§ltst.¬†Um einen MoneyBeam anzufragen:Tippe auf Geld erhalten > MoneyBeam anfragenW√§hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder f√ºge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einSobald der Kontakt deine Anfrage best√§tigt, erh√§ltst du deinen angefragten BetragDas Limit f√ºr MoneyBeams liegt bei 1000‚Ç¨ pro Transaktion und 5000‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Ein GIF als zus√§tzlichen Verwendungszweck hinzuf√ºgen:Wenn du MoneyBeam nutzt, kannst du GIFs als zus√§tzlichen Text beim Verwendungszweck versenden. Sobald der MoneyBeam abgeschlossen ist, wird dem Empf√§nger auf dem Startbildschirm ein Film-Emoji als Pr√§fix auf der eingehenden √úberweisung angezeigt, sodass er wei√ü, dass an die √úberweisung ein GIF angeh√§ngt ist. Der Empf√§nger kann das GIF zusammen mit dem Verwendungszweck in den √úberweisungsdaten einsehen.Die GIFs werden dir direkt von Giphy, Inc. zur Verf√ºgung gestellt und nicht von N26. Bitte beachte, dass Giphy ein US-amerikanisches Unternehmen ist, das deine personenbezogenen Daten in den USA verarbeitet. Informationen dar√ºber, wie Giphy deine personenbezogenen Daten verarbeitet, findest du in der Datenschutzrichtlinie von Giphy (neuen Tab).¬†¬†Um einen MoneyBeam mit einem GIF zu senden:Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeam.W√§hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder f√ºge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einW√§hle GIF hinzuf√ºgen und suche nach dem GIF, das du hinzuf√ºgen m√∂chtest, entweder per Suchfeld oder einfach scrollend.Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein und best√§tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erh√§ltst.

question: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
answer: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easy‚Äì‚Äìall you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once you‚Äôre there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.¬†Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit card¬†With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phone‚Äîthere‚Äôs no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of ‚Ç¨900 within 24 hours.¬†How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of ‚Ç¨50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once you‚Äôre ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.¬†Here‚Äôs what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you don‚Äôt make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and you‚Äôll need to generate a new one.¬†If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You don‚Äôt need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.¬†N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).¬†

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‚Äòowner‚Äô or the person who created the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‚Äòvisible‚Äô to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner‚Äôs contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô add participant flow.You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‚Äòlearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚Äòinvite new member‚Äô button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the ‚Äúlegal screen‚Äù so be sure to read all the information within the ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C‚Äôs then tap ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô button.Tap ‚ÄòSend invite‚Äô on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‚Äòsend invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).¬†In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.
