question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe‚Äôre sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your and provide our findings and final response via email.¬†Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)French litiges@n26.com (new tab)Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.¬†If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling times All complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days¬†Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days¬†United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days¬†Spain - 60 Calendar Days¬†Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our decision relating to a complaint about an N26 bank account and/or N26 services, you may wish to consider further advice from independent consumer arbitration services*.¬†¬†*Please note that these services cannot perform any actions on N26 accounts and will only offer the possibility of an out-of-court dispute resolution in German. The arbitration procedure is not a fast-track procedure and can take up to 6 months.Schlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank (Arbitration Body via the German Federal Bank) Link (new tab).Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority) Link (new tab).For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab).

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‚ÄòDirect Debits‚Äô: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don‚Äôt have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space‚Äôs IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‚ÄòSpace Settings‚Äô and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' ¬ª¬†Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' ¬ª¬†Accept the T&C's ¬ª¬†Enter your confirmation PIN ¬ª¬†Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‚Äòcog icon‚Äô)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on ‚ÄúSend money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúBank transfer‚ÄùSelect the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
answer:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if it‚Äôs for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And ‚Äòtry before you buy‚Äô - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, you‚Äôll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90‚Ç¨. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on ‚Äúcontinue‚Äù to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick ‚ÄúConfirm Purchase‚Äù : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on ‚ÄúLearn More‚Äù This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on ‚Äúcontinue‚Äù to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click ‚ÄúConfirm Purchase‚Äù : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the ‚ÄúStart free trial‚Äù button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

question: Wie behalte ich meine t√§glichen Ausgaben im Blick?
answer: Wir sortieren deine¬†Transaktionen¬†automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Insights an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen √ºber Einzelh√§ndler und Zahlungsgr√ºnde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach √§ndern, indem du die Transaktion ausw√§hlst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste ausw√§hlst.Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags f√ºr Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#B√ºcher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugef√ºgt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzuf√ºgst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzuf√ºgen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerw√ºnschte Tags zu entfernen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Frequently asked questions about the p-account
answer:
What does a p-account cost?The conversion to a p-account is free of charge and doesn't entail additional monthly fees. Already existing fees, such as account usage and premium subscription fees, will still apply.How can I increase my monthly allowance?In order to increase the basic allowance of your p-account, we‚Äôll need a completed certificate from an authority or appropriate body under ¬ß 850k (5) Code of Civil Procedure. This also applies to a one-time increase (e.g. for forwarding a rent deposit loan). You can get this certificate issued from the following authorities:Your employerThe institution making payment of the child benefits (Familienkasse)A nonprofit debtor and insolvency advisory bodyThe job centerLawyersPlease send us the original certificate by post to:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 Berlin GermanyHow can I convert my p-account back to my normal account?In order to convert your p-account back to your normal account you can send us an email from your registered email address to support@n26.com with the following information:Your first name and surnameYour N26 IBANConfirm that you want to convert your p-account to your normal account.In case you still have an active garnishment, please be aware that your account will be seized immediately and your funds transferred to the creditor.What is the legal p-account allowance?The legal p-account allowance is ‚Ç¨1.340.If you don‚Äôt spend your entire allowance, your unspent allowance will automatically be transferred to the next month for up to 3 months in total.If you receive funds on your N26 account in a given month, your unspent allowance from the previous month will be added on top of the new funds (but max. 1340‚Ç¨). So if you have a monthly income of 1340‚Ç¨ or higher and you don‚Äôt spend all of it, your allowance can accumulate to up to 3 x 1340‚Ç¨ = 4020‚Ç¨.If you don‚Äôt receive any funds on your N26 account in a given month, your allowance is equal to the unspent allowance from the previous month. If you‚Äôve spent your entire allowance and don‚Äôt receive any funds in the next month you won‚Äôt have any allowance left.You can check your current allowance at any time in the N26 app under: My Account > P-Account status

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: Mit der Funktion ‚ÄûRound-up Savings‚Äú k√∂nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen get√§tigte Kartentransaktion auf den n√§chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung f√ºhrt nicht zu einer √úberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du √ºber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verf√ºgen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgef√ºhrt.Du kannst immer nur eine ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl √ºberweisen.Du kannst die Funktion ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlie√üt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.Wie kann ich die "Aufrundungsregel" nutzen?Die Aktivierung der "Aufrundungsregel" geht schnell und einfach. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder Web-App von N26 ein:Gehe zum Bereich "Spaces".W√§hle den Space, auf den die Differenz zum aufgerundeten Betrag (das Restgeld) flie√üen soll.Tippe/Klicke auf "Verwalten" --> "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Schalte die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel verwalten" auf gr√ºn.W√§hle den Multiplikator und tippe/klicke anschlie√üend auf "Best√§tigen".Spare direkt bei deinem n√§chsten Einkauf mit deiner N26 Debitkarte!

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
answer: Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch f√ºr Kredite an unsere Kunden zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen (sofern diese √ºber eine entsprechende Bonit√§t verf√ºgen). F√ºr die nicht im Kundengesch√§ft ben√∂tigte Liquidit√§t ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europ√§ischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschlie√ülich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir √∂ffentlich-rechtliche Kunden haupts√§chlich in Deutschland (St√§dte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das hei√üt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.Und wir t√§tigen auch keine Spekulationsgesch√§fte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

question: Cos'√® CASH26?
answer: Disponibile per i conti aperti in Spagna, Germania, Austria, Italia e Grecia.CASH26 √® una funzione integrata nell'app N26 che ti permette di depositare contanti sul tuo conto N26 e prelevare denaro con il tuo smartphone, senza carta e senza sportello.Tutto quello che devi fare √® recarti in uno degli¬†oltre 2000 punti vendita¬†CASH26 in tutta Italia (tra cui Carrefour Iper, Market, Express, PENNY, PAM e Panorama), generare un codice a barre CASH26 e mostrarlo alla persona alla cassa dallo schermo del tuo smartphone collegato.¬†Leggi questo articolo per sapere come prelevare e depositare contanti sul conto con CASH26.Funzionalit√† CASH26Depositare contantiIl codice a barre ha una durata di soli 10 minuti; se non lo usi in tempo, scadr√† e dovrai generarne uno nuovo.Quando depositi il denaro, sar√† disponibile immediatamente, anche se potrebbero volerci fino a 10 minuti prima che sia visibile nel saldo del tuo conto nell'app N26.Quanto denaro in contanti posso depositare con CASH26?L'importo minimo √® di 50 ‚Ç¨ per deposito e quello massimo √® di 999 ‚Ç¨ ogni 24 ore.A prescindere dalla somma, si applica una commissione dell'1,5% sull'importo totale.Prelevare contanti con lo smartphoneNon appena viene generato il codice a barre CASH26, l'importo selezionato viene detratto immediatamente dal saldo del conto.¬†Se cambi idea e cancelli il codice prima di usarlo, oppure se lo lasci scadere dopo 10 minuti, il denaro torner√† immediatamente nel tuo conto.Quanto denaro in contanti posso prelevare con CASH26?Il limite massimo √® di 200 ‚Ç¨ per ogni prelievo e di 900 ‚Ç¨ ogni 24 ore. Non c'√® un importo minimo di prelievo. Puoi anche prelevare soltanto un centesimo.I prelievi con CASH26 sono privi di commissioni e senza spese aggiuntive.

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards: 45‚Ç¨Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: Come posso scaricare la ricevuta di un bonifico SEPA?
answer: Se hai inviato un bonifico dal tuo conto N26 e necessiti di una conferma dell‚Äôavvenuto invio o ricezione, puoi scaricare il file PDF con i dati della transazione dalla tua app mobile o WebApp. Ecco come:¬†Accedi alla tua app N26Dalla lista delle transazioni, seleziona il bonifico per il quale desideri scaricare la confermaClicca su ‚ÄúScarica il PDF del bonifico‚ÄùNon appena sceglierai questa opzione, la ricevuta verr√† automaticamente scaricata sul tuo smartphone o pc.Quali dati sono presenti nella ricevuta PDF del bonifico?Nella ricevuta del bonifico troverai i dati bancari del mittente e del ricevente del trasferimento, comprensivi dell‚Äôimporto della transazione e la data in cui √® stata effettuata.Ti ricordiamo inoltre, che nella ricevuta non troverai n√® il CRO (Codice Riferimento Operazione) n√® il TRN (Transaction Reference Number).

question: What you need to know about the Italian IBAN
answer: IMPORTANT - Currently new customers signing up in Italy will receive an Italian IBAN. For our existing customers in Italy with a German IBAN, as soon as we have information to share on how and when you can obtain an Italian IBAN, we will get back in touch. Why didn‚Äôt N26 offer an Italian IBAN from the beginning?Theoretically, having a German IBAN in Italy shouldn‚Äôt be an issue under EU law which states that all EU IBANs should be accepted, regardless if it‚Äôs from a different country than your country of residence. However, we‚Äôve been listening to our customers and know that this isn‚Äôt always the case. To make things easier, we‚Äôve now decided to offer our Italian customers their own local Italian IBAN.Can I receive my salary/social/unemployment benefit/pension?You can indeed receive incoming transfers in Euros to the Italian IBAN associated with your N26 account.Can I create Direct Debits?Yes, you can. Simply provide the relevant company with your N26 IBAN to set up Direct Debits.Can I create Standing orders?Yes, you can. Standing orders can be set up in the N26 app via the "Transfers" section.When trying to send a transfer to my N26 Italian IBAN, the sending bank said the account details aren't recognised. What is the issue?It's possible that the sending bank doesn't yet have our new Italian BIC in their system. Please contact the sending bank so they can update their database and process your transfer.Can I deposit cash on my N26 account?Our customers in Italy can use CASH26 to withdraw and deposit cash through our partner stores. You can see how this works by visiting our Support Center here.Does anything change in terms of the fees or cost related to using the account (price list)?Offering an Italian IBAN won't change the costs associated with your account. You can check the price list with all relevant information here (new tab).Is it true that if I open an account now, I won‚Äôt have to pay the stamp duty?A stamp duty of ‚Ç¨34.20 is due on accounts with an annual average balance exceeding ‚Ç¨5,000 (subject to subsequent changes to the law). It is paid by the Bank on bank statements until June 30th, 2022. Unless the promotion is extended, the annual stamp duty will be paid by the customer from July 1st, 2022. It will be charged on the customer's account by direct debit. Customers will not not need to provide any kind of declaration.

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: ‚Ç¨5,000Monthly limit: ‚Ç¨20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of ‚Ç¨1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of ‚Ç¨400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of ‚Ç¨2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of ‚Ç¨1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: ‚Ç¨1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit¬†Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Wie kann ich den Nachweis √ºber die Herkunft der Gelder f√ºr mein Konto erbringen?
answer: Als voll lizenzierte Bank muss N26 routinem√§√üige technische Pr√ºfungen der Kundenkonten durchf√ºhren. Als reguliertes Institut k√∂nnen wir so sicherstellen, dass das Geld auf N26 Konten sicher und gesch√ºtzt bleibt.Mitunter kann es vorkommen, dass wir uns aufgrund der Ergebnisse dieser Routinepr√ºfungen an einen Kontoinhaber wenden m√ºssen, um einen Nachweis √ºber die Herkunft der Gelder auf dem Konto zu erhalten, dies ist eine Praxis im Einklang mit den deutschen Bankvorschriften.Wenn dies der Fall ist, werden wir dich ausschlie√ülich √ºber die E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren, die mit deinem N26 Konto verkn√ºpft ist. In dieser E-Mail erh√§ltst du klare Anweisungen, wie du diese Dokumente einreichen kannst, z. B. Scans oder Fotos von Quittungen, Gehaltsabrechnungen, Rechnungen oder Zahlungsaufforderungen.Sei stets aufmerksam und vergewissere dich, dass solche E-Mails von N26 kommen ‚Äì wir werden dich nie nach deinen N26 Kontodaten, deinem Passwort oder anderen Daten fragen, die du im Rahmen deines Verifizierungsprozesses mitgeteilt hast.

question: How to order my Maestro card?
answer: Only applies to Germany, Austria and the NetherlandsYou need our German, Austrian or Dutch Terms & Conditions to order a¬†Maestro (new tab) card. Just login to your account and go to:Cards Tap: Get an additional Card Then tap: Maestro Then tap Choose to order the card The Maestro card is free of charge only for N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal customers, while it costs 10‚Ç¨ for N26 Standard customers. question: Qu‚Äôest-ce que le hame√ßonnage?
answer: Le hame√ßonnage est une m√©thode simple et efficace que les hackers utilisent pour obtenir vos informations confidentielles. Une fois ces informations obtenues, ils peuvent les utiliser pour usurper l‚Äôidentit√© de leurs victimes et perp√©trer diff√©rents types de fraudes en leur nom. Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, veuillez cliquer (nouvel onglet) ici (nouvel onglet) pour lire notre article de blog sur la mani√®re de reconna√Ætre et d‚Äô√©viter les attaques de hame√ßonnage.Comment signaler des emails et des messages suspectsN26 ne vous enverra jamais de messages d‚Äôavertissements urgents par SMS ou emails vous demandant de vous connecter √† votre compte et de partager des donn√©es utilisateur confidentielles. Nous ne vous enverrons jamais d‚Äôultimatum, et nous ne vous demanderons jamais de vous authentifier ou de v√©rifier vos donn√©es en dehors de nos canaux de communications s√©curis√©s.Emails suspectsSi vous recevez un email suspect, ne cliquez sur aucun lien et ne t√©l√©chargez aucune pi√®ce jointe.Afin de nous aider dans notre enqu√™te, nous vous prions :de nous transf√©rer simplement l‚Äôemail suspect √† l‚Äôadresse support@n26.com ;OUd‚Äôenregistrer, si possible, l‚Äôemail suspect en tant que fichier ¬´ eml ¬ª et de nous l‚Äôenvoyer. Avec la plupart des fournisseurs de services de messagerie, les emails sont automatiquement enregistr√©s dans ce format lorsqu‚Äôils sont t√©l√©charg√©s. En nous envoyant l‚Äôemail suspect dans ce format, vous nous permettez de d√©terminer la v√©ritable origine du message et de le signaler aux organisations comp√©tentes. Si vous rencontrez des difficult√©s pour enregistrer l‚Äôemail √† ce format, pas de probl√®mes. Dans ce cas, envoyez-nous simplement la conversation de l‚Äôemail suspect √† l‚Äôadresse indiqu√©e ci-dessus.¬†Veuillez ne pas nous envoyer de captures d‚Äô√©cran, car nous ne pouvons pas utiliser ce type d‚Äôinformations. Supprimez l‚Äôemail de votre bo√Æte mail.SMS suspectsSi vous recevez un SMS suspect, ne cliquez sur aucun lien et ne donnez aucune information demand√©e.Afin de nous aider dans notre enqu√™te, nous vous demandons de suivre les √©tapes suivantes :Prenez une capture d‚Äô√©cran du message que vous avez re√ßu et envoyez-la √† : support@n26.com.Assurez-vous que le message complet est enti√®rement visible, en incluant le num√©ro de t√©l√©phone de l‚Äôexp√©diteur et la date/l‚Äôheure de l‚Äôenvoi.Si nous vous confirmons que le SMS re√ßu constitue effectivement une tentative d‚Äôhame√ßonnage, bloquez le num√©ro de t√©l√©phone.Supprimez le message de votre t√©l√©phone mobile.Appels t√©l√©phoniques suspectsSi vous recevez un appel suspect, qu‚Äôil provienne ou non de l‚Äôun de nos num√©ros de t√©l√©phone, ne fournissez aucune donn√©e personnelle ou relative √† votre compte ou √† la carte associ√©e. Dans certains cas, gr√¢ce √† l‚Äôusurpation du num√©ro de t√©l√©phone, les escrocs sont capables de masquer le num√©ro de t√©l√©phone de l‚Äôexp√©diteur, le faisant passer pour celui de la banque.Pour cette raison, si vous pensez avoir √©t√© victime d‚Äôune escroquerie t√©l√©phonique ou avoir fourni vos donn√©es personnelles, veuillez contacter imm√©diatement notre service client √† l‚Äôadresse support@n26.com.Comment signaler un site internet frauduleuxIl peut arriver que vous tombiez sur un site internet se faisant passer pour N26 afin de promouvoir et de vendre des services frauduleux. Parfois, des sites pr√©tendument affili√©s √† N26 utilisent √©galement notre logo. Ils vous offriront peut-√™tre un cr√©dit ou des offres promotionnelles limit√©es dans le temps. Il est important de bien noter que ce n‚Äôest pas parce qu‚Äôun site contient ¬´ N26 ¬ª dans son adresse URL qu‚Äôil est forc√©ment l√©gitime.Si vous avez l‚Äôimpression d‚Äô√™tre sur un site frauduleux, arr√™tez votre activit√© sur le site et faites la chose suivante :V√©rifiez la barre d‚Äôadresse et assurez-vous que l‚Äôadresse URL est bien: https://app.n26.com/login. Si ce n‚Äôest pas le cas, copiez l‚ÄôURL et signalez-le imm√©diatement √†: support@n26.com.

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.¬†Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.¬†In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. question: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: We offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your¬†overdraft¬†or loan with¬†N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

question: Come chiudere il conto?
answer: Hai deciso di chiudere il tuo conto N26? Continua a leggere questo articolo per scoprire come procedere.¬†Se hai un conto premium, potrai scegliere se chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto o semplicemente cancellare la tua sottoscrizione (nuova tabella) e passare a N26 Standard.Ecco come fare per chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto:Se non hai un IBAN italianoSe hai un saldo positivo, trasferisci i fondi rimanenti su un altro conto prima di iniziare il processo di chiusura. Se hai un saldo negativo, per prima cosa dovrai trasferire (nuova tabella) il denaro mancante sul conto N26 in modo da portare il tuo saldo a 0.Clicca qui per avviare il processo elettronico di chiusura del conto (nuova tabella). Dovrai effettuare l'accesso alla tua app N26 per verificare la tua identit√†, dopodich√© l'applicazione ti guider√† attraverso il processo di chiusura del tuo conto.Distruggi la tua carta, per esempio tagliandola con delle forbici. √à necessario tagliare il chip e la banda magnetica, e poi smaltire i pezzi separatamente.Se hai un IBAN italianoNel caso in cui tu abbia un IBAN italiano o se non riesci a effettuare l'accesso al tuo conto, puoi inviarci un‚Äôemail all‚Äôindirizzo support@n26.com (nuova tabella) dal tuo indirizzo email registrato, allegando questo modulo di cancellazione (nuova tabella) contenente le seguenti informazioni:una dichiarazione in cui richiedi la chiusura del tuo conto. Potrai indicare una data specifica o specificare che desideri che la chiusura avvenga "il pi√π presto possibile";il tuo nome;il tuo IBAN N26;un altro IBAN all'interno dell‚Äôarea SEPA (Area unica di pagamenti in euro) per trasferire il tuo saldo residuo nel caso in cui sia positivo (sia che si tratti di denaro presente in uno spazio o sul tuo conto principale).

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Comment ouvrir un compte N26 ?
answer:
Ouvrir un compte N26 est simple et ne prend que quelques minutes. Pour √™tre √©ligible √† un compte N26, vous devez :avoir au moins 18 ans√™tre r√©sident permanent de l'un des pays o√π N26 est pr√©sentavoir un¬†t√©l√©phone portable compatibleposs√©der un¬†document d‚Äôidentit√© accept√© par nos servicesne pas avoir un compte N26parler l'une des langues parl√©es par notre Service Client : fran√ßais, anglais, allemand, espagnol ou italien.Voici comment se d√©roule l‚Äôouverture d‚Äôun compte N26 :Inscrivez-vous en renseignant les informations personnelles demand√©es et votre adresse email, puis choisissez un mot de passe. Ensuite, vous devrez choisir le compte que vous souhaitez ouvrir*.Apr√®s avoir valid√© votre adresse email, vous pourrez proc√©der √† la¬†v√©rification de votre identit√©¬†directement depuis votre application N26 et¬†synchroniser votre smartphone.D√®s que la v√©rification de votre identit√© est valid√©e, vous pouvez alimenter votre compte N26 par virement SEPA, en utilisant CASH26 (si vous √™tes client en Allemagne, Autriche et en Italie) ou en demandant de l'argent √† un ami (par Moneybeam).

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).¬†¬†How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you‚Äôll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don‚Äôt arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date¬†
In this scenario, Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.¬†You received a delivery, but it doesn‚Äôt correspond with what you ordered¬†
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn‚Äôt receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,¬†I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:¬†Amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.¬†If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help‚Äì‚Äìthis is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:¬†Dear XX,¬†I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:¬†Merchant name: {insert merchant name}¬†Amount of original, authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.¬†The merchant told me that they‚Äôve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven‚Äôt received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.¬†How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That‚Äôs why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits‚Äì‚Äìall right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‚ÄòDiscreet Mode (new tab)‚Äô option to securely access your account in public.¬†Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you‚Äôre always aware of what‚Äôs happening on your account. Plus, we‚Äôre always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.¬†How does card fraud occur?¬†A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that‚Äôs been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:¬†You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase¬†Your online shopping account is hacked¬†Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: Warum war eine Zahlung h√∂her als erwartet?
answer: Ganz gleich, ob es sich um eine Kartenzahlung oder eine Lastschrift handelt ‚Äì wenn eine Zahlung h√∂her ausf√§llt als urspr√ºnglich gedacht, kommt dir das erst einmal verd√§chtig vor. Es gibt jedoch ein paar Gr√ºnde, warum der tats√§chlich abgebuchte Betrag vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:¬†¬†Es handelt sich um eine Transaktion inklusive einer KautionEs handelt sich um eine Transaktion in einer Fremdw√§hrungIn beiden F√§llen kann es so aussehen, als sei eine Zahlung zu hoch. Sehen wir uns die beiden Szenarien genauer an:¬†Du f√§hrst in den Urlaub und mietest am Flughafen ein Auto. Du bezahlst die Mietwagengeb√ºhr mit deiner N26 Mastercard. Der abgebuchte Betrag f√§llt jedoch h√∂her aus, weil die Autovermietung auch die Kaution f√ºr den Mietwagen autorisiert, also geblockt hat. Wenn du am Ende deines Urlaubs den Mietwagen unversehrt zur√ºckbringst, erlischt die Autorisierung und der Betrag ist auf deinem Konto nach maximal 30 Tagen wieder voll verf√ºgbar. Mehr √ºber den Unterschied zwischen Autorisierungen und tats√§chlichen Buchungen erf√§hrst du hier.Du bestellst ein Produkt in einem Onlineshop und zahlst mit deiner Karte. Der Onlineshop sitzt au√üerhalb der Eurozone und bietet ausschlie√ülich Zahlungen in Fremdw√§hrungen an, zum Beispiel Dollar oder Pfund. Je nach aktuellem Wechselkurs kann der gebuchte Betrag auf deinem Konto von der urspr√ºnglichen Summe abweichen. Dies l√§sst sich aufgrund von Schwankungen auf dem Devisenmarkt nicht vermeiden. Mehr zu √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen erf√§hrst du hier.In beiden F√§llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen f√ºr die Differenz.Keines der beiden Szenarien trifft zu und du bist sicher, dass du zu viel bezahlt hast? Wenn die Transaktion sicher nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen.

question: ¬øD√≥nde invierte N26 mi dinero?
answer: Como regla general, nos esforzamos para que los dep√≥sitos de nuestros clientes sean otorgados en forma de pr√©stamo a nuestros propios clientes (siempre y cuando dispongan de una solvencia apropiada). En cuanto a la liquidez que no se utiliza para los clientes, nuestra estrategia de inversi√≥n es de bajo riesgo.Invertimos el dinero de nuestros clientes con el Deutsche Bundesbank (Banco Federal Alem√°n) y otros bancos europeos dentro de la eurozona, √∫nicamente con un buen tipo de riesgo y a corto plazo. Adem√°s, refinanciamos colectivos de derecho p√∫blico principalmente en Alemania (ciudades y municipios) e invertimos en bonos de estado en euros.No somos una instituci√≥n de trading y por lo tanto no comerciamos para obtener beneficios a corto plazo.No nos involucramos en la especulaci√≥n; ni con comida, divisas extranjeras, bitcoins u otras clases de activos.

question: What's a p-account?
answer: A p-account is a legal protection against garnishments which can be applied to any account type that we offer. If you have a German IBAN you are generally entitled to convert your N26 account to a p-account. This means that in case you have an active garnishment, you'll have a monthly allowance of normally ‚Ç¨1.340 which remains accessible to you and inaccessible to the creditor on a per month basis. An active alimony garnishment can decrease that amount. Please note, however, that we need to report the conversion of your account into p-account to SCHUFA AG.You may decide to convert your N26 account to a p-account in case your N26 account has been garnished. Please note that in this case we are obligated by law to seize your account. You will simultaneously receive a detailed in-app message from us to your Messages with N26 with all information regarding your garnishment and the options available to you. We encourage you to read it carefully so you are also informed about your other options, before making a decision.Find out more about how to get a p-account.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‚ÄòForgot Password‚Äô to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Ablaufen und Ersatz von Karten: H√§ufig gestellte Fragen
answer: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erh√§ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.¬†Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren m√∂chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine pers√∂nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Meine Karte l√§uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wenn deine Karte bald abl√§uft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu best√§tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.¬†Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit g√ºltig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die M√∂glichkeit, deine Adresse zu best√§tigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gem√§√ü den √∂rtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Bitte beachte: Wenn du deine neue Mastercard erhalten und aktiviert hast, musst du deine Zahlungsdaten f√ºr alle deine Abos und wiederkehrenden Zahlungen aktualisieren. Auf diese Weise kannst du verhindern, dass deine zuk√ºnftigen Zahlungen abgelehnt werden.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten G√ºltigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erh√§ltst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Ersatzkarten sind f√ºr alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erh√§ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten er√∂ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den L√§ndern, in denen N26 verf√ºgbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europ√§ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ans√§ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterst√ºtzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung f√ºr dich vornehmen k√∂nnen. Der Versand au√üerhalb dieser L√§nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zus√§tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.¬†Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten f√ºr ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In l√§ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch l√§nger dauern. Um √ºber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!¬†Wenn du deine Adresse bereits best√§tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen.¬†Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht best√§tigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu best√§tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen.¬†

question: Why can‚Äôt I get a loan?
answer: Applies to Germany and FranceWhen applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isn‚Äôt your main account, you‚Äôll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where you‚Äôre applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).We‚Äôll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This search will appear on your SCHUFA report but is only visible to you and won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isn‚Äôt the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).Once you‚Äôve sent an application to us, you‚Äôre unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). You‚Äôll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.The decision is then calculated through an automated process. We cannot perform manual checks.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

question: Combien de temps met un virement bancaire ?
answer: Les virements SEPA instantan√©s entrants vers des comptes N26 sont instantan√©s, √† condition qu‚Äôils soient envoy√©s par une banque qui prenne en charge les virements instantan√©s. Cependant, les virements peuvent parfois √™tre retard√©s s‚Äôils doivent √™tre v√©rifi√©s en raison des r√©glementations bancaires SEPA.Les virements SEPA ordinaires entrants sont effectu√©s sous 2 jours ouvr√©s maximum. Si un virement est effectu√© juste avant un weekend ou jour f√©ri√©, le d√©lai de traitement sera prolong√© de 3¬†jours ouvr√©s maximum.Les virements SWIFT entrants prennent jusqu‚Äô√† 4 jours ouvr√©s pour arriver.¬†Les virements instantan√©s SEPA sortants sont envoy√©s de mani√®re instantan√©e. Les virements SEPA sortants ordinaires prennent jusqu‚Äô√† 2 jours ouvr√©s. Les virements en devises √©trang√®res sortants avec notre partenaire Wise peuvent prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 4 jours ouvr√©s. Les virements SWIFT sortants ne sont pas pris en charge.Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôun ¬´¬†jour ouvrable¬†¬ª¬†?Un jour ouvrable correspond √† deux jours ouvr√©s en raison des heures d‚Äôouverture des banques impliqu√©es. N‚Äôimporte quel jour de la semaine qui n‚Äôest pas un jour f√©ri√© est consid√©r√© comme un jour ouvrable.Mon virement n‚Äôest pas arriv√© ‚Äì o√π est-il¬†?Si vous avez pris en compte les informations pr√©c√©dentes et le virement n‚Äôa toujours pas √©t√© effectu√©¬†? Dans ce cas, seule la banque √©mettrice peut lancer une investigation interne.Malheureusement, chez N26, nous ne pouvons pas enqu√™ter sur les virements entrants, uniquement sur les virements sortants. Mais vous pouvez toujours consulter cette liste de raisons potentielles pour lesquelles un virement pourrait √©chouer.Informations compl√©mentairesLe syst√®me avec lequel nous envoyons tous nos virements SEPA s‚Äôappelle TARGET2 (nouvel onglet), il traite les paiements tous les jours ouvr√©s de 07:00 √† 18:00 GMT et est ferm√© les jours suivants: 1er janvier (Jour de l‚Äôan), Vendredi saint, lundi de P√¢ques, 1er mai, 25 d√©cembre (No√´l) et 26 d√©cembre.

question: What to do if my card is lost or it‚Äôs been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.¬†Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).¬†You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: Cos'√® il modulo online N26 per le richieste GDPR?
answer:
Tenere al sicuro i dati personali e finanziari dei nostri clienti √® una delle nostre priorit√†, motivo per il quale ti mettiamo a disposizione uno strumento sicuro per processare le richieste correlate ai dati personali. Il nostro modulo online N26 per le richieste GDPR permette ai clienti ed ex clienti N26 (i quali conti sono attualmente chiusi) e ai loro rappresentanti autorizzati con richieste relative ai dati personali, di contattare N26 in maniera sicura.Come funziona?Il modulo online (nuova tabella) viene utilizzato quando un cliente N26 o un ex cliente N26 vuole esercitare, in prima persona o attraverso un rappresentante autorizzato, dei diritti previsti dal Regolamento generale sulla protezione dei dati (GDPR).In particolare, potrai esercitare i seguenti diritti:¬†Diritto di accesso dell'interessato ai sensi dell'art. 15 GDPR (nuova tabella)¬†Diritto alla cancellazione ("diritto all'oblio"), ai sensi dell'art. 17 GDPR (nuova tabella)¬†Diritto di opposizione ai sensi dell'art. 21 GDPR (nuova tabella)Puoi aspettarti di ricevere una risposta dal Team di N26 entro 30 giorni lavorativi.Quando compili il modulo, ti verr√† chiesto di indicare:Nome, cognome e indirizzo emailIl tuo paese di residenzaIl tuo status attuale (cliente, ex cliente, rappresentante autorizzato di un cliente/ex cliente)Il tipo di richiestaDevo fornire altri documenti se sono un ex cliente N26 o un rappresentante autorizzato?Agli ex clienti e ai loro rappresentanti autorizzati viene richiesto di caricare ulteriori documenti per legittimare la loro identit√† e assicurare che il destinatario dei dati abbia il diritto di riceverli.Ecco quali sono i documenti necessari:Ex clienti: copia del documento d‚Äôidentit√† o passaportoRappresentanti autorizzati: copia del documento d‚Äôidentit√† o passaporto e una procura (generale) firmata¬†Una volta compilati tutti i campi del modulo, clicca su Invia per farci pervenire la tua richiesta.Perch√© √® necessario il controllo della carta di identit√† o del passaporto degli ex clienti di N26 o dei rappresentanti autorizzati?Richiediamo una copia della carta di identit√† o del passaporto per verificare l‚Äôidentit√† e garantire che le informazioni personali, comprese quelle finanziarie, non finiscano nelle mani sbagliate.
Il controllo manuale dei documenti viene eseguito quando √® necessario verificare l‚Äôidentit√† di una persona e non siamo in grado di farlo con il nostro sistema di verifica standard tramite l‚Äôapp N26. Questa verifica √® necessaria al fine di identificare gli ex clienti e gli eventuali loro rappresentanti autorizzati che non hanno pi√π accesso all‚Äôapp N26.Domande o dubbi su questo argomento?Puoi contattare il nostro servizio clienti tramite support@n26.com (nuova tabella).

question: Devo pagare le tasse negli Stati Uniti?
answer: In quanto banca autorizzata, siamo obbligati a riportare all‚ÄôIRS informazioni sui conti tenuti dai contribuenti statunitensi secondo le disposizioni FATCA, una legislazione delineata dal US Department of Treasury e dal US Internal Revenue Service con lo scopo di incoraggiare l‚Äôadempimento fiscale ed di impedire che i soggetti statunitensi si rivolgano a banche estere o altri enti creditizi per evitare la tassazione statunitense sulle loro entrate e sul loro patrimonio.Troverai maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA (nuova tabella)qui (nuova tabella).Nell‚Äôambito FATCA, vengono definiti soggetti statunitensi, ad esempio:i cittadini degli Stati Uniti (inclusi i possessori di doppia cittadinanza)i residenti negli Stati Uniti (ad es. i possessori di un valido permesso di soggiorno per gli USA oppure le persone che superano il ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù - maggiori informazioni qui di seguito)Se non sai se sei un soggetto statunitense, ti suggeriamo di rivolgerti ad un consulente fiscale.Il ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù prevede che:tu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni nell‚Äôanno solare in corsoOPPUREtu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni negli ultimi 3 anni solari, da calcolare nel seguente modo:(almeno 31 giorni nell‚Äôanno solare in corso) + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA l‚Äôanno scorso) diviso per 3 + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA l‚Äôanno precedente) diviso per 6.Inoltre, se il tuo conto presenta almeno uno dei seguenti dati:cittadinanza statunitense o residenza statunitenseluogo di nascita statunitenseindirizzo postale o indirizzo di residenza statunitense, incluse le caselle postalinumero di telefono statunitensebonifici ricorrenti verso un indirizzo o un conto statunitensesaremo obbligati a considerarti un soggetto statunitense a meno che non tu fornisca i seguenti documenti:un modulo¬† W-8BEN o un'autocertificazione di simile valore eun passaporto non statunitense o un altro documento identificativo emesso da un altro governo, che riporti il possesso di una cittadinanza o nazionalit√† diversa da quella statunitensenel caso fossi nato negli USA, una copia del tuo Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You‚Äôll have to activate your card whether it‚Äôs your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you‚Äôve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you‚Äôre activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction ‚Äî in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail ‚Äî for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card ‚Äî you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you‚Äôll still be able to activate that new card.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe‚Äôre sorry you wish to raise a complaint and will thoroughly investigate it. We'll provide our findings and final response via email.¬†Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via live chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Please note: These inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve your issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.¬†If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.¬†If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different time frames apply based on the country of your account Terms & Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days¬†Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days¬†United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days¬†Spain - 60 Calendar Days¬†Italy - 60 Calendar Days¬†We may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. question: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
answer: Als Bank m√ºssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zul√§ssiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto er√∂ffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen m√∂chtest.Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identit√§t √ºber andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine Identit√§t zu sch√ºtzen.Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gew√§hlt wird, h√§ngt von deiner Nationalit√§t, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:Ich lebe in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Spanien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Italien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in einem anderen Land (neuen Tab)Als voll lizenzierte und regulierte Bank muss sich N26 bei der Verifizierung der Identit√§t aller potenziellen Kunden an strenge Branchenstandards und Richtlinien halten. Da diese je nach Nationalit√§t variieren, k√∂nnen wir den wichtigen Schritt der Identit√§tspr√ºfung nur mit bestimmten Arten von Ausweisdokumenten f√ºr bestimmte Nationalit√§ten durchf√ºhren.Wenn deine Ausweisdokumente derzeit nicht von uns akzeptiert werden, hei√üt das, dass wir dir aktuell kein Konto bei uns anbieten k√∂nnen. Wir f√ºgen jedoch laufend neue Ausweisdokumente zu dieser Liste hinzu. Es lohnt sich also, regelm√§√üig einen Blick darauf zu werfen, ob dein Ausweisdokument bereits hinzugef√ºgt wurde.Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschlie√üen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.¬†Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What‚Äôs a ‚Äúbanking day‚Äù?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn‚Äôt arrived ‚Äî where is it?So what if you‚Äôve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn‚Äôt come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.
