question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).¬†If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I‚Äôve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.¬†What if I‚Äôve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.¬†Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Warum ist meine SEPA √úberweisung fehlgeschlagen?
answer: Um eine √úberweisung zu erhalten, musst du dem Absender deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen (so, wie er auf dem von dir zur Verifizierung bereitgestellten Ausweisdokument steht) und deine IBAN angeben. Deine IBAN findest du in deinen Kontoausz√ºgen und in üë§ Mein Konto (in der mobilen App oder der Web-App (neuen Tab)).Der Name des Empf√§ngers auf dem √úberweisungsauftrag unterscheidet sich von dem Namen auf seinem Konto (der Name muss auf seinem Ausweisdokument stehen).Der Name des Empf√§ngers ist ein Firmenname und nicht ein pers√∂nlicher bzw. Kontoname (gilt f√ºr N26 Business).Die IBAN ist falsch.Du erh√§ltst keine Push-Nachricht zur Best√§tigung deiner √úberweisung.Es wurde ein unzul√§ssiger Verwendungszweck festgestellt. N26 ist dazu verpflichtet, routinem√§√üige Transaktionspr√ºfungen durchzuf√ºhren (siehe ¬ß¬†10¬†GwG (neuen Tab)). Infolgedessen k√∂nnen wir Unterlagen zur √úberpr√ºfung des Ursprungs oder der Herkunft dieser Transaktionen anfordern. Das kann dazu f√ºhren, dass die Gutschrift verz√∂gert oder nicht stattfindet.Unterst√ºtzte eingehende √úberweisungenSEPA-√úberweisungenSEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisungen√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit WiseSWIFT-√úberweisungenUnterst√ºtzte ausgehende √úberweisungenSEPA-√úberweisungenSEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisungen√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit WiseBitte beachte die gesch√§tzten Zeitrahmen f√ºr die verschiedenen √úberweisungsarten.

question: How does N26 Business Metal work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs ‚Ç¨16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.¬†Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.¬†Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Comment cr√©er et modifier un virement permanent ?
answer: Lorsque vous effectuez un virement sortant depuis l'application mobile N26 ou depuis votre espace client en ligne, vous avez la possibilit√© d'en faire un virement permanent.Apr√®s avoir entr√© les informations n√©cessaires pour effectuer votre virement et avant de le valider, vous avez la possibilit√© de cocher la case "Virement permanent ?".Vous pourrez alors choisir la fr√©quence ainsi que l‚Äôintervalle de temps pendant lequel vous souhaitez effectuer votre virement permanent.Pour visualiser vos virements d√©j√† planifi√©s dans l'application mobile N26 :Acc√©dez √† votre liste de transactions sur l'√©cran principal.Cliquez sur les trois traits en haut √† droite de votre √©cran et s√©lectionnez Virements Permanents.Vous aurez alors acc√®s √† tous les d√©tails de vos virements permanents.Vous pouvez √©galement annuler et/ou modifier les d√©tails de vos virements permanents. Pour annuler un virement permanent, il vous suffit de cliquer sur le virement concern√© puis sur l‚Äôic√¥ne ‚Äòcorbeille‚Äô en haut √† droite de votre √©cran.‚ÑπÔ∏è Veuillez noter qu'en cas d'√©chec d'un virement permanent en raison de fonds insuffisants, nous ne tenterons pas d‚Äôeffectuer √† nouveau le virement - vous devrez le faire manuellement. Cependant, les prochains virements permanents pr√©vus seront trait√©s normalement.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†*applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
answer: Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du immer siehst, was in deinem Konto passiert. Es gibt zwei Transaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem Gesch√§ft oder im Internet stattfinden:Autorisierungen: Ein Betrag, der von einem Einzelh√§ndler oder Verk√§ufer blockiert oder reserviert wird. Das kann alles M√∂gliche sein ‚Äì von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschlie√ülich Kautionen).Buchungen: Der tats√§chliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endg√ºltig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zur√ºckerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zur√ºckgegeben.Sobald eine Autorisierung best√§tigt wird, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Danach passiert eins dieser drei Dinge: Die Autorisierung wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verf√§llt (und kehrt nach sp√§testens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºck. Bei Kautionen f√ºr Autovermietungen kann es bis zu 30 Werktage dauern.)¬†Bitte beachte:Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endg√ºltige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung w√§hrend des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Aber keine Sorge ‚Äì am Ende erlischt die Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen noch nicht passiert ist, helfen wir dir dabei, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen (neuen Tab).Autorisierungen f√ºr Verifizierungen sind in der Regel sehr kleine Betr√§ge, mit denen gepr√ºft wird, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. im Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zur√ºck√ºberwiesen.Die H√∂he einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden (neuen Tab) von der endg√ºltigen Buchung abweichen.

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS ‚Üí Certificates ‚Üí "Request for yourself" ‚Üí flag "of Residence" ‚Üí "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" ‚Üí and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.¬†Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around ‚Ç¨2. For the time being, we‚Äôre unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here‚Äôs a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:¬†AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could‚Äôve been charged an ATM fee.

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000‚Ç¨,¬†and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500‚Ç¨. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Todesfall & Verlassenschaft
answer:
Wie wird N26 √ºber einen Todesfall informiert?¬†Im Trauerfall m√ºssen sich die Nachkommen mit vielen b√ºrokratischen Aufgaben auseinandersetzen. Eine davon ist die Abwicklung der Bankkonten des oder der Verstorbenen.In √ñsterreich wird in der Regel ein Notar als Gerichtskommiss√§r bestellt.¬†Der Kommiss√§r oder die Kommiss√§rin erreicht uns postalisch, per Fax oder per E-Mail. (Bitte mit Scan oder PDF eines entsprechenden Anschreibens im Anhang):E-Mail: verlassenschaft@n26.com¬†Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH¬†- Nachlassbearbeitung¬†
Rungestra√üe 22¬†
10179 Berlin, GERMANYWenn m√∂glich, bitten wir um eine Sterbeurkunde oder ein vergleichbares Dokument, da wir nur so ein zugeh√∂riges Bankkonto sicher identifizieren k√∂nnen.¬†Was passiert mit einem N26-Konto, wenn der Kontoinhaber stirbt?¬†¬†Aufgrund regionaler Unterschiede kann die Vorgehensweise je nach Land variieren.Sobald wir vom Tod eines Kunden erfahren, werden die zugeh√∂rigen Karten und das Online-Banking sowie jeglicher Zugang zur App gesperrt.Bitte beachte, dass Dauerauftr√§ge oder SEPA-Lastschriftmandate auf dem Konto in der Regel auch nach dem Tod des Kontoinhabers weiter bestehen. Erben oder Berechtigte m√ºssen diese widerrufen oder l√∂schen lassen.Dar√ºber hinaus sind alle deutschen Banken grunds√§tzlich gesetzlich verpflichtet, das in Deutschland f√ºr die Erbschaftsteuer zust√§ndige Finanzamt √ºber das zum Nachlass geh√∂rende Verm√∂gen zu informieren.Wir teilen den Beg√ºnstigten in jedem Fall mit, welche Unterlagen sie vorlegen m√ºssen, um das Konto des Verstorbenen bei N26 schlie√üen und Guthaben √ºberweisen zu k√∂nnen.¬†Ich bin Kunde, kann ich f√ºr den Fall meines Todes vorsorgen?¬†
Es gibt verschiedene M√∂glichkeiten, wie du sicherstellen kannst, dass dein Verm√∂gen im Todesfall nach deinen W√ºnschen verteilt wird. Das Testament ist eine der g√§ngigsten M√∂glichkeiten.Es ist jedem, der sich intensiver mit der Erstellung eines Testaments besch√§ftigt, dringend anzuraten, sich von einem Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater beraten zu lassen. Dies gilt insbesondere, wenn gr√∂√üere Verm√∂genswerte vererbt werden sollen.¬†Unser Kundenservice oder die Experten unserer Nachlass- und Rechtsabteilung k√∂nnen dir hierzu jedoch keine Beratung anbieten.¬†F√ºr n√§here Informationen zu deiner konkreten Situation wende dich bitte an einen Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater oder an eine andere geeignete Beratungsstelle.¬†

question: Comment fonctionnent les paiements sans contact ?
answer: Les paiements sans contact de votre carte fonctionnent via une antenne NFC (communication en champ proche). Si vous rencontrez des probl√®mes avec vos paiements sans contact, voici quelques solutions :V√©rifiez si les paiements sans contact sont autoris√©s dans les param√®tres de votre carte.Si votre carte est nouvelle, veuillez retirer de l‚Äôargent au distributeur automatique de billets ou effectuer un paiement en tapant votre code PIN. Ensuite, vous pourrez effectuer des paiements sans contact.Les paiements sans contact de votre carte (NFC) de moins de 50 ‚Ç¨ peuvent √™tre effectu√©s sans code PIN. Pour les paiements de plus de 50 ‚Ç¨ ou des transactions cumul√©es sup√©rieures √† 150 ‚Ç¨ vous devez saisir le code PIN de votre carte.Demandez au commer√ßant si le terminal est compatible avec les paiements sans contact.Les cartes N26 Metal ont leur antenne NFC au verso de la carte. Veuillez vous assurer de pr√©senter le verso de la carte devant le terminal pour utiliser l‚Äôantenne NFC (en utilisant le recto, cela ne fonctionnera pas).V√©rifiez que vous pr√©sentez votre carte directement du c√¥t√© compatible avec l‚Äôantenne NFC face au terminal de paiement. Si vous retirez votre carte trop vite ou si vous ne la pr√©sentez pas assez proche du terminal, r√©essayez.Si le paiement sans contact ne fonctionne pas, veuillez toujours ins√©rer votre carte et taper votre code PIN pour finaliser le paiement.

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.¬†How does it work?¬†The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?¬†Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney¬†Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person‚Äôs identity, and it‚Äôs not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.¬†As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.¬†Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: Wie √ºberweise ich in Fremdw√§hrungen?
answer: Wir arbeiten mit Wise zusammen, um einfache √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen (neuen Tab) zu erm√∂glichen. Wise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte Geb√ºhren.Um eine √úberweisung mit Wise durchzuf√ºhren, logge dich zun√§chst in deiner mobilen App ein:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.W√§hle Auslands√ºberweisung.F√ºge einen neuen Empf√§nger hinzu oder w√§hle einen bestehenden Kontakt aus. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzuf√ºgst, kannst du die gew√ºnschte W√§hrung ausw√§hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. Gib den Betrag und die Bankverbindung des Empf√§ngers an.Schlie√üe die √úberweisung mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN ab.Wenn wir deine gew√ºnschte W√§hrung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die Wise Website (neuen Tab)f√ºr eine noch gr√∂√üere Auswahl. Du kannst dich mit deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse einloggen, indem du auf Passwort vergessen? klickst. Du wirst eine E-Mail von Wise erhalten, mit der du dein Passwort erstellen kannst. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die √úberweisung abschlie√üen. Bitte beachte, dass du zuerst dein Wise-Konto mithilfe der N26 App erstellen musst, indem du versuchst, den Anweisungen in der N26 App f√ºr Fremdw√§hrungs√ºberweisungen zu folgen. Andernfalls wirst du nicht die E-Mail von Wise f√ºr die Zur√ºcksetzung deines Passworts erhalten.Bitte beachte auch, dass mit dem N26 Business, Business You und N26 Business Metal Konto in der App weder √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen, noch √úberweisungen an Unternehmen m√∂glich sind.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Wise unterst√ºtzt √úberweisungen nur in der Hauptw√§hrung eines Landes. Das bedeutet zum Beispiel, dass nach Indien keine USD-Transaktionen ausgef√ºhrt werden k√∂nnen.

question: Come utilizzare MoneyBeam?
answer: Grazie a MoneyBeam, puoi inviare denaro ai tuoi contatti in tempo reale senza dover inserire le loro coordinate bancarie. Puoi anche richiedere un MoneyBeam ai tuoi contatti per ricevere del denaro. Una volta che il MoneyBeam √® completato, il beneficiario potr√† vedere nella schermata Home un‚Äôemoji come prefisso sul bonifico ricevuto, indicando cos√¨ che al bonifico √® stata allegata una GIF. Il beneficiario potr√† visualizzare la GIF nei dettagli del bonifico insieme al testo di riferimento.Le GIF ti vengono fornite direttamente da Giphy, Inc. e non da N26. Ti preghiamo di notare che Giphy √® un'azienda con sede negli Stati Uniti che pu√≤ trattare i tuoi dati personali. Puoi trovare informazioni su come Giphy tratta i tuoi dati personali quando alleghi e invii GIF nell'Informativa sulla privacy di Giphy (nuova tabella).¬†¬†Per inviare un MoneyBeam con una GIF:Seleziona Invia denaro e poi MoneyBeam.Seleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungilo inserendo il suo numero di telefono e l'indirizzo email.Inserisci un importo e un riferimento.Seleziona Allega GIF e cerca o scorri la GIF che vuoi allegare.Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma e conferma la notifica (push) che riceverai.

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?

question: Wie behalte ich meine t√§glichen Ausgaben im Blick?

Wir sammeln Informationen √ºber Einzelh√§ndler und Zahlungsgr√ºnde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags f√ºr Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#B√ºcher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugef√ºgt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzuf√ºgst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzuf√ºgen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerw√ºnschte Tags zu entfernen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? question: How to open my N26 account?

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Wie sch√ºtzt N26 mein Geld?
answer: Gesetzliche EinlagensicherungDie¬† (neuen Tab)Entsch√§digungseinsrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH (neuen Tab) sch√ºtzt alle Einlagen¬†bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†in den Mitgliedsstaaten der Europ√§ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz ist N26 gesetzlich verpflichtet, Mitglied einer Einlagensicherung zu sein. N26 ist Mitglied der Entsch√§digungseinrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH.Wie erkennt und √ºberwacht N26 Betrugsversuche?N26 verf√ºgt √ºber ein Spezialteam, das sich auf die √úberwachung und Identifizierung verd√§chtiger Transaktionen auf unserer Plattform konzentriert. Mithilfe fortschrittlicher statistischer Modelle und Algorithmen sowie Verhaltensanalyse sorgt unser Team daf√ºr, dass dein Geld stets in sicheren H√§nden ist.Was unternimmt N26, wenn betr√ºgerisches Verhalten bei einem Kunden festgestellt wird?Wenn unser Expertenteam Unregelm√§√üigkeiten aufdeckt, ergreifen wir alle gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen Ma√ünahmen zur Schadensbegrenzung. Dazu z√§hlen mitunter die Schlie√üung der Konten und die Meldung derselben an die Beh√∂rden. Falls verd√§chtige Transaktionen auf Geldw√§sche, Terrorismusfinanzierung oder eine andere Straftat hinweisen, meldet N26 diese Aktivit√§ten unverz√ºglich der deutschen Zentralstelle f√ºr Finanztransaktionsuntersuchungen (‚ÄúFinancial Transaction Investigation Unit‚Äù; FIU) oder lokalen Aufsichtsbeh√∂rden.Wie hat N26 in die Sicherheit der Bank investiert?Ende 2019 haben wir unser Trust-and-Safety-Team zusammengestellt. Dessen Mitglieder sind im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit t√§tig und f√ºr den Schutz der Nutzer sowie deren Daten gegen Cyberkriminalit√§t verantwortlich. Dar√ºber hinaus hat N26 die Gr√∂√üe des eigenen AML-Teams und der Einheit f√ºr Finanzkriminalit√§t verdoppelt sowie Transaktions√ºberwachungsprozesse und -plattformen etabliert. Diese Ma√ünahmen erm√∂glichen es uns, sch√§dliche Aktivit√§ten auf Grundlage historischer Daten aufzudecken und zu verhindern. So k√∂nnen wir Kriminellen immer einige Schritte voraus sein. Wir investieren stark in Technologie und KI. Neben Verhaltensanalyse setzen wir auch auf fortschrittliche statistische Modelle und Algorithmen.

question: Why isn't my video verification working?

Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Deliveries¬†take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‚Äòowner‚Äô or the person who created the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‚Äòvisible‚Äô to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner‚Äôs contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô add participant flow.You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‚Äòlearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚Äòinvite new member‚Äô button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the ‚Äúlegal screen‚Äù so be sure to read all the information within the ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C‚Äôs then tap ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô button.Tap ‚ÄòSend invite‚Äô on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‚Äòsend invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: ¬øC√≥mo puedo cambiar mi n√∫mero de tel√©fono?

question: How can I prevent fraud via SMS?
answer: Did you get a text message followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt.How does the scam work?You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one¬†https://app.n26.com/login (new tab)The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App > My Account > Settings > Security > Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,¬† send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comDo I need to confirm a transaction to be able to receive a refund?Absolutely not! We would never instruct you to authorise a transaction that you did not initiate. Never confirm transactions if you do not recognise a recipient's name or IBAN in the case of debit transfers; an email or phone number in the case of a MoneyBeam payment; and a merchant's name in the case of a card transaction.How to recognise N26 official communications?We will never send you links via SMS: never trust an SMS from us that contains a link!¬†N26 usually sends verification codes via "AUTHMSG"; these codes will always originate from this sender. These codes are used to access the App or to associate the device with the account. Never share your OTP (One Time Password) codes with anyone!Our primary means of communication are live chat, email and our premium customer phone line.We do not call our customers, unless (in very specific cases) a call has been requested by a customer themselves.Therefore, if after clicking on a link, you‚Äôre informed that you will be contacted shortly by an N26 agent due to an unsuccessful operation, be wary of impending phone calls!How do scammers find out my personal information?In today‚Äôs day and age, it‚Äôs likely that your personal data is publicly available online. Think social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. It‚Äôs often the case that sensitive data is left unsecured. Scammers exploit people's vulnerability by collecting information and using it to their advantage.

question: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich Dauerauftr√§ge?
answer: Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine √úberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.Bevor du die √úberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein H√§kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die √úberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. Zun√§chst gibst du den Empf√§nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im n√§chsten Schritt das H√§kchen bei: ‚ÄúAls Dauerauftrag merken?‚Äù. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall f√ºr deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.So kannst du deine bestehenden Dauerauftr√§ge in der App sehen und verwalten:Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte √ºber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.Ein blaues Fenster √∂ffnet sich, in dem du "Dauerauftr√§ge" ausw√§hlen kannst.Hier kannst du deine Dauerauftr√§ge l√∂schen oder ver√§ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu l√∂schen, tippe auf den gew√ºnschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.‚ÑπÔ∏è Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgef√ºhrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszuf√ºhren. Du kannst die √úberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der n√§chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it‚Äîyou can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you‚Äôve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‚ÄòCards‚Äô from the bottom right-handTap ‚ÄòCard Settings‚Äô and select the relevant cardSelect ‚ÄòReset PIN‚ÄôEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction‚Äîin a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences‚Äîsuch as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn‚Äôt accepted, simply try again a different combination.¬†If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you‚Äôve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gem√§√ü des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen Beh√∂rden in der Europ√§ischen Union Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen L√§ndern steuerpflichtig sind.Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard f√ºr den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen Beh√∂rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher Verm√∂genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 L√§nder haben sich erkl√§rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner √ºber ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.Damit wir feststellen k√∂nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dich fragen:In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen L√§ndern hast, greifen f√ºr gew√∂hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden L√§nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren L√§ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, m√ºssen wir wissen, um welche L√§nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zuverl√§ssige Informationen zur Verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.
Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den L√§ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung (neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten ver√∂ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen L√§ndern identifizieren kannst.Falls sich deine Lebenslage ver√§ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich daf√ºr einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10‚Ç¨).¬†Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0‚Ç¨ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Kann N26 mein Konto schlie√üen?
answer: Kurz gesagt: ja.Wir k√∂nnen dein Konto auf drei Arten schlie√üen (mit einer K√ºndigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese K√ºndigungen sind endg√ºltig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen √ºber den Hintergrund einzelner K√ºndigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Du kannst deine Gesch√§ftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden Vertragsgeb√ºhren m√ºssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.2 Monate K√ºndigungsfristWir sind berechtigt, jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden zu k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 1 unserer¬†AGB (neuen Tab)¬†oder ¬ß 675h BGB).14 Tage K√ºndigungsfristWir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB (neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende Gr√ºnde hierzu vorliegen. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:Nutzung eines Privatkontos f√ºr gesch√§ftliche Zwecke¬†Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur f√ºr den pers√∂nlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle √úberweisungen, die sich auf Honorare f√ºr erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als Gesch√§ftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto f√ºr diesen Zweck nutzen m√∂chtest, er√∂ffne bitte ein¬†N26 Business¬†oder¬†N26 Business You Konto.Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen f√ºr eine routinem√§√üige Hintergrundpr√ºfung.¬†Wir sind eine Bank, deshalb¬†√ºberpr√ºfen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die Gesch√§ftsbeziehung zu k√ºndigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen m√ºssen. -Missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber N26-Mitarbeitern.¬†Wir tolerieren kein missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von K√∂rperverletzung oder allgemeines missbr√§uchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zust√§ndigen Beh√∂rde gemeldet.Fristlose K√ºndigungWir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch au√üerordentlich k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB (neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne Vorank√ºndigung und ohne K√ºndigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes f√ºr eine solche K√ºndigung. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:Falsche Angaben gegen√ºber N26 √ºber deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines KreditsDu kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegen√ºber N26 nicht zur√ºckzahlenNichterf√ºllung der Forderungen von N26 bez√ºglich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder Verst√§rkung von Sicherheiten, ¬ß 13 (2) unserer AGB (neuen Tab)).

question: What is a N26 Business Account?
answer: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you can‚Äôt have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&C‚Äôs, can order a Maestro card for an additional ‚Ç¨10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:¬†ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2,500	In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5,000¬†The monthly limit for payments is ‚Ç¨20,000.¬†You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expenses¬†The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:¬†MoneyBeam to N26 customers: ‚Ç¨1,000Instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000Outgoing transfers: No limits¬†N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.¬†Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business Metal ?
answer: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Irlande, Islande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie et Su√®de.N26 Business Metal co√ªte 16,90 ‚Ç¨ par mois et est con√ßu pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les ind√©pendants qui exercent leur activit√© en nom propre. Le nom de votre soci√©t√© ne peut donc pas figurer sur votre compte ou votre carte.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (nouvel onglet): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Pour l‚Äôinstant, il n‚Äôest pas possible de passer d‚Äôune offre de compte personnel √† un compte Business (ou vice versa). Il est donc important de savoir si le compte N26 Business Metal correspond √† vos besoins (nouvel onglet).Le compte N26 Business Metal est con√ßu sp√©cialement pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Ce compte permet de g√©rer vos d√©penses professionnelles avec un compte bancaire et une carte de d√©bit √† votre nom.Le compte a un co√ªt de 16,90 ‚Ç¨ par mois. Ce compte premium inclut : des garanties d'assurance et d'assistance N26 Business Metal fournies par Allianz, qui couvrent vos voyages professionnels et vos outils de travail, mais ce compte vous permet √©galement de retirer de l‚Äôargent en devises √©trang√®res sans frais suppl√©mentaires, aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez.La carte N26 Business Metal est une Mastercard con√ßue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Vous b√©n√©ficiez de 0,5 % de cashback sur tous vos achats effectu√©s avec votre carte N26 Business. Le montant du cashback est calcul√© de fa√ßon mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusqu‚Äô√† 7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relev√© de compte.N‚Äô√©tant pas possible d‚Äôavoir deux compte N26 en m√™me temps, nous vous conseillons de commander une Maestro (disponible en Autriche et en Allemagne) pour vos d√©penses priv√©s.Votre compte N26 Business Metal ne vous permet pas d‚Äôeffectuer de virements en devises √©trang√®res.Pour le moment, les pr√©l√®vements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business Metal. Vous pouvez choisir cette offre √† l‚Äôouverture de votre compte ou directement depuis votre application si vous √™tes d√©j√† client N26 Business*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, d√©nomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise membre du Groupe Allianz.

question: Ma pi√®ce d'identit√© n'est pas accept√©e et je n'arrive pas √† ouvrir un compte N26
answer:
Un √©tablissement bancaire doit v√©rifier votre identit√© avant de vous permettre d'ouvrir un compte bancaire. Selon votre pays de r√©sidence et votre nationalit√©, diff√©rentes pi√®ces d'identit√© peuvent √™tre accept√©es dans le cadre de cette proc√©dure de v√©rification.¬†
Vous retrouverez ici la liste des pi√®ces d'identit√© accept√©es lors de la proc√©dure de v√©rification d'identit√© si vous r√©sidez en France. 
Si vous r√©sidez dans un autre pays que la France, voici la liste des documents d'identit√© accept√©s (nouvel onglet) pour la v√©rification de votre identit√© :

Si votre pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© n'est pas prise en charge, nous ne serons pas en mesure de vous proposer l'ouverture d'un compte bancaire.

question: Bankdaten ‚Äì Deine N26 Kontobest√§tigung
answer: Was ist eine Kontobest√§tigung?Eine Kontobest√§tigung ‚Äì auch Bankbescheinigung genannt ‚Äì ist ein Dokument, das dich als InhaberIn deines Bankkontos ausweist. Auf der Kontobest√§tigung sind dein Vor- und Zuname, dein Geburtsdatum und deine Bankdaten wie die IBAN und das Datum der Kontoer√∂ffnung zu sehen.Auf Wunsch kann deine Bankbest√§tigung auch deinen aktuellen Kontostand und die Nummern deiner aktiven Karten auflisten. Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden werden diese Bankdaten teilweise mit Sternchen verdeckt.Wie beantrage ich meine Kontobest√§tigung?Klicke in der Web-App auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol* und w√§hle Bankdaten herunterladen. Eine PDF-Datei wird automatisch erstellt.¬†Wenn du eine Kontobest√§tigung inklusive deines aktuellen Kontostands und deiner Kartennummer(n) erhalten willst, klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*. Unter Kontobest√§tigung kannst du ausw√§hlen, ob du deinen aktuellen Kontostand und/oder die Kartennummer(n) deiner aktiven Karte(n) mit anzeigen lassen willst. Klicke dann auf Anfrage. Die PDF wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden unter Nachrichten von N26 (neuen Tab) in deiner App erscheinen.* Das Download-Symbol ist das Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil, links neben dem ‚ÄòButton ‚ÄúGeld erhalten‚Äù.

question: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including¬†CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2‚Ç¨. Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Was sind Echtzeit-√úberweisungen?
answer: Alle N26 Kunden haben nun die M√∂glichkeit, Echtzeit-√úberweisungen zu verwenden. Im Gegensatz zu den √ºblichen SEPA-√úberweisungen, die innerhalb von zwei Werktagen bearbeitet werden, werden Echtzeit-√úberweisungen innerhalb von Sekunden √ºbermittelt und empfangen.Eine Echtzeit-√úberweisungen kann von Vorteil sein, wenn du eine dringende √úberweisung t√§tigen musst (sie dauert etwa 10 Sekunden). F√ºr unsere Standardkunden, die Echtzeit-√úberweisungen nutzen, f√§llt jedoch eine Geb√ºhr an, die vor der Best√§tigung der √úberweisung angezeigt wird. Wenn die √úberweisung also bis zu 2 Tage warten kann, dann ist eine normale SEPA-√úberweisung wahrscheinlich besser geeignet. F√ºr unsere Premiumkunden ist die Echtzeit-√úberweisungen geb√ºhrenfrei.Obwohl diese √úberweisungen in Echtzeit durchgef√ºhrt werden, k√∂nnen sie sich aufgrund von Bearbeitungszeiten, Embargos usw. verz√∂gern (genau wie regul√§re √úberweisungen). Bei wichtigen Zahlungen, wie z. B. Einzahlungen oder Anzahlungen sollte man deshalb am besten im Voraus zahlen, um externe finanzielle Verluste aufgrund von Verz√∂gerungen zu vermeiden.Wie funktioniert das?Logge dich in die N26 App ein und tippe auf Geld senden > Bank√ºberweisung.Gib als n√§chstes den Namen und die IBAN des Empf√§ngers ein sowie ggf. einen Verwendungszweck.Tippe auf √úberweisung und w√§hle zwischen Echtzeit√ºberweisung und Standard√ºberweisung.Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.Best√§tige die √úberweisung in der App.Die Echtzeit√ºberweisung wird innerhalb von ca. 10 Sekunden verarbeitet und beim Empf√§nger eingehen.Bitte beachte: Wenn die Bank des Empf√§ngers nicht am SCT-Echtzeitverfahren teilnimmt, hast du nicht die M√∂glichkeit, eine Echtzeit√ºberweisung durchzuf√ºhren. Wichtige Informationen:**F√ºr die Nutzung von Echtzeit-√úberweisungen wird bei N26 Standard eine Geb√ºhr erhoben. Die Geb√ºhr wird direkt im Anschluss als separate Transaktion verrechnet und die Geb√ºhr f√§llt je nach Land unterschiedlich aus:Deutschland und √ñsterreich ‚Äì 0,49 ‚Ç¨Spanien ‚Äì 1,99 ‚Ç¨Italien, Frankreich und Rest Europas ‚Äì 0,99 ‚Ç¨Der H√∂chstbetrag, den du mit per Echtzeit-√úberweisungen versenden kannst, betr√§gt 2.000 ‚Ç¨ f√ºnfmal pro Tag bei einem Tagesh√∂chstbetrag von 10.000 ‚Ç¨.Wenn du eine Echtzeit-√úberweisungen f√ºr eine wichtige Zahlung (Einzahlung, Bu√ügeld, Anzahlung) verwenden m√∂chtest, solltest du die Zahlung eventuell im Voraus vornehmen, um eine Verz√∂gerung durch eine m√∂gliche Ablehnung oder Sperrung zu vermeiden.Wenn du Waren oder Dienstleistungen per Echtzeit-√úberweisungen bezahlst, achte immer darauf, dass du die Empf√§ngerdaten und -legitimationen √ºberpr√ºfst, bevor du die Transaktion best√§tigst. Es empfiehlt sich immer, vor Betr√ºgereien auf der Hut zu sein.Bitte beachte: Derzeit nehmen nicht alle Banken am Echtzeit-√úberweisungen teil. Wenn die Empf√§ngerbank nicht daran teilnimmt, hast du nicht die M√∂glichkeit, deine √úberweisung in Echtzeit durchzuf√ºhren.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around ‚Ç¨2. For the time being, we‚Äôre unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here‚Äôs a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:¬†AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could‚Äôve been charged an ATM fee.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (‚Äútapping‚Äù your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:¬†Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen.

question: Why was I charged a Gambling Fee?
answer: The Gambling Fee to the amount of 3% applies to all private customers who registered for an account after March 12, 2020, or who have a Business membership plan (regardless of the date on which said plan took effect).Customers with such a membership plan are charged the Gambling Fee when making use of the services of the following gambling providers:LotteriesSports bettingOnline casinosHorse racingOther gambling activitiesPlease note that this includes both incoming and outgoing applicable Mastercard transactions. The 3% Gambling Fee is charged after the applicable transaction is processed. For example: if you win or convert your remaining chips back to money, the merchant will send the balance in another transaction where the 3% Gambling Fee will be charged again.Good to know:The 3% Gambling Fee appears on your transaction list and balance statement, linked to the original and any subsequent transaction from the gambling merchant.The fee we have charged is related to Mastercard transactions you‚Äôve processed at certain relevant merchants (no matter which country you place the bet) and can‚Äôt be refunded.¬†Some of our customers will not have to pay the Gambling Fee, as a result of the ruling of the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (BGH XI ZR 26/20).

question: What are Cards for Spaces?
answer: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds in¬†the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space:¬†You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select ‚ÄòMain account‚Äô or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: Come attivare la carta?
answer: Attiva la tua Mastercard N26 direttamente dall'app e inizia subito ad utilizzarla! Dovrai attivare la nuova carta sia che si tratti della tua prima carta N26, di una carta sostitutiva o che tu abbia effettuato il passaggio a una carta N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal.Una volta ricevuta per posta la tua carta, assicurati che il tuo smartphone sia associato al tuo conto, poi:Apri la tua app N26Vai alla sezione "Carte" nel men√π in basso e trova la carta che vuoi attivareTocca "Impostazioni" e poi "Attiva"Inserisci il numero di 10 cifre che trovi sulla parte anteriore o posteriore della tua carta e scegli il tuo codice PINPer attivare la carta su N26 Web, seleziona "Attiva carta" dalla schermata principale.Ricorda, per abilitare i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e utilizzare la carta per i tuoi acquisti online, dovrai prima effettuare una transazione con chip e codice PIN presso un negozio o uno sportello ATM.Se ricevi per posta pi√π carte, perch√© ad esempio la consegna √® stata ritardata e ne hai richiesta pi√π di una, puoi attivare solo la carta pi√π recente. Tuttavia, se hai un conto premium e hai richiesto una carta aggiuntiva, potrai comunque attivare quella nuova carta.
