question: How to upgrade to N26 You?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How to protect my identity?
answer: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.¬†¬†Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules¬†As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.¬†Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.¬†Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.¬†For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating ‚Äúpermanent home‚Äù as a stronger form of attachment than ‚Äútemporary residence‚Äù). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number¬†Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country‚Äôs tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.¬†¬†The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities¬†As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.¬†Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.¬†We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.¬†Our recommendation¬†Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.¬†We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù, indicate whether you‚Äôre a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you‚Äôre tax resident in more than one country), click ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.¬†

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: ‚Ç¨5,000Monthly limit: ‚Ç¨20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of ‚Ç¨1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of ‚Ç¨400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of ‚Ç¨2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of ‚Ç¨1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: ‚Ç¨1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit¬†Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9.

Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app‚Äì‚Äìno debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store‚Äì‚Äìit‚Äôs that simple. Plus, you don‚Äôt have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you‚Äôll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.¬†If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of ‚Ç¨2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.

question: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including¬†CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of ‚Ç¨2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2‚Ç¨. Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôun message de s√©curit√© en pied de page et pourquoi en avons-nous int√©gr√© un ?
answer: Un message de s√©curit√© en pied de page est un message personnalis√© ajout√© au bas des emails et des documents num√©riques, qui sert de sceau d‚Äôauthenticit√©.En ajoutant votre nom complet au bas de chaque email, notre objectif est de vous aider √† distinguer les emails l√©gitimes envoy√©s par N26 des emails de phishing envoy√©s par des fraudeurs.¬†Un message de s√©curit√© en pied de page ne peut prouver avec certitude qu‚Äôun email provient d‚Äôune source v√©rifi√©e. Il permet n√©anmoins de r√©duire le risque de phishing, le type d‚Äôattaque par hame√ßonnage le plus courant.Qu‚Äôest-ce que le phishing¬†?Le phishing est une pratique ill√©gale qui consiste √† envoyer des emails g√©n√©riques √† un grand nombre de personnes inconnues, dans le but d‚Äôobtenir des informations confidentielles sous de faux pr√©textes.Comment y parvenir¬†?¬†Les fraudeurs contactent leurs cibles en leur faisant croire qu‚Äôils travaillent pour des entreprises connues. Ils leur font ensuite croire qu‚Äôils sont en s√©curit√© gr√¢ce √† des images de marque, des situations d‚Äôurgence et des propos trompeurs. Une fois les cibles app√¢t√©es, les fraudeurs essaient de les manipuler pour qu‚Äôelles se plient √† leurs exigences.Comment vous prot√©ger¬†?Faites tr√®s attention aux emails que vous recevez de banques, de clients, d‚Äôemployeurs, etc. Si vous √™tes invit√© √† faire quelque chose, n‚Äôagissez jamais par impulsion, mais r√©fl√©chissez bien avant d‚Äôagir.¬†Si vous soup√ßonnez un probl√®me, ne l‚Äôignorez pas. Observez les fautes d‚Äôorthographe et de grammaire, survolez les URL cach√©es (ne cliquez pas dessus), v√©rifiez les coordonn√©es de l‚Äôexp√©diteur et faites des recherches. Un contr√¥le rapide en ligne peut vous aider √† v√©rifier l‚Äôidentit√© de l‚Äôexp√©diteur.Si vous avez re√ßu un email, un appel t√©l√©phonique et/ou un SMS suspect au nom de N26, contactez notre Service Client √† l‚Äôadresse support@n26.com. Pour discuter de probl√®mes li√©s √† votre compte, veuillez nous contacter par Livechat depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile.En savoir plus sur¬†:Comment signaler des suspicions d‚Äôattaques de phishing (nouvel onglet)Comment reconna√Ætre et √©viter les attaques de phishing (nouvel onglet)Comment se prot√©ger de l‚Äôing√©nierie sociale (nouvel onglet)

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS ‚Üí Certificates ‚Üí "Request for yourself" ‚Üí flag "of Residence" ‚Üí "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" ‚Üí and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.¬†Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

question: Comment N26 g√®re mes informations fiscales ?
answer: Ce document a √©t√© r√©dig√© √† titre informatif uniquement. Il n‚Äôa pas √©t√© pens√© pour fournir des conseils fiscaux, juridiques ou comptables. De ce fait, nous n‚Äôen garantissons pas la fiabilit√©.N26 collecte vos informations fiscales pour deux raisons principales : afin de r√©pondre aux exigences de ¬´ Know Your Customer ¬ª (connaissance du client) et pour la d√©claration obligatoire aupr√®s des administrations fiscales responsables.¬†Obligation d‚Äôidentification de nos clients selon les r√®gles appel√©es ¬´ Know Your Customer ¬ªComme toute institution financi√®re,, en vertu de la l√©gislation fiscale applicable, nous sommes tenus de recueillir des informations fiscales pertinentes afin de vous identifier √† des fins fiscales. Il s‚Äôagit principalement de votre nom, adresse de r√©sidence, pays de r√©sidence fiscale (qu‚Äôil y en ait un ou plusieurs), num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale ou √©quivalent, ainsi que de votre lieu et date de naissance. Vous trouverez ci-dessous des informations g√©n√©rales sur les d√©finitions de la r√©sidence fiscale et du num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale.R√©sidence fiscaleEn r√®gle g√©n√©rale, un particulier n‚Äôa qu‚Äôun seul pays de r√©sidence (adresse de r√©sidence). Cependant, une personne peut r√©sider √† des fins fiscales dans deux ou plusieurs pays diff√©rents. En effet, les pays utilisent diff√©rents crit√®res (formes de rattachement) pour d√©terminer la r√©sidence fiscale. Ces crit√®res peuvent inclure, sans y √™tre limit√©s, la pr√©sence physique prolong√©e, la nationalit√©, la propri√©t√© de biens, etc. En cas de convention fiscale entre les pays, les r√®gles d√©cisives contenues dans cette convention attribueront la r√©sidence fiscale √† l‚Äôun des pays concern√©s.Par exemple, si vous avez un foyer d‚Äôhabitation¬†permanent (nouvel onglet) dans le pays A et une r√©sidence temporaire dans le pays B, les r√®gles d√©cisives de la convention fiscale conclue entre le pays A et le pays B peuvent indiquer que vous √™tes r√©sident fiscal dans le pays A o√π vous avez un foyer d‚Äôhabitation permanent plut√¥t que dans le pays B o√π vous avez une r√©sidence temporaire (traitant le ¬´ foyer d‚Äôhabitation permanent ¬ª comme une forme de rattachement plus forte que la ¬´ r√©sidence temporaire ¬ª). La mani√®re de d√©terminer la r√©sidence fiscale repose sur des faits ; en cas de doute, vous devez donc le pr√©ciser aupr√®s de votre administration fiscale et/ou votre conseiller fiscal.Le portail d‚Äô√©change automatique de l‚ÄôOCDE fournit des informations utiles sur les NIF (notamment o√π les trouver et leurs sp√©cifications) √©mis par de nombreux pays participant √† l‚Äô√©change automatique d‚Äôinformations en mati√®re fiscale. Cependant, en cas de doutes sur votre NIF, nous vous conseillons de consulter votre conseiller fiscal ou votre administration fiscale.Obligation de d√©claration des informations fiscales pertinentes de certains clients aux autorit√©s fiscales responsablesComme toute institution financi√®re,, nous sommes tenus de d√©clarer r√©guli√®rement certaines informations fiscales pertinentes √† l‚Äôadministration fiscale responsable. Selon votre IBAN, l‚Äôadministration fiscale destinataire peut √™tre celle de l‚ÄôAllemagne, de l‚ÄôItalie, de l‚ÄôEspagne ou de la France.Les d√©clarations en vertu de la Norme commune de d√©claration (nouvel onglet) (NCD) et du Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (nouvel onglet) (FATCA, Loi sur le respect des imp√¥ts sur les comptes √©trangers) doivent tout particuli√®rement √™tre mentionn√©es. Si vous √™tes r√©sident fiscal dans un pays appliquant la NCD et/ou aux √âtats-Unis, l‚Äôadministration fiscale destinataire communique les informations re√ßues de la part de N26 √† votre pays de r√©sidence fiscale dans le cadre de l‚Äô√©change automatique d‚Äôinformations en vertu de la NCD et du FATCA.Pour que N26 puisse s‚Äôacquitter de ses obligations d‚Äôinformation, en particulier celles en mati√®re de NCD et de FATCA, nous avons besoin de recueillir des informations fiscales¬† correctes et √† jour (donn√©es d‚Äôautocertification). Les donn√©es d‚Äôautocertification comprennent le nom, l‚Äôadresse de r√©sidence, pays de r√©sidence fiscale (qu‚Äôil y en ait un ou plusieurs), le NIF, ainsi que le lieu et la date de naissance. Si vous √™tes r√©sident fiscal am√©ricain (ressortissant des √âtats-Unis), vous devez √©galement fournir votre NIF am√©ricain (nouvel onglet). Veuillez suivre ce lien (nouvel onglet) pour en savoir plus sur le FATCA et ce que vous devez faire pour d√©terminer si vous √™tes une Personne am√©ricaine, et si par cons√©quent vous devez nous fournir votre NIF am√©ricain.Nous sommes tenus d‚Äôeffectuer des contr√¥les r√©guliers pour nous assurer que vos informations fiscales pertinentes stock√©es dans notre syst√®me sont correctes (en proc√©dant √† ce que l‚Äôon appelle la ¬´ diligence raisonnable permanente ¬ª). Si la diligence raisonnable requise r√©v√®le des inexactitudes, nous vous contacterons pour obtenir des informations correctes et √† jour.Notre recommandationVeuillez noter que nous sommes tenus, en dernier recours, d‚Äôappliquer des mesures restrictives √† votre compte si nous ne sommes pas en mesure d‚Äôobtenir dans les d√©lais applicables des informations correctes et √† jour aux fins de la NCD et du FATCA d√©crits ci-dessus.Nous vous recommandons de v√©rifier et de mettre √† jour r√©guli√®rement vos informations fiscales pertinentes. N‚Äôoubliez pas que si vous ne le faites pas, cela peut √©galement avoir des cons√©quences directes pour vous. Par exemple, l‚Äôadministration fiscale peut directement vous imposer des sanctions. Pour v√©rifier et mettre √† jour vos informations depuis votre application N26 :Acc√©dez √† D√©tails du¬†compte > Informations personnelles > Informations fiscalesAppuyez sur ¬´ Ajouter un nouveau pays d‚Äôimposition ¬ª, indiquez si vous √™tes une Personne am√©ricaine et suivez les instructions donn√©esPour ajouter un pays d‚Äôimposition suppl√©mentaire (si vous √™tes r√©sident fiscal dans plusieurs pays), cliquez sur ¬´ Ajouter un nouveau pays d‚Äôimposition ¬ª et suivez les instructionsLa suppression du pays d‚Äôimposition existant n‚Äôest possible qu‚Äôapr√®s avoir ajout√© un nouveau pays d‚ÄôimpositionInformations importantesVous pouvez toujours v√©rifier les informations fiscales dont nous disposons actuellement en acc√©dant √† : D√©tails du Mon compte > Informations personnelles > Informations fiscales.Dans tous les cas, vos donn√©es √† caract√®re personnel seront stock√©es de mani√®re s√©curis√©e et uniquement utilis√©es pour nous acquitter des exigences de la NCD, du FATCA ou d‚Äôautres exigences similaires.Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de vous donner des conseils sur votre statut fiscal. En cas de doute, veuillez en discuter avec un conseiller fiscal et/ou l‚Äôadministration fiscale.

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.¬†You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list¬†Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: Mit der Funktion ‚ÄûRound-up Savings‚Äú k√∂nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen get√§tigte Kartentransaktion auf den n√§chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung f√ºhrt nicht zu einer √úberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du √ºber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verf√ºgen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgef√ºhrt.Du kannst immer nur eine ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl √ºberweisen.Du kannst die Funktion ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlie√üt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.Wie kann ich die "Aufrundungsregel" nutzen?Die Aktivierung der "Aufrundungsregel" geht schnell und einfach. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder Web-App von N26 ein:Gehe zum Bereich "Spaces".W√§hle den Space, auf den die Differenz zum aufgerundeten Betrag (das Restgeld) flie√üen soll.Tippe/Klicke auf "Verwalten" --> "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Schalte die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel verwalten" auf gr√ºn.W√§hle den Multiplikator und tippe/klicke anschlie√üend auf "Best√§tigen".Spare direkt bei deinem n√§chsten Einkauf mit deiner N26 Debitkarte!

question: Come verifico la mia identit√†?
answer: In qualit√† di banca, abbiamo bisogno di sapere chi sei. Ecco perch√© devi dimostrare la tua identit√† con un documento supportato quando apri un conto con noi o richiedi alcuni prodotti. Non ti chiederemo¬†mai¬†di dimostrare la tua identit√† per conto di altre persone o aziende. Abbiamo raccolto dei¬†suggerimenti per aiutarti a proteggere la tua identit√†.Puoi mostrarci il tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† in due modi:¬†foto o¬†video. Il modo in cui puoi dimostrare la tua identit√† dipende dalla tua nazionalit√†, dal tuo paese di residenza e dal tipo di documento d‚Äôidentit√† che utilizzi:Vivo in Germania (nuova tabella)Vivo in Spagna (nuova tabella)Vivo in Italia (nuova tabella)Vivo in un altro paese (nuova tabella)In quanto banca regolamentata e in possesso di piena licenza bancaria, N26 √® tenuta ad aderire a rigorosi standard e linee guida per quanto riguarda la verifica di tutti i potenziali clienti. Questi variano a seconda della nazionalit√†, motivo per cui possiamo eseguire il passaggio principale di verifica dell'identit√† solo con determinate tipologie di documenti per alcune nazionalit√†.Se i tuoi documenti d'identit√† non sono in un formato attualmente supportato, significa che non possiamo offrirti un conto al momento. Considera che la lista con i documenti accettati viene aggiornata continuamente, per cui ti consigliamo di controllare di tanto in tanto se √® stato aggiunto anche il tuo.La chat √® disponibile dal luned√¨ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you‚Äôll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10‚Ç¨ to activate the card).¬†An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10‚Ç¨ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‚ÄòGet an additional card‚Äô.Select ‚ÄòVirtual‚Äô at the top, then tap ‚ÄòChoose‚Äô at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‚ÄòGenerate virtual card‚Äô.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‚Äòcards‚ÄôLocate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‚Äòcard details‚ÄôYou will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: Can I order a checkbook?
answer: Because we‚Äôre a mobile bank, all of our services are digital‚Äîaccessible via our app or online. That‚Äôs why N26 doesn‚Äôt issue checkbooks. Instead, we offer lots of other convenient ways to transfer money without having to visit a branch.Here are a few ways you can transfer funds to your account or make payments:By bank transferVia MoneyBeam (instant payments between N26 accounts)With a bank cardVia direct deposit (by providing your RIB to your employer)

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

question: Wie kann ich mein Smartphone mit meinem Konto verkn√ºpfen oder trennen?
answer:
F√ºr die Nutzung deines N26 Kontos brauchst du eines der folgenden Smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s oder neuer, mindestens auf iOS 11 geupdated)
„Éª Android (6.0 oder neuer)Die Amazon Fire und Oxygen OS Versionen sind zurzeit leider nicht mit N26 kompatibel.Beachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verkn√ºpfen kannst.Wann muss ich mein Smartphone verkn√ºpfen?Du musst dein Smartphone verbinden bzw. entkoppeln, wenn du ein neues Konto bei N26 einrichtest, ein neues Endger√§t nutzt oder deine Telefonnummer wechselst.Wie kann ich mein N26 Konto mit meinem Handy verbinden?Smartphone zum ersten Mal verkn√ºpfenFolge dieser Anleitung, um dein Smartphone zum ersten Mal mit deinem Konto zu verbinden:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein ‚Äì du wirst automatisch aufgefordert, deine Telefonnummer zu best√§tigen.Du erh√§ltst einen 4-stelligen Verkn√ºpfungscode per SMS (neuen Tab). Sobald du ihn eingibst, wird dein Handy automatisch verkn√ºpft.Neues Endger√§t verkn√ºpfenBeachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verkn√ºpfen kannst.Falls du dein N26 Konto mit einem neuen Handy verbinden willst, musst du aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden (neuen Tab) zuerst dein altes Smartphone entkoppeln.So entkoppelst du dein altes Smartphone:Gehe auf üë§ Mein Konto (in der mobilen App) oder √ºber die Web App (neuer Tab) (neuen Tab)Tippe auf SicherheitTippe auf Smartphone entkn√ºpfen.Falls du auf dein altes Smartphone nicht mehr zugreifen kannst:Logge dich unter üë§ Mein Konto einTippe auf SicherheitPr√ºfe dein E-Mail-Postfach f√ºr weitere Anweisungen.Falls du dich √ºber ein neues Ger√§t in deinem Konto anmeldest, erh√§ltst du zwei Codes per SMS:Einen 6-stelligen Code zum EinloggenEinen 4-stelligen Code zum Verkn√ºpfen deines SmartphonesDen 6-stelligen Anmeldecode brauchst du, um dich in dein Konto einzuloggen. Dann kannst du dein Smartphone mithilfe des 4-stelligen Verkn√ºpfungscode verbinden.Beachte bitte: Wenn du deine SIM-Karte wechselst, aber dasselbe Smartphone nutzt, musst du es nicht erneut verkn√ºpfen bzw. entkoppeln.

question: Why can‚Äôt I get a loan?
answer: Applies to Germany and FranceWhen applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isn‚Äôt your main account, you‚Äôll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where you‚Äôre applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).We‚Äôll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This search will appear on your SCHUFA report but is only visible to you and won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isn‚Äôt the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).Once you‚Äôve sent an application to us, you‚Äôre unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). You‚Äôll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.The decision is then calculated through an automated process. We cannot perform manual checks.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you‚Äôll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10‚Ç¨ to activate the card).¬†An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10‚Ç¨ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‚ÄòGet an additional card‚Äô.Select ‚ÄòVirtual‚Äô at the top, then tap ‚ÄòChoose‚Äô at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‚ÄòGenerate virtual card‚Äô.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‚Äòcards‚ÄôLocate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‚Äòcard details‚ÄôYou will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: How does N26 Business Metal work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs ‚Ç¨16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.¬†Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.¬†Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.¬†How does it work?¬†The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?¬†Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney¬†Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person‚Äôs identity, and it‚Äôs not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.¬†As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.¬†Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:‚Ç¨1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs‚Ç¨5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500‚Ç¨ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050‚Ç¨ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:‚Ç¨20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Facebook erm√∂glicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Benutzerdefinierte Zielgruppen bestehen aus N26 Kunden und Internetnutzern, denen personalisierte Inhalte angezeigt werden, oder nur aus Internetnutzern, um dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von bestimmten Werbungen von uns auszuschlie√üen. Wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen, da du bereits N26 Kunde bist. Mithilfe von Lookalike Audiences k√∂nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte Werbung interessanter ist als f√ºr andere Facebook Nutzer. Diese sog. ‚ÄûLookalike-Audiences‚Äú sind unseren Kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Facebook Nutzer.¬†Um die oben beschrieben Vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir Facebook eine ‚Äúgehashte‚Äù Version deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse zur Verf√ºgung. Das sog. ‚ÄúHashing‚Äù ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung durch die deine Email-Adresse verschl√ºsselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. Deine gehashte E-Mail-Adresse wird von Facebook dahingehend abgeglichen, ob diese auch bei Facebook hinterlegt ist. Nach dem Abgleich, unabh√§ngig davon ob dieser erfolgreich war oder nicht, werden s√§mtliche gehashte E-Mail-Adressen innerhalb von 6-8 Stunden gel√∂scht. Facebook teilt diese Daten nicht mit Dritten oder anderen Werbetreibenden oder gew√§hrt diesen Zugang zu deinen Daten. Diese und weitere Informationen kannst du den AGB von Facebook (neuen Tab) entnehmen.¬†Facebook Ireland Limited √ºbermittelt Daten an Facebook Inc., USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 (‚ÄûDSGVO‚Äú) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verf√ºgbar sind.Sie k√∂nnen Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gem√§√ü Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen.¬†Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Google Customer MatchCustomer Match erm√∂glicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Benutzerdefinierte Zielgruppen bestehen aus N26 Kunden und Internetnutzern, denen personalisierte Inhalte angezeigt werden, oder nur aus Internetnutzern, um dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von bestimmten Werbungen von uns √ºber das Google Search Network, den Shopping Tab, Gmail, YouTube und Google Display Network auszuschlie√üen. Wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen. Mithilfe von Lookalike Audiences k√∂nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte Werbung interessanter ist als f√ºr andere Google Nutzer. Diese sog. ‚ÄûLookalike-Audiences‚Äú sind unseren Kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Google Nutzer.Um die oben beschriebenen Vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir Google eine gehashte Version Ihrer N26-E-Mail-Adresse zur Verf√ºgung. Das sog. ‚ÄûHashing‚Äú ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung, bei der Ihre E-Mail-Adresse so verschl√ºsselt wird, dass Sie √ºber diese gehashte E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden k√∂nnen. Google gleicht diese E-Mail-Adresse dann mit der potenziellen E-Mail-Adresse Ihres Google-Kontos ab. Wenn diese E-Mail-Adresse nicht √ºbereinstimmt, kann Google sie dennoch f√ºr die √úberpr√ºfung der Einhaltung der Richtlinien verwenden. Dar√ºber hinaus verwendet Google sie jedoch nicht f√ºr den Customer Match oder andere Google-Produkte. Die Daten werden von Google nicht l√§nger als 48 Stunden gespeichert, um die Zielgruppen zum Customer Match zu erstellen, und danach umgehend gel√∂scht. Google gibt diese Daten weder an Dritte noch an andere Werbetreibende weiter und gew√§hrt auch keinen Zugriff darauf. Diese und weitere Informationen finden Sie im Support-Artikel ‚ÄûVerwendung von Daten zum Customer Match durch Google (neuen Tab)‚Äú.Google Ireland Limited √ºbermittelt Daten an Google LLC, USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 (‚ÄûDSGVO‚Äú) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verf√ºgbar sind.Sie k√∂nnen Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gem√§√ü Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen.

question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as ‚ÄúDocuSign‚Äù.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

question: Espaces Partag√©s - Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôune procuration ?
answer: Le fondement juridique d‚ÄôEspaces Partag√©s repose sur la procuration (Kontovollmacht en Allemand).¬†Contrairement aux comptes joints classiques, les participants d‚Äôun espace partag√© n‚Äôont pas les m√™mes pouvoirs sur l‚Äôespace que son administrateur. Apr√®s avoir re√ßu une procuration, les participants obtiennent le droit d‚Äôagir au nom de l‚Äôadministrateur de l‚Äôespace pour effectuer des virements vers/depuis l‚Äôespace partag√© concern√©.La personne qui autorise un participant d‚Äôagir en son nom est appel√© l‚Äô‚Äùadministrateur‚Äù de l‚Äôespace. Ce dernier est le seul propri√©taire de l‚Äôespace partag√©. L‚Äôadministrateur doit √™tre un client N26 Premium, et donc poss√©der un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business You.Cela signifie que la personne ayant cr√©√© l‚Äôespace partag√© est son d√©tenteur l√©gal. L‚Äôadministrateur de l‚Äôespace partag√© :poss√®de tous les fonds disponibles dans l‚Äôespace partag√©peut effectuer des virements librement vers et depuis l‚Äôespace partag√©, √† tout momentpeut inviter des amis √† rejoindre un espace partag√© en leur donnant une procurationpeut r√©silier la procuration d‚Äôun participant √† tout momentpeut aussi cl√¥turer un espace partag√© apr√®s avoir retir√© un participant (tous les fonds de l‚Äôespace partag√© seront alors vir√©s vers le compte principal de l‚Äôadministrateur)En obtenant une procuration, les participants qui acceptent l‚Äôinvitation de l‚Äôadministrateur auront acc√®s √† tous les fonds disponibles dans l‚Äôespace partag√©. Cela signifie que chaque b√©n√©ficiaire peut aussi effectuer des virements librement vers et en dehors de l‚Äôespace partag√©.N26 Bank GmbH ne peut √™tre tenue responsable des paiements effectu√©s dans le cadre de la procuration.Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partag√©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces Partag√©s ?.D√©couvrez √©galement comment ajouter/supprimer des participants dans un espace partag√©.

question: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
answer: 3D Secure sch√ºtzt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zus√§tzlichen Passw√∂rter.Wenn du eine¬†Online-Zahlung¬†mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, best√§tigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unseren¬†Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verkn√ºpfte Smartphone gesendet.Wenn du einen Kauf √ºber dein Smartphone t√§tigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf best√§tigen und abschlie√üen kannst. Danach gehst du zur√ºck zur Website des H√§ndlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine Best√§tigung f√ºr deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.

question: Wie kann ich meine Best√§tigungs-PIN √§ndern?
answer: Schritt-f√ºr-Schritt Anleitung:iPhoneAndroidSchritt 1√ñffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf √Ñndere deinen Best√§tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der R√ºckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und best√§tige deine neue Best√§tigungs-PINSchritt 1√ñffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf √Ñndere deinen Best√§tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der R√ºckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und best√§tige deine neue Best√§tigungs-PINMit der Best√§tigungs-PIN best√§tigst du √úberweisungen und andere Transaktionen, die du in der App t√§tigst. Bei der Verkn√ºpfung deines Smartphones (neuen Tab) mit deinem Konto legst du die Best√§tigungs-PIN selbst fest. Falls du deinen PIN-Code √§ndern willst oder vergessen hast, kannst du jederzeit einen neuen in deiner App festlegen:Gehe auf üë§ Mein Konto > Sicherheit.Tippe auf √Ñndere deinen Best√§tigungscode.Gib den Token ein (die 10-stellige Nummer auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte, gleich unter deinem Namen; bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der R√ºckseite).Erstelle und best√§tige deine neue Best√§tigungs-PIN.Falls du sechsmal in Folge eine falsche Best√§tigungs-PIN eintr√§gst, musst du sie vor dem n√§chsten Versuch neu festlegen.Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gew√ºnschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Bedenke bitte, dass deine Best√§tigungs-PIN nicht dasselbe wie deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) ist. Falls du willst, kannst du aber f√ºr beide PINs dieselbe Zahlenkombination w√§hlen.

Comment cr√©er un Espace partag√© :¬†Cr√©ez un espace, puis s√©lectionnez-le pour y acc√©der
¬†S√©lectionnez le symbole + en haut √† droite de la page.

Recherchez puis s√©lectionnez le contact de votre choix dans la liste des utilisateurs N26. Si la personne que vous souhaitez inviter n'appara√Æt pas dans la liste de contacts, nous vous recommandons de lui demander de v√©rifier qu'il a accept√© d'√™tre visible par d'autres utilisateurs N26 depuis son application mobile, dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Informations personnelles.

question: Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?
answer: La carta sostitutiva √® gratuita per tutti i clienti possessori di un conto N26 Smart, You e Metal.Se hai aperto il tuo conto prima delle seguenti date, sia la nuova carta che la spedizione al tuo indirizzo sono gratuiti nei paesi in cui N26 √® disponibile (nuova tabella):16/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale nella Grande Europa)25/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Italia o Spagna)11/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Francia)18/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Germania, Austria o Svizzera)Se il tuo conto √® stato creato in seguito, la tua carta sostitutiva avr√† lo stesso costo di una carta nuova.Se attualmente ti trovi in un Paese non supportato da N26, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono, cos√¨ possiamo effettuare l‚Äôordine per te. La consegna al di fuori di questi Paesi (nuova tabella) potrebbe comportare un costo aggiuntivo.¬†Quanto tempo ci vorr√†?Tutte le carte sostitutive delle carte scadute o in scadenza vengono spedite tramite consegna Standard. Richiede fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed √® gratuita. Nelle zone rurali o difficili da raggiungere potrebbe volerci pi√π tempo. Per rimanere aggiornato sui progressi nella consegna, vai alla schermata Home della tua app mobile N26.La mia carta sta per scadere, cosa devo fare?Posso continuare a usare la mia carta dopo che √® scaduta?La mia carta √® gi√† scaduta ma non ho mai ricevuto una sostituzione

question: Dove investe i miei soldi N26?
answer: Ci sforziamo di fornire ai nostri clienti depositi per i prestiti (a condizione che abbiano un appropriato rating di credito). Per la liquidit√† non richiesta nel business dei clienti, la nostra strategia di investimento √® a basso rischio.Investiamo i soldi dei nostri clienti in breve tempo con la Deutsche Bundesbank e altre banche europee nell'area dell'euro, solamente con buone classi di rischio. E rifinanziamo i clienti di diritto pubblico principalmente in Germania (citt√† e comuni) e investendo in titoli di stato in euro.Non siamo un istituto di trading book. Cio√®: non scambiamo per profitto a breve termine.E non ci occupiamo di speculazioni, sia sul cibo, sui cambi, su bitcoin o su altre classi di attivit√†.

question: Was ist eine Pf√§ndung?
answer: Wenn du einem Dritten, dem Finanzamt oder einer sonstigen Beh√∂rde Geld schuldest, kann es zu einer Pf√§ndung kommen. Doch was bedeutet ‚ÄúPf√§ndung‚Äù genau?Bei der Pf√§ndung ‚Äì auch Pf√§ndungs- oder √úberweisungsbeschluss genannt ‚Äì handelt es sich um eine staatliche Ma√ünahme, bei der durch einen Gerichtsvollzieher oder ein Gericht das verf√ºgbare Geld auf deinem Konto beschlagnahmt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass du dein Geld nicht anderweitig ausgibst und die Schulden bei deinem Gl√§ubiger beglichen werden.Was passiert bei einer Pf√§ndung?Wir sind gesetzlich dazu verpflichtet, dein Konto sofort zu sperren, wenn uns ein Pf√§ndungs- und √úberweisungsbeschluss zugestellt wird. Dar√ºber hinaus m√ºssen wir den Pf√§ndungsbetrag an den Gl√§ubiger auszahlen. Dies tun wir 4 Wochen nach Zustellung des Pf√§ndungs- und √úberweisungsbeschlusses, sofern du keine anderen Ma√ünahmen ergreifst.¬†Wenn wir eine Pf√§ndung f√ºr dein Konto erhalten, schicken wir dir eine Nachricht unter ‚ÄúNachrichten von N26‚Äù in deiner N26 App. Die Nachricht enth√§lt folgende Informationen:Datum¬†Name des Gl√§ubigers (und Name des rechtlichen Vertreters)AktenzeichenBetragBis die gesamte Forderung beglichen ist, bleibt dein Konto gesperrt. Das hei√üt, du kannst keine Zahlungen mit deinem N26 Konto ausf√ºhren. Sobald die Pf√§ndung aufgehoben ist, benachrichtigen wir dich in deinem Postfach ‚ÄúNachrichten von N26‚Äù. Solltest du Fragen zur Pf√§ndung haben, setze dich bitte mit deinem Gl√§ubiger oder dem zust√§ndigen Vollstreckungsgericht in Verbindung.

question: How to get a loan?
answer: Applies to Germany and FranceWith N26 Credit, we‚Äôve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between ‚Ç¨1.000 to ‚Ç¨50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.For Younited Credit, you will receive a referral link that will take you from the app to continue the process with Younited.Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products : We‚Äôll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (you‚Äôll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if you‚Äôve used N26 for less than 6 months).Prove your identity: We‚Äôll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if you‚Äôre a non-EU citizen, you‚Äôll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.Edit your answers during the application process: Once you‚Äôre happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and we‚Äôll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you won‚Äôt be able to request another loan during that time.Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, you‚Äôll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if you¬†change your plan¬†or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.For more information, see the N26 Credit¬†T&Cs (new tab).

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes‚Äîyour Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact‚Äîyou create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You‚Äôre the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: Warum hat mir ein Geldautomat kein Bargeld ausgezahlt?
answer: Es kann passieren: Ein Geldautomat zahlt dir kein Bargeld aus und in einigen F√§llen wird dein Konto trotzdem belastet. √úberpr√ºfe zun√§chst die folgenden Punkte:Stelle in deinen Karteneinstellungen sicher, dass Bargeldabhebungen aktiviert sind. Deine Karteneinstellungen findest du im Aktionen-Tab.√úberpr√ºfe, dass dein individuell einstellbares Limit f√ºr Bargeldabhebungen mindestens so hoch ist, wie der Betrag, den du abheben wolltest.Beachte, dass du nur soviel Geld abheben kannst, wie du Guthaben auf deinem Konto hast. Zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein oder beantrag einen Dispokredit, um √ºber genug Guthaben zu verf√ºgen.Das maximal einstellbare Tageslimit liegt bei 1000‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden. Dennoch haben viele Automaten ihre eigene Limits, sodass es vorkommen kann, dass du an einem Automaten nicht dein ganzes Tageslimit auf einmal abheben kannst.Au√üerdem gilt ein Limit von 2500‚Ç¨ pro Kalenderwoche.Ich habe kein Geld erhalten, aber mein Konto wurde trotzdem belastetDer Betrag, der in der App von deinem Guthaben abgezogen wurde, ist zun√§chst nur eine Autorisierung, d.h. eine Reservierung des Betrags. Da die Transaktion nicht erfolgreich war, verf√§llt der reservierte Betrag normalerweise nach wenigen Stunden - maximal 12 Werktagen - und wird deinem Konto dann automatisch wieder gutgeschrieben. Nur wenn der Betrag tats√§chlich abgebucht wird, k√∂nnen wir ihn reklamieren, also zur√ºckfordern. Der Betrag wurde erst abgebucht, wenn er auf deinen herunterladbaren Kontoausz√ºgen erscheint, (nicht nur in der Umsatzanzeige in der App).Das bedeutet: Wenn der Betrag auf deinen herunterladbaren Kontoausz√ºgen erscheint und/oder nach 12 Werktagen noch nicht deinem Konto wieder gutgeschrieben wurde, kannst du den Betrag reklamieren, wobei wir dir selbstverst√§ndlich gerne helfen.Unterdessen empfehlen wir, mit CASH26 oder bei einem Geldautomaten eines anderen Geldinstituts Geld abzuheben.

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.
