question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren‚Äôt sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you‚Äôve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to üë§ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card: 30‚Ç¨Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card 65‚Ç¨

answer: Derzeit nur f√ºr iOS-Nutzer in der mobilen App verf√ºgbar.¬†Kontaktloses Bezahlen ist sehr praktisch. Vielleicht bevorzugst du es jedoch, diese Zahlungsmethode zu deaktivieren, um unberechtigte Transaktionen mit deiner Karte zu verhindern. Deshalb kannst du jetzt gezielt NFC-Zahlungen f√ºr deine Karte deaktivieren:Gehe auf Karten.Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gew√ºnschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Schalte die Funktion Kontaktlose Bezahlung aus.Die von dir vorgenommenen √Ñnderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gew√§hlte Karte angewendet. Beachte bitte, dass sich diese Einstellungen auf deine physische Karte beziehen. Zur Verwaltung deiner Einstellungen f√ºr Google Pay und Apple Pay haben wir spezielle Artikel f√ºr dich zusammengestellt. Falls de Probleme mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlfunktion hast, lerne hier, wie du sie beheben kannst.

question: Come ricevere i messaggi push?
answer: Ti inviamo messaggi push per finalizzare i trasferimenti (come¬†MoneyBeam) o per confermare un servizio (come nel caso di¬†CASH26). Se non ricevi questi messaggi, verifica innanzitutto che le notifiche siano abilitate sia per il telefono che per l'app. Quindi prova alcuni dei nostri suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi, a seconda dello smartphone:iOSElimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dall'App Store Apple e riassocia lo smartphone.Controlla di aver effettuato l‚Äôaccesso all‚Äôapp N26.Assicurati che la messaggistica per l'app sia stata attivata nelle impostazioni generali dello smartphone.AndroidElimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dal Google Play Store Google e riassocia lo smartphone.Vai nelle Impostazioni conto e attiva le notifiche cliccando su Impostazioni App e poi Notifiche.Huawei e Xiaomi: vai in Impostazioni, Impostazioni avanzate e Impostazioni batteria. Imposta N26 come app protetta.OnePlus: seleziona l‚Äôottimizzazione della batteria, poi l'app N26 e Non ottimizzare.Oppo: disattiva l'ottimizzazione della batteria per l'app e bloccala in Panoramica app recenti.

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

question: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
answer: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easy‚Äì‚Äìall you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once you‚Äôre there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.¬†Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit card¬†With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phone‚Äîthere‚Äôs no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of ‚Ç¨900 within 24 hours.¬†How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of ‚Ç¨50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once you‚Äôre ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.¬†Here‚Äôs what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you don‚Äôt make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and you‚Äôll need to generate a new one.¬†If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You don‚Äôt need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.¬†N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).¬†

question: How to protect my identity?
answer: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Bei der Verkn√ºpfung deines Smartphones (neuen Tab) mit deinem Konto legst du die Best√§tigungs-PIN selbst fest. Falls du deinen PIN-Code √§ndern willst oder vergessen hast, kannst du jederzeit einen neuen in deiner App festlegen:Gehe auf üë§ Mein Konto > Sicherheit.Tippe auf √Ñndere deinen Best√§tigungscode.Gib den Token ein (die 10-stellige Nummer auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte, gleich unter deinem Namen; bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der R√ºckseite).Erstelle und best√§tige deine neue Best√§tigungs-PIN.Falls du sechsmal in Folge eine falsche Best√§tigungs-PIN eintr√§gst, musst du sie vor dem n√§chsten Versuch neu festlegen.Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzen. question: Comment effectuer un virement SEPA?
answer:
Vous pouvez effectuer des virements vers tous les pays faisant partie de la zone SEPA, si la banque r√©ceptrice accepte les virements en euros.Vous pouvez effectuer un virement sortant depuis votre application mobile N26 ou depuis sa version web app.n26.com (nouvel onglet). Pour cela : Rendez-vous dans la rubrique Envoyer en haut √† gauche de l‚Äô√©cran d‚ÄôaccueilAppuyez sur Envoyer, puis s√©lectionnez Virement bancaireChoisissez Ajouter un destinataire et saisissez les coordonn√©es bancaires du b√©n√©ficiaireEntrez le montant de votre virement V√©rifiez l‚Äô√©cran de confirmation (qui r√©sume votre virement) Depuis cet √©cran, vous pouvez √©galement planifier la date d‚Äôenvoi de votre virement Confirmez avec votre code de validation. Vous devez ensuite confirmer ou annuler votre virement par notification push depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile de votre smartphone synchronis√©. Nous ne pouvons pas bloquer un virement sortant ou modifier les coordonn√©es bancaires du destinataire apr√®s que le virement a √©t√© valid√© depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile N26.Si vous ne pouvez pas confirmer votre virement depuis votre application, veuillez v√©rifier les points suivants :Assurez-vous d‚Äôavoir une connexion internet stable. Assurez-vous d‚Äôavoir activ√© les notifications depuis les param√®tres de votre smartphone. Assurez-vous d‚Äôutiliser un appareil synchronis√©.Une fois votre virement effectu√©, vous pouvez t√©l√©charger une confirmation de virement au format PDF. Pour cela :Rendez-vous sur votre liste de transactions (√©cran d‚Äôaccueil de votre application) Trouvez et s√©lectionnez le virement.Faites d√©filer votre √©cran vers le bas et s√©lectionnez Confirmation de virement.
Vous pouvez √©galement effectuer des virements SEPA sortants directement depuis les Espaces auxquels des IBAN sont associ√©s. Il vous suffit d‚Äôacc√©der √† l‚ÄôEspace auquel est associ√© un IBAN, d‚Äôappuyer sur ¬´ Envoyer ¬ª, puis de s√©lectionner ¬´ Virement bancaire ¬ª. Ce virement fonctionnera alors comme un paiement sortant normal.

question: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder ausl√§ndischen Entit√§ten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, die laut FATCA f√ºr U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.FATCA steht f√ºr Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. Eingef√ºhrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, ausl√§ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute daf√ºr zu nutzen, ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr √ºber FATCA oder den IRS erf√§hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.Anders als die meisten L√§nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-Staatsb√ºrger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen L√§nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer B√ºrger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen B√ºrger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.Um zuverl√§ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?
Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, hei√üt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine pers√∂nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zun√§chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine Steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlie√ülich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.
Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen f√ºr dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil best√§tigst.Falls sich deine Lage ver√§ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 
Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You‚Äôll have to activate your card whether it‚Äôs your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you‚Äôve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you‚Äôre activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction ‚Äî in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail ‚Äî for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card ‚Äî you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you‚Äôll still be able to activate that new card.

question: Konto gem√§√ü ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG
answer: Das Konto gem√§√ü ¬ß¬ß 39 ff. ZKG ist kein N26 Standardkonto. Das Zahlungskontengesetz (ZKG) gibt allen Verbrauchern, die sich rechtm√§√üig in der Europ√§ischen Union aufhalten, das Recht, ein Basiszahlungskonto zu f√ºhren. Dies gilt f√ºr Personen, die in einem unterst√ºtzten Land leben.Unser Basiskonto hat eine monatliche Geb√ºhr von 6‚Ç¨. Alle anderen Geb√ºhren findest du in unseren Preislisten (neuen Tab). Wenn du noch kein Bankkonto bei N26 oder einem anderen Finanzinstitut in Deutschland hast, kannst du ein Basiskonto beantragen. Unter bestimmten Umst√§nden kann N26 deine Anfrage ablehnen.Bitte beachte, dass einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen wie N26 Dispo, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, oder N26 Metal f√ºr das N26 Basiskonto nicht verf√ºgbar sind. Um ein Basiskonto zu beantragen:Lade das Antragsformular (neuen Tab) herunter, f√ºlle es aus und unterschreibe es von Hand.Dem Antrag ist ein Coupon zur Legitimation bei der Deutschen Post AG beigef√ºgt. Gehe zur n√§chstgelegenen Postfiliale, um damit deine Identit√§t nachzuweisen.Sende uns zus√§tzlich den ausgef√ºllten und unterschriebenen Antrag postalisch zu: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto Klosterstra√üe 62 - 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandSobald wir dein Formular erhalten und festgestellt haben, ob wir ein Basiskonto f√ºr dich er√∂ffnen k√∂nnen, senden wir dir eine E-Mail mit dem Vertrag und den AGB (neuen Tab).Den unterschriebenen Vertrag sendest du dann ebenfalls an unsere Adresse.¬†Sobald wir den Vertrag erhalten haben, werden wir dein N26 Basiskonto √∂ffnen. Du erh√§ltst dann eine Benachrichtigung.Warum bekomme ich kein Basiskonto?Unter bestimmten Umst√§nden kann N26 deinen Antrag auf ein Basiskonto ablehnen. Das ist der Fall, wenn:du au√üerhalb eines von uns unterst√ºtzten Landes lebst.du bereits ein N26 Bankkonto oder ein anderes Bankkonto in Deutschland hast und es in vollem Umfang nutzen kannst.du innerhalb der letzten 3 Jahre wegen einer Straftat gegen die Bank, ihre Mitarbeiter oder ihre Kunden verurteilt wurdest.du bereits in der Vergangenheit ein Basiskonto bei N26 unterhalten hast, das wegen √úberziehung oder unzul√§ssiger Nutzung geschlossen wurde.du die Mindestanforderungen gem√§√ü des Geldw√§sche- und Kreditwesengesetzes nicht erf√ºllst.

question: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
answer:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird ‚ÄúBesitzer‚Äù genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das hei√üt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers √ºber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verf√ºgen.Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space
ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.kann √ºber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verf√ºgen.kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.kann einen Shared Space schlie√üen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).
Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces √ºber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verf√ºgen k√∂nnen.Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden f√ºr Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

question: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?

Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You‚Äôll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism¬†As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26‚Äôs public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API¬† & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as ‚Äúpending‚Äù will be classified as ‚Äúbooked‚Äù transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We‚Äôve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
answer: Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wie¬†MoneyBeams¬†durchzuf√ºhren, √ºberpr√ºft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber wei√üt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie sich h√∂chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch w√§hlen, ob du selbst dich f√ºr andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen m√∂chtest.Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
answer: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.‚ÄùAll of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

question: Comment modifier les plafonds de ma carte ?
answer: Vous pouvez modifier les plafonds de votre carte depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile N26 ou bien depuis votre espace client en ligne. Chaque modification effectu√©e est imm√©diatement prise en compte pour la carte s√©lectionn√©e.Pour modifier vos plafonds depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile :Connectez-vous et allez dans CartesFaites d√©filer les cartes avec votre doigt sur l‚Äô√©cran puis choisissez celle o√π vous souhaitez effectuer des modificationsCliquez sur Param√®tres de la carteCliquez sur Limites quotidiennesPour modifier vos plafonds depuis votre espace client :Connectez-vous (nouvel onglet) et acc√©dez √† Mon compteCliquez sur la carte de votre choix dans la section CartesPlafondsLes limites quotidiennes¬†sont valables pendant 24 heures et non un jour civil, elles sont d√©finis ainsi :1 000 ‚Ç¨ pour les retraits au distributeur automatique de billets5 000 ‚Ç¨ pour les paiements en ligne et magasins confondusLa limite mensuelle¬†est valable sur¬†sur le mois fixe (et non une p√©riode de 30 jours) et est d√©finie ainsi :20 000 ‚Ç¨ pour les paiements en ligne et magasins confondus

question: What are Instant transfers?
answer: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipient‚Äôs bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you won‚Äôt have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49‚Ç¨Spain - 1,99‚Ç¨Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99‚Ç¨The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000‚Ç¨ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000‚Ç¨ per day). If you‚Äôre using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If you‚Äôre paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiver‚Äôs details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Come ricevere la mia carta pi√π velocemente con la consegna express?
answer: La consegna express √® un'ottima soluzione se hai bisogno di ricevere la tua carta in tempi brevi o se per qualche motivo la prima consegna non √® andata a buon fine.Ti verr√† data la possibilit√† di selezionare la consegna express quando scegli un metodo di consegna per la tua prima carta o se riordini una carta. Riceverai, quindi, un link di tracciamento via email. Se non sei a casa al momento della consegna e la cassetta della posta non √® accessibile, la carta verr√† lasciata presso un punto di ritiro nelle vicinanze (puoi trovarlo tramite il link di tracciabilit√†). La carta sar√† custodita nel punto di ritiro per un periodo di tempo limitato, dopodich√© verr√† restituita a N26. In tal caso, ti contatteremo via e-mail.Se selezioni la spedizione express, ricorda che:La tua nuova Mastercard N26 ti arriver√† entro 3 - 5 giorni lavorativi. Al momento non si effettuano consegne in altri Paesi.Non √® possibile annullare o modificare una consegna express dopo che √® stata selezionata come metodo di consegna.Per chiudere un conto, si dovr√† pagare la consegna express della carta.Se la carta non √® arrivata entro 3-5 giorni lavorativi dall'ordine, controlla il link di tracciabilit√† per aggiornamenti. Puoi utilizzare il link anche per informare direttamente DHL sui dettagli dell‚Äôindirizzo di consegna o per reindirizzare la spedizione se non puoi essere presente al momento della consegna.Quanto costa la consegna express?N26 Standard, Smart e You: Prima carta richiesta all'apertura del conto: 25‚Ç¨Carta riordinata: 30‚Ç¨Carta extra N26 You: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal:Prima carta richiesta all'apertura del conto: 25‚Ç¨Carta riordinata: 65‚Ç¨

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app‚Äì‚Äìno debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store‚Äì‚Äìit‚Äôs that simple. Plus, you don‚Äôt have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you‚Äôll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.¬†If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of ‚Ç¨2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.

question: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
answer: Wof√ºr steht PSD2?Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) ist eine √ºberarbeitete europ√§ische Richtlinie und erm√∂glicht dir, √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzuf√ºhren.Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern √ºber eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:Du kannst √ºber einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenf√ºhren und sie √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen Zahlungsausl√∂sedienst (ZAD) nutzen.Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund √ºber unseren Partner Token.io.Wie funktioniert's?Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen Zahlungausl√∂sedienst, wirst Du √ºber Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu best√§tigen.¬†In unserer Datenschutzerkl√§rung (neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich √ºber die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen f√ºr die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der √ºberarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erf√ºllen.FAQsWarum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zun√§chst √ºber unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.Wie kann ich eine Zugriffsbest√§tigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt habe, widerrufen?Um eine Zugangsbest√§tigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.*gilt f√ºr alle L√§nder im EWR.

question: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
answer: Die folgenden Angaben wurden nur zu Informationszwecken erstellt und dienen nicht der steuerlichen, rechtlichen oder buchhalterischen Beratung und sollten auch nicht als solche verstanden werden.N26 sammelt deine Daten haupts√§chlich aus zwei Gr√ºnden: um die "Know Your Customer"-Anforderungen zu erf√ºllen und um die Meldepflicht gegen√ºber den zust√§ndigen Steuerbeh√∂rden zu erf√ºllen.¬†Verpflichtung zur Identifizierung unserer Kunden nach den sogenannten "Know your customer"-RegelnWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind wir nach den geltenden Steuergesetzen verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen von dir zu sammeln, um dich f√ºr steuerliche Zwecke zu identifizieren. Dazu geh√∂ren vor allem dein Name, deine Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die L√§nder, in denen du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist (Steuerwohnsitz / Steuerwohnsitze), deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder deren √Ñquivalent sowie dein Geburtsort und -datum.Im Folgenden sind allgemeine Informationen zu den Definitionen von Steuerwohnsitz und Steueridentifikationsnummer aufgef√ºhrt.SteuerwohnsitzIn der Regel hat man einen Wohnsitz, in dem Land , in dem man wohnt (Wohnsitzadresse). Man kann jedoch in zwei oder mehr L√§ndern steuerlich ans√§ssig sein (Steuerwohnsitz haben). Das liegt daran, dass die L√§nder zur Bestimmung des steuerlichen Wohnsitzes unterschiedliche Kriterien (Formen der Bindung) verwenden. Zu diesen Kriterien geh√∂ren u. a. eine l√§ngere physische Anwesenheit, die Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit, der Besitz von Eigentum usw. Wenn es ein Steuerabkommen zwischen den L√§ndern gibt, wird der steuerliche Wohnsitz aufgrund der in einem solchen Abkommen normalerweise enthaltenen Kollisionsnormeneinem der beteiligten L√§nder zugewiesen.Wenn du beispielsweise eine st√§ndige Wohnst√§tte in Land A und einen vor√ºbergehenden Wohnsitz in Land B hast, kann es sein, dass die Regeln des Steuerabkommens zwischen Land A und B vorsehen, dass du in Land A steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, wo du eine st√§ndige Wohnst√§tte hast, und nicht in Land B, wo du einen vor√ºbergehenden Wohnsitz hast (wobei "st√§ndige Wohnst√§tte" eine st√§rkere Form der Bindung darstellt als "vor√ºbergehender Wohnsitz"). Wenn du dir unsicher bist, wo du steuerans√§ssig bist, musst du das mit deiner Steuerverwaltung und/oder deinem Steuerberater kl√§ren.SteueridentifikationsnummerDie Steueridentifikationsnummer (Steuer-IdNr.) ist eine eindeutige Kombination aus Buchstaben oder Zahlen, die dir von dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, zugewiesen wird. Die Steuer-IdNr. identifiziert dich f√ºr Zwecke der Steuerverwaltung in dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist. Die Steuer-IdNr. ist auch n√ºtzlich, um Steuerpflichtige zu identifizieren, die in anderen L√§ndern investieren. Die Spezifikationen f√ºr die Steuer-IdNr. (d. h. die Anzahl der Buchstaben, Zahlen und ihre Reihenfolge) werden von den Steuerverwaltungen der einzelnen L√§nder festgelegt. W√§hrend die meisten L√§nder Steuer-IdNr. vergeben, gibt es einige, die keine Steuer-IdNr. vergeben. Auf dem Portal f√ºr den automatischen Informationsaustausch der OECD (neuen Tab) findest du n√ºtzliche Informationen zu den Steuer-IdNrn. (vor allem, wo du sie findest und und ihre Spezifikationen). Bei Zweifeln √ºber deine Steuer-IdNr. empfehlen wir dir jedoch, deinen Steuerberater oder deine Steuerverwaltung zu konsultieren.Verpflichtung zur Meldung steuerlich relevanter Informationen bestimmter Kunden an die zust√§ndigen Steuerbeh√∂rdenWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind auch wir verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen regelm√§√üig an die zust√§ndige Steuerbeh√∂rde zu melden. Abh√§ngig von deiner IBAN kann die empfangende Steuerbeh√∂rde in Deutschland, Italien, Spanien oder Frankreich liegen.Besonders erw√§hnenswert sind die Berichte nach dem Common Reporting Standard (neuen Tab) (CRS) und dem Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (neuen Tab) (FATCA). Falls du steuerlich in einem Land ans√§ssig bist, das CRS anwendet und/oder wenn du in den USA steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, tauscht die empfangende Steuerbeh√∂rde die von N26 erhaltenen Informationen im Rahmen des automatischen Informationsaustauschs gem√§√ü CRS und FATCA mit dem Land aus, in dem du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist.Damit N26 seinen Meldepflichten, insbesondere in Bezug auf CRS und FATCA, nachkommen kann, m√ºssen wir genaue und aktuelle steuerrelevante Informationen von dir sammeln (sogenannte Selbstauskunftsdaten). Zu diesen Daten geh√∂ren Name, Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die L√§nder, in denen du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, Steuer-IdNr. sowie Geburtsort und -datum. Wenn du in den USA steuerlich ans√§ssig bist (Person der Vereinigten Staaten), solltest du auch deine US-Steuer-IdNr (neuen Tab).¬†angeben. Bitte folge diesem Link (neuen Tab), um mehr √ºber FATCA zu erfahren und was du gegebenenfalls unternehmen musst, um herauszufinden, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und uns daher deine US-Steuer-IdNr. mitteilen solltest.Wir sind verpflichtet, regelm√§√üig zu √ºberpr√ºfen, ob deine in unserem System gespeicherten steuerlich relevanten Informationen korrekt sind (sogenannte laufende Due Diligence). Sollten sich im Rahmen der Due Diligence Ungenauigkeiten ergeben, setzen wir uns mit dir in Verbindung, um genaue und aktuelle Informationen zu erhalten.Unsere EmpfehlungBeachte bitte, dass wir als allerletztes Mittel restriktive Ma√ünahmen f√ºr dein Konto ergreifen m√ºssen, sollten wir nicht in der Lage sein, genaue und aktuelle Informationen f√ºr die oben beschriebenen Zwecke f√ºr CRS und FATCA innerhalb der geltenden Fristen zu erhalten.Wir raten dir, deine steuerlich relevanten Informationen regelm√§√üig zu √ºberpr√ºfen und zu aktualisieren. Bitte bedenke, dass eine Nichtbeachtung auch unmittelbare Folgen f√ºr dich haben kann, wie z. B. die Verh√§ngung von Bu√ügeldern durch die Steuerbeh√∂rde. Um deine Informationen zu √ºberpr√ºfen und zu aktualisieren, schaue in deine N26 App:Gehe zu Kontodetails > Pers√∂nliche Details > SteuerinformationenW√§hle Neues Steuerland hinzuf√ºgen. Gib an, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und folge den AnweisungenUm ein weiteres Steuerland hinzuzuf√ºgen (wenn du in mehr als einem Land steuerlich ans√§ssig bist), klicke auf "Neues Steuerland hinzuf√ºgen" und folge den AnweisungenDas bestehende Steuerland kann erst entfernt werden, nachdem du ein neues Steuerland hinzugef√ºgt hastWichtige InformationenDu kannst die Steuerinformationen, die wir aktuell von dir erfasst haben, jederzeit √ºberpr√ºfen. Daf√ºr gehst du auf: Kontodetails > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerinformationen.Deine personenbezogenen Daten werden in jedem Fall sicher gespeichert und nur zur Erf√ºllung von CRS, FATCA und √§hnlichen Anforderungen verwendet.Wir k√∂nnen dir keine Auskunft √ºber deinen Steuerstatus geben. Wenn du dir nicht sicher bist, bespreche die Angelegenheit mit einem Steuerberater und/oder der Steuerbeh√∂rde.

question: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
answer: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easy‚Äì‚Äìall you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once you‚Äôre there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.¬†Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit card¬†With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phone‚Äîthere‚Äôs no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of ‚Ç¨900 within 24 hours.¬†How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of ‚Ç¨50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once you‚Äôre ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.¬†Here‚Äôs what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you don‚Äôt make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and you‚Äôll need to generate a new one.¬†If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You don‚Äôt need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.¬†N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).¬†

question: Wie melde ich mein N26 Konto f√ºr meine Steuerzahlungen in Frankreich an?
answer: (gilt f√ºr alle in Frankreich ans√§ssigen Kunden)Nach dem allgemeinen Franz√∂sischen Steuergesetzbuch sind alle in Frankreich ans√§ssigen Personen verpflichtet, all ihre Bankkonten anzugeben, die sie innerhalb des Jahres der Einkommenserkl√§rung er√∂ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen haben. Dazu geh√∂rt auch dein N26 Bankkonto. So funktioniert‚Äôs:Markiere in deiner Steuererkl√§rung das K√§stchen Ausl√§ndisches Konto er√∂ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).F√ºlle das Cerfa n¬∞ 3917 Formular (neuen Tab) aus und f√ºge es deiner Steuererkl√§rung bei.Erfahre mehr zu diesem Thema in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) auf unserem Blog

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‚Äòlookalike audiences‚Äô are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: Warum konnte mein Wise-Konto nicht verkn√ºpft werden?

question: Why isn‚Äôt my photo verification working?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review the¬†guide (new tab)¬†we‚Äôve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photo¬†verifications¬†fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure you‚Äôre the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn‚Äôt go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.¬†

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‚Äòowner‚Äô or the person who created the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‚Äòvisible‚Äô to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner‚Äôs contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô add participant flow.You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‚Äòlearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚Äòinvite new member‚Äô button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the ‚Äúlegal screen‚Äù so be sure to read all the information within the ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C‚Äôs then tap ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô button.Tap ‚ÄòSend invite‚Äô on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‚Äòsend invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?¬†N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business¬†and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.¬†¬†What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.¬†In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank¬Æ sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.¬†How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account¬†
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint¬Æ ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.¬†
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.¬†¬†I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: Comment bloquer un pr√©l√®vement automatique ?
answer: Si vous attendez un pr√©l√®vement automatique √† venir, vous avez la possibilit√© de le bloquer en suivant les √©tapes d√©crites dans cet article. Cependant, avant de remplir et de nous envoyer le formulaire de blocage de pr√©l√®vement automatique, veuillez lire les informations suivantes :Identifiant cr√©ancier SEPA (ICS) et r√©f√©rence unique de mandat (RUM) : vous devrez sp√©cifier l‚ÄôICS et la RUM. Pour trouver ces informations, allez dans l‚Äôapplication et v√©rifiez les d√©tails de la transaction du pr√©l√®vement automatique pr√©c√©dent ou contactez le commer√ßant (notez que l‚ÄôIBAN et le nom du commer√ßant ne suffisent pas).Les pi√®ces jointes ne doivent pas d√©passer 25 MB : lorsque vous enverrez le formulaire requis, veillez √† ce que le total de vos pi√®ces jointes ne d√©passe pas 25 MB.Signature du document : si cela est possible, il est pr√©f√©rable de signer manuscritement le formulaire avant de nous l‚Äôenvoyer. Cependant, nous acceptons √©galement les signatures suivantes :Signature √©lectronique : elle doit √™tre identique √† celle du document que vous avez utilis√© pour ouvrir votre compte N26.Signature num√©rique : une signature num√©rique ne sera valid√©e que si nous pouvons la v√©rifier. Il est possible de cr√©er une signature num√©rique √† l‚Äôaide de fournisseurs tels que ¬´ DocuSign ¬ª.Enfin, il est important de noter que l‚Äôannulation d‚Äôun pr√©l√®vement automatique ne fait que bloquer les paiements mais n‚Äôannule en aucun cas le contrat que vous avez pass√© avec le commer√ßant.Que dois-je faire pour bloquer un pr√©l√®vement automatique ?Veuillez suivre les √©tapes ci-dessous, remplir le formulaire et contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat ou par t√©l√©phone :T√©l√©chargez et remplissez ce formulaire (nouvel onglet).Remplissez le formulaire en pr√©cisant ce que vous souhaitez bloquer (identifiant cr√©ancier SEPA, r√©f√©rence unique de mandat ou blocage complet). Notez que certaines de ces informations figurent dans les pr√©l√®vements automatiques pr√©c√©dents effectu√©s par le commer√ßant en question, que vous pouvez consulter dans votre liste de transactions.Apposez votre signature (manuscrite, √©lectronique ou num√©rique).Vous devez ensuite contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat (pour une v√©rification sans difficult√©s) ou par t√©l√©phone. Nos sp√©cialistes vous aideront √† mener √† bien ce processus. Si vous remplissez le formulaire √† l‚Äôavance, vous acc√©l√©rerez le processus !

question: How does N26 Business Smart work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs ‚Ç¨4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard‚Äôs exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn‚Äôt charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard‚Äôs rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
answer: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easy‚Äì‚Äìall you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once you‚Äôre there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.¬†Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit card¬†With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phone‚Äîthere‚Äôs no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of ‚Ç¨900 within 24 hours.¬†How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of ‚Ç¨50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once you‚Äôre ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.¬†Here‚Äôs what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you don‚Äôt make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and you‚Äôll need to generate a new one.¬†If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You don‚Äôt need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.¬†N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).¬†

question: What are ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: ¬øPor qu√© ha fallado mi compra online?
