Prueba cambiando de WiFi a 3G/4G o viceversa.Si utilizas un dispositivo iOS, aseg√∫rate de que el modo No Molestar est√° desactivado.Si la cantidad que muestra la p√°gina del comerciante es diferente de la que se muestra en el mensaje push, se puede deber al tipo de cambio de una divisa a euros.Aseg√∫rate tambi√©n de desactivar los adblokers que se ejecuten en tu navegador.

question: Commissione sui depositi superiori a 50.000 ‚Ç¨
answer: A partire da Luglio 2022, non addebiteremo pi√π questa quotaPer ogni conto (eccetto N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal e N26 Business Metal) aperto a partire dal 19/10/2020 si applica una commissione per la tenuta del conto in caso di saldo superiore a 50.000‚Ç¨, come indicato nei Termini e condizioni durante il processo di apertura del conto.Clicca qui (nuova tabella) per i relativi Termini e Condizioni.La commissione √® pari allo 0,5% per anno e viene calcolata su base mensile esclusivamente sull'importo che supera la soglia di saldo di 50.000‚Ç¨ e tenendo in considerazione solo i giorni in cui nel mese di riferimento questo limite √® stato superato.La commissione sar√† addebitata direttamente sul tuo conto all‚Äôinizio di ogni mese per i 30 giorni precedenti.Se il saldo del tuo conto dovesse superare la soglia di cui sopra, e non vuoi incorrere in questa commissione, ci sono due modi per evitare che ti venga addebitata:Passa a un conto Premium N26 You (nuova tabella), N26 Business You (nuova tabella), N26 Metal (nuova tabella) o N26 Business Metal (nuova tabella). Se sei un cliente residente in Germania, apri un conto EasyFlex Savings (nuova tabella) e trasferisci i tuoi fondi in eccesso l√¨ (prendi nota dei requisiti di idoneit√†)

question: Wo finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
answer: Deine IBAN und deinen BIC ben√∂tigst du, um SEPA-√úberweisungen auf dein Konto zu erhalten oder per Lastschrift zu bezahlen. Eine IBAN besteht aus mehreren Elementen: Alle unsere IBANs beginnen mit DE, ES oder IT, gefolgt von der zweistelligen Pr√ºfziffer, unserer Bankleitzahl (10011001), und schlie√ülich deiner 10-stelligen Kontonummer (beginnend mit 26). Die IBAN wird bei der Kontoer√∂ffnung erstellt und zugewiesen und kann nicht ge√§ndert werden.Deine IBAN und deinen BIC findest du an 3 Orten:In deiner mobilen N26 App und deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab) unter: üë§ Mein Konto. Tippe bzw. klicke auf das Kopieren-Symbol, um die IBAN zu kopieren.Im Online Banking (neuen Tab) kannst du deine Bankverbindung als PDF herunterladen. Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Bankdaten auf Bankdaten herunterladen.Auf deinen herunterladbaren Kontoausz√ºgen: Tippe im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App auf das Burgermen√º oben rechts und w√§hle Kontoausz√ºge. Oder in deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab): Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Kontoausz√ºge auf einen gew√ºnschten Monat.Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube (neuen Tab) Kanal an.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes‚Äîyour Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact‚Äîyou create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You‚Äôre the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).¬†If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I‚Äôve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.¬†What if I‚Äôve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.¬†Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Wie kann ich zu N26 You upgraden?

Verf√ºgbar in √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Irland, Italy, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Spanien, Schweden.N26 You ist √ºber die Erstanmeldung eines Kontos oder √ºber ein Upgrade in der App verf√ºgbar, wenn du bereits ein Standard-Konto hast. question: Come posso bloccare la banda magnetica della mia carta?
answer: Ci sono diversi modi per effettuare un pagamento con carta: contactless ("poggiando" la tua carta), tramite chip con PIN e tramite banda magnetica, ovvero, passando la carta nella fessura del lettore. Le transazioni tramite banda magnetica sono sempre meno diffuse, ma alcuni esercenti richiedono ancora questo metodo di pagamento.Perch√© dovrei bloccare le transazioni con banda magnetica?Un numero piuttosto consistente di transazioni fraudolente avviene proprio strisciando la banda magnetica della carta. Alcuni esercenti dispongono di sistemi illegali per copiare le informazioni della tua carta, che poi usano per effettuare transazioni fraudolente. Questo processo √® noto come "skimming". Bloccando le transazioni tramite banda magnetica puoi proteggerti da un simile rischio.Come faccio a bloccare/sbloccare le transazioni tramite banda magnetica?Per bloccare le transazioni tramite banda magnetica:¬†Vai su Carte.¬†Se possiedi pi√π carte, scorri verso destra finch√© non compare la carta interessata.Vai su Impostazioni carta.Vai su banda magnetica.Disattiva Attiva banda magnetica.Qui puoi anche riabilitare l'uso della banda magnetica. Le modifiche vengono applicate istantaneamente per la carta selezionata.¬†

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: Kann N26 mein Konto schlie√üen?
answer: Kurz gesagt: ja.Wir k√∂nnen dein Konto auf drei Arten schlie√üen (mit einer K√ºndigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese K√ºndigungen sind endg√ºltig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen √ºber den Hintergrund einzelner K√ºndigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Du kannst deine Gesch√§ftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden Vertragsgeb√ºhren m√ºssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.2 Monate K√ºndigungsfristWir sind berechtigt, jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden zu k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 1 unserer¬†AGB (neuen Tab)¬†oder ¬ß 675h BGB).14 Tage K√ºndigungsfristWir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB (neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende Gr√ºnde hierzu vorliegen. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:Nutzung eines Privatkontos f√ºr gesch√§ftliche Zwecke¬†Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur f√ºr den pers√∂nlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle √úberweisungen, die sich auf Honorare f√ºr erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als Gesch√§ftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto f√ºr diesen Zweck nutzen m√∂chtest, er√∂ffne bitte ein¬†N26 Business¬†oder¬†N26 Business You Konto.Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen f√ºr eine routinem√§√üige Hintergrundpr√ºfung.¬†Wir sind eine Bank, deshalb¬†√ºberpr√ºfen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die Gesch√§ftsbeziehung zu k√ºndigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen m√ºssen. -Missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber N26-Mitarbeitern.¬†Wir tolerieren kein missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von K√∂rperverletzung oder allgemeines missbr√§uchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zust√§ndigen Beh√∂rde gemeldet.Fristlose K√ºndigungWir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch au√üerordentlich k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB (neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne Vorank√ºndigung und ohne K√ºndigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes f√ºr eine solche K√ºndigung. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:Falsche Angaben gegen√ºber N26 √ºber deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines KreditsDu kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegen√ºber N26 nicht zur√ºckzahlenNichterf√ºllung der Forderungen von N26 bez√ºglich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder Verst√§rkung von Sicherheiten, ¬ß 13 (2) unserer AGB (neuen Tab)).

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose¬†RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: PSD2 - Authentification Forte du Client
answer: Comment fonctionne l‚ÄôAuthentification Forte du Client (SCA) ?L‚ÄôAuthentification Forte du Client (SCA) constitue une protection suppl√©mentaire pour tous les clients N26 en √©tablissant une authentification √† deux facteurs. Gr√¢ce √† l‚Äôauthentification √† deux facteurs, nous ajoutons une nouvelle mesure de s√©curit√© lorsque vous vous connectez √† votre compte N26. Vous √™tes probablement habitu√© √† utiliser uniquement votre mot de passe pour vous connecter √† votre compte, avec l'authentification √† deux facteurs, vous aurez maintenant besoin soit d'une confirmation depuis votre appareil synchronis√© soit d'un code SMS pour vous connecter √† votre compte.Lorsque vous vous connectez √† votre compte N26 √† partir d‚Äôun navigateur Web ou d'un appareil non synchronis√© √† votre compte, vous serez invit√© √† confirmer votre connexion depuis une notification envoy√©e sur votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√© ou vous devrez saisir un code envoy√© par SMS au num√©ro de t√©l√©phone li√© √† votre compte. Apr√®s avoir confirm√© votre connexion, vous pourrez alors vous connecter √† votre compte N26. Lorsque vous vous connectez √† votre compte N26 √† partir de votre appareil synchronis√©, l'authentification √† deux facteurs est d√©j√† automatiquement activ√©e. Par cons√©quent, il vous suffit de saisir votre identifiant et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronis√©.Pourquoi le SCA est-il introduit ?Le SCA est introduit dans le cadre de la deuxi√®me Directive europ√©enne sur les services de paiement (PSD2) qui s'applique √† toutes les banques europ√©ennes. L'objectif de cette directive est d'am√©liorer la s√©curit√© et la confidentialit√© des comptes et des donn√©es des clients. Pour en savoir plus, vous pouvez consulter l'article de notre blog consacr√© √† PSD2. (nouvel onglet)

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card: 30‚Ç¨Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card 65‚Ç¨

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You‚Äôll have to activate your card whether it‚Äôs your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you‚Äôve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you‚Äôre activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction ‚Äî in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail ‚Äî for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card ‚Äî you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you‚Äôll still be able to activate that new card.

question: My ID wasn‚Äôt accepted and I can‚Äôt open an account with N26
answer: As a fully-licensed bank, we‚Äôre required to verify your identity before allowing you to open an account. Depending on your country of residence and nationality, different forms of identification may be accepted during the verification process.¬†You can find our list of accepted IDs for the identity verification here (new tab) if you live in France.If you live outside of France, here‚Äôs the list of IDs you can submit to verify your identity:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in another country (new tab)If your ID isn‚Äôt supported, we won‚Äôt be able to open a bank account for you.¬†

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you‚Äôve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that‚Äôs needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you‚Äôd like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest ‚ÄúSplit the bill‚Äù feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you‚Äôre sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, tap it and choose ‚ÄòSplit the bill‚ÄôAdd the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you‚Äôll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can‚Äôt be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: Come posso pagare bollettini e ricariche telefoniche dalla mia app?
answer: A partire dal 1 Settembre potrai pagare bollettini postali, PagoPA, MAV/RAV, il bollo auto ed effettuare ricariche telefoniche direttamente dall‚Äôapp mobile con la carta di debito N26.Questo servizio √® fornito in collaborazione con PayTipper SpA, un istituto di pagamento che dal 2019 √® partner del gruppo Enel X.Come effettuare pagamenti verso terze parti nell‚Äôapp mobile:¬†Accedi all‚Äôapp N26 e seleziona ‚ÄúDal mio conto"Clicca su ‚ÄúAltri pagamenti‚ÄùNel men√π dovrai selezionare il pagamento che desideri effettuare (Ricarica telefonica, PagoPA, Bollettini postali, MAV o RAV, Bollo auto)Sarai poi reindirizzato al sito del fornitore del servizio dove potrai effettuare il pagamentoIl servizio non √® fornito direttamente da N26 ma da terze parti. Per questo, utilizzando questo metodo di pagamento, sarai soggetto al trattamento dei dati personali, termini e condizioni ed eventuali commissioni non dipendenti da N26. In alcuni casi il servizio potrebbe essere offerto solo in italiano.Se hai bisogno di assistenza per un pagamento o vuoi richiedere il rinvio della ricevuta, dovrai contattare direttamente l‚Äôassistenza clienti del fornitore del servizio che hai scelto.¬†Clicca qui per metterti in contatto con PayTipper (nuova tabella)Di seguito puoi trovare i contatti dell‚Äôassistenza clienti per i principali operatori telefonici (fai riferimento ai rispettivi siti web per orari di apertura ed eventuali costi del servizio):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

question: CRS - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin d‚Äôinformations de votre part ?
answer:
N26 suit la norme d‚Äô√©change automatique de renseignements (CRS en anglais), comme tout √©tablissement de cr√©dit. Nous sommes donc tenus de communiquer directement aux autorit√©s fiscales de l'Union Europ√©enne les informations des comptes financiers d√©tenus par nos clients r√©sidents fiscaux dans d'autres pays.CRS signifie Common Reporting Standard ou Echange Automatique de Renseignements.
Le CRS a √©t√© √©labor√© par l'Organisation de coop√©ration et de d√©veloppement √©conomiques (OCDE). C'est une norme mondiale de d√©claration pour l'√©change automatique d'informations (AEOI). 
L'objectif du CRS est de permettre aux autorit√©s d'avoir une meilleure compr√©hension des actifs financiers d√©tenus √† l'√©tranger par leurs r√©sidents pour lutter contre la fraude fiscale. 
Plus de 90 pays ont accept√© de partager des informations sur les actifs et les revenus des r√©sidents en conformit√© avec le CRS.Afin que nous puissions d√©terminer avec pr√©cision si un compte doit √™tre d√©clar√© aux autorit√©s fiscales pour le CRS, nous devons vous demander :1. Le(s) pays dans le(s)quel(s) vous √™tes imposable Vous √™tes normalement ¬´r√©sident fiscal¬ª et donc soumis √† l'imp√¥t sur vos revenus dans le pays o√π vous avez un logement. Si vous r√©sidez dans plus d'un pays, il existe normalement des ¬´r√®gles de d√©partage¬ª incluses dans les conventions de double imposition et dans les lois fiscales des pays concern√©s qui vous aident √† d√©terminer o√π vous √™tes r√©sident fiscal. Il se peut que vous soyez r√©sident fiscal dans plus d'un pays au cours d'une ann√©e. Dans ce cas, nous aurions besoin de conna√Ætre chaque pays et chaque num√©ro d'identification fiscale afin de communiquer les informations exactes aux autorit√©s fiscales comp√©tentes.2. Votre num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale (NIF) pour chaque pays auquel vous √™tes fiscalement rattach√©.
L‚Äôattribution et le format d‚Äôun NIF diff√®rent d‚Äôun pays √† l‚Äôautre. Si vous r√©sidez au sein de l‚ÄôUnion Europ√©enne, vous pourrez trouver le v√¥tre en consultant ce guide (nouvel onglet) mis √† disposition par la Commission Europ√©enne.Si votre situation fiscale vient √† changer, vous pourrez √† tout moment modifier les informations concern√©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Scadenza e sostituzione delle carte: domande frequenti
answer: Se la tua Mastercard N26 √® scaduta o scadr√† a breve, in questo articolo troverai tutte le informazioni su come ordinarne una nuova, i relativi costi e tempi di spedizione. Prima di procedere con il riordino di una nuova carta, ti consigliamo di verificare che tutti i tuoi dati personali siano aggiornati e corretti.La mia carta sta per scadere, cosa devo fare?Se la tua carta sta per scadere, accedi al tuo conto N26 nell'app, vai alla sezione Carte e cerca un banner sotto la carta corrispondente. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva e te la invieremo.¬†Se questo messaggio non compare, non preoccuparti. Probabilmente √® perch√© la tua carta sar√† valida ancora per un periodo; quando sar√† il momento giusto vedrai l‚Äôopzione per confermare il tuo indirizzo.Una volta ricevuta la tua carta, prima di poterla utilizzare la dovrai attivare. Non dimenticare di distruggere la tua vecchia carta e di buttarla via secondo le linee guida locali per il riciclo.Attenzione: una volta ricevuta e attivata la tua nuova Mastercard, ricordati di aggiornare le tue informazioni di pagamento per tutti i tuoi abbonamenti e i pagamenti ricorrenti. In questo modo eviterai che i tuoi pagamenti futuri vengano rifiutati.Posso continuare a usare la mia carta dopo che √® scaduta?No, la data di scadenza della tua carta ha una funzione importante e non potrai pi√π utilizzarla dopo il mese di scadenza. Riceverai una nuova carta con un numero diverso e una nuova data di scadenza.Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?La carta sostitutiva √® gratuita per tutti i clienti possessori di un conto N26 Smart, You e Metal.Se hai aperto il tuo conto prima delle seguenti date, sia la nuova carta che la spedizione al tuo indirizzo sono gratuiti nei paesi in cui N26 √® disponibile (nuova tabella):16/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale nella Grande Europa)25/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Italia o Spagna)11/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Francia)18/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Germania, Austria o Svizzera)Se il tuo conto √® stato creato in seguito, la tua carta sostitutiva avr√† lo stesso costo di una carta nuova.Se attualmente ti trovi in un Paese non supportato da N26, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono, cos√¨ possiamo effettuare l‚Äôordine per te. La consegna al di fuori di questi Paesi (nuova tabella) potrebbe comportare un costo aggiuntivo.¬†Quanto tempo ci vorr√†?Tutte le carte sostitutive delle carte scadute o in scadenza vengono spedite tramite consegna Standard. Richiede fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed √® gratuita. Nelle zone rurali o difficili da raggiungere potrebbe volerci pi√π tempo. Per rimanere aggiornato sui progressi nella consegna, vai alla schermata Home della tua app mobile N26.La mia carta √® gi√† scaduta ma non ho mai ricevuto una sostituzioneNessun problema, ci pensiamo noi!¬†Se hai gi√† confermato il tuo indirizzo e sono passati pi√π di 20 giorni, ti preghiamo di contattare il Supporto Clienti. Puoi farlo nella sezione Supporto nell'app.¬†Se non hai ancora confermato il tuo indirizzo, effettua l'accesso al tuo conto N26 nell'app e cerca un banner sotto la tua carta scaduta. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva.¬†

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

Par cons√©quent, m√™me si vous d√©sactivez cette option, vous recevrez toujours des emails contenant des informations relatives √† l‚Äôutilisation de votre compte bancaire N26 (par exemple, les transactions r√©centes, les nouvelles fonctionnalit√©s de votre compte bancaire). LivechatSi vous activez l‚Äôoption de Livechat, vous recevrez des offres personnalis√©es pour les produits et fonctionnalit√©s N26, des mises √† jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et d‚Äôautres recommandations, par exemple √† la fin d‚Äôune conversation avec le Service Client N26. Partenaires commerciaux:Lorsque vous activez l‚Äôoption Partenaires commerciaux, vous autorisez N26 √† envoyer votre adresse email de mani√®re chiffr√©e (email hashing) √† ses Partenaires commerciaux (Google Ireland Limited et Facebook Ireland Limited) afin de vous √©viter de recevoir des publicit√©s N26 et d‚Äôaider N26 √† mieux d√©finir ses groupes cibles. Si vous d√©sactivez cette option, N26 n‚Äôenverra pas votre adresse email √† ses Partenaires commerciaux, toutefois vous pourrez √©ventuellement recevoir des publicit√©s N26 qui vous semblent non pertinentes . Pour plus d‚Äôinformations sur les Partenaires commerciaux, veuillez consulter cet article.

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees¬†is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),¬†then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you‚Äôll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: Warum wurde mir eine Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet?
answer: Geldautomatengeb√ºhren k√∂nnen aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden anfallen:F√ºr jede Auszahlung, die √ºber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨. Diese Geb√ºhr erscheint als separate Transaktion in deiner Umsatzanzeige. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur Verf√ºgung hast.Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen Geb√ºhren. In deiner Umsatzanzeige erscheint diese Geb√ºhr in derselben Transaktion wie die Abhebung, also eingerechnet in den Abhebungsbetrag. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir k√∂nnen sie weder ablehnen noch r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Sollten zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren. Kunden in Spanien k√∂nnen k√∂nnen hier eine L√∂sung finden.Abhebungen in Fremdw√§hrungen k√∂nnen geb√ºhrenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Standard und N26 Smart Konti f√§llt eine Geb√ºhr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese Geb√ºhr entf√§llt f√ºr N26 You, N26 Metal, Business You- oder N26 Business Metal-Mitglieder.Nutzung deiner Maestrocard f√ºr Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier f√§llt sowohl f√ºr nationale als auch f√ºr internationale Abhebungen eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨ an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden erh√§ltlich.Wenn du unser N26 Flex Konto hast, kosten Abhebungen 2‚Ç¨. Gut zu wissen:Um geb√ºhrenfreie Automaten in deiner N√§he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche (neuen Tab) verwenden. W√§hle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen ‚Äúkeine Nutzungsgeb√ºhr‚Äù aus.Alle Automaten, die im Geldautomatenfinder angezeigt werden, unterst√ºzen Mastercard.Eine √úbersicht unserer Angebote und Geb√ºhren findest du auf unserer Website (neuen Tab).

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:‚Ç¨1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs‚Ç¨5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500‚Ç¨ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050‚Ç¨ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:‚Ç¨20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-√úberweisung?
answer: Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausf√ºhren.¬†Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in deinem Online Banking erstellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.W√§hle Bank√ºberweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt.Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des Empf√§ngers ein und w√§hle Weiter.Gib den Betrag ein und w√§hle Weiter.Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und w√§hle Weiter.√úberpr√ºfe die Zusammenfassung deiner √úberweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine Termin√ºberweisung werden soll oder ein DauerauftragKlicke Absenden und best√§tige mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN.Zum Schluss erh√§ltst du in deinem verkn√ºpften Handy eine Push-Mitteilung, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.¬†Sobald die √úberweisung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen oder die Daten des √úberweisungsempf√§ngers √§ndern.Falls du die √úberweisung nicht best√§tigen kannst, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte, dass:Du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast.In den Einstellungen deines Handys Push-Mitteilungen aktiviert sind.Du dein verkn√ºpftes Handy verwendest.Sobald deine √úberweisung gesendet wurde, kannst du in der App eine √úberweisungsbest√§tigung als PDF herunterladen:Gehe in deine Umsatzliste.Finde deine √úberweisung und tippe auf diese.Scrolle nach unten zu den Informationen zur Transaktion tippe auf √úberweisungsbest√§tigung.Du kannst ausgehende SEPA-√úberweisungen auch direkt aus deinen Spaces mit zugewiesenen IBANs vornehmen. Gehe daf√ºr einfach in den Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN, w√§hle "Geld senden" und dann "Bank√ºberweisung". Das wird dann wie eine normale ausgehende Zahlung gehandhabt.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How to contact N26?
answer:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while you‚Äôre logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once you‚Äôre logged inHow to call us

Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.¬†

question: Wo kann ich meine Maestro Card einsetzen?
answer: Nur verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden mit unseren deutschen, √∂sterreichischen oder niederl√§ndischen AGB.Deine Maestro kann nicht f√ºr Online-Eink√§ufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.Du kannst sie nicht f√ºr Apple Pay or Google Pay verwenden.Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder Gesch√§ften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. question: Come bloccare un addebito diretto?
answer: Prima di inviarci il modulo per bloccare un addebito diretto, ti preghiamo di notare quanto segue:Identificativo del creditore e riferimento del mandato: dovrai specificare sia l‚Äôidentificativo del creditore che il codice di riferimento del mandato. Puoi ottenere queste informazioni nei dettagli della transazione dell'ultimo addebito diretto nell'app o contattando l'esercente (attenzione, non bastano l'IBAN e il nome dell'esercente).Allegati inferiori a 25 MB: quando rispondi con il modulo necessario, ti preghiamo di assicurarti che complessivamente i tuoi allegati non superino i 25 MB.Firma del documento: se puoi, apponi la tua firma autografa al modulo che ci invii. Tuttavia, accettiamo anche:Firma elettronica: deve essere la stessa del documento che hai usato per aprire il tuo conto N26.Firma digitale: se apponi sul documento una firma digitale che possiamo verificare, la firma √® considerata valida. Le firme digitali possono essere create tramite operatori come "DocuSign".Infine, √® importante notare che cancellando un addebito diretto impedisci solo i pagamenti, ma non estingui il contratto che hai con l'esercente.Come blocco un addebito diretto?Ti invitiamo a seguire gli step descritti in seguito, compilare il modulo e metterti in contatto con il nostro team del Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono.Per favore, scarica e compila questo modulo (nuova tabella).Compila il modulo e specifica cosa intendi bloccare, ad es., identificativo del creditore, codice di riferimento del mandato e blocco totale. Puoi trovare queste informazioni negli addebiti diretti precedenti per lo stesso esercente nel tuo elenco delle transazioni.Assicurati di includere una firma (autografa, elettronica o digitale).Dopodich√© dovrai metterti in contatto con il nostro team del Supporto Clienti tramite live chat (per essere verificato direttamente) o telefonicamente, cos√¨ i nostri agenti potranno aiutarti a portare a termine la procedura. Compila il modulo anticipatamente per accelerare la procedura!

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50 or cumulative transactions above 150‚Ç¨ you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: CRR Disclosure Report
answer: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).¬†¬†Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an ‚Äúappropriate medium‚Äù and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

question: Was sind Shared Spaces?
answer: Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk f√ºr eure Liebsten organisieren m√∂chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es m√∂glich.Premium-Kunden (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You oder N26 Business Metal) k√∂nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.Alle N26 Nutzer k√∂nnen teilnehmen, unabh√§ngig von ihren Kontotypen.Dem Besitzer geh√∂ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: What to do if my card is lost or it‚Äôs been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.¬†Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).¬†You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: What are ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: Come posso ordinare una carta aggiuntiva?
answer: Clicca qui, se vuoi sostituire la tua carta invece di ordinarne una aggiuntiva.Come posso ordinare una carta aggiuntiva:Accedi al tuo conto N26Vai su: EsploraSeleziona: Carta aggiuntiva > MastercardScegli il colore e il tipo di spedizione che preferisciConferma l‚Äôoperazione e effettua il pagamentoLa carta aggiuntiva ha un costo di 10‚Ç¨ con consegna standard e di 25‚Ç¨ con consegna express. question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren‚Äôt sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you‚Äôve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to üë§ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: Come posso tenere traccia delle mie spese quotidiane?
answer: Le¬†transazioni¬†vengono ordinate automaticamente e i risultati visualizzati in Statistiche (angolo in alto a destra dell'app mobile) in ordine di:Categorie: Raccogliamo informazioni sui rivenditori e sulle causali di pagamento al fine di migliorare la categorizzazione (come ad es. bancomat, cibo e generi alimentari, shopping). Se, ad esempio, mandi un Moneybeam con il testo di riferimento Pranzo, verr√† inserito nella categoria Bar e ristoranti. Se secondo te una categoria non √® adatta, puoi modificarla semplicemente selezionando la transazione e scegliendo una categoria dall'elenco a discesa.Hashtag: Abbiamo anche aggiunto degli hashtag standard per gli orari delle transazioni (#weekend), i tipi di transazioni (#libri), o i luoghi degli acquisti (#berlino). Puoi ordinare ulteriormente le transazioni aggiungendo degli hashtag personali: tocca una transazione e poi l'icona della matita per aggiungere un tag (ad esempio #viaggio_portogallo #ognimese) o rimuoverne uno.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking s√©curis√©
answer:
Qu‚Äôest-ce que la Directive DSP2?La 2√®me Directive sur les Services de Paiement 2 (¬´ DSP2 ¬ª) est une directive europ√©enne r√©vis√©e qui vous permet d‚Äôacc√©der aux informations de votre compte ainsi que d‚Äôeffectuer des paiements de mani√®re s√ªre et s√©curis√©e par l'interm√©diaire de prestataires de services de paiement r√©gul√©s.Cela signifie que vous pouvez autoriser des prestataires de services r√©gul√©s √† acc√©der directement aux donn√©es de votre compte gr√¢ce √† une interface d√©di√©e :¬†Vous pouvez permettre √† un service d'information sur les comptes (SIC) de regrouper les donn√©es de vos diff√©rents comptes bancaires, puis de regrouper ces comptes au m√™me endroit (via une application comme un agr√©gateur de comptes par exemple);Vous pouvez payer en toute s√©curit√© en ligne sur tous les sites internet qui proposent des services d'initiation de paiement (SIP).L'√©change de donn√©es se fait en arri√®re-plan via notre partenaire Token.io.Comment cela fonctionne ?Si vous commencez √† utiliser un service de paiement tiers comme un service d‚Äôinformation sur les comptes ou un service d'initiation de paiement, vous serez redirig√©s vers l‚Äôapplication N26 via Token.io pour confirmer votre demande.Notre politique de confidentialit√© (nouvel onglet) vous informe des objectifs, des parties prenantes et du cadre l√©gal concernant le traitement des donn√©es n√©cessaire au respect de nos obligations dans le cadre de la Directive Europ√©enne r√©vis√©e sur les Services de Paiement. FAQPourquoi est-ce je n‚Äôarrive pas √† lier un prestataire de service √† mon compte?
Si un prestataire de service n‚Äôest pas int√©gr√© avec notre interface, le prestataire devra mettre en place une telle int√©gration avec notre partenaire Token.io.¬†Comment r√©voquer l‚Äôautorisation d‚Äôacc√©der aux informations de mon compte donn√©e √† un prestataire de service?
Vous pouvez simplement contacter le prestataire de service en question pour r√©voquer l‚Äôautorisation que vous leur avez donn√©e.*s‚Äôapplique √† tous les pays de l‚ÄôEEA.

answer: F√ºr Konten verf√ºgbar, die in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland er√∂ffnet wurden.Dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone ist alles, was du brauchst. √ñffne die CASH26 Karte in deiner App und nutze die Zoom-Funktion, um ein teilnehmendes Gesch√§ft in deiner N√§he zu finden. Sobald du vor Ort im Laden bist, kannst du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellen und ihn auf deinem Smartphone an der Kasse vorzeigen.Wie kann ich Geld mit CASH26 abheben?√ñffne in deiner N26 App den ‚ÄúKarten‚Äù-Tab und w√§hle CASH26 > Bargeld abheben.W√§hle den Betrag, den du abheben willst (maximal 200 ‚Ç¨ pro Abhebung sowie 900 ‚Ç¨ innerhalb von 24 Stunden). Der Kassierer bzw. die Kassiererin wird den Code einscannen und dir das Bargeld aush√§ndigen.¬†Wie kann ich Geld auf mein N26 Konto einzahlen mit CASH26?Gehe in deiner N26 App auf den ‚ÄúKarten‚Äù-Tab und w√§hle CASH26 > Bargeld einzahlen.W√§hle den Betrag, den du einzahlen willst (mindestens 50 ‚Ç¨).Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und best√§tige die Transaktion im Popup-Fenster.¬†Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor und √ºberreiche das Bargeld.Es kann es bis zu 10 Minuten dauern, bis das eingezahlte Bargeld in deinem Kontostand in der N26 App zu sehen ist.Wichtig!Der Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang g√ºltig. In diesem Fall musst du einen neuen Strichcode erstellen.¬†Falls du einen falschen Betrag eingibst, kannst du ihn l√∂schen, indem du auf das Papierkorb Symbol oben rechts tippst (oder den Code ablaufen l√§sst) und dann einen neuen Barcode erstellst.¬†Du musst im Gesch√§ft nichts kaufen, wenn du Bargeld einzahlen oder Geld abheben willst.Mehr √ºber CASH26 sowie Einzahl- und Abhebelimits erf√§hrst du in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab).

question: How to contact N26?
answer:

question: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000‚Ç¨,¬†and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500‚Ç¨. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
answer: Deine IBAN enth√§lt die DE-L√§nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige Pr√ºfnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer. Zum Beispiel:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Die teilnehmenden L√§nder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.H√§ndler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des Europ√§ischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, versto√üen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europ√§isches Recht (Artikel 9 der¬†Verordnung Nr. 260/2012 (neuen Tab)).Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deine¬†zust√§ndige nationale Beh√∂rde (neuen Tab)¬†und informiere diese √ºber den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des H√§ndlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschlie√ülich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).
