question: Come funziona 3D Secure?
answer: 3D Secure ti protegge dalle frodi online con carta. Si attiva automaticamente quando attivi la tua carta nell‚Äôapp. Non servono password aggiuntive.Ogni volta che effettui un¬†pagamento online¬†con la tua Mastercard, 3D Secure ti conferma la transazione entro 5 minuti tramite un¬†messaggio push. Se non vedi la transazione, prova alcuni¬†suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi¬†che abbiamo raccolto.Ricorda: la notifica push sar√† inviata solo allo smartphone collegato al conto.Se effettui un acquisto utilizzando lo smartphone, nell‚Äôapp verr√† visualizzata una transazione in sospeso. Tocca l‚Äôicona della campana per visualizzare il messaggio push per confermare e finalizzare l‚Äôacquisto. Poi torna al sito web dell‚Äôesercente. Dovresti vedere una conferma dell‚Äôavvenuto acquisto entro pochi secondi.

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here‚Äôs how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. ¬† * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: N26 Kontoauszug herunterladen ‚Äì so funktioniert‚Äôs
answer: Was ist ein Kontoauszug? Ein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, das den Gesamtsaldo sowie alle ein- und ausgehenden Transaktionen von deinem Bankkonto anzeigt. Dazu geh√∂ren √úberweisungen, Lastschriften, Kartenzahlungen usw. Au√üerdem sieht man in deinem Kontoauszug den Namen und Nachnamen des Kontoinhabers sowie die IBAN und BIC des Kontos. So findest du deinen Kontoauszug:In der mobilen N26 App (als PDF): Tippe auf die drei horizontalen Linien oben rechts in deinem Home-Bildschirm. Tippe dann auf Kontoausz√ºge.Du kannst auch Kontoausz√ºge f√ºr einzelne Spaces herunterladen: √ñffne dazu den Space im ‚ÄúSpaces‚Äù-Tab und tippe auf das Einstellungen-Icon oben rechts. Tippe dann auf Kontoauszug.In der Web-App (als PDF): Tippe auf das Download-Icon (neuen Tab)* und w√§hle den relevanten Monat unter Kontoausz√ºge.¬†In der Web-App (als CSV): Tippe auf das Download-Icon (neuen Tab)* und gib unter CSV das Start- und Enddatum des Zeitraums an, f√ºr den du einen Kontoauszug ben√∂tigst. Tippe dann auf CSV herunterladen. ¬† * Das Download-Icon ist das Quadrat mit einem Pfeil, der nach unten zeigt. Du findest ihn links von ‚ÄúGeld erhalten‚Äù.

question: Come i miei soldi sono protetti ad N26
answer: Lo¬† (nuova tabella)Schema di Compensazione delle banche private tedesche (nuova tabella) assicura tutti i depositi¬†fino a 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†posseduti negli Stati membri dell'Unione Europea. In qualit√† di titolare di una licenza bancaria, N26 Bank √® legalmente tenuta ad essere membro di uno Schema di Compensazione. N26 √® un membro dello Schema di Compensazione delle banche private tedesche.In che modo N26 rileva e monitora le frodi?N26 dispone di un team di specialisti il cui lavoro si concentra sul monitoraggio e l‚Äôidentificazione di transazioni sospette sulla nostra piattaforma. Con l‚Äôaiuto di modelli statistici e algoritmi avanzati, assieme ad analisi comportamentali, il nostro team di specialisti fa in modo che i tuoi soldi siano sempre in buone mani.Quali iniziative intraprende N26 quando rileva azioni fraudolente nelle attivit√† dei propri clienti?Non appena il nostro team di esperti rileva un‚Äôattivit√† irregolare, prendiamo tutte le misure previste dalla legge per ridurne l‚Äôimpatto e prevenire ulteriori danni. Ci√≤ implica anche chiudere e denunciare alle autorit√† i conti bancari sui quali si verificano attivit√† illegali. Se delle transazioni sospette fanno pensare a un riciclaggio di denaro, finanziamenti a organizzazioni terroristiche o qualsiasi altro atto criminale, N26 segnala immediatamente tali attivit√† all‚ÄôUnit√† di intelligence finanziaria tedesca (Financial Transaction Investigation Unit, FIU) o alle autorit√† locali di vigilanza.Quali sono i modi in cui N26 ha investito sulla sicurezza?Alla fine del 2019 abbiamo creato il nostro team dedicato ai temi Trust e Sicurezza. Questo team lavora con il team dedicato alla Sicurezza informatica e il loro operato consiste nel garantire la sicurezza degli utenti, dei loro conti e dei loro dati, proteggendoli dai criminali informatici. Inoltre, N26 ha raddoppiato la dimensione della propria Unit√† Antiriciclaggio (AML) e dell‚ÄôUnit√† contro i crimini finanziari, creando procedure per il monitoraggio delle transazioni e delle piattaforme. In questo modo possiamo rilevare e prevenire le attivit√† illegali basandoci sullo storico dei dati, che in ultima istanza ci permette di essere sempre diversi passi avanti rispetto ai malfattori. Investiamo significativamente nella tecnologia e nell‚Äôintelligenza artificiale per implementare modelli e algoritmi avanzati, assieme ad analisi comportamentali.

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: How to request the average annual balance
answer:
In the beginning of January 2022, you will receive your average annual balance for 2021 in your (new tab)Messages (new tab). You do not need to submit a request. Same thing for the average annual balance of the years 2020 and 2019.If you need your average annual balance for a year prior to 2019, please contact our Customer Service team via chat.Why do I need it?The average annual balance is used to fill out the ISEE form, report your N26 bank account with a German IBAN to the Italian tax authorities when this balance is greater than 5.000‚Ç¨, prove your creditworthiness, and access programs or receive special benefits from the Italian government based on your financial situation.You can request the ISEE form by filling out the DSU form, which is essential for accessing some of the tax breaks offered by the Italian government.The value of the average annual balance, which is self-certified by the bank account holder without the need for paper documentation, must be entered in the FC.2 section of the ISEE form, under ‚Äúbank and postal accounts and deposits‚Äù. You should enter the type of financial asset held and the bank account balance into this field.How do I calculate it?The average annual balance is the amount obtained by dividing the sum of the daily balances of the current account by 365, regardless of the effective duration of the calendar year (leap years), and of the number of days in which the account has been active or had a positive balance, as defined by the italian Tax Authority (new tab) and in the instructions (new tab) for completing the Single Tax Declaration 2020 of the Ministry of Labor and Social Policies.FAQs on Average annual balanceIf I have an account with a German IBAN and my average balance is over ‚Ç¨ 5,000, do I have to declare it to the tax authority?Yes, you will have to fill in the Rw part of the tax return and pay VAT, a fixed amount tax of ‚Ç¨ 34.20. Click here (new tab) for more information on this.I would like to receive a PDF document with the value of my average annual balance. Is it possible?We remind you that there are no legal provisions that require banks to provide this type of certification.
We have decided to send the average annual balance as a private message, in order to make this data easily accessible and downloadable by all customers.
However, your bank statement is sufficient as official proof in the event of an explicit request by the authorities, therefore we are unable to provide any document signed by the bank in PDF or similar format.

question: ¬øC√≥mo cambiar mi PIN de confirmaci√≥n?
answer: Instrucciones paso a paso:iPhoneAndroidPaso 1Inicia sesi√≥n en tu aplicaci√≥n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2Despl√°zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaci√≥nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el n√∫mero de 10 d√≠gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaci√≥nPaso 1Inicia sesi√≥n en tu aplicaci√≥n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2Despl√°zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaci√≥nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el n√∫mero de 10 d√≠gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaci√≥nEl PIN de confirmaci√≥n es el que usas para confirmar las transferencias o cualquier otra operaci√≥n que hagas desde la app. Si no sabes cu√°l es, quiz√° te ayude a recordarlo que t√∫ creas tu propio PIN de confirmaci√≥n¬†cuando vinculas tu m√≥vil (pesta√±a nueva) por primera vez.Si lo has olvidado o quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo cuando quieras desde la app:Ve a üë§ Mi cuenta y luego Seguridad.Selecciona¬†Cambiar PIN de confirmaci√≥n.Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (es un n√∫mero de 10 d√≠gitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta; o por atr√°s, en las tarjetas N26 Smart, You y Metal).Crea y confirma tu nuevo PIN de confirmaci√≥n.Si introduces el PIN de confirmaci√≥n err√≥neamente 6 veces seguidas, tendr√°s que restablecerlo antes de volver a intentarlo.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ning√∫n PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcci√≥n u otra combinaci√≥n con d√≠gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el n√∫mero que has elegido no es v√°lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaci√≥n diferente.Recuerda que tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n no es el mismo que el c√≥digo PIN de tu tarjeta; (pesta√±a nueva) pero, si t√∫ quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.

question: Come contattare N26?
answer:
Ci sono diversi modi per contattare il nostro Supporto Clienti, ma l'opzione migliore √® sempre aprire una chat sicura quando effettui l'accesso all'app. Questo ci permetter√† di verificare la tua identit√† e fornirti informazioni e supporto specifici.La nostra chat √® disponibile tutti i giorni dalle 07:00 alle 23:00, anche la domenica e nei giorni festivi.Come contattarci tramite appCome chattare con noiApri una chat di assistenzaLa chat inizier√† non appena effettui l'accesso.Come chiamarci
(solo per conti Premium)Possiamo metterti in contatto con il nostro Supporto Clienti solo se ci chiami al numero registrato nel tuo conto. Se devi registrare un nuovo numero di telefono, segui i passaggi descritti in questa pagina: Come cambiare il mio numero di telefono.Attenzione: per contattarci al telefono devi possedere un conto N26 premium (You, Smart o Metal).Supporto telefonico (solo premium)Non hai accesso all'app?Non sei ancora cliente di N26?Se non hai un conto con noi ma hai domande di carattere generale sui nostri prodotti e servizi, puoi aprire una chat visitatore qui sotto oppure inviarci un email a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere pi√π lungo).Hai perso l‚Äôaccesso al tuo conto?Il tuo telefono √® smarrito o si √® rotto? Stai riscontrando problemi per effettuare l'accesso nell'app e accedere al tuo conto? Segui le istruzioni riportate in questa pagina.
Come posso cambiare il mio numero di telefono, l'indirizzo o altri dati personali?Attenzione: per la tua sicurezza possiamo aiutarti con domande relative ai dati personali solo se apri una chat di assistenza una volta effettuato l'accesso all'app.Apri una chat visitatoreNota bene: non siamo in grado di assisterti se ti presenterai di persona nei nostri uffici. Ti preghiamo di utilizzare solo i nostri canali designati per contattarci.

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it‚Äîyou can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you‚Äôve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‚ÄòCards‚Äô from the bottom right-handTap ‚ÄòCard Settings‚Äô and select the relevant cardSelect ‚ÄòReset PIN‚ÄôEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction‚Äîin a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences‚Äîsuch as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn‚Äôt accepted, simply try again a different combination.¬†If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you‚Äôve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Come posso creare Regole per i miei Spaces?
answer: Nell‚Äôambito dei tuoi Spaces puoi decidere le tue Regole: puoi preimpostare trasferimenti periodici verso i tuoi Spaces e risparmiare tempo e denaro in modo molto semplice.Se vuoi impostare una Regola dalla webapp, effettua un bonifico con Spaces e poi seleziona ‚ÄúRipeti questa operazione‚Äù. Per cancellare una regola, clicca sui 3 puntini indicanti le impostazioni. Da l√¨, vedrai tutte le regole attive. Clicca sull‚Äôicona del cestino per cancellare la regola. Se vuoi modificare una regola esistente, puoi semplicemente eliminarla dalle impostazioni dello Space in cui l‚Äôhai creata e crearne una nuova.¬†Dai dispositivi Android effettua un bonifico e seleziona ‚ÄúRipeti questa operazione‚Äù. In alternativa, dalla sezione Spaces, seleziona i tre puntini e poi ‚Äúcrea regola‚Äù. Da questo punto, segui i passaggi successivi fino a confermare le informazioni inserite.Dai dispositivi iOS, entra nella sezione Spaces e seleziona ‚Äúcrea regola‚Äù. Baster√† inserire le informazioni richieste e confermare.¬†Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le regole per i tuoi Spaces ed eventuali ordini di bonifici verranno elaborati allo stesso orario (0100 UTC) se impostate per lo stesso giorno. Accertati di avere fondi sufficienti per coprire queste transazioni ed evitare che non vengano eseguite.¬†Se non riesci a coprire l‚Äôimporto richiesto, baster√† impostare le transazioni in date differenti in base alle tue priorit√†.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†*applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: ¬øQu√© es un embargo y qu√© puedo hacer?
answer: ¬øC√≥mo funciona un embargo?Un embargo es una orden judicial emitida por una entidad estatal o una Corte donde se informa a la entidad bancaria que tienes una deuda por pagar. Como consecuencia, N26 tiene la obligaci√≥n de retener los fondos en tu cuenta para posteriormente transferirlos al acreedor (entidad p√∫blica o cuenta especificada por el juzgado).Los acreedores pueden ser la Agencia Tributaria, la Seguridad Social o cualquier oficina de la administraci√≥n p√∫blica y las Cortes como resultado de un proceso judicial.Cuando bloqueamos el saldo en tu cuenta como consecuencia del embargo, recibir√°s un mensaje con la siguiente informaci√≥n:AcreedorN√∫mero del embargo¬†Saldo a embargarSaldo embargado en tu cuenta¬øQu√© puedo hacer en esta situaci√≥n?En primer lugar, te recomendamos comunicarte con el acreedor para llegar a un acuerdo de pago o para que levanten el embargo si lo consideran pertinente. N26 no puede tomar ninguna acci√≥n al respecto, ya que estamos obligados legalmente a efectuar el embargo y transferir los fondos, salvo que recibamos una orden de levantamiento de embargo en el tiempo determinado por la ley.Puedes realizar el pago mediante otra cuenta o a trav√©s de tu cuenta N26, aunque el dinero no se liberar√° hasta que el acreedor no confirme la recepci√≥n del pago.Protecci√≥n de salarios y de subsidios estatalesSi recibes tu salario en tu cuenta N26, se debe aplicar una protecci√≥n especial sobre un porcentaje dependiendo de tus ingresos.Sin embargo, normalmente hay que informar de esta situaci√≥n al acreedor, quien notificar√° a N26 el levantamiento de los fondos correspondientes.¬øEn cu√°nto tiempo transfiere N26 los fondos embargados al acreedor?La transferencia de los fondos se ejecuta en tiempos diferentes dependiendo del tipo de acreedor que ha ordenado el embargo. Normalmente son 20 d√≠as (Cortes o Hacienda) y 10 d√≠as para embargos provenientes de la Seguridad Social. Los fondos se transfieren directamente a la entidad o al juzgado que ha emitido la orden; no se pueden transferir a terceros ni al deudor en ning√∫n caso (salvo si se levanta el embargo).

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don‚Äôt recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?¬†Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.¬†¬†N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant‚Äôs part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn‚Äôt receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26¬†You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.¬†Go to the ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute¬†Tap ‚ÄòGet help with this transaction‚Äô and follow the steps provided.¬†Important:¬†If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you‚Äôll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You‚Äôll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.¬†¬†If you select a transaction but the ‚ÄòGet help‚Äô button doesn‚Äôt appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you‚Äôll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you‚Äôve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you‚Äôll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we‚Äôve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?¬†N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business¬†and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.¬†¬†What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.¬†In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank¬Æ sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.¬†How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account¬†
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint¬Æ ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.¬†
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.¬†¬†I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above ‚Ç¨150 will be charged with a 12.50‚Ç¨ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than ‚Ç¨150.The maximum fee is ‚Ç¨100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?

Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience.¬†You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the Apple¬†App Store (new tab)¬†or the¬†Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They‚Äôre able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that‚Äôs growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you‚Äôve received an unexpected message:If you‚Äôve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you‚Äôve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you‚Äôre ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We‚Äôre always here to help!

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Insights¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?

To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: Warum konnte mein Wise-Konto nicht verkn√ºpft werden?
answer: Der h√§ufigste Grund daf√ºr, dass Kunden ihr Wise-Konto nicht mit ihrem N26 Konto verkn√ºpfen k√∂nnen, ist, dass sie ihre pers√∂nlichen Informationen auf ihrem Wise-Konto nicht vollst√§ndig angegeben haben.Falls du ein Konto direkt bei Wise er√∂ffnet hast und dieselbe E-Mail-Adresse benutzt hast wie f√ºr dein N26 Konto, jedoch deine pers√∂nlichen Informationen nicht vollst√§ndig ausgef√ºllt hast, k√∂nnen wir dein Konto nicht mit N26 verkn√ºpfen.Bitte logge dich unter (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/d (neuen Tab)e in dein Wise-Konto ein oder benutze ihre App und stelle sicher, dass du deinen vollen Namen, Adresse, Geburtsdatum und Handynummer vollst√§ndig angegeben hast.Falls du dein Passwort f√ºr dein Wise-Konto vergessen hast, gehe zu (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/de (neuen Tab) und w√§hle ‚ÄòPasswort vergessen‚Äô, um es zur√ºckzusetzen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen.Falls du dich nicht erinnern kannst, ob du ein Konto bei Wise er√∂ffnet hast, solltest du trotzdem versuchen dich einzuloggen, indem du dein Passwort zur√ºcksetzt. Es k√∂nnte sein, dass es von einem anderen Partner er√∂ffnet wurde oder einfach eine Weile her ist.

question: Quelle est la fr√©quence des retraits gratuits ?

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Was ist N26 Business?
answer: Verf√ºgbar in √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Slowakei Spanien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Es ist aktuell noch nicht m√∂glich, zwischen verschiedenen Konten zu wechseln, daher musst du entscheiden, ob N26 Business das Richtige f√ºr dich ist:Das N26 Business Konto ist f√ºr¬†Selbst√§ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Tag. question: Comment puis-je fournir une preuve de l‚Äôorigine des fonds pour mon compte ?
answer: En tant que banque enti√®rement agr√©√©e, N26 doit effectuer des contr√¥les de routine sur les comptes utilisateurs. question: How to report an insurance claim?
answer: Your¬†N26 You (new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal (new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: Come si fa un bonifico SEPA?
answer: Puoi inviare bonifici verso tutti i paesi dell'area SEPA (se la banca ricevente accetta trasferimenti in euro).I bonifici in uscita possono essere effettuati tramite la versione mobile e web dell‚Äôapp N26 in questo modo:Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Dal mio conto.¬†Seleziona Dal mio conto, Bonifico bancario e poi Aggiungi nuovo beneficiario.¬†Inserisci il nome e l'IBAN del beneficiario e seleziona Continua.Inserisci l'importo e seleziona Avanti.Aggiungi un messaggio se necessario, oppure seleziona Salta.Controlla i dati del bonifico nell‚Äôapposita schermata.Nella stessa schermata puoi scegliere la data in cui vuoi che il bonifico venga inviato oppure salvarlo come ordine permanente.Seleziona Invia e conferma con il tuo PIN di Conferma.Dovrai, infine, confermare o annullare il bonifico tramite notifica push dal tuo dispositivo associato.Una volta che il bonifico viene confermato nella app, non possiamo pi√π annullarlo o cambiare i dettagli del beneficiario.Se non riesci a confermare l‚Äôinvio del bonifico tramite app, dovresti accertarti di quanto segue:hai una connessione internet stabilehai abilitato le notifiche push sul tuo dispositivo (le notifiche si abilitano dalle impostazioni del dispositivo e non dall‚Äôapp N26)¬†stai usando il dispositivo associato Dopo aver inviato il bonifico, potrai scaricare il PDF relativo alla transazione in questo modo:¬†Vai alla tua lista di transazioni.Individua e seleziona il bonifico.¬†Scorri verso il basso, fino a Informazioni sul bonifico e seleziona Conferma di trasferimentoPuoi inviare bonifici SEPA direttamente dai tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato. Basta andare nello Space con l'IBAN assegnato, selezionare "Invia denaro" e poi "Bonifico bancario". Funzioner√† come un normale pagamento in uscita.

question: Wie speichere ich die Daten eines √úberweisungsempf√§ngers?
answer: Jedes Mal, wenn du eine √úberweisung an einen neuen Empf√§nger in der App erstellst (klicke im Startbildschirm auf den Tab Geld senden, anschlie√üend auf Bank√ºberweisung und schlie√ülich auf Einen neuen Empf√§nger hinzuf√ºgen), werden einige Daten wie der Name des Empf√§ngers und die IBAN automatisch in deiner Kontaktliste f√ºr zuk√ºnftige √úberweisungen gespeichert. Du kannst auch Kontakte l√∂schen oder deinen Transaktionsverlauf mit ihnen einsehen:iOS: Tippe auf die drei Punkte links, um den Kontakt zu l√∂schen.Android: Tippe auf die drei Punkte rechts, um den Kontakt zu l√∂schen.Beachte, dass das L√∂schen eines Kontakteintrags den zugeh√∂rigen Transaktionsverlauf nicht l√∂scht.

question: PSD2 - un Open Banking sicuro
answer: Cos‚Äô√® la PSD2?La Direttiva sui Servizi di Pagamento 2 (¬´PSD2¬ª) √® la nuova direttiva europea¬† che ti consente di accedere alle informazioni sul tuo conto e di effettuare la disposizione di ordini di pagamento tramite¬† terze parti autorizzate in modo sicuro e protetto.Questo¬† significa che puoi autorizzare¬† terze parti ad accedere alle informazioni del tuo conto tramite un‚Äôinterfaccia dedicata.Puoi abilitare un servizio d‚Äôinformazioni sui conti t (AIS) per riunire i dati relativi ai¬† tuoi conti bancari che possiedi e gestirli attraverso fornitori terzi certificati;Puoi pagare in modo sicuro su¬† qualsiasi sito che offre servizi di pagamento (PIS).Lo scambio di dati avviene tramite il¬† nostro partner - Token.io.Come funziona?Se decidi di utilizzare¬† un servizio di pagamento come il servizio di informazione sui conti oppure il servizio di disposizione di ordini di pagamento, verrai reindirizzato all'app di N26 tramite Token.io per confermare la richiesta di accesso.Nella nostra Informativa sulla privacy (nuova tabella) ti informiamo sulle finalit√†, le parti coinvolte e le basi giuridiche del trattamento dei dati necessari per adempiere ai nostri obblighi nel quadro della nuova direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento.Domande frequenti¬†Perch√© non riesco a collegare terze parti al mio conto?Se una terza parte non ha effettuato l'integrazione con la nostra interfaccia dedicata, dovr√† farlo¬† attraverso il nostro partner Token.io.¬†Come posso revocare il consenso conferito ad una singola terza parte?Dovrai contattare la terza parte in questione direttamente e richiedere la revoca del consenso.*si applica a tutti i paesi EEA.

question: ¬øQu√© son los Espacios Compartidos?
answer: Con los Espacios Compartidos ahora puedes compartir dinero de forma r√°pida y f√°cil. Estos espacios se pueden usar para lo que sea, tanto para compartir facturas como para planear vacaciones u organizar el cumplea√±os de un amigo o familiar.Los Espacios Compartidos est√°n disponibles para los usuarios con plan premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You y N26 Business Metal), los cuales pueden crear e invitar a otros a su Espacio.Puede participar en un espacio cualquier usuario de N26, tenga la cuenta que tenga. El administrador del espacio es el due√±o legal del dinero de ese espacio. El administrador puede invitar hasta 10 participantes y puede eliminarlos siempre que quiera. Como todos los Espacios, los Espacios Compartidos no tienen un IBAN o tarjeta asociada a ellos.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We‚Äôre sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We‚Äôd love to keep you as a customer‚Äîtell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.¬†If you‚Äôve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here‚Äôs what to do:Make your account balance ‚Ç¨0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is ‚Ç¨0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You‚Äôll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you‚Äôre unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or ‚Äúas soon as possible‚ÄùYour full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we‚Äôll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.¬†Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.¬†

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?¬†N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business¬†and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.¬†¬†What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.¬†In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank¬Æ sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.¬†How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account¬†
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint¬Æ ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.¬†
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.¬†¬†I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintr√§chtigt wurde?
answer:
Betrugshotline - Kontaktiere uns.Du hast per Bank√ºberweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen Betr√ºger √ºberwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.¬†Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlie√ülich f√ºr die oben beschriebenen F√§lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vort√§uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du denkst, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, √§ndere¬†als Erstes¬†dein Passwort.¬†Danach¬†kannst du je nach Situation verschiedene Ma√ünahmen ergreifen:Was sollte ich tun, wenn mir eine Transaktion auf meinem Konto verd√§chtig vorkommt?Wenn du eine verd√§chtige Transaktion bemerkst, erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?"
Danach solltest du sofort unser Kundenserviceteam kontaktieren, entweder direkt √ºber die N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Wenn du lieber telefonieren m√∂chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zur√ºck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erkl√§re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.Um unsere Sicherheitsma√ünahmen auch √ºber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.Die einzelnen F√§lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir au√üerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,Was sollte ich tun, wenn ich meine Karte verloren habe oder denke, dass meine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden?Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast, sie dir gestohlen wurde oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, solltest du deine Karte sofort in deiner N26 App sperren und eine neue beantragen, damit dein Geld sicher bleibt.Was passiert, wenn ich mein gekoppeltes Ger√§t verloren habe? K√∂nnte in diesem Fall jemand auf mein Konto zugreifen?Wenn du dein gekoppeltes Ger√§t verloren hast oder es dir gestohlen wurde, kannst du dich darauf verlassen, dass man auf deine N26 App nur unter Eingabe des richtigen Passworts oder mit Fingerabdruck- oder Gesichtserkennung zugreifen kann. Wenn du ein neues Ger√§t hast, hilft dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne dabei, es mit deinem N26 Konto zu koppeln.Was ist, wenn ich eine Idee habe, um die Sicherheit bei N26 zu verbessern?Mehr dar√ºber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall sch√ºtzen, erf√§hrst du in unserem Blog (neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel √ºber Sicherheit bei N26 (neuen Tab).Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Comment d√©clarer son compte N26 aux imp√¥ts fran√ßais ?
answer: (S‚Äôapplique aux r√©sidents fran√ßais)Conform√©ment au Code g√©n√©ral des imp√¥ts, vous √™tes tenu de d√©clarer tout compte bancaire ouvert √† l‚Äô√©tranger si vous l'avez ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√© au cours de l'ann√©e pour laquelle vous d√©clarez vos revenus. Cela s‚Äôapplique donc pour votre compte N26.Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte N26 en d√©cembre 2019, vous devez d√©clarer votre compte lors de votre d√©claration de revenus gagn√©s en 2019, en 2020. De la m√™me fa√ßon, si vous avez ouvert votre compte en mars 2020, vous devrez le d√©clarer avec vos revenus de 2020, en 2021.Pour ce faire :Au moment de remplir les informations relatives √† vos ‚Äúrevenus et charges‚Äù demand√©es lors de l‚Äô√âtape 3, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Divers. Vous devrez cocher la case ‚ÄúComptes √† l‚Äô√©tranger, reprise de r√©ductions ou de cr√©dit d‚Äôimp√¥t‚Äù.Dans la fen√™tre "D√©clarations annexes‚Äù qui appara√Æt, cochez la case correspondant au formulaire N¬∞3916 ‚ÄúD√©claration par un r√©sident d‚Äôun compte ouvert, d√©tenu, utilis√© ou clos √† l‚Äô√©tranger‚Äù.Ensuite, acc√©dez au formulaire en cliquant sur ‚ÄúAnnexe n¬∞3916‚Äù, accessible en haut √† gauche de votre √©cran de t√©l√©d√©claration.En cliquant sur l‚ÄôAnnexe, indiquez d‚Äôabord combien de comptes vous souhaitez d√©clarer. Indiquez ‚Äú1‚Äù si votre compte N26 est le seul compte √† l‚Äô√©tranger que vous avez ouvert, utilis√© ou clos en 2020.Remplissez le formulaire en indiquant les informations ci-dessous pour votre compte N26.Retrouvez une aide d√©taill√©e, √©tape par √©tape, en lisant l'article de notre blog (nouvel onglet) pr√©vu √† cet effet.

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes‚Äîyour Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact‚Äîyou create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You‚Äôre the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine extra Karte?

Um die Produktion und Lieferung der Karte auszul√∂sen, ben√∂tigst du au√üerdem einen einmaligen Mindestbetrag in H√∂he von 10‚Ç¨ auf deinem Konto. Mehr dazu erf√§hrst du hier.‚ÑπÔ∏è Die Zusatzkarte ist verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in den folgenden L√§ndern: Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, √ñsterreich, D√§nemark, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Schweden, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Niederlande.

question: Come ricaricare il mio conto?
answer: Dopo aver aperto il tuo conto N26, puoi ricevere accrediti fin da subito nei seguenti modi:Bonifici SEPA.¬†Invia bonifici SEPA in EURO oppure imposta bonifici ricorrenti verso il tuo conto per essere sicuro che il tuo saldo sia sempre positivo oppure, in casi pi√π urgenti, puoi ricevere bonifici istantanei*. Il tempo di accredito √® fino a 2 giorni lavorativi.Accredito stipendio. Fai trasferire le tue entrate fisse sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA. Ti baster√† fornire l'IBAN al mandante.¬†Carta di debito, credito o prepagata. Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto inserendo nell'app N26 i dettagli della carta associata ad un tuo altro conto. Il servizio di accredito istantaneo del Conto consente di ricaricare un importo compreso tra 20 ‚Ç¨ e 450 ‚Ç¨ al mese. Il primo deposito √® gratuito, sui depositi successivi sar√† applicata una commissione dell' 3 %. Le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate. Apple Pay o Google Pay (nuova tabella). Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto utilizzando Apple Pay (per dispositivi iOS) o GPay (per dispositivi Android). Puoi scegliere di depositare tra 20 ‚Ç¨ e 450 ‚Ç¨. Il primo deposito √® gratuito, sui depositi successivi sar√† applicata una commissione dell' 3 %. Le carte prepagate cos√¨ come le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate. CASH26. (valido per Italia, Spagna, Grecia, Germania e Austria). Con CASH26 puoi versare contanti sul tuo conto N26 semplicemente recandoti presso i supermercati convenzionati.MoneyBeam. Con MoneyBeam puoi ricevere denaro da altri utenti N26 in tempo reale.iDEAL (valido solo nei Paesi Bassi). Per clienti con Termini e Condizioni olandesi e un account iDEAL. Il primo deposito √® gratuito. Sui seguenti depositi sar√† addebitata una commissione pari all'1,5% dell'importo del deposito.GiroPay (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Germania per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni tedeschi un conto Giropay.EPS (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Austria per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni austriaci e un conto EPS.Bancontact (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Belgio per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni belgi e un conto Bancontact.*Per ricevere un bonifico istantaneo √® necessario che il mittente selezioni questa tipologia di bonifico e che la banca emittente la supporti. Altrimenti verr√† accreditato entro 2 giorni lavorativi. Il limite massimo per bonifici SEPA istantanei in entrata √® di 100.000 ‚Ç¨. Non viene applicato alcun limite ai normali bonifici SEPA in entrata.

question: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‚ÄòSharing Money‚ÄôRead the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù will pop-up. Tap ‚Äúsign‚ÄùCheck both ‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù and ‚ÄúPower of attorney‚Äù, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.
