question: Come funziona Spaces?
answer: Spaces √® una funzionalit√† per conti Premium che ti permette di creare diversi spazi nel tuo conto principale, per mettere da parte del denaro. Puoi personalizzare ogni spazio a tuo piacimento e trasferire denaro dal tuo conto principale allo spazio, in tempo reale. Spaces √® disponibile via app e¬†WebApp (nuova tabella)¬†in tutti i paesi.Oltre al tuo conto corrente principale, puoi creare degli spazi aggiuntivi tutte le volte che vuoi, ma ricorda che il numero di spazi attivi che puoi avere dipende dalla tipologia di conto che possiedi: fino a 10 spazi per i conti N26 You, N26 Smart e N26 Metal.Inoltre, l‚Äôestratto conto del tuo conto principale, includer√† anche le transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.Solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) pu√≤ avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia disponibile per te. Tutti gli altri spazi non possono avere un saldo negativo, puoi trasferire negli spazi soltanto un ammontare di denaro effettivamente disponibile.Per effettuare una qualsiasi transazione con la tua Mastercard, potrai usare soltanto il saldo disponibile nel tuo conto principale. Ti suggeriamo quindi di trasferire nel tuo conto principale denaro sufficiente per effettuare la transazione, prima che questa avvenga.Sposta denaro da uno space all'altro tenendo premuto sul tuo account principale e trascinandolo nel tuo space. Una volta confermato l‚Äôammontare, il tuo saldo attuale verr√† aggiornato subito dopo.Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. Dovrai solo confermare l'operazione con il tuo PIN di conferma. Se uno space √® bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. Se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.Puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti Spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.Puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno Space al saldo totale sul conto. Per fare questo, entra nello Space, seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra e poi "nascondi il saldo dello spazio".Adesso puoi anche bloccare i trasferimenti da uno Space. Vai alle impostazioni dello Space e seleziona Blocca i trasferimenti al conto principale o ad altri Spazi e inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma per convalidare l'opzione.Potrai anche cancellare definitivamente uno Space, sempre dal men√π Impostazioni dello Space stesso.Spaces include una opzione chiamata Regole, con le quali potrai gestire il tuo tempo e il tuo denaro in maniera molto semplice.Round-Up Savings:Con la funzione ‚ÄúRound-Up Savings‚Äù, i clienti Premium possono far arrotondare tutte le transazioni con carta alla cifra tonda in euro pi√π prossima, mettendo ogni volta da parte la differenza in uno spazio a scelta.Gli arrotondamenti non ti faranno andare in scoperto. Se il tuo saldo non √® sufficiente a coprire l‚Äôarrotondamento, questo non verr√† effettuato.Puoi avere solo un arrotondamento attivo alla volta quando trasferisci il denaro in uno spazio di tua preferenza.Puoi disattivare la funzione ‚ÄúRound-Up‚Äù in qualsiasi momento.Se chiudi uno spazio per cui sono abilitati gli arrotondamenti, la funzione ‚ÄúRound-Up‚Äù verr√† disattivata fino a quando non la riattiverai.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
„Éª Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.¬†Remember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app‚Äîyou‚Äôll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you‚Äôll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).¬†To unpair your old smartphone:Go to üë§ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to üë§ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: ¬øC√≥mo cerrar la cuenta?
answer: Si por alguna extra√±a raz√≥n decidieras cerrar tu cuenta de N26, lo respetamos; y aunque te echaremos de menos, aqu√≠ puedes ver que hasta darse de baja tambi√©n es f√°cil.Si tienes un plan premium, primero piensa si quieres realmente cerrar la cuenta o, mejor, si prefieres simplemente cancelar la suscripci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva) y quedarte con el plan Est√°ndar gratis.Para cerrar la cuenta por completo, haz lo siguiente:Si tienes saldo positivo, transfiere tus fondos restantes a otra cuenta antes de iniciar el proceso. Si tienes saldo negativo, ingresa (pesta√±a nueva) el dinero que falte en la cuenta N26. El objetivo es dejar tu balance a 0 para que todo vaya mucho m√°s r√°pido.Haz clic aqu√≠ para seguir los pasos del proceso electr√≥nico de cierre de cuenta (pesta√±a nueva). Tendr√°s que iniciar sesi√≥n para verificar tu identidad y, despu√©s, la app te guiar√° por el proceso para dar de baja tu cuenta.Destruye tu tarjeta cort√°ndola con unas tijeras (por ejemplo). Hay que cortar el chip y la banda magn√©tica, y despu√©s deshacerse de los trozos por separado.ImportanteSolo si no puedes iniciar sesi√≥n en tu cuenta y, por lo tanto, el enlace del proceso electr√≥nico te da error, puedes enviarnos un email a (pesta√±a nueva)support@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva) desde tu direcci√≥n de email registrada, adjuntando este formulario de cancelaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva), que requiere:La declaraci√≥n donde solicitas el cierre de tu cuenta en una fecha determinada o ¬´lo antes posible¬ª;tu nombre;tu IBAN de N26;un IBAN diferente dentro de la zona SEPA (euro) para transferir tu saldo restante en caso de que sea positivo (tanto en Espacios como en tu cuenta principal).

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you‚Äôre able to see what‚Äôs going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you‚Äôve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.¬†Sometimes you‚Äôll see both payments at the same time‚Äìthe authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn‚Äôt expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).¬†Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: Was sind Spaces?
answer:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und √ºberweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App und¬†WebApp (neuen Tab)¬†verf√ºgbar.Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder prim√§ren Space) kannst du beliebig oft zus√§tzliche Spaces anlegen und l√∂schen, wobei die Anzahl der verf√ºgbaren aktiven Spaces von deinem Kontotyp abh√§ngt: bis zu 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces mit N26 You, N26 Smart und N26 Metal.Die Kontoausz√ºge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces √ºberwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die Kontoausz√ºge kannst du online herunterladen.Nur dein Hauptkonto kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einen¬†Dispokredit¬†hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur Betr√§ge √ºberweisen, die dort jeweils auch verf√ºgbar sind.Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem Hauptkonto f√ºr Kartenzahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld √ºberweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf t√§tigen kannst.Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedr√ºckt h√§ltst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine Best√§tigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf √ºberweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen m√∂chtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe daf√ºr zum gew√ºnschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".Du kannst jetzt Zahlungen von einem Space sperren. Gehe einfach zu den Einstellungen des entsprechenden Space und tippe auf Zahlungen an mein Hauptkonto oder anderen Space sperren. Best√§tige dann mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN.Du kannst jetzt einen Space auch l√∂schen, wenn eine Karte damit verkn√ºpft ist. Gehe dazu in die Einstellungen von deinem Space.Spaces enth√§lt eine Funktion, die ‚ÄúRegeln‚Äù hei√üt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Round-up Savings:Mit der Funktion ‚ÄûRound-up Savings‚Äú k√∂nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen get√§tigte Kartentransaktion auf den n√§chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung f√ºhrt nicht zu einer √úberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du √ºber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verf√ºgen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgef√ºhrt.Du kannst immer nur eine ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl √ºberweisen.Du kannst die Funktion ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlie√üt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die ‚ÄûRound-up‚Äú-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.IBANs f√ºr Spaces:Premiumkunden (N26 Smart, You und Metal), die ihr Konto in Deutschland er√∂ffnet haben und √ºber eine deutsche IBAN verf√ºgen, k√∂nnen ihrem Space bzw. ihren Spaces nun eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen. Sobald einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde, k√∂nnen √ºber den Space bestimmte √úberweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften get√§tigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Zusammenfassung, wie du deine Spaces f√ºr eine noch bessere √úbersicht √ºber deine eingehenden und ausgehenden √úberweisungen nutzen kannst: √úberweisungen empfangen: Sobald du dem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, kannst du die individuelle IBAN angeben, um √úberweisungen zu empfangen.Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift t√§tigen: Mit Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN kannst du Zahlungen per Lastschrift t√§tigen.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces mit einer individuellen IBAN erstellen, um noch mehr Kontrolle √ºber deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Geldfl√ºsse zu haben. Du hast insgesamt 10 IBANs zur Verf√ºgung.Unseren speziellen Artikel mit weiteren Informationen zu IBANs f√ºr Spaces findest du hier.

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‚Äòlookalike audiences‚Äô are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: Comment faire un don avec N26 ?
answer:
N26 a toujours √©t√© impliqu√© dans la lutte contre la faim et les in√©galit√©s aux c√¥t√©s d‚Äôorganisations humanitaires. Il sera d√©sormais encore plus facile de faire un don depuis votre compte N26.¬†Vous pouvez d√©sormais envoyer un don √† une liste d‚Äôorganisations caritatives que nous avons s√©lectionn√©es, directement depuis votre application N26. Le montant total sera envoy√© par virement bancaire √† l‚Äôorganisation caritative s√©lectionn√©e.Pour envoyer un don √† une organisation caritative, veuillez suivre les √©tapes suivantes¬†:Depuis l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil de votre application, appuyez sur Envoyer.S√©lectionnez Don et ContinuerChoisissez une organisation caritative dans la liste¬†S√©lectionnez Continuer pour faire un don.Saisissez le montant de votre don, puis confirmez la transaction avec votre code PIN.
Dans de nombreux cas, une preuve de paiement est suffisante pour demander l‚Äôabattement fiscal de votre don dans votre d√©claration d‚Äôimp√¥ts sur le revenu. Cependant, si vous avez besoin d‚Äôun re√ßu officiel de don de l‚Äôorganisation caritative, nous vous prions de la contacter directement (avec votre preuve de paiement), car seules les organisations caritatives peuvent d√©livrer des re√ßus de don et non N26.

question: Why isn't my video verification working?
answer: Tips for a successful video¬†verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll¬†need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery¬†of your card.¬†Please note that this is not a fee: your¬†first card¬†after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries¬†take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gem√§√ü des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen Beh√∂rden in der Europ√§ischen Union Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen L√§ndern steuerpflichtig sind.Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard f√ºr den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen Beh√∂rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher Verm√∂genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 L√§nder haben sich erkl√§rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner √ºber ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.Damit wir feststellen k√∂nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dich fragen:In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen L√§ndern hast, greifen f√ºr gew√∂hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden L√§nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren L√§ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, m√ºssen wir wissen, um welche L√§nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zuverl√§ssige Informationen zur Verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.
Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den L√§ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung (neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten ver√∂ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen L√§ndern identifizieren kannst.Falls sich deine Lebenslage ver√§ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich daf√ºr einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe‚Äôre sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your complaint and provide our findings and final response via email.¬†Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Italian reclami@n26.com (new tab)It is also possible to write through a certified email message (PEC) to reclami@pec.n26.com (new tab).Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarized power of attorney form.Please only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.¬†If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinComplaints filed in a manner other than those above, or sent to addresses other than those listed, will be considered received from the date they are delivered to the Complaints Office.If your complaint is upheld, we will inform you of the steps that we have taken and/or plan to implement, with the expected timeframes. If your complaint is not upheld, we will provide you with a clear illustration of the reasons for the rejection and, in addition, indications on the possibility of using alternative means for resolving the dispute.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. Otherwise, non-payment related complaints will be resolved within 60 calendar days.For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days¬†Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days¬†United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days¬†Spain - 60 Calendar Days¬†Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties.¬†Customers who reside in Italy can also contact the following:Arbitro Bancario FinanziarioConciliatore Bancario FinanziarioAlternatively, you can go before a different arbitration or mediation body as long as they are enrolled in the appropriate register kept by the Italian Ministry of Justice. The full list of mediation bodies is available at: www.giustizia.itCustomers outside of Italy can also contact the following:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.Annual reportsRendiconto sull'attivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2019 (new tab)Rendiconto sull‚Äôattivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l‚Äôanno 2020 (new tab)Rendiconto sull'attivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2021 (new tab)

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above ‚Ç¨150 will be charged with a 12.50‚Ç¨ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than ‚Ç¨150.The maximum fee is ‚Ç¨100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: How to make N26 my main account?
answer: N26 offers you a series of services and benefits designed specifically for our customers in Italy. If you decide to use your N26 account as your main account to receive your salary and carry out your daily banking operations, simply provide your bank details to your employer.What services does N26 offer?As soon as you have opened your account, you can immediately start depositing and withdrawing cash with CASH26 (new tab) from over 1000 partner points of sale throughout Italy. Just open the N26 app, find the nearest CASH26 store on the map, create a barcode and show it to the person at the checkout.You‚Äôll be able to top up your account by bank transfer, even instantaneous, from another current account, or by debit, credit or prepaid card or by crediting your salary.With your N26 account you will also have the possibility to set direct debits for your subscriptions for free, from the gym to streaming services, to debit your utilities (water, electricity, gas, telephony) and pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and make phone top-ups directly from your mobile app. Click here (new tab) to find out more.With your N26 Premium Mastercard you can also withdraw cash for free and without limits from all ATMs in Europe (up to 3 free withdrawals per month in Europe with N26 Standard).We also remind you that the tax on the account due in the event of an average stock exceeding ‚Ç¨ 5,000 (on an annual basis and subject to subsequent changes in the law) and equal to ‚Ç¨ 34.20, will be borne by N26 until 30/06/2022.What other benefits does N26 offer?From your N26 app, available for iOS and Android, you can make SEPA transfers for free and receive or make instant SEPA transfers, free of charge if you have an N26 premium account (N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal) and for ‚Ç¨ 0.99 if you have a N26 Standard account. In addition, you can set up standing orders for free both in the SEPA area and in foreign currencies and receive or make international transfers (SWIFT).Also remember that by opening your N26 account, you can immediately start using the Mastercard card associated with it and connect it to Apple or Google Pay. With N26 Standard you will immediately have a free virtual Mastercard that you can use for your online purchases and contactless payments. The additional physical card can be requested at any time without any monthly fee.With an N26 Premium account, you will also be able to create separate Spaces (new tab) from your main account to set aside money and share (new tab) it with other N26 customers to manage joint expenses.What to do if my IBAN is not accepted?We remind you that the IBAN of your N26 account, according to the European law of 1 February 2016, Article 9 of EU Regulation 260/2012 (new tab), must be accepted by every member state of the European Economic Area. If your employer or a merchant refuses to accept your IBAN, click here (new tab) for more information on how to report the incident.

question: ¬øHas recibido un mensaje sospechoso?
answer: Durante el punto √°lgido de la pandemia global, EasyJet hizo p√∫blico el robo de los datos personales y de vuelo de 9 millones de clientes en un sofisticado ciberataque. Durante el primer trimestre de 2021, los datos personales de m√°s de 530 millones de usuarios de Facebook de m√°s de 100 pa√≠ses salieron a subasta en internet. Unos d√≠as despu√©s, los datos personales de otros 500 millones de usuarios de LinkedIn aparecieron en la Dark Web. Entre estos datos hab√≠a nombres, fechas de nacimiento, n√∫meros de tel√©fono y direcciones de email.¬øQu√© tiene que ver todo esto con N26? Aunque esto no afecta directamente a N26 ni a la seguridad de tu cuenta bancaria, los ciberdelincuentes pueden utilizar informaci√≥n obtenida de sus ataques a otras empresas para llevar a cabo ataques de phishing a gran escala.El phishing es una t√©cnica empleada para obtener datos sensibles que pueden utilizarse con fines fraudulentos. Los estafadores se hacen pasar por empresas de renombre para convencer a sus v√≠ctimas de que compartan sus datos personales. Lo consiguen dirigi√©ndose a ellas a trav√©s de los medios de comunicaci√≥n digital que todos utilizamos a diario, por ejemplo: email, SMS, llamadas de tel√©fono y redes sociales.Como nuestro banco digital es cada vez m√°s popular, los clientes de N26 est√°n sufriendo campa√±as de phishing. Durante ellas, los atacantes env√≠an mensajes que suelen contener enlaces a sitios web que se parecen mucho a la WebApp de N26. Aunque a primera vista puedan parecer convincentes, estos sitios web son maliciosos y no tienen ninguna relaci√≥n con N26. En algunos casos, los atacantes falsifican un c√≥digo abreviado para enviar sus SMS, por lo que sus mensajes pueden aparecer en el mismo hilo que los mensajes que N26 te ha enviado anteriormente. Te rogamos que prestes mucha atenci√≥n y que nos contactes de inmediato si detectas algo que se salga de lo com√∫n.¬øQu√© hace N26 para combatir este problema? Nuestro personal de seguridad realiza un seguimiento constante para prevenir los ataques y garantizar que los sitios web fraudulentos se desactiven lo antes posible. De este modo, nuestra entidad mantiene tu cuenta segura.Mientras nosotros seguimos tomando precauciones para proteger tus cuentas y tus datos personales, t√∫ tambi√©n puedes adoptar medidas para protegerte. Esto es lo que debes hacer si recibes un mensaje inesperado:Si recibes un SMS de alguien que hable en nombre de N26, recuerda que nosotros nunca te contactar√≠amos a trav√©s de ese canal.Los mensajes de texto que te pidan hacer algo siempre son maliciosos. No hagas clic en ning√∫n enlace ni indiques ning√∫n dato personal. Nosotros nunca te pedimos que hagas nada por medio de un SMS.Si tienes alguna duda sobre la informaci√≥n que te comunican o sospechas que te han dirigido a un sitio fraudulento, act√∫a con cautela. Si te piden que llames a un n√∫mero o que env√≠es un correo a una direcci√≥n de email, busca los datos de contacto para ver si coinciden con los de una empresa real.Si no sales de dudas, haz una captura de pantalla del mensaje y contacta con nuestro Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente a trav√©s del chat de la app N26, o env√≠ala a support@n26.com. ¬°Estaremos encantados de ayudarte!

question: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
answer: Deine N26 Karte kam heute mit der Post? Bevor du sie nutzen kannst, musst du deine Karte aktivieren. Die Aktivierung deiner N26 Karte ist in wenigen Schritten erledigt. Stelle vorher jedoch sicher, dass du dein Smartphone bereits mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft hast.Um deine Karte in der N26 App zu aktivieren, f√ºhre folgende Schritte vom Startbildschirm aus:Gehe zum "Karten"-Tab.W√§hle "Einstellungen" und wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du aktivieren m√∂chtest.Tippe auf "Aktivieren".Gib den Token ‚Äì die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte ‚Äì ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der R√ºckseite.Um deine Karte in der Web-App zu aktivieren, klicke einfach im Startbildschirm auf "Karte aktivieren".Du willst eine neue Karte bestellen, weil deine alte verloren gegangen, gestohlen oder besch√§digt worden ist? Oder hast du dir ein Upgrade auf N26 Smart, You oder Metal geholt? In allen F√§llen musst du die oben genannten Schritte zur Aktivierung deiner neuen Karte wiederholen.¬†Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in Gesch√§ften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem Gesch√§ft vollst√§ndig aktivieren. Hierf√ºr muss die Karte in ein Kartenleseger√§t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.Falls du mehrere Karten derselben Art hast (zum Beispiel, weil sich die Lieferung verz√∂gert hat und du mehr als eine Karte bestellt hast), kannst du nur die neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle √§lteren Karten werden deaktiviert, wenn du eine neue bestellst. Das trifft nicht auf Zusatzkarten f√ºr Premiumkonten zu.

question: Comment faire une remarque ou sugg√©rer une nouvelle id√©e de produit ?
answer: Nous envoyons fr√©quemment des sondages √† nos utilisateurs pour avoir leurs retours. Les r√©ponses sont √©videmment anonymes. Vous pouvez √† tout moment nous faire des retours et des suggestions en envoyant un email √†¬†ideas@n26.com (nouvel onglet). C‚Äôest gr√¢ce √† vous que nous nous am√©liorons. Nous travaillons au quotidien pour vous proposer le meilleur produit et la meilleure exp√©rience possible.Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas satisfaits de l‚Äôun de nos produits ou services, vous pouvez faire une¬†r√©clamation.

question: Cos‚Äô√® una carta virtuale?
answer: Se apri un conto N26 Standard avrai una carta virtuale gratuitamente (a condizione che tu abbia un saldo minimo una tantum di 10 ‚Ç¨ per attivare la carta).Una carta virtuale aggiuntiva √® ideale per effettuare pagamenti online: puoi utilizzare e condividere i dati della tua carta extra senza ansia e separare i pagamenti ricorrenti, come i tuoi abbonamenti, dalle spese quotidiane.I clienti N26 Smart, YOU e Metal hanno la possibilit√† di ordinare una carta virtuale gratuitamente, oltre alla carta fisica gratuita che ricevono con la loro sottoscrizione premium. Buone da sapere: i clienti N26 Standard hanno la possibilit√† di ordinare una carta fisica pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 ‚Ç¨ (senza dover passare a una sottoscrizione premium).Come ordinare e attivare la mia carta virtuale?Effettua l‚Äôaccesso e apri la scheda Carte nell‚Äôangolo in basso a destra.Tocca 'Ottieni una carta aggiuntiva'.Seleziona 'Virtuale' in alto, poi tocca 'Seleziona' in fondo.Leggi e accetta i termini e le condizioni, poi tocca 'Genera carta virtuale'.Aggiungi la tua carta virtuale a Apple Pay o Google Pay o salta questo passaggio.Come uso la mia carta virtuale?Pagare nei negozi fisici usando Apple o Google Pay: collega la tua carta virtuale ad Apple o Google Pay a seconda del tuo dispositivo.Prelevare contanti: una volta che hai collegato la tua carta virtuale al tuo wallet Apple o Google, puoi prelevare contanti dagli sportelli ATM che hanno la funzionalit√† contactless. Puoi anche utilizzare CASH26 per depositare o prelevare contanti (DE, AT, IT, ES e GR).Effettuare acquisti online: puoi vedere i dettagli della tua carta virtuale nell‚Äôapp (numero di carta, data di scadenza e numero CVV). Per vedere questi dettagli:Effettua il log-in nell‚Äôapp mobile N26Seleziona 'Carte'Trova la tua carta virtuale (scorri verso sinistra per trovare la tua carta virtuale se ne hai pi√π di una)Seleziona 'Dati della carta'Dopodich√© dovrai inserire il tuo PIN di conferma o effettuare un login biometrico per vedere le tue carte virtuali per 60 secondi.La Mastercard virtuale √® disponibile solo per i conti N26 Standard aperti a partire dal febbraio 2021 e per tutti i conti N26 Premium a partire dal 9 ottobre 2021.

question: Who can sign up for N26 Business?
answer:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.¬†How do N26 Business accounts work?¬†N26 offers a wide range of Business accounts (new tab), designed for freelancers and the self-employed, with a Mastercard linked to their account, entitling them to up to 0.5% monthly cashback on all their business payments.(The cashback offered by N26 Business accounts is not the Government Cashback, which can currently be activated for all N26 Mastercards.)If you are interested in Allianz coverage or other Premium perks, besides the N26 Business (new tab) account, you can also opt for N26 Business You (new tab) , N26 Business Metal (new tab), or N26 Business Smart (new tab). ¬†N26 Business (new tab) accounts are reserved exclusively for:freelancers enrolled in a professional register or order (such as architects, lawyers, pharmacists, and nurses)other freelancers, i.e. the self-employed and individual entrepreneurs with a VAT number (such as designers, photographers, electricians, or owners of B&Bs and holiday homes with VAT numbers).sole proprietorships registered in the Business Register of the Chamber of CommerceHowever, it is not possible to sign up for an N26 Business in the name of a partnership (e.g., GPs and LPs), capital company (e.g., LLCs and INCs), or another entity, including subjects with legal status and liability.¬†What is the VAT number and where can I find it?The VAT number is an 11-digit numeric code, which is used to uniquely identify the owner of a given professional activity, such as the personal tax code.
Under Italian law, anyone who carries out a continuous activity for more than 30 days, in fact, has the obligation to register for VAT. This can be of two types: ordinary or flat-rate tax regime, depending on the revenues and expenses incurred for the activity.
The opening of the VAT number takes place by submitting a specific form to the Revenue Agency:Model AA9 / 12 (new tab) for individuals;Model AA7 / 10 (new tab) for companies.The form must be submitted or sent online via the Tax Agency portal (new tab) within 30 days of starting the professional activity.
As soon as the opening application is approved and completed, you will receive the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number containing the relevant code assigned to you by post and in the reserved area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe Tax Agency portal (new tab) .What is the ATECO code and where can I find it?The ATECO code is an alphanumeric abbreviation used to classify a commercial activity and to assign a risk level to that company, according to the ATECO 2007 classification (new tab)currently in force.
The code must be entered at the time of the request to open the VAT number, in order to communicate to the Tax Agency the type of activity that will be carried out.
It will also be possible to add different ATECO codes with the opening of additional VAT numbers.
You can find the ATECO code on the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number or on the Chamber of Commerce registration in the case of sole proprietorships.

question: What are ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password? (new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Was sind Echtzeit-√úberweisungen?
answer: Alle N26 Kunden haben nun die M√∂glichkeit, Echtzeit-√úberweisungen zu verwenden. Im Gegensatz zu den √ºblichen SEPA-√úberweisungen, die innerhalb von zwei Werktagen bearbeitet werden, werden Echtzeit-√úberweisungen innerhalb von Sekunden √ºbermittelt und empfangen.Eine Echtzeit-√úberweisungen kann von Vorteil sein, wenn du eine dringende √úberweisung t√§tigen musst (sie dauert etwa 10 Sekunden). F√ºr unsere Standardkunden, die Echtzeit-√úberweisungen nutzen, f√§llt jedoch eine Geb√ºhr an, die vor der Best√§tigung der √úberweisung angezeigt wird. Wenn die √úberweisung also bis zu 2 Tage warten kann, dann ist eine normale SEPA-√úberweisung wahrscheinlich besser geeignet. F√ºr unsere Premiumkunden ist die Echtzeit-√úberweisungen geb√ºhrenfrei.Obwohl diese √úberweisungen in Echtzeit durchgef√ºhrt werden, k√∂nnen sie sich aufgrund von Bearbeitungszeiten, Embargos usw. verz√∂gern (genau wie regul√§re √úberweisungen). Bei wichtigen Zahlungen, wie z. B. Einzahlungen oder Anzahlungen sollte man deshalb am besten im Voraus zahlen, um externe finanzielle Verluste aufgrund von Verz√∂gerungen zu vermeiden.Wie funktioniert das?Logge dich in die N26 App ein und tippe auf Geld senden > Bank√ºberweisung.Gib als n√§chstes den Namen und die IBAN des Empf√§ngers ein sowie ggf. einen Verwendungszweck.Tippe auf √úberweisung und w√§hle zwischen Echtzeit√ºberweisung und Standard√ºberweisung.Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.Best√§tige die √úberweisung in der App.Die Echtzeit√ºberweisung wird innerhalb von ca. 10 Sekunden verarbeitet und beim Empf√§nger eingehen.Bitte beachte: Wenn die Bank des Empf√§ngers nicht am SCT-Echtzeitverfahren teilnimmt, hast du nicht die M√∂glichkeit, eine Echtzeit√ºberweisung durchzuf√ºhren. Wichtige Informationen:**F√ºr die Nutzung von Echtzeit-√úberweisungen wird bei N26 Standard eine Geb√ºhr erhoben. Die Geb√ºhr wird direkt im Anschluss als separate Transaktion verrechnet und die Geb√ºhr f√§llt je nach Land unterschiedlich aus:Deutschland und √ñsterreich ‚Äì 0,49 ‚Ç¨Spanien ‚Äì 1,99 ‚Ç¨Italien, Frankreich und Rest Europas ‚Äì 0,99 ‚Ç¨Der H√∂chstbetrag, den du mit per Echtzeit-√úberweisungen versenden kannst, betr√§gt 2.000 ‚Ç¨ f√ºnfmal pro Tag bei einem Tagesh√∂chstbetrag von 10.000 ‚Ç¨.Wenn du eine Echtzeit-√úberweisungen f√ºr eine wichtige Zahlung (Einzahlung, Bu√ügeld, Anzahlung) verwenden m√∂chtest, solltest du die Zahlung eventuell im Voraus vornehmen, um eine Verz√∂gerung durch eine m√∂gliche Ablehnung oder Sperrung zu vermeiden.Wenn du Waren oder Dienstleistungen per Echtzeit-√úberweisungen bezahlst, achte immer darauf, dass du die Empf√§ngerdaten und -legitimationen √ºberpr√ºfst, bevor du die Transaktion best√§tigst. Es empfiehlt sich immer, vor Betr√ºgereien auf der Hut zu sein.Bitte beachte: Derzeit nehmen nicht alle Banken am Echtzeit-√úberweisungen teil. Wenn die Empf√§ngerbank nicht daran teilnimmt, hast du nicht die M√∂glichkeit, deine √úberweisung in Echtzeit durchzuf√ºhren.

question: How N26 Crypto works
answer:
In Austria, N26 Crypto is powered by Bitpanda GmbH (FN423018k) as digital asset servicing provider, registered with the Austrian Financial Market Authority and located at Stella-Klein-L√∂w-Weg 17, 1020 Vienna, Austria.The following statements do not constitute investment advice or any other advice on financial services, financial instruments, financial products or digital assets. They are intended to provide general information. The following statements do not constitute an offer to conclude a contract for the purchase or sale of financial instruments and financial products or an invitation to submit such an offer and to buy or sell any particular digital asset.Cryptocurrencies are subject to high fluctuations in value. A decline in value or a complete loss are possible at any time. The loss of access to data and passwords can also lead to a complete loss.Manage and monitor both cash and crypto in one place‚Äîfrom your N26 app. No need to download a new app or make a new account to start trading crypto, just scroll down from your bank account to check it out.Try N26 Crypto in your N26 app by following these steps:Tap the Finances tab and scroll to TradingSelect Get started with crypto and browse the coinsIf you‚Äôre ready, hit Buy and sign up in just a minuteTada ‚Äî enjoy being a digital currency owner!Crypto may seem like a tough nut to crack‚Äîbut, as always, we‚Äôve got your back. Whether you‚Äôre wondering about the basics ‚Äî like what is crypto? (new tab) and Is cryptocurrency safe? (new tab) Things to be aware of.
5 Things to Know Before You Start Trading Crypto | N26 (new tab)N26 Crypto Fees¬†Buying crypto doesn‚Äôt need to be costly. You only need ‚Ç¨1 to get started and with N26 Crypto, you‚Äôll pay 1.5% in fees on Bitcoin and 2.5% on other cryptocurrencies.With a Metal account, you get a discount on trading fees ‚Äî pay 1% for Bitcoin and 2% for other coins. Metal plans also come with a Mastercard made of stainless steel, comprehensive travel and tech insurance, and dedicated customer support via phone 7 days a week.The N26 Metal crypto fee discounts only apply to trading amounts up to ‚Ç¨5,000 (including fees on purchasing and excluding fees on selling crypto) per calendar month. Above this amount, regular fees apply: 1.5% on Bitcoin and 2.5% on all other coins.Please note that fees are always rounded up to the nearest full cent‚Äîto a maximum of one cent‚Äîwhich may lead to a slight increase of the fee percentage shown in an order preview).The fees and cryptocurrency prices shown on the N26 app for every transaction and including a possible spread are not determined by N26 but provided by Bitpanda. N26's liability is expressly excluded for any claim or damage arising from the formation of the prices of the assets offered by Bitpanda.N26 Crypto Limitshe following limits apply to trading crypto on N26:A ‚Ç¨50,000 limit on daily transactions by Personal customersA ‚Ç¨100,000 limit on daily transactions by Business customers200 trades within 24 hours, per userUsers can only place buy and sell orders with a minimum of ‚Ç¨1. This applies to all coins.If you have some questions burning a hole in your pocket, view our Crypto page with¬†FAQs.Good to know before getting startedIn order to be able to buy and sell Crypto you have to have a correct, registered and valid Tax ID. In case you don‚Äôt know where to find your Tax ID or how to register it in your app, please visit our Support Page (new tab).

question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 Metal (new tab):If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs ‚Ç¨16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. question: Perch√© il bancomat non ha erogato i contanti?
answer: Pu√≤ succedere: vai ad un ATM, l‚Äôimporto richiesto viene detratto dal tuo saldo, ma la macchina non eroga i contanti.Per prima cosa controlla i¬†limiti della tua carta¬†accedendo al Mio Account e selezionando Impostazioni Carte. Assicurati che i prelievi ATM siano attivi.Anche se non sappiamo dirti con certezza perch√© √® successo, possiamo sicuramente aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. L‚Äôimporto che √® stato detratto dal saldo √® solo un‚Äôautorizzazione (una prenotazione o un importo stornato). Dato che la transazione non √® andata a buon fine, l‚Äôimporto prenotato scadr√† entro poche ore o al massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sar√† riaccreditato al tuo saldo.Se l‚Äôimporto prenotato non scadesse dopo 12 giorni lavorativi, per favore completa il¬†modulo di contestazione. Faremo del nostro meglio per recuperare i tuoi soldi.Nel frattempo ti consigliamo di provare un altro ATM di un altro operatore. Raramente accade due volte di seguito.Non sono riuscito a ritirare dal bancomat il denaro richiesto. Come posso fare?Anche in questo caso possiamo aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. L‚Äôimporto che hai richiesto al momento del prelievo adesso comparir√† sotto forma di autorizzazione sul tuo conto. Visto che, anche in questa circostanza, la transazione non √® andata a buon fine, l‚Äôimporto prenotato scadr√† entro massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sar√† riaccreditato sul tuo conto.Nel caso in cui l‚Äôautorizzazione non scadesse e la trovassi addebitata nel tuo estratto conto, per favore compila il modulo di contestazione (nuova tabella). Ti ricordiamo infine che il limite massimo di prelievo giornaliero √® di 1000‚Ç¨ e il limite di prelievo settimanale √® di 2500‚Ç¨.

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand¬†N26 Insurance¬†allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù banner you find.¬†You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.¬†How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.¬†Am I eligible?¬†N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can‚Äôt sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: Pagos por adelantado de las cuentas premium N26
answer: El contrato de tu suscripci√≥n es v√°lido por un a√±o, despu√©s se renovar√° autom√°ticamente de forma indefinida hasta que lo canceles; esto se puede hacer en cualquier momento (ver m√°s abajo). Te avisaremos 2 meses antes de la fecha de renovaci√≥n indefinida de tu contrato.¬øCu√°les son las opciones de pago?Puedes elegir si quieres pagar tu suscripci√≥n mes a mes, cada 6 meses o todo el a√±o de golpe (con las √∫ltimas dos opciones recibes un descuento). La opci√≥n que elijas no afecta a la duraci√≥n del contrato, que ser√° siempre de un a√±o.Por ejemplo: si eliges pagar cada 6 meses, har√°s el primer pago al inicio del contrato y, 6 meses despu√©s, har√°s el segundo pago por los 6 meses restantes del contrato de 12 meses.¬øCu√°ndo y c√≥mo se paga?Tu suscripci√≥n se activar√° en cuanto realices el primer pago y obtendr√°s acceso a todas las ventajas premium. Puedes hacer el primer pago con tarjeta de d√©bito o de cr√©dito, con Google Pay o con Apple Pay; lo que te dar√° acceso inmediato a las ventajas premium en cuanto completes la verificaci√≥n de tu identidad. Tambi√©n puedes pagar a√±adiendo dinero a tu cuenta de N26, y el importe se cobrar√° autom√°ticamente.Si no hemos recibido el primer pago dentro de 15 d√≠as desde que completas la verificaci√≥n de tu identidad, el importe se cobrar√° autom√°ticamente de tu cuenta N26 y obtendr√°s acceso a las ventajas premium. Despu√©s del primer pago, todos los dem√°s siempre se cobrar√°n autom√°ticamente de tu cuenta N26, dependiendo de la opci√≥n que hayas elegido.¬øC√≥mo se cancela la suscripci√≥n?Suspensi√≥n de la renovaci√≥n autom√°tica: puedes detener la renovaci√≥n autom√°tica de tu suscripci√≥n en cualquier momento antes de que finalice el primer contrato de 12 meses poni√©ndote en contacto con nosotros a trav√©s del chat. Si decides detener tu renovaci√≥n, podr√°s seguir usando tu Mastercard N26 y todas las ventajas de tu suscripci√≥n premium hasta que esta caduque. Eso significa que mantendr√°s la cobertura de tu seguro (para cuentas N26 You y N26 Metal) mientras pagues la cuota de tu suscripci√≥n.Cancelaci√≥n inmediata: puedes cancelar tu suscripci√≥n de inmediato en cualquier momento poni√©ndote en contacto con nosotros. Si eliges esta opci√≥n, tu tarjeta N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal se desactivar√° y emitiremos una tarjeta virtual cuando pases a N26 Est√°ndar. Si eliges esta opci√≥n y eres cliente de N26 You o N26 Metal, la cobertura de tu seguro tambi√©n se suspender√° de forma inmediata.Revocaci√≥n: puedes revocar tu suscripci√≥n dentro de un per√≠odo de 14 d√≠as desde el momento en el que se te cobra la primera cuota mensual. Desactivaremos tu Mastercard N26 y emitiremos una tarjeta virtual para usar con tu cuenta N26 Est√°ndar.¬øPuedo recibir un reembolso?Si cancelas tu suscripci√≥n dentro del periodo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as (contactando con Atenci√≥n al Cliente a trav√©s de tu app N26), te reembolsaremos el pago inicial. Si cancelas tu suscripci√≥n pasado el periodo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as, te reembolsaremos los meses restantes que hayas pagado por adelantado.Sin embargo, ten en cuenta que si has pagado un precio reducido (por elegir el pago anual o cada 6 meses), te reembolsaremos los meses restantes, pero cobrando el precio completo por los meses que ya hayas disfrutado. Es decir, que solo recibes el descuento si completas el a√±o entero del contrato.
