question: P√∫blicos personalizados
answer: Tratamiento de datos en el marco de Custom Audiences de FacebookCustom Audiences nos permite crear audiencias personalizadas y parecidas. Las audiencias personalizadas se componen de clientes de N26 y usuarios de Internet para mostrarles contenido personalizado, o solo de usuarios de Internet para excluirte, como cliente existente de N26, de algunos de nuestros anuncios. No queremos mostrarte anuncios que sean irrelevantes, dado que ya eres cliente de N26. Las audiencias parecidas nos permiten definir un grupo objetivo relevante para el cual los anuncios mostrados tengan un mayor inter√©s que para otros usuarios de Facebook. Estas denominadas "audiencias parecidas" son m√°s similares a nuestros clientes que el usuario promedio de Facebook.Para beneficiarte de las ventajas descritas con anterioridad, le proporcionamos a Facebook una versi√≥n con hash de tu direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico de N26. El llamado "hashing" es una forma de seudonimizaci√≥n que codifica tu direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico para que no se te pueda identificar con esta direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico con hash. Posteriormente, Facebook compara esta direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico con tu posible direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico de Facebook. Despu√©s de realizar la comparaci√≥n, independientemente de si es positiva o no, Facebook elimina cualquier direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico con hash en un plazo de 6 a 8 horas. Facebook no comparte estos datos con terceros u otros anunciantes ni otorga acceso a los mismos. Puedes encontrar esta y otra informaci√≥n en los t√©rminos de Custom Audiences de Facebook (pesta√±a nueva).Facebook Ireland Limited transfiere datos a Facebook Inc., EE. UU. EE. UU. es un pa√≠s que, seg√∫n los t√©rminos del Reglamento de la UE 2016/679 ("RGPD"), no proporciona un nivel adecuado de protecci√≥n de los datos personales; esto implica, entre otras cosas, que las agencias gubernamentales de los EE. UU. pueden tener derecho a acceder a tus datos sin que existan recursos efectivos disponibles.Puedes revocar tu consentimiento a este tratamiento de datos, de acuerdo con el Art. 6 apartado 1 letra a del RGPD, en la aplicaci√≥n web y la aplicaci√≥n de N26 en cualquier momento . Tratamiento de datos en el marco de Customer Match de GoogleCustomer Match nos permite crear audiencias personalizadas y parecidas. Las audiencias personalizadas se componen de clientes de N26 y usuarios de Internet para mostrarles contenido personalizado, o solo de usuarios de Internet para excluirte, como cliente existente de N26, de algunos de nuestros anuncios en la Red de b√∫squeda de Google, la pesta√±a Compras, Gmail, YouTube y la Red de Display de Google. No queremos mostrarte anuncios que sean irrelevantes. Las audiencias parecidas nos permiten definir un grupo objetivo relevante para el cual los anuncios mostrados tengan un mayor inter√©s que para otros usuarios de Google. Estas denominadas "audiencias parecidas" son m√°s similares a nuestros clientes que el usuario promedio de Google.Para beneficiarte de las ventajas descritas con anterioridad, le proporcionamos a Google una versi√≥n con hash de tu direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico de N26. El llamado "hashing" es una forma de seudonimizaci√≥n que codifica tu direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico para que no se te pueda identificar con esta direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico con hash. Luego, Google compara esta direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico con tu posible direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico de la cuenta de Google. Si esta direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico no coincide, Google a√∫n puede utilizarla como parte de una verificaci√≥n de cumplimiento de pol√≠ticas, pero Google no la utilizar√° de ninguna otra manera para Customer Match ni ning√∫n otro producto de Google. Google no retiene los datos durante m√°s de 48 horas para crear las audiencias de Customer Match y, a continuaci√≥n, los elimina de inmediato. Google no comparte estos datos con terceros u otros anunciantes ni otorga acceso a los mismos. Puedes encontrar esta y otra informaci√≥n en el art√≠culo de ayuda C√≥mo utiliza Google los datos de Customer Match (pesta√±a nueva).Google Ireland Limited transfiere datos a Google LLC, EE. UU. EE. UU. es un pa√≠s que, seg√∫n los t√©rminos del Reglamento de la UE 2016/679 ("RGPD"), no proporciona un nivel adecuado de protecci√≥n de los datos personales; esto implica, entre otras cosas, que las agencias gubernamentales de los EE. UU. pueden tener derecho a acceder a tus datos sin que existan recursos efectivos disponibles.Puedes revocar tu consentimiento a este tratamiento de datos, de acuerdo con el Art. 6 apartado 1 letra a del RGPD, en la aplicaci√≥n web y la aplicaci√≥n de N26 en cualquier momento.

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Insights¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: Comment fonctionne 3D Secure ?
answer: 3D Secure est une technologie de s√©curisation des paiements en ligne visant √† limiter l‚Äôutilisation frauduleuse des cartes bancaires sur internet. Tous les e-commer√ßants qui utilisent cette technologie affichent le logo ¬´ Mastercard SecureCode ¬ª sur leurs sites.Lorsque vous faites un paiement en ligne, depuis votre t√©l√©phone, une tablette ou un ordinateur, vous avez 5 minutes pour confirmer la transaction en cliquant sur la¬†notification¬†que vous recevez sur votre t√©l√©phone.Attention : la notification push ne sera envoy√©e qu'au smartphone synchronis√© au compte.Si vous ne confirmez pas imm√©diatement cette transaction, vous pouvez √©galement la retrouver dans la liste de vos transactions. Elle appara√Ætra en attente sur votre application. Une petit cloche vous indique que vous devez la confirmer. Vous pourrez alors appuyer sur cette transaction et la valider.Si vous ne voyez pas cette transaction dans votre liste, vous pouvez consulter l‚Äôarticle relatif aux raisons pour lesquelles¬†un paiement en ligne peut √©chouer.

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: Information about the flex p-account
answer: A flex p-account allowance is based on incoming funds from certain entities, usually public institutions and/or your employer. Consequently, your monthly allowance is liable to change every calendar month.Whenever your salary is above the basic monthly allowance of 1.340‚Ç¨, your salary amount becomes the new allowance for the remainder of the month. Whenever the salary is below the amount of the basic allowance (1.340‚Ç¨) then your allowance remains as it is, and does not decrease.Until you receive your salary, your P-account allowance will be the basic one. All adjustments are made within 1-2 working days after you've received your salary.

question: ¬øN26 admite transferencias SWIFT?
answer: S√≠, pero de momento solo transferencias SWIFT entrantes.Todav√≠a no pueden realizarse transferencias SWIFT salientes. Sigue las redes sociales de #N26 y nuestro Blog (pesta√±a nueva) para estar entre los primeros en saberlo cuando esto cambie.Te explicamos c√≥mo hacer transferencias en divisas extranjeras con N26.Descubre cu√°nto tiempo tarda una transferencia SWIFT entrante.¬øCu√°nto cuesta una transferencia SWIFT?A las transferencias entrantes de m√°s de 150¬†‚Ç¨ se les aplicar√° una comisi√≥n de 12,50¬†‚Ç¨ m√°s el 0,1 % del importe recibido.A las transferencias entrantes de menos de 150¬†‚Ç¨ no se les aplican comisiones.La comisi√≥n m√°xima es de 100¬†‚Ç¨ por transacci√≥n.¬øA qui√©n se le aplica esta comisi√≥n?Si contrataste la cuenta antes del 07/07/2021 y tienes un IBAN alem√°n, la comisi√≥n se te aplicar√° si tienes una cuenta N26 Business Est√°ndar, Business Smart o Business You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a las cuentas N26 Metal ni N26 Business Metal.)

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: ¬øDebo declarar mi cuenta de N26 en Espa√±a?
answer: A la hora de hacer la declaraci√≥n de la renta en Espa√±a (pesta√±a nueva), la Agencia Tributaria ofrece mecanismos para que puedan declarar sus bienes en el extranjero aquellas personas que est√©n legalmente obligadas a hacerlo.En el caso de tu cuenta de N26, depende del tipo de IBAN que tengas:Si tu cuenta de N26 tiene un IBAN espa√±ol (que empieza por ES), tu cuenta bancaria est√° en Espa√±a a todos los efectos y no es necesario declararla.Si tu cuenta de N26 tiene un IBAN alem√°n (es decir, empieza por DE), entonces el dep√≥sito de tu dinero est√° en Alemania y, por lo tanto, estar√≠as sujeto a esta obligaci√≥n tributaria siempre y cuando tu caso concreto est√© dentro de los requisitos establecidos legalmente.Para saber si tu situaci√≥n corresponde a uno de estos requisitos, te recomendamos que recurras a un profesional en la materia para recibir el debido asesoramiento, ya que nosotros no estamos habilitados para ejercer como consejeros tributarios.Puedes consultar m√°s informaci√≥n al respecto en el sitio web oficial de la Agencia Tributaria (pesta√±a nueva).

question: Perch√© ho un addebito doppio?
answer: Nel momento in cui effettui pagamenti con carta avvengono due principali tipologie di transazioni:La preautorizzazione, che √® una transazione che prevede il blocco di un certo importo da parte di un venditore di prodotti o servizi per verificare la validit√† della carta o la presenza di fondi sul conto dei clienti. Le pre-autorizzazioni sono molto frequenti per confermare prenotazioni alberghiere oppure il noleggio di auto.L'addebito, che √® la transazione con la quale l'importo viene effettivamente detratto dal conto.Nel momento in cui viene effettuata una preautorizzazione, questa pu√≤ diventare un addebito sul conto, pu√≤ essere respinta oppure scadere. Nell'ultimo caso, l'importo ritorna automaticamente sul tuo conto entro i successivi 12 giorni. Gli importi preautorizzati nel caso di noleggio auto possono richiedere fino a 30 giorni prima di essere nuovamente disponibili sul conto.Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:Talvolta sul conto appaiono sia l'autorizzazione che l'addebito. Questo accade, ad esempio, nel caso di pagamento offline, quindi non in tempo reale, oppure a causa di problemi tecnici al terminale di pagamento. Anche in questi casi, l'autorizzazione scadr√† nei tempi indicati. Nel caso non dovesse succedere, contattaci via chat e ti aiuteremo a recuperare l'importo (nuova tabella).L'importo della preautorizzazione pu√≤ essere diverso da quello dell'addebito finale del conto per diversi motivi (nuova tabella).

question: N26 Cashless - Competition for Italian customers
answer:
What is it?N26 Cashless is a new promotion designed for N26 customers residing in Italy whose purpose is to encourage the use of the N26 debit card for digital payments.The competition will be active from March 1st to June 30th, 2021.Who can participate?
Registration for N26 Cashless is open and automatic for all N26 customers residing in Italy (except N26 Business customers) and who have given their consent to marketing communications.In order to participate in the promotion and prize draw, customers must:Have an open and active N26 accountNot have incurred in foreclosures, seizures or other limitations of the current accountThe mentioned conditions are valid for the entire duration of the competition and failure to comply may lead to exclusion from the final prize draw.How does it work?
N26 customers enrolled in the program will reach the threshold to participate in the final prize draws by making transactions with their Mastercard associated with the N26 account via POS (either contactless, or with chip and pin) or with Apple Pay and Google Pay.Online payments and ATM withdrawals are excluded from the transaction count.What are the prizes?Based on the number of transactions carried out during the period of validity of the competition (1st March - 30th June 2021), participants will be able to access the draws for 3 prizes:At least 20 transactions > 20‚Ç¨ Amazon gift card At least 50 transactions > 50‚Ç¨ Amazon gift card At least 90 transactions > 90‚Ç¨ Amazon gift card If participants make a number of transactions that correspond to different thresholds, they participate in the drawing of prizes for both thresholds reached.(For example, if you carry out 60 payments during the duration of the competition, you participate in the draw for both 20‚Ç¨ and 50‚Ç¨ Amazon voucher.)The prize draw will take place by August 31, 2021.In the event of a win, customers will receive an official communication within their "Messages" inbox of ‚Äã‚Äãthe N26 App.Prize competition valid from 01/03/2021 to 30/06/2021. Prize money 4,160 ‚Ç¨ F.C. VAT. To consult the complete rules, visit www.n26.com (new tab). Amazon.co.uk Gift Card is not a sponsor of this promotion. Restrictions applied. More details on amazon.it/gc-legal (new tab).

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?¬†N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Warum pr√ºft N26 Transaktionen?
answer:
Wir haben die Aufgabe, Routinepr√ºfungen von Transaktionen durchzuf√ºhren, um die Sicherheit deines Kontos zu gew√§hrleisten (siehe¬†GwG ¬ß 10 (neuen Tab)). Diese √úberpr√ºfungen betreffen einzelne Transaktionen und werden automatisch von unseren Systemen initiiert.Aus diesem Grund kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen. Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erh√§ltst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen f√ºr solche √úberpr√ºfungen, und sie k√∂nnen auch nicht umgangen werden.¬†Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken √ºblich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gew√§hrleisten.Der genaue Pr√ºfvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:In der E-Mail, die du von uns erh√§ltst, werden wir dir genau erkl√§ren, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir ben√∂tigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Bitte gib uns auch eine genaue Beschreibung √ºber den Inhalt des Dokuments.Du kannst einen Beleg, eine Rechnung, einen Vertrag oder ein √§hnliches Dokument einreichen, das es uns erm√∂glicht, die jeweilige Transaktion und deren Herkunft und Zweck eindeutig zu identifizieren. .Sei pr√§zise in deinen Antworten, Details und Dokumenten. Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie f√ºr die √úberpr√ºfung ausreichend sind. In einigen F√§llen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu Verz√∂gerungen f√ºhren kann.Antworte so fr√ºh wie m√∂glich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit.¬†Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.Du musst die je nach deiner Situation g√ºltigen Dokumente vorlegen. 
Einige Beispiele:Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschlie√üen oder hast Grundst√ºcke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein Gew√§hrungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument √ºber die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer ver√§u√üerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder Kontoausz√ºge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).Du hast eine Immobilie ver√§u√üert oder deine Aktien an der B√∂rse verkauft.Den Vertrag √ºber die vereinbarten Gesch√§fte oder notarielle Beurkundung des Eigentums√ºbergangs.Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.Kontoausz√ºge √ºber die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines Arbeitsverh√§ltnisses belegen, mit einer Zahlungsbegr√ºndung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines fr√ºheren Arbeitgebers.

question: Que faire si j‚Äôai l‚Äôimpression que mon compte a √©t√© pirat√© ?
answer: Si vous pensez que votre compte a √©t√© pirat√©, modifiez d‚Äôabord le mot de passe, puis, en fonction de la situation, prenez les mesures suivantes :Que faire en cas de transactions suspectes sur mon compte ?Si vous remarquez une transaction suspecte, r√©f√©rez-vous √† notre article Comment contester une transaction ?Puis, contactez l‚Äô√©quipe du Service Client, soit directement via l‚Äôapplication N26, soit par email √† support@n26.com (nouvel onglet).Notre Livechat est disponible depuis votre application et votre espace en ligne, ou encore √† la fin de certains articles de notre Support Center, comme celui-ci. Pour d√©marrer une conversation, cliquez sur le bouton D√©marrer un chat. Si vous pr√©f√©rez avoir une conversation t√©l√©phonique, vous pouvez le demander par chat. Nous organiserons un appel dans l‚Äôheure qui suit pour discuter de la situation avec vous. Une fois en relation avec un de nos agents, expliquez la situation en d√©tails. Toute information sera importante pour nos services. Soyez assur√© que nous prendrons toutes les mesures n√©cessaires pour vous aider.En plus de nos obligations l√©gales en mati√®re de pr√©vention contre la fraude, et afin d'am√©liorer sans cesse nos mesures de s√©curit√©, nous avons d√©di√© une √©quipe qui analyse chaque cas de fraude.Les cas de fraudes sont souvent compliqu√©s et doivent √™tre √©tudi√©s dans les d√©tails. Cela peut prendre quelques jours, ou m√™me quelques semaines pour les cas les plus compliqu√©s.Enfin, si vous avez des preuves ou des raisons s√©rieuses de penser que votre compte a pu √™tre pirat√©, nous vous conseillons de d√©poser plainte aupr√®s des autorit√©s comp√©tentes.Que faire si je perds ma carte, ou si je pense que les donn√©es de celle-ci ont √©t√© pirat√©es ?Si votre carte N26 a √©t√© perdue ou vol√©e et que vous craignez que ses donn√©es n‚Äôaient √©t√© pirat√©es, vous devriez la bloquer imm√©diatement depuis votre application N26 afin que votre compte ne soit pas d√©bit√©. Vous pourrez ensuite commander une nouvelle carte.Que faire si je n‚Äôai plus l‚Äôappareil associ√© √† mon compte en ma possession ? Quelqu‚Äôun peut-il y acc√©der ?Si l‚Äôappareil associ√© √† votre compte est perdu ou vol√©, pas d‚Äôinqui√©tude : votre application N26 ne peut √™tre ouverte qu‚Äôen utilisant le bon mot de passe, votre empreinte ou la reconnaissance faciale. Notre √©quipe du Service Client saura vous assister si vous souhaitez associer un nouvel appareil √† votre compte N26.Et si j‚Äôai des id√©es pour am√©liorer la s√©curit√© chez N26 ?Pour en savoir plus sur la fa√ßon dont nous prot√©geons votre compte, visitez notre page sur la s√©curit√© chez N26 (nouvel onglet).Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 √† 23:00 h.Si vous n‚Äôavez pas acc√®s √† votre application mobile N26, ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter √† votre espace client en ligne, vous pouvez √©galement demander √† bloquer votre carte bancaire ou les transactions sortantes de votre compte en nous appelant au +33 1 88 45 02 39.

question: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
answer: Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9) in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards: 45‚Ç¨Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: ¬øC√≥mo iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta con la autenticaci√≥n de dos factores?
answer: ¬†Los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n es un proceso de autenticaci√≥n basado en el uso de dos o m√°s elementos de seguridad. Esto asegurar√° que solo t√∫ puedes entrar en tu cuenta.Cuando inicies sesi√≥n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n ya est√°n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.¬øCu√°les son los requisitos?¬†¬†Necesitas actualizar el sistema operativo de tu tel√©fono y la app de N26 a la √∫ltima versi√≥n.¬†Si no puedes iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta, pero a√∫n tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contrase√±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, cont√°ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.¬†¬øQu√© pasa si no recuerdo mi contrase√±a?Lee en este art√≠culo como restablecer tu contrase√±a.¬øQu√© pasa si he perdido o me han robado el m√≥vil?Si has perdido el acceso a tu dispositivo vinculado pero tienes acceso a tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono registrado, inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 y solicita un c√≥digo de vinculaci√≥n. Disponible dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Italie, Lettonie, Lituanie, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Su√®de et Suisse.Google Pay est une m√©thode de paiement qui vous permet de payer facilement vos achats depuis votre smartphone, sans avoir besoin de votre portefeuille ni de votre Mastercard.Google Pay est disponible chez tous les marchands qui proposent les paiements sans contact (NFC), y compris sur les sites de vente en ligne. Connectez-vous √† votre application mobile N26 et acc√©dez √† Cartes > Param√®tres de la carte > Ajouter √† Google Pay. Vous serez ensuite redirig√© vers l'application Google Pay.
Si vous ne parvenez pas √† installer Google Pay :Afin d‚Äôajouter votre Mastercard N26 √† votre Google Wallet, votre t√©l√©phone doit √™tre √©quip√© d‚ÄôAndroid 5.0 (Lollipop) ou d‚Äôune version plus r√©cente et compatible avec la technologie sans contact (NFC). Une fois l‚Äôapplication Google Pay install√©e, il vous faudra cliquer sur Ajouter une carte.Il est indispensable d‚Äôavoir un code de verrouillage sur l‚Äô√©cran de votre t√©l√©phone lorsque vous utilisez Google Pay. Si vous n‚Äôen avez pas, il vous sera demand√© d‚Äôen configurer un avant d‚Äôajouter votre Mastercard √† votre Google Wallet.Si votre t√©l√©phone est prot√©g√© par une coque, il est possible que vous deviez la retirer pour pouvoir payer. Certains terminaux de paiement ne reconnaissent pas le t√©l√©phone si la coque est trop √©paisse.Si le terminal de paiement vous demande de pr√©senter √† nouveau votre carte, il se peut que vous ayez retir√© votre t√©l√©phone trop rapidement o√π que celui-ci n‚Äôait pas √©t√© plac√© suffisamment proche du terminal de paiement.Utilisez votre carte avec Google Pay avant m√™me de la recevoirN26 vous permet d‚Äôutiliser votre nouvelle carte avant m√™me de la recevoir en l‚Äôajoutant √† votre compte Google Pay.Cette fonctionnalit√© est disponible si vous venez de recommander une carte (suite √† l'ouverture de votre compte ou √† un changement de type de compte). Cette fonctionnalit√© est utilisable pendant 30 jours √† partir de la date de la commande de votre carte. Si vous n‚Äôactivez pas votre nouvelle carte physique dans ce d√©lai, vous ne pourrez temporairement plus utiliser les paiements mobiles.D√®s que vous aurez re√ßu votre carte, activez-la depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne en suivant les √©tapes indiqu√©es.Veuillez noter que cette fonctionnalit√© ne vous permet pas de retirer des esp√®ces en DAB ni d‚Äôutiliser CASH26 (si disponible dans votre pays).

question: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†
You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†
What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you‚Äôre able to see what‚Äôs going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you‚Äôve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.¬†Sometimes you‚Äôll see both payments at the same time‚Äìthe authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn‚Äôt expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).¬†Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll¬†need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery¬†of your card.¬†Please note that this is not a fee: your¬†first card¬†after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries¬†take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

haz clic en ¬´Confirmar compra¬ª: a partir de ese momento estar√°s disfrutando de la prueba. question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?¬†N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

Du kannst dar√ºber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit geb√ºhrenfrei Bargeld in jeder W√§hrung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z.
