question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select ‚ÄúSend Money‚Äù then choose ‚ÄúBank Transfer‚Äù. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card: 30‚Ç¨Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card 65‚Ç¨

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: ‚Ç¨5,000Monthly limit: ‚Ç¨20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of ‚Ç¨1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of ‚Ç¨400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of ‚Ç¨2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of ‚Ç¨1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: ‚Ç¨1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit¬†Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.¬†Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?¬†Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you‚Äôre asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.¬†If you have a feeling that something is off, don‚Äôt ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don‚Äôt click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender‚Äôs identity.If you‚Äôve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you‚Äôd like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

question: O√π est mon remboursement par carte ?
answer:
Dans la majorit√© des cas, votre remboursement sera visible sur l‚Äôapplication N26 le jour m√™me de la transaction initiale, et non le jour du remboursement. Faites d√©filer vers le bas votre liste de transactions ou bien t√©l√©chargez vos relev√©s bancaires pr√©c√©dents pour le trouver.Vous pouvez consulter et t√©l√©charger vos relev√©s de compte sur l'application mobile : depuis l'√©cran d'accueil, cliquez sur les 3 traits en haut √† droite et s√©lectionnez Relev√©s.Vous pouvez trouver vos relev√©s sur votre espace personnel en ligne (app.n26.com). Sur la page¬†Transactions, cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne nuage √† c√¥t√© du symbole ‚Äú+‚Äù. Vous verrez ensuite la section¬†Relev√©s de compte.Pour la location d‚Äôune voiture, le montant bloqu√© en d√©p√¥t de garantie peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 30 jours √† revenir sur votre compte.
En ce qui concerne le remboursement d‚Äôun paiement par carte, ce d√©lai est de 14 jours maximum.

question: How can I credit my salary on my N26 account?
answer: Having your salary credited to your N26 account is easy, simply provide your N26 IBAN to your employer, who‚Äôll transfer the amount to your account via SEPA transfer.SEPA transfers are the official payment method of the SEPA area, which includes most of the European countries. In case your employer refuses to credit your salary through SEPA transfer because you have a German IBAN and not an Italian one, please check the "What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted" article on our Support Center.

question: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†
You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†
What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

question: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
answer: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.¬†This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

question: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift sperren?
answer: Bevor du uns das Formular f√ºr die Sperrung des Lastschrifteinzugs schickst, beachte bitte Folgendes:Gl√§ubiger-ID und Mandatsreferenz: Du musst sowohl die Gl√§ubiger-ID als auch die Mandatsreferenz angeben. Diese Angaben kannst du in den Transaktionsdetails der letzten Lastschrift in der App einsehen oder indem du den H√§ndler kontaktierst (bitte beachte, dass IBAN und H√§ndlername nicht ausreichen).Anh√§nge kleiner als 25 MB: Wenn du √ºber das erforderliche Formular antwortest, achte bitte darauf, dass deine Anh√§nge insgesamt nicht gr√∂√üer als 25 MB sind.Dokumentenunterschrift: Falls m√∂glich, w√§re es am besten, wenn du das von dir an uns gesendete Formular handschriftlich unterschreibst. Wir akzeptieren allerdings auch:Elektronische Unterschrift: Diese muss mit dem Dokument √ºbereinstimmen, das du zur Er√∂ffnung deines N26 Kontos verwendet hast.Digitale Unterschrift: Wenn du das Dokument mit einer digitalen Unterschrift versehen hast, die von uns verifiziert werden kann, dann wird die Unterschrift als g√ºltig angesehen. Digitale Unterschriften k√∂nnen √ºber Anbieter wie "DocuSign" erstellt werden.Zu guter Letzt ist zu beachten, dass das Stornieren einer Lastschrift nur die Zahlung, nicht aber den Vertrag mit dem H√§ndler beendet.Bitte befolge die unten beschriebenen Schritte, f√ºlle das Formular aus und nimm √ºber den Live-Chat oder telefonisch Kontakt mit unserem Kundenservice-Team auf:Bitte lade dieses Formular (neuen Tab) herunter und f√ºlle es aus.F√ºlle das Formular aus und trage ein, was du sperren m√∂chtest, z. B. Gl√§ubiger-ID, Mandatsreferenz oder vollst√§ndige Sperre. Bitte achte darauf, dass du einige dieser Informationen bereits in fr√ºheren Lastschriften desselben H√§ndlers innerhalb deiner Transaktionsliste einsehen kannst.Stelle sicher, dass eine Unterschrift dabei ist (handschriftlich, elektronisch oder digital).Anschlie√üend musst du per Live-Chat (zur nahtlosen Verifizierung) oder telefonisch Kontakt mit unserem Kundenservice-Team aufnehmen. Dort helfen unsere Spezialisten dir dabei, den Vorgang abzuschlie√üen. Du kannst den Vorgang beschleunigen, indem du das Formular schon vorab ausf√ºllst!

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: Warum wurde mir eine Gl√ºcksspielgeb√ºhr berechnet?
answer: Die Gl√ºcksspiel-Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3% gilt f√ºr alle Privatkunden, die sich zur Kontoer√∂ffnung nach dem 12. M√§rz 2020 angemeldet haben oder ein Business-Konto (unabh√§ngig vom Datum der Kontoer√∂ffnung) besitzen.F√ºr Kunden, die ein solches Konto besitzen, wird die Gl√ºcksspiel-Geb√ºhr im Zusammenhang mit folgenden Gl√ºcksspielanbietern f√§llig:LotterienSportwettenOnline-CasinosPferderennenSonstiges Gl√ºcksspielBitte beachte, dass dies sowohl f√ºr eingehende als auch ausgehende Transaktionen mit deiner Mastercard gilt. Die Gl√ºcksspiel-Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3 % wird nach der Abwicklung der entsprechenden Transaktion abgebucht. Wenn du zum Beispiel gewinnst oder deine verbleibenden Chips wieder in Geld umwandelst, √ºberweist der H√§ndler den entsprechenden Betrag in einer anderen Transaktion, bei der die Gl√ºcksspiel-Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3% erneut abgebucht wird.Gut zu wissen:Die Gl√ºcksspiel-Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3 % erscheint auf deiner Transaktionsliste und deinem Kontoauszug und bezieht sich jeweils auf die urspr√ºngliche Transaktion sowie jede nachfolgende Transaktion des Gl√ºcksspielanbieters.Die von uns erhobene Geb√ºhr bezieht sich auf Transaktionen mit deiner Mastercard, die du bei bestimmten relevanten H√§ndlern get√§tigt hast (unabh√§ngig vom Land, in dem du deinen Tippschein abgegeben hast) und kann nicht zur√ºckerstattet werden.¬†F√ºr einige unserer Kunden wird die Gl√ºcksspiel-Geb√ºhr unter Zugrundelegung des Urteils vom BGH XI ZR 26/20 nicht mehr erhoben.

question: Alcune cose da sapere sull‚ÄôIBAN italiano
answer:
IMPORTANTE - Tutti i clienti che aprono un conto N26 a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 riceveranno automaticamente un IBAN italiano. I clienti che hanno aperto il conto prima di questa data e sono in possesso di un IBAN tedesco verranno contattati una volta che il servizio sar√† disponibile.¬†
Perch√© non √® stato offerto un IBAN italiano fin dall‚Äôinizio?Secondo la normativa UE, tutti gli Stati membri devono garantire che i titolari di conti bancari non subiscano discriminazioni per ragioni di natura geografica. Questo significa che i gestori delle utenze, oppure i datori di lavoro sono tenuti ad accettare codici IBAN di conti aperti presso banche con sede in qualunque paese membro dell‚ÄôUE. Tuttavia, abbiamo ascoltato i nostri clienti e sappiamo che questo non sempre accade. Per questo motivo abbiamo deciso di offrire ai nostri clienti italiani un IBAN locale.Posso ricevere l'accredito del mio stipendio?Certo! Puoi ricevere accrediti in Euro sul tuo conto N26 fornendo l'IBAN al tuo datore di lavoro.Posso ricevere l'accredito della mia pensione o del mio sussidio?Al momento non √® possibile accreditare la pensione sul conto N26 per i clienti con IBAN italiano. Aggiorneremo tutti i nostri clienti e forniremo loro tutti i dettagli in merito non appena il servizio sar√° disponibile. Nel caso dovessi riscontrare dei ritardi nel pagamento, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat.Posso ricevere addebiti diretti?Certo! Baster√† fornire l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al beneficiario.Posso impostare ordini permanenti?Certo! Puoi creare ordini permanenti tramite l'app di N26, nella sezione Bonifico bancario.Nell‚Äôeffettuare un bonifico verso il mio conto N26, la banca ricevente non riconosce i dettagli bancari. Perch√©?Molto probabilmente la banca emittente non ha ancora integrato il nostro BIC italiano nel suo sistema. Contatta la banca in questione in modo che possa aggiornare i dati in suo possesso ed elaborare il tuo bonifico.Posso depositare contanti sul mio conto N26 con IBAN italiano?I nostri clienti residenti in Italia possono usare CASH26 per prelevare e depositare contanti tramite i negozi convenzionati. Ci saranno variazioni relativi ai costi del conto?Avere un IBAN italiano non comporter√† particolari variazioni dei costi associati al conto. Puoi controllare i nostri fogli informativi qui. (nuova tabella) √â vero che se apro un conto adesso, non pago il bollo?L' imposta di bollo sull‚Äôestratto conto √® dovuta in caso di giacenza media superiore a 5000 ‚Ç¨ (su base annua e salvo successive modifiche di legge) in misura pari a 34,20‚Ç¨. L‚Äô imposta √® a carico di N26 fino al 30/06/2022. Salvo estensione della promozione, sar√† a carico del cliente dopo il 30/06/2022. In tal caso l'imposta verr√† addebitata sul conto del cliente tramite addebito diretto (il cliente non dovr√† fornire ulteriori documenti in merito).Per maggiori informazioni, leggi l'articolo (nuova tabella) sul nostro blog.

question: Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 si je r√©side hors de la zone euro ?
answer: Si vous r√©sidez en Pologne, Su√®de, Suisse, Danemark, Norv√®ge, Liechtenstein et en Islande, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte bancaire avec N26. Voici un aper√ßu de ce que nous offrons :¬†Le choix entre un compte personnel ou un compte N26 Business.Un compte en ‚Ç¨, un IBAN allemand et les virements SEPA ou Moneybeam.Un taux de change avantageux et une carte de d√©bit Mastercard.La livraison standard gratuite de votre Mastercard ou la livraison express √† 25 ‚Ç¨.Des virements bancaires en devises √©trang√®res avec notre partenaire Wise (uniquement avec le compte personnel).0,1% de cashback sur tous vos paiements par carte (uniquement avec le compte N26 Business).5 retraits gratuits en euros dans l‚ÄôUnion europ√©enne (des frais de 1,7 % du montant retir√© pour les retraits en devises autres que l‚Äôeuro s‚Äôappliquent).2 sous-comptes en plus de votre compte principal, avec Espaces.Une prime de parrainage √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun des amis que vous avez invit√© ouvre un compte N26.Les paiements sans contact et mobiles gr√¢ce √† Google Pay et Apple pay.Quelques conseils concernant vos virements entrants et sortants :¬†Nous vous recommandons de s√©lectionner votre devise locale au moment d‚Äôeffectuer vos paiements ou retraits avec votre carte Mastercard pour b√©n√©ficier du meilleur taux de change (dans le cas contraire des frais suppl√©mentaires pourraient vous √™tre factur√©s).Pour alimenter votre compte N26 en euros en utilisant votre devise locale, nous recommandons de convertir votre devise locale en utilisant notre partenaire Wise depuis leur site web ou de faire un virement SEPA vers votre compte N26 depuis votre banque locale.Pour effectuer des virements sortants vers un compte en ‚Ç¨, vous pouvez simplement utiliser la fonctionnalit√© Virement de votre application N26. Pour vos virements sortants vers un compte en devise √©trang√®re, utilisez la fonctionnalit√© Wise de votre application N26 en s√©lectionnant la devise du compte vers lequel vous envoyez votre virement*.*Rappel: Wise est uniquement disponible pour les comptes N26 Standard. Seuls les virements SEPA en euros peuvent √™tre effectu√©s.

question: Comment annuler mon adh√©sion N26 Premium ?
answer:
Les contrats N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal ont une dur√©e initiale d‚Äôun an avec renouvellement automatique, puis sa dur√©e devient ind√©termin√©e.Vous pouvez mettre fin √† ce renouvellement automatique √† tout moment pendant les 12 premiers mois de votre contrat.Apr√®s ce renouvellement, la dur√©e du contrat devient ind√©termin√©e, ce qui signifie que vous pouvez alors r√©silier votre adh√©sion √† tout moment.Dans cet article, vous trouverez la diff√©rence entre annulation, r√©siliation et renouvellement de votre adh√©sion. Vous avez 3 options :R√©silier votre contrat d'adh√©sion dans un d√©lai de 14 jours apr√®s la signature du contrat (c‚Äôest un d√©lai l√©gal, vous pouvez le demander en nous contactant).Mettre fin au renouvellement de votre adh√©sion √† tout moment avant la fin du premier contrat de 12 mois en nous contactant sur le Livechat.Annuler votre adh√©sion √† tout moment (vous pouvez r√©silier imm√©diatement et sans limitation en nous contactant via le Livechat).Changer pour une formule Premium inf√©rieureSi vous le d√©sirez, vous pouvez d√©sormais changer de formule Premium sans avoir besoin de passer par un compte Standard. Vous pourrez donc garder vos Espaces, vos Arrondis, vos r√©partitions de revenus ainsi que vos cartes et paiements actuels.Pour ce faire, connectez-vous √† votre application mobile, allez dans ‚ÄòMon Compte‚Äô et cliquez sur les d√©tails de votre formule d‚Äôabonnement. S√©lectionnez ‚ÄòChanger d‚Äôabonnement‚Äô et vous pourrez choisir une autre formule d‚Äôabonnement qui correspond √† vos besoins.Annuler l'adh√©sionVous pouvez annuler votre adh√©sion pendant la p√©riode d‚Äôannulation de 14 jours. Cette p√©riode commence d√®s que les premiers frais mensuels sont pr√©lev√©s. Il vous suffit de nous contacter et nous vous assisterons. Si vous r√©siliez l‚Äôune de nos adh√©sions Premium, vous pourrez de nouveau passer √† la m√™me ou √† une autre adh√©sion si vous le souhaitez √† une date ult√©rieure.Mettre fin au renouvellement de l'adh√©sionVotre adh√©sion N26 Premium a une dur√©e initiale de 12 mois. √Ä la fin des 12 premiers mois, votre contrat d‚Äôadh√©sion se renouvelle automatiquement et sa dur√©e devient ind√©termin√©e, sauf si vous nous contactez pour mettre fin au renouvellement.Vous pouvez en faire la demande √† tout moment avant la date de renouvellement de votre contrat de 12 mois. Nous vous enverrons un email vous rappelant le renouvellement de votre adh√©sion 8 semaines avant la date anniversaire de votre contrat.Si vous mettez fin √† votre renouvellement, vous pouvez continuer √† utiliser votre N26 Mastercard et √† profiter de tous les avantages de votre adh√©sion Premium jusqu‚Äô√† son expiration. Cela signifie que vous garderez votre couverture d‚Äôassurance (pour N26 You et N26 Metal) aussi longtemps que vous serez tenu de payer vos frais d‚Äôadh√©sion. Ensuite, une carte virtuelle vous sera d√©livr√©e √† la date anniversaire du contrat imm√©diatement apr√®s la r√©trogradation. Le solde minimum requis est de 10 ‚Ç¨. Vous n‚Äôavez pas besoin de nous contacter √† ce sujet, cela sera trait√© automatiquement.R√©silier l'adh√©sion √† tout momentSi vous souhaitez r√©silier votre adh√©sion √† tout moment apr√®s la p√©riode d‚Äôannulation de 14 jours, veuillez nous contacter. Si vous choisissez cette option avec N26 You ou N26 Metal, vos avantages d‚Äôassurance et vos cartes Premium N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal seront √©galement d√©sactiv√©es.Pour cl√¥turer votre compte d√©finitivement, veuillez consulter notre article Comment cl√¥turer mon compte N26?FAQ sur la r√©siliation de l‚Äôadh√©sion N26 PremiumDois-je cl√¥turer mon compte pour r√©silier mon adh√©sion N26 Premium ?
Non, il vous suffit de passer √† une autre adh√©sion depuis l‚Äôapplication N26 et votre nouveau compte sera imm√©diatement cr√©√©.Qu‚Äôadvient-il de mon IBAN si je r√©silie mon adh√©sion N26 Premium ?
Le passage √† une autre adh√©sion n‚Äôaffecte pas vos coordonn√©es bancaires. Votre IBAN reste donc inchang√©.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†

question: Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?
answer: Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten G√ºltigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erh√§ltst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Meine Karte l√§uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be¬†visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:¬†Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is ‚Ç¨1000 per transaction and ‚Ç¨5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).¬†¬†¬†To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our¬†friend referral program.

question: What is a N26 Business Account?
answer: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you can‚Äôt have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&C‚Äôs, can order a Maestro card for an additional ‚Ç¨10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:¬†ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2,500	In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5,000¬†The monthly limit for payments is ‚Ç¨20,000.¬†You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expenses¬†The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:¬†MoneyBeam to N26 customers: ‚Ç¨1,000Instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000Outgoing transfers: No limits¬†N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.¬†Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
„Éª Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.¬†Remember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app‚Äîyou‚Äôll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you‚Äôll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).¬†To unpair your old smartphone:Go to üë§ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to üë§ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: Bank information‚Äîyour N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‚ÄòAdd Money‚Äô button.

question: ¬øC√≥mo funciona Google Pay?
answer: Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Espa√±a, Estonia, Eslovaquia, Francia, Finlandia, Grecia, Italia, Irlanda, Lituania, Letonia, Los Pa√≠ses Bajos, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia y Suiza.Google Pay es un m√©todo de pago que te permite pagar directamente desde tu dispositivo sin necesidad de llevar la Mastercard encima todo el rato.Google Pay est√° disponible en todas las tiendas que acepten los pagos sin contacto (NFC), as√≠ como en las tiendas online. Mant√©n tu tel√©fono cerca del terminal y el pago se realizar√° autom√°ticamente. Cuando est√©s pagando online, tendr√°s que seleccionar Google Pay como m√©todo de pago y despu√©s confirmar tu compra mediante una¬†notificaci√≥n push¬†al hacer el¬†check out¬†de la compra.Aqu√≠ tienes algunos consejos a tener en cuenta:Para a√±adir tu tarjeta N26 Mastercard, descarga la app de Google Pay y selecciona¬†Empezar para introducir los detalles de tu tarjeta. Necesitar√°s la versi√≥n de Android 5.0 (Lollipop) o en adelante, adem√°s de un smartphone con tecnolog√≠a NFC.Inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta N26 desde la app m√≥vil¬†y ve a la pesta√±a¬†Tarjetas > Configuraci√≥n de tarjetas > A√±adir a Google Pay. Ser√°s redirigido a la aplicaci√≥n Google Pay.Google Pay requiere un bloqueo de pantalla seguro. Si todav√≠a no lo has configurado, ser√° necesario que lo hagas antes de a√±adir tu Mastercard a la app de Google Pay.Si proteges tu tel√©fono m√≥vil con una funda o carcasa, puede que la tengas que quitar para pagar. question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand¬†N26 Insurance¬†allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù banner you find.¬†You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.¬†How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.¬†Am I eligible?¬†N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can‚Äôt sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: How to get a p-account?
answer: In order to get a p-account, please fill out this p-account form (new tab) and sign it. You'll also find this link in the in-app message you received from us regarding your garnishment in Messages from N26. Please send the form back as a direct reply to that email or from your registered email address to support@n26.com (new tab).Please note:We report your p-account conversion to Schufa Holding AG.If your account has been garnished and you have an open credit or overdraft at the time of conversion to a p-account, we will have to cancel your overdraft and/ or credit.You're allowed to have only one p-account. Having multiple p-accounts (even at other banks) is a violation of the law and can lead to an extraordinary termination without notice of your N26 account.

question: How to apply for an overdraft?
answer:
Available in Germany and AustriaYou can apply for an overdraft only in the N26 mobile app. You‚Äôll know whether you qualify in real-time with no paperwork needed. You can apply for an N26 Overdraft as follows:Login the N26 mobile app.From the Homescreen, tap on the Explore-tab.Scroll down to Financial Products.Swipe to the side and tap on N26 Overdraft and follow the steps shown in the app.There you can also change the limits of your overdraft, view the interest you‚Äôve accumulated or cancel your overdraft at any time. We offer an 10.15% p.a. interest rate deduct the interest from your account at the end of every quarter.When you apply for N26 Overdraft, we look at information on your personal and financial situation. We then decide automatically on your eligibility for N26 Overdraft and the limit
amount we can offer you, based on a mathematical-statistical method and our risk appetite
practiced at each moment in time. In this regard:We take into account several factors and assess the personal data we have about
you to make our decision on your N26 Overdraft application, as better detailed in our
Privacy PolicyIf you want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility or on the limits for
your N26 Overdraft and want to have a human review of this automated decision,
you can get in touch with us by contacting our Customer Support team, either via live
chat through your N26 mobile app, web app or via the N26 Support Center. Kindly
note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered
to your N26 account or from your Secure Inbox in your app.If you decide to activate your N26 Overdraft, we will report this to SCHUFA.Why didn't I get an overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method in order to assess and decide if we can offer you an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time.If you followed the steps above and didn‚Äôt get an overdraft, it means we probably can‚Äôt offer you an overdraft at the moment. The latter might particularly be the case if you have an active garnishment or previously did not fulfil your financial obligations. Making your N26 account your main account (new tab) also has a positive effect on your eligibility.If you live in Germany, when deciding on your N26 Overdraft eligibility and limits we look at
your SCHUFA Score, which can be up to 3 years old. If it‚Äôs older, we will request your most
recent SCHUFA Score after you have gone through our N26 Overdraft application flow. This
might appear on your SCHUFA report, but does not affect your SCHUFA score and will only
be visible to you. In this case, you may not be offered a N26 Overdraft. If you live in Austria,
we look at your CRIF Score.If you can‚Äôt get an overdraft, you can try again at a later point in time. In any case, if you are
not eligible for a N26 Overdraft, we will notify you as soon as you become eligible. If you
want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility, please see above how to get in
touch with us.If you have further questions, please open a live chat directly in the N26 mobile app or your
Online Banking.You can find more information in our Overdraft Terms & Conditions (new tab).Why can‚Äôt I get a higher overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method model in order to determine the amount limit we can offer you for an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time and depends on the personal and financial information we have about you and our risk appetite at each moment in time.We will notify you as soon as we may grant you a higher limit for your N26 Overdraft. If you want to challenge the automated decision on the limit we can offer you, please see above how to get in touch with us. In this case, please reach out to us before accepting the overdraft limit we offered you.Why was my Overdraft limit reduced or cancelled?We routinely review the overdrafts we offer to ensure sustainable overdraft protection for all our customers. This change is not necessarily permanent, and you may be able to request an increase in your overdraft limit in the future. If you need further information, please reach out to our Customer Support Team.Can my overdraft limit change? / Why did my limit get reduced?We routinely review the overdraft limits we offer to ensure adequate protection for our customers. We may reduce or cancel limits if:We make a change to our credit policyYou repeatedly forget to repay your overdraft for more than 90 daysYou repeatedly repay your overdraft lateYour credit score decreases significantlyYou use your overdraft for fraudulent or illegal activityIf changes are implemented that affect you, we will naturally ensure that you are informed.What happens if I cancel my Overdraft whilst having a negative account balance?Your overdraft balance and interest becomes due immediatelyYou lose the ability to borrow money when your account balance is 0To reenable, you will have to apply for overdraft again, reactivation is not always guaranteedAfter cancellation, you will have to repay your overdraft immediately to avoid any additional fees towards N26 caused by delay in repayment. You will also start receiving reminders to top up.¬†Can I request a limit increase?While we don‚Äôt currently offer credit limit increases, we‚Äôre working to make this possible in the future.What can I do if I can‚Äôt pay back the money before the deadline?Limit change does not affect your current outstanding balance. You can continue to pay back the outstanding balance at least once every 90 days, as long as your usage is below your maximum limit.

question: Comment commander ma carte en livraison express ?
answer: Cette option est disponible pour vous permettre de recevoir votre carte dans de brefs d√©lais si vous en avez besoin rapidement.¬†La livraison express est √©galement conseill√©e si vous avez d√©j√† eu des difficult√©s avec la livraison de votre courrier.Vous pourrez s√©lectionner la livraison Express lorsque vous choisirez la m√©thode de livraison lors de la commande de votre premi√®re carte ou lorsque vous commandez une nouvelle carte.Vous recevrez ensuite un lien de suivi par email. Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas √† votre domicile lors de la livraison et si votre bo√Æte aux lettres est hors d‚Äôacc√®s, la carte sera d√©pos√©e dans un point relais √† proximit√© de chez vous (vous pourrez consulter son adresse depuis le lien de suivi).La carte sera conserv√©e en point relais pour une dur√©e limit√©e. Pass√© un certain d√©lai, elle nous sera retourn√©e. Dans ce cas, nous vous tiendrons inform√© par email.¬†Veuillez √©galement noter que :Votre Mastercard N26 sera livr√©e dans un d√©lai de 3 jours ouvr√©s (ce d√©lai d√©pend de l‚Äôheure √† laquelle vous commandez votre carte et du temps de fabrication de celle-ci).Les livraisons DHL Express interviennent entre 8:00 et 12:00, du lundi au vendredi. Une signature sera n√©cessaire lors de la r√©ception du colis √† domicile.L'exp√©dition via DHL Express est possible dans tous les pays europ√©ens o√π N26 est pr√©sent. En dehors de ces pays, l'exp√©dition n'est pas encore possible.Il n'est pas possible d'annuler ou modifier la m√©thode de livraison express une fois celle-ci valid√©e.Pour cl√¥turer un compte si vous avez d√©j√† command√© votre carte, vous devrez payer les frais de livraison express de cette derni√®re.Dans le cas o√π votre carte ne vous serait pas parvenue 3 jours ouvr√©s apr√®s votre commande, veuillez cliquer sur le lien de suivi pour surveiller l'exp√©dition. Ce lien de suivi vous permet aussi de fournir des informations suppl√©mentaires √† DHL concernant votre adresse de livraison ou de modifier cette adresse dans le cas o√π vous ne pourriez pas √™tre √† votre domicile √† l'heure pr√©vue.Combien co√ªte la livraison express?1. Cartes N26 Standard, N26 Smart et N26 You :a. Premi√®re carte √† l'ouverture de votre compte : 25 ‚Ç¨b. Carte de remplacement : 30 ‚Ç¨c. Carte suppl√©mentaire N26 You : 30 ‚Ç¨2. Cartes N26 Metal:a. Premi√®re carte √† l'ouverture de votre compte: 25 ‚Ç¨b. Carte de remplacement : 65 ‚Ç¨

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Facebook erm√∂glicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Benutzerdefinierte Zielgruppen bestehen aus N26 Kunden und Internetnutzern, denen personalisierte Inhalte angezeigt werden, oder nur aus Internetnutzern, um dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von bestimmten Werbungen von uns auszuschlie√üen. Wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen, da du bereits N26 Kunde bist. Mithilfe von Lookalike Audiences k√∂nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte Werbung interessanter ist als f√ºr andere Facebook Nutzer. Diese sog. ‚ÄûLookalike-Audiences‚Äú sind unseren Kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Facebook Nutzer.¬†Um die oben beschrieben Vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir Facebook eine ‚Äúgehashte‚Äù Version deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse zur Verf√ºgung. Das sog. ‚ÄúHashing‚Äù ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung durch die deine Email-Adresse verschl√ºsselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. Deine gehashte E-Mail-Adresse wird von Facebook dahingehend abgeglichen, ob diese auch bei Facebook hinterlegt ist. Nach dem Abgleich, unabh√§ngig davon ob dieser erfolgreich war oder nicht, werden s√§mtliche gehashte E-Mail-Adressen innerhalb von 6-8 Stunden gel√∂scht. Facebook teilt diese Daten nicht mit Dritten oder anderen Werbetreibenden oder gew√§hrt diesen Zugang zu deinen Daten. Diese und weitere Informationen kannst du den AGB von Facebook (neuen Tab) entnehmen.¬†Facebook Ireland Limited √ºbermittelt Daten an Facebook Inc., USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 (‚ÄûDSGVO‚Äú) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verf√ºgbar sind.Sie k√∂nnen Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gem√§√ü Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen.¬†Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Google Customer MatchCustomer Match erm√∂glicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Benutzerdefinierte Zielgruppen bestehen aus N26 Kunden und Internetnutzern, denen personalisierte Inhalte angezeigt werden, oder nur aus Internetnutzern, um dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von bestimmten Werbungen von uns √ºber das Google Search Network, den Shopping Tab, Gmail, YouTube und Google Display Network auszuschlie√üen. Wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen. Mithilfe von Lookalike Audiences k√∂nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte Werbung interessanter ist als f√ºr andere Google Nutzer. Diese sog. ‚ÄûLookalike-Audiences‚Äú sind unseren Kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Google Nutzer.Um die oben beschriebenen Vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir Google eine gehashte Version Ihrer N26-E-Mail-Adresse zur Verf√ºgung. Das sog. ‚ÄûHashing‚Äú ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung, bei der Ihre E-Mail-Adresse so verschl√ºsselt wird, dass Sie √ºber diese gehashte E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden k√∂nnen. Google gleicht diese E-Mail-Adresse dann mit der potenziellen E-Mail-Adresse Ihres Google-Kontos ab. Wenn diese E-Mail-Adresse nicht √ºbereinstimmt, kann Google sie dennoch f√ºr die √úberpr√ºfung der Einhaltung der Richtlinien verwenden. Dar√ºber hinaus verwendet Google sie jedoch nicht f√ºr den Customer Match oder andere Google-Produkte. Die Daten werden von Google nicht l√§nger als 48 Stunden gespeichert, um die Zielgruppen zum Customer Match zu erstellen, und danach umgehend gel√∂scht. Google gibt diese Daten weder an Dritte noch an andere Werbetreibende weiter und gew√§hrt auch keinen Zugriff darauf. Diese und weitere Informationen finden Sie im Support-Artikel ‚ÄûVerwendung von Daten zum Customer Match durch Google (neuen Tab)‚Äú.Google Ireland Limited √ºbermittelt Daten an Google LLC, USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 (‚ÄûDSGVO‚Äú) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verf√ºgbar sind.Sie k√∂nnen Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gem√§√ü Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen.

question: ¬øC√≥mo puedo proporcionar una prueba de origen de fondos para mi cuenta?
answer: N26, como banco plenamente acreditado, debe llevar a cabo inspecciones t√©cnicas rutinarias de las cuentas de sus clientes. Como entidad regulada, esto nos ayuda a asegurar que los fondos mantenidos en las cuentas de N26 est√©n seguros y protegidos.A veces, los resultados de estas inspecciones rutinarias pueden requerir que nos pongamos en contacto con el titular de la cuenta para pedirle una prueba del origen de los fondos en la cuenta, lo cual es una pr√°ctica en l√≠nea con las regulaciones bancarias alemanas.Cuando este sea el caso, solamente nos pondremos en contacto contigo en la direcci√≥n de email asociada a tu cuenta de N26. En este email se proporcionar√°n instrucciones claras sobre c√≥mo puedes enviar estos documentos, que pueden incluir escaneados o fotos de recibos, n√≥minas, facturas o instrucciones de pago.Presta atenci√≥n y comprueba que este email provenga de N26. Nunca te pediremos los datos de tu cuenta de N26, la contrase√±a o cualquier detalle compartido en tu proceso de verificaci√≥n.

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 You?
answer: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus f√ºnf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 You Mastercard online sowie in Gesch√§ften, vermeide versteckte Bankgeb√ºhren und profitiere von geb√ºhrenfreien Auslands√ºberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst dar√ºber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit geb√ºhrenfrei Bargeld in jeder W√§hrung abheben.Versicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: R√ºckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, f√ºr Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Versp√§tung des aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten f√ºr medizinische R√ºcktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erh√§ltst eine Versicherung f√ºr Such- und Rettungsma√ünahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unf√§llen w√§hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz f√ºr Sch√§den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Du kannst N26 YOU mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du dich f√ºr¬†N26 You (neuen Tab) interessierst, denke daran:Die N26 You Mastercard hat keine Pr√§gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlie√ülich der Nummer, des CVV Codes und des zehnstelligen Tokens sind auf der R√ºckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du auf N26 You upgradest, wird die monatliche Geb√ºhr von 9,90 ‚Ç¨ jeden Monat ab dem Datum deines Upgrades direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du ein Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach deiner¬†Identit√§ts√ºberpr√ºfung¬†eingezogen. Danach wird die Mitgliedschaftsgeb√ºhr monatlich von deinem Konto abgebucht, gez√§hlt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades. Wenn du dein Konto also zum Monatsende er√∂ffnest, wird die Geb√ºhr im darauf folgenden Monat zwei Mal abgebucht. Du kannst eine zus√§tzlich N26 You Karte f√ºr eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10‚Ç¨ in deiner N26 App bestellen.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgeb√ºhr monatlich oder im Voraus f√ºr die n√§chsten 6 Monate oder f√ºr 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich f√ºr die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig f√ºr den von dir gew√ºnschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt.Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Abrechnungsoptionen (monatlich, halbj√§hrlich oder j√§hrlich) und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.

question: ¬øC√≥mo guardar los detalles de un beneficiario?
