question: Wie lange dauert eine √úberweisung mit Wise?
answer: Wenn du eine √úberweisung mit Wise machst, wird dir ein gesch√§tztes Eingangsdatum angezeigt. Stelle bei sicher, dass der Name des Empf√§ngers exakt mit dem Namen auf seinem Bankkonto √ºbereinstimmt.Falls eine Wise-√úberweisung fehlschl√§gt, benachrichtigen wir dich mit einer Push-Mitteilung. Der Betrag wird einige Tage sp√§ter automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºckgebucht.Du kannst eine √úberweisung nicht manuell abbrechen. Aber wenn du den Kundenservice von Wise kontaktierst, k√∂nnen sie deine √úberweisung f√ºr dich abbrechen. Bitte beachte, dass die √úberweisung nur solange abgebrochen werden kann, bis Wise den Betrag an den Empf√§nger √ºberwiesen hat. Sobald der Betrag √ºberwiesen wurde, kann die √úberweisung nicht mehr abgebrochen werden. Auch die Empf√§ngerdaten k√∂nnen ge√§ndert werden, indem du dich mit Wise in Verbindung setzt. Bitte beachte, dass die Empf√§ngerdaten nur solange ge√§ndert werden k√∂nnen, bis Wise den Betrag an den Empf√§nger √ºberwiesen hat.Weder wir noch Wise berechnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren f√ºr eine R√ºckzahlung. Einige teilnehmende Banken erheben jedoch Geb√ºhren; in diesem Fall zieht Wise gem√§√ü seinen¬†Nutzungsbedingungen (neuen Tab)¬†diese Betr√§ge von dem zur√ºckgezahlten Geld ab.H√§ufige Gr√ºnde f√ºr eine fehlgeschlagene √úberweisung:Fehler in den √úberweisungsangaben (z. B. bei der Eingabe des Empf√§ngernamens oder der Kontoinformationen).Sonderzeichen oder zu viele Zeichen im Namen des Empf√§ngers oder im Feld f√ºr den Zahlungszweck.Limits wurden erreicht oder Online-Zahlungen sind in den Karteneinstellungen nicht aktiv.√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen sind mit dem N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto nicht m√∂glich; zudem darf das Empf√§ngerkonto kein Gesch√§ftskonto sein.

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

question: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
answer: Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9) in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

question: Bank information‚Äîyour N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‚ÄòAdd Money‚Äô button.

question: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
answer: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to¬†ideas@n26.com (new tab). We‚Äôre always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

question: Comment faire une r√©clamation ?
answer: En qu√™te d‚Äôassistance ou de r√©ponse √† une question ?Si vous avez besoin d‚Äôaide au sujet de votre compte, d‚Äôune demande de remboursement, pour un changement au niveau de vos donn√©es personnelles ou simplement si vous avez une question, voici comment contacter N26.D√©poser une r√©clamationNous sommes d√©sol√©s d‚Äôapprendre que vous souhaitez effectuer une r√©clamation.¬†Afin de d√©poser une r√©clamation, nous vous invitons √† nous contacter par votre email adresse associ√©e √† votre compte N26.Vous pouvez demander √† d√©poser une r√©clamation par l‚Äôinterm√©diaire de notre √©quipe d‚Äôassistance en direct, qui sera ravie de vous aider.Afin que votre r√©clamation puisse √™tre trait√©e, merci de bien vouloir inclure les mentions obligatoires suivantes:¬†Le produit ou service dont vous n‚Äô√™tes pas satisfaitUne description de votre r√©clamation et la date √† laquelle cela s‚Äôest produitVous pouvez aussi inclure tout document justificatif que vous poss√©dez en relation avec votre r√©clamationSi la r√©clamation est d√©pos√©e par l'interm√©diaire d'un repr√©sentant, celle-ci doit √™tre accompagn√©e d'un mandat de repr√©sentation sp√©ciale.¬†Nous vous remercions de nous contacter uniquement via notre application ou par e-mail. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de vous apporter une assistance en personne. Si vous ne pouvez pas nous contacter via l‚Äôapplication ou par e-mail, veuillez nous adresser une r√©clamation √©crite (par lettre) √† l‚Äôadresse suivante :N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinSi vous souhaitez soumettre votre r√©clamation par e-mail, veuillez √©crire √† l'une des adresses e-mail suivantes, en fonction de votre langue pr√©f√©r√©e:Francais litiges@n26.com (nouvel onglet)Anglais complaints@n26.com (nouvel onglet)Nous vous contacterons par email pour confirmer que nous avons re√ßu votre r√©clamation et nous commencerons ensuite notre investigation. Dans le cas o√π nous aurions besoin de plus d‚Äôinformations de votre part, notre service de gestion des r√©clamations vous contactera directement par email en vous expliquant quelles sont les informations requises. Une fois que notre service de gestion des r√©clamations aura examin√© vos probl√®mes, nous vous fournirons une d√©cision finale par email.¬†¬†D√©lais de traitement des r√©clamationsToutes les r√©clamations concernant les services de paiement, tels que les virements et les transactions par carte, seront r√©solues dans les 15 jours ouvrables, conform√©ment √† la directive europ√©enne sur les services de paiement II (PSD2). Si nous avons besoin de plus de temps pour √©valuer votre r√©clamation, nous vous en informerons, mais nous devons fournir notre r√©ponse dans les 35 jours ouvrables.Pour toutes les autres r√©clamations, des d√©lais diff√©rents s'appliquent en fonction des conditions g√©n√©rales relatives √† votre compte.Allemagne et Autriche - 15 Jours OuvrablesGreater Europe - 15 Jours OuvrablesIreland - 40 Jours OuvrablesFrance - 56 Jours CalendairesUnited Kingdom - 56 Jours CalendairesEspagne - 60 Jours CalendairesNous nous r√©servons le droit de cl√¥turer votre r√©clamation en cas d‚Äôabsence de r√©ponse de votre part. Si vous revenez vers nous dans le futur, nous ouvrirons un nouveau dossier et nous vous fournirons un nouveau num√©ro de suivi.Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas satisfait du r√©sultat de votre r√©clamationSi vous n‚Äô√™tes pas satisfait de la r√©ponse apport√©e √† votre demande relative √† votre compte bancaire N26 et aux services N26, vous pouvez transmettre votre r√©clamation √† une partie tierce ind√©pendante et d√©poser une r√©clamation aupr√®s des instances dont le coordonn√©es se trouvent ci-dessous*.*Pour votre information, ces instances offrent¬† la possibilit√© d'un r√®glement extrajudiciaire des litiges en allemand et ne peuvent effectuer aucune action sur les comptes N26. La proc√©dure d'arbitrage n'est pas une proc√©dure acc√©l√©r√©e et peut prendre jusqu'√† 6 mois.Une instance arbitrale est √† votre disposition √† la Banque F√©d√©rale Allemande (Schlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank). Lien (nouvel onglet).Ou vous pouvez d√©poser une r√©clamation aupr√®s de l‚ÄôAutorit√© de Surveillance Allemande des Services Financiers (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì BaFin). Lien (nouvel onglet).Pour obtenir une liste compl√®te des organes de r√©solution des litiges, veuillez consulter notre page Mentions l√©gales (nouvel onglet).

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúCard transfer‚ÄùChoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per top-up, for a maximum of 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùChoose an amount¬†Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†> Security.Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: ¬øC√≥mo descargar el Estado de Comisiones?
answer:
El estado de comisiones es parte de la Directiva Europea de Servicios de Pagos (PSD2) y facilita el acceso al historial de comisiones. El estado de comisiones est√° disponible para todos nuestros clientes o antiguos clientes que cerraron la cuenta hace menos de seis meses.Para clientes actualesInicia sesi√≥n en la WebApp (pesta√±a nueva), pulsa sobre Descargas y despu√©s baja hasta Estado de Comisiones. Selecciona Solicitar y recibir√°s un email en tu direcci√≥n de correo asociada a la cuenta con un enlace (puede tardar unos cinco minutos).Sigue las instrucciones que se muestran para descargar el Estado de Comisiones. Para antiguos clientesPuedes descargar tu estado de comisiones hasta seis meses despu√©s de haber cerrado tu cuenta a trav√©s de este formulario (pesta√±a nueva). Para ello, necesitar√°s esta informaci√≥n: Nombre y apellidos, n√∫mero y fecha de caducidad del documento de identidad que utilizaste para verificar tu cuenta. La direcci√≥n de email registrada en la cuenta. La fecha (mes y a√±o) en la que has creado y cerrado la cuenta (puedes consultar tu email de verificaci√≥n).Te pediremos que crees una contrase√±a temporal, v√°lida durante 24 horas, para el enlace que te vamos a enviar a tu direcci√≥n de email registrada en la cuenta. Ten en cuenta que si introduces una contrase√±a err√≥nea cinco veces, el enlace ser√° inv√°lido y tendr√°s que iniciar el proceso de nuevo. Resumen de Comisiones y GastosAl igual que todos los Bancos en Espa√±a, durante el mes de enero de cada a√±o te enviaremos una comunicaci√≥n con informaci√≥n detallada sobre los intereses y las comisiones pagadas y los gastos devengados por cada servicio bancario que N26 te ha prestado durante el a√±o anterior.
Esta informaci√≥n se entrega cumpliendo la normativa de transparencia del Banco de Espa√±a, para que puedas conocer el coste que te ha supuesto tener tu cuenta N26. Te puede servir para completar el Modelo 100 de autoliquidaci√≥n anual del Impuesto sobre la Renta de las Personas F√≠sicas (IRPF), o simplemente para acreditar los intereses, gastos y comisiones producidos y devengados durante el a√±o anterior.N26 pone a tu disposici√≥n este resumen anual a trav√©s de un email con un enlace para que puedas descargarlo f√°cilmente.
*Para cuentas Business, la devoluci√≥n trimestral no aparece en el documento.

question: Wann kommt meine Karte?
answer: Die Standardlieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos, wenn es sich um deine erste Karte nach der Kontoer√∂ffnung (au√üer bei N26 Standard*) oder einem Upgrade zu einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft handelt. Bei entlegeneren Lieferadressen kann es l√§nger dauern. Um √ºber die Kartenlieferung auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe ganz einfach zum Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App. Falls die Karte nicht zugestellt werden kann und an uns zur√ºckgeschickt wird, informieren wir dich per E-Mail.Die Express-Lieferung dauert bis zu 3 Werktage. Zus√§tzlich zum Banner im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App, kannst du den Fortschritt der Kartenlieferung mit dem Tracking-Link verfolgen, den wir dir per E-Mail schicken. Erfahre mehr √ºber die Express-Lieferung.Bitte warte, bis der gesch√§tzte Lieferzeitraum verstrichen ist, bevor du etwas tust. Die erste Karte nach der Kontoer√∂ffnung oder einem Upgrade zu einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft ist immer kostenlos. F√ºr folgende Karten kann eine Ersatzgeb√ºhr gelten.Wie kann ich sicherstellen, dass meine Karte unterwegs ist?Du musst deine Verifizierung abschlie√üen, damit deine Kontoer√∂ffnung abgeschlossen wird. Stelle sicher, dass du dich verifiziert hast, indem du dich in die N26 App einloggst. Sobald die Verifizierung abgeschlossen ist, wird dein Konto er√∂ffnet und du kannst deine N26 Karte erhalten.√úberpr√ºfe deine Lieferanschrift. Falls deine Lieferanschrift Fehler hatte, berichtige sie bitte direkt (neuen Tab) in der mobilen N26 App unter: üë§ Mein Konto > Pers√∂nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Beachte folgende Hinweise:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, f√ºge diesen unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls erforderlich, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und T√ºrnummer unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in Erw√§gung und gib die k√ºnftige Wohnadresse an.Falls es sich um deine erste N26 Karte handelt, kontaktiere uns bitte via Live Chat direkt aus der mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, bestelle bitte eine neue direkt in der N26 App.Deine erste Karte f√ºr dein N26 Smart, You oder Metal Konto ist kostenlos. Beim N26 Standard Konto erh√§ltst du eine kostenlose digitale Karte (es sei denn, du entscheidest dich daf√ºr, eine physische Karte f√ºr 10¬†‚Ç¨ zu bestellen). Deine Karte wird produziert und versendet, sofern dein Kontostand nach Abbuchung der ersten monatlichen Geb√ºhr mindestens 0¬†‚Ç¨ betr√§gt. Wenn du ein Upgrade auf eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft abgeschlossen hast, wird die erste Monatsgeb√ºhr sofort abgebucht. Hast du dich direkt bei der Anmeldung f√ºr eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft entschieden, wird die erste Monatsgeb√ºhr abgebucht, sobald du genug Geld zur Begleichung der Geb√ºhr aufs Konto geladen hast, sp√§testens jedoch 15¬†Tage, nachdem du deine Identit√§t nachgewiesen hast. Wenn die erste Monatsgeb√ºhr abgebucht wurde und dein Konto einen negativen Kontostand aufweist, musst du dein Konto aufladen, um die Produktion und den Versand deiner Karte zu veranlassen.Du wirst in der App unter "Nachrichten" und durch einen Banner auf dem Home Bildschirm √ºber den Lieferstatus informiert. Bitte beachte:Das einmalige Mindestguthaben ist keine Geb√ºhr, sondern eine notwendige Voraussetzung, um die Produktion und Auslieferung deiner Karte zu veranlassen.Bei Expressversand wird eine Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 25¬†‚Ç¨ von deinem Konto abgebucht, sobald die Karte versendet wird. Bitte sorge f√ºr einen ausreichenden Kontostand, um diese Geb√ºhr(en)zu decken.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterst√ºtzen. Erfahre mehr √ºber die digitalen Nutzungsm√∂glichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Warum habe ich meine Karte nicht im gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraum erhalten?√úberpr√ºfe den gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraum im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App oder in deinem Online-Banking. Falls der angegebene Zeitraum verstrichen ist, kontaktiere uns bitte via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab).

question: Termini d'uso di N26 per il servizio di Wise

question: ¬øC√≥mo puedo vincular mi cuenta de N26 a PayPal?
answer: Si quieres, puedes vincular tu cuenta de N26 a tu cuenta de PayPal y disfrutar de una serie de ventajas.Podr√°s ingresar dinero en tu cuenta bancaria al instante, enviar y recibir pagos r√°pidos con total seguridad y sin necesidad de utilizar tus datos bancarios ni el n√∫mero de tu tarjeta de N26.Te explicamos c√≥mo conectar tu cuenta de N26 desde la versi√≥n web de PayPal:Haz clic en Wallet, en la parte superior de la p√°gina.Selecciona Vincular tarjeta o cuenta bancaria.Haz clic en Vincular cuenta bancaria.Sigue las instrucciones que se te indican.Si utilizas la app del m√≥vil de PayPal:Haz clic en Configuraciones, en la esquina superior derecha.Selecciona Vincular tarjeta o cuenta bancaria.Haz clic en + y selecciona Cuenta bancaria.Introduce tus datos bancarios y confirma.Recuerda introducir tu nombre y apellido exactamente como figuran en tu cuenta de N26; de lo contrario, la conexi√≥n con PayPal no se producir√°.En cuanto se confirme tu cuenta de N26, PayPal te cobrar√° dos peque√±os cargos que se reembolsar√°n en tu cuenta en un plazo de 2-3 d√≠as laborables.En ese momento, solo tienes que anotar los cargos recibidos, iniciar sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de PayPal y confirmar la conexi√≥n de tu cuenta de N26 desde tu Wallet.

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúCard transfer‚ÄùChoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per top-up, for a maximum of 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùChoose an amount¬†Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: Was genau sind Karten f√ºr Spaces?

question: Vous avez re√ßu un message suspect ?
answer:
En pleine pand√©mie mondiale, EasyJet a r√©v√©l√© que les donn√©es personnelles et les d√©tails de voyage de 9 millions de clients avaient √©t√© vol√©s lors d‚Äôune cyberattaque tr√®s sophistiqu√©e. Au premier semestre 2021, les donn√©es personnelles de plus de 530 millions d‚Äôutilisateurs de Facebook, de plus de 100 pays, ont √©t√© mises en vente en ligne. Quelques jours apr√®s, 500 millions d‚Äôutilisateurs de LinkedIn ont vu leurs donn√©es personnelles appara√Ætre sur des r√©seaux clandestins en ligne. Ces donn√©es comprenaient notamment des noms, des dates de naissance, des num√©ros de t√©l√©phone et des adresses email.Quel est le rapport avec N26 ? Bien qu‚Äôil n‚Äôy ait pas d‚Äôimpact direct sur N26 ou sur la s√©curit√© de votre compte bancaire, les cybercriminels peuvent utiliser des informations, obtenues lors d‚Äôattaques visant d‚Äôautres entreprises, pour perp√©trer des attaques d‚Äôhame√ßonnage √† grande √©chelle.L‚Äôhame√ßonnage est une technique utilis√©e pour obtenir des informations sensibles qui peuvent √™tre utilis√©es √† des fins frauduleuses. En se faisant passer pour des entit√©s de confiance, les escrocs parviennent √† manipuler les gens pour les amener √† partager leurs donn√©es personnelles. Ils y parviennent en ciblant les gens par le biais de canaux de communication num√©riques que nous utilisons tous au quotidien, tels que les emails, les SMS, les appels t√©l√©phoniques et les r√©seaux sociaux.En tant que banque digitale de plus en plus populaire, les clients de N26 ont √©t√© cibl√©s par des campagnes d‚Äôhame√ßonnage, au cours desquelles les pirates envoient des messages contenant souvent un lien vers des sites internet qui ressemblent beaucoup √† l‚Äôespace client en ligne de N26. Bien qu‚Äôils puissent √™tre cr√©dibles √† premi√®re vue, ces sites internet sont malveillants et ne sont en aucun cas li√©s √† N26. Dans certains cas, les pirates peuvent usurper notre code court envoy√© par SMS. Leurs messages peuvent alors appara√Ætre dans le m√™me fil de discussion que les messages envoy√©s pr√©c√©demment par N26. Nous vous demandons de rester vigilant et de nous contacter imm√©diatement en cas de situation inhabituelle.Quelles sont les mesures prises par N26 √† ce sujet ? Pour garantir la s√©curit√© de votre compte, notre √©quipe de s√©curit√© surveille en permanence les attaques futures, afin de s‚Äôassurer que les sites internet frauduleux sont d√©sactiv√©s le plus rapidement possible.
Nous continuons √† prendre des pr√©cautions pour prot√©ger vos comptes et vos donn√©es personnelles. Toutefois, nous vous invitons √† prendre des mesures de s√©curit√© pour vous prot√©ger. Si vous avez re√ßu un message inhabituel, voici quelques √©l√©ments √† prendre en compte :Si vous avez re√ßu un SMS d‚Äôun pr√©tendu repr√©sentant de N26, gardez toujours √† l‚Äôesprit que nous ne vous contacterons jamais par ce moyen.Les SMS contenant un appel √† l‚Äôaction sont toujours malveillants. N‚Äôappuyez sur aucun lien et ne fournissez aucune donn√©e personnelle. Nous ne vous demanderons jamais de faire quoi que ce soit par SMS.Si vous avez des doutes sur les informations qui vous ont √©t√© communiqu√©es ou si vous pensez avoir √©t√© redirig√© vers un site frauduleux, faites preuve de prudence. Si vous √™tes invit√© √† appeler un num√©ro ou √† envoyer un email √† une adresse email, v√©rifiez qu‚Äôil s‚Äôagit bien des coordonn√©es d‚Äôune entreprise l√©gitime.En cas de doute, faites une capture d‚Äô√©cran du message et contactez notre Service Client via le Livechat de votre application N26, ou envoyez-la √† support@n26.com. Nous sommes toujours l√† pour vous aider !

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: Les pr√©l√®vements automatiques SEPA peuvent-ils √™tre accept√©s si le solde de mon compte est insuffisant ?

Si votre compte ne dispose pas des fonds suffisants lors d‚Äôun pr√©l√®vement automatique, nous devons refuser celui-ci. Nous vous facturons alors les frais de gestion correspondants, conform√©ment √† nos tarifs.Pour chaque pr√©l√®vement refus√©, nous vous facturons une somme forfaitaire de¬†3 ‚Ç¨. En outre, en cas de d√©couvert exceptionnel, nous appliquons un taux d'int√©r√™t sur le d√©couvert de 8,9 %.Il n‚Äôest pas possible de retarder un pr√©l√®vement automatique.√Ä l'avenir, vous pouvez v√©rifier si vous √™tes √©ligible √† un¬†d√©couvert autoris√©¬†sur votre application mobile (disponible uniquement en Allemagne et en Autriche).Bon √† savoir pour les pays en dehors de la zone euro : Si vous mettez en place un pr√©l√®vement automatique avec un marchand et qu‚Äôil est factur√© dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliqu√© (et donc le montant final d√©bit√© sur votre compte N26) est d√©fini et collect√© par la banque qui re√ßoit votre paiement.

question: PSD2 - Autenticaci√≥n Reforzada de Clientes
answer:
¬øQu√© es la Autenticaci√≥n Reforzada de Clientes (SCA)? SCA act√∫a como capa de seguridad adicional para los clientes de N26, ya que proporciona dos factores de autenticaci√≥n. Esta autenticaci√≥n se basa en el uso de dos o m√°s elemento de seguridad. Probablemente est√°s familiarizado con el inicio de sesi√≥n utilizando tu contrase√±a, pero con los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n, vas a necesitar la confirmaci√≥n desde el dispositivo vinculado o un c√≥digo por SMS. Cuando inicies sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibir√°s un notificaci√≥n emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un c√≥digo SMS a tu n√∫mero registrado. Esto asegurar√° que solo t√∫ puedes entrar en tu cuenta. Cuando inicies sesi√≥n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n ya est√°n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.
¬øPor qu√© se va a introducir la SCA?SCA se introduce como parte de la Directiva de Servicios de Pagos Europeos al que los bancos europeos deben acogerse. El objetivo de PSD2 es aumentar la seguridad de nuestros clientes, sus cuentas e informaci√≥n. Puedes leer m√°s informaci√≥n acerca de esto en nuestro art√≠culo sobre PSD2.

question: Bankdaten ‚Äì Deine N26 Kontobest√§tigung
answer: Was ist eine Kontobest√§tigung?Eine Kontobest√§tigung ‚Äì auch Bankbescheinigung genannt ‚Äì ist ein Dokument, das dich als InhaberIn deines Bankkontos ausweist. Auf der Kontobest√§tigung sind dein Vor- und Zuname, dein Geburtsdatum und deine Bankdaten wie die IBAN und das Datum der Kontoer√∂ffnung zu sehen.Auf Wunsch kann deine Bankbest√§tigung auch deinen aktuellen Kontostand und die Nummern deiner aktiven Karten auflisten. Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden werden diese Bankdaten teilweise mit Sternchen verdeckt.Wie beantrage ich meine Kontobest√§tigung?Klicke in der Web-App auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol* und w√§hle Bankdaten herunterladen. Eine PDF-Datei wird automatisch erstellt.¬†Wenn du eine Kontobest√§tigung inklusive deines aktuellen Kontostands und deiner Kartennummer(n) erhalten willst, klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*. Unter Kontobest√§tigung kannst du ausw√§hlen, ob du deinen aktuellen Kontostand und/oder die Kartennummer(n) deiner aktiven Karte(n) mit anzeigen lassen willst. Klicke dann auf Anfrage. Die PDF wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden unter Nachrichten von N26 (neuen Tab) in deiner App erscheinen.* Das Download-Symbol ist das Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil, links neben dem ‚ÄòButton ‚ÄúGeld erhalten‚Äù.

question: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
answer: Was ist starke Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA)?SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem sie Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einf√ºhrt. Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login √ºber zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Wahrscheinlich bist du damit vertraut, zum Login nur dein pers√∂nliches Passwort einzugeben. Um die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abzuschlie√üen, musst du zus√§tzlich deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t oder durch einen SMS-Code best√§tigen.Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, wirst du aufgefordert, deinen Login-Versuch durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t zu best√§tigen. Alternativ kannst du einen SMS-Code anfordern, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich vom verkn√ºpften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass sich der Login-Prozess bei deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t nicht ver√§ndert.Mehr Informationen dar√ºber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?Warum wird Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung eingef√ºhrt?SCA wird im Rahmen der Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie PSD2 eingef√ºhrt, die f√ºr alle europ√§ischen Banken gilt. Mit PSD2 wird die Sicherheit der Daten und Kundenkonten erh√∂ht.Erfahre mehr √ºber PSD2 in unserem Blogpost (neuen Tab).

question: Spazi Condivisi - Il beneficiario fidato
answer: Il beneficiario fidato di uno Spazio Condiviso pu√≤:Trasferire denaro dai propri Spazi (inclusi gli Spazi Condivisi di cui √® partecipante) a uno Spazio Condiviso.Accedere e liberamente trasferire fondi presenti su uno Spazio Condiviso.Abbandonare uno Spazio Condiviso in qualunque momento.I trasferimenti tra un beneficiario fidato e uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno bisogno di essere autenticati tramite notifiche Pin e Push. I beneficiari possono facilmente trascinare denaro tramite app (mobile e web), cos√¨ come con gli Spazi non condivisi.Perch√© un proprietario o un partecipante deve essere identificato come beneficiario fidato?Le leggi bancarie europee regolano le modalit√† secondo cui un trasferimento bancario possa essere autorizzato.Nell‚Äôambito di queste leggi, la SCA (Strong Customer Authentication) definisce i requisiti per rendere i pagamenti online pi√π sicuri.Un‚Äôeccezione ai requisiti SCA pu√≤ avvenire se un partecipante di uno Spazio Condiviso viene classificato come ‚Äùbeneficiario fidato‚Äù.Scopri di pi√πCosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

question: Wie benutze ich meine Karte digital?

question: PSD2 - Autenticazione Forte del Cliente
answer: Cos‚Äô√® l‚ÄôAutenticazione Forte del Cliente (SCA)?L‚ÄôAutenticazione Forte del Cliente (SCA) √® uno strumento che garantisce un ulteriore livello di sicurezza ai titolari di conto N26 attraverso l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori. Questa procedura si basa sull‚Äôuso di due o pi√π elementi di sicurezza. Hai gi√† familiarit√† con la procedura di accesso al conto attraverso l‚Äôinserimento della password personale. Con l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori avrai bisogno di confermare l‚Äôaccesso tramite un dispositivo associato (nuova tabella) oppure un codice che riceverai via sms.¬†¬†¬†Quando eseguirai l‚Äôaccesso al tuo conto N26 dalla Webapp (nuova tabella) oppure da un dispositivo non associato, ti verr√† richiesto di confermare una notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato. In alternativa, potrai richiedere la ricezione di un codice via sms sul numero di telefono registrato con noi e confermare l‚Äôaccesso al conto.Questa procedura garantisce che soltanto tu possa accedere al tuo conto N26.Quando esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 dal tuo dispositivo associato, l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori ha luogo automaticamente. Sar√† sufficiente accedere utilizzando le tue credenziali.Perch√© si usa la SCA?La SCA √® una misura di sicurezza che rientra nella nuova direttiva sui pagamenti (nuova tabella)(PSD2)e si applica a tutte le banche europee. L‚Äôobiettivo del PSD2 √® rafforzare la tutela dei dati del clienti e la sicurezza dei loro conti. Domande frequenti.Non riesco ad accedere al mio conto. Come posso risolvere?Innanzitutto, aggiorna il sistema operativo del tuo smartphone all‚Äôultima versione disponibile.¬†Se ancora non riesci ad accedere al conto ma hai accesso all‚Äôindirizzo email associato al conto, resetta la tua password.¬†Se non hai accesso al tuo indirizzo email, contattaci via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.Non riesco ad accedere al mio dispositivo associato. Come posso eseguire il login al mio conto?Se non puoi accedere al tuo smartphone associato ma puoi utilizzare il numero di telefono registrato, esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 e richiedi un codice di autenticazione. Ecco come:Esegui l'accesso dalla Webapp (nuova tabella);Seleziona Aiuto quando ti viene richiesto di confermare l'accesso tramite dispositivo associatoSeleziona Invia Codice SmsRicevuto il codice, inseriscilo nella Webapp.Una volta confermato l'accesso con il codice, avrai completato l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori e potrai associare il tuo nuovo dispositivo al tuo conto.Se non hai accesso al tuo numero registrato perch√© hai un nuovo numero oppure non sei pi√π in possesso del telefono, contatta la nostra assistenza clienti via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.Cosa posso fare se il mio telefono non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp N26?Se hai un dispositivo che non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp, non potrai eseguire l‚Äôaccesso al conto attraverso la versione mobile dell‚Äôapp.Potrai utilizzare la versione web per visualizzare informazioni relative al tuo conto. Per accedere sar√† necessario confermare il tuo tentativo di accesso con un codice di verifica inviato via sms sul numero di telefono associato al tuo conto.Potrai continuare ad effettuare pagamenti e prelievi con la tua Mastercard. I bonifici potranno essere eseguiti solo dopo essere stati confermati tramite app.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).¬†If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I‚Äôve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.¬†What if I‚Äôve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.¬†Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password? (new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How to order my extra card?
answer: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: ‚ÄúAlways losing things?‚Äù > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs ‚Ç¨10 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of ‚Ç¨10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.‚ÑπÔ∏è The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

question: What is Phishing?
answer: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If you‚Äôd like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. We‚Äôll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‚Äòeml‚Äô file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.¬†Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can‚Äôt use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:¬†Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.¬†Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the ‚Äúphone spoofing‚Äù technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that‚Äôs being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps they‚Äôre offering limited-time promotional deals. It‚Äôs important to note that just because ‚ÄúN26‚Äù is part of the URL, this doesn‚Äôt necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect you‚Äôre on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesn‚Äôt, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.¬†

question: Cos‚Äô√® il phishing?
answer: Il phishing √® un metodo semplice ed efficace che gli hacker utilizzano per indurre le persone a fornire dati sensibili. Una volta ottenute queste informazioni, possono utilizzarle per mettere in atto diversi tipi di frode assumendo l‚Äôidentit√† delle loro vittime. Se vuoi saperne di pi√π, clicca (nuova tabella) qui (nuova tabella) e leggi l‚Äôarticolo del nostro blog su come riconoscere ed evitare gli attacchi di phishing.Come segnalare email e messaggi sospettiNoi di N26 non ti invieremo mai messaggi SMS o email dai toni allarmanti che richiedono una tua azione immediata, per esempio accedere al tuo conto e condividere dati riservati. Non ti daremo mai un ultimatum, n√© ti chiederemo di autenticarti o di verificare i tuoi dati al di fuori dei nostri canali di comunicazione sicuri.Email sospetteSe ricevi un‚Äôemail sospetta, non cliccare su nessun link e non scaricare assolutamente gli allegati.Per aiutarci a segnalare ogni tentativo di truffa alle autorit√† competenti ti chiediamo di inoltrarci semplicemente lo scambio di email all‚Äôindirizzo support@n26.com .Se possibile, ti chiederemo di salvare l‚Äôemail sospetta come file ‚Äòeml‚Äô e inviarcela. Con la maggior parte dei servizi di posta elettronica, le email vengono salvate automaticamente in questo formato, una volta scaricate. Mandandoci il messaggio in questo formato ci permetti di identificare la vera origine del messaggio sospetto e di riportarlo alle autorit√† competenti. Tuttavia, se non riesci a salvare l‚Äôemail in questo formato, non preoccuparti: inoltraci semplicemente lo scambio di email all‚Äôindirizzo sopra menzionato. Dopodich√©, cancella l‚Äôemail dalla tua posta in arrivo.Ricorda: se ci invii soltanto uno screenshot del messaggio, purtroppo non saremo in grado di intervenire.¬†Messaggi di testo sospettiSe ricevi un SMS, non cliccare su nessun link e non fornire dati di nessun genere.Per aiutarci ad andare in fondo alla questione, ti chiediamo di fare quanto segue:¬†fai uno screenshot del messaggio ricevuto e invialo a support@n26.comassicurati che l‚Äôintero messaggio sia visibile, compreso il numero di telefono del mittente e la data/ora;dopo aver ricevuto una conferma da parte nostra che si tratta di un messaggio di phishing, blocca il numero di telefono;cancella il messaggio dal tuo cellulare.¬†Telefonate sospetteSe ricevi una chiamata sospetta, che provenga o meno da un nostro numero di telefono, non fornire nessun dato personale, n√® relativo al tuo conto o alla carta ad esso associata.Ti ricordiamo che in alcuni casi, con la tecnica del ‚Äúphone spoofing‚Äù, i truffatori sono in grado di camuffare il numero telefonico del mittente, facendolo apparire uguale a quello della banca.Per questo, se hai il sospetto di essere stato vittima di una truffa telefonica o hai fornito i tuoi dati personali, contatta subito il nostro supporto clienti a support@n26.com.Come segnalare un sito web contraffattoPrima o poi potresti ritrovarti su un sito web non legittimo, utilizzato impropriamente per sponsorizzare falsi servizi a nome di N26. Non √® da escludere che tu veda addirittura il nostro logo su alcune presunte pagine affiliate. In alcune di queste pagine potrebbero esserti offerti dei crediti o delle promozioni limitate nel tempo. Ti preghiamo di prestare la massima attenzione,¬† perch√© anche se ‚ÄúN26‚Äù appare nell‚Äôindirizzo del sito, non vuol dire necessariamente che il sito web sia legittimo o nostro partner.Se sospetti di trovarti su un sito web fraudolento, ti consigliamo di seguire attentamente questi passaggi: :controlla la barra degli indirizzi e assicurati che l‚ÄôURL sia https://app.n26.com/login. In caso contrario, ti preghiamo di copiare l‚ÄôURL e riportalo immediatamente a support@n26.com.

question: Comment fonctionne Espaces ?
answer: Espaces est une fonctionnalit√© des comptes premium qui vous permet de cr√©er des sous-comptes pour mettre votre argent de c√¥t√©, selon vos projets ou vos besoins. Vous pouvez personnaliser vos sous-comptes et d√©placer instantan√©ment votre argent depuis votre compte courant vers un de vos sous-comptes, et vice-versa, depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile et¬†internet (nouvel onglet).En plus de votre compte courant (ou espace principal), vous pouvez cr√©er et supprimer des espaces aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez selon ces limites : jusqu‚Äô√† 10 espaces suppl√©mentaires pour les utilisateurs N26 You, N26 Smart et N26 Metal.Les relev√©s de votre compte courant incluront √©galement les transactions entrantes ou sortantes depuis/vers vos sous-comptes.Vous avez acc√®s √† la liste de transactions de chacun de vos espaces tout comme celle de votre compte principal.Vous pouvez uniquement utiliser le solde de votre compte courant pour payer avec votre Mastercard N26. Si vous souhaitez utiliser l‚Äôargent disponible sur l‚Äôun de vos sous-comptes, vous devez d‚Äôabord le transf√©rer vers votre compte courant.Seul votre compte principal peut √™tre √†¬†d√©couvert¬†(dans les pays √©ligibles). Le solde de vos sous-comptes ne peut pas √™tre n√©gatif. Vous pouvez seulement transf√©rer l‚Äôargent qui est disponible sur votre sous-compte.Le virement se fait en maintenant la pression et en d√©pla√ßant le doigt vers le sous-compte de destination. Une fois le montant confirm√© avec votre code de validation, le solde du compte est instantan√©ment mis √† jour.Vous pouvez verrouiller ou d√©verrouiller un sous-compte directement depuis votre application mobile ou web. Il vous faudra pour cela utiliser votre code de validation. Si un sous-compte est verrouill√©, vous pouvez toujours ajouter de l'argent sur celui-ci. Si vous avez besoin de retirer de l'argent depuis un sous-compte verrouill√©, il faudra dans un premier temps le d√©verrouiller.Vous pouvez masquer le solde de votre espace du solde total de votre compte. Il vous suffit d‚Äôaller dans votre espace, puis de cliquer sur les trois points en haut √† droite de votre application et de s√©lectionner ‚ÄúMasquer le solde de l‚Äôespace‚Äù.Vous pouvez d√©sormais bloquer les virements depuis un Espace en particulier. Rendez-vous dans les param√®tres de cet Espace, cliquez sur 'Bloquer les virements vers le compte courant ou les autres espaces' et entrez votre code PIN de validation.Vous pouvez aussi maintenant supprimer un Espace, m√™me avec une carte associ√©e, depuis les param√®tres de cet Espace.Nous avons r√©cemment mis en place une nouvelle fonctionnalit√© : les r√®gles automatiques. Cette fonctionnalit√© d‚ÄôEspaces vous permet de mettre en place des virements automatiques entre votre compte principal et vos espaces.√âpargner avec ¬´ Les Arrondis ¬ªLa fonctionnalit√© ¬´ Arrondis ¬ª permet aux clients premium d‚Äôarrondir √† l‚Äôeuro sup√©rieur toutes les transactions par carte. La diff√©rence est automatiquement vers√©e sur le sous-compte de leur choix.Les arrondis √† l‚Äôeuro sup√©rieur ne vous mettront pas √† d√©couvert. Si le solde de votre compte n‚Äôest pas suffisant pour couvrir l‚Äôarrondi, celui-ci n‚Äôaura pas lieu.Vous ne pouvez activer la fonctionnalit√© ¬´ Arrondis¬ª qu‚Äôune seule fois dans un des sous-comptes de votre choix, et non plusieurs fois en m√™me temps.Vous pouvez annuler cette fonctionnalit√© √† tout moment.Si vous cl√¥turez un sous-compte dans lequel sont vers√©es les sommes arrondies, la fonctionnalit√© sera automatiquement d√©sactiv√©e jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous l‚Äôactiviez de nouveau.

question: How to report an insurance claim?
answer: Your¬†N26 You (new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal (new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

question: Come cambiare il mio PIN di conferma?
answer: Istruzioni passo per passo:iPhoneAndroidPasso 1Accedi alla tua app N26 e vai a Il mio conto, nell'angolo in altro a destraPasso 2Scorri in basso e seleziona SicurezzaPasso 3Vai su Cambia PIN di ConfermaPasso 4Inserisci il token della tua carta: il numero di 10 cifre presente sulla tua cartaPasso 5Crea e salva il tuo PIN di ConfermaPasso 1Accedi alla tua app N26 e vai a Il mio conto, nell'angolo in altro a destraPasso 2Scorri in basso e seleziona SicurezzaPasso 3Vai su Cambia PIN di ConfermaPasso 4Inserisci il token della tua carta: il numero di 10 cifre presente sulla tua cartaPasso 5Crea e salva il tuo PIN di ConfermaIl PIN di conferma √® quello che usi per confermare i bonifici o qualsiasi altra operazione che esegui dall'app. Se non sai quale sia, il tuo PIN di conferma √® quello che crei quando associ il tuo smartphone (nuova tabella) per la prima volta.Se l'hai dimenticato o lo vuoi cambiare, puoi farlo quando vuoi tramite l'app:Accedi a üë§ Il mio conto, poi Sicurezza.Seleziona Cambiare il PIN di conferma.Inserisci il token della tua carta (si tratta di un numero di 10 cifre che appare sotto il tuo nome sul fronte della tua carta; o sul retro, sulle carte N26 Smart, You e Metal).Crea e conferma il tuo nuovo PIN di conferma.Se inserisci il PIN di conferma in modo errato per 6 volte di seguito, dovrai ripristinarlo prima di riprovare.Per ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non √® valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Ricorda che il tuo PIN di conferma non √® lo stesso del codice PIN della tua carta, (nuova tabella) ma se vuoi puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.

question: Wie kann ich eine N26 Versicherung abschlie√üen?
answer: Mit der neuen On-Demand-Versicherung von N26 k√∂nnen alle unsere Kunden ihr Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Smartwatch und andere elektronische Ger√§te gegen Diebstahl, Einbruch, Raub, versehentliche Sch√§den und Wassersch√§den versichern lassen. Du kannst die Versicherung direkt in deiner N26 App oder Web-App (neuen Tab) abschlie√üen und jederzeit auf Wunsch wieder k√ºndigen ‚Äì ganz ohne l√§stigen Papierkram.Wie funktioniert N26 Versicherung?Wenn du die Versicherung abschlie√üen m√∂chtest, melde dich einfach in deiner N26 App oder Web-App an, gehe auf Entdecken und klicke auf das dort angezeigte Banner "Versicherung".Du wirst anschlie√üend aufgefordert, ein paar Details zu deinem Endger√§t einzugeben. W√§hle die monatliche oder j√§hrliche Zahlungsoption aus und best√§tige die Anfrage. Nach Abschluss der Versicherungspolice ist die Versicherung f√ºr dein Smartphone ab dem Folgetag aktiv und du kannst sie jederzeit √ºber deine N26 App oder deine Web-App (neuen Tab) k√ºndigen.Wie kann ich einen Versicherungsanspruch geltend machen?Du kannst einen Versicherungsanspruch √ºber das Onlineportal von Simplesurance (neuen Tab) geltend machen. Dazu musst du dich mit deiner Zertifikatsnummer und Zertifikats-PIN anmelden. Diese findest du auf deinem Versicherungszertifikat, das du via Nachrichten von N26 erhalten hast.Jeder Kunde ist berechtigt, maximal zwei Anspr√ºche pro Jahr einzureichen. Nach der zweiten Inanspruchnahme der Versicherungsleistung erlischt die Versicherung automatisch. Weitere Informationen findest du in den Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen, die dir direkt nach dem Versicherungsabschluss an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse geschickt werden. Dar√ºber hinaus kannst du dich jederzeit an support@simplesurance.de wenden, wenn du Informationen zu deinem Versicherungsschein oder einem gemeldeten Schadensfall ben√∂tigst.Bin ich dazu berechtigt?Die N26 Versicherung ist f√ºr alle unsere Kunden verf√ºgbar. N26 Metal Kunden k√∂nnen lediglich nicht ihr Handy versichern, da sie bereits im Rahmen ihrer Metal-Mitgliedschaft eine Handyversicherung haben. Bitte vergewissere dich, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast. N26 Versicherung ist derzeit f√ºr Kunden in √ñsterreich, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Deutschland erh√§ltlich.Diese Versicherung gilt nicht f√ºr Ger√§te, die au√üerhalb Europas gekauft werden.

question: Where can I use my Maestro card?
answer: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLet‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each¬†ATM transaction¬†using your Maestro is ‚Ç¨2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). question: Come prelevare e depositare contanti con CASH26
answer:
Disponibile per i conti aperti in Spagna, Germania, Austria, Italia e Grecia.L'unica cosa di cui hai bisogno √® avere il tuo smartphone collegato. Possono volerci fino a 10 minuti prima che il deposito sia visibile nel saldo del tuo conto nell'app N26.Importante!Il codice a barre ha una durata di soli 10 minuti. Se non lo usi in tempo, scadr√† e dovrai generarne uno nuovo.¬†Se sbagli l'importo, puoi cancellarlo facendo clic sull'icona del cestino in alto a destra (o lasciarlo scadere) e generarne uno nuovo.Non √® necessario fare acquisti in negozio per depositare o prelevare denaro.I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti per un massimo di 2000‚Ç¨ a settimana.
Leggi questo articolo (nuova tabella) per saperne di pi√π sui dettagli e i limiti di CASH26.Domande frequenti su CASH26
Perch√© non trovo punti CASH26 sulla mappa?Prima di tutto, verifica di aver accettato e attivato la geolocalizzazione della tua app N26. Ci sono tuttavia molti altri metodi per ricaricare il tuo conto come i bonifici SEPA, l‚Äôaccredito dello stipendio, le carte di debito e credito, e molto altro ancora. Dai un‚Äôocchiata a "Come ricaricare il mio conto N26 (nuova tabella)" per saperne di pi√π.
Posso depositare o prelevare contanti in tabaccheria o al bancomat?No, non √® ancora possibile depositare e prelevare contanti in tabaccheria n√® negli sportelli ATM, ma puoi farlo in uno dei nostri punti vendita CASH26 che sono pi√π di 1900 in tutta Italia.Puoi controllare il punto CASH26 pi√π vicino a te nella sezione Carte > CASH26 della tua app.

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúCard transfer‚ÄùChoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per top-up, for a maximum of 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùChoose an amount¬†Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (‚Äútapping‚Äù your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:¬†Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen.

Dans ce dernier cas, son montant sera automatiquement cr√©dit√© sur votre solde dans un d√©lai maximum de 12 jours. Ce montant sera automatiquement recr√©dit√© sur votre solde.Le montant du d√©bit effectif peut √™tre diff√©rent du montant de l‚Äôautorisation pour diff√©rentes raisons (nouvel onglet).

question: Was ist eine Sicherheitsfu√üzeile und warum haben wir eine solche eingef√ºgt?
answer: Eine Sicherheitsfu√üzeile ist eine personalisierte Nachricht, die am Ende von E-Mails und digitalen Dokumenten eingef√ºgt wird und als Echtheitssiegel dienen soll.Durch das Hinzuf√ºgen deines vollst√§ndigen Namens am Ende jeder E-Mail m√∂chten wir dir helfen, zwischen legitimen E-Mails von N26 und Phishing-E-Mails von Betr√ºgern zu unterscheiden.¬†Auch wenn eine Sicherheitsfu√üzeile nicht eindeutig beweisen kann, dass eine E-Mail von einer verifizierten Quelle stammt, tr√§gt sie dazu bei, das Risiko von Deceptive Pishing ‚Äì der h√§ufigsten Art von Phishing-Angriffen ‚Äì zu verringern.Was ist Deceptive Phishing?Deceptive Phishing ist der illegale Versand von generischen Phishing-E-Mails an eine gro√üe Anzahl unbekannter Personen mit dem Ziel, unter Vort√§uschung falscher Angaben an vertrauliche Informationen zu gelangen.Wie wird dies erreicht?¬†Betr√ºger kontaktieren ihre Zielpersonen unter dem Vorwand, f√ºr renommierte Unternehmen zu arbeiten. Den Zielpersonen wird dann mit Markenbildern, zeitkritischen Szenarien und irref√ºhrender Sprache ein falsches Gef√ºhl der Sicherheit vorgegaukelt. Sobald sie an der Angel h√§ngen, versuchen die Betr√ºger, ihre Opfer dahingehend zu manipulieren, dass sie auf ihre Forderungen eingehen.Wie kannst du dich sch√ºtzen?Achte besonders auf E-Mails, die du von Banken, Kunden, Arbeitgebern usw. erh√§ltst. Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, etwas zu unternehmen, handele nie aus einem Impuls heraus, sondern √ºberlege immer genau, bevor du handelst.¬†Wenn du das Gef√ºhl hast, dass etwas nicht stimmt, solltest du dieses Gef√ºhl Ernst nehmen. Achte auf Rechtschreib- und Grammatikfehler, fahre mit dem Mauszeiger √ºber versteckte URLs (klicke nicht darauf), √ºberpr√ºfe die Absenderangaben und informiere dich genauer dar√ºber ‚Äì ein schneller Online-Check kann dir helfen, die Identit√§t eines Absenders zu verifizieren.Wenn du eine verd√§chtige E-Mail, einen verd√§chtigen Smartphone-Anruf und/oder eine verd√§chtige SMS im Namen von N26 erhalten hast, leite dein Anliegen an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com weiter. Wenn du Fragen zu deinem Konto kl√§ren m√∂chtest, kannst du √ºber unsere mobile App mit uns chatten.Erfahre mehr √ºber:Wie du verd√§chtige Phishing-Angriffe meldest (neuen Tab)Wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und verhindern kannst (neuen Tab)So sch√ºtzt du dich vor Social Engineering (neuen Tab)

question: Wie kann ich meine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen?

Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, k√∂nnen diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine pers√∂nlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht √ºberpr√ºfte Empf√§nger.Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer Routinepr√ºfung¬†unterzogen wird.¬†Sende nur g√ºltige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.Wir werden dich au√üerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen.¬†Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur Verf√ºgung, auch wenn sie N26 √§hnelt.Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verd√§chtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein k√∂nnte, z√∂gere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

question: Posso aprire un conto se vivo al di fuori della zona euro?
answer: Se vivi in Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Liechtenstein, Svizzera o Islanda puoi aprire un conto (nuova tabella) con noi. Ti offriremo:La scelta tra un conto standard e un conto business (nuova tabella).Un conto in euro, un IBAN tedesco e la possibilit√† di effettuare bonifici SEPA o trasferimenti tramite MoneyBeam (nuova tabella).Un buon tasso di cambio con la tua carta di debito Mastercard.La scelta tra spedizione standard (gratuita) oppure express (nuova tabella) (per un costo di 25 ‚Ç¨) della tua carta di debito Mastercard.¬†Trasferimenti in valuta estera tramite Wise (per i conti standard)3 prelievi bancomat gratuiti in ‚Ç¨ all'interno dell'eurozona (1,7% di commissione sui prelievi in valuta estera)0,1% di cashback per tutti i pagamenti effettuati con carta (per i conti Business).2 Spazi (nuova tabella) (sottoconti) in aggiunta al conto principale.15 ‚Ç¨ di bonus per ogni amico che avrai invitato con successo ad N26 con il nostro programma Invita un amico (nuova tabella).Pagamenti contactless tramite Google Pay e Apple Pay.Suggerimenti per i bonifici in entrata e in uscita:Ti suggeriamo di scegliere la tua valuta locale per ottenere il miglior tasso di cambio quando userai la tua Mastercard per acquisti o per prelevare contante (diversamente, potrebbero essere applicate commissioni aggiuntive).¬†¬†Per ricaricare il conto nella tua valuta, ti consigliamo di usare Wise tramite l‚Äôapp, il sito di Wise oppure di convertire la valuta tramite bonifico SEPA con la tua banca.Per bonifici verso conti in euro, puoi semplicemente selezionare bonifico SEPA nell'app stessa. Per bonifici verso conti non in euro, puoi usare Wise nell‚Äôapp.Nota: Wise non √® disponibile per conti N26 Business (sono permessi bonifici SEPA in euro)¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†
