question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose¬†RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†the Cards tab¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Wo du deine Steuernummer findest
answer:
Deine Steuernummer (TIN) ist dir zugeordnet und wird von der Steuerbeh√∂rde bei der Anmeldung in dem Land ausgestellt, in dem du als Privatperson steuerpflichtig bist.
 
Wo du deine TIN findest, kann sich je nach Land unterscheiden, in dem du steuerlich berechtigt bist. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Begriff f√ºr die TIN in jedem Land unterscheiden kann. Wenn du etwa aus Gro√übritannien stammst, kannst du dir deine TIN-Nummer wie deine National Insurance Number (NIN) vorstellen., wenn du in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland wohnst:Wenn du in Deutschland wohnst und dich bei deiner Gemeinde angemeldet hast, erh√§ltst du eine 11-stellige TIN oder Steueridentifikationsnummer. Verwechsle sie bitte nicht mit deiner 9-stelligen Steuernummer.
 
Eine TIN wird nicht in offiziellen Ausweisdokumenten angegeben, aber deine TIN kannst an in den folgenden Stellen finden:Im Brief, den du vom Bundeszentralamt f√ºr Steuern (BZSt) erhalten hast, mit dem deine TIN oder Id-Nr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer) ausgestellt wurde.EinkommensteuerbescheidLohnsteuerbescheinigungWeitere Informationen dar√ºber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erf√§hrst du hier (neuen Tab)., wenn du in Frankreich wohnst:Wenn du in Frankreich ans√§ssig bist und dort eine Steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst, weisen dir die franz√∂sischen Steuerbeh√∂rden eine 13-stellige TIN oder SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) zu, sobald du dich in der Datenbank der Steuerbeh√∂rde registriert hast. Diese Kennungen beginnen mit 0, 1, 2 oder 3.
 
Deine TIN ist an den folgenden Stellen zu finden:Auf deiner vorgedruckten Einkommensteuererkl√§rungAu√üerdem kannst du sie in deinen Steuer- und Grundsteuerbescheinigungen einsehen.Weitere Informationen dar√ºber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erf√§hrst du hier (neuen Tab)., wenn du in Italien wohnst:Wenn du in Italien ans√§ssig bist, ist eine TIN oder Steuernummer (aus 16 Zeichen bestehend) nur g√ºltig, wenn du im italienischen Steuerregister eingetragen bist, das von der italienischen Finanzbeh√∂rde (Agenzia delle Entrate) verwaltet wird. Wenn du keine TIN besitzt, solltest du einen Antrag bei einem Amt der italienischen Finanzbeh√∂rde stellen.
 
Eine TIN wird nicht in offiziellen Ausweisdokumenten angegeben, aber deine TIN kannst an in den folgenden Stellen finden:Deine TIN findest du auf deiner pers√∂nlichen Krankenversicherungskarte (Steuer-ID-Nummer, Tessera sanitaria/Codice Fiscale).Deine TIN kannst du auch auf deiner TIN-Karte finden.Weitere Informationen dar√ºber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erf√§hrst du hier (neuen Tab)., wenn du in Spanien wohnst:Wenn du in Spanien ans√§ssig bist, ist deine TIN f√ºr steuer- und zollrechtliche Zwecke gedacht. Deine spanische TIN besteht aus neun Zeichen (wobei das letzte Zeichen ein Pr√ºfbuchstabe ist). Die TINs werden vom Ministerium des Innern ausgestellt und k√∂nnen abweichen, je nachdem, ob du eine nat√ºrliche Person mit spanischer Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit bist oder nicht.
 
Deine TIN kannst du je nach pers√∂nlicher Situation an den folgenden Stellen finden:PersonalausweisElektronischer PersonalausweisAufenthaltskarte f√ºr Ausl√§nderNeuer F√ºhrerschein (seit 2004)SteuerkarteSozialversicherungskarteWeitere Informationen dar√ºber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erf√§hrst du hier (neuen Tab).Wichtige Informationen:Das Format f√ºr die Steuernummer, das du in deiner N26 App vorfindest, h√§ngt vom Land deines Aufenthalts ab. Wenn du also in Deutschland wohnst, musst du deine deutsche TIN eingeben.Die von dir f√ºr dein Konto gespeicherten Steuerdaten kannst du √ºberpr√ºfen, indem du auf:Mein Konto > Pers√∂nliche Details > Steuerinformationen.Wenn du das Land eingetragen hast, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist, aber nicht deine Steuernummer, l√∂sche bitte das Land aus der Liste, gehe wieder in das Land ein und gib deine Steuernummer erneut ein.Mehr Informationen dar√ºber, was wir mit deinen Steuerinformationen unternehmen, findest du hier (neuen Tab).

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: Pagamenti anticipati per i conti N26 Premium
answer: Il tuo contratto di sottoscrizione √® valido per un anno, dopodich√© si rinnover√† automaticamente a tempo indeterminato fino a quando non lo annullerai. Quest'operazione pu√≤ essere effettuata in qualsiasi momento (vedi sotto). Ti avviseremo 2 mesi prima del rinnovo automatico del tuo contratto.Quali sono i metodi di pagamento disponibili?Puoi scegliere se pagare la tua sottoscrizione annuale su base mensile o se ricevere uno sconto sul costo totale pagando anticipatamente, per esempio in un‚Äôunica soluzione o ogni 6 mesi. La tua scelta non influisce sul periodo di durata del tuo contratto.Se scegli di pagare in anticipo i primi 6 mesi della tua sottoscrizione, dovrai effettuare un primo pagamento all‚Äôinizio del periodo di validit√† del tuo contratto e un secondo pagamento 6 mesi dopo, all‚Äôinizio della seconda met√† del tuo contratto annuale.Come e quando posso effettuare il pagamento?La tua sottoscrizione verr√† attivata soltanto dopo che avrai effettuato il pagamento del tuo primo canone. Potrai pagare con una carta di debito o di credito, Apple Pay o Google Wallet: in questo modo potrai accedere a tutti i vantaggi del tuo conto premium subito dopo aver verificato la tua identit√†. In alternativa, puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto e procederemo a detrarre l‚Äôimporto dovuto.Se non dovessimo ricevere il primo pagamento del tuo canone (su base mensile, semestrale o annuale) entro 15 giorni dalla verifica della tua identit√†, detrarremo automaticamente l‚Äôimporto corrispondente dal tuo conto N26 per darti accesso ai tuoi vantaggi premium. In seguito, il canone verr√† automaticamente detratto dal tuo conto N26 in base al metodo di pagamento che hai selezionato.Come posso cancellare la mia sottoscrizione a N26?Sospendi il rinnovo automatico: puoi interrompere il rinnovo automatico della tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento prima del termine dei 12 mesi di contratto, ti baster√† contattarci in chat. Se decidi di sospendere il rinnovo automatico, potrai continuare a utilizzare la tua Mastercard N26 e tutti i vantaggi del tuo conto premium fino alla data di scadenza del contratto. Questo significa che potrai usufruire della copertura assicurativa (per i conti N26 You e N26 Metal) finch√© pagherai il canone del tuo conto N26.Cancellazione immediata: puoi annullare la tua sottoscrizione ad effetto immediato in qualsiasi momento, ti baster√† contattarci. Scegliendo quest'opzione, la tua Mastercard N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal verr√† disattivata, riceverai una carta virtuale e passerai a un conto N26 Standard. Se hai un conto N26 You o N26 Metal e scegli quest'opzione, anche la tua copertura assicurativa verr√† immediatamente sospesa.Revoca: puoi cancellare la tua sottoscrizione durante il periodo di prova di 14 giorni, che inizia nel momento in cui ti viene addebitato il primo canone mensile. Cancellando la sottoscrizione passerai a un conto N26 Standard, la tua Mastercard N26 verr√† disattivata e ne riceverai una virtuale.Posso ricevere un rimborso?Se scegli di cancellare la tua sottoscrizione utilizzando la chat del Supporto Clienti entro il periodo di 14 giorni in cui si applica il diritto di ripensamento, rimborseremo completamente il tuo pagamento.Se scegli di cancellare la tua sottoscrizione dopo il periodo di recesso di 14 giorni attraverso il recesso ordinario, rimborseremo solamente i mesi che hai¬† pagato in anticipo e di cui non hai usufruito.Nel caso in cui al tuo pagamento anticipato fosse applicato uno sconto, ti rimborseremo i mesi rimanenti applicando il prezzo ordinario della sottoscrizione e senza tenere in considerazione lo sconto. Il tuo diritto a usufruire dello sconto matura soltanto se mantieni la tua sottoscrizione per tutto il periodo coperto dal pagamento anticipato.

question: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
answer: Deine IBAN enth√§lt die DE-L√§nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige Pr√ºfnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer. Zum Beispiel:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Die teilnehmenden L√§nder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.H√§ndler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des Europ√§ischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, versto√üen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europ√§isches Recht (Artikel 9 der¬†Verordnung Nr. 260/2012 (neuen Tab)).Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deine¬†zust√§ndige nationale Beh√∂rde (neuen Tab)¬†und informiere diese √ºber den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des H√§ndlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschlie√ülich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).

question: Come posso richiedere la giacenza media?
answer:
Nelle prime settimane di Gennaio 2022, riceverai la tua giacenza media per l‚Äôanno 2021 nei tuoi Messaggi (nuova tabella), senza bisogno di richiederla personalmente.¬†Stessa cosa per la giacenza media degli anni 2020 e 2019.Se avessi bisogno della giacenza media del tuo conto per gli anni precedenti al 2019, ti invitiamo a contattare il nostro Servizio Clienti in chat.A cosa serve?La giacenza media serve per compilare il modello ISEE, per dichiarare al fisco il tuo conto N26 con IBAN tedesco qualora questa sia superiore ai 5.000‚Ç¨, per dimostrare a qualcuno che sei solvibile o per accedere a programmi o benefici speciali concessi dallo Stato sulla base della tua situazione economica.Il modello ISEE pu√≥ essere richiesto tramite la compilazione della Dichiarazione Sostitutiva Unica, fondamentale per accedere a molte agevolazioni previste dallo Stato per il sostegno al reddito.¬†Il valore della giacenza media, che sar√† autocertificato dal titolare del conto senza bisogno di una documentazione cartacea, andr√† inserito nel Quadro FC.2 del modello ISEE, denominato ‚Äúdepositi e conti correnti bancari e postali‚Äù. In questo spazio dovr√† essere indicato il tipo di rapporto finanziario posseduto e l‚Äôammontare del saldo contabile attivo sul conto corrente.Come si calcola?La giacenza media annuale √® l'importo che si ottiene dividendo la somma dei saldi giornalieri del conto corrente per 365, indipendentemente dall'effettiva durata dell'anno solare (come negli anni bisestili) e indipendentemente dal numero di giorni in cui il conto √® stato attivo o ha avuto un saldo positivo, come definito dall'Agenzia delle Entrate (nuova tabella) e nelle istruzioni (nuova tabella) alla compilazione della Dichiarazione Unica Sostitutiva 2020 del Ministero del Lavoro e delle Politiche Sociali.
Domande frequenti sul tema Giacenza mediaSe possiedo un conto con IBAN tedesco e la mia giacenza media √® oltre i 5000‚Ç¨ , devo dichiararlo al fisco?S√¨, dovrai compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi e versare l‚ÄôIvafe, un‚Äôimposta di importo fisso pari a ‚Ç¨34,20. Clicca qui (nuova tabella) per maggiori informazioni in merito.Vorrei ricevere un documento PDF con il valore della mia giacenza media. E‚Äô possibile?Ti ricordiamo che non sono in vigore disposizioni di legge che impongano alle banche di fornire questo genere di attestazioni. Abbiamo deciso di inviare la giacenza media come messaggio privato, in modo da rendere questo dato facilmente accessibile e scaricabile da tutti i clienti.¬†Il tuo estratto conto tuttavia √® sufficiente come prova ufficiale in caso di esplicita richiesta da parte delle Autorit√†, pertanto non siamo in grado di fornire alcun modulo firmato dalla banca in formato PDF o simili.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest ‚ÄúSplit the bill‚Äù feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you‚Äôre sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, tap it and choose ‚ÄòSplit the bill‚ÄôAdd the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you‚Äôll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can‚Äôt be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.¬†Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.¬†
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Welcher Wechselkurs gilt f√ºr mich?
answer:
Wenn du mit deiner N26 Karte Eink√§ufe in anderen W√§hrung machst, gelten f√ºr den ausgegebenen Betrag die Wechselkurse von Mastercard.Die gute Nachricht: N26 erhebt keine eigene Geb√ºhren f√ºr Auslandszahlungen.Die Wechselkurse von Mastercard kannst hier einsehen: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (neuen Tab)
Du kannst auch den Wechselkurs, der f√ºr eine zur√ºckliegende Transaktion galt, in der Umsatzanzeige deiner N26 App oder deinem Online Banking nachsehen.¬†
Bitte beachte, dass Wechselkurse Schwankungen unterliegen, sodass der tats√§chlich abgebuchte Betrag von dem urspr√ºnglich angezeigten Betrag abweichen kann.

question: Perch√© mi √® stato addebitato pi√π di quanto mi aspettassi?
answer: Tutte le transazioni avvengono in tempo reale. Ti avvertiremo tramite notifica push quando una qualsiasi transazione in entrata o in uscita avviene.A volte una transazione pu√≤ sembrare sospetta perch√© l‚Äôimporto finale addebitato pu√≤ essere diverso dall‚Äôimporto originale della transazione per alcuni motivi:L‚Äôesercente blocca un importo pi√π elevato come deposito (es. alla stazione di benzina, per un noleggio auto o una prenotazione alberghiera), e la differenza viene accreditata sul tuo conto non appena il deposito non sar√† pi√π necessario.Le variazioni dei tassi di cambio possono comportare lievi differenze nel totale delle operazioni effettuate in valuta estera.In entrambi i casi, non applichiamo interessi per la differenza negli importi.Ma se sei sicuro di non aver autorizzato una transazione, potremmo aiutarti a¬†recuperare i tuoi soldi.

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.¬†You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list¬†Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: Expiration et remplacement des cartes : FAQ
answer: Si votre Mastercard N26 a expir√© ou arrive √† expiration, vous trouverez dans cet article toutes les informations sur la commande d‚Äôune nouvelle carte, les co√ªts associ√©s et les d√©lais de livraison.¬†Avant de commander une nouvelle carte, nous vous recommandons de v√©rifier que vos donn√©es personnelles sont correctes et √† jour. Ma carte arrive √† expiration, que dois-je faire¬†?Si votre carte arrive √† expiration, veuillez vous connecter √† votre compte N26 dans l‚Äôapplication N26, allez dans la rubrique Cartes et cherchez une banni√®re sous la carte correspondante. Suivez les √©tapes pour confirmer l‚Äôadresse o√π vous souhaitez recevoir votre carte de remplacement et nous vous l‚Äôenverrons.¬†Ne vous inqui√©tez pas si ce message ne s‚Äôaffiche pas. C‚Äôest probablement parce que votre carte est encore valable pendant un certain temps. Le moment venu, vous aurez la possibilit√© de confirmer votre adresse.Une fois votre carte re√ßue, vous devrez l‚Äôactiver avant de pouvoir l‚Äôutiliser. N‚Äôoubliez pas de d√©truire votre ancienne carte et de la jeter conform√©ment aux directives locales en mati√®re de recyclage.Remarque¬†: une fois que vous aurez re√ßu et activ√© votre nouvelle Mastercard, n‚Äôoubliez pas de mettre √† jour vos informations de paiement pour tous vos abonnements et virements permanents. Ainsi, vos paiements futurs ne seront pas rejet√©s.Puis-je continuer √† utiliser ma carte apr√®s son expiration¬†?Non, la date d‚Äôexpiration figurant sur votre carte remplit une fonction importante et vous ne pourrez plus l‚Äôutiliser apr√®s le mois d‚Äôexpiration. Vous recevrez une nouvelle carte avec un num√©ro diff√©rent, ainsi qu‚Äôune nouvelle date d‚Äôexpiration.Combien co√ªte le remplacement de ma carte arrivant √† expiration ou p√©rim√©e¬†?Les cartes de remplacement sont gratuites pour tous les clients N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal.Si vous avez ouvert votre compte avant les dates suivantes, la nouvelle carte et la livraison sont gratuites dans les pays o√π les services propos√©s par N26 sont disponibles (nouvel onglet)¬†:16.02.2021 (clients domicili√©s dans la Grande Europe)25.02.2021 (clients domicili√©s en Italie ou en Espagne)11.03.2021 (clients domicili√©s en France)18.03.2021 (clients domicili√©s en Allemagne, en Autriche ou en Suisse)Si votre compte a √©t√© cr√©√© apr√®s cette date, votre carte de remplacement co√ªtera le m√™me prix qu‚Äôune nouvelle carte.Si vous r√©sidez dans un pays non support√© par N26, veuillez contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat ou par t√©l√©phone afin que nous puissions passer la commande pour vous. La livraison en dehors de ces pays (nouvel onglet) peut entra√Æner des frais suppl√©mentaires.¬†Combien de temps cela prendra-t-il¬†?Toutes les cartes de remplacement sont exp√©di√©es par livraison standard. Cette livraison est gratuite et peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 15¬†jours ouvr√©s. Dans les zones rurales ou difficiles d‚Äôacc√®s, cela peut prendre plus de temps. Pour suivre l‚Äôavanc√©e de l‚Äôexp√©dition, il vous suffit d‚Äôacc√©der √† l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil de votre application mobile N26.Ma carte est d√©j√† p√©rim√©e mais je n‚Äôai jamais re√ßu de carte de remplacementPas de probl√®me, nous sommes l√† pour vous aider¬†!¬†Si vous avez d√©j√† confirm√© votre adresse et que plus de 20¬†jours se sont √©coul√©s, veuillez contacter le Service Client. Pour ce faire, consultez la rubrique Aide de l‚Äôapplication.¬†Si vous n‚Äôavez pas encore confirm√© votre adresse, connectez-vous √† votre compte N26 dans l‚Äôapplication et cherchez une banni√®re sous votre carte expir√©e. Suivez les √©tapes pour confirmer l‚Äôadresse o√π vous souhaitez recevoir votre carte de remplacement.¬†

question: ¬øC√≥mo activar la tarjeta?
answer: Una vez recibes la tarjeta, lo siguiente que tienes que hacer antes de poder empezar a usarla, es activarla. La tarjeta se activa en 2 pasos muy sencillos, pero primero tienes que haber vinculado tu m√≥vil a tu cuenta (pesta√±a nueva).Para activar tu tarjeta en la app N26, desde la pantalla de Inicio:Ve a la pesta√±a Tarjetas.Desliza hasta que veas la tarjeta que quieres activar.Selecciona Ajustes de las tarjetas y pulsa Activar (para activarla desde la WebApp (pesta√±a nueva), selecciona Activar tarjeta en la pantalla de Inicio).Cuando hayas terminado de activarla en la app, el √∫ltimo paso es hacer una retirada de efectivo en un cajero autom√°tico*.vale cualquier cajero, siempre y cuando est√© en el mismo pa√≠s donde se envi√≥ tu tarjeta;los pagos contactless (pesta√±a nueva) no se activar√°n hasta que introduzcas la tarjeta para que el cajero lea el chip y teclees tu c√≥digo PIN correctamente.Deber√°s volver a seguir estos pasos cada vez que pidas una nueva tarjeta, ya sea por p√©rdida, deterioro, robo, o si te pasas a N26 Smart (pesta√±a nueva), You (pesta√±a nueva) o Metal (pesta√±a nueva).Si tienes varias tarjetas del mismo tipo (por ejemplo, porque el env√≠o se retrasara y acabaras pidiendo m√°s de una), solo podr√°s activar tu tarjeta m√°s reciente, ya que las tarjetas anteriores se desactivan al pedir una nueva. Esto no aplica a las tarjetas adicionales (pesta√±a nueva) disponibles con los planes premium.

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?¬†When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?¬†¬†First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.What if I can‚Äôt remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can‚Äôt receive SMS for other reasons?If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.Why can‚Äôt I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose¬†RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: Was ist ein verd√§chtiger Loginversuch?
answer: Warum habe ich diese E-Mail erhalten?Sicherheit hat f√ºr uns oberste Priorit√§t. Wenn unser System einen ungew√∂hnlichen Anmeldeversuch erkennt, benachrichtigen wir dich sofort, sodass du Ma√ünahmen zur Sicherung deines Kontos ergreifen kannst. Wenn du eine Meldung erhalten hast und du denkst, dass jemand anderes versucht hat, sich in dein Konto einzuloggen, ist ein schnelles Zur√ºcksetzen deines Passworts erforderlich. Dennoch weisen wir darauf hin, dass unser System lieber Vorsicht als Nachsicht walten l√§sst. Wenn du den in der Meldung angezeigten Anmeldeversuch erkennst, kannst du unsere Nachricht also einfach ignorieren.Wie setze ich mein Passwort zur√ºck?Du kannst dein Passwort zur√ºcksetzen, indem du dich √ºber deine App oder einen Internetbrowser in dein Konto einloggst. Gehe zu Mein Konto ‚Üí Einstellungen ‚Üí Sicherheit.Wenn du nicht auf dein Konto zugreifen kannst, klicke auf dem Anmeldebildschirm auf Passwort vergessen. Anschlie√üend musst du nur deine E-Mail-Adresse eingeben und einen Link zum Zur√ºcksetzen des Passworts anfordern.Bei der Erstellung deines neuen Passworts bitten wir dich darauf zu achten, dass du es nicht schon bei anderen Plattformen verwendest. Bitte stelle sicher, dass du ein einzigartiges Passwort verwendest. Die mehrfache Verwendung derselben Passw√∂rter ist die Hauptursache f√ºr ein kompromittiertes Konto.Wann sollte ich den Kundenservice kontaktieren?Nachdem du eine E-Mail √ºber eine ungew√∂hnliche Anmeldung erhalten hast, hast du vielleicht Sorgen um die Sicherheit deines Kontos. Wir m√∂chten dir jedoch versichern, dass die √Ñnderung deines Passworts ausreicht, um den Schutz deines Kontos zu gew√§hrleisten. Wenn du das Thema mit jemandem besprechen m√∂chtest, steht dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne zur Verf√ºgung.

question: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
answer: Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten √ºber kirchensteuerliche Abz√ºge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgef√ºhrt.Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen √ºber deine Religionszugeh√∂rigkeit durch das Formular¬†‚ÄûErkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk‚Äú (neuen Tab)¬†Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. Wenn du Widerspruch einlegst, wird dein Finanzamt dich auffordern, eine Kirchensteuererkl√§rung abzugeben.Weitere Informationen findest du auf der Website des¬†Bundeszentralamtes f√ºr Steuern (neuen Tab).

question: Have you been victim of a fraud? Contact us.
answer:
Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please help us save you time and contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you‚Äôre an N26 customer and have an authorized or unauthorized card transaction which you want to dispute, please use our dedicated and complete service in the N26 mobile app. The hotline above exclusively helps in case of transfers to a suspicious account with an N26 IBAN.Did you get a SMS followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt. This is how the fraud works:You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one (new tab) The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App> My Account> Settings >Security> Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,¬† send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comIn the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab).I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behaviour.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.Useful links:What is phishing?What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How to revoke my loan application?
answer: N26 Credit¬†revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.We‚Äôll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so it‚Äôs best to chat with us about this. We‚Äôll take it from there and let you know via email when it‚Äôs done.Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

question: Dove trovo il mio IBAN o il numero di conto?
answer: Puoi visualizzare l‚ÄôIBAN e il nostro numero BIC sul tuo estratto conto. In alternativa, li troverai nella sezione¬†üë§ Il mio conto¬†dell'app mobile o¬†WebApp (nuova tabella).Puoi condividere facilmente questi due dati tramite il tasto Condividi. Se necessario, puoi scaricare le informazioni relative al tuo conto bancario in formato PDF accedendo alla¬†WebApp (nuova tabella)¬†e selezionando l‚Äôicona a forma di nuvola nell‚Äôangolo in alto a destra.I nostri IBAN italiani sono costituiti da 27 caratteri: iniziano con IT (codice Paese), poi seguono il codice di controllo di regolarit√†, il CIN, l'ABI e il CAB. Le ultime 12 cifre corrispondono al numero del conto.I nostri IBAN tedeschi sono composti da 22 caratteri e iniziano con DE seguito dal codice di controllo di regolarit√†, poi dal nostro¬†codice banca¬†10011001 e terminano con il tuo¬†numero di conto¬†a 10 cifre (inizia dal 26).Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial (nuova tabella)sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube (nuova tabella).

question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We‚Äôve made a¬†video (new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you‚Äôve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that‚Äôs needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you‚Äôd like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

question: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
answer: Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gem√§√ü FATCA verpflichtet, dem ‚ÄúInternal Revenue Service‚Äù (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen gef√ºhrt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rige ausl√§ndische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden.¬†Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier. (neuen Tab)Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger unter anderem so definiert:Staatsangeh√∂riger der USA (auch bei doppelter Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit)Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer g√ºltigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù erf√ºllt (siehe unten).Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù bedeutet:Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.ODERDu warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.Dar√ºber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enth√§lt:US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USAGeburtsort in den USAPostanschrift oder Postfach in den USAUS-amerikanische RufnummerDauerauftr√§ge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wirdF√ºr den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US Staatsangeh√∂rigen anzusehen:Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine √§hnliche Eigenerkl√§rung undeinen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Nationalit√§t eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der Best√§tigung √ºber den Verlust deiner Staatsb√ºrgerschaft.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.¬†Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What‚Äôs a ‚Äúbanking day‚Äù?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn‚Äôt arrived ‚Äî where is it?So what if you‚Äôve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn‚Äôt come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: Why do I need to update my personal information?
answer: Starting from mid-August 2022, we will contact our customers residing in Italy and holders of an N26 account with Italian Iban, with the aim of verifying and keeping their personal information up to date.As a bank, we are required by law to keep our customers' personal information correct and up-to-date, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing.This process involves the periodic verification and updating of personal data and the compilation of a due diligence questionnaire, which includes additional financial information about our customers.What information do I need to update?When you receive our communication regarding this, by logging in to your N26 app, you will be immediately directed to the process of updating your personal information.Before proceeding, make sure you have updated the app to the latest version available. The operation can only be done through the app associated with your smartphone (it will not be displayed when you log in from the WebApp).First of all, you will be asked to verify and confirm your personal data:Name and surnamePlace and date of birthNationalityGenderTax informationIn the next step, you will then need to validate your legal address and your shipping address, if different.As a last step, you will be asked to fill in the due diligence questionnaire, in order to ensure the integration and updating of relevant information required by banking legislation. This is a quick procedure, the operation will only take you a few minutes.Remember, the update and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Please note that, in accordance with the legislation in force, the updating of your data and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Furthermore, the processing of your data is subject to the European regulation on data protection and privacy (GDPR). You can find more information on our privacy policy (new tab).What is the due diligence questionnaire?The anti-money laundering legislation referred to in Legislative Decree 231/2007 requires the bank to regularly collect updated information on its customers, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing. and as a condition for maintaining relationships and transactions between customers and the bank.For this reason, we will submit a short questionnaire, within your N26 app, where we will ask you to answer a series of questions regarding your net worth, your current employment, the origin of the funds in your account and the use you make of your N26 account.We will check the data you have entered and, if necessary, we will contact you at a later time. For this, please make sure you have your app updated to the latest version available and always monitor incoming communications in the "Messages from N26" from the "Support" section of your app.What happens if I don't complete the procedure as required?We suggest you to complete the transaction as soon as possible, so that you can continue to have full access to all the features of your N26 account.In the event that the information is not updated within a reasonable period, N26 will be obliged to refrain from continuing the contractual relationship with the customer (Article 42 of Legislative Decree 231/2007).After the first 30 days, you will still be able to complete the questionnaire, but we will be forced to temporarily limit certain features of your account (e.g. incoming payments, such as salary) until you have met this regulatory requirement.

question: Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôune carte virtuelle ?
answer: Si vous ouvrez un compte N26 Standard, vous recevrez une carte virtuelle gratuitement (√† condition de disposer d‚Äôun solde minimum de 10 ‚Ç¨ pour activer la carte).¬†La carte virtuelle est id√©ale pour effectuer des paiements en ligne ou lorsque vous devez partager votre num√©ro de carte sur des sites web ou sur des applications. Elle vous permet √©galement de g√©rer s√©par√©ment certaines d√©penses comme vos abonnements ou vos pr√©l√®vements automatiques.Les clients N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal ont la possibilit√© de commander une carte virtuelle sans frais en plus de la carte physique gratuite fournie avec leur adh√©sion premium. Bon √† savoir : Les clients N26 Standard ont la possibilit√© de commander une carte physique au prix unique de 10 ‚Ç¨ (sans avoir besoin de passer √† une adh√©sion premium).Comment commander et activer ma carte virtuelle ?Connectez-vous √† votre compte et allez dans l‚Äôonglet Cartes dans le coin inf√©rieur droit.Appuyez sur ¬´ Obtenir une carte suppl√©mentaire ¬ª.S√©lectionnez ¬´ Virtuelle ¬ª en haut de la page, puis appuyez sur ¬´ Choisir ¬ª en bas de la page.Lisez et acceptez les conditions g√©n√©rales, puis appuyez sur ¬´ G√©n√©rer une carte virtuelle ¬ª.Ajoutez votre carte virtuelle N26 √† votre portefeuille Apple Pay ou Google Pay ou ignorez cette √©tape.Comment utiliser ma carte virtuelle N26 ?Paiement en magasin en utilisant Apple ou Google Pay : Associez votre carte virtuelle N26 √† votre portefeuille Apple ou Google Pay selon votre appareil.Retrait en esp√®ces : Une fois que vous avez associ√© votre carte virtuelle √† votre portefeuille Apple ou Google, vous pouvez retirer de l‚Äôargent liquide aux distributeurs automatiques de billets sans contact. Vous pouvez √©galement utiliser CASH26 pour d√©poser ou retirer de l‚Äôargent (DE, AT, IT, ES et GR).Effectuer des achats en ligne : Vous pouvez consulter les d√©tails de votre carte virtuelle dans l‚Äôapplication N26 (num√©ro de carte, date d‚Äôexpiration et code de s√©curit√©). Pour consulter ces d√©tails :Connectez-vous √† l‚Äôapplication mobile N26S√©lectionnez ¬´ Cartes ¬ª.Trouvez votre carte virtuelle N26 (faites d√©filer vers la gauche avec votre doigt jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous trouviez votre carte virtuelle N26 si vous en avez plusieurs)S√©lectionnez ¬´ D√©tails de la carte ¬ª.Vous devrez ensuite saisir votre code de validation ou un identifiant biom√©trique pour consulter les donn√©es de vos cartes virtuelles pendant 60 secondes.La carte virtuelle Mastercard N26 n‚Äôest disponible que pour les comptes N26 Standard ouverts √† partir de f√©vrier 2021 et tous les comptes N26 Premium ouverts √† partir du 9 octobre 2021.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You‚Äôll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism¬†As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26‚Äôs public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API¬† & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as ‚Äúpending‚Äù will be classified as ‚Äúbooked‚Äù transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We‚Äôve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: N26 Cashless - Promozione per i clienti italiani
answer: Cos‚Äô√®?N26 Cashless √® una nuova promozione pensata per i clienti di N26 residenti in Italia volta ad incentivare l‚Äôuso della carta di debito N26 per i pagamenti digitali.Il concorso sar√† attivo dal 1¬∞ Marzo al 30 Giugno 2021.Chi pu√≤ partecipare?¬†L‚Äôiscrizione ad N26 Cashless √® aperta e automatica per tutti i clienti N26 che risiedono in Italia (eccetto i clienti N26 Business) e che hanno dato il proprio consenso alle comunicazioni di marketing.¬†Per poter partecipare alla promozione e al sorteggio dei premi, i clienti dovranno:¬†Avere un conto N26 aperto e attivo¬†Non essere incorsi in pignoramenti, sequestri o altre limitazioni del conto correnteLe condizioni citate sono valide per tutta la durata del concorso e la mancata osservanza pu√≤ comportare l‚Äôesclusione dall‚Äôestrazione finale dei premi.Come funziona?I clienti N26 iscritti al programma raggiungono la soglia per partecipare alle estrazioni dei premi finali effettuando transazioni con la propria Mastercard associata al conto N26 via POS (sia contactless, sia con chip e pin) o con Apple Pay e Google Pay.I pagamenti online e i prelievi allo sportello ATM sono esclusi dal conteggio delle transazioni.¬†Quali sono i premi in palio?In base al numero di transazioni effettuate durante il periodo di validit√† del concorso (1¬∞ Marzo - 30 Giugno 2021), i partecipanti potranno accedere alle estrazioni per 3 soglie di premi:Almeno 20 transazioni > Buono Regalo Amazon.it da 20‚Ç¨Almeno 50 transazioni > Buono Regalo Amazon.it da 50‚Ç¨Almeno 90 transazioni > Buono Regalo Amazon.it da 90‚Ç¨Se si effettua un numero di transazioni che corrisponde a diverse soglie, si partecipa cumulativamente all‚Äôestrazione dei premi per entrambe le soglie raggiunte.(Per esempio, se si effettuano 60 pagamenti nel periodo di durata del concorso, si partecipa all‚Äôestrazione dell‚ÄôAmazon voucher sia da ‚Ç¨ 20 che da ‚Ç¨ 50.)L‚Äôestrazione dei premi avverr√† entro il 31 Agosto 2021.In caso di vincita, i clienti riceveranno una comunicazione ufficiale nella casella "Messaggi" dell'app N26.¬†Concorso a premi valido dal 01/03/2021 al 30/06/2021. Montepremi 4.160 ‚Ç¨ F.C. iva. Per consultare il regolamento completo, visita www.n26.com (nuova tabella). Buono Regalo Amazon.it non √® uno sponsor della presente promozione. Restrizioni applicate. Maggiori dettagli su amazon.it/gc-legal (nuova tabella).

question: Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

So erstellst du einen Shared Space:Erstelle im Spaces-Tab einen neuen Space und tippe darauf.
Tippe dann auf das M√§nnchen in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms.
Lies dir aufmerksam die Informationen unter "Mehr erfahren √ºber Shared Spaces" durch und tippe auf "Teilnehmer einladen".
Suche und w√§hle den Kontakt des N26 Nutzers aus, den du einladen m√∂chtest. Wenn die Person, die du einladen m√∂chtest, ein N26 Konto hat aber nicht in deiner Kontaktliste auftaucht, kann es daran liegen dass sie sich in der App nicht als N26 Nutzer erkennbar gemacht hat. Diese Option l√§sst sich unter Mein Konto < Einstellungen < Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen < Pers√∂nliche Daten aktivieren.
Falls n√∂tig, trage deren vollen Namen an, wie in deren N26 Konto hinterlegt.
Sieh dir die Informationen unter Kontovollmacht erteilen (die rechtliche √úbersicht) an. Wenn du die Nutzungsbestimmungen durchgelesen und akzeptiert hast, tippe auf das K√§stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".

question: Cosa sono gli IBAN per Spaces?
answer:
Con la funzionalit√† IBAN per Spaces, i tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale diventano ancora pi√π utili. Di per s√© uno spazio non pu√≤ ricevere bonifici in entrata e non pu√≤ essere utilizzato per pagare addebiti diretti in uscita. Tuttavia, assegnando un IBAN a uno dei tuoi Spaces, sar√† possibile ricevere bonifici in entrata direttamente su questo spazio. In questo modo potrai usufruire di questo IBAN per pagare gli addebiti diretti in uscita.Come funziona?Gli IBAN per Spaces permettono ai clienti con una membership premium (N26 Smart, You o Metal) che hanno aperto il loro conto N26 in Germania e hanno un IBAN che inizia con ‚ÄúDE‚Äù, di assegnare un IBAN unico a uno spazio separato dal conto principale; in questo modo sar√† possibile utilizzarlo per ricevere e inviare direttamente alcuni bonifici.Di seguito puoi trovare una panoramica delle funzionalit√† che otterrai assegnando un IBAN a uno o pi√π Spaces:Aggiungi un IBAN a uno dei tuoi Spaces: puoi assegnare un IBAN unico a uno spazio separato dal conto principale, nuovo o gi√† esistente. Non √® possibile assegnare un IBAN a uno Spazio condiviso.Spaces multipli con IBAN: puoi creare fino a 10 Spaces, ognuno con il suo IBAN ed avere cos√¨ maggiore controllo sulle tue finanze. Ti preghiamo di notare che dopo aver assegnato un IBAN a 3 Spaces si attiva un limite di 24 ore prima di poter assegnare un nuovo IBAN a un altro spazio.Ricevere bonifici bancari: puoi ricevere i bonifici direttamente in uno spazio separato dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato.Inviare bonifici bancari: puoi effettuare i bonifici direttamente da uno spazio separato dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato.Pagamento di addebiti diretti: puoi utilizzare lo spazio con l‚ÄôIBAN unico per pagare addebiti diretti in uscita ricorrenti direttamente dallo spazio separato dal conto principale. Se non hai fondi a sufficienza per coprire l‚Äôimporto dell‚Äôaddebito diretto, il bonifico verr√† rifiutato e ti verr√† addebitata una commissione sul tuo conto principale.Visualizzazione dei dettagli IBAN dei tuoi Spaces: puoi vedere i dettagli di tutti gli IBAN dei tuoi Spaces che puoi utilizzare per ricevere bonifici e pagare per gli addebiti diretti. Basta effettuare l‚Äôaccesso nell‚Äôapp mobile o su N26 Web, andare sulla sezione ‚ÄúSpaces‚Äù e selezionare lo spazio per vedere i dettagli dell‚ÄôIBAN. Vai alle ‚ÄúImpostazioni Spaces‚Äù per vedere l‚ÄôIBAN e il BIC sul lato superiore dello schermo.Come aggiungere un IBAN a uno spazio separato dal conto principale:Puoi aggiungere un IBAN a uno dei tuoi spazi eseguendo questi passaggi:Effettua l‚Äôaccesso nell‚Äôapp mobile N26Vai su ‚ÄúSpaces‚Äù per aprire il menu corrispondenteSeleziona lo spazio a cui desideri assegnare un IBAN unicoVai sull'icona dell‚Äôingranaggio in alto a destra della schermata e poi apri ‚ÄúImpostazioni Spaces‚ÄùSegui i passaggi consigliati nell‚Äôapp:Seleziona ‚ÄúImposta IBAN‚Äù ¬ªLeggi le informazioni e tocca ‚ÄúAggiungi IBAN a ...‚Äù ¬ªAccetta i Termini e Condizioni ¬ªInserisci il PIN di conferma ¬ªSeleziona ‚ÄúVa bene‚Äù nella schermata finale.Come rimuovere un IBAN da uno spazio separato dal conto principale:Per rimuovere un IBAN da uno dei tuoi Spaces dovrai eliminare del tutto lo spazio e trasferire i fondi rimanenti sul tuo conto principale oppure su un altro dei tuoi spazi. Per eliminare uno spazio con un IBAN procedi in questo modo:Effettua l‚Äôaccesso nell‚Äôapp mobile N26Clicca su ‚ÄúSpaces‚ÄùSeleziona lo spazio con l‚ÄôIBAN che vuoi cancellare (ricorda che questo canceller√† completamente lo spazio e che sar√† dunque necessario trasferire l‚Äôintero importo da un'altra parte)Vai a ‚ÄúImpostazioni Spaces‚Äù (clicca sull‚Äôicona dell‚Äôingranaggio in alto a destra)Sotto ‚ÄúGestisci‚Äù trovi l‚Äôopzione ‚ÄúSvuota e cancella lo spazio‚ÄùClicca e conferma di volere cancellare lo spazio separato dal conto principaleSeleziona il tuo conto principale o un altro spazio per spostare il saldo rimanenteInfine, sullo schermo comparir√† ‚ÄúElimina‚Äù. Clicca per confermare.
Puoi inviare anche bonifici SEPA dai tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale a cui hai assegnato un IBAN. Per farlo, segui i passaggi qui sotto:Vai sullo Space da cui desideri trasferire del denaro e tocca "Invia denaro"Seleziona "Bonifico bancario"Seleziona il contatto a cui vuoi inviare denaroConferma l'importo che intendi trasferire e inserisci una causale (opzionale)Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma e dai l'ok per completare il bonifico

question: O√π puis-je effectuer des retraits gratuits ?
answer: Avec votre Mastercard N26, vous b√©n√©ficiez d‚Äôun certain nombre de retraits gratuits, conform√©ment √† notre Politique d‚ÄôUtilisation √âquitable.Les retraits via CASH26 sont toujours gratuits dans les magasins partenaires.Vous pouvez aussi utiliser l'outil de g√©olocalisation de DAB de Mastercard (nouvel onglet) pour trouver les DAB qui vous permettront de retirer sans frais.*Pour les clients r√©sidant en Espagne : En Espagne, certains distributeurs automatiques de billets peuvent facturer des frais d‚Äôenviron 2 ‚Ç¨. √Ä l‚Äôheure actuelle, nous ne pouvons pas emp√™cher ces frais de vous √™tre factur√©s, mais nous pouvons vous aider √† √™tre rembours√©s si vous nous contactez directement via le LiveChat dans notre application. En attendant, voici une liste des banques dont les DAB peuvent √™tre utilis√©s gratuitement : AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicajaVous avez quand m√™me d√ª payer des frais de retrait ?

question: Come posso creare e modificare bonifici periodici?
answer: Quando effettui un bonifico dall'app mobile N26 o dalla Webapp (nuova tabella), hai la possibilit√† di creare un bonifico periodico.Ogni volta che completerai un bonifico in uscita, ti verr√† offerta l'opzione di "Salvare come bonifico programmato". Se selezionerai questa opzione, potrai inviare il bonifico allo stesso beneficiario periodicamente. Nella schermata successiva, inoltre, potrai scegliere la frequenza dell'invio, la data di inizio e di fine dell'operazione. Ecco come puoi visualizzare e impostare i bonifici periodici nell'app mobile N26:Accedi all'app N26 e apri la tua lista dei movimentiClicca sui tre puntini in alto a destra per Android, o sulle tre lineette orizzontali i per iOS.Seleziona "Prossimi pagamenti"Qui potrai controllare i bonifici periodici esistenti o crearne uno nuovo In questo menu √® possibile annullare e / o modificare i dettagli di tali transazioni. Per cancellare un bonifico periodico, trascinalo semplicemente fino all'icona del cestino. ‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Ricorda che, nel caso in cui un trasferimento periodico fallisca per insufficienza di fondi, non effettueremo nuovamente il bonifico, ma dovrai effettuare il bonifico manualmente.

question: Was sind Shared Spaces?
answer: Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk f√ºr eure Liebsten organisieren m√∂chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es m√∂glich.Premium-Kunden (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You oder N26 Business Metal) k√∂nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.Alle N26 Nutzer k√∂nnen teilnehmen, unabh√§ngig von ihren Kontotypen.Dem Besitzer geh√∂ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select ‚ÄúSend Money‚Äù then choose ‚ÄúBank Transfer‚Äù. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9.

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.¬†You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them

question: Come ottenere il mio PIN?
answer: Innanzitutto, bisogna sapere che con N26 si hanno due codici PIN diversi: uno √® il PIN di conferma e l'altro il PIN della carta. Ricorda: sei tu a creare entrambi.Il PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) deve essere inserito per confermare tutte le azioni eseguite all'interno dell'app, ad esempio bonifici, modifiche della password, CASH26, ecc. Crei questo PIN nell'app quando associ il tuo smartphone per la prima volta.Puoi modificarlo andando su Il mio conto > Sicurezza > Cambia il PIN di conferma.Il PIN della carta (nuova tabella) viene utilizzato per effettuare prelievi o pagare con la carta nei negozi. Puoi impostarlo tramite l'app non appena ricevi e attivi la tua carta N26.Puoi modificarlo andando su Carte > Impostazioni della carta > Reimposta il PIN. Dopo aver impostato il tuo nuovo codice PIN, dovrai prima effettuare un prelievo ATM affinch√© la modifica del PIN venga registrata (come quando attivi la tua carta per la prima volta).Importante:Non ti invieremo mai un PIN tramite posta o in nessuno dei nostri canali di comunicazione. Sei la sola persona che dovrebbe conoscere i tuoi PIN.Per ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1994, 1331 o 1234). Se il numero scelto non √® valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Per ulteriori dettagli su questi PIN, dai un'occhiata agli altri articoli del Support Center sull'argomento tramite i link sopra indicati.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.¬†Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What‚Äôs a ‚Äúbanking day‚Äù?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn‚Äôt arrived ‚Äî where is it?So what if you‚Äôve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn‚Äôt come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.
