question: Bank documents‚Äîa guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason‚Äîyou can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they‚Äôre perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here‚Äôs how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and‚Äîif you wish‚Äîit can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here‚Äôs how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you‚Äôve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You‚Äôll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient‚Äôs full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation‚Äîthe PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information‚Äîfull name, legal address, IBAN and BIC‚Äîspecific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM‚Äôs nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can‚Äôt reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2‚Ç¨.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for Support or have a Question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a ComplaintWe‚Äôre sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will investigate your complaint in full, and provide our findings and final response via email. Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Spanish reclamaciones.es@n26.com (new tab), or reclamaciones@n26.com (new tab) if you have a German (DE) IBAN.Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.¬†If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarized power of attorney form.In exceptional cases where you do not have access to send an email, we recommend reviewing your account terms and conditions or List of Prices to find the appropriate address for written correspondence. Our German postal address is:¬†N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint Handling TimesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within one month. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days¬†Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days¬†United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days¬†Spain - 60 Calendar Days¬†Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties.¬†Customers with a Spanish (ES) IBAN can also contact the following:Banco de Espa√±a - Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones located on Calle Alcal√° 48, 28014 MadridCustomers with a German (DE) IBAN can also contact the following:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)Applicable LegislationThe applicable Spanish legislation related to customer rights and transparency regulations is available on the official website of the Bank of Spain (new tab).Rulebook:Reglamento para la defensa del Cliente de N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en Espa√±a. (new tab)

question: How to rent a car with your N26 card?
answer:
In order to rent a car, the main driver is normally required to be a credit card holder, but recently an increasing number of car rental companies have been accepting debit cards due to their growing usage.As a result, our N26 debit card enables you to rent cars at a great number of companies. Here you‚Äôll find some of the agencies that currently accept debit cards:
AlamoAvisCentaurEnterpriseEuropcarFireflyJoy rentLocautoGreaterSicilyByCarThrifty car rentalBefore renting a vehicle, we suggest you contact the company: conditions for the rental depend on the single agencies so requirements may vary locally and nationally.We also recommend checking if the agency accepts debit cards when you reserve the car as well as when you collect it, and whether they require the card to have embossed numbers.Please also consider that:in case an unexpected or unjustified amount is charged, you‚Äôll first need to contact and possibly start a dispute with the agency. Only if the dispute has a negative outcome, we‚Äôll be able to offer our assistance to start a new dispute via Mastercard.the security deposit will be charged (and not authorized, as with credit cards). The deposit will then be credited back to your account after returning the car and if no damage is reported.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (‚Äútapping‚Äù your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:¬†Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen.

Diese Anforderungen sind unten aufgelistet:iPhone:Modell 5s und neueriOS 12 und h√∂herDeine iOS-Version kannst du unter Einstellungen > Allgemein > InfoAndroid:Android 6.0 oder h√∂her. Du findest deine Android-Version unter Einstellungen > √úber dein Ger√§tNative Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr Google ServicesDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? question: Perch√© devo aggiornare le mie informazioni personali?
answer:
A partire dalla met√† di agosto 2022, contatteremo i nostri clienti residenti in Italia e possessori di un conto N26 con Iban italiano, con lo scopo di verificare e mantenere aggiornati le loro informazioni personali.In qualit√† di banca, siamo tenuti per legge a mantenere le informazioni personali dei nostri clienti corrette e aggiornate, con l'obiettivo di prevenire l'utilizzo del sistema finanziario a fini di riciclaggio del denaro e finanziamento del terrorismo.¬†Questo processo prevede la verifica e l‚Äôaggiornamento periodico dei dati personali e la compilazione di un questionario di adeguata verifica, che include informazioni aggiuntive di carattere finanziario sui nostri clienti.¬†Quali informazioni devo aggiornare?Quando riceverai la nostra comunicazione in merito, effettuando il Login alla tua app N26, verrai immediatamente indirizzato al processo di aggiornamento delle tue informazioni personali.¬†Prima di procedere, assicurati di aver aggiornato l‚Äôapp all‚Äôultima versione disponibile. L‚Äôoperazione pu√≤ essere effettuata solo tramite l‚Äôapp associata al tuo smartphone (non verr√† visualizzata al tuo accesso dalla WebApp).Come primo passaggio ti verr√† chiesto di verificare e confermare i tuoi dati personali:Nome e cognomeLuogo e data di nascitaNazionalit√†Sesso anagraficoCodice FiscaleNel passaggio successivo, dovrai quindi convalidare il tuo indirizzo di residenza e il tuo indirizzo di domicilio, se diverso.¬†Come ultimo passaggio, ti verr√† richiesta la compilazione del questionario di adeguata verifica, al fine di assicurare l‚Äôintegrazione e l‚Äôaggiornamento di informazioni rilevanti richieste dalla normativa bancaria. Si tratta di una procedura veloce, l‚Äôoperazione ti richieder√† solo qualche minuto.Ti ricordiamo che, ai sensi della normativa in vigore, l'aggiornamento dei tuoi dati e il questionario dovranno essere completati anche se le tue informazioni sono rimaste invariate.Il trattamento dei tuoi dati, inoltre, √® soggetto al regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy (GDPR). Puoi trovare pi√π informazioni sulla nostra politica di privacy. (nuova tabella)Cos‚Äô√® il questionario di adeguata verifica?La normativa antiriciclaggio di cui al D.Lgs 231/2007 prevede che la banca sia tenuta a raccogliere regolarmente informazioni aggiornate sui propri clienti, con l'obiettivo di prevenire l'utilizzo del sistema finanziario a fini di riciclaggio e finanziamento del terrorismo.¬† e quale condizione per mantenere i rapporti e le operazioni tra i clienti e la banca.Per questo, ti sottoporremo un breve questionario,¬† all‚Äôinterno della tua app N26, dove ti chiederemo di rispondere ad una serie di domande riguardanti il tuo stato patrimoniale, il tuo attuale impiego, l‚Äôorigine dei fondi presenti sul tuo conto, il tuo reddito netto e l‚Äôuso che fai del tuo conto N26.¬†Verificheremo i dati da te inseriti e, se necessario, ti contatteremo in un secondo momento. Per questo, assicurati di avere la tua app aggiornata all‚Äôultima versione disponibile e di monitorare sempre le comunicazioni in arrivo nei "Messaggi da N26" dalla sezione "Supporto" della tua app.Cosa succede se non completo la procedura come richiesto?Ti invitiamo a compilare al pi√π presto l‚Äôoperazione, cos√¨ da poter continuare ad avere pieno accesso a tutte le funzionalit√† del tuo conto N26.¬†Nel caso in cui le informazioni non vengano aggiornate entro un congruo termine N26 sar√† obbligata ad astenersi dal proseguire il rapporto contrattuale con il cliente (art. 42 D.Lgs. 231/2007).
Dopo i primi 30 giorni, sarai ancora in grado di completare il questionario, ma saremo costretti a limitare temporaneamente alcune funzionalit√† del tuo conto (ad esempio i pagamenti in entrata, come lo stipendio) fino a quando non avrai soddisfatto questo requisito normativo.¬†

question: Cos'√® N26 Business?
answer: Il conto N26 Business √® un conto corrente business digitale, sicuro e intuitivo, che puoi aprire in pochi minuti. √à incredibilmente semplice, trasparente e gratuito* e ti permette di ricevere pagamenti dai clienti, inviare denaro e spenderlo in piena sicurezza tenendo le finanze della tua attivit√† completamente separate da quelle personali.¬†I nostri conti Business sono riservati esclusivamente per:liberi professionisti iscritti ad un albo o ordine professionale (ad esempio architetti, avvocati, farmacisti, infermieri...),¬†freelance, ovvero lavoratori autonomi e imprenditori individuali in possesso di una partita IVA (come designer, fotografi, elettricisti o i titolari di B&B e casa vacanza con partita IVA).ditte individuali iscritte al Registro Imprese della Camera di Commercio.Cosa include un conto N26 Business?Ecco tutte le caratteristiche e funzionalit√† offerte con N26 Business:Conto Business gratuito*: N26 Business √® gratuito, senza commissioni di gestione del conto (*in caso di saldo pari o superiore a 50.000 ‚Ç¨ potrebbe essere applicata una commissione sulla custodia).Carta virtuale: il conto include una carta virtuale (nuova tabella) Mastercard gratuita, concepita esclusivamente per uso commerciale. La carta virtuale ha un numero PAN completo pronto per essere aggiunto ad Apple Pay o Google Pay per gli acquisti online e in negozio. Puoi anche utilizzare gli sportelli bancomat con funzionalit√† contactless per prelevare contanti con Apple Pay o Google Pay.Mastercard N26 fisica: al costo di 10‚Ç¨ aggiuntivi puoi avere una carta di debito fisica N26 per uso commerciale (ti ricordiamo che √® necessario che il saldo del tuo conto sia di almeno 10‚Ç¨ per avviare la produzione e spedizione della carta).Carta Maestro: se hai bisogno di una carta anche per le tue spese private e apri il tuo N26 Business in Germania, Austria o nei Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta¬†Maestro al costo di 10‚Ç¨.Pagamenti e bonifici: puoi inviare e ricevere bonifici SEPA utilizzando la tua app mobile N26. Inoltre, potrai inviare bonifici istantanei ad altri clienti N26 utilizzando MoneyBeam. A differenza di altri conti, N26 Business non consente di effettuare bonifici in valuta estera direttamente dall‚Äôapp. Per eseguirli, vai su Wise (nuova tabella).Cashback aziendale: ogni mese riceverai lo 0,1% di cashback su tutti i pagamenti effettuati con la carta. Il conto N26 Business non supporta i pagamenti business to business (B2B).Quali sono i limiti di utilizzo dei conti N26 Business?I limiti massimi giornalieri delle Mastercard N26 Business (importo totale entro le 24 ore) per i pagamenti con carta sono:Prelievi bancomat: 2.500‚Ç¨¬†Pagamenti in negozio o online: 5.000‚Ç¨Il limite mensile per i pagamenti con carta √® di 20.000‚Ç¨ .Puoi impostare i tuoi limiti (nuova tabella) di prelievo bancomat e di pagamento direttamente nell'app selezionando Carte.Ricorda: se apri il tuo conto N26 Business You o N26 Business Metal in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro per le tue spese personali.¬†I limiti massimi giornalieri (nell'arco di 24 ore) per i bonifici bancari sono:MoneyBeam a clienti N26: 1.000 ‚Ç¨Bonifici istantanei: 100.000 ‚Ç¨Bonifici in uscita: Nessun limiteI bonifici in valuta estera (nuova tabella) non sono possibili con N26 Business dalla app ma direttamente dal sito di Wise (nuova tabella).I pagamenti B2B (transazioni tra imprese industriali e commerciali) non sono supportati.Link utili:Chi pu√≤ aprire un conto N26 Business?

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above ‚Ç¨150 will be charged with a 12.50‚Ç¨ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than ‚Ç¨150.The maximum fee is ‚Ç¨100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: We offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your¬†overdraft¬†or loan with¬†N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:¬†üë§¬†My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. question: How to close my account?
answer: We‚Äôre sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We‚Äôd love to keep you as a customer‚Äîtell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.¬†If you‚Äôve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here‚Äôs what to do:Make your account balance ‚Ç¨0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is ‚Ç¨0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You‚Äôll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you‚Äôre unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or ‚Äúas soon as possible‚ÄùYour full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we‚Äôll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
answer: Die kontaktlose Bezahlung mit deiner Karte erfolgt per Nahfeldkommunikation (NFC). Bei Problemen mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlung solltest du Folgendes beachten:√úberpr√ºfe, ob in deinen Karteneinstellungen die kontaktlose Bezahlung aktiviert ist.Wenn deine Karte neu ist, musst du sie zuvor einmal an einem Geldautomaten oder an einem Zahlungsterminal mit Chip & PIN benutzt haben. Erst danach kannst du sie auch f√ºr die kontaktlose Bezahlung verwenden.Bei kontaktlosen Zahlungen mit deiner Karte (NFC) bis zu 50 ‚Ç¨ ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich. Bei Zahlungen √ºber 50 ‚Ç¨ oder kumulativen Zahlungen √ºber 150‚Ç¨ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.Frage den H√§ndler, ob das Zahlungsterminal die kontaktlose Bezahlung auch tats√§chlich unterst√ºtzt.Bei N26 Metal Karten befindet sich die NFC-Funktion nur auf der R√ºckseite der Karte. Achte darauf, dass du die R√ºckseite der Karte an das Terminal h√§ltst, um kontaktlos zu zahlen (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).Du musst deine Karte direkt an die NFC-kompatible Oberfl√§che des Zahlungsterminals halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell weggezogen oder sie nicht nahe genug an die Oberfl√§che gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.Wenn die kontaktlose Bezahlung nicht funktioniert, versuche bitte immer die Zahlung mit Chip & PIN abzuschlie√üen.

question: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
answer: Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch f√ºr Kredite an unsere Kunden zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen (sofern diese √ºber eine entsprechende Bonit√§t verf√ºgen). F√ºr die nicht im Kundengesch√§ft ben√∂tigte Liquidit√§t ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europ√§ischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschlie√ülich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir √∂ffentlich-rechtliche Kunden haupts√§chlich in Deutschland (St√§dte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das hei√üt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.Und wir t√§tigen auch keine Spekulationsgesch√§fte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

question: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
answer: 3D Secure sch√ºtzt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zus√§tzlichen Passw√∂rter.Wenn du eine¬†Online-Zahlung¬†mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, best√§tigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unseren¬†Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verkn√ºpfte Smartphone gesendet.Wenn du einen Kauf √ºber dein Smartphone t√§tigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf best√§tigen und abschlie√üen kannst. Danach gehst du zur√ºck zur Website des H√§ndlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine Best√§tigung f√ºr deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.

question: Warum gibt es eine Warteliste f√ºr die Anmeldung?
answer: Um in Zukunft eine noch st√§rkere Grundlage f√ºr unser Gesch√§ft zu schaffen, konzentrieren wir uns auf unser Serviceerlebnis, Produktangebote und unsere Prozesse.Angesichts der √ºberw√§ltigenden Nachfrage nach den digitalen Banking-Produkten von N26 werden wir die Anzahl der neuen Bankkonten, die wir jeden Monat anbieten k√∂nnen, vor√ºbergehend limitieren.¬†Darum m√ºssen wir die Aufnahme von neuen Nutzern in bestimmten M√§rkten vor√ºbergehend aussetzen. Wir bitten dich, dich in unsere Warteliste anzumelden. Wir werden uns bei dir melden, sobald wir dir das Konto deiner Wahl anbieten k√∂nnen.Wird sich diese Pause auf bestehende Nutzer auswirken?Diese vor√ºbergehende Pause bei Neuanmeldungen hat keinerlei Auswirkungen auf bestehende N26 Nutzer ‚Äì und als Nutzer kannst du auf deinem Smartphone dasselbe nahtlose, sichere und gesch√ºtzte digitale Banking-Erlebnis erwarten, das du kennen und lieben gelernt hast.Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck daran, den Anmeldeprozess f√ºr alle Nutzer so reibungslos wie m√∂glich zu gestalten und gehen davon aus, dass wir bald neue Konten f√ºr alle Nutzer er√∂ffnen k√∂nnen.Wie erfahre ich, wann es f√ºr mich wieder m√∂glich sein wird, ein Konto zu er√∂ffnen?Wenn du versucht hast, ein Konto zu er√∂ffnen und dies nicht m√∂glich war, ist es am besten, wenn du dich auf unserer Warteliste eintr√§gst. Wir melden uns bei dir, sobald wir dir das Konto deiner Wahl zur Verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.Da wir nach wie vor eine enorme Nachfrage nach unserem Produkt erleben, wollen wir sicherstellen, dass wir allen Nutzern in unserer Warteliste einen fairen Zugang zum N26 Banking-Erlebnis bieten k√∂nnen. Deshalb setzen wir uns in der Reihenfolge der Warteliste mit den Nutzern in Verbindung, sobald wir ihnen ein Konto anbieten k√∂nnen.¬†Kann ich in meinem Land ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen?

question: Wie kann ich eine N26 Versicherung abschlie√üen?
answer: Mit der neuen On-Demand-Versicherung von N26 k√∂nnen alle unsere Kunden ihr Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Smartwatch und andere elektronische Ger√§te gegen Diebstahl, Einbruch, Raub, versehentliche Sch√§den und Wassersch√§den versichern lassen. Du kannst die Versicherung direkt in deiner N26 App oder Web-App (neuen Tab) abschlie√üen und jederzeit auf Wunsch wieder k√ºndigen ‚Äì ganz ohne l√§stigen Papierkram.Wie funktioniert N26 Versicherung?Wenn du die Versicherung abschlie√üen m√∂chtest, melde dich einfach in deiner N26 App oder Web-App an, gehe auf Entdecken und klicke auf das dort angezeigte Banner "Versicherung".Du wirst anschlie√üend aufgefordert, ein paar Details zu deinem Endger√§t einzugeben. W√§hle die monatliche oder j√§hrliche Zahlungsoption aus und best√§tige die Anfrage. Nach Abschluss der Versicherungspolice ist die Versicherung f√ºr dein Smartphone ab dem Folgetag aktiv und du kannst sie jederzeit √ºber deine N26 App oder deine Web-App (neuen Tab) k√ºndigen.Wie kann ich einen Versicherungsanspruch geltend machen?Du kannst einen Versicherungsanspruch √ºber das Onlineportal von Simplesurance (neuen Tab) geltend machen. Dazu musst du dich mit deiner Zertifikatsnummer und Zertifikats-PIN anmelden. Diese findest du auf deinem Versicherungszertifikat, das du via Nachrichten von N26 erhalten hast.Jeder Kunde ist berechtigt, maximal zwei Anspr√ºche pro Jahr einzureichen. Nach der zweiten Inanspruchnahme der Versicherungsleistung erlischt die Versicherung automatisch. Weitere Informationen findest du in den Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen, die dir direkt nach dem Versicherungsabschluss an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse geschickt werden. Dar√ºber hinaus kannst du dich jederzeit an support@simplesurance.de wenden, wenn du Informationen zu deinem Versicherungsschein oder einem gemeldeten Schadensfall ben√∂tigst.Bin ich dazu berechtigt?Die N26 Versicherung ist f√ºr alle unsere Kunden verf√ºgbar. N26 Metal Kunden k√∂nnen lediglich nicht ihr Handy versichern, da sie bereits im Rahmen ihrer Metal-Mitgliedschaft eine Handyversicherung haben. Bitte vergewissere dich, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast. N26 Versicherung ist derzeit f√ºr Kunden in √ñsterreich, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Deutschland erh√§ltlich.Diese Versicherung gilt nicht f√ºr Ger√§te, die au√üerhalb Europas gekauft werden.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you‚Äôll want to go to the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a new space‚Äô in the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepageSelect one of the below options:‚ÄòSaving for a goal‚Äô - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‚ÄòSharing money‚Äô - Allows you to create a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.‚ÄòCreate now, decide later‚Äô - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let‚Äôs start using ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‚ÄòMain Account‚Äô or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‚Äòmanage‚ÄôThen press ‚ÄòLock Space‚Äô or ‚ÄòUnlock Space‚ÄôEnter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‚ÄòSettings‚Äô cog (top-right corner)Select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‚ÄòManage‚Äô:To create a savings goal, select ‚ÄòCreate my goal‚Äô (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‚ÄòSet goal‚ÄôTo enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‚ÄòManage Round-UpsToggle ‚ÄòEnable Round-Ups‚ÄôYou will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a rule‚ÄôChoose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: ¬øQu√© pasa si rechazan mi IBAN de N26?
answer: Si abriste la cuenta en Espa√±a despu√©s del 17 de abril de 2019, tu IBAN es espa√±ol. Dicho IBAN tiene el c√≥digo de pa√≠s ES, un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, luego los 10 d√≠gitos del c√≥digo de entidad financiera, despu√©s 2 d√≠gitos de control y, por √∫ltimo, los 10 d√≠gitos de tu n√∫mero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:¬†ES XX 1563 2626 XX 326XXXXXXX.En cambio, si la abriste antes del 17 de abril de 2019, o despu√©s de esa fecha pero fuera de Espa√±a, tu IBAN es alem√°n. Este tiene el c√≥digo de pa√≠s DE, un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, el c√≥digo bancario de 8 d√≠gitos y, por √∫ltimo, los 10 d√≠gitos de tu n√∫mero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Los pa√≠ses que est√°n en la zona SEPA (Zona √önica de pagos en Euros) han acordado el sistema de IBAN para simplificar los pagos tanto nacionales como internacionales, y para reducir el riesgo de error en la comunicaci√≥n y en el procesamiento de transacciones.Los comerciantes y empresas que no aceptan el IBAN de otros estados miembros del Espacio Econ√≥mico Europeo (EEE), est√°n violando la legislaci√≥n europea desde el 1 de febrero de 2016 (Art√≠culo 9 del¬†Reglamento No. 260/2012 (pesta√±a nueva)).Si te ves afectado por una discriminaci√≥n de IBAN, te pedimos que te pongas en contacto con las¬† (pesta√±a nueva)autoridades competentes (pesta√±a nueva)¬†directamente y des parte del incidente. Facilita tu informaci√≥n de contacto, el nombre de la empresa o del comerciante que no acepte el IBAN y una descripci√≥n del incidente (incluyendo capturas de pantalla del rechazo o cualquier otra documentaci√≥n de tu comunicaci√≥n con ellos).

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card: 30‚Ç¨Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25‚Ç¨Reordering your card 65‚Ç¨

question: Was ist CASH26?
answer: F√ºr Konten verf√ºgbar, die in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland er√∂ffnet wurden.CASH26 ist ein integriertes Feature in deiner N26 App, mit dem du √ºber dein Smartphone Geld von deinem N26 Konto abheben und einzahlen kannst ‚Äì komplett ohne Karte und Geldautomat.Geh einfach in eines unserer √ºber 12.100 Partnergesch√§fte in Deutschland (inkl. REWE, Penny und dm) und 2.600 Partnergesch√§fte in √ñsterreich (inkl. dm, Billa, Billa Plus, und PENNY), erstelle einen CASH26 Strichcode auf deinem verkn√ºpften Smartphone und zeige ihn an der Kasse vor.Wie du Geld mit CASH26 einzahlen bzw. √ºber CASH26 Geld abheben kannst, erf√§hrst du in diesem Artikel.Wie funktioniert CASH26?CASH26 EinzahlungDer Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang g√ºltig. Falls du ihn nicht innerhalb dieser Zeit nutzt, verf√§llt er und du musst einen neuen erstellen.¬†Wenn du Geld √ºber CASH26 einzahlst, kannst du sofort darauf zugreifen. Es kann jedoch sein, dass der Betrag erst bis zu 10 Minuten sp√§ter in deinem Kontostand erscheint.Wie viel Geld kann ich einzahlen?Der Mindestbetrag f√ºr eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 ‚Ç¨. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 ‚Ç¨ einzahlen.Es f√§llt eine Transaktionsgeb√ºhr von 1,5 % des Einzahlbetrags an ‚Äì ganz gleich, wie viel oder wenig Geld du einzahlst.Zus√§tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit f√ºr Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in H√∂he von 999‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden.Mit CASH26 Geld abhebenSobald du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellst hast, wird der Betrag, den du abheben willst, von deinem Kontostand abgezogen.Falls du dich umentscheidest und den Code vor der Nutzung l√∂schst oder ihn nach 10 Minuten verfallen l√§sst, wird der Betrag deinem Kontostand sofort wieder gutgeschrieben.Wie viel Geld kann man abheben?Das Abhebelimit betr√§gt 200 ‚Ç¨ pro Transaktion sowie 900 ‚Ç¨ innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag ‚Äì du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Abhebungen mit CASH26 sind f√ºr alle unsere Konten kostenlos, au√üer f√ºr das N26 Flex Konto. Bei diesem entf√§llt auf jede Abhebung eine Geb√ºhr von 2‚Ç¨. Zus√§tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit f√ºr Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in H√∂he von 999‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden.

question: Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?
answer:
Come aggiungere un partecipante ad uno Spazio Condiviso:Accedi allo Space e clicca sull'icona con il + in altro a destraSeleziona la persona che vuoi aggiungere dalla tua lista di contatti.Accetta le condizioni del servizio e conferma cliccando su 'Rilascia la procura'.
Come rimuovere un partecipante da uno Spazio Condiviso:Accedi allo Space e clicca sui 3 puntini in alto a destra.Dalla lista dei ‚ÄòParticipanti‚Äô, tocca sulla freccia che si trova sulla destra del nome del partecipante che vuoi rimuovere. Seleziona ‚ÄòRevoca procura generale‚Äô.Conferma la notifica che appare in basso cliccando di nuovo 'Revoca procura generale'.Come partecipare ad uno Spazio Condiviso:Nella schermata dello Space, tocca lo Space con l'icona "In attesa" e l'icona dello Spazio Condiviso.Leggi le istruzioni su Spazi Condivisi e prosegui alla schermata della Procura.Una volta che hai letto e compreso le informazioni sulla Procura legale, spunta la casella e tocca il pulsante 'Concedi procura'.Inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma.Conferma la notifica push ‚ÄòAccetta Procura Legale‚Äô tramite il tuo smartphone associato.Dovrai avere abbastanza Space liberi per poter accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso. Se non ne hai, potrai procedere solo se cancelli altri Space(s) per fare spazio ad un altro.Inoltre, non potrai avere Space aperti con lo stesso nome o immagine dello Spazio Condiviso. Potrai accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso solo una volta cambiato il nome/immagine dell'altro Space. Come lasciare uno Spazio Condiviso:Nella schermata dello Space, clicca sul men√π indicato dai 3 puntini in alto a destra.Nelle impostazioni, tocca su ‚ÄòAbbandona Spazio Condiviso‚Äô.Conferma la notifica che appare sullo schermo, e clicca di nuovo ‚ÄòAbbandona Spazio Condiviso‚Äô.Uno Spazio Condiviso pu√≤ essere creato e modificato sia nell'app mobile N26 sia nella Webapp (nuova tabella).Questa funzione √® al momento disponibile solo per conti Premium con IBAN Tedesco e Spagnolo. question: Que faire face au rejet de votre IBAN N26 ?

Il se pr√©sente ainsi : DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Les pays membres de l'espace SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area ou Espace unique de paiement en Euros) se sont mis d'accord pour utiliser un syst√®me bas√© sur l'IBAN afin de faciliter les paiements nationaux et internationaux et de limiter le risque d'erreurs dans la communication et le traitement des transactions.Les commer√ßants et employeurs qui n'acceptent pas tous les IBAN des pays de l‚ÄôEspace √©conomique europ√©en violent en r√©alit√© la loi europ√©enne du 1er F√©vrier 2016 (art. 9 de¬†la directive europ√©enne n¬∞260/2012 (nouvel onglet)).Dans le cas o√π vous seriez victime de ce que l'on appelle une ¬´ discrimination √† l'IBAN ¬ª, nous vous prions de contacter votre autorit√© nationale comp√©tente (nouvel onglet)¬†en l'informant de la situation. Nous vous recommandons de toujours indiquer votre nom complet, vos coordonn√©es (email, num√©ro de t√©l√©phone, adresse‚Ä¶), le nom du commer√ßant ou de l‚Äôemployeur qui refuse votre IBAN, une br√®ve description du probl√®me et si possible, des captures d‚Äô√©crans prouvant que votre IBAN a bien √©t√© refus√©.

question: Puis-je continuer √† utiliser ma carte apr√®s son expiration¬†?

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They‚Äôre able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that‚Äôs growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you‚Äôve received an unexpected message:If you‚Äôve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you‚Äôve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you‚Äôre ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We‚Äôre always here to help!

question: What are the benefits of N26 You?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Comment prot√©ger mes donn√©es bancaires en ligne ?
answer: Que vous fassiez des achats, des transactions bancaires ou que vous g√©riez votre bo√Æte de r√©ception, voici quelques astuces pour garantir une s√©curit√© optimale et prot√©ger vos donn√©es personnelles dans cette √®re num√©rique.Mettez r√©guli√®rement √† jour votre application N26 et votre syst√®me d‚Äôexploitation mobile, pour recevoir les derni√®res corrections et ajustements des syst√®mes de s√©curit√©.Utilisez l'analyse d‚Äôempreinte digitale ou la reconnaissance faciale pour vous connecter.Cr√©ez des mots de passe forts et robustes en privil√©giant les combinaisons de lettres, de chiffres et de symboles ainsi que majuscules et minuscules et n‚Äôutilisez jamais le m√™me mot de passe pour diff√©rents comptes.Ne publiez jamais d‚Äôinformations personnelles sensibles en ligne sur les r√©seaux sociaux.Faites attention aux connexions Wi-Fi partag√©es ou publiques, choisissez toujours des connexions s√©curis√©es WPA2 plut√¥t que WEP, et utilisez un VPN si possible.Choisissez des fournisseurs d'e-mail s√©curis√©s avec des filtres de courrier ind√©sirable et authentification √† deux facteurs, tels que Gmail, Yahoo ou d‚Äôautres fournisseurs de r√©f√©rence.M√©fiez-vous des offres trop belles pour √™tre vraies. Ce sont probablement des arnaques.Faites vos achats uniquement sur des sites internet dignes de confiance de marchands connus et reconnus par les autorit√©s.V√©rifiez que les sites internet sont s√©curis√©s, cherchez le cadenas √† c√¥t√© de l‚Äôadresse URL et examinez les identifiants en un simple clic.Activez la g√©olocalisation sur votre application N26, pour nous permettre d'identifier les transactions irr√©guli√®res que n'avez certainement pas effectu√©es.Si vous pensez que les d√©tails de votre compte ou de votre carte ont √©t√© compromis, modifiez votre mot de passe et r√©f√©rez-vous √† notre article Que faire si j‚Äôai l‚Äôimpression que mon compte a √©t√© pirat√© ?

question: Ablaufen und Ersatz von Karten: H√§ufig gestellte Fragen
answer: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erh√§ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.¬†Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren m√∂chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine pers√∂nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Meine Karte l√§uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wenn deine Karte bald abl√§uft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu best√§tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.¬†Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit g√ºltig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die M√∂glichkeit, deine Adresse zu best√§tigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gem√§√ü den √∂rtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Bitte beachte: Wenn du deine neue Mastercard erhalten und aktiviert hast, musst du deine Zahlungsdaten f√ºr alle deine Abos und wiederkehrenden Zahlungen aktualisieren. Auf diese Weise kannst du verhindern, dass deine zuk√ºnftigen Zahlungen abgelehnt werden.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten G√ºltigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erh√§ltst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Ersatzkarten sind f√ºr alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erh√§ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten er√∂ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den L√§ndern, in denen N26 verf√ºgbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europ√§ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ans√§ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterst√ºtzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung f√ºr dich vornehmen k√∂nnen. Der Versand au√üerhalb dieser L√§nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zus√§tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.¬†Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten f√ºr ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In l√§ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch l√§nger dauern. Um √ºber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!¬†Wenn du deine Adresse bereits best√§tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen.¬†Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht best√§tigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu best√§tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen.¬†

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Insights¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
answer: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

question: Pourquoi des frais ont √©t√© pr√©lev√©s lors d‚Äôun retrait en distributeur automatique ?

Dans ce cas, le DAB doit afficher la somme de ces frais avant que vous finalisiez votre retrait. Dans la liste de vos transactions, ces frais sont ajout√©s au montant de votre retrait. Cela ne concerne pas les d√©tenteurs de comptes N26 You / Business You ou N26 Metal / Business Metal.Des frais peuvent s‚Äôappliquer si vous retirez de l‚Äôargent avec votre carte Maestro.¬†Pour les cartes Maestro, uniquement disponibles en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas, 2 euros sont pr√©lev√©s sur tous les retraits (en euros et en devises √©trang√®res).Pour savoir o√π se trouvent les distributeurs les plus proches de vous, vous pouvez consulter la carte des DAB √† proximit√©, disponible depuis votre application mobile.Vous pouvez consulter un aper√ßu de¬†nos tarifs sur notre site web (nouvel onglet).

question: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
answer: Falls du zurzeit auf eine Karte wartest, warte bitte den gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraum ab, die im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App angezeigt wird.Wenn du eine neue Karte bestellen musst, √ºberpr√ºfe zun√§chst deine Lieferanschrift unter: üë§ Mein Konto > Pers√∂nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, f√ºge diesen unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls zutreffend, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und T√ºrnummer unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in Erw√§gung und gib die k√ºnftige Wohnadresse an.Falls deine erste N26 Karte innerhalb des gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraums nicht angekommen ist, √∂ffne bitte einen Live Chat direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking.Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, kannst du deine neue Karte so in der App bestellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten unten rechts.W√§hle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, die du nachbestellen willst.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Neue Karte bestellen.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterst√ºtzen. Erfahre mehr √ºber die digitalen Nutzungsm√∂glichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Wie viel kostet eine neue Karte?Standardlieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 10‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 45‚Ç¨Express-Lieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Bitte beachte: Falls du auf deine erste N26 Karte wartest und deine Lieferanschrift von Anfang an richtig war, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking.¬†

question: Come fare un reclamo?
answer: Ti serve supporto tecnico oppure hai una domanda?Se hai bisogno di assistenza con il tuo conto, con una controversie sui pagamenti con carta, con la modifica dei tuoi dati o semplicemente vuoi porre una domanda, scopri Come contattare N26 qui.Come presentare un reclamo?Un reclamo pu√≤ essere presentato¬† inviando una email, a seconda della tua lingua di preferenza, a:reclami@n26.com (nuova tabella) - in italianocomplaints@n26.com (nuova tabella) - in inglesePuoi¬† inviare un reclamo anche attraverso un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata (PEC) a:reclami@pec.n26.com (nuova tabella) (in italiano o in inglese)Ti preghiamo di contattarci solo tramite la nostra app o via email, poich√© non siamo in grado di servire i clienti di persona. Se non puoi contattarci tramite app o email, invia un reclamo scritto (in forma di lettera) all'indirizzo postale centrale:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinTi ricordiamo di considerare questi recapiti solo nel caso tu voglia presentare un reclamo. Per assistenza tecnica ti invitiamo a rivolgerti invece al nostro Servizio Clienti che ti aiuter√† a risolvere il tuo problema velocemente. Il nostro Servizio Clienti √® disponibile tutti i giorni dalle 07:00 alle 23:00, comprese le domeniche e i festivi.Quando presenti un reclamo, includi sempre:una descrizione dettagliata del tuo reclamoil prodotto o il servizio di cui non sei soddisfattola data in cui il problema si e presentatopuoi anche allegare qualsiasi documentazione di supporto relativa al tuo reclamo (ad es. Screenshots, email, ecc.)la tua richiestaTi ricordiamo che possiamo gestire le richieste relative al tuo conto corrente esclusivamente se ci contatti dall'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26.Qualora il reclamo venga presentato per mezzo di un rappresentante √® necessario che sia accompagnato da apposita procura autenticata.Ti invieremo un‚Äôe-mail per confermare la ricezione. Nel caso in cui avessimo bisogno di ulteriori informazioni, il nostro Ufficio Reclami ti contatter√† direttamente via e-mail.Una volta che il nostro Ufficio Reclami avr√† effettuato le dovute indagini sul tuo caso, ti comunicheremo la nostra decisione finale tramite email. Se il reclamo √® ritenuto fondato, N26 ti comunicher√† le iniziative che si impegna ad assumere ed i relativi tempi di realizzazione. Se il reclamo √® ritenuto infondato, N26 provveder√† a fornirti un‚Äôillustrazione chiara delle motivazioni del rigetto ed, inoltre, indicazioni sulla possibilit√† di ricorrere a strumenti alternativi per la risoluzione della controversia.Ti preghiamo di notare che i reclami presentati con modalit√† diverse da quelle sopra esposte oppure inviati a indirizzi diversi da quelli indicati, si considereranno pervenuti nel momento in cui saranno recapitati all‚ÄôUfficio Reclami.¬†Tempistiche per la gestione dei reclamiN26 si impegna a rispondere entro 15 giorni lavorativi per i reclami relativi ai servizi di pagamento come bonifici, disposizioni permanenti di pagamenti, addebiti su carte di debito e altro, in applicazione alla Direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento (nuova tabella) (PSD2). Nel caso in cui non sia possibile per noi rispettare il termine di 15 giorni, N26 invier√† una risposta interlocutoria indicando le ragioni del ritardo e il termine entro il quale verr√† fornita la risposta definitiva, in ogni caso entro il termine massimo di 35 giorni lavorativi.I reclami relativi ad operazioni e servizi bancari e finanziari (diversi dai servizi di pagamento) saranno risolti entro 60 giorni solari.Se hai aperto un conto corrente¬† in un paese diverso dall‚ÄôItalia, i termini relativi alla gestione dei reclami non relativi a servizi di pagamento sono i seguenti:Germania e Austria - 15 giorni lavorativiAltri paesi europei - 15 giorni lavorativiIrlanda - 40 giorni lavorativiFrancia - 56 giorni solariRegno Unito - 56 giorni solariSpagna - 60 giorni solariSe non riceviamo una tua risposta, potremmo chiudere il tuo reclamo. Se ci contatterai di nuovo in un secondo momento, apriremo un nuovo file e forniremo un nuovo numero di riferimento del reclamo.Non sei soddisfatto della risoluzione proposta?Nel caso in cui non riuscissimo a trovare una soluzione soddisfacente, potrai rivolgerti a diversi sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie. Se possiedi un conto corrente N26 con termini e condizioni italiani √® possibile:presentare un ricorso all‚ÄôArbitro Bancario Finanziario¬†rivolgersi al Conciliatore Bancario FinanziarioI sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie intervengono nel momento in cui il cliente non riceve risposta oppure se la risoluzione proposta √® ritenuta insoddisfacente. In alternativa, potrai ricorrere ad un altro organismo specializzato iscritto nell‚Äôapposito registro tenuto dal Ministero della Giustizia. L‚Äôelenco degli organismi di mediazione √® disponibile sul sito www.giustizia.it (nuova tabella).Se hai aperto un conto corrente N26 fuori dall‚ÄôItalia √® possibile contattare uno dei seguenti organi arbitrali:la Banca Federale Tedesca (Deutsche Bundesbank)l‚ÄôAutorit√† federale tedesca di vigilanza finanziaria (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht - BaFin).Per una lista completa degli enti di risoluzione delle controversie, consulta la nostra pagina Imprint (nuova tabella).Reportistica annualeRendiconto sull'attivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2019 (nuova tabella)Rendiconto sull‚Äôattivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l‚Äôanno 2020 (nuova tabella)Rendiconto sull'attivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2021 (nuova tabella)

question: What is Phishing?
answer: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If you‚Äôd like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. We‚Äôll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‚Äòeml‚Äô file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.¬†Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can‚Äôt use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:¬†Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.¬†Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the ‚Äúphone spoofing‚Äù technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that‚Äôs being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps they‚Äôre offering limited-time promotional deals. It‚Äôs important to note that just because ‚ÄúN26‚Äù is part of the URL, this doesn‚Äôt necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect you‚Äôre on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesn‚Äôt, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.¬†

question: Shared Spaces - Vertrauensw√ºrdiger Empf√§nger
answer: Vertrauensw√ºrdige Empf√§nger eines Shared Spaces k√∂nnen:Geld von ihren eigenen Spaces (inklusive anderer Shared Spaces, in denen sie Teilnehmer sind) zu einem Shared Space √ºberweisen.Jederzeit frei auf das Guthaben eines Shared Spaces zugreifen.Einen Shared Space jederzeit verlassen.√úberweisungen zwischen vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§ngern und einem Shared Space m√ºssen nicht mit einer PIN und Push-Nachricht autorisiert werden. Das bedeutet, dass die Empf√§nger per Drag-and-Drop Geld verschieben k√∂nnen, √§hnlich wie bei normalen Space-Transaktionen in der N26 App oder WebApp.Warum muss ich einen Besitzer oder einen Teilnehmer als vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger bestimmen?Das europ√§ische Bankrecht regelt, wie Bank√ºberweisungen autorisiert werden m√ºssen. Hiernach ist die Anwendung einer starken Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA) eine Ma√ünahme, um Online-Zahlungen sicherer zu machen.¬†Eine Ausnahme hiervon bildet die Klassifizierung einer Person in einem Shared Space als "vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger". √úberweisungen an diese Person bed√ºrfen keiner starken Kundenauthentifizierung.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

question: Come fare una richiesta di risarcimento?
answer: L‚Äôiscrizione a¬†N26 You (nuova tabella)¬†e¬†N26 Metal (nuova tabella)¬†comprende un‚Äôampia gamma di prestazioni assicurative, coperte dal nostro partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*Per segnalare un reclamo, accedi alla tua app, vai su üë§Il mio conto > Il tuo conto > Copertura assicurativa Allianz.Li troverai:Una guida per presentare la richiesta di risarcimento (ad es. ritardo del volo o del bagaglio, furto del telefono cellulare, estensione della garanzia o cancellazione del viaggio)Le informazioni del tuo conto N26, incluso il numero di polizza AllianzL‚Äôopzione per contattare Allianz direttamente in caso di emergenza medicaPer le emergenze, tieni a portata di mano le seguenti informazioni:L‚Äôindirizzo completo e il numero di telefono del luogo in cui ti troviI nomi di tutti i contatti ufficiali (dottori, ospedali e/o polizia)Una descrizione precisa della situazione*Allianz Global Assistance Europe √® un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

question: Wie kann ich zu N26 Smart upgraden?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Gilt f√ºr Belgien, D√§nemark, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Island, Italien, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, √ñsterreich, die Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Schweden, die Slowakei, Slowenien und Spanien.N26 Smart ist √ºber die Erstanmeldung eines Kontos oder √ºber ein Upgrade in der mobilen App verf√ºgbar, wenn du bereits ein Standardkonto hast.Um das Upgrade auf N26 Smart in der App durchzuf√ºhren, √∂ffnest du einfach die Registerkarte Entdecken und w√§hlst Entdecke N26 Smart aus. Mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte kannst du aus unseren f√ºnf neuen Farben w√§hlen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.W√§hle dann deine bevorzugte Versandmethode, akzeptiere die Gesch√§ftsbedingungen von N26 Smart und schon ist deine neue Karte zu dir unterwegs.Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu 10 Werktage, Expresslieferungen 3 Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 4,90 ‚Ç¨ wird jeden Monat am Tag des Upgrades direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht.Die Mindestvertragslaufzeit f√ºr die N26 Smart Mitgliedschaft betr√§gt ein Jahr.
