question: Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?
answer: So entfernen Besitzer einen Teilnehmer aus einem Shared Space:Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.Tippe auf den Pfeil rechts neben des Namen des jeweiligen Teilnehmers in der Teilnehmerliste (iOS). Wenn du ein Android-Ger√§t verwendest, tippe einfach auf den Namen des Teilnehmers.Tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf dem n√§chsten Bildschirm und tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".So trittst du einem Shared Space bei:Tippe in der Spaces-√úbersicht auf "ausstehend" und das Shared Spaces Symbol.Lies dir die Aufkl√§rung zu Shared Spaces durch und gehe zur n√§chsten Seite √ºber Kontovollmachten.Sieh dir die Informationen zur Kontovollmacht (die rechtliche √úbersicht) an. Sobald du die AGB durchgelesen und verstanden hast, tippe auf das K√§stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.Best√§tige auf deinem verkn√ºpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Kontovollmacht akzeptieren".Du brauchst gen√ºgend freie Spaces, um eine Einladung zu einem Shared Space annehmen zu k√∂nnen. Sonst kannst du nur weitermachen, wenn du einen anderen Space l√∂schst.Es ist auch nicht m√∂glich, einen Space mit demselben Namen oder Bild wie dem des Shared Spaces zu verwenden. Du kannst Einladungen nur annehmen, wenn du den Namen oder das Bild des anderen Spaces √§nderst.So verl√§sst du einen Space:Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.Tippe in den Einstellungen auf "Shared Space verlassen".Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf der n√§chsten Seite und tippe auf "Space verlassen":Shared Spaces lassen sich durch die N26 App oder WebApp erstellen und bearbeiten.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

question: So l√§dst Du Geld auf dein Konto per Karte, Apple Pay und Google Pay
answer:
Du kannst jetzt Geld auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du eine Debitkarte, Kreditkarte, Apple Pay oder Google Pay verwendest. So kannst du schnell und einfach √úberweisungen auf dein N26 Konto t√§tigen:Geld mit einer Debit- oder Kreditkarte hinzuf√ºgen√ñffne deine N26 App und tippe im Homescreen auf Geld erhalten.Tippe auf Mit Karte aufladen.W√§hle einen Betrag und gib deine Karteninformationen ein (Name auf der Karte, Kartennummer, Ablaufdatum und CVV-Code). Deine Karteninformationen speichern wir nicht.Folge den Anweisungen, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verf√ºgbar.Mit Instant Account Funding kannst du minimum 20 EUR und maximal 450 EUR bei jeder wiederkehrenden Transaktion und maximal 450 ‚Ç¨ insgesamt pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen.Geld mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay hinzuf√ºgen√ñffne deine N26 App und tippe im Homescreen auf Geld erhalten.W√§hle dann Apple Pay bzw. Google Pay.Gib einen Betrag ein.Folge den Anweisungen, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verf√ºgbar.Akzeptierte Karten: Visa und Mastercard-Karten, die eine 16-stellige Kartennummer haben. Prepaid-Karten werden nicht akzeptiert. In diesem Blog Post (neuen Tab)(Englisch) erf√§hrst du mehr √ºber den Unterschied zwischen Debit-, Kredit- und Prepaidkarten.Kosten:¬†
Diese Methode ist zwar die schnellste und einfachste, um Geld auf dein N26 Konto zu laden ‚Äì f√ºr uns ist es allerdings teurer, Geld sofort auf deinem Konto verf√ºgbar zu machen. Andere Methoden f√ºr das Aufladen deines Kontos sind g√ºnstiger.¬†Das erste Mal Aufladen ist immer kostenlos. Danach berechnen wir jedes Mal eine Geb√ºhr von 3 %. Denn wenn du Geld von einer anderen Bankkarte oder dem Wallet auf dein Konto l√§dst, wird es nicht direkt auf dein N26 Konto √ºbertragen ‚Äì die Geb√ºhr deckt die Kosten ab, die aufkommen, weil wir das Geld trotzdem sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verf√ºgbar machen.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
„Éª Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.¬†Remember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app‚Äîyou‚Äôll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you‚Äôll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).¬†To unpair your old smartphone:Go to üë§ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to üë§ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

Diese Geb√ºhr k√∂nnen wir nicht verhindern, aber wir erstatten sie zur√ºck, wenn du in im per Chat in deiner App kontaktierst. question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‚ÄòForgot Password‚Äô to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: ¬øC√≥mo descargar mi informaci√≥n personal?
answer: La Regulaci√≥n General de Protecci√≥n de Datos (RGPD) es una nueva regulaci√≥n europea sobre la protecci√≥n de datos y la privacidad que entr√≥ en vigor el 25 de mayo de 2018. Como respuesta a esta ley, hemos a√±adido la opci√≥n de exportar tu informaci√≥n en la¬†Web App (pesta√±a nueva): entra en¬†üë§ Mi Cuenta, despu√©s en¬†Configuraci√≥n Personal¬†y finalmente haz clic en¬†Tus datos personales.Como banco m√≥vil que somos, entendemos la importancia de la seguridad de los datos. Debes saber que almacenamos el m√≠nimo de datos posibles, solo aquellos que estamos obligados a tener por ley. Adem√°s, eliminamos los datos una vez que dejan de ser necesarios para nuestros productos o servicios.El art√≠culo 20 de la RGPD afirma que tienes derecho a la portabilidad de tus datos y te permite cambiar de proveedor de servicios en caso de que quieras abrir una cuenta bancaria con otro banco. Por ello y de acuerdo con este art√≠culo tenemos que enviarte estos datos en un formato legible por m√°quina. Ten en cuenta que este archivo est√° destinado a la portabilidad de datos y puede que tu ordenador no pueda leer archivos en formato JSON. En caso de que puedas abrir el archivo, es posible que sea dif√≠cil de entender ya que no est√° pensando para que las personas lo puedan comprender, si no una m√°quina. Como somos un banco online, entendemos la importancia de la protecci√≥n de datos. Por ello, tomamos medidas de seguridad extra antes de que puedas descargar tus datos. Hacemos esto para asegurarnos de que el titular de la cuenta es la persona que est√° solicitando los datos.C√≥mo descargar tus datosPuedes solicitar la descarga de datos personales tanto de tu cuenta actual como de una cuenta que hayas cerrado. La informaci√≥n viene en un formato de lectura electr√≥nica para que puedas compartirla con terceros si lo deseas.Clientes actualesPor favor inicie sesi√≥n en¬†esta p√°gina (pesta√±a nueva)¬†utilizando la misma informaci√≥n de acceso a su cuenta de N26.Tendr√°s que crear una contrase√±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estar√° activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contrase√±a se introduce err√≥neamente 5 veces, el link caducar√° y tendr√°s que realizar otra solicitud.Antiguos clientesPuedes descargar tus datos a√∫n despu√©s de haber cerrado tu cuenta. Para solicitar esta informaci√≥n completa el¬†formulario (pesta√±a nueva)¬†y aseg√∫rate de que los datos coinciden con los de tu antigua cuenta. Necesitar√°s:nombre, apellido, n√∫mero de identidad y fecha de expiraci√≥n del documento que proporcionaste al abrir la cuenta (DNI o pasaporte)email registrado en tu cuentafecha (mes y a√±o) en la que creaste y cerraste la cuenta (revisa el email que recibiste al confirmar tu direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico en el proceso de registro)Por motivos de seguridad, tenemos que asegurarnos de que realmente eres t√∫ quien est√° descargando los datos; si alg√∫n campo est√° incorrecto o incompleto, tu petici√≥n no ser√° aceptada.Tendr√°s que crear una contrase√±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estar√° activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contrase√±a se introduce err√≥neamente 5 veces, el link caducar√° y tendr√°s que realizar otra solicitud.Si quieres m√°s informaci√≥n sobre la recopilaci√≥n, el uso y el procesamiento de tus datos personales, visita nuestra¬†Pol√≠tica de Privacidad (pesta√±a nueva).

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
answer: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.¬†This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

question: Comment N26 investit mon argent ?
answer: En r√®gle g√©n√©rale, nous aspirons √† mettre les d√©p√¥ts de nos clients √† disposition pour les cr√©dits pour nos utilisateurs, √† condition qu'ils aient une solvabilit√© appropri√©e.¬†Concernant les liquidit√©s non-utilis√©es pour les op√©rations envers les clients, N26 poursuit une strat√©gie d'investissement √† faible risque. De plus, nous refinan√ßons des pr√™ts aux collectivit√©s publiques en Allemagne (villes et communes) et nous investissons dans des obligations d'Etat en euros.Nous ne sommes pas un √©tablissement de trading et donc n'investissons pas pour r√©aliser des profits √† court terme.¬†Nous ne sp√©culons ni sur les mati√®res premi√®res, ni sur les devises, ni sur les bitcoins ou toutes autres classes d‚Äôactifs.

question: How to use Moneybeam?

question: Wie kann ich mein Konto sch√ºtzen?

Logge dich daf√ºr in die App ein und gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort √§ndern. Bitte w√§hle ein sicheres Passwort aus und halte es geheim.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du alleine deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen k√∂nnen. Mehr Informationen dar√ºber, wie du deine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen kannst, findest du in unserem Artikel ‚ÄúWie kann ich meine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen?‚Äù.Wenn du glaubst, dass dein Konto in irgendeiner Form gef√§hrdet ist oder unerlaubte √Ñnderungen vorgenommen wurden, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:‚Ç¨1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs‚Ç¨5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500‚Ç¨ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050‚Ç¨ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:‚Ç¨20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you‚Äôll want to go to the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a new space‚Äô in the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepageSelect one of the below options:‚ÄòSaving for a goal‚Äô - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‚ÄòSharing money‚Äô - Allows you to create a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.‚ÄòCreate now, decide later‚Äô - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let‚Äôs start using ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‚ÄòMain Account‚Äô or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‚Äòmanage‚ÄôThen press ‚ÄòLock Space‚Äô or ‚ÄòUnlock Space‚ÄôEnter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‚ÄòSettings‚Äô cog (top-right corner)Select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‚ÄòManage‚Äô:To create a savings goal, select ‚ÄòCreate my goal‚Äô (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‚ÄòSet goal‚ÄôTo enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‚ÄòManage Round-UpsToggle ‚ÄòEnable Round-Ups‚ÄôYou will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a rule‚ÄôChoose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
„Éª Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.¬†Remember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app‚Äîyou‚Äôll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you‚Äôll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).¬†To unpair your old smartphone:Go to üë§ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to üë§ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: How to top up my account?
answer: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000‚Ç¨ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of ‚Ç¨ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.¬†How does it work?¬†The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?¬†Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney¬†Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person‚Äôs identity, and it‚Äôs not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.¬†As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.¬†Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: Comment changer mon code de validation N26 ?
answer: Instructions √©tape par √©tape:iPhoneAndroidEtape 1Ouvrez votre application N26 et cliquez sur l'ic√¥ne Mon compte en haut √† droite de votre √©cranEtape 2Faites d√©rouler et cliquez sur S√©curit√©Etape 3Choisissez Modifier le PIN de confirmationEtape 4Entrez le token de votre carte : les 10 chiffres √† l'avant ou √† l'arri√®re de votre carteEtape 5Cr√©ez et confirmez votre nouveau PIN de confirmationEtape 1Ouvrez votre application N26 et cliquez sur l'ic√¥ne Mon compte en haut √† droite de votre √©cranEtape 2Faites d√©rouler et cliquez sur S√©curit√©Etape 3Choisissez Modifier le PIN de confirmationEtape 4Entrez le token de votre carte : les 10 chiffres √† l'avant ou √† l'arri√®re de votre carteEtape 5Cr√©ez et confirmez votre nouveau PIN de confirmationLe code de validation vous permet de confirmer les virements ou toute autre op√©ration effectu√©e depuis l‚Äôapplication. Pour vous en souvenir, cr√©ez votre propre code de validation N26 lors de la premi√®re synchronisation de votre t√©l√©phone. (nouvel onglet)Si vous l‚Äôavez oubli√© ou souhaitez le modifier, vous pouvez le faire √† tout moment depuis l‚Äôapplication N26 :Allez dans la rubrique üë§ Mon compte, s√©lectionnez S√©curit√©.S√©lectionnez Changer le code de validation.Saisissez le token de votre carte (il se compose de 10 chiffres et se trouve sous votre nom au recto de votre carte ; ou au verso des cartes N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal).Saisissez puis validez votre nouveau code de validation.Si vous saisissez un code de validation erron√© √† 6 reprises, vous devrez le r√©initialiser avant de r√©essayer.Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, les codes de validation compos√©s des √©l√©ments de votre date de naissance, de votre adresse, de r√©p√©titions de chiffres ou de suites de chiffres (par exemple, 1994, 1111, 1234 ou 4321) ne sont pas accept√©s. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refus√©, nous vous invitons √† essayer une combinaison de chiffres diff√©rente.Le code de validation et le code PIN de votre carte (nouvel onglet) sont deux choses diff√©rentes. Cependant, vous pouvez choisir la m√™me combinaison de chiffres pour ces deux codes.

question: Wo kann ich meine Maestro Card einsetzen?
answer: Nur verf√ºgbar f√ºr Kunden mit unseren deutschen, √∂sterreichischen oder niederl√§ndischen AGB.Deine Maestro kann nicht f√ºr Online-Eink√§ufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.Du kannst sie nicht f√ºr Apple Pay or Google Pay verwenden.Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder Gesch√§ften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. Jede¬†Abhebung am Geldautomaten¬†mit der Maestrocard kostet 2 ‚Ç¨ (bei Fremdw√§hrungen zuz√ºglich einer Geb√ºhr von 1,7% auf den abgehobenen Betrag).Du kannst¬†deine Maestro Card¬†direkt in der App bestellen.Wenn du Probleme mit deiner Maestrocard hast, pr√ºfe zuerst, ob deine¬†Karteneinstellungen¬†aktiviert sind. question: Comment mon argent est-il prot√©g√© chez N26 ?
answer: Protection des d√©p√¥tsLe Fonds de Protection des D√©p√¥ts allemand (nouvel onglet) prot√®ge tous les d√©p√¥ts jusqu‚Äô√† 100 000 ‚Ç¨ d√©tenus dans les √âtats membres de l'Union europ√©enne.¬†¬†En tant que titulaire d'une licence bancaire, N26 Bank est oblig√© de proposer une protection des d√©p√¥ts. N26 est membre du Fonds de protection des d√©p√¥ts allemand.¬†Comment N26 d√©tecte-t-elle et surveille-t-elle les fraudes ?N26 a une √©quipe sp√©cialis√©e ax√©e sur la surveillance et l‚Äôidentification des transactions suspectes sur notre plateforme. En utilisant des mod√®les statistiques, d‚Äôalgorithmes avanc√©s et d'analyses du comportement humain, notre √©quipe d‚Äôexperts s'assure que votre argent est toujours entre de bonnes mains.Que fait N26 en cas de d√©tection de comportement frauduleux dans sa base de clients ?Lorsque notre √©quipe d‚Äôexperts d√©tecte une activit√© irr√©guli√®re, nous prenons toutes les mesures d‚Äôatt√©nuation, conform√©ment aux lois r√©glementaires, pour emp√™cher des d√©g√¢ts suppl√©mentaires dont la fermeture et le signalement aux autorit√©s des comptes incrimin√©s. Lorsque des transactions suspectes indiquent des cas de blanchiment d‚Äôargent, de financement d‚Äôactivit√© terroriste, ou de toute autre activit√© criminelle, N26 signale imm√©diatement ces activit√©s √† l‚Äôunit√© d‚Äôinvestigation des transactions financi√®res allemande (Financial Transaction Investigation Unit, FIU) ou aux entit√©s de supervision locales.Quels sont les investissements de N26 en mati√®re de s√©curit√© ?Fin 2019, nous avons cr√©√© l‚Äô√©quipe Trust and Safety. Elle travaille avec l‚Äô√©quipe de s√©curit√© informatique et son travail consiste √† prot√©ger les utilisateurs, leurs comptes ainsi que leurs donn√©es des cybercriminels. De plus, N26 a doubl√© la taille de son effectif LCB (Lutte contre le blanchiment des capitaux), et a mis en place des processus et des plateformes de surveillance des transactions. Cela nous a permis de d√©tecter et d‚Äôemp√™cher des activit√©s malveillantes en nous basant sur des donn√©es historiques. Nous avons ainsi pu conserver une longueur d‚Äôavance sur les personnes malveillantes. Nous investissons √©norm√©ment dans la technologie et dans l‚Äôintelligence artificielle pour ex√©cuter des mod√®les statistiques et des algorithmes avanc√©s, accompagn√©s d‚Äôune analyse comportementale.

question: Wie k√ºndige ich meine N26 Premium-Mitgliedschaft?
answer:
N26 Smart, N26 You oder N26 Metal Vertr√§ge haben zun√§chst eine Laufzeit von einem Jahr mit einer automatischen Verl√§ngerung nach den ersten 12 Monaten und werden dann auf eine unbefristete Vertragslaufzeit geschlossen.Du kannst dich jederzeit dazu entscheiden, diese automatische Erneuerung w√§hrend der ersten 12 Monate deines Vertrags zu unterbinden.Nach dieser Erneuerung wird der Vertrag auf unbefristete Zeit geschlossen. Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jedoch jederzeit k√ºndigen.In diesem Artikel erf√§hrst du den Unterschied zwischen Widerruf, K√ºndigung der Mitgliedschaft und Unterbindung der Erneuerung deiner Mitgliedschaft. Du hast 3 Optionen:Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist widerrufen (dies ist eine gesetzliche Frist; von deinem Widerrufsrecht kannst du Gebrauch machen, indem du uns kontaktierst).Du kannst die Erneuerung deiner Mitgliedschaft jederzeit vor Ablauf der ersten 12-monatigen Vertragslaufzeit unterbinden, indem du uns per Chat kontaktierst.Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jederzeit k√ºndigen (und zwar sofort und ohne Einschr√§nkungen, indem du uns per Chat kontaktierst).Umstellung von einem Premiumkonto auf ein anderes PremiumkontoWenn du m√∂chtest, kannst du dein Konto jetzt auf ein anderes Premiumkonto umstellen, ohne auf ein Standardkonto wechseln zu m√ºssen. So beh√§ltst du all deine Spaces, deine Aufrundungsregeln, deinen Einkommensverteiler sowie deine bestehenden Karten und Zahlungen.Logge dich dazu in deiner mobilen App ein, gehe zu "Mein Konto" und √∂ffne deine Mitgliedschaftsdaten. W√§hle "Mitgliedschaft √§ndern". Dann kannst du eine andere Premium-Mitgliedschaft w√§hlen, die besser zu deinen Bed√ºrfnissen passt.¬†WiderrufDu kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der gesetzlichen 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist widerrufen. Dieser Zeitraum beginnt, sobald die erste monatliche Geb√ºhr abgebucht wird. Kontaktiere uns einfach, damit wir dir weiterhelfen k√∂nnen. Wenn du eine unserer Premium-Mitgliedschaften widerrufst, kannst du sp√§ter wieder auf die gleiche oder eine andere Mitgliedschaft upgraden.Die Verl√§ngerung deiner Mitgliedschaft beendenDeine N26 Premium-Mitgliedschaft hat zun√§chst eine Vertragslaufzeit von 12 Monaten.¬† Nach Ablauf der ersten 12 Monate verl√§ngert sich die Mitgliedschaft automatisch und wird auf eine unbefristete Vertragslaufzeit umgestellt.Wir benachrichtigen dich 8 Wochen im Voraus per E-Mail √ºber die Verl√§ngerung der Mitgliedschaft. Du kannst die automatisch Verl√§ngerung w√§hrend der ersten 12 Monate beenden.Wenn du dich daf√ºr entscheidest, die Verl√§ngerung zu beenden, kannst du deine N26 Mastercard und alle deine Premium-Mitgliedschaftsvorteile bis zum Ablauf deiner Mitgliedschaft weiterhin nutzen. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Versicherungsschutz so lange beh√§ltst (bei N26 You und N26 Metal), wie du deine Mitgliedschaftsgeb√ºhr zahlen musst. Danach wird dir am Stichtag der Vertragsverl√§ngerung unmittelbar nach dem Downgrade eine digitale Karte ausgestellt. Dazu muss dein Kontostand mindestens 10 ‚Ç¨ betragen. Du brauchst uns deswegen nicht extra zu kontaktieren, da die Angelegenheit automatisch bearbeitet wird.K√ºndigung deiner Mitgliedschaft jederzeitWenn du deine Mitgliedschaft nach Ablauf der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist k√ºndigen m√∂chtest, kontaktiere uns bitte. Wenn du diese Option bei N26 You oder N26 Metal w√§hlst, werden deine Versicherungsleistungen eingestellt und deine Smart, You und Metal Premiumkarten deaktiviert.Wenn du dein Konto endg√ºltig schlie√üen m√∂chtest, lies dir unseren Artikel Wie schlie√üe ich mein N26 Konto? durch.FAQs zur K√ºndigung der N26 Premium-MitgliedschaftMuss ich mein Konto schlie√üen, um meine Premium-Mitgliedschaft zu k√ºndigen?
Nein, du kannst einfach in der N26 App dein Abo √§ndern und dein neues Konto wird sofort eingerichtet.Was passiert mit meiner IBAN, wenn ich meine Premium-Mitgliedschaft k√ºndige?
Die √Ñnderung deines Abos hat keine Auswirkungen auf deine Bankdaten, sodass deine IBAN unver√§ndert bleibt.

question: Come posso effettuare bonifici in valute estere?
answer: Collaboriamo con Wise (nuova tabella) per rendere pi√π facili e veloci i bonifici in valuta estera. Wise offre tassi di cambio in tempo reale e nessuna commissione nascosta. Ecco come puoi effettuare un bonifico in valuta estera:Accedi alla tua app N26 e clicca su Dal mio contoSeleziona Bonifici in valuta estera. Inserisci l'importo che desideri inviare in Euro. Questo si convertir√† automaticamente nella valuta estera che scegli. Clicca su Continua, seleziona un beneficiario dalla tua lista di contatti o Aggiungi un nuovo destinatario.Controlla i dati bancari del beneficiario e invia il bonifico con il tuo PIN di conferma.Se al momento non trovassi la¬†valuta straniera (nuova tabella)¬†che stai cercando, visita¬†Wise (nuova tabella)¬†per ulteriori informazioni. Puoi accedere a Wise utilizzando i dati di accesso del tuo conto N26 e selezionando 'Hai dimenticato la password?'. Riceverai un'email da Wise per reimpostare la tua password. Una volta completato questo passaggio, potrai utilizzare questo profilo per tutte le tue operazioni. Affinch√© questo processo funzioni, √® necessario creare prima un profilo Wise tramite l'app N26 e seguire i passaggi per effettuare il bonifico in valuta estera all'interno dell'app, altrimenti non riceverai l'email da Wise per reimpostare la tua password.Ricorda che i bonifici in valuta estera non sono possibili con il conto N26 Business, N26 Business You o N26 Business Metal, n√© lo sono i bonifici verso conti aziendali.Wise applica commissioni che verranno indicate prima di confermare il bonifico. Wise supporta i bonifici solo nella valuta principale di un paese. Ci√≤ significa, ad esempio, che non possono essere elaborate transazioni in USD verso l'India.

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above ‚Ç¨150 will be charged with a 12.50‚Ç¨ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than ‚Ç¨150.The maximum fee is ‚Ç¨100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: Where to find your Tax ID
answer: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If you‚Äôre from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authorities‚Äô database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TIN‚Äôs are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

question: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
answer: Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es √§ndern m√∂chtest, w√§hle in der App beim Login¬†Vergessen?¬†oder¬†Passwort vergessen? (neuen Tab)¬†in der¬†WebApp (neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen f√ºr unsere Passw√∂rter. Wir berechnen die St√§rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur Passw√∂rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von ‚Äúschwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnern‚Äù.Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, f√ºge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen Gro√ü- und Kleinschreibung variierst.Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vor√ºbergehend gesperrt. Nach 30 Minuten kannst du es erneut versuchen.Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: Perch√© i pagamenti contactless non funzionano?
answer: I pagamenti contactless della tua carta funzionano tramite near field communication (NFC). Se hai riscontrato dei problemi con i pagamenti contactless, ricorda quanto segue:Accertati di aver abilitato i pagamenti contactless nelle impostazioni della tua carta.Se la tua carta √® nuova, assicurati di averla prima utilizzata presso uno sportello ATM o con chip e PIN. Solo in seguito potrai effettuare anche i pagamenti contactless.I pagamenti contactless della tua carta (NFC) fino a 50‚Ç¨ non richiedono il PIN della carta. Per importi superiori a 50‚Ç¨ o per transazioni cumulative superiori a 150‚Ç¨ dovrai invece inserire il PIN della carta.Chiedi al rivenditore se il terminale √® abilitato per i pagamenti contactless.L'NFC delle carte N26 Metal si trova solo sul retro della carta. Assicurati di poggiare il retro della carta sul terminale per utilizzare l'NFC (poggiando il lato frontale, non funziona).Assicurati di collocare la tua carta direttamente sulla superficie del terminale compatibile con l'NFC. Se rimuovi la tua carta troppo velocemente o non l'avvicini abbastanza, puoi semplicemente riprovare.Se il pagamento contactless non funziona, prova sempre a pagare con il metodo chip e PIN.

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death?¬†In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased‚Äôs bank accounts.¬†The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: bereavement.service@n26.com¬†Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH¬†- Nachlassbearbeitung
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 Berlin, GERMANYPlease inform us on:¬†Who is the deceased?¬†If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account.¬†How can we contact the beneficiaries? Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated.¬† A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?¬†If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.¬†We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.¬†Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you.¬†What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?¬†¬†Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.¬†However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH is located in Germany.¬†When it comes to the relationship between the deceased‚Äôs bank and the beneficiaries, other legal requirements may be applicable than usually in your home country.As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be blocked.Please note that standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates on the account regularly continue to exist after the death of the account holder. Heirs or authorised representatives must have these revoked or deleted.Further, we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax in Germany of the assets belonging to the estate.We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased‚Äôs account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?¬†There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.¬†It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.¬†Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.¬†For any further information on a specific situation please seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor or any suitable advisory service.

question: What are Instant transfers?
answer: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipient‚Äôs bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you won‚Äôt have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49‚Ç¨Spain - 1,99‚Ç¨Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99‚Ç¨The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000‚Ç¨ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000‚Ç¨ per day). If you‚Äôre using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If you‚Äôre paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiver‚Äôs details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

question: ¬øQu√© es una disputa y c√≥mo disputar un pago con tarjeta?
answer: ¬øHay alguna transacci√≥n con tarjeta en tu extracto mensual de N26 que no hayas hecho t√∫? ¬øPediste algo por internet, pero no te lleg√≥? Sigue leyendo para saber c√≥mo solucionarlo.¬øQu√© es una disputa?Una disputa es una reclamaci√≥n de devoluci√≥n de dinero por un pago con tarjeta, debido a que un comerciante ha efectuado lo que se considera una transacci√≥n err√≥nea. El cargo se devuelve cuando la disputa se resuelve en favor del comprador.N26 te permite disputar una transacci√≥n a trav√©s de Mastercard para recuperar el dinero de un pago con tarjeta que no hayas realizado t√∫, o en el que han surgido problemas con el comerciante. Por ejemplo, si pediste productos online y no los recibiste en la fecha de entrega indicada, puedes disputar el pago y reclamar la devoluci√≥n de tu dinero.¬øC√≥mo disputar un pago con tarjeta?Puedes disputar una transacci√≥n desde la app N26 o la WebApp:Ve a la pesta√±a de inicio y busca la transacci√≥n que quieres disputar;pulsa sobre ella para abrir los detalles;selecciona Obtener ayuda con esta transacci√≥n y sigue los pasos.Importante:¬†Si tu disputa es sobre una transacci√≥n no autorizada (o sea, que no la has hecho t√∫), para que podamos tramitar tu solicitud tendr√°s que bloquear tu tarjeta y pedir una nueva para evitar m√°s fraudes. Podr√°s pedir una tarjeta nueva y bloquear la antigua siguiendo los pasos que se te indican en la app.Si al seleccionar un pago en la app no aparece el bot√≥n para iniciar la disputa, es porque dicha transacci√≥n todav√≠a es una autorizaci√≥n y hay que esperar a que se presente el pago. En este art√≠culo te explicamos qu√© es eso de una autorizaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva).Si has cerrado tu cuenta y no tienes acceso a la app, tendr√°s que enviar un email a support@n26.com (pesta√±a nueva) desde la direcci√≥n de email con la que te registraste.En este art√≠culo hemos recopilado algunas preguntas frecuentes sobre c√≥mo disputar pagos (pesta√±a nueva).

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10‚Ç¨).¬†Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0‚Ç¨ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Comment changer le code PIN de ma carte N26 ?
answer: Vous devez choisir un code PIN au moment d'activer votre carte N26. Nous ne d√©finissons jamais le code PIN de votre carte. Vous pouvez facilement choisir et modifier votre code PIN dans votre application N26.Pour d√©finir le code PIN de votre carte, utilisez l'appareil associ√© √† votre compte N26, puis :Ouvrez l'application N26S√©lectionnez la rubrique Cartes et faites d√©filer l'√©cran jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous trouviez la carte correspondanteS√©lectionnez Param√®tres puis R√©initialiser le code PIN.Saisissez les 10 num√©ros du token qui figurent au recto (carte Standard) ou au verso (cartes Smart, You et Metal) de votre carte N26.Choisissez votre nouveau code PIN et confirmez la modification.Avant de pouvoir effectuer des achats sans contact avec votre nouvelle carte, vous devrez effectuer un paiement ou un retrait en distributeur en utilisant le nouveau code PIN s√©lectionn√©. PIN incorrect ou non validePour des raisons de s√©curit√©, les codes PIN compos√©s des √©l√©ments de votre date de naissance, de votre adresse, de r√©p√©titions de chiffres ou de suites de chiffres (par exemple, 1994, 1111, 1234 ou 4321) ne sont pas accept√©s. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refus√©, nous vous invitons √† essayer une combinaison de chiffres diff√©rente.Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, si vous saisissez un code PIN incorrect trois fois de suite, votre carte sera automatiquement bloqu√©e. Il vous faudra alors contacter le Service Client depuis le Livechat dans l'application N26 afin de la d√©bloquer.Le code PIN de votre carte N26 et votre code de validation (nouvel onglet) sont deux choses diff√©rentes. Cependant, vous pouvez choisir la m√™me combinaison de chiffres pour ces deux codes.Si vous avez modifi√© votre code PIN, mais que vous rencontrez un probl√®me lors du paiement, il est possible que vous n‚Äôayez pas effectu√© de retrait en distributeur.

question: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
answer: You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app.

question: Warum muss ich weitere Unterlagen schicken?
answer: Sobald du den Verifizierungsprozess zur Er√∂ffnung deines N26 Girokontos gestartet hast und du eine E-Mail von uns erh√§ltst, in der wir weitere Informationen anfordern, um mit deiner Anmeldung fortzufahren, lies bitte die folgenden Informationen durch, um dir bei deiner Beantragung zu helfen.N26 ist eine beaufsichtigte Bank. In bestimmten Situationen ben√∂tigen wir zus√§tzliche Informationen von unseren Kunden, um mit deren Anmeldung fortfahren zu k√∂nnen. Es handelt sich dabei um eine Standardanforderung, die mit den gesetzlichen und regulatorischen Anforderungen in Einklang steht. Wir ben√∂tigen von dir f√ºr die Er√∂ffnung eines N26 Girokontos spezifische Unterlagen.Wir sind uns bewusst, dass diese Informationen sehr pers√∂nlich sind und sichern dir zu, dass die Informationen, die du uns schickst, strikt vertraulich behandelt werden. Wir werden sie nur zur Erf√ºllung unserer gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen verwenden.Welche Unterlagen muss ich schicken?Nachdem du den Verifizierungsprozess gestartet und eine E-Mail von uns erhalten hast, in der wir dich um weitere Informationen bitten, musst du auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast, mit den unten stehenden Informationen antworten. Bitte beachte, dass du nur die Unterlagen schicken musst, die wir in der E-Mail aufgef√ºhrt haben. Im Folgenden findest du einfach eine Liste mit den Informationen, die wir anfordern k√∂nnen:‚ÄãWohnsitznachweis: Beispiel: Gas, Wasser oder Stromrechnung (weniger als 3 Monate alt). Oder eine Meldebescheinigung.Gehaltsnachweis: Beispiel: Einen Arbeitsvertrag, eine Gehaltsabrechnung oder eine Verm√∂gens- und Einkommenserkl√§rung (falls du uns eine der beiden letztgenannten √ºbermittelst, schw√§rze bitte alle Angaben zu deinem religi√∂sen Bekenntnis und deinem Familienstand, falls sie darin enthalten sind)Grund, warum du im Land X lebst: Beispiel: Visa-Dokumenten, Studiennachweis, Verm√∂gensquelle:Beispiel: Vertr√§ge, Kontoausz√ºge, Informationen zur Ver√§u√üerung von Verm√∂genswerten, Kapitalgewinne oder ErbeWie schicke ich euch diese Informationen?Bitte beachte, dass unser System standardm√§√üig dazu ausgelegt ist, die Zusendung per E-Mail mittels TLS-Verschl√ºsselung oder besser zu sch√ºtzen. Wenn dein E-Mail-Server eine eingehende TLS-Verschl√ºsselung oder eine bessere Verbindung akzeptiert, werden die E-Mails, die du mit uns getauscht hast, √ºber das Netzwerk verschl√ºsselt (Ende-zu-Ende). Wenn dein E-Mail-Server keine TLS-Verschl√ºsselung oder bessere Verbindung unterst√ºtzt, wird die E-Mail, die du uns versendest, m√∂glicherweise nicht verschl√ºsselt. Daher empfehlen wir dir, die physische Postversandoption zu verwenden, die eine sichere M√∂glichkeit darstellt, Informationen mit der folgenden Adresse auszutauschen: N26 GmbH, Sign-up document, Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.W√ºnschst du eine Zusendung per E-Mail, lies bitte die Anweisungen in der diesbez√ºglichen E-Mail durch, die du von uns erhalten hast.¬†Wenn du dich daf√ºr entscheidest, per E-Mail zu antworten, schicke bitte auch gescannte Kopien, Fotos und/oder Screenshots mit detaillierten Beschreibung des jeweiligen Dokuments. Alles muss klar und lesbar sein und darf nicht gr√∂√üer als 15 MB sein.Du solltest innerhalb der n√§chsten 3 Werktage eine R√ºckmeldung von uns erhalten.Wichtig: Das Versenden falscher und/oder unzutreffender Informationen ist eine Straftat. In einem solchen Fall k√∂nnen wir deinen Antrag nicht annehmen.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.¬†¬†Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules¬†As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.¬†Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.¬†Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.¬†For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating ‚Äúpermanent home‚Äù as a stronger form of attachment than ‚Äútemporary residence‚Äù). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number¬†Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country‚Äôs tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.¬†¬†The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities¬†As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.¬†Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.¬†We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.¬†Our recommendation¬†Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.¬†We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù, indicate whether you‚Äôre a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you‚Äôre tax resident in more than one country), click ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.¬†

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes‚Äîyour Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact‚Äîyou create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You‚Äôre the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: Espacios Compartidos - ¬øQu√© es un poder notarial?
answer: El modelo legal que cumplen los Espacios Compartidos se llama Poder notarial (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†Un espacio compartido no es lo mismo que una cuenta compartida en el sentido tradicional, donde cada persona es propietaria parcialmente del dinero de la cuenta. En el caso del espacio compartido, cuando los participantes reciben el poder notarial, obtienen el derecho de actuar en nombre del administrador, como por ejemplo para recibir y realizar transferencias.¬†La persona que autoriza a las dem√°s a actuar en su nombre es el administrador y es el √∫nico propietario de la cuenta. El administrador tiene que ser un usuario con cuenta de N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You).Esto significa, que el creador del espacio compartido es su due√±o legal.¬†El due√±o del espacio compartido:¬†- Tiene posesi√≥n de todos los fondos dentro del espacio.¬†- Puede transferir fondos a la cuenta o desde la cuenta siempre que los necesite.¬†- Puede invitar a otros usuarios a su espacio compartido d√°ndoles poder notarial.- Puede revocar el poder notarial del resto de los participantes siempre que quiera.- Puede cerrar el espacio compartido (todos los fondos se transferir√°n a la cuenta principal del administrador).Cuando se le concede poder notarial a una persona, esta tendr√° acceso a todo el dinero del espacio compartido. Esto significa que cada participante enviar y recibir dinero en ese espacio compartido.¬†N26 Bank GmbH no se hace responsable de los pagos cubiertos por el poder notarial.M√°s sobre Espacios Compartidos¬øQu√© son los Espacios Compartidos?¬øC√≥mo crear un Espacios Compartido?

question: ¬øPor qu√© no me ha dado dinero el cajero autom√°tico?
answer: A veces pasa. Aseg√∫rate de que las retiradas de efectivo en cajeros est√°n activadas.Aunque no podamos decir con certeza de qu√© se trata, s√≠ que podemos ayudarte a recuperar tu dinero. La cantidad que se ha restado de tu saldo disponible no es m√°s que una autorizaci√≥n (una reserva o cantidad bloqueada). Como la transacci√≥n no finaliz√≥ con √©xito, la autorizaci√≥n caducar√° en unas horas o en un m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as h√°biles y el dinero volver√° a tu cuenta.Si en 12 d√≠as el dinero no ha sido desbloqueado, por favor rellena el¬†formulario de disputa¬†y nosotros haremos todo lo que est√© en nuestras manos para recuperar tu dinero.Mientras tanto, te sugerimos que pruebes con otro cajero autom√°tico de un operador diferente. Rara vez se da esta situaci√≥n dos veces seguidas.No he podido retirar el dinero que he sacado del cajero. ¬øQu√© puedo hacer?En este caso tambi√©n podemos ayudarte a recuperar el dinero. El importe que has solicitado en el momento de la retirada aparecer√° en forma de autorizaci√≥n en tu cuenta. Como en esta ocasi√≥n la transacci√≥n tampoco se ha completado, el importe solicitado expirar√° en un plazo m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as laborables y ser√° reembolsado en tu cuenta.En caso de que la autorizaci√≥n no expirase y vieras en tu extracto bancario que ha sido cargada, te rogamos que rellenes el formulario de impugnaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva). Haremos cuanto est√© en nuestra mano para recuperar tu dinero.

question: Wie bekomme ich einen Kredit?

Andernfalls verfallen die Antr√§ge in 90 Tagen und du kannst w√§hrend dieser Zeit keinen weiteren Kredit beantragen.Best√§tige deinen Kredit.¬†Wenn du unser Angebot annimmst, musst du den Vertrag entweder elektronisch per Videoanruf unterzeichnen oder per SMS best√§tigen.Du erh√§ltst eine Push-Nachricht, sobald die Auszahlung erfolgt ist.¬†In Deutschland wird der Kreditbetrag in 5-7 Werktagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben. In Frankreich dauert die Auszahlung eine Woche.Wir bieten Zinss√§tze zwischen 1,99% und 19% p. a. an. Au√üer den Zinsen fallen keine weiteren Kosten an. Wenn du jedoch¬†deinen Plan √§nderst¬†oder mit deinen monatlichen Zahlungen in Verzug bist, k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen.Weitere Informationen findest du in den¬†AGB (neuen Tab)¬†zu N26 Credit.

question: Wie lade ich meine pers√∂nlichen Daten herunter?
answer: Die Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine europ√§ische Verordnung zum Schutz personenbezogener Daten, die am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft getreten ist. Wir haben daraufhin eine Funktion zum Datenexport in der WebApp (neuen Tab) hinzugef√ºgt, um dein Recht auf Daten√ºbertragbarkeit gem√§√ü Art. 20 DSGVO zu gew√§hrleisten. Die Beschaffung der von dir bereitgestellten pers√∂nlichen Daten ist transparent und einfach und somit besitzt du die vollst√§ndige Kontrolle: Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen und klicke auf Deine pers√∂nlichen Daten.Das Recht auf Daten√ºbertragbarkeit gem√§√ü Art. 20 DSGVO umfasst personenbezogene Daten, die du uns bereitgestellt hast. Art. 20 DSGVO soll dir erm√∂glichen, ohne gro√üen Aufwand den Dienstleister zu wechseln f√ºr den Fall, dass du die von dir bereitgestellten Daten nutzen m√∂chtest, um ein Konto bei einer anderen Bank zu er√∂ffnen. Aus diesem Grund verpflichtet uns Art. 20 DSGVO dazu, dir diese Daten in einem maschinenlesbaren Format bereitzustellen. Dabei ist zu beachten, dass die Datei lediglich f√ºr Zwecke der Daten√ºbertragbarkeit zu nutzen ist und dein Computer die JSON Datei m√∂glicherweise nicht lesen kann. Falls du die JSON Datei √∂ffnen kannst, k√∂nnen ihre Inhalte dennoch schwierig zu verstehen sein, da die Datei f√ºr Maschinenlesbarkeit konzipiert ist und nicht f√ºr die unmittelbare Verarbeitung durch Menschen. Die Datei, die wir ausstellen, ist lediglich zur √úbertragung an andere Banken bestimmt.Als mobile Bank sind wir uns der Wichtigkeit der Sicherheit deiner Daten bewusst. Daher haben wir zus√§tzliche Sicherheitsma√ünahmen installiert bevor du deine Daten herunterladen kannst. Diese Ma√ünahmen sind im folgenden Absatz beschrieben. Wir tun dies, um sicherzustellen, dass du, der Kontoinhaber, auch derjenige bist, der die Daten herunterl√§dt.¬†So l√§dst du deine Daten herunterDu kannst beantragen, die von dir f√ºr ein laufendes oder vorheriges Konto bereitgestellten personenbezogenen Daten, herunterzuladen. Du erh√§ltst das Dokument in einem maschinenlesbaren Format, sodass du es mit einem Dritten teilen kannst.Bestehende KundenBitte frage deine Daten √ºber unser Webformular (neuen Tab) an.Du wirst aufgefordert, ein tempor√§res Passwort f√ºr den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist nur f√ºr 24 Stunden g√ºltig, ab dem Zeitpunkt, an dem du die E-Mail erhalten hast. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ung√ºltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.Ehemalige KundenDu kannst von dir bereitgestellte personenbezogene Daten auch nach deiner Kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. F√ºlle einfach das Datenanforderungsformular (neuen Tab) aus und vergewissere dich, dass deine angegebenen Informationen mit deinen vorherigen Kontoinformationen exakt √ºbereinstimmen. Welche pers√∂nlichen Informationen du ben√∂tigst:Vor- und Nachname, Lichtbildausweis (Identifikationsnummer und Ablaufdatum des Dokuments mit dem du dein Konto best√§tigt hast (Personalausweis oder Reisepass)Die registrierte E-Mail-Adresse des KontosDatum (Monat und Jahr) an dem du dein Konto erstellt und abgeschlossen hast (sieh in deiner Best√§tigungsemail nach).Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden sind wir verpflichtet sicherzustellen, dass die Daten heruntergeladen wurden: Wenn du ein Feld leer l√§sst oder falsch ausgef√ºllt hast, kann deine Anfrage nicht abgeschlossen werden.Du wirst aufgefordert, ein tempor√§res Passwort f√ºr den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist aber nur f√ºr 24 Stunden g√ºltig. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ung√ºltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.F√ºr weitere Informationen √ºber die Erfassung, Verwendung oder Verarbeitung deiner pers√∂nlichen Daten, schau dir bitte unsere Datenschutzerkl√§rung (neuen Tab)an.

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.¬†Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.¬†

Achte darauf, deinen Vor- und Nachnamen genau so einzugeben, wie er auf deinem N26 Konto erscheint, da sonst die Verkn√ºpfung mit PayPal fehlschl√§gt.Sobald dein N26 Konto best√§tigt ist, erhebt PayPal zwei geringe Geb√ºhren, die dir dann innerhalb von 2‚Äì3 Werktagen auf dein Konto zur√ºckerstattet werden.An diesem Punkt musst du einfach die H√∂he der zur√ºckerstatteten Geb√ºhren eintragen, dich in dein PayPal-Konto einloggen und die Verkn√ºpfung deines N26 Kontos von deinem Wallet aus best√§tigen.
