answer: Du kennst deinen PIN-Code nicht? Bei N26 erh√§ltst du keine PINs per Post oder E-Mail. Du legst deine eigene PIN fest, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Falls du deine PIN vergessen hast oder deine Karten-PIN √§ndern willst, kannst du das in wenigen Schritten direkt in der N26 App tun.Stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft und deine Karte aktiviert ist. Dann √∂ffne die N26 App und folge dieser Schritt-f√ºr-Schritt-Anleitung:√ñffne den ‚ÄúKarten‚Äù-Tab.Tippe auf ‚ÄúEinstellungen‚Äù und w√§hle die entsprechende Karte.Tippe auf ‚ÄúPIN zur√ºcksetzen‚Äù.Gib den Token ‚Äì die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte ‚Äì ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der R√ºckseite.W√§hle einen neuen PIN-Code und best√§tige ihn.Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in Gesch√§ften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem Gesch√§ft vollst√§ndig aktivieren. Hierf√ºr muss die Karte in ein Kartenleseger√§t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.Ung√ºltige oder falsche PINAus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine PIN, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Sequenzen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzt. Falls deine gew√ºnschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Falls du dreimal hintereinander die falsche PIN eingibst, wird deine Karte aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden automatisch gesperrt. Nimm in diesem Fall Kontakt zu unserem Kundenservice in der App auf. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Deine Karten-PIN ist nicht dasselbe wie deine Best√§tigungs-PIN. Wenn du willst, kannst du aber dieselbe Zahlenkombination f√ºr beide PINs nutzen.Wenn du nach dem √Ñndern deiner PIN Probleme bei Kartenzahlungen hast, kann das daran liegen, dass du sie noch nicht mit dem Chip oder am Geldautomaten aktiviert hast (siehe Schritt 6 weiter oben).

question: Account in conjunction with ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG
answer: The account ICW ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.¬†¬†Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form you‚Äôll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto Klosterstra√üe 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract we‚Äôll open a Basiskonto for you. You‚Äôll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.¬†

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‚ÄòDirect Debits‚Äô: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don‚Äôt have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space‚Äôs IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‚ÄòSpace Settings‚Äô and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' ¬ª¬†Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' ¬ª¬†Accept the T&C's ¬ª¬†Enter your confirmation PIN ¬ª¬†Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‚Äòcog icon‚Äô)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on ‚ÄúSend money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúBank transfer‚ÄùSelect the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?
answer: Ersatzkarten sind f√ºr alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erh√§ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten er√∂ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den L√§ndern, in denen N26 verf√ºgbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europ√§ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ans√§ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterst√ºtzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung f√ºr dich vornehmen k√∂nnen. Der Versand au√üerhalb dieser L√§nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zus√§tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.¬†Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten f√ºr ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In l√§ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch l√§nger dauern. question: Come posso usare la mia carta digitalmente?

In questo caso, la tua carta attuale continuer√† a funzionare con Apple Pay o Google Pay finch√© non attiverai la nuova carta. (nuova tabella)Dove posso trovare i dati della mia carta nell'app N26?Se hai bisogno dei dettagli della tua carta ma al momento non la porti con te, non preoccuparti. question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†*applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: Come funziona N26 Business Smart?
answer: Valido per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia e Svizzera.N26 Business Smart costa 4,90 ‚Ç¨ al mese ed √® pensato per lavoratori autonomi e freelance che hanno un‚Äôazienda a proprio nome. Ci√≤ significa che il conto non sar√† in nome della tua azienda e la tua azienda non comparir√† sulla carta.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nell‚Äôapp!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.¬†Ancora non √® possibile passare da conti privati a conti business, quindi √® importante sapere se N26 Business Metal fa al caso tuo (nuova tabella).Il conto N26 Business Smart √® stato pensato per i lavoratori autonomi e i freelance la cui attivit√† √® a proprio nome. Ci√≤ significa che non potrai intestare questo conto a nome della tua azienda.Il canone di 4,90‚Ç¨ verr√† detratto direttamente dal tuo conto ogni mese nello stesso giorno in cui hai effettuato il passaggio. Ci√≤ significa che se hai aperto il tuo conto a fine mese, i primi due canoni mensili ti verranno addebitati il mese successivo.La Mastercard N26 Business Smart √® destinata esclusivamente all‚Äôuso commerciale. Passeranno fino a 7 giorni prima che questo appaia nel tuo saldo.Se hai bisogno di un‚Äôaltra carta per le spese private, ti consigliamo di ordinare una Maestro (disponibile in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi).A differenza di altri conti, N26 Business Smart non consente di effettuare (nuova tabella) bonifici in valuta estera (nuova tabella) direttamente dall‚Äôapp. Per eseguirli, vai su (nuova tabella) Wise (nuova tabella).l conti N26 Business non supportano i pagamenti business to business (B2B).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe √® un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

question: Comment puis-je associer mon compte N26 √† PayPal ?
answer:
Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez associer votre compte N26 √† votre compte PayPal et profiter de nombreux avantages.Vous pourrez alimenter instantan√©ment votre compte bancaire, effectuer et recevoir des paiements rapides en toute s√©curit√©, sans avoir √† utiliser vos coordonn√©es bancaires ou votre num√©ro de carte N26.Voici comment associer votre compte N26 depuis la version web de PayPal¬†:Cliquez sur Wallet en haut de la page.S√©lectionnez Lier une carte ou un compte bancaire.Cliquez sur Lier un compte bancaire.Suivez les instructions fournies.

question: Caducidad y sustituci√≥n de las tarjetas: Preguntas frecuentes
answer: Si tu Mastercard de N26 ha caducado o va a caducar pr√≥ximamente, en este art√≠culo encontrar√°s toda la informaci√≥n sobre c√≥mo pedir una nueva, los costes asociados y los plazos de env√≠o.¬†Antes de pedir una nueva tarjeta, te recomendamos que compruebes que todos tus datos personales son correctos y est√°n actualizados.Mi tarjeta caduca pronto, ¬øqu√© debo hacer?Si tu tarjeta caduca pronto, inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta N26 en la app, ve a la pesta√±a Tarjetas y busca un banner debajo de la tarjeta correspondiente. Sigue los pasos para confirmar d√≥nde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustituci√≥n y te la enviaremos.¬†Si no ves ese mensaje, no te preocupes. Seguro que tu tarjeta todav√≠a tiene tiempo de validez, as√≠ que cuando llegue el momento adecuado tendr√°s la opci√≥n de confirmar tu direcci√≥n.Cuando llegue tu tarjeta, tendr√°s que activarla antes de poder utilizarla. No olvides destruir tu tarjeta antigua y tirarla siguiendo las normas locales de reciclaje.Nota: cuando hayas recibido y activado tu nueva Mastercard, recuerda actualizar tus datos de pago para todas tus suscripciones y transferencias programadas. De esta forma, evitar√°s que se rechacen tus pagos en el futuro.¬øPuedo seguir utilizando mi tarjeta cuando haya caducado?No, la fecha de caducidad de tu tarjeta cumple una funci√≥n importante y no podr√°s utilizarla cuando finalice el mes de caducidad. Recibir√°s una nueva tarjeta con un n√∫mero diferente y una nueva fecha de caducidad.¬øCu√°nto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustituci√≥n de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?Las tarjetas de sustituci√≥n son gratuitas para todos los clientes de Smart, You o Metal.Si abriste tu cuenta antes de las siguientes fechas, tanto la nueva tarjeta nueva como el env√≠o a tu direcci√≥n son gratuitos en los pa√≠ses en los que N26 est√° disponible (pesta√±a nueva):16/02/2021(Clientes con domicilio legal en la Gran Europa)25/02/2021 (Clientes con domicilio legal en Italia o Espa√±a)11/03/2021 (Clientes con domicilio legal en Francia)18/03/2021 (clientes con domicilio legal en Alemania, Austria o Suiza);Si tu cuenta se cre√≥ despu√©s, tu tarjeta de sustituci√≥n costar√° lo mismo que pedir una nueva tarjeta.Si actualmente resides en un pa√≠s no aceptado por N26, ponte en contacto con nuestro Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente por chat o por tel√©fono para que podamos realizar el pedido por ti. El env√≠o fuera de estos pa√≠ses (pesta√±a nueva) puede conllevar un coste adicional.¬†¬øCu√°nto tardar√°?Todas las tarjetas de sustituci√≥n de tarjetas que caducan o han caducado se env√≠an mediante un env√≠o est√°ndar. Tarda hasta 15 d√≠as h√°biles y es gratuito. En zonas rurales o de dif√≠cil acceso puede tardar m√°s. Para conocer las actualizaciones en el progreso de la entrega, solo tienes que ir a la pantalla de inicio de la app del m√≥vil de N26.Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nueva¬°No te preocupes, nosotros te ayudamos!¬†Si ya has confirmado tu direcci√≥n y han transcurrido m√°s de 20 d√≠as, contacta con el Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente. Puedes hacerlo en la secci√≥n de Ayuda de la app.¬†Si todav√≠a no has confirmado tu direcci√≥n, inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 en la app y busca un banner debajo de tu tarjeta caducada. Sigue los pasos para confirmar d√≥nde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustituci√≥n.¬†

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don‚Äôt currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You‚Äôll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

L‚Äôacc√®s √† votre compte et votre identification aupr√®s de notre Service Client pourraient √™tre impact√©s si nous d√©tenons des informations erron√©es.Ce que vous pouvez modifier directement depuis l‚Äôapplication N26Adresse de livraisonMot de passeInformations fiscales: cliquez ici pour y acc√©derNum√©ro de t√©l√©phone**Votre smartphone doit rester synchronis√©, donc li√© √† votre compte N26, ce qui vous permettra de vous authentifier. Retrouvez plus d‚Äôinformations pour synchroniser/d√©synchroniser votre t√©l√©phone.Voici les √©tapes √† suivre :1. Vous rendre dans la section üë§Mon compte depuis l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil.2. Cliquer sur Param√®tres¬†3. S√©lectionner Param√®tres personnels ou S√©curit√© selon les donn√©es √† modifier.Veuillez nous contacter directement via le LiveChat pour modifier les informations suivantes :Adresse emailNom et genre*Nationalit√©** Apr√®s avoir v√©rifi√© votre identit√©, nous vous demanderons de nous transmettre la copie de votre nouveau document d‚Äôidentit√© et si besoin celle d‚Äôun document officiel confirmant le changement (un certificat de mariage ou un extrait de naissance par exemple).Afin de d√©marrer un LiveChat, veuillez s‚Äôil vous pla√Æt :Depuis votre espace client en ligne (nouvel onglet) : cliquez sur "Livechat Service Client" situ√© en bas √† droite de la page.Depuis votre application N26 : veuillez vous rendre dans la section üë§Mon compte > Aide > LiveChat.Si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter √† votre compte N26, vous pouvez cliquer directement sur "D√©marrer un chat" en bas de cet article.S√©lectionner M‚Äôauthentifier juste avant de d√©marrer un chat si cela est possible. question: Pourquoi mon achat en ligne a-t-il √©chou√© ?
answer: Votre application N26 vous guidera dans le processus de paiement en ligne.Voici quelques raisons pour lesquelles votre paiement en ligne a √©chou√© :Si vous n‚Äôavez pas pu confirmer votre achat dans les 5 minutes imparties : dans ce cas, veuillez simplement recommencer votre achat.Assurez-vous que vous avez autoris√© les transactions en ligne depuis les param√®tres de votre carte dans votre application mobile N26.Si vous ne recevez pas de notification push, veuillez vous assurer que votre smartphone est bien synchronis√©,¬†que les notifications push sont activ√©es et que vous avez une bonne connexion Wi-Fi ou mobile. De plus, si vous utilisez un appareil iOS, assurez-vous de ne pas avoir activ√© le mode ¬´ Ne pas d√©ranger ¬ª.Attention : la notification push ne sera envoy√©e qu'au smartphone synchronis√© au compte.Assurez-vous de d√©sactiver les bloqueurs de publicit√© lorsque vous faites un achat sur internet et que votre connexion internet est suffisamment puissante.Veuillez noter par ailleurs que votre carte Maestro N26 (disponible uniquement en Allemagne, Autriche et aux Pays-Bas) ne peut pas √™tre utilis√©e pour des achats en ligne.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.¬†Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.¬†
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: ¬øC√≥mo dar parte de un siniestro al seguro?
answer: Tu cuenta¬†N26 You (pesta√±a nueva)¬†o¬†N26 Metal (pesta√±a nueva)¬†incluye un amplio abanico de beneficios de seguro, cubiertos por nuestro socio Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*Para dar parte y hacer una reclamaci√≥n, entra en la app N26 y despu√©s, ve a¬†üë§ Mi Cuenta > Tu cuenta > Copertura assicurativa Allianz.Ah√≠ encontrar√°s:Una gu√≠a de c√≥mo realizar una reclamaci√≥n (retraso en el vuelo o de equipaje, robo de m√≥vil, garant√≠a extendida o cancelaci√≥n de viaje, por ejemplo).La informaci√≥n de tu cuenta N26, incluido tu n√∫mero de p√≥liza de AllianzLa opci√≥n de contactar Allianz directamente en caso de emergencia m√©dica.Para las emergencias, te recomendamos que tengas preparada la siguiente informaci√≥n:El n√∫mero de tel√©fono y la direcci√≥n de tu localizaci√≥n actual.Nombres de todos los contactos oficiales (doctores, hospitales y/o polic√≠a).Una descripci√≥n exacta de la situaci√≥n.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe es un nombre comercial de AWP P & C S.A. - sucursal holandesa y miembro del Grupo Allianz.

question: Spazi Condivisi - Che cos'√® una Procura?
answer: Il modello legale utilizzato per Spazi Condivisi si chiama Procura.I partecipanti di uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno pari propriet√† del conto come un conto condiviso nel senso bancario tradizionale. Dopo aver ricevuto la Procura i partecipanti ottengono il diritto di agire a nome dell'amministratore, per tutto ci√≤ che riguarda il trasferimento dei fondi entro lo Spazio Condiviso. La persona che autorizza l'altro ad agire per suo conto √® denominata "Amministratore", questa persona √® il¬†titolare delle somme depositate sullo Spazio Condiviso. L'amministratore deve essere un titolare di un conto N26 Premium, ad esempio¬†N26 Smart,¬†N26 You, N26 Metal e¬†N26 Business Smart,¬†N26 Business You¬†e N26 Business Metal.Ci√≤ significa che chiunque abbia creato lo Spazio Condiviso ne √® il suo proprietario legale. L'amministratore di uno Spazio Condiviso:¬†- E' il proprietario di tutti i fondi presenti nello Spazio Condiviso.- Pu√≤ trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.- Pu√≤ invitare partecipanti al proprio Spazio Condiviso garantendo loro la Procura. - Pu√≤ revocare la Procura di un partecipante in qualsiasi momento.- Pu√≤ anche chiudere uno Spazio Condiviso dopo aver rimosso un partecipante (tutti i fondi di quello Spazio Condiviso saranno trasferiti nel conto principale del proprietario). Rilasciando la Procura ad una persona, quest'ultima avr√† accesso ad ogni fondo presente nello Spazio Condiviso. Questo significa che ogni partecipante potr√† trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.N26 Bank GmbH non pu√≤ essere ritenuta responsabile per i pagamenti coperti dalla Procura.Scopri di pi√πCosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

question: How can I prevent fraud via SMS?
answer: Did you get a text message followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt.How does the scam work?You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one¬†https://app.n26.com/login (new tab)The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App > My Account > Settings > Security > Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,¬† send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comDo I need to confirm a transaction to be able to receive a refund?Absolutely not! We would never instruct you to authorise a transaction that you did not initiate. Never confirm transactions if you do not recognise a recipient's name or IBAN in the case of debit transfers; an email or phone number in the case of a MoneyBeam payment; and a merchant's name in the case of a card transaction.How to recognise N26 official communications?We will never send you links via SMS: never trust an SMS from us that contains a link!¬†N26 usually sends verification codes via "AUTHMSG"; these codes will always originate from this sender. These codes are used to access the App or to associate the device with the account. Never share your OTP (One Time Password) codes with anyone!Our primary means of communication are live chat, email and our premium customer phone line.We do not call our customers, unless (in very specific cases) a call has been requested by a customer themselves.Therefore, if after clicking on a link, you‚Äôre informed that you will be contacted shortly by an N26 agent due to an unsuccessful operation, be wary of impending phone calls!How do scammers find out my personal information?In today‚Äôs day and age, it‚Äôs likely that your personal data is publicly available online. Think social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. It‚Äôs often the case that sensitive data is left unsecured. Scammers exploit people's vulnerability by collecting information and using it to their advantage.

question: Wie lade ich meine Entgeltaufstellung herunter?
answer: Die Entgeltaufstellung ist Teil der europ√§ischen Zahlungskonten-Direktive, mit der Bankkunden die M√∂glichkeit haben, eine √úbersicht √ºber ihre vergangenen Geb√ºhren zu erhalten.Eine Entgeltaufstellung steht all unseren Kunden jederzeit zur Verf√ºgung.Wenn du aktuell ein Konto bei uns hast, logge dich in die WebApp (neuen Tab) ein, klicke auf das Download-Symbol und scrolle nach unten zu "Entgeltaufstellung".Wenn du ehemaliger N26 Kunde bist, kannst du deine Entgeltaufstellung bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner Kontoschlie√üung √ºber dieses Formular (neuen Tab) herunterladen.Daf√ºr wirst du folgende Informationen ben√∂tigen:Deinen Vor- und Nachnamen, deine Ausweisnummer und das Ablaufdatum des Ausweisdokuments (Personalausweis oder Pass), mit dem du dich registriert hast.Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse.Das Datum (Monat und Jahr) deiner Kontoer√∂ffnung und Kontoschlie√üung, das du den jeweiligen Best√§tigungsemails entnehmen kannst.Wir werden dich fragen, ein tempor√§res Passwort zu erstellen, das du benutzen kannst, um auf den Link zuzugreifen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken. Der Link gilt nur f√ºr 24 Stunden. Bitte beachte, dass der Link und das Passwort ung√ºltig werden, wenn dieses f√ºnf mal falsch eingegeben wurde. In diesem Fall muss eine neue Exportanfrage gestellt werden.*¬† F√ºr Business Konten werden Cashback-Betr√§ge nicht angezeigt.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes‚Äîyour Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact‚Äîyou create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You‚Äôre the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúCard transfer‚ÄùChoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per top-up, for a maximum of 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùChoose an amount¬†Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it‚Äîthis can be done at any time (see below). We‚Äôll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn‚Äôt affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you‚Äôll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month‚Äôs time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you‚Äôll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you‚Äôve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven‚Äôt received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you‚Äôve proved your identity, we‚Äôll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you‚Äôve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee.¬†You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, we‚Äôll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).¬†In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Bank documents‚Äîa guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason‚Äîyou can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they‚Äôre perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here‚Äôs how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and‚Äîif you wish‚Äîit can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here‚Äôs how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you‚Äôve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You‚Äôll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient‚Äôs full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation‚Äîthe PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information‚Äîfull name, legal address, IBAN and BIC‚Äîspecific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ ist?
answer: Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, kann dein Kontostand negativ sein, solange du dich innerhalb deines √úberziehungsrahmen bewegst.Ansonsten kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn N26-Geb√ºhren zu bezahlen sind wie z.B. f√ºr unsere Express-Lieferung oder unsere Premium-Mitgliedschaften.¬†Au√üerdem kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn Offline-Kartenzahlungen eingehen und abgebucht werden m√ºssen. Dies sind z.B. Zahlungen auf Flugzeugen oder Schiffen, die zum Zeitpunkt der Zahlungsautorisierung nicht deinem Kontostand gegen√ºbergestellt werden k√∂nnen, aber trotzdem abgebucht werden m√ºssen.¬†Gem√§√ü unserer AGB hast du dich verpflichtet, dein Konto auszugleichen. Du erh√§ltst eine Erinnerung per E-Mail und wir bitten dich, dein Konto so schnell wie m√∂glich auszugleichen. Solange dein Kontostand negativ ist, kannst du keine weiteren Zahlungen oder Abhebungen t√§tigen.Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ bleibt?Dein Konto bleibt weitere 60 Tage aktiv, nachdem es negativ geworden ist. In diesem Zeitraum:Bekommst du zwei Erinnerungen.Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, wird dieser nach der zweiten Erinnerung gek√ºndigt und du musst den Betrag sofort zur√ºckzahlen (oder du kannst einen R√ºckzahlungsplan beantragen).Wenn du ein N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You Konto hast, werden alle Leistungen nach 60 Tagen gek√ºndigt und dein Konto in ein Standardkonto umgewandelt.Wenn du nach diesen 60 Tagen nicht handelst, kann dein Konto geschlossen werden.

question: Alimenter mon compte par carte, Apple Pay et Google Pay
answer: Vous pouvez d√®s √† pr√©sent alimenter votre compte en utilisant une carte de d√©bit ou de cr√©dit mais aussi Apple ou Google Pay. C‚Äôest la mani√®re la plus rapide et simple d‚Äôalimenter votre compte N26.Alimenter votre compte avec une carte de d√©bit ou de cr√©ditOuvrez l'application N26 et cliquez sur "Recevoir".S√©lectionnez ‚ÄúCarte de d√©bit‚ÄùChoisissez un montant, entrez le nom qui figure sur la carte, le num√©ro de carte, la date d‚Äôexpiration et le cryptogramme visuel (nous ne conservons jamais ces donn√©es)Suivez les √©tapes afin de confirmer le paiementL‚Äôargent est disponible instantan√©ment sur votre compteLe montant avec lequel vous pouvez alimenter votre compte √† chaque transaction r√©currente est de 20 ‚Ç¨ au minimum et de 450 ‚Ç¨ au maximum par transaction, avec un plafond maximum de 450 ‚Ç¨ par mois.Alimenter votre compte avec Apple ou Google PayDepuis votre application N26, rendez-vous dans la section ‚ÄúCartes‚Äù¬†Cliquez simplement sur ‚ÄúRecevoir‚Äù et s√©lectionnez ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù ou ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùSaisissez le montantSuivez les √©tapes afin de confirmer le paiementL‚Äôargent est disponible instantan√©ment sur votre compteCartes accept√©es : les cartes Visa et Mastercard dot√©es d'un num√©ro de carte √† 16 chiffres. Veuillez noter que les cartes pr√©pay√©es ne sont pas accept√©es.Pour en savoir plus sur les diff√©rences entre cartes de d√©bit, cr√©dit et pr√©pay√©es, vous pouvez consulter cet article (nouvel onglet).Frais :La premi√®re de ces transactions est toujours gratuite, mais les suivantes sont factur√©es √† hauteur de 3 % du montant total du d√©p√¥t.Bien que ces options soient les plus simples et rapides pour alimenter instantan√©ment votre compte N26, le traitement de ces transactions nous est plus co√ªteux que celui des autres options propos√©es.Lorsque vous alimentez votre compte avec une carte bancaire ou un compte Apple Pay ou Google Pay, votre argent n‚Äôest pas re√ßu instantan√©ment par N26. Les frais couvrent donc les co√ªts suppl√©mentaires associ√©s √† l‚Äôavance de la somme sur votre compte.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

question: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder ausl√§ndischen Entit√§ten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, die laut FATCA f√ºr U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.FATCA steht f√ºr Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. Eingef√ºhrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, ausl√§ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute daf√ºr zu nutzen, ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr √ºber FATCA oder den IRS erf√§hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.Anders als die meisten L√§nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-Staatsb√ºrger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen L√§nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer B√ºrger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen B√ºrger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.Um zuverl√§ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?
Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, hei√üt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine pers√∂nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zun√§chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine Steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlie√ülich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.
Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen f√ºr dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil best√§tigst.Falls sich deine Lage ver√§ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 
Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

question: Comment rejoindre, ajouter ou retirer des participants d‚Äôun espace partag√© ?
answer: Si vous avez √©t√© invit√© √† rejoindre un espace partag√©, voici comment faire :¬†¬†Depuis la rubrique Espaces, appuyez sur l‚Äôespace signal√© ‚ÄúEn attente‚Äù, puis sur¬† l‚Äôic√¥ne qui s‚Äôaffiche. Prenez connaissance des informations relatives √† Espaces Partag√©s, puis lisez l‚Äô√©cran suivant √† propos de la procuration. Une fois que vous avez pris connaissance et compris toutes les informations relatives √† la Procuration, cochez la case et appuyez sur le bouton ‚ÄúAccepter la procuration‚Äù. Entrez votre code de validation.Ouvrez la notification ‚ÄúAccepter la procuration‚Äù re√ßu sur votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√© pour confirmer votre d√©cision.Vous pouvez rejoindre un espace partag√© si vous avez encore des espaces non utilis√©s. Pour rappel, les clients N26 Standard peuvent utiliser jusqu‚Äô√† 2 espaces et les utilisateurs de comptes premium ont la possibilit√© d‚Äôen utiliser jusqu‚Äô√† 9 simultan√©ment.¬† Si vous utilisez d√©j√† le nombre maximum d‚Äôespaces que vous offre votre compte, il vous faudra en supprimer un pour rejoindre un espace partag√©.¬†Lorsque vous souhaitez rejoindre¬† un espace partag√©, veuillez noter que vous devrez modifier la photo ou/et le nom de votre espace individuel dans le cas o√π ces param√®tres seraient identiques avant de pouvoir accepter l‚Äôinvitation.¬†Si vous avez souhaitez quitter un espace partag√©, voici comment faire :¬†¬†Depuis la rubrique Espaces, appuyez sur l‚Äôespace partag√© que vous souhaitez quitter puis sur les trois points en haut √† droite de votre √©cran pour ouvrir le menu. Dans la section ‚ÄúG√©rer‚Äù appuyez sur ‚ÄúQuitter l‚Äôespace partag√©‚Äù.Ouvrez la notification ‚ÄúQuitter l‚Äôespace partag√©‚Äù re√ßu sur votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√© pour confirmer votre d√©cision.Si vous √™tes l‚Äôadministrateur d‚Äôun espace partag√©, vous pouvez retirer un participant de de cette fa√ßon :¬†Depuis l‚Äôaper√ßu de l‚Äôespace, appuyez sur les trois points pour ouvrir le menuAppuyez sur la fl√®che qui se situe √† droite du nom du participant que vous souhaitez retirer (IOS) ou directement sur le nom du participant si vous utilisez un appareil Android.¬†Appuyez sur ‚ÄúR√©voquer la procuration‚Äù.Confirmez la notification sur l'√©cran suivant et appuyez sur " R√©voquer procuration ".¬†Un espace partag√© peut √™tre cr√©√© ou modifi√© depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile N26 ou votre espace client en ligne sur https://app.n26.com/login (nouvel onglet).Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partag√©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces Partag√©s ?.D√©couvrez √©galement Comment cr√©er un Espace partag√© ?

question: Wie lange dauert eine √úberweisung?
answer: Eingehende SEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisungen auf N26 Konten erfolgen in Echtzeit, solange sie von einer Bank stammen, die Echtzeit√ºberweisungen unterst√ºtzt. √úberweisungen k√∂nnen jedoch manchmal verz√∂gert werden, wenn sie aufgrund von SEPA-Banking-Vorschriften √ºberpr√ºft werden m√ºssen.Gew√∂hnliche SEPA-√úberweisungen gehen innerhalb von h√∂chstens zwei Werktagen ein. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Zeitrahmen auf maximal drei¬†Werktage verl√§ngert, wenn die √úberweisung kurz vor einem Wochenende oder Feiertag vorgenommen wird.Eingehende SWIFT-√úberweisungen dauern bis zu vier Werktage, bis sie eintreffen.Ausgehende SEPA-Echtzeit√ºberweisungen erfolgen in Echtzeit. Gew√∂hnliche ausgehende SEPA-√úberweisungen dauern bis zu zwei Werktage. Ausgehende √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit unserem Partner Wise dauern bis zu vier Werktage. Ausgehende SWIFT-√úberweisungen werden nicht unterst√ºtzt.Was ist ein "Bankarbeitstag"?Ein Bankarbeitstag entspricht aufgrund der √ñffnungszeiten der beteiligten Banken zwei Werktagen. Jeder Tag unter der Woche, der kein Feiertag ist, gilt als Werktag.Warum ist meine √úberweisung nicht angekommen?Was passiert, wenn alles Obenstehende ber√ºcksichtigt wurde und die √úberweisung immer noch nicht ausgef√ºhrt wurde? In solchen F√§llen kann nur die auftraggebende Bank eine interne Nachforschung einleiten.Leider k√∂nnen wir bei N26 keine eingehenden √úberweisungen untersuchen, nur ausgehende √úberweisungen. Dessen ungeachtet findest du hier eine Liste der m√∂glichen Gr√ºnde, warum eine √úberweisung fehlschlagen k√∂nnte.Weitere InformationenAll unsere SEPA-√úberweisungen werden √ºber ein System namens TARGET2 (neuen Tab) abgewickelt. Dieses System bearbeitet Bankzahlungen werktags von 7:00 Uhr bis 18:00 Uhr europ√§ischer Standardzeit. An den folgenden Tagen macht TARGET2 Urlaub: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. Dezember (1. Weihnachtsfeiertag) und 26. Dezember (2. Weihnachtsfeiertag).

question: Come passare a N26 You?

Per effettuare l'upgrade a N26 You tramite app:effettua il login nella app, vai in Esplora e seleziona Passa a N26 You.scegli uno dei nostri cinque nuovi colori di carta: rabarbaro, oceano, sabbia, acquamarina, antracite. seleziona il¬†metodo di consegna¬†che preferisci e accetta i¬†Termini e Condizioni (nuova tabella)¬†di N26 You. A questo punto, la tua nuova carta arriver√† a breve.Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:Le consegne standard richiedono fino a 10 giorni lavorativi, mentre le consegne express fino a 3 giorni lavorativi.Il costo mensile di ‚Ç¨9,90 sar√† addebitato direttamente sul tuo conto ogni mese alla data dell‚Äôupgrade.Puoi acquistare una seconda Mastercard N26 You direttamente tramite la app di N26 per un costo di ‚Ç¨14, una tantum.

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†

question: Was ist N26 Business You?
answer: Verf√ºgbar in √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Schweden.N26 Business You kostet 9,90 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat und ist f√ºr Selbstst√§ndige und Freiberufler gedacht, die in eigenem Namen t√§tig sind. Das bedeutet, dass auf dem Konto oder der Karte kein Firmenname stehen kann.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus f√ºnf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 You Mastercard online sowie in Gesch√§ften, vermeide versteckte Bankgeb√ºhren und profitiere von geb√ºhrenfreien Auslands√ºberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst dar√ºber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit geb√ºhrenfrei Bargeld in jeder W√§hrung abheben.Versicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: R√ºckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, f√ºr Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Versp√§tung des aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten f√ºr medizinische R√ºcktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erh√§ltst eine Versicherung f√ºr Such- und Rettungsma√ünahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unf√§llen w√§hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz f√ºr Sch√§den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Es ist noch nicht m√∂glich, zwischen Privat- und Gesch√§ftskonten zu wechseln. Umso wichtiger ist es, zu wissen, ob N26 Business Metal das Richtige f√ºr dich (neuen Tab) ist:Das N26 Business You Konto ist f√ºr Selbst√§ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Das Konto kostet 9,90 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat.Das Premium-Konto beinhaltet: Ein Allianz-Versicherungspaket und geb√ºhrenfreie Abhebungen an Geldautomaten in Fremdw√§hrungen.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur f√ºr den gesch√§ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erh√§ltst monatlich 0,1% Cashback auf alle mit der Karte get√§tigten Zahlungen. Es ist derzeit nicht m√∂glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu f√ºhren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte f√ºr private Ausgaben ben√∂tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestrocard zu bestellen (erh√§ltlich in Deutschland und √ñsterreich).√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrung sind mit N26 Business You nicht m√∂glich.Du kannst direkt bei der Anmeldung Business You ausw√§hlen oder von einem existierenden N26 Business Konto upgraden.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.

question: Wie oft kann ich kostenlos Bargeld abheben?
answer: Wie viele kostenlose Bargeldabhebungen du pro Monat mit deiner Mastercard hast, h√§ngt von deiner N26 Mitgliedschaft und von dem Land deiner AGB ab (die Adresse, an die deine Karte urspr√ºnglich geliefert wurde). In deiner mobilen N26 App kannst du zudem jederzeit sehen, wie viele kostenlose Abhebungen pro Monat du noch √ºbrig hast. question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.¬†With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we‚Äôre able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We‚Äôre going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.¬†Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: Impostazioni per le comunicazioni di marketing

Pertanto, anche disattivando questa funzione, riceverai comunque notifiche push contenenti informazioni rilevanti per il tuo utilizzo del conto corrente N26 (ad es. transazioni recenti, nuove funzionalit√† del tuo conto corrente). Disattivando gli aggiornamenti nell'app, non riceverai pi√π i contenuti di cui sopra con questa modalit√†. Ti preghiamo di notare che abilitare/disabilitare questa opzione ha un effetto solo su contenuti relativi a offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalit√† N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni, ma non ha influisce su altri contenuti che puoi ricevere tramite aggiornamenti nell'app. Pertanto, anche disattivando questa funzione, riceverai comunque aggiornamenti nell'app contenenti informazioni rilevanti per il tuo utilizzo del conto corrente N26 (ad es. transazioni recenti, nuove funzionalit√† del tuo conto corrente). Email:Attivando le comunicazioni via email, riceverai offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalit√† N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni tramite email. Disabilitando le comunicazioni via email, non riceverai pi√π i contenuti sopra menzionati con questa modalit√†. Ti preghiamo di notare che abilitare/disabilitare questa opzione ha un effetto solo su contenuti relativi a offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalit√† N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni, ma non ha influisce su altri contenuti che puoi ricevere tramite email. Pertanto, anche disattivando questa funzione, riceverai comunque email contenenti informazioni rilevanti per il tuo utilizzo del conto corrente N26 (ad es. transazioni recenti, nuove funzionalit√† del tuo conto corrente). Chat di assistenza:Attivando la chat di assistenza, riceverai offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalit√† N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni tramite la chat di assistenza, ad esempio verso la fine di una conversazione con il Supporto Clienti N26. Disattivando le comunicazioni tramite chat di assistenza, non riceverai pi√π i contenuti sopra menzionati tramite chat. Ti preghiamo di notare che Questa modifica non ha alcun impatto sulla tua accessibilit√† al Supporto Clienti di N26, inclusa la chat di assistenza di N26.
