Marketing partner:Attivando l'opzione Marketing partner, accetti che N26 possa inviare il tuo indirizzo email cifrato ai suoi Marketing partner (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) al fine di escluderti dalle pubblicit√† di N26 e aiutare N26 a definire meglio i suoi gruppi target. Se disattivi questa opzione, N26 non invier√† il tuo indirizzo email ai suoi Marketing partner e potresti ricevere annunci pubblicitari di N26 non rilevanti per te. Per maggiori informazioni sui Marketing partner, fai riferimento a questo articolo.

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard‚Äôs exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn‚Äôt charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard‚Äôs rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: ¬øQu√© es ‚ÄúMensajes‚Äù?
answer:
La seguridad de tus datos personales es nuestra prioridad, por ello, hemos creado un buz√≥n dentro de la app que te va a permitir compartir cualquier comunicaci√≥n. Cualquier contenido que incluya datos personales lo vamos a comunicar a trav√©s de Mensajes. De todas formas, seguiremos comunicando a tu email la informaci√≥n general. ¬øQu√© son los datos personales?Los datos personales hacen referencia a cualquier informaci√≥n que se refiere a ti como persona y te identifica o podr√≠a identificarte. Podr√≠an ser los detalles de tu cuenta, tu direcci√≥n (de email o postal), el documento de identidad, una prueba de residencia, pero tambi√©n puede ser una notificaci√≥n sobre los intereses acumulados de un descubierto o tu transferencia mensual programada. ¬øC√≥mo funciona?Cuando enviamos un mensaje a Mensajes, recibes una notificaci√≥n emergente en tu tel√©fono vinculado y un email a tu direcci√≥n de correo registrada en la cuenta. Cuando te conectes a la WebApp, recibir√°s un panel con el mensaje. Te enviaremos un mensaje que puedes encontrar en Mensajes y te pediremos que lo contestes directamente desde ah√≠.Esta funci√≥n est√° disponible en nuestra app m√≥vil, haciendo clic en el icono de Ayuda, en la esquina superior derecha. Asegurate de que tienes la √∫ltima versi√≥n de la app. 
No es posible iniciar una conversaci√≥n pero puedes responder cuando te enviemos un mensaje. Si tienes que enviarnos un documento, selecciona la opci√≥n Adjuntar archivo. Recuerda que el tama√±o total de los archivos no debe exceder los 25MB. Mensajes no reemplaza al chat y por supuesto tambi√©n puedes seguir envi√°ndonos emails. Si necesitas contactarnos visita la p√°gina de nuestro Centro de Ayuda: ¬øC√≥mo contactar N26?. Si tenemos que verificarte te pediremos que abras un chat con nosotros.

question: Wie verdiene ich Geld, indem ich Freunde zu N26 einlade?
answer: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald dein Konto vollst√§ndig er√∂ffnet ist.Um zu erfahren welchen Betrag du f√ºr die Empfehlung deines Freundes erhalten kannst, schaust du einfach in der App unter "Freunde einladen":Logge dich in die App einAuf der Startseite gehst du zu ‚ÄúEntdecken‚Äù (App) oder ‚ÄúMein Konto‚Äù¬†(Web-App (neuen Tab))Gehe zu ‚ÄúFreunde einladen‚ÄùTippe auf deinen pers√∂nlichen Empfehlungscode, um ihn zu kopieren und w√§hle aus auf welchem Weg du den Code teilen m√∂chtestDu kannst bei Bedarf eine Nachricht an deinen Freund hinzuf√ºgen oder die Vorgabe nutzen¬†Tippe auf ‚ÄúSenden‚Äù!Damit du den Bonus erh√§ltst, m√ºssen deine Freunde auch alle unsere Voraussetzungen erf√ºllen:Die Anmeldung √ºber deinen Empfehlungslink oder pers√∂nlichen Code abschlie√üen.Abschluss der ersten Transaktion mit der Mastercard in mindestens der H√∂he des Bonuses der Weiterempfehlung. Die Transaktion kann ein Kauf in einem Gesch√§ft, eine Abhebung am Geldautomaten oder eine Online-Zahlung sein (au√üer PayPal).Wenn deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen erf√ºllt haben, wird der Bonus innerhalb von 60 Tagen ausgezahlt. Du kannst den Status jederzeit in deiner mobilen App oder WebApp einsehen.Ingesamt kannst du bis zu 1500‚Ç¨ erhalten, wenn du Freunde einl√§dstFalls dein Werbebonus noch nicht ausgezahlt wurde, haben wir auch einige¬†Gr√ºnde¬†daf√ºr gesammelt.*Der Link verf√§llt nicht und kann jederzeit verwendet werden. Pers√∂nliche Einladungscodes und Links sollten nur f√ºr pers√∂nliche und nichtkommerzielle Zwecke verwendet werden. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Einladungslink √ºber Social Media mit pers√∂nlichen Kontakten teilen kannst, solange du der Haupteigent√ºmer bist. N26 hat das Recht, das Empfehlungsprogramm jederzeit zu beenden.Weitere Informationen findest du in den¬†AGB (neuen Tab)¬†des Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms.

question: What are Instant transfers?
answer: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipient‚Äôs bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you won‚Äôt have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49‚Ç¨Spain - 1,99‚Ç¨Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99‚Ç¨The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000‚Ç¨ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000‚Ç¨ per day). If you‚Äôre using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If you‚Äôre paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiver‚Äôs details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

question: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-√úberweisung?
answer: Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausf√ºhren.¬†Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in deinem Online Banking erstellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.W√§hle Bank√ºberweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt.Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des Empf√§ngers ein und w√§hle Weiter.Gib den Betrag ein und w√§hle Weiter.Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und w√§hle Weiter.√úberpr√ºfe die Zusammenfassung deiner √úberweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine Termin√ºberweisung werden soll oder ein DauerauftragKlicke Absenden und best√§tige mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN.Zum Schluss erh√§ltst du in deinem verkn√ºpften Handy eine Push-Mitteilung, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.¬†Sobald die √úberweisung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen oder die Daten des √úberweisungsempf√§ngers √§ndern.Falls du die √úberweisung nicht best√§tigen kannst, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte, dass:Du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast.In den Einstellungen deines Handys Push-Mitteilungen aktiviert sind.Du dein verkn√ºpftes Handy verwendest.Sobald deine √úberweisung gesendet wurde, kannst du in der App eine √úberweisungsbest√§tigung als PDF herunterladen:Gehe in deine Umsatzliste.Finde deine √úberweisung und tippe auf diese.Scrolle nach unten zu den Informationen zur Transaktion tippe auf √úberweisungsbest√§tigung.Du kannst ausgehende SEPA-√úberweisungen auch direkt aus deinen Spaces mit zugewiesenen IBANs vornehmen. Gehe daf√ºr einfach in den Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN, w√§hle "Geld senden" und dann "Bank√ºberweisung". Das wird dann wie eine normale ausgehende Zahlung gehandhabt.

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you‚Äôll want to go to the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a new space‚Äô in the ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô homepageSelect one of the below options:‚ÄòSaving for a goal‚Äô - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‚ÄòSharing money‚Äô - Allows you to create a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.‚ÄòCreate now, decide later‚Äô - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let‚Äôs start using ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‚ÄòMain Account‚Äô or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‚Äòmanage‚ÄôThen press ‚ÄòLock Space‚Äô or ‚ÄòUnlock Space‚ÄôEnter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‚ÄòSettings‚Äô cog (top-right corner)Select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‚ÄòManage‚Äô:To create a savings goal, select ‚ÄòCreate my goal‚Äô (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‚ÄòSet goal‚ÄôTo enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‚ÄòManage Round-UpsToggle ‚ÄòEnable Round-Ups‚ÄôYou will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‚ÄòCreate a rule‚ÄôChoose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: Documentos bancarios
answer: Como no pod√≠a ser de otra manera, en N26 puedes descargar tu extracto bancario, certificado de titularidad bancaria y m√°s documentos de forma autom√°tica. Todos estos documentos son oficiales y perfectamente v√°lidos sin firma:Extracto bancario: es un documento en el que se refleja tu saldo total y todas las transacciones entrantes y salientes de tu cuenta N26, adem√°s de tu nombre y apellidos, IBAN y BIC. Aqu√≠ te explicamos c√≥mo descargarlo.Certificado de titularidad bancaria: es un documento que confirma que tu cuenta est√° registrada a tu nombre. Incluye tu nombre y apellidos, fecha de nacimiento, el IBAN de la cuenta, la fecha en que te diste de alta y, opcionalmente, tu saldo actual y n√∫mero de tarjeta. Aqu√≠ te mostramos c√≥mo solicitarlo.Estado de comisiones: es un documento en el que puedes ver detalladamente todas las comisiones que te hemos cobrado como banco durante el √∫ltimo a√±o.Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pesta√±a nueva), bajo Estado de Comisiones, selecciona si lo quieres de los √∫ltimos 6 o 12 meses y haz clic en Solicitar. Recibir√°s el PDF en la secci√≥n Mensajes dentro de 24 horas.Justificante de pago por transferencia bancaria: es un documento que prueba que has hecho una transferencia. Incluye tu nombre y apellidos, tu direcci√≥n registrada en N26, el IBAN y BIC de tu cuenta, el importe, fecha y concepto de la transferencia, nombre y apellidos del beneficiario, su IBAN y su BIC.Desde la app del m√≥vil o la WebApp: en la pantalla de Inicio, elige la transferencia en cuesti√≥n y selecciona Confirmaci√≥n de transferencia. El PDF se genera autom√°ticamente.Justificante de pago con tarjeta: sirve para demostrar o probar que has hecho un pago con tu tarjeta. Puedes hacerlo presentando el extracto bancario del mes en cuesti√≥n.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire en franc√©s): es un documento espec√≠fico para las autoridades francesas donde se recoge tu informaci√≥n bancaria b√°sica; nombre y apellidos, direcci√≥n legal, IBAN y BIC.Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pesta√±a nueva), baja hasta el apartado RIB y haz clic en Solicitar. ¬†* El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del bot√≥n de Ingresar dinero.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You‚Äôll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism¬†As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26‚Äôs public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API¬† & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as ‚Äúpending‚Äù will be classified as ‚Äúbooked‚Äù transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We‚Äôve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: How can I pay bills and top-up my phone from the app?
answer: Starting from the 1st of September, it will be possible for all the customers with Italian Terms and Conditions to pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and top-up their phone directly from their mobile app with the N26 debit card.This service is provided in collaboration with PayTipper SpA, a payment institution that has been a partner of the Enel X group since 2019.How to make payments to 3rd parties within the N26 mobile app:Log in to the N26 app and click on "Send money"Select "Other payments"In the menu, select the payment you want to make (Phone top-up, PagoPA, Postal bulletins, MAV or RAV, Car tax)You will then be redirected to the website of that service provider and will be able to perform the paymentThe service is not provided directly by N26 but by the 3rd party service providers. For this reason, by using this payment method, you will be subject to the processing of personal data, terms and conditions and any possible commissions not dependent on N26. In some cases the service might be offered only in Italian.If you need assistance with a payment or would like to receive a payment receipt, please get in contact with the customer support of the service provider you have chosen. Click here to get in touch with PayTipper (new tab)Below you can find customer support contacts for the main Italian network providers (please refer to the respective websites for opening hours and service costs):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: ¬øC√≥mo hacer la declaraci√≥n de la renta y pagar impuestos con N26?
answer: N26 es el primer neobanco espa√±ol que permite a sus clientes efectuar el pago de liquidaciones y deudas a trav√©s de la Agencia Tributaria (AEAT) desde la propia app. Esto significa que puedes usar tu cuenta N26 para hacer la declaraci√≥n de la renta y pagar impuestos como el IVA y el IRPF, entre muchos otros.¬øQu√© impuestos puedo pagar con mi cuenta N26?Lo primero a tener en cuenta es que este proceso solo aplica a los ejercicios del a√±o 2019 en adelante. A pesar de que N26 sigue sin ser una entidad colaboradora de la Agencia Tributaria, puedes pagar la inmensa mayor√≠a de impuestos. De los m√°s de 700 tributos de la AEAT, puedes pagar todos excepto los modelos: 576, 602, 696, 770, 771, 003, 060, 061, 069, 790, 990, 791 y 991.Por desgracia, todav√≠a no es posible pagar los impuestos de la Seguridad Social, como la cuota de aut√≥nomos, ni recibir prestaciones, como el paro o la jubilaci√≥n.¬øC√≥mo puedo pagar impuestos de la AEAT con N26?Este proceso es igual tanto para clientes con IBAN espa√±ol (que empieza por ES) como para clientes con IBAN alem√°n o italiano (que empieza por DE o IT, respectivamente):Clica en el siguiente link (pesta√±a nueva)para acceder a la p√°gina de la AEAT donde podr√°s rellenar tus datosSigue las instrucciones para cumplimentar el formulario del impuesto y, al elegir la modalidad de pago, selecciona Reconocimiento de deuda y pago por transferencia.En este punto, la AEAT te mostrar√° los datos bancarios para hacer la transferencia desde N26: IBAN, BIC/SWIFT, importe, concepto y fecha l√≠mite de recepci√≥n.Vuelve a tu app N26 y selecciona Enviar dinero > Transferencia bancaria.Introduce los datos bancarios de la AEAT y aseg√∫rate de a√±adir el c√≥digo indicado como concepto de la transferencia.Selecciona si quieres enviar una transferencia ordinaria o una transferencia inmediata (gratis para clientes premium o 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ para cuentas Est√°ndar).Ten en cuenta que una transferencia ordinaria tardar√° entre 24 y 48 horas laborables en llegar a la cuenta de destino y saldar la deuda. De modo que si tienes un plazo muy justo, te recomendamos seleccionar la transferencia inmediata.Encuentra aqui una breve explicaci√≥n visual sobre como pagar impuestos o hacer tu declaraci√≥n desde la AEAT.Renta 2021 - Opciones de pago (pesta√±a nueva)

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app‚Äì‚Äìno debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store‚Äì‚Äìit‚Äôs that simple. Plus, you don‚Äôt have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you‚Äôll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.¬†If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of ‚Ç¨2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.

question: Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôun compte N26 Standard ?
answer: Le compte N26 Standard est un compte courant num√©rique s√ªr et intuitif que vous pouvez ouvrir en quelques minutes, directement depuis votre smartphone. Il est d‚Äôune grande simplicit√© et transparence, vous permettant de recevoir, d‚Äôenvoyer et de d√©penser de l‚Äôargent en toute confiance. Le compte N26 Standard est gratuit*, vous offrant une solution simple et abordable pour tous vos besoins financiers.¬†Que comprend un compte N26 Standard ?Notre compte N26 Standard pr√©sente les avantages et fonctionnalit√©s suivants :Compte courant gratuit* : Notre compte N26 Standard est gratuit (*si le solde du compte est de 50 000 ‚Ç¨ ou plus, des droits de garde peuvent √™tre pr√©lev√©s).Carte virtuelle N26 : L‚Äôouverture du compte N26 vous donne droit √† une carte virtuelle gratuite qui comporte un num√©ro PAN complet et qui peut √™tre ajout√©e √† Apple ou Google Pay pour les achats en ligne et en magasin.Carte physique N26 Mastercard : Pour 10 ‚Ç¨ suppl√©mentaires, vous pouvez recevoir une carte de d√©bit physique N26 Standard (veuillez noter que vous devez disposer d‚Äôau moins 10 ‚Ç¨ sur votre compte pour la fabrication et l‚Äôenvoi de la carte).Paiements et virements : Vous pouvez effectuer et recevoir des virements SEPA en utilisant votre application mobile N26. Vous pouvez √©galement envoyer de l‚Äôargent instantan√©ment √† d‚Äôautres clients N26 en utilisant Moneybeam.Autres services financiers : Si vous √™tes √©ligible, vous pouvez √©galement demander d‚Äôautres services financiers, tels que les d√©couverts autoris√©s, N26 Cr√©dit, N26 √âpargne, etc.CASH26 : Effectuez des retraits et d√©p√¥ts en utilisant notre fonctionnalit√© CASH26 (Conditions g√©n√©rales d‚Äôutilisation DE, AT et IT).Service Client : Vous pouvez contacter notre incroyable √©quipe de service client en utilisant le livechat de l‚Äôapplication ou en d√©marrant un chat depuis notre site internet ou votre espace client N26. Notre nouveau compte N26 Standard vous donne droit √† une carte de d√©bit virtuelle gratuite. Un compte N26 Standard actif vous permet d‚Äôeffectuer des paiements en ligne et en magasin. En outre, vous pouvez ajouter votre carte virtuelle √† votre portefeuille Apple ou Google Pay.Vous trouverez les d√©tails de votre carte virtuelle et votre num√©ro PAN complet dans votre application N26 pour effectuer des achats en ligne.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine extra Karte?
answer: Klicke hier, wenn du deine Karte ersetzen willst, anstatt eine zus√§tzliche Karte zu bestellen.So kannst du eine extra Karte bestellen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto einGehe zu: Entdecken¬†W√§hle: Zusatzkarte > MastercardW√§hle deine bevorzugte Farbe und VersandartTippe: Best√§tigen und BezahlenDie Zusatzkarte kostet 10‚Ç¨ per Standardversand und 25‚Ç¨ per Expresslieferung. question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
answer: Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten √ºber kirchensteuerliche Abz√ºge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgef√ºhrt.Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen √ºber deine Religionszugeh√∂rigkeit durch das Formular¬†‚ÄûErkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk‚Äú (neuen Tab)¬†Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. Wenn du Widerspruch einlegst, wird dein Finanzamt dich auffordern, eine Kirchensteuererkl√§rung abzugeben.Weitere Informationen findest du auf der Website des¬†Bundeszentralamtes f√ºr Steuern (neuen Tab).

question: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business ?
answer:
Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Islande Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Suisse et Su√®de.Le compte N26 Business est con√ßu sp√©cialement¬†pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Ce compte permet de g√©rer vos d√©penses professionnelles avec un compte bancaire et une carte de d√©bit¬†√† votre nom. Le compte et la carte ne peuvent donc pas porter le nom de votre activit√©.Pour le moment, il n‚Äôest pas possible de passer d‚Äôun compte Business √† un compte Standard, You ou Metal (ou vice versa). D‚Äôembl√©e, il est donc important de savoir si ce type de compte r√©pond √† vos besoins quotidiens.Le compte N26 BusinessCe compte est gratuit¬†et vous b√©n√©ficiez, selon votre pays, d‚Äôun certain nombre de retraits mensuels gratuits en distributeurs d‚Äôapr√®s notre¬†Politique d‚ÄôUtilisation √âquitable.Le compte N26 Business vous permet de :recevoir, en votre nom, les paiements de vos clients.r√©gler vos d√©penses professionnelles (d√©placements ou fournitures) ou votre loyer professionnel, toujours en votre nom. b√©n√©ficier de toutes les fonctionnalit√©s et avantages offerts par le compte N26 Standard. Quelques points √† consid√©rer :Les¬†virements en devises √©trang√®res ne sont pas possibles depuis l'application N26 avec un compte Business. 
Si vous souhaitez toutefois faire un virement en devises √©trang√®res, vous pouvez le faire en vous rendant sur le site de¬†Wise (nouvel onglet) en y cr√©ant un compte professionnel. Pour le moment, les pr√©l√®vements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business. La carte Mastercard N26 BusinessLa carte Mastercard du compte N26 Business est uniquement destin√©e √† un usage √† des fins commerciales. Vous recevez chaque mois 0,1 % de remise en argent ou cashback sur vos paiements effectu√©s avec cette carte. Le montant du cashback est calcul√© de fa√ßon mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusqu‚Äô√† 7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relev√© de compte.Si vous avez besoin d'une carte suppl√©mentaire pour vos achats priv√©s, nous vous conseillons d'opter pour la carte¬†Maestro¬†(disponible en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas).

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

question: Was ist Phishing?
answer: Phishing ist eine einfache und wirksame Methode, mit der Hacker Menschen dazu bringen, sensible pers√∂nliche Daten preiszugeben. Sobald sie an diese Informationen gelangt sind, k√∂nnen sie diese f√ºr verschiedene Betr√ºgereien nutzen, indem sie im Namen ihrer Opfer auftreten. (neuen Tab) Hier (neuen Tab) kannst du mehr dar√ºber erfahren. In unserem Blogbeitrag erkl√§ren wir dir, wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und dich davor sch√ºtzen kannst.Wie du verd√§chtige E-Mails und Textnachrichten meldestN26 versendet niemals Textnachrichten oder E-Mails, die dringliche Warnungen enthalten und dich dazu auffordern, dich in dein Konto einzuloggen und pers√∂nliche Daten herauszugeben. Wir stellen dir niemals ein Ultimatum, noch bitten wir dich je darum, dich au√üerhalb unserer sicheren Kommunikationskan√§le zu authentifizieren oder deine Daten zu verifizieren.Verd√§chtige E-MailsKlicke keine Links an und lade keine Anh√§nge herunter, wenn du eine verd√§chtige E-Mail erh√§ltst. Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:die verd√§chtigen E-Mails unter support@n26.com an uns weiterzuleitenODERdie verd√§chtige E-Mail wenn m√∂glich als ‚Äûeml‚Äú-Datei zu speichern und an uns zu senden. Die meisten E-Mail-Anbieter speichern die Datei automatisch in diesem Format, wenn du sie herunterl√§dst. Wenn du uns die verd√§chtige E-Mail in diesem Format zusendest, k√∂nnen wir den wahren Ursprung der Nachricht ermitteln und den Vorfall den zust√§ndigen Beh√∂rden melden. Wenn du Schwierigkeiten hast, die E-Mail in diesem Format zu speichern: kein Problem. Leite dann die verd√§chtigen E-Mails einfach an die obige Adresse weiter.¬†Bitte sende uns keine Screenshots, da wir damit nichts anfangen k√∂nnen. L√∂sche danach die E-Mail aus deinem Postfach.Verd√§chtige TextnachrichtenKlicke keine Links an und gib keine Daten ein, wenn du eine verd√§chtige Textnachricht erh√§ltst.Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:¬†einen Screenshot der erhaltenen Nachricht zu machen und an support@n26.com zu senden;achte bitte darauf, dass die komplette Nachricht, einschlie√ülich Telefonnummer des Absenders und Datum/Uhrzeit, sichtbar ist;blockiere die Telefonnummer, wenn du eine Best√§tigung von uns erh√§ltst, dass es sich um eine Phishing-Nachricht handelt;l√∂sche die Nachricht von deinem Mobiltelefon.¬†Verd√§chtige TelefonanrufeWenn du einen verd√§chtigen Anruf erh√§ltst, unabh√§ngig davon, ob dieser von einer unserer Telefonnummern ausgeht oder nicht, gib keine personenbezogenen Daten an, die sich auf dein Konto oder die damit verbundene Karte beziehen. Wir weisen darauf hin, dass Betr√ºger in einigen F√§llen mit der "Spoofing"-Technologie die Telefonnummer des Absenders verschleiern k√∂nnen, so dass diese so aussieht wie die Telefonnummer der Bank.Wenn du also den Verdacht hast, dass du einem Telefonbetrug zum Opfer gefallen bist oder deine pers√∂nlichen Daten weitergegeben hast, wende dich bitte umgehend an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com.Wie du eine gef√§lschte Website meldestM√∂glicherweise findest du dich irgendwann einmal auf einer fragw√ºrdigen Website wieder, die vorgibt, im Namen von N26 f√ºr Dienstleistungen zu werben. Oder du siehst unser Logo auf vermeintlichen Partnerseiten. M√∂glicherweise bieten sie Kredite an oder zeitlich begrenzte Werbeangebote. Bitte behalte Folgendes im Hinterkopf: Die Tatsache, dass ‚ÄûN26‚Äú Bestandteil einer URL ist, bedeutet nicht unbedingt, dass die Webseite seri√∂s ist.Wenn du vermutest, dass du dich auf einer betr√ºgerischen Webseite befindest, solltest du einen Moment innehalten und Folgendes tun:√úberpr√ºfe die Adresszeile und vergewissere dich, dass die URL https://app.n26.com/login lautet. Ist das nicht der Fall, kopiere die URL bitte und melde sie sogleich hier: support@n26.com.¬†

question: Kann ich meine Karte mit Expressversand schneller bekommen?
answer: Die Expresslieferung ist eine gute Wahl, wenn du deine Karte schnell ben√∂tigst. Wenn du deine erste Karte bestellst oder eine neue Karte bestellst, steht auch die Option Expressversand zur Verf√ºgung. Die Karte ist nicht nur schneller bei dir, du erh√§ltst auch noch einen Tracking-Link per E-Mail. Wenn du bei der Zustellung nicht zu Hause bist und dein Postfach nicht erreichbar ist, wird die Karte an einen Zugangspunkt in deiner N√§he geliefert (den du √ºber den Tracking-Link findest). Die Karte bleibt nur f√ºr eine begrenzte Zeit dort, danach wird sie an uns zur√ºckgesandt. Wir informieren dich in diesem Fall per E-Mail.Wenn du die Expresslieferung w√§hlst, beachte bitte:Deine N26 Standard-, N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Karte wird innerhalb von drei Werktagen ausgeliefert. Die Zustellung erfolgt zwischen 8 und 12 Uhr.Lieferungen k√∂nnen per DHL Express in alle von uns unterst√ºtzten L√§nder innerhalb Europas erfolgen. Lieferungen in andere L√§nder sind derzeit nicht m√∂glich.Wenn Expresslieferung als Versandart ausgew√§hlt wurde, kann die Lieferung nicht storniert oder ge√§ndert werden.Falls du die Expresslieferung gew√§hlt hast und dein Konto nun schlie√üen willst, wird die Geb√ºhr f√ºr die Expresslieferung dennoch f√§llig.Wenn deine Karte nicht innerhalb von 3-5 Werktagen nach deiner Bestellung eingetroffen ist, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte den Tracking-Link auf m√∂gliche Updates. Du kannst den Tracking-Link auch verwenden, um DHL direkt √ºber die Details deiner Lieferadresse zu informieren oder die Sendung umzuleiten, wenn du zum Zeitpunkt der Lieferung nicht zuhause bist.Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 10‚Ç¨ inklusive Standardversand oder 30‚Ç¨, wenn du dich f√ºr eine Expresslieferung entscheidest. Wie viel kostet die Expresslieferung?N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 YOU-Karten:Erste Karte bei Kontoer√∂ffnung: 25‚Ç¨Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 30‚Ç¨N26-YOU-Zusatzkarte: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal-Karten:Erste Karte bei Kontoer√∂ffnung: 25‚Ç¨Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 65‚Ç¨

question: Come bloccare la mia carta N26?
answer: Puoi bloccare e sbloccare le tue carte in qualsiasi momento nell‚Äôapp. Accedi, seleziona Carte¬†e poi¬†Impostazioni della carta. Qui puoi decidere se vuoi limitare temporaneamente o disattivare i prelievi bancomat, i pagamenti online o all‚Äôestero, o bloccare del tutto la carta di debito.In questo modo hai il pieno controllo della tua carta e puoi proteggerti da¬†transazioni non autorizzate. In caso di sospetto, blocca immediatamente la carta. Puoi sempre sbloccarla successivamente.Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:¬†üë§¬†My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?¬†N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.¬†With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we‚Äôre able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We‚Äôre going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.¬†Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: Comment passer au compte bancaire N26 Smart ?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è N26 Smart est disponible dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Islande, Italie, Lettonie, Liechtenstein, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Su√®de.Vous pouvez souscrire au compte premium N26 Smart :lors de l‚Äôouverture de votre comptesi vous avez d√©j√† un compte bancaire N26 Standard :acc√©dez simplement √† l‚Äôonglet D√©couvrir.S√©lectionnez N26 Smart.Lors de votre commande, vous pouvez choisir l‚Äôune des cinq couleurs disponibles pour votre carte bancaire : Rhubarbe, Oc√©an, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.Ensuite, indiquez la m√©thode de livraison de votre choix, acceptez les Conditions g√©n√©rales de N26 Smart et votre nouvelle carte sera en route.Bon √† savoir :La livraison standard a un d√©lai de 15 jours ouvr√©s maximum.La (nouvel onglet) livraison express vous permet de recevoir votre carte N26 sous 3 jours ouvr√©s.Les frais d‚Äôadh√©sion de 4,90 ‚Ç¨ sont pr√©lev√©s directement de votre compte N26 chaque mois, en fonction de la date de votre souscription √† N26 Smart.Vous pouvez commander une carte suppl√©mentaire N26 Smart directement depuis l‚Äôapplication N26, moyennant un paiement unique de 10 ‚Ç¨.

question: Comment bloquer la bande magn√©tique de ma carte ?
answer: ¬†Il y a diff√©rentes mani√®res de payer par carte bancaire : sans contact (en approchant votre carte du terminal), avec le code PIN, avec la bande magn√©tique de votre carte en glissant votre carte dans un lecteur. M√™me si les transactions effectu√©es avec la bande magn√©tique sont de moins en moins communes, certains commer√ßants vous demandent encore de payer avec ce mode de paiement.Pourquoi devrais-je bloquer mes transactions avec bande magn√©tique ?Les paiements avec bande magn√©tique repr√©sentent une grande partie des fraudes √† la carte bancaire. Certains commer√ßants ont des syst√®mes frauduleux qui copient les informations de votre carte pour ensuite les utiliser afin d‚Äôeffectuer des transactions frauduleuses, ce processus est appel√© ¬´ clonage de carte ¬ª. En bloquant les transactions avec bande magn√©tique, vous pouvez vous prot√©ger de ces risques de fraudes.Comment puis-je bloquer/d√©bloquer mes transactions avec bande magn√©tique ?Pour bloquer vos transactions avec bande magn√©tique :¬†Acc√©dez √† Cartes.¬†Si vous avez plusieurs cartes, il vous suffit de balayer √† droite avec votre doigt sur l‚Äô√©cran jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez.S√©lectionnez Param√®tres de la carte.Cliquez sur bande magn√©tique.Basculer l‚Äôoption Activer la bande magn√©tique.Ici, vous pouvez aussi d√©sactiver la bande magn√©tique. Les changements effectu√©s sont directement appliqu√©s sur la carte que vous avez choisie.

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards: 45‚Ç¨Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.¬†You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list¬†Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don‚Äôt currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You‚Äôll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

question: How does N26 Business Smart work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs ‚Ç¨4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

question: Wo kann ich kostenlos Bargeld abheben?
answer: Mit deiner N26-Mastercard hast du eine bestimmte Anzahl kostenloser Abhebungen am Geldautomaten gem√§√ü unserer Fair-Use-Policy.Au√üerdem kannst du den Mastercard ATM Locator (neuen Tab) benutzen, um kostenlose Geldautomaten zu finden.Abhebungen via CASH26 sind immer kostenlos in teilnehmenden Partnergesch√§ften.*Kunden in Spanien: Einige Geldautomatenbetreiber in Spanien erheben eine unabh√§ngige Geb√ºhr von ca. 2‚Ç¨. Diese Geb√ºhr k√∂nnen wir nicht verhindern, aber wir erstatten sie zur√ºck, wenn du in im per Chat in deiner App kontaktierst. In der Zwischenzeit kannst du bei den folgenden Banken kostenfrei Geld abheben:AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Hier findest du weitere Gr√ºnde, warum Ihnen eine Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet werden k√∂nnte.

question: Was genau sind Karten f√ºr Spaces?
answer:
Mit unserer neuen Funktion Karten f√ºr Spaces kannst du deine individuellen Unterkonten mit einer eigenen N26-Karte verkn√ºpfen, sodass Zahlungen von dem verkn√ºpften Space-Unterkonto abgerechnet werden.
Wie funktioniert das?Mit Karten f√ºr Spaces k√∂nnen N26 Nutzer mit einem Premiumabo (N26 Smart, You oder Metal) ihre physische oder digitale N26-Karte mit einem Space-Unterkonto verkn√ºpfen und das Guthaben auf dem Unterkonto f√ºr pers√∂nliche Ausgaben nutzen. Im Folgenden erh√§ltst du einen √úberblick √ºber die vielen M√∂glichkeiten, deine N26-Karte mit deinen Spaces zu verkn√ºpfen:¬†Du kannst deine N26-Karte mit einem deiner Spaces und wieder mit deinem Hauptkonto verkn√ºpfen.Du kannst mehrere Karten mit einem Space oder mit verschiedenen Spaces verkn√ºpfenWenn du eine physische N26 Mastercard mit einem Space verkn√ºpfst, kannst du mit dieser Karte automatisch Apple und Google Pay nutzen. (Dies gilt nicht f√ºr Maestro-Karten.)Die Funktion steht noch nicht f√ºr Shared Spaces zur Verf√ºgung.Wie verkn√ºpfe ich meine Karte mit einem Space?Du kannst deine bestehenden digitalen und physischen Karten mit deinem gew√§hlten Space verkn√ºpfen.Daf√ºr gibt es 3 M√∂glichkeiten:Im Tab Karten siehst du unter jeder Karte die Schaltfl√§che, mit der du den gew√ºnschten Space ausw√§hlen kannst.In den Karteneinstellungen kannst du auch den gew√ºnschten Space ausw√§hlen und diesen mit deiner Karte verkn√ºpfen.In den Einstellungen jedes Spaces kannst du die Karte ausw√§hlen, die mit dem jeweiligen Space verkn√ºpft werden soll.Immer wenn du deine Karte mit deinem Hauptkonto oder einem anderen Space verkn√ºpfen m√∂chtest, w√§hlst du einfach "Hauptkonto" oder den anderen Space im Dropdown-Men√º aus.

question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal¬†contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you‚Äôre now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you‚Äôll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.¬†RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.¬† At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of ‚Ç¨10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: Was sind ‚ÄúNachrichten‚Äù?
answer: Die Sicherheit deiner Daten hat f√ºr uns h√∂chste Priorit√§t. Deshalb haben wir einen Posteingang direkt in deiner N26 App erstellt, an den wir Nachrichten schicken k√∂nnen. Alle Inhalte, die personenbezogene Daten enthalten, werden an Nachrichten geschickt. Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse benutzen wir weiterhin f√ºr allgemeine Informationen. Was sind personenbezogene Daten?Personenbezogene Daten sind solche Daten, die dich identifizierbar machen oder anhand derer man dich identifizieren k√∂nnte. Dazu z√§hlen deine Kontodaten, deine Adresse (E-Mail oder postalisch), Ausweisdokumente, Meldebescheinigung, aber auch Mitteilungen √ºber anfallende Dispokreditzinsen oder √ºber Dauerauftr√§ge.Wie funktioniert‚Äôs?Wenn wir dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken, erh√§ltst du eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t und eine E-Mail an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn du dich in die WebApp einloggst, wirst du ebenfalls durch eine Info-Karte √ºber neue Nachrichten informiert.Wir werden dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken und bitten dich, direkt von dort zu antworten.Diese Funktion ist in unserer mobilen App verf√ºgbar, indem du oben rechts auf das Support-Symbol klickst.¬†Stelle sicher, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast.Du kannst keine E-Mail-Unterhaltung starten, aber du kannst antworten, sobald wir dir die erste Nachricht geschickt haben. Wenn es darum geht, uns ein Dokument zu schicken, w√§hle Datei anh√§ngen. Bitte stelle sicher, dass die gesamte Gr√∂√üe der Anh√§nge pro Nachricht nicht gr√∂√üer ist als 25 MB.Nachrichten ersetzt nicht unseren Live Chat und du kannst uns weiterhin per E-Mail von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren. Wie du als erstes mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst, erf√§hrst du in unserem Artikel: Wie kontaktiere ich N26? Falls wir dich f√ºr dein Anliegen verifizieren m√ºssen, bitten wir dich, einen Chat mit uns zu starten.

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard‚Äôs exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn‚Äôt charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard‚Äôs rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You‚Äôll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism¬†As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26‚Äôs public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API¬† & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as ‚Äúpending‚Äù will be classified as ‚Äúbooked‚Äù transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We‚Äôve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: Do I have to declare my N26 account in Spain?
answer: ¬†The Agencia Tributaria offers assistance to those who need to declare their taxes and assets in a foreign country.¬†¬†¬†In regards to your N26 account, this will depend on the type of IBAN you have:¬†If you have a Spanish IBAN (starting with ES), your account is Spanish and you don‚Äôt need to declare it. If you have a German IBAN (starting with DE), your account and money is situated in Germany. In this case you would be obligated to declare it, following specific legal requirements.¬†To know if one of the above scenarios applies to your N26 account, I‚Äôd recommend that you inquire with a professional in regards to this matter as we‚Äôre not eligible to give tax advice.¬†¬†Read more information about this in the official website of the Agencia Tributaria (new tab).

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10‚Ç¨N26 Metal cards: 45‚Ç¨Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30‚Ç¨N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.
