Si vous souhaitez effectuer des virements en devises √©trang√®res, vous pouvez vous rendre directement sur le site internet de TransferWise ou le faire depuis leur application mobile.¬†Veuillez noter que pour effectuer des virements √† titre professionnel, vous aurez besoin de cr√©er un compte pour entreprise depuis votre espace en ligne TransferWise.La carte N26 Business You est une Mastercard con√ßue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Vous b√©n√©ficiez de 0,1 % de cashback sur tous vos achats effectu√©s avec votre carte N26 Business. Le montant du cashback est calcul√© de fa√ßon mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusqu‚Äô√† 7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relev√© de compte.Pour le moment, les pr√©l√®vements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business You. *Allianz Global Assistance Europe, d√©nomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise membre du Groupe Allianz.

question: Que sont les Espaces Partag√©s ?

Ces espaces peuvent √™tre utilis√©s pour partager des factures entre colocataires, pour pr√©voir le budget de ses prochaines vacances entre amis ou faire un pot commun pour le cadeau d‚Äôanniversaire d‚Äôun proche, par exemple.Les espaces partag√©s sont disponibles pour les utilisateurs premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You et N26 Business Metal), qui peuvent cr√©er et inviter des participants √† contribuer √† un espace partag√©.Tous les utilisateurs N26, quel que soit le compte qu‚Äôils poss√®dent, peuvent √™tre invit√©s √† rejoindre un espace partag√©.L‚Äôadministrateur de l‚Äôespace partag√© poss√®de l‚Äôargent contenu dans ce dernier.L‚Äôadministrateur peut inviter jusqu‚Äô√† 10 participants dans un espace partag√©.Comme pour tous les espaces, les espaces partag√©s ne sont ni rattach√©s √† un IBAN ni √† une carte.

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).¬†In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
answer: If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.Foreign currency transfers with Wise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).2 Spaces in addition to the main account.A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using Wise (on their website (new tab)) or using your local bank.For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use Wise in the app.**Please note: Wise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.¬†Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?¬†Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you‚Äôre asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.¬†If you have a feeling that something is off, don‚Äôt ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don‚Äôt click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender‚Äôs identity.If you‚Äôve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you‚Äôd like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Perch√© il mio bonus per i referral non √® arrivato?
answer: Ricorda: per ricevere il tuo bonus, il tuo amico deve eseguire una prima transazione con carta (acquisto in negozio, prelievo bancomat o pagamento online - PayPal escluso) pari almeno al valore del bonus di riferimento. Il premio pu√≤ richiedere fino a 60 giorni per essere accreditato sul tuo conto.Una volta che il tuo amico ha completato tutti i criteri di ammissibilit√† del nostro¬†Programma Invita un amico, verificheremo la tua ricompensa. Puoi sempre accedere al tuo conto nell'app o¬†WebApp (nuova tabella)¬†per verificare lo stato della tua ricompensa.Nella maggior parte dei casi il bonus non viene accreditato perch√© l'amico invitato non ha effettuato una prima transazione Mastercard Transazioni almeno del valore della ricompensa o superiori. Ad esempio, per una ricompensa di 15 ‚Ç¨ il valore della transazione deve essere di almeno 15 ‚Ç¨ o superiore. Assicurati di informare i tuoi amici di questi requisiti.Tieni presente che il processo di ricompensa potrebbe richiedere fino a 60 giorni.N26 si riserva il diritto di trattenere la ricompensa in caso di attivit√† sospette che violano i¬†Termini e condizioni (nuova tabella).

question: Bank information‚Äîyour N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‚ÄòAdd Money‚Äô button.

question: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
answer: Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine f√§llige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zur√ºckgegeben und dir wird eine¬†Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨¬†berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus ger√§t, werden √úberziehungszinsen in der H√∂he von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verz√∂gert werden.Um diese Geb√ºhr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App pr√ºfen, ob dir ein¬†Dispokredit¬†zur Verf√ºgung steht.IBANs f√ºr Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Lastschrift√ºberweisung abgewiesen und dir eine Geb√ºhr in H√∂he von 3 ‚Ç¨ berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht m√∂glich ist, deinen Space zu √ºberziehen.*F√ºr L√§nder mit einer anderen Hauptw√§hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienD√§nemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRum√§nienSchwedenSchweizDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‚ÄòSharing Money‚ÄôRead the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù will pop-up. Tap ‚Äúsign‚ÄùCheck both ‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù and ‚ÄúPower of attorney‚Äù, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: Lutto e successione
answer:
Come faccio a informare N26 in caso di decesso?¬†In caso di decesso, gli eredi si trovano ad affrontare molte sfide burocratiche. Una di queste √® la risoluzione dei conti correnti del defunto.¬†Il modo pi√π semplice per contattare N26 a riguardo √® via email. In alternativa, √® possibile inviare la richiesta per lettera o (se applicabile, via fax):Email: servizio.successioni@n26.comPEC: successioni@pec.n26.com¬†Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana¬† 
-Servizio Successioni-
Via Filippo Sassetti 32,¬†20124 Milano (MI) ITALIAN26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana¬†
c/o N26 Bank AG¬†-Servizio Successioni-
Klosterstr. 62,¬†10179 Berlin - GERMANYTi preghiamo di informarci su:¬†Chi √® il defunto?¬†Se possibile, allegare un certificato di morte poich√© questo √® il modo pi√π affidabile per identificare qualsiasi conto corrente associato.¬†Come possiamo contattare i beneficiari?Ti chiediamo di fornire il nome completo, indirizzo di spedizione e indirizzo email di chi si occuper√† di comunicare con noi. Non sar√† possibile organizzare una chiamata.C'√® qualcosa che dovremmo sapere in anticipo?¬†Se stai affrontando determinate procedure (ad es., rifiuto dell'eredit√† o compilazione di un inventario) o hai gi√† documenti specifici a disposizione, pu√≤ essere utile condividerli con noi.¬†Ricontatteremo te o i beneficiari per informazioni relative alle procedure successive.¬†Ti preghiamo di non inviarci i documenti originali per posta in questa fase. Ti informeremo se ci occorrono gli originali in ogni singolo caso.¬†Cosa succede a un conto N26 se il titolare del conto viene a mancare?A causa delle differenze locali tra le leggi e i regolamenti, la procedura pu√≤ variare a seconda del Paese.¬†Tuttavia, tutti i conti con N26 Bank GmbH, Succursale Italiana sono in Italia.¬†Non appena veniamo informati del decesso di uno dei nostri clienti, le carte associate, l'online banking e qualsiasi accesso all'app verr√† disabilitato. Allo stesso modo tutti i pagamenti regolari come bonifici periodici o bonifici SEPA per gli addebiti diretti, non verranno pi√π eseguiti.Ti preghiamo inoltre di notare che, in linea di principio, siamo tenuti legalmente a informare l'autorit√† fiscale responsabile dell'imposta di successione dei beni appartenenti all'eredit√†. Potresti dover rispondere ad alcune domande per svincolare i beni con N26.Ti consigliamo di metterti in contatto con le autorit√† fiscali competenti nel tuo Paese per adempiere ai requisiti fiscali locali (se ne esistono).In ogni caso, comunicheremo ai beneficiari quali documenti esatti devono fornire per regolare il conto del defunto con N26.Sono un cliente, posso prendere misure precauzionali in caso di decesso?¬†Ci sono diversi modi per assicurarti che i tuoi beni siano distribuiti secondo le tue esigenze.¬†Per questo motivo, consigliamo caldamente a chiunque sia coinvolto pi√π intensamente nella redazione di un testamento, di chiedere assistenza legale a un avvocato, notaio o un consulente fiscale. Questo vale soprattutto nel caso in cui nell'eredit√† siano inclusi beni pi√π importanti.¬†Il nostro Supporto Clienti o gli esperti del nostro reparto successioni non possono offrirti ulteriori consigli su questo argomento.Per ulteriori informazioni su situazioni specifiche, ti preghiamo di chiedere l'assistenza professionale di un servizio di consulenza adeguato.¬†

question: Wie verhindere ich Betrug via SMS?
answer: Hast du eine SMS mit einem verd√§chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link √∂ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch, machmal Smishing (neuen Tab) genannt. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empf√§ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu √∂ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)¬†Die ge√∂ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie au√üerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, f√ºr N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verd√§chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zus√§tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu best√§tigen. Best√§tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der Zahlungsempf√§nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verd√§chtigen Link ge√∂ffnet habe?√Ñndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zun√§chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort √§ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Login‚ÄìBildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den n√§chsten Schritten.Falls du pers√∂nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto gesch√ºtzt bleibt. Bitte schicke au√üerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Muss ich in der App eine Zahlung best√§tigen, um eine R√ºckerstattung zu erhalten?Nein! Wir werden dich nie auffordern eine Zahlung zu best√§tigen, die du nicht get√§tigt hast. Wenn du den Namen oder die IBAN des Empf√§ngers nicht kennst, best√§tigt die Zahlung niemals. Das gilt auch f√ºr die E-Mail-Adresse oder Telefonnumer bei MoneyBeams und den Firmennamen bei Kartenzahlungen.Wie erkenne ich offizielle Nachrichten von N26?Wir werden dir nie einen Link per SMS schicken! Wir schicken nur Verifizierungscodes via AUTHMS, die nur von dir angefordert werden k√∂nnen. Mit diesen Codes bzw. Einmalpassw√∂rtern (OTP) kannst du dich in die App einloggen oder dein Ger√§t verkn√ºpfen. Teile deine OTP mit niemandem!Unsere meistgenutzten Kommunikationskan√§le sind Chat, E-Mail und unsere Hotline f√ºr Premium-Kunden.¬†Wir rufen unsere Kunden nicht an, au√üer ein Kunde bittet um einen R√ºckruf. Falls du also Nachricht erh√§ltst, dass wir dich demn√§chst anrufen, nachdem du auf einen verd√§chtigen Link geklickt hast, solltest skeptisch sein! Hier findest du weiter Informationen dazu, wie N26 mit dir kommuniziert. (neuen Tab)Wie finden Betr√ºger meine pers√∂nlichen Daten heraus?Heutzutage sind deine pers√∂nlichen Daten wahrscheinlich online in sozialen Medien wie Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc zu finden. H√§ufig werden sensible Daten nicht ausreichend gesichert. Betr√ºger nutzen das zu ihrem Vorteil.

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don‚Äôt recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?¬†Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.¬†¬†N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant‚Äôs part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn‚Äôt receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26¬†You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.¬†Go to the ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute¬†Tap ‚ÄòGet help with this transaction‚Äô and follow the steps provided.¬†Important:¬†If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you‚Äôll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You‚Äôll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.¬†¬†If you select a transaction but the ‚ÄòGet help‚Äô button doesn‚Äôt appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you‚Äôll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you‚Äôve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you‚Äôll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we‚Äôve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: What are ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.¬†You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‚Äòowner‚Äô or the person who created the ‚ÄòShared Space‚Äô can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‚Äòvisible‚Äô to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner‚Äôs contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‚ÄòShared Spaces‚Äô add participant flow.You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‚Äòlearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚Äòinvite new member‚Äô button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the ‚Äúlegal screen‚Äù so be sure to read all the information within the ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C‚Äôs then tap ‚ÄòGrant Power of Attorney‚Äô button.Tap ‚ÄòSend invite‚Äô on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‚Äòsend invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†

question: Come mantenere al sicuro i miei dati bancari online?
answer: Ecco alcuni consigli utili per stare sempre al sicuro ogni volta che sei online, che sia per lo shopping, il banking o semplicemente per gestire la tua corrispondenza:Tieni la tua app N26 e il sistema operativo del tuo cellulare sempre aggiornati in modo da evitare che possano verificarsi bug;Utilizza metodi di autenticazione biometrici come la scansione dell‚Äôimpronta digitale o il riconoscimento facciale per effettuare l'accesso;Crea delle password complesse contenenti lettere, numeri e simboli ed evita di usare la stessa password per accedere a diversi conti;Non pubblicare mai informazioni personali sensibili online o sui social media;Fai attenzione quando utilizzi una rete WiFi pubblica o una connessione condivisa e scegli sempre connessioni WPA2 sicure invece di connessioni WEP.Prediligi fornitori di servizi email con filtri per la sicurezza e per lo spam e che dispongono di un sistema di autenticazione a due fattori, come Gmail e Yahoo!;Stai in guardia di fronte a offerte troppo belle per essere vere: probabilmente √® proprio cos√¨!Effettua acquisti solo presso siti web affidabili di venditori riconosciuti;Assicurati che i siti web siano sicuri, controlla che ci sia il simbolo di un lucchetto accanto all‚ÄôURL e verifica le credenziali con un semplice clic;Consenti la geolocalizzazione sulla tua app N26, cos√¨ possiamo individuare transazioni irregolari non effettuate da te.Se sospetti che il tuo conto o i dettagli della tua carta siano stati compromessi, cambia subito la tua password e fai riferimento al nostro articolo Cosa fare se il mio account viene hackerato?

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be¬†visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:¬†Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is ‚Ç¨1000 per transaction and ‚Ç¨5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).¬†¬†¬†To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our¬†friend referral program.

question: I wasn‚Äôt approved for my loan, but my account was still debited
answer: Before approving a loan, credit agencies will perform a check to verify your creditworthiness. To do this, an authorization hold is often charged to your card‚Äî generally equivalent to the first monthly installment of the requested loan.Because installment payments from third-party credit organizations aren‚Äôt possible with an N26 debit card, you may be rejected for your loan despite the transaction showing up on your account.The good news is that the amount in question won‚Äôt actually be debited to your card, despite appearing on your transaction list in the N26 app. The charge will expire within 12 days and the amount on the hold will be automatically refunded.If you don‚Äôt receive the money back, please contact our Customer Support as soon as possible.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
answer: Falls du zurzeit auf eine Karte wartest, warte bitte den gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraum ab, die im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App angezeigt wird.Wenn du eine neue Karte bestellen musst, √ºberpr√ºfe zun√§chst deine Lieferanschrift unter: üë§ Mein Konto > Pers√∂nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Bitte beachte:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, f√ºge diesen unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls zutreffend, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und T√ºrnummer unter Zus√§tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in Erw√§gung und gib die k√ºnftige Wohnadresse an.Falls deine erste N26 Karte innerhalb des gesch√§tzten Lieferzeitraums nicht angekommen ist, √∂ffne bitte einen Live Chat direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking.Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, kannst du deine neue Karte so in der App bestellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten unten rechts.W√§hle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, die du nachbestellen willst.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Neue Karte bestellen.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‚ÄòForgot Password‚Äô to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

question: Wo finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
answer: Deine IBAN und deinen BIC ben√∂tigst du, um SEPA-√úberweisungen auf dein Konto zu erhalten oder per Lastschrift zu bezahlen. Eine IBAN besteht aus mehreren Elementen: Alle unsere IBANs beginnen mit DE, ES oder IT, gefolgt von der zweistelligen Pr√ºfziffer, unserer Bankleitzahl (10011001), und schlie√ülich deiner 10-stelligen Kontonummer (beginnend mit 26). Die IBAN wird bei der Kontoer√∂ffnung erstellt und zugewiesen und kann nicht ge√§ndert werden.Deine IBAN und deinen BIC findest du an 3 Orten:In deiner mobilen N26 App und deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab) unter: üë§ Mein Konto. Tippe bzw. klicke auf das Kopieren-Symbol, um die IBAN zu kopieren.Im Online Banking (neuen Tab) kannst du deine Bankverbindung als PDF herunterladen. Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Bankdaten auf Bankdaten herunterladen.Auf deinen herunterladbaren Kontoausz√ºgen: Tippe im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App auf das Burgermen√º oben rechts und w√§hle Kontoausz√ºge. Oder in deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab): Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Kontoausz√ºge auf einen gew√ºnschten Monat.Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube (neuen Tab) Kanal an.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? question: Comment rembourser mon cr√©dit avant la date pr√©vue ?
answer: Vous pouvez tout √† fait rembourser votre¬†cr√©dit¬†par anticipation, c‚Äôest √† dire avant la date initialement pr√©vue.Nous vous rappelons que 1 % de frais s‚Äôapplique √† tout remboursement anticip√©. En revanche, si la p√©riode de remboursement restante est de moins de 12 mois, les frais de remboursement anticip√© seront de 0,5 %.Pour demander un remboursement par anticipation, contactez-nous par Livechat et nous vous communiquerons le calcul pr√©cis de votre paiement anticipant incluant les frais mentionn√©s ci-dessus.*Les informations ci-dessus sont uniquement valables pour les cr√©dits fournis par N26. Si votre cr√©dit est fourni par l‚Äôun de nos partenaires, veuillez les contacter directement : Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) en Allemagne et Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) en France.

question: Que faire si je ne peux pas rembourser mon cr√©dit ou mon d√©couvert ?
answer: Si vous ne pouvez pas payer votre¬†cr√©dit N26¬†ou votre¬†d√©couvert¬†(uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche), nous pouvons vous proposer diff√©rents plans de remboursement. Cela peut arriver si votre autorisation de d√©couvert autoris√© a √©t√© annul√©e ou si vous avez besoin de plus de deux mois pour rembourser la somme que vous nous devez.Veuillez noter que nous ne pouvons pas vous proposer de plan de remboursement si votre compte N26 est d√©j√† cl√¥tur√©.Voici la marche √† suivre : contactez-nous par Livechat avec une proposition pr√©cise de votre plan de remboursement. Cette proposition doit expliquer, clairement comment et en combien de temps vous pouvez rembourser votre cr√©dit ou votre d√©couvert en totalit√©. Sachez que nous refuserons toute proposition de payer la somme due ‚Äúult√©rieurement‚Äù sans autre d√©tail.Ensuite, nous pourrons accepter, refuser ou vous proposer une solution alternative. Vous pourrez alors accepter ce plan de remboursement..√Ä noter : Votre compte N26 sera ferm√© si votre solde reste n√©gatif pendant une longue p√©riode. Toute d√©cision de cl√¥ture de compte est d√©finitive, sauf si vous remboursez la somme due avant la date de fermeture annonc√©e. Si vous ne le faites pas, votre dette sera directement prise en charge par une agence de recouvrement.Ce qui pr√©c√®de concerne uniquement les cr√©dits N26. Pour les cr√©dits Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) ou Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99), veuillez contacter le partenaire appropri√©.

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a¬†temporary limitation¬†to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments for France is currently only available for customers who‚Äôve opened their account in France, and who have a DE IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note there is a fixed fee depending on the loan value. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing froPricing: This will be an interest rate of 7.49% of 10.49%. And will be charged with your first instalment amount. Eligible purchase amount: From ‚Ç¨20 - ‚Ç¨199N26 Installments Duration: The installments duration is 3 months minimum and maximum, with the option of early loan repayment.Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment Automated cancellation of the loan when >105 days in arrearsHow to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‚ÄòExplore‚Äô tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‚ÄòOptions‚Äô (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚ÄôWhen you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚Äô:First you will be provided with information about ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚ÄôThen you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you‚Äôll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We‚Äôll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you‚Äôll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in full

question: Comment commander une nouvelle carte ?
answer:
‚ÑπÔ∏è La livraison de votre carte peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 15 jours ouvr√©s. Si la livraison de votre carte est en cours, nous vous demandons de bien vouloir patienter jusqu‚Äô√† la date de livraison estim√©e avant d‚Äôenvisager de la recommander. Vous pouvez consulter l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil de votre application N26, o√π figure la liste de vos transactions.Avant de recommander une carte, veuillez vous assurer que votre adresse de livraison est √† jour, depuis votre application N26 :üë§ Mon Compte > Informations personelles > Adresses > Adresse de livraison.Nous envoyons les cartes uniquement √† des adresses r√©sidentielles (les adresses d‚Äôentreprises ne sont pas accept√©es).Votre nom doit appara√Ætre sur la bo√Æte aux lettres. Si un nom diff√©rent est affich√©, merci de l‚Äôajouter dans la section Compl√©ment d‚Äôadresse¬†N'entrez pas d'espace dans le code postal de votre adresse de livraison.Assurez-vous d‚Äôindiquer les informations compl√©mentaires d‚Äôadresse dans la section Compl√©ment d‚Äôadresse (par exemple, votre num√©ro de b√¢timent, num√©ro de cage d'escalier...).¬†Si votre adresse contient des caract√®res sp√©ciaux, veuillez nous contacter via le Livechat depuis l‚Äôapplication N26.Si vous d√©m√©nagez bient√¥t, vous pouvez choisir la livraison express. Sinon, assurez-vous de s√©lectionner le pays et l'adresse o√π vous allez d√©m√©nager et souhaitez recevoir votre carte N26.Est-ce votre premi√®re carte N26 ou en aviez-vous activ√© une dans le pass√© ? S'il s‚Äôagit de votre premi√®re carte N26¬†et que le d√©lai de livraison de votre carte N26 est d√©pass√© : veuillez nous contacter sur le Livechat depuis votre espace en ligne ou votre application N26 pour que nous puissions la recommander.Si vous aviez activ√© une carte N26 dans le pass√©, veuillez en recommander une depuis votre application N26 :Ouvrez l‚Äôapplication et allez dans l‚Äôonglet ‚ÄúCartes‚Äù.S√©lectionnez ‚ÄúParam√®tres de la carte‚Äù puis la carte que vous souhaitez recommander (si vous en avez plusieurs, faites glisser l‚Äô√©cran vers la gauche).Une fois la carte choisie, faites glisser l‚Äô√©cran vers le bas afin de s√©lectionner ‚ÄúCommander une nouvelle carte‚Äù.Choisissez la raison pour laquelle vous recommandez votre carte et laissez-vous guider.
Frais de remplacement des cartes :N26 Standard, N26 Business, N26 You et N26 Business You : 10 ‚Ç¨ en livraison standard 30 ‚Ç¨ en livraison expressN26 Metal et N26 Business Metal :45 ‚Ç¨ en livraison standard65 ‚Ç¨ en livraison expressVous pouvez utiliser votre carte avant m√™me qu‚Äôelle n‚Äôarrive chez vousN26 vous permet d‚Äôutiliser votre carte N26 avant m√™me de l‚Äôavoir re√ßue, en l‚Äôajoutant √† votre compte¬†Apple Pay¬†ou¬†Google Pay. Il est donc possible de faire des¬†achats avec votre smartphone, en utilisant la version digitale de votre carte aupr√®s de¬†commer√ßants acceptant ce moyen de paiement.

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.¬†You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list¬†Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program.
