question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‚ÄòSharing Money‚ÄôRead the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù will pop-up. Tap ‚Äúsign‚ÄùCheck both ‚ÄúAdvanced electronic signature‚Äù and ‚ÄúPower of attorney‚Äù, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.¬†Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?¬†Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you‚Äôre asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.¬†If you have a feeling that something is off, don‚Äôt ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don‚Äôt click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender‚Äôs identity.If you‚Äôve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you‚Äôd like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Smart?
answer: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus f√ºnf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Du kannst N26 Smart mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du mit N26 Smart lieb√§ugelst, beachte bitte unsere AGB (neuen Tab) sowie folgendes:Deine N26 Smart Mastercard hat keine Pr√§gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlie√ülich der Nummer, des CVV-Codes und des 10-stelligen Tokens sind auf der R√ºckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du von N26 Standard zu N26 Smart upgradest, wird die monatliche Geb√ºhr von 4,90 ‚Ç¨ wird beginnend mit dem Datum deines Upgrades jeden Monat direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach der Verifizierung deiner Identit√§t eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Geb√ºhr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende er√∂ffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei Monatsgeb√ºhren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgeb√ºhr monatlich oder im Voraus f√ºr die n√§chsten 6 Monate oder f√ºr 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich f√ºr die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig f√ºr den von dir gew√ºnschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt. Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Prepaid-Abrechnungsoptionen und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.

question: Quanto ci mette un bonifico ad arrivare?
answer: I bonifici istantanei SEPA in entrata verso conti N26 avvengono in maniera istantanea, purch√© il bonifico provenga da una banca che supporta i bonifici istantanei. Tuttavia, talvolta i bonifici possono avere ritardi se devono essere verificati a causa delle direttive bancarie SEPA.I bonifici SEPA normali in entrata arrivano entro al massimo 2 giorni lavorativi. Ricorda che se un bonifico viene effettuato poco prima di un fine settimana o un giorno festivo, il periodo di tempo sar√† esteso fino a un massimo di 3 giorni lavorativi.La ricezione di bonifici SWIFT in entrata richiede fino a 4 giorni lavorativi.¬†I bonifici SEPA istantanei in uscita arrivano all'istante. I normali bonifici SEPA in uscita richiedono fino a 2 giorni lavorativi. Per i bonifici in valuta straniera con il nostro partner Wise occorrono fino a 4 giorni lavorativi. I bonifici SWIFT in uscita non sono supportati.Cos'√® un "giorno bancario"?Un giorno bancario corrisponde a due giorni lavorativi a causa dell'orario di ufficio delle banche coinvolte. Ogni giorno settimanale che non sia un giorno festivo √® considerato giorno lavorativo.Il mio bonifico non √® arrivato: dov'√®?Pur tenendo in considerazione quanto detto sopra, il bonifico non √® ancora arrivato? In questi casi, solo la banca emittente pu√≤ aprire un'indagine interna.Sfortunatamente, noi di N26 non possiamo indagare sui bonifici in entrata, ma solo su quelli in uscita. Ma puoi comunque consultare questa lista di possibili motivi per cui un bonifico potrebbe non andare a buon fine.Informazioni aggiuntiveIl sistema con cui inviamo tutti i nostri bonifici SEPA si chiama TARGET2 (nuova tabella), elabora i pagamenti ogni giorno lavorativo dalle 7.00 alle 18.00 ed √® chiuso nei seguenti giorni: 1¬∞ gennaio (Capodanno), Venerd√¨ Santo, Luned√¨ dell‚ÄôAngelo, 1 maggio, 25 dicembre (Natale) e 26 dicembre.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†*applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here‚Äôs how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. ¬† * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
answer: Die kontaktlose Bezahlung mit deiner Karte erfolgt per Nahfeldkommunikation (NFC). Bei Problemen mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlung solltest du Folgendes beachten:√úberpr√ºfe, ob in deinen Karteneinstellungen die kontaktlose Bezahlung aktiviert ist.Wenn deine Karte neu ist, musst du sie zuvor einmal an einem Geldautomaten oder an einem Zahlungsterminal mit Chip & PIN benutzt haben. Erst danach kannst du sie auch f√ºr die kontaktlose Bezahlung verwenden.Bei kontaktlosen Zahlungen mit deiner Karte (NFC) bis zu 50 ‚Ç¨ ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich. Bei Zahlungen √ºber 50 ‚Ç¨ oder kumulativen Zahlungen √ºber 150‚Ç¨ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.Frage den H√§ndler, ob das Zahlungsterminal die kontaktlose Bezahlung auch tats√§chlich unterst√ºtzt.Bei N26 Metal Karten befindet sich die NFC-Funktion nur auf der R√ºckseite der Karte. Achte darauf, dass du die R√ºckseite der Karte an das Terminal h√§ltst, um kontaktlos zu zahlen (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).Du musst deine Karte direkt an die NFC-kompatible Oberfl√§che des Zahlungsterminals halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell weggezogen oder sie nicht nahe genug an die Oberfl√§che gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.Wenn die kontaktlose Bezahlung nicht funktioniert, versuche bitte immer die Zahlung mit Chip & PIN abzuschlie√üen.

question: Was ist ein P-Konto?
answer: Ein Pf√§ndungsschutzkonto (P-Konto) ist ein Girokonto, mit dem du im Falle einer Kontopf√§ndung monatlich √ºber einen pf√§ndungsfreien Betrag verf√ºgst. Der Pf√§ndungsschutz kann auf alle von uns angebotenen Kontotypen angewandt werden ‚Äì und mit einer deutschen IBAN bist du grunds√§tzlich dazu berechtigt, dein Konto in ein P-Konto umzuwandeln. Du verf√ºgst dadurch im Falle einer Pf√§ndung √ºber einen monatlichen P-Konto-Freibetrag in H√∂he von ‚Ç¨1.340, jedoch kann dieser Betrag durch eine aktive Unterhaltspf√§ndung geringer ausfallen. Der P-Konto-Freibetrag steht dir zur Verf√ºgung und wird nicht an den Gl√§ubiger √ºberwiesen. Bitte beachte, dass wir die Umwandlung in ein P-Konto der Schufa Holding AG melden.Wenn wir f√ºr dein N26 Konto eine Pf√§ndung erhalten, kannst du dich dazu entscheiden, es in ein P-Konto umzuwandeln. Nach Erhalt einer Pf√§ndung sind wir gesetzlich dazu verpflichtet, dein Konto zu pf√§nden. Gleichzeitig senden wir dir eine Nachricht mit allen Informationen zur Pf√§ndung an dein sicheres Postfach in deiner N26 App. Bitte lies dir diese Nachricht durch, damit du √ºber alle Optionen informiert bist, bevor du dich f√ºr eine entscheidest.Wie du ein P-Konto bekommst, erf√§hrst du hier.

question: Wie sch√ºtze ich meine Bankdaten online?
answer:
Ob beim Shopping, Banking oder Verwalten deines Postfachs: Hier findest du einige Tipps, wie du dich und deine Daten im digitalen Raum sch√ºtzen kannst.Aktualisiere stets deine N26 App und das Betriebssystem deines Smartphones, um immer die aktuellsten Sicherheitsfeatures zu haben.Verwende zum Einloggen den Fingerabdrucksensor oder die Gesichtserkennung.
Nutze starke Passw√∂rter mit Buchstaben, Zahlen sowie Symbolen ‚Äì und verwende niemals dasselbe Passwort f√ºr mehrere Konten.Ver√∂ffentliche in den sozialen Medien unter keinen Umst√§nden sensible pers√∂nliche Informationen.Sei vorsichtig, wenn du √∂ffentliche oder geteilte WLAN-Verbindungen nutzt ‚Äì entscheide dich stets f√ºr sichere WPA2- anstatt WEP-Netzwerke und verwende wann immer m√∂glich ein VPN.Nutze E-Mail-Provider wie Gmail und Yahoo!, die √ºber Sicherheitsma√ünahmen verf√ºgen, Spamfilter einsetzen und Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung anbieten.Nimm dich vor Angeboten in Acht, die zu gut sind, um wahr zu sein ‚Äì oft handelt es sich um Betrug.Kaufe nur auf vertrauensw√ºrdigen Webseiten bekannter H√§ndler ein.√úberpr√ºfe die Sicherheit von Webseiten ‚Äì halte Ausschau nach dem Schloss neben der URL. Klicke darauf, um dir die Zertifikatsinformationen anzusehen.Aktiviere die Standortverfolgung in deiner N26 App, damit wir verd√§chtige Transaktionen erkennen k√∂nnen, die m√∂glicherweise nicht du get√§tigt hast.Falls du denkst, dass sich jemand unbefugten Zugriff auf dein Konto oder deine Kartendaten verschafft hat, √§ndere bitte umgehend dein Passwort, und erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintr√§chtigt wurde?"

question: O√π trouver votre num√©ro d'identification fiscale
answer:
Votre num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale (NIF) est unique. Il est d√©livr√© par l‚Äôadministration fiscale lors de votre inscription dans votre pays de r√©sidence fiscale.
 
Votre NIF peut figurer sur diff√©rents documents selon votre pays de r√©sidence fiscale. Le NIF de chaque pays peut varier. Par exemple, si vous r√©sidez au Royaume-Uni, vous pouvez consid√©rer votre NIF comme votre Num√©ro de s√©curit√© sociale (NIN).NIF pour les r√©sidents allemands :Si vous r√©sidez en Allemagne et que vous vous √™tes inscrit aupr√®s de l‚Äôadministration fiscale locale, vous recevrez un NIF ou Steueridentifikationsnummer √† 11 chiffres. Ne le confondez pas avec votre num√©ro fiscal ou Steuernummer √† 9 chiffres.
 
Le NIF ne figure pas sur les pi√®ces d‚Äôidentit√©, mais vous le trouverez sur les documents suivants :La lettre que vous avez re√ßue de l‚ÄôOffice central f√©d√©ral des imp√¥ts d√©livrant votre NIF ou IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Avis d‚ÄôimpositionD√©claration d‚Äôimp√¥t sur le revenuPour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).NIF pour les r√©sidents fran√ßais :Si vous r√©sidez en France et que vous √™tes tenu d‚Äôy d√©clarer vos imp√¥ts, l‚Äôadministration fiscale fran√ßaise vous d√©livrera un NIF √† 13 chiffres ou SPI une fois que vous vous serez inscrit aupr√®s de celle-ci. Ces chiffres commencent par 0, 1, 2 ou 3.
 
Votre NIF figure sur les documents suivants :D√©claration de revenus pr√©imprim√©eAvis d‚Äôimp√¥tsPour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).NIF pour les r√©sidents italiens :Si vous r√©sidez en Italie, le NIF ou Codice fiscale (compos√© de 16 caract√®res) n‚Äôest valable que si vous √™tes inscrit au Registre des imp√¥ts italien g√©r√© par l‚ÄôAgence italienne du revenu (Agenzia delle Entrate). Si vous n‚Äôavez pas de NIF, vous devez en faire la demande √† n‚Äôimporte quel bureau de l‚ÄôAgence italienne du revenu.
 
Le NIF ne figure pas sur les pi√®ces d‚Äôidentit√©, mais vous le trouverez sur les documents suivants :Carte d‚Äôassurance maladie personnelle (num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale)Carte d‚Äôidentification fiscalePour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).NIF pour les r√©sidents espagnols :Si vous r√©sidez en Espagne, votre NIF est unique pour des raisons fiscales et douani√®res. Votre NIF espagnol se compose de neuf caract√®res (le dernier caract√®re √©tant une lettre de contr√¥le). Les NIF sont d√©livr√©s par le minist√®re de l‚ÄôInt√©rieur et peuvent varier selon votre nationalit√©.
 
Selon votre situation, vous trouverez votre NIF sur les documents suivants :Carte d‚Äôidentit√© personnelleCarte d‚Äôidentit√© √©lectroniqueCarte de r√©sident pour les √©trangersNouveau permis de conduire (depuis 2004)Carte d‚Äôidentification fiscaleCarte vitalePour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).Informations importantes :Le format du NIF autoris√© √† √™tre saisi dans votre application N26 d√©pend de votre pays de r√©sidence. Autrement dit, si vous r√©sidez en Allemagne, vous devez saisir votre NIF allemand.Pour v√©rifier les informations fiscales que vous avez enregistr√©es sur votre compte, acc√©dez √† :Mon Compte > Informations personnelles > Informations fiscales.Si vous avez d√©j√† renseign√© votre pays de r√©sidence fiscale mais pas votre identifiant fiscal, il vous suffit de supprimer le pays actuellement renseign√© dans l‚Äôapplication et de l‚Äôajouter √† nouveau. Vous pourrez alors renseigner votre identifiant fiscal.Pour en savoir plus sur la gestion de vos informations fiscales, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: Domande frequenti sulle contestazioni di pagamento con carta
How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here‚Äôs how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. ¬† * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: ¬øQu√© hace N26 con mi informaci√≥n fiscal?
answer: Este material ha sido preparado con fines exclusivamente informativos y no constituye, ni debe utilizarse como un asesoramiento fiscal, legal o contable.N26 recoge tus datos principalmente por dos motivos: para cumplir con las reglas de ¬´Conozca a su cliente¬ª y por la obligaci√≥n de comunicar a la agencia tributaria responsable.¬†Obligaci√≥n de identificar a nuestros clientes siguiendo las denominadas reglas ¬´Conoce a tu cliente¬ªComo otras instituciones financieras, estamos obligados a recabar informaci√≥n fiscal relevante para identificarte a efectos fiscales. Esta informaci√≥n incluye principalmente tu nombre,¬† direcci√≥n de residencia, pa√≠s o pa√≠ses de domicilio fiscal, n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal o su equivalente, as√≠ como el lugar y la fecha de tu nacimiento.A continuaci√≥n encontrar√°s informaci√≥n general sobre las definiciones de domicilio fiscal y el n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal.Domicilio fiscalPor lo general, una persona solo tiene un pa√≠s de residencia (residencia en el pa√≠s de vivienda o domicilio). Sin embargo, una persona puede residir en dos o m√°s pa√≠ses a efectos fiscales. Esto se debe a que diferentes pa√≠ses aplican distintos criterios (formas de vinculaci√≥n) para determinar la residencia (o domicilio) a efectos fiscales. Estos criterios pueden incluir, entre otros, la presencia f√≠sica prolongada, la nacionalidad, la titularidad de la vivienda, etc. Si existe un convenio fiscal entre los pa√≠ses, las reglas en materia de arbitraje que suelen contener dicho convenio asignar√°n un domicilio fiscal a uno de los pa√≠ses involucrados.Por ejemplo, si tienes un vivienda permanente en el pa√≠s A y una residencia temporal en el pa√≠s B, las reglas en materia de resoluci√≥n de conflictos del convenio para evitar la doble imposici√≥n concluido entre el pa√≠s A y B podr√°n estipular que eres residente fiscal en el pa√≠s A en el que tienes una vivienda permanente en lugar de en el pa√≠s B, en el que tienes una residencia temporal (la ¬´vivienda permanente¬ª se considera como una forma de vinculaci√≥n m√°s fuerte que la ¬´residencia temporal¬ª). El an√°lisis para determinar el domicilio fiscal se basa en hechos y, si tienes dudas, tendr√°s que aclararlo con la tu agencia tributaria y/o asesor fiscal.N√∫mero de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal:El N√∫mero de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal (NIF) es una combinaci√≥n √∫nica de letras o n√∫meros que te ha asignado tu pa√≠s de domicilio fiscal. El NIF te identifica a efectos de aplicar las leyes fiscales de tu pa√≠s de domicilio fiscal. Los NIF tambi√©n son √∫tiles para identificar a los contribuyentes que invierten en otros pa√≠ses. Las especificaciones del NIF (es decir, el n√∫mero de letras, n√∫meros y su secuencia) son establecidas por la agencia tributaria de cada pa√≠s. Aunque la mayor√≠a de pa√≠ses emiten un NIF, hay algunos que no.¬†El portal de intercambio autom√°tico de la OCDE (pesta√±a nueva) proporciona informaci√≥n √∫til sobre los NIF (especialmente d√≥nde encontrarlos y sus especificaciones) emitidos por muchos pa√≠ses que participan en el intercambio autom√°tico de informaci√≥n fiscal. Pero si tienes alguna duda sobre tu NIF, lo m√°s recomendable es que consultes con tu asesor fiscal o con tu agencia tributaria.Obligaci√≥n de comunicar a las autoridades tributarias competentes¬† informaci√≥n fiscal relevante de determinados clientesComo otras instituciones financieras, estamos obligados a comunicar peri√≥dicamente informaci√≥n fiscal a la agencia tributaria responsable. Dependiendo de tu IBAN, la agencia tributaria receptora puede ser la de Alemania, Italia, Espa√±a o Francia.Cabe destacar los informes que se llevan a cabo en virtud del Est√°ndar Com√∫n de Comunicaci√≥n (pesta√±a nueva) (ECR) y la Ley de Cumplimiento Tributario de Cuentas Extranjeras (pesta√±a nueva) (FATCA). Si eres residente fiscal en un pa√≠s que aplica el ECR y/o de los EE. UU., la agencia tributaria beneficiaria intercambiar√° la informaci√≥n recibida de N26 con tu pa√≠s de domicilio fiscal como parte de los procedimientos de intercambio autom√°tico de informaci√≥n en virtud del ECR y la FATCA.Para que N26 cumpla con sus obligaciones de comunicaci√≥n, especialmente en lo que respecta al ECR y la FATCA, necesitamos recopilar¬† informaci√≥n fiscal correcta y actualizada (la llamada informaci√≥n de autocertificaci√≥n). La informaci√≥n de autocertificaci√≥n incluye nombre, domicilio, pa√≠s o pa√≠ses de domicilio fiscal, NIF y lugar y fecha de nacimiento. Si eres residente fiscal en EE. UU. (persona estadounidense), tambi√©n debes proporcionar tu NIF estadounidense (pesta√±a nueva). A continuaci√≥n, haz clic en este enlace (pesta√±a nueva) para leer m√°s sobre la FATCA y qu√© debes hacer para determinar si eres una persona estadounidense. En el caso que si, debes proporcionarnos tu NIF estadounidense.Estamos obligados a realizar inspecciones peri√≥dicas para garantizar que la informaci√≥n fiscal relevante almacenada en nuestro sistema es correcta (la denominada diligencia debida continua). Si la diligencia debida detecta inexactitudes, nos ponemos en contacto contigo para pedirte informaci√≥n exacta y actualizada.Nuestra recomendaci√≥nTe informamos de que estamos obligados a aplicar medidas restrictivas en tu cuenta, como √∫ltimo recurso, si no recibimos informaci√≥n exacta y actualizada para los fines del ECR y de la FATCA descritos anteriormente en los plazos aplicables.Te recomendamos que consultes y actualices tu informaci√≥n fiscal relevante de forma peri√≥dica. No olvides que no hacerlo tambi√©n puede afectarte directamente. Por ejemplo, la agencia tributaria podr√≠a imponer sanciones directamente. Para consultar y actualizar tus datos en tu app N26:Ve a Informaci√≥n de la cuenta > Informaci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n fiscalHaz clic en ¬´A√±adir nuevo pa√≠s fiscal¬ª, indica si eres Persona estadounidense y sigue las instrucciones.Para a√±adir un pa√≠s fiscal adicional (si eres residente fiscal en m√°s de un pa√≠s), haz clic en ¬´A√±adir nuevo pa√≠s fiscal¬ª y sigue las instrucciones.Solo puedes eliminar el pa√≠s fiscal actual tras a√±adir uno nuevo.Informaci√≥n importantePuedes consultar la informaci√≥n fiscal que tenemos actualmente accediendo a: Informaci√≥n de la cuenta > Informaci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n fiscalEn todo caso, tus datos personales se almacenar√°n de forma segura y solo se utilizar√°n para cumplir los requisitos del ECR, FATCA y similares.No podemos asesorarte sobre tu situaci√≥n fiscal. Si tienes dudas, te rogamos que consultes con un asesor fiscal o con tu agencia tributaria.

question: Audiences similaires
answer: Traitement des donn√©es dans le cadre de Facebook Custom AudiencesLe service Custom Audiences nous permet de cr√©er des audiences personnalis√©es et similaires. Les audiences personnalis√©es sont constitu√©es de clients N26 et d‚Äôinternautes auxquels afficher un contenu personnalis√©, ou uniquement d‚Äôinternautes afin de vous exclure, en tant que client N26 existant, de certaines de nos publicit√©s. √âtant donn√© que vous √™tes d√©j√† un client N26, nous ne voulons pas vous afficher des publicit√©s non pertinentes. Les audiences similaires nous permettent de d√©finir un groupe cible pertinent pour lequel les publicit√©s affich√©es sont plus pertinentes que pour les autres utilisateurs de Facebook. Lesdites ¬´ ¬ª ressemblent davantage √† nos clients qu‚Äô√† l‚Äôutilisateur moyen de Facebook.Afin de profiter des avantages d√©crits ci-dessus, nous fournissons une version hach√©e de votre adresse e-mail N26 √† Facebook. Ledit ¬´ hachage ¬ª est une forme de pseudonymisation qui chiffre votre adresse e-mail de mani√®re √† ce que vous ne puissiez plus √™tre identifi√©(e) par cette adresse e-mail hach√©e. Facebook associe ensuite cette adresse e-mail √† votre adresse e-mail Facebook potentielle. Apr√®s la mise en correspondance, qu‚Äôelle ait r√©ussi ou non, Facebook supprime toutes les adresses e-mail hach√©es dans les 6 √† 8 heures. Facebook ne partage pas ces donn√©es avec des tiers ou d‚Äôautres annonceurs et n‚Äôaccorde pas l‚Äôacc√®s √† ces donn√©es. Vous pouvez trouver ces informations et d‚Äôautres renseignements dans les conditions de Facebook Custom Audiences (nouvel onglet). Facebook Ireland Limited transf√®re des donn√©es √† Facebook Inc., √âtats-Unis. Au sens du R√®glement UE 2016/679 (¬´ RGPD ¬ª), les √âtats-Unis ne fournissent pas un niveau de protection ad√©quat des donn√©es personnelles ; cela implique, entre autres, que les agences gouvernementales aux √âtats-Unis peuvent avoir le droit d‚Äôacc√©der √† vos donn√©es sans que des recours effectifs soient disponibles. Vous pouvez r√©voquer votre consentement conform√©ment √† l‚Äôart. 6 par. 1. a) du RGPD √† ce traitement de donn√©es dans l‚Äôespace client en ligne et l‚Äôapplication N26 √† tout moment. Les audiences personnalis√©es se composent de clients N26 et d‚Äôinternautes auxquels afficher un contenu personnalis√©, ou uniquement d‚Äôinternautes afin de vous exclure, en tant que client N26 existant, de certaines de nos publicit√©s sur Google Search Network, l‚Äôonglet Shopping, Gmail, YouTube et Google Display Network. Nous ne voulons pas vous montrer des publicit√©s non pertinentes. Les audiences similaires nous permettent de d√©finir un groupe cible pertinent pour lequel les publicit√©s affich√©es sont plus pertinentes que pour les autres utilisateurs de Google. Lesdites ¬´ audiences similaires ¬ª ressemblent davantage √† nos clients qu‚Äô√† l‚Äôutilisateur moyen de Google.Afin de profiter des avantages d√©crits ci-dessus, nous fournissons une version hach√©e de votre adresse e-mail N26 √† Google. Ledit ¬´ hachage ¬ª est une forme de pseudonymisation qui chiffre votre adresse e-mail de mani√®re √† ce que vous ne puissiez plus √™tre identifi√©(e) par cette adresse e-mail hach√©e. Google associe ensuite cette adresse e-mail √† l‚Äôadresse e-mail potentielle de votre compte Google. Si cette adresse e-mail ne correspond pas, Google peut toujours l‚Äôutiliser dans le cadre d‚Äôune v√©rification de conformit√©. Toutefois, Google ne l‚Äôutilisera pas de toute autre mani√®re pour Customer Match ou tout autre produit Google. Google ne conserve pas les donn√©es plus de 48 heures pour cr√©er les audiences Customer Match, et elles sont rapidement supprim√©es par la suite. Google ne partage pas ces donn√©es avec des tiers ou d‚Äôautres annonceurs et n‚Äôaccorde pas l‚Äôacc√®s √† ces donn√©es. Vous pouvez trouver ces informations et d‚Äôautres renseignements dans l‚Äôarticle d‚Äôassistance Comment Google utilise les donn√©es du ciblage par liste de clients (nouvel onglet).Google Ireland Limited transf√®re des donn√©es √† Google LLC, √âtats-Unis. Au sens du R√®glement UE 2016/679 (¬´ RGPD ¬ª), les √âtats-Unis ne fournissent pas un niveau de protection ad√©quat des donn√©es personnelles ; cela implique, entre autres, que les agences gouvernementales aux √âtats-Unis peuvent avoir le droit d‚Äôacc√©der √† vos donn√©es sans que des recours effectifs soient disponibles. question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around ‚Ç¨2. For the time being, we‚Äôre unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here‚Äôs a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:¬†AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could‚Äôve been charged an ATM fee.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).¬†¬†How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you‚Äôll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don‚Äôt arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date¬†
In this scenario, Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.¬†You received a delivery, but it doesn‚Äôt correspond with what you ordered¬†
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn‚Äôt receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,¬†I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:¬†Amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.¬†If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help‚Äì‚Äìthis is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:¬†Dear XX,¬†I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:¬†Merchant name: {insert merchant name}¬†Amount of original, authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.¬†The merchant told me that they‚Äôve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven‚Äôt received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.¬†How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That‚Äôs why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits‚Äì‚Äìall right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‚ÄòDiscreet Mode (new tab)‚Äô option to securely access your account in public.¬†Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you‚Äôre always aware of what‚Äôs happening on your account. Plus, we‚Äôre always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.¬†How does card fraud occur?¬†A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that‚Äôs been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:¬†You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase¬†Your online shopping account is hacked¬†Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: How to top up my account?
answer: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000‚Ç¨ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of ‚Ç¨ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

question: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.¬†Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card and we‚Äôll send it to you.¬†If you don‚Äôt see that message, don‚Äôt worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you‚Äôll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don‚Äôt forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it‚Äîthis can be done at any time (see below). We‚Äôll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn‚Äôt affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you‚Äôll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month‚Äôs time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you‚Äôll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you‚Äôve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven‚Äôt received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you‚Äôve proved your identity, we‚Äôll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you‚Äôve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee.¬†You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, we‚Äôll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

question: Kann ich ein Konto er√∂ffnen, wenn ich au√üerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
answer: Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen. Wir bieten dir:Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.Ein Konto in Euro, eine deutsche IBAN und √úberweisungen per SEPA oder MoneyBeam.Einen g√ºnstigen Wechselkurs mit deiner Mastercard Debitkarte.Kostenloser Versand deiner Mastercard oder Expressversand f√ºr 25‚Ç¨.√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit Wise (neuen Tab) (mit dem Standard-Konto).3-5 geb√ºhrenfreie Abhebungen am Geldautomaten (1.7% Geb√ºhr auf Abhebungen in Fremdw√§hrungen).0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).2 zus√§tzliche Spaces zu deinem HauptkontoEinen Bonus f√ºr alle Freunde, die du √ºber unser Freundschaftswerbungsprogramm erfolgreich zu N26 einl√§dst.Kontaktlose Zahlungen mit Google Pay und Apple Pay.Tipps f√ºr ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:Damit du stets den g√ºnstigsten Wechselkurs erh√§ltst, empfehlen wir dir, bei Eink√§ufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine Landesw√§hrung auszuw√§hlen (andernfalls k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen).Um Geld in deiner Landesw√§hrung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-√úberweisung √ºber die Wise-Website (neuen Tab), unser Partner f√ºr Geldtransfers in Fremdw√§hrungen. Alternativ kannst du auch √ºber deine √∂rtliche Bank Geld √ºberweisen.Ausgehende √úberweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach √ºber die Standardfunktion in der N26 App t√§tigen. √úberweisungen auf Konten in Fremdw√§hrungen kannst du √ºber Wise auch in der App t√§tigen.**Bitte beachte: Wise ist nicht f√ºr N26 Business verf√ºgbar (nur SEPA-√úberweisungen in Euro).

question: ¬øQu√© es CASH26?
answer: Disponible para las cuentas abiertas en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, Italia y Grecia.CASH26 es una funcionalidad integrada en la app N26 que te permite ingresar dinero en efectivo en tu cuenta N26 y sacar dinero con el m√≥vil, sin tarjeta y sin cajero autom√°tico.Solo tienes que dirigirte a uno de los m√°s de 1255 establecimientos CASH26 repartidos por toda Espa√±a (BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa), generar un c√≥digo de barras CASH26 y ense√±√°rselo en la pantalla de tu m√≥vil vinculado a la persona que haya en el mostrador, diciendo que quieres depositar o retirar dinero con nuestro socio Viacash.¬†Ingresar dinero en efectivoEl c√≥digo de barras dura solo 10 minutos; si no lo usas a tiempo, caducar√° y tendr√°s que generar uno nuevo.Cuando deposites el dinero, podr√°s disponer de √©l inmediatamente, aunque puede tardar hasta 10 minutos en verse reflejado en el saldo de tu cuenta en la app N26.¬øQu√© cantidad se puede ingresar en efectivo con CASH26?El m√≠nimo es de 50¬†‚Ç¨ por dep√≥sito y el m√°ximo es de 999¬†‚Ç¨ cada 24 horas.Sea cual sea la cantidad, se cobra una comisi√≥n del 1,5¬†% sobre el importe total.Tambi√©n hay un l√≠mite combinado de retiradas e ingresos de 999 ‚Ç¨ cada 24 horas.Sacar dinero con el m√≥vilEn cuanto generas el c√≥digo de barras CASH26, la cantidad seleccionada se deduce del saldo de tu cuenta inmediatamente.¬†Si cambias de opini√≥n y borras el c√≥digo antes de usarlo, o si dejas que caduque a los 10 minutos, el dinero volver√° inmediatamente al saldo de tu cuenta.¬øCu√°nto dinero se puede retirar en efectivo con CASH26?El m√°ximo es de 200¬†‚Ç¨ por cada retirada y de 900¬†‚Ç¨ cada 24 horas. No hay ning√∫n m√≠nimo de retirada, como si quieres sacar un c√©ntimo.Tambi√©n hay un l√≠mite combinado de retiradas e ingresos de 999 ‚Ç¨ cada 24 horas.Las retiradas con CASH26 no tienen comisi√≥n, son gratis.Lee este otro art√≠culo para aprender c√≥mo retirar e ingresar dinero en efectivo con CASH26.

question: How to make N26 my main account?
answer: We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: we‚Äôll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and we‚Äôll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.There are three ways to switch your bank accounts over to N26:Account switching service powered by finleap connect GmbHTogether with our partner finleap connect GmbH (new tab) we‚Äôre offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. It‚Äôs an automated process and completely free.Log into your N26 mobile app and tap on My account > Switch to N26. Tap Start now and follow the instructions.Alternatively, you can use this¬†form (new tab)¬†and log in with your previous bank account details. Once you‚Äôve filled in all required information, it‚Äôll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Account switching service supportYou could also inform your payment partners yourself. To do this, fill out the letter to notify your payment partners (new tab) and send it to them. You could also request the¬†termination of your bank account (new tab) with your previous bank by filling out the form and sending it to them.This service is also free. If you need help with this process, contact our Customer Support via chat.

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.¬†If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won‚Äôt be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: Do I have to declare my N26 account in Spain?
answer: ¬†The Agencia Tributaria offers assistance to those who need to declare their taxes and assets in a foreign country.¬†¬†¬†In regards to your N26 account, this will depend on the type of IBAN you have:¬†If you have a Spanish IBAN (starting with ES), your account is Spanish and you don‚Äôt need to declare it. If you have a German IBAN (starting with DE), your account and money is situated in Germany. In this case you would be obligated to declare it, following specific legal requirements.¬†To know if one of the above scenarios applies to your N26 account, I‚Äôd recommend that you inquire with a professional in regards to this matter as we‚Äôre not eligible to give tax advice.¬†¬†Read more information about this in the official website of the Agencia Tributaria (new tab).

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Insights¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be¬†visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:¬†Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is ‚Ç¨1000 per transaction and ‚Ç¨5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).¬†¬†¬†To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our¬†friend referral program.

question: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
answer: Die folgenden Angaben wurden nur zu Informationszwecken erstellt und dienen nicht der steuerlichen, rechtlichen oder buchhalterischen Beratung und sollten auch nicht als solche verstanden werden.N26 sammelt deine Daten haupts√§chlich aus zwei Gr√ºnden: um die "Know Your Customer"-Anforderungen zu erf√ºllen und um die Meldepflicht gegen√ºber den zust√§ndigen Steuerbeh√∂rden zu erf√ºllen.¬†Verpflichtung zur Identifizierung unserer Kunden nach den sogenannten "Know your customer"-RegelnWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind wir nach den geltenden Steuergesetzen verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen von dir zu sammeln, um dich f√ºr steuerliche Zwecke zu identifizieren. Dazu geh√∂ren vor allem dein Name, deine Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die L√§nder, in denen du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist (Steuerwohnsitz / Steuerwohnsitze), deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder deren √Ñquivalent sowie dein Geburtsort und -datum.Im Folgenden sind allgemeine Informationen zu den Definitionen von Steuerwohnsitz und Steueridentifikationsnummer aufgef√ºhrt.SteuerwohnsitzIn der Regel hat man einen Wohnsitz, in dem Land , in dem man wohnt (Wohnsitzadresse). Man kann jedoch in zwei oder mehr L√§ndern steuerlich ans√§ssig sein (Steuerwohnsitz haben). Das liegt daran, dass die L√§nder zur Bestimmung des steuerlichen Wohnsitzes unterschiedliche Kriterien (Formen der Bindung) verwenden. Zu diesen Kriterien geh√∂ren u. a. eine l√§ngere physische Anwesenheit, die Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit, der Besitz von Eigentum usw. Wenn es ein Steuerabkommen zwischen den L√§ndern gibt, wird der steuerliche Wohnsitz aufgrund der in einem solchen Abkommen normalerweise enthaltenen Kollisionsnormeneinem der beteiligten L√§nder zugewiesen.Wenn du beispielsweise eine st√§ndige Wohnst√§tte in Land A und einen vor√ºbergehenden Wohnsitz in Land B hast, kann es sein, dass die Regeln des Steuerabkommens zwischen Land A und B vorsehen, dass du in Land A steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, wo du eine st√§ndige Wohnst√§tte hast, und nicht in Land B, wo du einen vor√ºbergehenden Wohnsitz hast (wobei "st√§ndige Wohnst√§tte" eine st√§rkere Form der Bindung darstellt als "vor√ºbergehender Wohnsitz"). Wenn du dir unsicher bist, wo du steuerans√§ssig bist, musst du das mit deiner Steuerverwaltung und/oder deinem Steuerberater kl√§ren.SteueridentifikationsnummerDie Steueridentifikationsnummer (Steuer-IdNr.) ist eine eindeutige Kombination aus Buchstaben oder Zahlen, die dir von dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, zugewiesen wird. Die Steuer-IdNr. identifiziert dich f√ºr Zwecke der Steuerverwaltung in dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist. Die Steuer-IdNr. ist auch n√ºtzlich, um Steuerpflichtige zu identifizieren, die in anderen L√§ndern investieren. Die Spezifikationen f√ºr die Steuer-IdNr. (d. h. die Anzahl der Buchstaben, Zahlen und ihre Reihenfolge) werden von den Steuerverwaltungen der einzelnen L√§nder festgelegt. W√§hrend die meisten L√§nder Steuer-IdNr. vergeben, gibt es einige, die keine Steuer-IdNr. vergeben. Auf dem Portal f√ºr den automatischen Informationsaustausch der OECD (neuen Tab) findest du n√ºtzliche Informationen zu den Steuer-IdNrn. (vor allem, wo du sie findest und und ihre Spezifikationen). Bei Zweifeln √ºber deine Steuer-IdNr. empfehlen wir dir jedoch, deinen Steuerberater oder deine Steuerverwaltung zu konsultieren.Verpflichtung zur Meldung steuerlich relevanter Informationen bestimmter Kunden an die zust√§ndigen Steuerbeh√∂rdenWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind auch wir verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen regelm√§√üig an die zust√§ndige Steuerbeh√∂rde zu melden. Abh√§ngig von deiner IBAN kann die empfangende Steuerbeh√∂rde in Deutschland, Italien, Spanien oder Frankreich liegen.Besonders erw√§hnenswert sind die Berichte nach dem Common Reporting Standard (neuen Tab) (CRS) und dem Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (neuen Tab) (FATCA). Falls du steuerlich in einem Land ans√§ssig bist, das CRS anwendet und/oder wenn du in den USA steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, tauscht die empfangende Steuerbeh√∂rde die von N26 erhaltenen Informationen im Rahmen des automatischen Informationsaustauschs gem√§√ü CRS und FATCA mit dem Land aus, in dem du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist.Damit N26 seinen Meldepflichten, insbesondere in Bezug auf CRS und FATCA, nachkommen kann, m√ºssen wir genaue und aktuelle steuerrelevante Informationen von dir sammeln (sogenannte Selbstauskunftsdaten). Zu diesen Daten geh√∂ren Name, Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die L√§nder, in denen du steuerlich ans√§ssig bist, Steuer-IdNr. sowie Geburtsort und -datum. Wenn du in den USA steuerlich ans√§ssig bist (Person der Vereinigten Staaten), solltest du auch deine US-Steuer-IdNr (neuen Tab).¬†angeben. Bitte folge diesem Link (neuen Tab), um mehr √ºber FATCA zu erfahren und was du gegebenenfalls unternehmen musst, um herauszufinden, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und uns daher deine US-Steuer-IdNr. mitteilen solltest.Wir sind verpflichtet, regelm√§√üig zu √ºberpr√ºfen, ob deine in unserem System gespeicherten steuerlich relevanten Informationen korrekt sind (sogenannte laufende Due Diligence). Sollten sich im Rahmen der Due Diligence Ungenauigkeiten ergeben, setzen wir uns mit dir in Verbindung, um genaue und aktuelle Informationen zu erhalten.Unsere EmpfehlungBeachte bitte, dass wir als allerletztes Mittel restriktive Ma√ünahmen f√ºr dein Konto ergreifen m√ºssen, sollten wir nicht in der Lage sein, genaue und aktuelle Informationen f√ºr die oben beschriebenen Zwecke f√ºr CRS und FATCA innerhalb der geltenden Fristen zu erhalten.Wir raten dir, deine steuerlich relevanten Informationen regelm√§√üig zu √ºberpr√ºfen und zu aktualisieren. Bitte bedenke, dass eine Nichtbeachtung auch unmittelbare Folgen f√ºr dich haben kann, wie z. B. die Verh√§ngung von Bu√ügeldern durch die Steuerbeh√∂rde. Um deine Informationen zu √ºberpr√ºfen und zu aktualisieren, schaue in deine N26 App:Gehe zu Kontodetails > Pers√∂nliche Details > SteuerinformationenW√§hle Neues Steuerland hinzuf√ºgen. Gib an, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und folge den AnweisungenUm ein weiteres Steuerland hinzuzuf√ºgen (wenn du in mehr als einem Land steuerlich ans√§ssig bist), klicke auf "Neues Steuerland hinzuf√ºgen" und folge den AnweisungenDas bestehende Steuerland kann erst entfernt werden, nachdem du ein neues Steuerland hinzugef√ºgt hastWichtige InformationenDu kannst die Steuerinformationen, die wir aktuell von dir erfasst haben, jederzeit √ºberpr√ºfen. Daf√ºr gehst du auf: Kontodetails > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerinformationen.Deine personenbezogenen Daten werden in jedem Fall sicher gespeichert und nur zur Erf√ºllung von CRS, FATCA und √§hnlichen Anforderungen verwendet.Wir k√∂nnen dir keine Auskunft √ºber deinen Steuerstatus geben. Wenn du dir nicht sicher bist, bespreche die Angelegenheit mit einem Steuerberater und/oder der Steuerbeh√∂rde.

question: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
answer: Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9) in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

question: Wie bekomme ich ein P-Konto?
answer: Befolge bitte diese Schritte, um ein P-Konto zu beantragen:¬†F√ºlle dieses Formular (neuen Tab) aus und unterschreibe esSchicke das Formular von deiner bei uns registrierten E-Mail-Adresse an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Alternativ kannst du uns das Formular auch direkt √ºber die App zukommen lassen. Antworte dazu einfach auf die Nachricht, in der wir dich √ºber die Pf√§ndung informiert haben.Bitte beachte:Wir melden der Schufa Holding AG die Umwandlung in ein P-Konto.Wenn du dich f√ºr ein P-Konto entscheidest, m√ºssen wir bei Aktivierung des Pf√§ndungsschutzes (d. h. bei einer aktiven Pf√§ndung) deinen Dispokredit und Kredit k√ºndigen.Du darfst nur ein P-Konto haben. Mehrere P-Konten (auch bei anderen Banken) zu nutzen ist nicht erlaubt und kann zu einer au√üerordentlichen, fristlosen K√ºndigung deines N26 Kontos f√ºhren.

question: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
answer: Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wie¬†MoneyBeams¬†durchzuf√ºhren, √ºberpr√ºft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber wei√üt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie sich h√∂chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch w√§hlen, ob du selbst dich f√ºr andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen m√∂chtest.Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.¬†Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.¬†In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.
