question: Why was I charged a Gambling Fee?
answer: The Gambling Fee to the amount of 3% applies to all private customers who registered for an account after March 12, 2020, or who have a Business membership plan (regardless of the date on which said plan took effect).Customers with such a membership plan are charged the Gambling Fee when making use of the services of the following gambling providers:LotteriesSports bettingOnline casinosHorse racingOther gambling activitiesPlease note that this includes both incoming and outgoing applicable Mastercard transactions. The 3% Gambling Fee is charged after the applicable transaction is processed. For example: if you win or convert your remaining chips back to money, the merchant will send the balance in another transaction where the 3% Gambling Fee will be charged again.Good to know:The 3% Gambling Fee appears on your transaction list and balance statement, linked to the original and any subsequent transaction from the gambling merchant.The fee we have charged is related to Mastercard transactions you‚Äôve processed at certain relevant merchants (no matter which country you place the bet) and can‚Äôt be refunded.¬†Some of our customers will not have to pay the Gambling Fee, as a result of the ruling of the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (BGH XI ZR 26/20).

question: Come creare una password?
answer: Se hai dimenticato la password oppure vuoi cambiarla, seleziona Dimenticata? nella versione mobile dell'app o Password dimenticata? nella¬†WebApp (nuova tabella)¬†nella fase di accesso. Ti invieremo un link all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail registrato per creare una nuova password. La password non deve rispondere a requisiti specifici ma ne verr√† valutata la sicurezza nel momento in cui viene creata: verranno accettate le password considerate sicure dal nostro algoritmo.Raccomandiamo l'utilizzo di una combinazione di parole piuttosto che l'uso di un'unica parola: segui la logica del "difficile da indovinare ma facile da ricordare".Se la tua password non viene accettata dal nostro sistema, puoi inserire caratteri speciali, numeri oppure una combinazione di lettere maiuscole e minuscole.Se inserisci una password errata per sei volte consecutive, l'accesso al conto verr√† temporaneamente bloccato. In tal caso, prova a collegarti nuovamente dopo 30 minuti.La chat √® disponibile da luned√¨ a domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).¬†If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I‚Äôve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.¬†What if I‚Äôve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.¬†Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Mastercard Travel Rewards - France
answer: Mastercard Travel Rewards vous permet d'√©conomiser pendant que vous voyagez. Avec des centaines de remises sous forme de cashback dans 17 pays, vous pouvez obtenir un remboursement automatique sur vos sorties culturelles, vos achats, les restaurants, les h√¥tels et plus encore lorsque vous payez avec votre Mastercard N26 √† l'√©tranger.O√π puis-je trouver les offres ?Lorsque vous vous connectez √† votre application N26, appuyez simplement sur la rubrique D√©couvrir pour acc√©der √† toutes les offres en cours. Vous recevrez ensuite le remboursement correspondant √† l'offre sur votre compte N26 dans un d√©lai de 30 jours suivant la date d'achat.Veuillez noter : Mastercard Travel Rewards est uniquement disponible pour les titulaires de comptes N26 Smart, You et Metal.

question: What is a N26 Business Account?
answer: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you can‚Äôt have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&C‚Äôs, can order a Maestro card for an additional ‚Ç¨10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:¬†ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2,500	In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5,000¬†The monthly limit for payments is ‚Ç¨20,000.¬†You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expenses¬†The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:¬†MoneyBeam to N26 customers: ‚Ç¨1,000Instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000Outgoing transfers: No limits¬†N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.¬†Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe‚Äôre sorry you wish to raise a complaint and will thoroughly investigate it. We'll provide our findings and final response via email.¬†Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via live chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Please note: These inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve your issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.¬†If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.¬†If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different time frames apply based on the country of your account Terms & Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days¬†Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days¬†United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days¬†Spain - 60 Calendar Days¬†Italy - 60 Calendar Days¬†We may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties, such as:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.

question: How to block contactless payments on my card?
answer: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If you‚Äôre experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50 or cumulative transactions above 150‚Ç¨ you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: What are ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: ¬øQu√© es una tarjeta virtual?
answer: Si contratas una cuenta N26 Est√°ndar, obtendr√°s una tarjeta virtual gratis (siempre y cuando tengas un saldo m√≠nimo extraordinario de 10 ‚Ç¨ para activar la tarjeta).¬†Una tarjeta virtual adicional es ideal para tus compras online, lo que te da un extra de tranquilidad al compartir los detalles de tu tarjeta en internet. Tambi√©n es perfecta para mantener tus suscripciones y pagos recurrentes separados de tus compras del d√≠a a d√≠a.Los clientes de N26 Smart, YOU y Metal tienen la opci√≥n de pedir una tarjeta virtual gratis adem√°s de la tarjeta f√≠sica gratuita que reciben junto con su contrato premium. Recuerda: Los clientes de N26 Est√°ndar tienen la opci√≥n de pedir una tarjeta f√≠sica por una comisi√≥n √∫nica de 10 ‚Ç¨ (sin necesidad de contratar una cuenta premium).¬øC√≥mo pedir y activar mi tarjeta virtual?Inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta y abre la pesta√±a Tarjetas, en la esquina inferior derecha.Pulsa ¬´Obtener una tarjeta adicional¬ª.Selecciona ¬´Virtual¬ª en la parte superior y pulsa ¬´Elegir¬ª en la parte inferior.Lee y acepta los t√©rminos y condiciones y pulsa ¬´Generar tarjeta virtual¬ª.A√±ade tu tarjeta virtual a Apple Pay o Google Pay u omite este paso.¬øC√≥mo uso mi tarjeta virtual?Pagar en un establecimiento empleando Apple o Google Pay: Vincula tu tarjeta virtual a tu Apple o Google Pay, dependiendo de tu dispositivo.Retirar dinero en efectivo: Cuando hayas vinculado la tarjeta virtual a tu wallet de Apple o Google, podr√°s retirar dinero en efectivo en cajeros que tengan funci√≥n contactless. Tambi√©n puedes utilizar CASH26 para ingresar o retirar dinero en efectivo (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR).Realizar compras online: Puedes consultar los datos de tu tarjeta virtual en la app (n√∫mero de tarjeta, fecha de caducidad y n√∫mero CVV). Para consultar estos datos:Inicia sesi√≥n en tu app m√≥vil de N26Selecciona ¬´Tarjetas¬ªBusca tu tarjeta virtual (desliza hacia la izquierda para buscar tu tarjeta virtual si tienes m√°s de una)Selecciona ¬´Informaci√≥n de la tarjeta¬ªTendr√°s que introducir el PIN de confirmaci√≥n o utilizar el inicio de sesi√≥n biom√©trico para ver los datos de tus tarjetas virtuales durante 60 segundosLa Mastercard virtual solo est√° disponible para cuentas N26 Est√°ndar abiertas a partir de febrero de 2021 y para todas las cuentas premium de N26 a partir del 9 de octubre de 2021.

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.¬†How does it work?¬†The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?¬†Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney¬†Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person‚Äôs identity, and it‚Äôs not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.¬†As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.¬†Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: Comment N26 prot√®ge mon compte ?
answer: M√™me si nous souhaitons vous offrir une exp√©rience bancaire simple et mobile sur votre smartphone, nous ne faisons aucun compromis sur la s√©curit√©. Notre architecture de s√©curit√© en trois √©tapes nous permet de s√©curiser votre compte et votre argent :Connexion s√©curis√©e. Les donn√©es n√©cessaires pour se connecter, c'est-√†-dire le nom d'utilisateur, le mot de passe ou l'empreinte digitale ou le syst√®me de reconnaissance faciale (selon le type de smartphone) sont identiques pour l'application mobile N26 et votre espace personnel sur notre site internet (nouvel onglet). Veillez √† d√©finir un mot de passe s√ªr et √† ne partager vos donn√©es de connexion avec personne.Code de validation. Il s'agit d'un code √† 4 chiffres √† d√©finir soi-m√™me apr√®s la premi√®re synchronisation de votre smartphone avec votre compte. Il doit √™tre saisi √† chaque fois que vous r√©alisez une transaction depuis votre application N26 ou depuis votre espace personnel sur notre site internet.Push notification. Il s'agit d'une notification s√©curis√©e envoy√©e sur le smartphone associ√© √† votre compte. Si cette notification est envoy√©e pour une validation de transaction via 3D Secure, vous devez vous connecter √† l‚Äôapplication pour confirmer la transaction.√Ä chacun de vos contacts, nous vous poserons quelques questions afin de nous assurer que vous √™tes bien le b√©n√©ficiaire du compte.En aucun cas nous ne vous demanderons votre num√©ro de carte (16 chiffres), votre cryptogramme de s√©curit√© (CVV), votre mot de passe, votre code de validation ou code PIN de carte.¬†Vous √™tes l‚Äôunique personne qui doit conna√Ætre ces informations et N26 ne vous demandera jamais de les communiquer.Par ailleurs, nous assurons √©galement la s√©curit√© de votre compte en conservant un minimum de donn√©es vous concernant. Nous le faisons uniquement pendant la dur√©e qui nous est impos√©e par la loi. Nous supprimons toutes vos donn√©es d√®s lors qu‚Äôelles ne sont plus n√©cessaires pour les produits ou services que nous vous offrons.Pour trouver plus d‚Äôinformation concernant la protection de vos donn√©es, nous vous invitons √† lire notre¬†Politique de confidentialit√© (nouvel onglet).

question: What is Phishing?
answer: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If you‚Äôd like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. We‚Äôll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‚Äòeml‚Äô file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.¬†Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can‚Äôt use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:¬†Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.¬†Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the ‚Äúphone spoofing‚Äù technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that‚Äôs being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps they‚Äôre offering limited-time promotional deals. It‚Äôs important to note that just because ‚ÄúN26‚Äù is part of the URL, this doesn‚Äôt necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect you‚Äôre on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesn‚Äôt, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.¬†

question: Paiement anticip√© de votre abonnement Premium
answer: Votre contrat d'adh√©sion est valable pour un an, apr√®s quoi il sera automatiquement renouvel√© pour une p√©riode ind√©finie jusqu'√† ce que vous d√©cidiez de l'annuler. Vous pouvez le faire √† tout moment (voir ci-dessous). Nous vous informerons 2 mois avant la date de fin de votre contrat que celui-ci sera d√©sormais renouvel√© ind√©finiment.Quelles sont mes options de facturation ?Vous pouvez choisir de r√©gler vos cotisations tous les mois ou en plusieurs mensualit√©s anticip√©es (6 ou 12 mois, par exemple) afin de profiter d'une r√©duction. Cela n'affectera pas la dur√©e de votre contrat annuel.Si par exemple vous choisissez de payer 6 mensualit√©s d'avance en un seul paiement, vous effectuerez un paiement pour les 6 premiers mois de votre contrat annuel au d√©but de votre adh√©sion, et un deuxi√®me paiement 6 mois plus tard, pour la deuxi√®me moiti√© de votre contrat annuel.Quand et comment puis-je payer ?Votre adh√©sion sera activ√©e et vous acc√©derez √† tous vos avantages Premium d√®s que vous aurez r√©gl√© la premi√®re cotisation de votre adh√©sion. Vous pouvez effectuer votre premier paiement avec une carte de cr√©dit ou de d√©bit ou avec Apple Pay ou Google Wallet. Vous acc√©derez alors √† vos avantages Premium d√®s l'instant o√π vous aurez v√©rifi√© votre identit√©. Sinon, vous pouvez choisir d'alimenter votre compte et nous d√©duirons automatiquement de votre solde le montant de la premi√®re cotisation de vos frais d‚Äôadh√©sion.Si nous ne recevons pas le premier paiement de votre adh√©sion (c'est √† dire votre premi√®re mensualit√© ou les cotisations pay√©es en avance) dans les 15 jours qui suivent votre v√©rification d'identit√©, nous d√©duirons la somme correspondante de votre compte N26 et vous donnerons acc√®s √† l‚Äôensemble des avantages Premium √† ce moment-l√†. Par la suite, vos cotisations seront pr√©lev√©es automatiquement sur votre compte selon le mode de facturation que vous avez choisi.Comment annuler mon adh√©sion √† N26 ?Mettre fin au renouvellement de l'adh√©sion : vous pouvez arr√™ter le renouvellement automatique de votre adh√©sion √† tout moment avant la fin de votre contrat d'adh√©sion de 12 mois en nous contactant sur le LiveChat. Si vous mettez fin au renouvellement, vous pourrez continuer √† utiliser votre carte N26 et profiter des avantages de votre adh√©sion jusqu'√† l'expiration de votre contrat d'adh√©sion. Pour les comptes N26 You et N26 Metal, cela signifie que vous continuerez √† profiter des couvertures d'assurance tant que vous vous acquitterez de vos frais d'adh√©sion.Annulation imm√©diate : vous pouvez mettre fin √† votre adh√©sion √† tout moment en nous contactant. Si vous choisissez cette option, votre carte Premium N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal sera d√©sactiv√©e et nous √©mettrons pour vous une carte virtuelle au moment o√π vous passerez √† un compte gratuit N26 Standard. Les clients N26 You et N26 Metal perdent imm√©diatement leur couverture d'assurance.¬†R√©vocation : vous pouvez r√©voquer votre adh√©sion pendant une p√©riode de 14 jours suivant le pr√©l√®vement de vos premiers frais mensuels. Il vous suffit de nous contacter et nous vous assisterons. Nous d√©sactiverons alors votre Mastercard N26 et √©mettrons une carte virtuelle associ√©e √† votre compte N26 Standard.Est-ce que je peux me faire rembourser ?Si vous annulez votre adh√©sion durant la p√©riode de r√©tractation de 14 jours, nous vous remboursons int√©gralement le montant que vous avez vers√© initialement.¬†Si vous r√©siliez votre adh√©sion au-del√† de la p√©riode de r√©tractation de 14 jours, nous vous rembourserons toute mensualit√© restante que vous auriez pay√©e en avance.En revanche, si vous avez b√©n√©fici√© d'une r√©duction pour les mensualit√©s pay√©es en avance, nous vous rembourserons les mensualit√©s restantes mais la r√©duction dont vous avez b√©n√©fici√© sera d√©duite du montant de votre remboursement. En effet, vous ne pouvez b√©n√©ficier de la r√©duction que si vous maintenez votre adh√©sion durant toute la p√©riode pay√©e en avance.

question: How does N26 Business work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: ¬øC√≥mo descargar el extracto bancario?
answer: El extracto bancario es un documento en el que se refleja el saldo total de tu cuenta y todas las transacciones entrantes y salientes (transferencias, domiciliaciones, pagos con tarjeta, etc.). Tambi√©n aparecen el nombre y apellidos del titular de la cuenta, el IBAN y el BIC.Desde la app del m√≥vil (PDF): en la pantalla de Inicio, pulsa en las 3 barritas de la esquina superior derecha y selecciona Extractos.Tambi√©n puedes descargar el extracto de un espacio concreto: ve a Espacios, elige un espacio, pulsa en el icono de configuraci√≥n en la esquina superior derecha y selecciona Extractos.Desde la WebApp (PDF): haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pesta√±a nueva) y selecciona el mes en cuesti√≥n bajo Extractos bancarios.Desde la WebApp (CSV): haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pesta√±a nueva), bajo CSV, selecciona las fechas de inicio y fin que necesites y haz clic en Descargar CSV.* El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del bot√≥n de Ingresar dinero.

question: Con quale frequenza posso prelevare contanti gratuitamente?
answer: Il numero di prelievi gratuiti di contanti con la tua Mastercard dipende dal tipo di conto che possiedi e dai Termini e condizioni del tuo Paese di riferimento (quello in cui √® stata originariamente spedita la carta).Per i possessori di conti N26 Standard (nuova tabella):3 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese, in ogni paese (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzando¬†CASH26)Per i possessori di tutti gli altri conti N26 Premium (nuova tabella):Germania: 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese in Germania (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzando¬†CASH26)Austria e Italia: Prelievi gratuiti illimitati (compreso¬†CASH26)*Francia, Spagna, Paesi Bassi e resto d'Europa: 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese nel Paese di residenza e nell'EurozonaSvizzera: Da 3 a 5* prelievi gratuiti al mese nella zona europea e 1,7% di commissione sui prelievi localiSi applica sempre una commissione di 2 ‚Ç¨ se si utilizza la carta¬†Maestro¬†per prelevare contanti (disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e nei Paesi Bassi). Se hai il nostro conto N26 Flex, ogni prelievo costa 2 ‚Ç¨. Controlla i nostri¬†listini prezzi¬†se ti √® stata addebitata una commissione per un¬†prelievo da uno sportello bancomat.*I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti con CASH26 per un massimo di 2000‚Ç¨ a settimana.

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†the Cards tab¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Cos'√® N26 Rate?
answer: Requisiti d'idoneit√†: N26 Rate √® attualmente disponibile solo per i clienti che hanno aperto un conto con IBAN tedesco.N26 Rate ti permette di suddividere una transazione da 3 fino a 6 rate mensili dello stesso importo direttamente nell'app. Se hai effettuato un acquisto importante e vorresti ammortizzarne il costo nel tempo, puoi utilizzare N26 Rate. Puoi suddividere in questo modo le transazioni idonee che hai effettuato nelle ultime 4 settimane. Avrai cos√¨ maggior controllo delle tue spese e potrai gestire il tuo budget mensile come preferisci.Caratteristiche di N26 Rate:Leggi qui sotto le caratteristiche di N26 Rate. Ti preghiamo di notare che i tassi di interesse dipendono dalla valutazione di rischio di credito effettuata da N26. Inoltre, il servizio pu√≤ essere utilizzato solo con transazioni considerate idonee per la suddivisione, il che dipende sia dal tipo di transazione che dall'esercente presso cui l'hai effettuata.Tasso annuo effettivo globale (TAEG): dal 7,99% al 13,99% (a seconda della valutazione di rischio di credito)Importo: tra 20 ‚Ç¨ e 200 ‚Ç¨Durata di N26 Rate: la durata del finanziamento N26 Rate √® compresa tra 3 e 6 mesi, con addebito della prima rata il giorno della sottoscrizione e l'opzione di rimborso anticipato (la rata viene addebitata mensilmente).Idoneit√† dell'esercente / della transazione: N26 Rate √® offerto per un'ampia gamma di acquisti in diverse categorie, inclusa l'elettronica, l'arredamento, biglietti aerei e ferroviari, moda e addirittura pagamenti effettuati presso il tuo negozio di quartiere preferito!Ulteriori informazioni:Suddividi in rate gli acquisti attraverso il finanziamento nella tua app N26Torna indietro fino a 4 settimane per suddividere gli acquisti passatiPossibilit√† di rimborso anticipato del finanziamento Addebito diretto in rate mensili Pagamento manuale dei pagamenti saltatiPromemoria automatico un giorno prima della scadenzaPromemoria automatico quando salti un pagamentoCome usare N26 Rate?Dopo aver portato a termine una transazione, se √® idonea, puoi accedere a N26 Rate in diversi modi:Vedrai una scheda pratica nel tuo feed delle transazioniScorri fino alla fine della scheda 'Esplora' e tocca N26 Rate sotto Prodotti finanziari.Una volta che il finanziamento √® stato creato, puoi vedere la sezione con le rate seguendo questi passaggi:Seleziona 'Opzioni' (i tre puntini in alto nel feed delle transazioni)Vai su 'N26 Rate'Dopo aver selezionato una transazione idonea che vuoi rateizzare, verrai guidato attraverso gli step sottostanti per confermare l'utilizzo di N26 Rate:Per prima cosa ti verranno fornite informazioni su N26 RatePoi vedrai l'analisi dettagliata del Tasso Annuo Effettivo Globale (TAEG) applicabile, l‚Äôimporto totale da restituire e in fondo allo schermo troverai uno slider che ti permette di scegliere la durata (anche le rate mensili verranno mostrate sullo schermo)In seguito vedrai la schermata finale, dove ti sar√† richiesto di prendere visione e sottoscrivere la documentazione contrattuale per confermare l‚Äôoperazione.Dopo aver confermato un finanziamento con N26 Rate ti verr√† accreditato l'importo corrispondente al tuo acquisto direttamente sul tuo conto principale. Addebiteremo contemporaneamente l'importo corrispondente alla prima rata. I pagamenti delle rate restanti ti verranno addebitati automaticamente sul conto principale a scadenza regolare ogni mese (riceverai un promemoria 1 giorno prima della scadenza del pagamento).Come gestisco N26 Rate?Puoi gestire il tuo finanziamento con N26 Rate navigando nella sezione corrispondente dell'app e selezionando il menu delle opzioni (i 3 puntini in alto a destra nel feed delle transazioni) e poi andando su N26 Rate. Dopodich√© potrai vedere:Il saldo totale dei finanziamenti da restituireLe rate dei finanziamentiDettagli sulle ratePiano di rimborsoL'opzione per rimborsare l'intero importo

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS ‚Üí Certificates ‚Üí "Request for yourself" ‚Üí flag "of Residence" ‚Üí "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" ‚Üí and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.¬†Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.¬†Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What‚Äôs a ‚Äúbanking day‚Äù?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn‚Äôt arrived ‚Äî where is it?So what if you‚Äôve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn‚Äôt come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking f√ºr Drittanbieter
answer:
HintergrundDie Zweite EU-Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (PSD2) bringt einige √Ñnderungen f√ºr Zahlungsdienste innerhalb der Europ√§ischen Union mit sich. Ziel der PSD2 ist es, einen einheitlicheren, transparenteren und offeneren EU-Zahlungsmarkt zu schaffen und allen Marktteilnehmern Innovation, Wettbewerb und Sicherheit zu bieten.Wenn Sie als Drittanbieter Zugang zu den PSD2-Schnittstellen von N26 erhalten m√∂chten, m√ºssen Sie von einer nationalen Aufsichtsbeh√∂rde lizenziert sein. In Deutschland ist dies die Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. Au√üerdem ben√∂tigen Sie daf√ºr ein qualifiziertes Zertifikat f√ºr die Website-Authentifizierung (QWAC). Solche Zertifikate k√∂nnen Sie bei qualifizierten Vertrauensdiensteanbietern (QTSP (neuen Tab)) beantragen.Dedizierte SchnittstelleUnsere dedizierte Schnittstelle ist die REST API, die mit Version 1.3.6 der Implementierungsrichtlinien der Berlin Group (neuen Tab) konform ist.Autorisierungsprotokoll: oAuth 2.0 (neuen Tab).Anmerkung: Hinweis: F√ºr den Zugriff auf die API der Berlin Group ist ein g√ºltiges QWAC-Zertifikat erforderlich. Die offizielle Liste der qualifizierten Vetrauensdiensteanbieter ist auf der Vertrauensliste der Europ√§ischen Kommission auf Grundlage der eIDAS-Verordnung (neuen Tab) verf√ºgbar. F√ºr die dedizierte PSD2-Schnittstelle (API) von N26 muss ein QWAC-Zertifikat von einer qualifizierten Zertifizierungsstelle ausgestellt werdenNotfallmechanismusIm Rahmen seiner gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen gem√§√ü der PSD2 hat N26 einen Notfallmechanismus implementiert, der Folgendes vorsieht:Zuverl√§ssige Identifizierung eines Drittanbieters √ºber den Besitz eines g√ºltigen QWAC-Zertifikats (Qualifiziertes Zertifikat f√ºr die Website-Authentifizierung).Sicherer und autorisierter Zugriff auf ein KontoDrittanbieter k√∂nnen √ºber die folgenden URLs auf unseren Notfallmechanismus zugreifen:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deDer Zugriff auf die obigen URLs und der Aufbau der TLS-Verbindung erfordern die Nutzung eines qualifizierten Zertifikats.DokumentationTPPs finden die folgende Dokumentation im √∂ffentlichen GitHub-Repository von N26 (neuen Tab):AISP- und PISP-Dokumentation f√ºr die dedizierte SchnittstelleGreifen Sie auf die Dokumentation f√ºr Sandbox zuAISP- und PISP-Dokumentation f√ºr die Fallback-SchnittstelleOffene API- und Sandbox-PostbotensammlungH√§ufig gestellte FragenWir empfehlen TPPs, sich auf das Repository zu beziehen, um die neuesten Informationen zu technischer Dokumentation und Spezifikation zu erhalten.F√ºr Anfragen und Support im Zusammenhang mit N26 Open Banking verwenden Sie bitte dieses Formular (neuen Tab).Daten zur Verf√ºgbarkeit und Leistung der SchnittstelleIn den folgenden Berichten werden die Verf√ºgbarkeit und Leistung unserer dedizierten PSD2-Schnittstelle mit dem PSU-Interface verglichen:Q3 2019 (neuen Tab) / Q4 2019 (neuen Tab)

question: Comment se connecter avec l‚Äôauthentification √† deux facteurs ?
answer:
L‚Äôauthentification √† deux facteurs est une proc√©dure d‚Äôidentification qui constitue une protection suppl√©mentaire en √©tablissant une authentification √† deux ou plusieurs facteurs pour vous connecter √† votre compte.
En plus d‚Äôutiliser votre mot de passe, vous aurez maintenant besoin soit d'une confirmation depuis votre appareil synchronis√© soit d'un code SMS pour vous connecter √† votre compte.
 
D√©couvrez √©galement comment fonctionne l‚ÄôAuthentification Forte du Client (SCA).Comment me connecter avec l‚Äôauthentification √† deux facteurs ?Lorsque vous vous connectez √† votre compte N26 √† partir d‚Äôun navigateur Web ou d'un appareil non synchronis√© √† votre compte, vous serez invit√© √† confirmer votre connexion depuis une notification envoy√©e sur votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√© ou vous devrez saisir un code envoy√© par SMS au num√©ro de t√©l√©phone li√© √† votre compte. Apr√®s avoir confirm√© votre connexion, vous pourrez alors vous connecter √† votre compte N26.
Lorsque vous vous connectez √† votre compte N26 √† partir de votre appareil synchronis√©, l'authentification √† deux facteurs est d√©j√† automatiquement activ√©e. Par cons√©quent, il vous suffit de saisir votre identifiant et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronis√©.Quelles sont les conditions requises ?Dans un premier temps, veuillez t√©l√©charger la derni√®re mise √† jour de l'application (minimum version 3.31) et essayer de vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronis√©.
Si vous ne pouvez toujours pas vous connecter √† votre compte mais que vous avez toujours acc√®s √† l'adresse e-mail li√©e √† votre compte N26, veuillez essayer de r√©initialiser votre mot de passe.
Si vous n'avez pas acc√®s √† l'adresse e-mail li√©e √† votre compte N26, veuillez contacter notre service client depuis le Livechat pour que nous puissions vous aider.Que dois-je faire si je ne me souviens plus de mon mot de passe ?Vous trouverez plus d‚Äôinformations sur l‚Äôarticle Comment cr√©er un nouveau mot de passe ? de notre Support Center.Je n'ai plus acc√®s √† mon appareil synchronis√©. Comment puis-je me connecter √† nouveau √† mon compte ?Si vous n'avez plus acc√®s √† votre appareil synchronis√© mais que vous avez toujours acc√®s au num√©ro de t√©l√©phone li√© √† votre compte N26, veuillez vous connecter √† votre compte N26 et demander un code d'authentification :Connectez-vous √† votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne ou un appareil non synchronis√©S√©lectionnez Aide au moment o√π l'on vous demande de confirmer votre connexion depuis votre appareil synchronis√©Choisissez Recevoir un code par SMSD√®s que vous aurez re√ßu le code par SMS, rentrez-le dans l'espace indiqu√©Apr√®s avoir confirm√© votre connexion gr√¢ce au code d'authentification, vous aurez donc termin√© l‚Äôauthentification √† deux facteurs et vous pourrez synchroniser votre nouvel appareil √† votre compte.Que dois-je faire si j'ai un nouveau num√©ro de t√©l√©phone ou si je ne suis pas en mesure de recevoir des SMS ?Si vous n'avez pas acc√®s au num√©ro de t√©l√©phone li√© √† votre compte - soit parce que vous avez un nouveau num√©ro de t√©l√©phone, soit parce que votre t√©l√©phone a √©t√© perdu ou vol√© - veuillez contacter notre Service client depuis le Livechat pour que nous puissions vous aider.Et si mon t√©l√©phone n‚Äôest pas compatible avec la derni√®re version de l‚Äôapplication ? Si vous poss√©dez un t√©l√©phone qui n‚Äôest pas compatible avec la derni√®re version de l‚Äôapplication, vous ne pourrez malheureusement plus acc√©der √† votre compte N26 depuis votre application mobile sur ce t√©l√©phone.
Vous devrez confirmer votre connexion via le code SMS que nous enverrons au num√©ro de t√©l√©phone li√© √† votre compte N26 pour vous connecter √† votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne.
Vous pourrez effectuer vos transactions habituelles avec votre Mastercard, cependant veuillez noter que vous ne pourrez effectuer aucun virement tant que vous ne pourrez pas le confirmer dans l'application N26 depuis votre appareil synchronis√©.

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.¬†With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we‚Äôre able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We‚Äôre going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.¬†Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments is currently only available for customers who‚Äôve opened their account in Spain, and who have a ES or DE IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note, rates are dependent on your financial situation. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual interest rate: From 7.49% to 13.99% (financial situation dependent)Eligible purchase amount: From ‚Ç¨20 - ‚Ç¨200N26 Installments Duration: The N26 Installments duration is from 3 to 6 months, with the option of early loan repayment (the interest rate is charged monthly).Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment Automated cancellation of the loan when >105 days in arrearsHow to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‚ÄòExplore‚Äô tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‚ÄòOptions‚Äô (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚ÄôWhen you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚Äô:First you will be provided with information about ‚ÄòN26 Installments‚ÄôThen you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you‚Äôll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We‚Äôll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you‚Äôll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in fullHow do we decide on your N26 Installment request?In order to swiftly and efficiently decide on your request for N26 Installments we evaluate your creditworthiness. In order to evaluate your creditworthiness, we generate an internal credit score. Within the scoring process we calculate how probable it is that you as a customer meet your payment obligations. For such calculations we process your personal data: your salary, your expenses, existing obligations, experiences of former contractual relations, repayment of former credits as agreed upon. Your scoring is the result of a mathematical-statistical procedure. Based on the data processed and the respective outcome of the internal scoring process, we determine whether we may offer you a N26 Account or N26 Installments and establish the conditions we can offer you for those products. Therefore, our scoring process is necessary to offer you an account with us (Payment services framework agreement - N26 Account) and to manage the offer of our credit contracts to you (as N26 Installments) according to Art. 22 (2) (a) and Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR. This information should already be helping you to understand the mathematically and statistically validated decision making process we offer to swiftly and efficiently perform and reply to your request for N26 Installments. You can get in touch with us here and explain why you think that we may have not yet sufficiently considered your point of view in our decision and why we should take further necessary information into account.After you get in touch with us regarding the respective automated decision, the decision will be reviewed by one of our employees. However, this does not guarantee a different decision by N26.

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?
answer: Ersatzkarten sind f√ºr alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erh√§ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten er√∂ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den L√§ndern, in denen N26 verf√ºgbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europ√§ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ans√§ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterst√ºtzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung f√ºr dich vornehmen k√∂nnen. Der Versand au√üerhalb dieser L√§nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zus√§tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.¬†Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten f√ºr ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In l√§ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch l√§nger dauern. Um √ºber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte l√§uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‚ÄòForgot Password‚Äô to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Wie kann ich die Best√§tigung einer SEPA-√úberweisung herunterladen?
answer: Wenn du eine √úberweisung get√§tigt hast und eine Best√§tigung der √úberweisung ben√∂tigst, kannst du diese als PDF-Datei inklusive der Transaktionsdaten in deiner mobilen App oder Web-App herunterladen. Das geht so:Logge dich in deiner N26 App einW√§hle aus der Transaktionsliste die Bank√ºberweisung aus, f√ºr die du die Best√§tigung herunterladen m√∂chtest.Klicke auf "√úberweisungsbest√§tigung herunterladen".Nachdem du diese Option ausw√§hlst, wird das Dokument automatisch auf dein Smartphone oder PC heruntergeladen.Welche Daten werde ich in der √úberweisungsbest√§tigung finden?In der √úberweisungsbest√§tigung findest du die Bankverbindung des √úberweisenden und des Beg√ºnstigten der √úberweisung, einschlie√ülich des Transaktionsbetrags und des Datums, an dem die √úberweisung stattgefunden hat.

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM‚Äôs nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can‚Äôt reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2‚Ç¨.

question: Come posso collegare il mio conto N26 a PayPal?
answer:
Se vuoi, puoi collegare il tuo conto N26 al tuo account PayPal, e avere cos√¨ accesso a una serie di vantaggi.¬†Potrai ricaricare istantaneamente il tuo conto corrente, inviare e ricevere pagamenti rapidi in tutta sicurezza e senza il bisogno di usare i tuoi dati bancari o il numero della tua carta N26.Ecco come collegare il tuo conto N26 dalla versione web di PayPal:Clicca su Portafoglio nella parte superiore della pagina.Seleziona Collega una carta o un conto bancarioClicca Collega un conto bancario.Segui le istruzioni fornite.
Se invece utilizzi l‚Äôapp mobile di PayPal:Clicca su Impostazioni in alto a destraSeleziona Collega una carta o un conto bancarioClicca sul + e seleziona Conto bancarioInserisci i tuoi dati bancari e conferma¬†
Ricorda di immettere il tuo nome e cognome esattamente come riportato sul tuo conto N26, altrimenti il collegamento con PayPal non andr√† a buon fine.Non appena il tuo conto N26 sar√† confermato, PayPal effettuer√† due addebiti di piccolo importo che saranno poi rimborsati sul tuo conto nel giro di 2-3 giorni lavorativi.¬†A questo punto dovrai semplicemente prendere nota degli addebiti ricevuti, accedere al tuo account PayPal e confermare il collegamento del tuo conto N26 dal tuo Portafoglio.

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: FATCA - Perch√© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
answer: Come previsto dalla normativa FATCA, N26 ha l‚Äôobbligo di fornire informazioni finanziarie al Dipartimento del Tesoro e all‚ÄôInternal Revenue Service (IRS) degli Stati Uniti sui conti di contribuenti statunitensi e di societ√† estere in cui contribuenti statunitensi detengono interessi considerevoli.La normativa FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) √® stata introdotta dall‚ÄôIRS con lo scopo di prevenire l‚Äôevasione fiscale di contribuenti statunitensi mediante l‚Äôapertura di conti presso istituti finanziari esteri.¬†Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA sul sito www.irs.gov (nuova tabella)¬†A differenza della maggior parte dei paesi del mondo, il sistema fiscale statunitense prevede la tassazione dei propri cittadini anche nei casi in cui abbiano la residenza fiscale all‚Äôestero.¬†¬†Per stabilire se il tuo conto deve essere riportato all‚ÄôIRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:1. Sei (anche) un cittadino statunitense o titolare di una Green Card (permesso di soggiorno permanente) per gli Stati Uniti?2. Sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti? Essere ‚Äúsoggetto a tasse‚Äù negli Stati Uniti non significa necessariamente pagare imposte sul reddito negli Stati Uniti. Implica, piuttosto, che le normative fiscali richiedono la compilazione della dichiarazione dei redditi (inerente tutti i redditi percepiti al di fuori degli Stati Uniti) da presentare all‚ÄôIRS.¬† 3. Se sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti, qual √® il tuo Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)?Puoi fornire il tuo Social Security Number (SSN) statunitense oppure il tuo Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN).¬†Ti informiamo, inoltre, che se il tuo conto presenta un luogo di nascita statunitense, un numero di telefono statunitense oppure se hai impostato un ordine permanente verso gli Stati Uniti, secondo la normativa FATCA, verrai considerato un soggetto ai sensi del FATCA fino a quando non verr√† dimostrato il contrario.¬†Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. Baster√† eseguire l‚Äôaccesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:„Éª iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
„Éª Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.¬†Remember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app‚Äîyou‚Äôll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember‚Äîyou can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you‚Äôll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).¬†To unpair your old smartphone:Go to üë§ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to üë§ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you‚Äôre able to see what‚Äôs going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you‚Äôve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.¬†Sometimes you‚Äôll see both payments at the same time‚Äìthe authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn‚Äôt expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).¬†Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).
