question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 Metal (new tab):If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
answer: From the 17th March, customers from other banks can request‚Äîat their bank institution‚Äîthe return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, you‚Äôll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your Main Account, you‚Äôll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

question: Come evitare le truffe via SMS
answer:
Hai ricevuto un messaggio SMS seguito da un link molto sospetto?Se s√¨, NON cliccare su quel link! Questo √® un messaggio di phishing.Come funziona la truffa?Ricevi un SMS dai toni allarmanti che ti invita ad aprire un link.L‚ÄôSMS contiene un link con un URL diverso da quello ufficiale di N26 https://app.n26.com/login (nuova tabella)La pagina che si apre cliccando su quel link fraudolento ha una¬† grafica simile a quella usata da N26 e richiede la condivisione di alcuni dati personali, come 
la password dell'e-mail, la password, il numero della carta, il CVC, il codice PIN o i codici arrivati via SMS.. Non fornire mai questi dati fuori dall' App o dalla WebApp di N26!Dopo l‚ÄôSMS, un finto operatore chiama la vittima e prova a convincerla a svolgere alcune operazioni sospette, come fornire ulteriori dati relativi al conto o accedere all‚ÄôApp di N26 per autorizzare delle transazioni non richieste. Ricorda: non confermare mai un pagamento all‚Äôinterno dell‚ÄôApp di N26 se non riconosci il beneficiario o l‚Äôesercente!Cosa fare se hai cliccato su un link sospetto?In questo caso, cambia immediatamente la tua password di accesso al conto.Puoi farlo accedendo alla App > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Sicurezza > Modifica la password di accesso. Oppure, durante il Login, puoi cliccare su Reimposta la password.¬†Ti invieremo un‚Äôemail con la procedura da seguire.Se hai fornito i tuoi dati personali tramite quel link, contattaci via chat dalla tua App N26. I nostri operatori ti assisteranno nel ripristino delle credenziali dia sicurezza del tuo conto. Se puoi, inviaci lo screenshot dell‚ÄôSMS a support@n26.comDevo confermare una transazione attraverso l‚ÄôApp di N26 per poter ricevere il rimborso?Assolutamente no! Non ti chiederemo mai di autorizzare una transazione attraverso l‚ÄôApp di N26 se non sei stato tu a disporla. Non confermare mai delle transazioni se non riconosci il nome o l‚ÄôIBAN del destinatario nel caso di un bonifico, l‚Äôemail o il numero di telefono nel caso di un MoneyBeam, il nome dell‚Äôesercente nel caso di una transazione con carta. Ti ricordiamo che la conferma delle transazioni avviene attraverso apposita notifica ricevuta all‚Äôinterno dell‚ÄôApp di N26.Riconosci le comunicazioni ufficiali di N26?N26 non invia mai link all‚Äôinterno dei propri SMS, non fidarti se il messaggio che ricevi ne contiene uno!I messaggi di N26 arrivano solitamente dal mittente ‚ÄúAUTHMSG‚Äù, compresi i codici di verifica e di associazione OTP (One Time Password).I principali mezzi di comunicazione usati da N26 sono la live chat, le email e le chiamate in entrata da parte dei nostri clienti Premium.¬†Non telefoniamo mai ai nostri clienti, a meno che non sia stato il cliente stesso a richiedere la telefonata.Come fanno i truffatori a conoscere i miei dati?Pensa ai tuoi profili social, come Facebook o Instagram: alcuni tuoi dati personali sono sicuramente online. Nome e cognome, data di nascita, indirizzo email, numero di telefono, sono tutti dati che utilizziamo per identificarci, ad esempio, nella creazione di account su internet. I truffatori sanno sfruttare la vulnerabilit√† delle persone per raccogliere queste informazioni tramite tattiche di social engineering.

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Where to find your Tax ID
answer: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If you‚Äôre from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben √ºber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des Proc√©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authorities‚Äô database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TIN‚Äôs are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If you‚Äôre a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TIN‚Äôs are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‚Äòlookalike audiences‚Äô are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‚ÄòGDPR‚Äô) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.¬†You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: Hast du eine verd√§chtige Nachricht erhalten?
answer: Auf dem H√∂hepunkt der Pandemie enth√ºllte EasyJet, dass die pers√∂nlichen Daten und Reiseinformationen von 9 Millionen Kunden durch einen √§u√üerst raffinierten Cyberangriff gestohlen worden waren. In der ersten H√§lfte des Jahres 2021 wurden die pers√∂nlichen Daten von mehr als 530 Millionen Facebook-Nutzern aus √ºber 100 L√§ndern online zum Kauf angeboten. Ein paar Tage sp√§ter tauchten die pers√∂nlichen Daten von weiteren 500 Millionen LinkedIn-Nutzern im Darknet auf. Diese Daten umfassten Informationen wie Namen, Geburtsdaten, Telefonnummern und E-Mail-Adressen.Was hat das mit N26 zu tun? Auch wenn N26 oder die Sicherheit deines Girokontos nicht direkt davon betroffen sind, k√∂nnen Cyberkriminelle mithilfe von Informationen, die sie durch Angriffe auf andere Unternehmen erlangt haben, gro√ü angelegte Phishing-Angriffe ver√ºben.Phishing ist eine Methode, um an sensible Informationen zu gelangen, die dann f√ºr betr√ºgerische Zwecke verwendet werden k√∂nnen. Indem sie sich als vertrauensw√ºrdige Unternehmen tarnen, k√∂nnen Betr√ºger Menschen mit List dazu bringen, ihre pers√∂nlichen Daten preiszugeben. Dies gelingt ihnen, indem sie Menschen √ºber digitale Kommunikationskan√§le, die wir alle t√§glich nutzen, ins Visier nehmen, wie z. B. per E-Mail, SMS, Telefonanruf und √ºber soziale Netzwerke.Als digitale Bank, die zunehmend an Bekanntheit gewinnt, sind N26 Kunden bereits Ziel von Phishing-Kampagnen geworden. Dabei versenden Angreifer Nachrichten, die h√§ufig einen Link zu Websites enthalten, die der Web-App von N26 zum Verwechseln √§hnlich sehen. Auch wenn sie auf den ersten Blick t√§uschend echt wirken, sind diese Websites b√∂swillig und stehen in keiner Weise mit N26 in Verbindung. In einigen F√§llen f√§lschen Angreifer unseren SMS-Kurzcode, was dazu f√ºhren kann, dass ihre Nachrichten im gleichen Thread erscheinen wie zuvor von N26 versandte Nachrichten. Wir bitten dich, achtsam zu bleiben und uns sofort zu kontaktieren, wenn dir etwas merkw√ºrdig vorkommt.Was unternimmt N26 in diesem Fall? Unser Sicherheitspersonal h√§lt kontinuierlich Ausschau nach m√∂glichen Angriffen, um sicherzustellen, dass alle betr√ºgerischen Websites so schnell wie m√∂glich deaktiviert werden und wir als Unternehmen die Sicherheit deines Kontos gew√§hrleisten k√∂nnen.W√§hrend wir weiterhin Vorsichtsma√ünahmen ergreifen, um deine Konten und pers√∂nlichen Daten zu sch√ºtzen, kannst du auch selbst einiges daf√ºr tun. Diese Dinge solltest du beachten, wenn du eine unerwartete Nachricht erhalten hast:Hast du eine SMS von jemandem erhalten, der behauptet, im Namen von N26 zu handeln, solltest du immer daran denken, dass wir niemals √ºber solche Kan√§le Kontakt mit dir aufnehmen werden.Hinter Textnachrichten mit einer Handlungsaufforderung steckt immer eine b√∂swillige Absicht. Klicke auf keinen Fall auf Links und gib keine pers√∂nlichen Daten preis. Wir werden dich niemals per SMS dazu auffordern, etwas zu tun.Solltest du Zweifel an Informationen haben, die dir mitgeteilt wurden, oder vermutest du, dass du auf eine betr√ºgerische Seite gef√ºhrt worden bist, ist Vorsicht geboten. Wenn du aufgefordert wurdest, eine bestimmte Telefonnummer anzurufen oder eine Nachricht an eine bestimmte E-Mail-Adresse zu senden, dann solltest du die Kontaktdaten recherchieren und pr√ºfen, ob es sich um ein seri√∂ses Unternehmen handelt.Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, mache einen Screenshot von der Nachricht und kontaktiere unsere Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter √ºber die Chat-Option in deiner N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com. Wir stehen dir jederzeit mit Rat und Tat zur Seite!

question: Wie kann ich gemeinsame Ausgaben mit MoneyBeam aufteilen?
answer: Teilnahmeberechtigung: Alle EU-M√§rkte mit iOS verf√ºgbar. In den kommenden Wochen ist das Feature auch f√ºr Android verf√ºgbar.Rechnungen teilenMit unserer neuesten Funktion "Rechnungen teilen" kannst du √ºber deine N26 App ganz einfach gemeinsame Ausgaben unter Freunden und mit der Familie aufteilen. Teile die Rechnung in einem Restaurant auf oder beteilige dich an einem Geburtstagsgeschenk ‚Äì die Funktion ist f√ºr alle Eink√§ufe geeignet, bei denen die Kosten unter mehreren Personen aufgeteilt werden sollen. Du kannst sogar die Kosten f√ºr deine Haushaltsausgaben aufteilen, wie z. B. eine Stromrechnung oder Gegenst√§nde f√ºr dein Zuhause.F√ºr jede durchgef√ºhrte Kartentransaktion kannst du die Rechnung gleichm√§√üig aufteilen oder individuelle Betr√§ge f√ºr jede Person eingeben, die an dem Gruppeneinkauf beteiligt ist. Du kannst die Kosten unter beliebigen Personen aufteilen, egal, ob sie N26 Kunden sind oder nicht.Wie man "Rechnungen teilen" verwendetDu musst f√ºr den Kauf zuerst deine N26 Karte verwenden. Wenn du dann die Rechnung aufteilen m√∂chtest, gehe nach den folgenden Schritten vor:√ñffne nach deinem Kauf deine N26 AppSuche im "Start"-Tab nach der Transaktion, tippe sie an und w√§hle "Rechnung aufteilen" aus.F√ºge die Personen hinzu, mit denen du die Kosten aufteilen m√∂chtest (bei Personen, die nicht Kunden bei N26 sind, musst du ihren Namen angeben).Wenn alles fertig ist, tippe auf den gr√ºnen Button am unteren Rand des Bildschirms, um die aufgeteilten Betr√§ge zu best√§tigen.Personen, die nicht Kunden bei N26 sind, erhalten eine Nachricht mit deiner Bankverbindung, um dir den vereinbarten Betrag zu √ºberweisen.Tippe abschlie√üend auf "Best√§tigen", um die verbleibenden Anfragen an andere N26 Kunden zu senden, die dann eine Anfrage √ºber MoneyBeam erhalten werden.Wichtig:Anfragen an N26 Kunden: Dies funktioniert genauso wie eine normale Anfrage bei MoneyBeam.Anfragen an Personen, die nicht Kunden bei N26 sind: Du erh√§ltst eine Standardvorlage mit deinen IBAN-Daten, die du bearbeiten kannst. Diese kann dann √ºber jede andere Messaging-Plattform auf deinem Ger√§t versendet werden (z. B. E-Mail, WhatsApp, Signal, usw.). Bitte bedenke, dass diese Anfragen nicht in der App nachverfolgt werden k√∂nnen.Verbleibenden Zahlungsbetrag anzeigen: N26 Kunden und auch du selbst k√∂nnen den aufzuteilenden Gesamtbetrag einsehen und wie viel von der Gesamtrechnung noch zu zahlen ist. Wenn der Gesamtkaufbetrag nicht mit dem aufgeteilten Betrag √ºbereinstimmt, dann erscheint eine Warnmeldung (du kannst aber trotzdem weitermachen).Maximal 20 offene MoneyBeam-Anfragen: Du kannst bis zu 20 offene MoneyBeam-Anfragen gleichzeitig und maximal 3 offene Anfragen mit einem einzigen Kontakt nutzen. Wenn dein Limit erreicht ist, wird dir eine Nachricht zur Erkl√§rung angezeigt.

question: Wie benutze ich EasyFlex Savings?
answer: Bitte beachte: Seit dem 16. September 2022 sind keine neuen Anmeldungen bei EasyFlex Savings mehr m√∂glich. Falls du dich vor diesem Datum angemeldet hast, bist du davon nicht betroffen uns kannst das Produkt wie gewohnt nutzen.Mit EasyFlex Savings kannst du Zinsen verdienen und dabei v√∂llig flexibel bleiben. Der Mindestbetrag f√ºr die erste Einzahlung liegt bei 500‚Ç¨. Danach kannst jederzeit beliebig viel Geld von deinem EasyFlex Savings-Depot abheben oder darauf einzahlen. Das bedeutet: Es gibt keine Festgeld-Laufzeiten, sondern du kannst jederzeit auf dein Geld zugreifen. Abhebungen von- und Einzahlungen auf dein EasyFlex Savings-Depot dauern bis zu 2 Werktage. Tippe im Homescreen deiner App auf Entdecken, scrolle herunter und w√§hle dann EasyFlex Savings, um es zu √∂ffnen. FAQsWas kostet EasyFlex Savings?Es gibt keine festen Geb√ºhren und auch von deinen Zinsen berechnen wir nichts. Falls du mehr als 50.000‚Ç¨ auf deinem N26 Konto hast, ist EasyFlex Savings eine gute M√∂glichkeit, unser Verwahrentgelt (neuen Tab) zu vermeiden und dabei etwas zu verdienen.Wie oft werden die Zinsen ausbezahlt?Deine verdienten Zinsen werden dir jedes Quartal (alle 3 Monate) auf dein EasyFlex Savings-Depot ausgezahlt. Du kannst den Betrag abheben oder ihn in deinem EasyFlex Savings-Depot lassen, um noch mehr Zinsen zu verdienen.Gibt es einen festen Zinssatz?Nein. Der Zinssatz variiert und h√§ngt von unserer Partnerbank ab. Wir sind jederzeit bestrebt, transparent zu sein und die h√∂chstm√∂glichen Zinss√§tze anzubieten.Muss ich auf meine verdienten Zinsen Einkommensteuer zahlen?Du musst deine verdienten Zinsen in deiner pers√∂nlichen Einkommensteuererkl√§rung an die zust√§ndige Steuerbeh√∂rde erkl√§ren. Ob du Einkommensteuer auf deine verdienten Zinsen zahlen musst, h√§ngt von deiner pers√∂nlichen Situation ab. Du erh√§ltst eine j√§hrliche Erkl√§rung von unserer Partnerbank in deinen Nachrichten von N26 in deiner App mit den gesamten Zinsen, die du versteuern musst.Wie bietet N26 das Easy Flex Savings als Service an?Wir sind eine Partnerschaft mit Raisin, auch bekannt als WeltSparen, eingegangen, um EasyFlex Savings als komplett digitalen Service anzubieten. Unsere Partnerbank f√ºr dieses Produkt ist die norwegische Komplett Bank.Ist mein Geld sicher in EasyFlex Savings?Ja. Dein Geld ist durch die deutsche Einlagensicherung gesch√ºtzt, durch die dein Gelde in H√∂he von bis zu 100.000‚Ç¨ abgesichert ist (ausgezahlt im √Ñquivalent in norwegischen Kronen).

question: Perch√© la verifica video non funziona?
answer: Alcuni consigli per fare la¬†verifica¬†video con successo:La maggior parte delle videochiamate non riesce a causa della connessione Internet scarsa o della cattiva qualit√† dell‚Äôimmagine (ad es. troppo sfocata o scarsa illuminazione). question: Pourquoi y a-t-il une liste d‚Äôattente pour ouvrir un compte ?
answer: Afin de construire des fondations encore plus solides pour l‚Äôavenir de notre entreprise, nous mettons en ce moment l‚Äôaccent sur l'exp√©rience client, nos offres de produits et nos processus internes. Tout cela pour devenir une banque encore meilleure pour vous dans les ann√©es √† venir.¬†Compte tenu de la forte demande concernant les services bancaires num√©riques de N26, nous limitons de fa√ßon temporaire le nombre de nouveaux comptes que nous proposons chaque mois.¬†Nous avons donc mis en place une liste d'attente. Nous vous encourageons √† vous y inscrire, car nous vous contacterons aussit√¥t que nous pourrons vous proposer le compte de votre choix.Je suis client N26, qu'est-ce qui change pour moi ?Rien du tout. En tant que client N26, vous pouvez continuer √† profiter en toute s√©curit√© de l'exp√©rience bancaire simple et intuitive que vous connaissez et appr√©ciez au quotidien, aussi bien sur votre smartphone que sur votre espace client en ligne. ¬†Nous faisons notre maximum pour faciliter le processus d‚Äôouverture de compte pour les nouveaux clients et esp√©rons pouvoir bient√¥t les accueillir.Je ne suis pas encore client, quand est-ce que je pourrai ouvrir mon compte N26 ?Si vous avez essay√© d‚Äôouvrir un compte N26 mais que vous n‚Äôavez pas pu le faire, la meilleure fa√ßon de vous tenir au courant est de vous inscrire sur notre liste d‚Äôattente. Nous pourrons alors vous contacter tr√®s rapidement d√®s l'instant o√π vous aurez la possibilit√© d'ouvrir le compte de votre choix.En raison de la tr√®s forte demande pour nos services, nous voulons assurer √† chacune des personnes inscrites sur notre liste d'attente un acc√®s √©quitable √† l'exp√©rience bancaire N26. C'est pour cette raison que nous traitons les demandes d'ouverture de compte dans l'ordre dans lequel nous les recevons.Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 ?

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.¬†You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them

question: ¬øQu√© pasa si tengo un saldo negativo?
answer: Tu saldo puede ser negativo si tienes que abonar comisiones de N26, por ejemplo, por nuestras entregas expr√©s o por nuestros contratos premium.¬†En el resto de los casos, tu saldo puede ser negativo si entran pagos offline con tarjeta y deben contabilizarse. Se trata, por ejemplo, de pagos en vuelos o barcos que, en el momento de la autorizaci√≥n de pago, no pueden deducirse del saldo de tu cuenta, pero que de todos modos deben cargarse.Conforme a nuestros T√©rminos y condiciones, est√°s obligado a liquidar tu saldo negativo. Recibir√°s un recordatorio por email y te pediremos que liquides tu saldo negativo lo antes posible. Mientras tu saldo sea negativo, no podr√°s efectuar m√°s pagos ni realizar retiradas en cajeros.¬øQu√© pasa si mi saldo sigue siendo negativo?Tu cuenta seguir√° activa durante 60 d√≠as a partir de la fecha en la que el saldo entre en n√∫meros rojos. Durante este plazo:Recibir√°s dos recordatorios.Si tienes una cuenta N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You, se cancelar√°n todos los servicios 60 d√≠as despu√©s y tu cuenta se convertir√° en una cuenta est√°ndarSi transcurridos estos 60 d√≠as no has hecho nada, podremos proceder al cierre de tu cuenta.

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app‚Äì‚Äìno debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store‚Äì‚Äìit‚Äôs that simple. Plus, you don‚Äôt have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you‚Äôll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.¬†If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of ‚Ç¨2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?¬†When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?¬†¬†First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.What if I can‚Äôt remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can‚Äôt receive SMS for other reasons?If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.Why can‚Äôt I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: ¬øC√≥mo a√±adir y eliminar participantes en un espacio compartido?
answer:
C√≥mo a√±adir a un participante a un espacio compartido:Accede al "Espacio" y haz clic en el icono "Compartir" en la parte superior derecha.Selecciona a la persona que deseas agregar de tu lista de contactos.Acepta las condiciones del servicio y confirma haciendo clic en 
"Otorgar poder especial".C√≥mo eliminar a un participante de un espacio compartido:En la secci√≥n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el men√∫ en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha. iOS: desde la lista de participantes, pulsa sobre la flecha que est√° al lado del nombre que quieres eliminar. Android: Pincha en el nombre del participante.Pulsa en ‚Äòrevocar poder notarial‚Äô.Confirma la notificaci√≥n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha sobre ‚Äòrevocar poder notarial‚Äô.Para unirte a un espacio compartido:En la secci√≥n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el espacio ''Pendiente'' y el icono de compartir espacio. Lee el resumen del espacio compartido y despu√©s lee la pantalla del poder notarial. Cuando lo hayas le√≠do, marca la casilla verde y pulsa sobre ''Otorgar poder notarial''.Introduce tu PIN de confirmation.Confirma la notificaci√≥n ''Aceptar poder notarial'' que te llegar√° a tu dispositivo vinculado.Necesitas tener alg√∫n espacio sin utilizar para aceptar la invitaci√≥n a un espacio compartido. En caso contrario, tendr√°s que eliminar alguno para liberar espacio. No debes tener ning√∫n espacio con el mismo nombre o imagen que el espacio compartido. Solo puedes aceptar la invitaci√≥n para unirte a un espacio compartido cuando hayas cambiado el nombre o al imagen del otro espacio. Para salirte de un espacio compartido:En la secci√≥n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el men√∫ en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha. Dentro de la configuraci√≥n pulsa en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''Confirma la notificaci√≥n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''Se puede crear y modificar un espacio compartido desde la app de N26 y la web app. M√°s sobre Espacios Compartidos¬øQu√© son los Espacios Compartidos?¬øC√≥mo crear un Espacios Compartido?

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).¬†In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‚ÄòDE‚Äô IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‚ÄòDirect Debits‚Äô: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don‚Äôt have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space‚Äôs IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‚ÄòSpaces‚Äô section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‚ÄòSpace Settings‚Äô and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' ¬ª¬†Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' ¬ª¬†Accept the T&C's ¬ª¬†Enter your confirmation PIN ¬ª¬†Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‚Äòcog icon‚Äô)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on ‚ÄúSend money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúBank transfer‚ÄùSelect the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 You?
answer: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus f√ºnf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 You Mastercard online sowie in Gesch√§ften, vermeide versteckte Bankgeb√ºhren und profitiere von geb√ºhrenfreien Auslands√ºberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst dar√ºber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit geb√ºhrenfrei Bargeld in jeder W√§hrung abheben.Versicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: R√ºckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, f√ºr Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Versp√§tung des aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten f√ºr medizinische R√ºcktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erh√§ltst eine Versicherung f√ºr Such- und Rettungsma√ünahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unf√§llen w√§hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz f√ºr Sch√§den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Du kannst N26 YOU mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du dich f√ºr¬†N26 You (neuen Tab) interessierst, denke daran:Die N26 You Mastercard hat keine Pr√§gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlie√ülich der Nummer, des CVV Codes und des zehnstelligen Tokens sind auf der R√ºckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du auf N26 You upgradest, wird die monatliche Geb√ºhr von 9,90 ‚Ç¨ jeden Monat ab dem Datum deines Upgrades direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du ein Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach deiner¬†Identit√§ts√ºberpr√ºfung¬†eingezogen. Danach wird die Mitgliedschaftsgeb√ºhr monatlich von deinem Konto abgebucht, gez√§hlt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades. Wenn du dein Konto also zum Monatsende er√∂ffnest, wird die Geb√ºhr im darauf folgenden Monat zwei Mal abgebucht. Du kannst eine zus√§tzlich N26 You Karte f√ºr eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10‚Ç¨ in deiner N26 App bestellen.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgeb√ºhr monatlich oder im Voraus f√ºr die n√§chsten 6 Monate oder f√ºr 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich f√ºr die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig f√ºr den von dir gew√ºnschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt.Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Abrechnungsoptionen (monatlich, halbj√§hrlich oder j√§hrlich) und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won‚Äôt be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: Wie kann ich Push-Nachrichten erhalten?
answer: Wir senden dir Push-Mitteilungen, um √úberweisungen abzuschlie√üen (z. B.¬†MoneyBeam) oder einen Service zu best√§tigen (wie bei¬†CASH26). Wenn du diese Push-Nachrichten nicht erh√§ltst, √ºberpr√ºfe zun√§chst, ob die Benachrichtigungen sowohl f√ºr dein Smartphone als auch f√ºr die App aktiviert sind. Dann kannst du abh√§ngig von deinem Smartphone einige unserer Vorschl√§ge zur Fehlerbehebung ausprobieren:iOSL√∂sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
answer: Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is ‚Ç¨9) in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

question: Mastercard travel rewards - France
answer: Mastercard Travel Rewards allows you to save while you travel. With hundreds of cashback deals across 17 countries, you can get automatic cashback on arts, culture, shopping, restaurants, hotels, and more when you pay with your N26 Mastercard overseas.Where can I find the deals?When you login to your N26 app, just tap the Explore tab to access all the current offers and deals available. How can I get these discounts?If you want to benefit from the deals offered by Mastercard Travel Rewards, all you have to do is pay with your N26 card at participating stores abroad. You will then receive a cashback in your N26 account within 30 days from the purchase date.Please note: Mastercard Travel Rewards is only available for N26 Smart, You and Metal account holders.

question: How to block contactless payments on my card?
answer: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen. question: How do I cash a check?
answer:
N26 is a 100% digital bank‚Äîall of our services are performed online and we have no bank branches. This means it‚Äôs not possible to deposit a check into your N26 account, and we don‚Äôt issue checkbooks.
However, we offer a number of ways to top up your N26 account (new tab) easily, quickly, and directly from your smartphone.

question: Who can sign up for N26 Business?
answer:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.¬†How do N26 Business accounts work?¬†N26 offers a wide range of Business accounts (new tab), designed for freelancers and the self-employed, with a Mastercard linked to their account, entitling them to up to 0.5% monthly cashback on all their business payments.(The cashback offered by N26 Business accounts is not the Government Cashback, which can currently be activated for all N26 Mastercards.)If you are interested in Allianz coverage or other Premium perks, besides the N26 Business (new tab) account, you can also opt for N26 Business You (new tab) , N26 Business Metal (new tab), or N26 Business Smart (new tab). ¬†N26 Business (new tab) accounts are reserved exclusively for:freelancers enrolled in a professional register or order (such as architects, lawyers, pharmacists, and nurses)other freelancers, i.e. the self-employed and individual entrepreneurs with a VAT number (such as designers, photographers, electricians, or owners of B&Bs and holiday homes with VAT numbers).sole proprietorships registered in the Business Register of the Chamber of CommerceHowever, it is not possible to sign up for an N26 Business in the name of a partnership (e.g., GPs and LPs), capital company (e.g., LLCs and INCs), or another entity, including subjects with legal status and liability.¬†What is the VAT number and where can I find it?The VAT number is an 11-digit numeric code, which is used to uniquely identify the owner of a given professional activity, such as the personal tax code.
Under Italian law, anyone who carries out a continuous activity for more than 30 days, in fact, has the obligation to register for VAT. This can be of two types: ordinary or flat-rate tax regime, depending on the revenues and expenses incurred for the activity.
The opening of the VAT number takes place by submitting a specific form to the Revenue Agency:Model AA9 / 12 (new tab) for individuals;Model AA7 / 10 (new tab) for companies.The form must be submitted or sent online via the Tax Agency portal (new tab) within 30 days of starting the professional activity.
As soon as the opening application is approved and completed, you will receive the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number containing the relevant code assigned to you by post and in the reserved area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe Tax Agency portal (new tab) .What is the ATECO code and where can I find it?The ATECO code is an alphanumeric abbreviation used to classify a commercial activity and to assign a risk level to that company, according to the ATECO 2007 classification (new tab)currently in force.
The code must be entered at the time of the request to open the VAT number, in order to communicate to the Tax Agency the type of activity that will be carried out.
It will also be possible to add different ATECO codes with the opening of additional VAT numbers.
You can find the ATECO code on the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number or on the Chamber of Commerce registration in the case of sole proprietorships.

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: Wie kann ich Feedback geben oder ein neues Produkt vorschlagen?

Schreib uns einfach eine E-Mail an ideas@n26.com (neuen Tab)! √úber diese Adresse sammeln wir alle Verbesserungsvorschl√§ge, Ideen und W√ºnsche.Je nach Nachfrage ber√ºcksichtigen wir deine Vorschl√§ge in der Produktentwicklung. In der Vergangenheit haben wir auf diese Weise schon einige neue Features eingef√ºhrt ‚Äì Feedback geben lohnt sich also!¬†√úbrigens f√ºhren wir regelm√§√üige Umfragen durch, an denen du anonym teilnehmen kannst. Und solltest du mal unzufrieden sein, kannst du uns auch eine Beschwerde schicken. Ganz gleich, wie du Feedback geben willst ‚Äì wir sind dankbar, dass du dir die Zeit nimmst!¬†¬†

question: Comment t√©l√©charger des donn√©es personnelles ?
answer: Le R√®glement G√©n√©ral sur la Protection des Donn√©es (RGPD) est un r√®glement europ√©en sur la protection et la confidentialit√© des donn√©es, entr√© en vigueur le 25 mai 2018. Pour r√©pondre √† ces nouvelles exigences, nous vous offrons d√©sormais la possibilit√© de t√©l√©charger vos donn√©es personnelles depuis notre¬†application web (nouvel onglet), rubrique¬†üë§ Mon compte¬†puis¬†Informations personnelles.En tant que banque mobile, nous mesurons toute l‚Äôimportance de la s√©curit√© des donn√©es. Nous conservons un minimum de donn√©es vous concernant et seulement pendant la dur√©e qui nous est impos√©e par la loi. Nous supprimons toutes vos donn√©es d√®s lors qu‚Äôelles ne sont plus n√©cessaires pour les produits ou services que nous vous offrons.L‚Äôarticle 20 du RGPD vous octroie le droit √† la portabilit√© des donn√©es. Comme tout ce que nous proposons, le t√©l√©chargement de vos donn√©es personnelles est simple et transparent, vous avez le contr√¥le.Le fichier que vous obtenez est uniquement destin√© √† la portabilit√© de vos donn√©es et, dans une majorit√© des cas, ne sera pas lisible par votre ordinateur compte tenu de son format JSON. Ce format √©tant cr√©√© pour √™tre lu par une machine et non par un humain, vous ne serez pas en mesure d‚Äôen d√©chiffrer les informations. Ce fichier JSON est uniquement destin√© √† √™tre transmis √† une autre institution.Comment t√©l√©charger vos donn√©esVous pouvez demander √† t√©l√©charger les donn√©es personnelles que vous avez fournies pour votre compte actuel ou un ancien compte jusqu‚Äô√† 6 mois apr√®s sa date de cl√¥ture. Ces donn√©es vous seront transmises dans un format √©lectronique que vous pourrez partager avec une tierce partie si vous le souhaitez.Client actuelVeuillez faire une¬†demande en ligne (nouvel onglet) pour t√©l√©charger vos donn√©es personnelles.Il vous sera demand√© de cr√©er un mot de passe temporaire pour utiliser le lien qui vous sera envoy√© √† l‚Äôadresse email associ√©e √† votre compte.¬†Ce lien est valide pour seulement 24 heures √† partir du moment o√π vous recevez l‚Äôemail en question. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez un mot de passe erron√© √† 5 reprises, le lien sera d√©sactiv√© et vous devrez faire une nouvelle demande de t√©l√©chargement de vos donn√©es.Ancien clientVous pouvez consulter vos donn√©es¬†y compris¬†apr√®s la fermeture de votre compte. Pour t√©l√©charger vos donn√©es, veuillez compl√©ter le¬†formulaire (nouvel onglet) en ligne de demande de donn√©es et vous assurer que les informations renseign√©es correspondent bien √† celles que vous aviez donn√©es pour votre ancien compte. Voici ce que vous devez renseigner :votre nom et pr√©nom, le num√©ro et la date d‚Äôexpiration de la pi√®ce d'identit√© que vous aviez utilis√© pour ouvrir votre compte (Carte d‚ÄôIdentit√© ou Passeport),l'adresse email associ√©e √† ce compteles dates (mois et ann√©e) auxquelles vous avez ouvert et cl√¥tur√© votre compte (pour retrouver la date d'ouverture de votre compte, r√©f√©rez-vous √† la date de r√©ception de l'email de confirmation de votre adresse email).Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, nous devons nous assurer que vous √™tes bien la personne qui t√©l√©charge vos donn√©es : si l‚Äôun des champs mentionn√©s ci-dessus est erron√© ou manquant, nous ne pourrons satisfaire votre demande.Il vous sera demand√© de cr√©er un mot de passe temporaire pour utiliser le lien qui vous sera envoy√© par email. Ce lien est valide pour seulement 24 heures √† partir du moment o√π vous recevez l‚Äôemail en question. Ce lien est seulement valide pour une dur√©e de 24 heures. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez un mot de passe erron√© √† 5 reprises, le lien sera d√©sactiv√© et vous devrez faire une nouvelle demande de t√©l√©chargement de vos donn√©es.Si vous souhaitez plus d‚Äôinformations √† propos du recueil, de l‚Äôusage et du traitement de vos donn√©es personnelles, veuillez consulter la derni√®re version de notre¬†Politique de Confidentialit√© (nouvel onglet).

question: Why do I pay the church tax?
answer: We‚Äôre legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.You‚Äôre entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through an¬†Erkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk (new tab)¬†form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.Further information is available on the website of the¬†German Federal Central Office for Taxation (new tab).

question: How does N26 Business Metal work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs ‚Ç¨16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.¬†Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.¬†Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Come scaricare i miei dati personali?
answer: Il General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) √® un regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy entrato in vigore il 25 maggio 2018. In seguito all'introduzione di questo regolamento, abbiamo aggiunto un‚Äôopzione nella nostra¬†webapp (nuova tabella)che ti permette di scaricare i tuoi dati con una procedura molto semplice: Il mio conto > Impostazioni personali > Dati personaliIl diritto alla portabilit√† dei dati secondo l'articolo 20 GDPR fa riferimento a dati precedentemente forniti e permette agli utenti di trasferire i propri dati ad un altro fornitore di servizi. Il GDPR richiede che i dati trasmessi con questa finalit√† siano in un formato leggibile elettronicamente (JSON file). Il tuo dispositivo potrebbe non supportare tale formato e, nel caso lo supportasse, ti preghiamo di notare che i dati sono salvati in modo da essere leggibili solo elettronicamente. In qualit√† di banca mobile, la sicurezza dei dati √® una nostra priorit√†. Prima di permettere ai nostri clienti di scaricare i propri dati, verifichiamo l'autenticit√† dell'identit√† di chi effettua la richiesta di scaricare tali dati. Come scaricare i tuoi dati?Puoi richiedere di scaricare i dati personali che hai fornito per un conto N26 attualmente aperto oppure per un conto N26 gi√† chiuso. I dati saranno forniti in un formato leggibile elettronicamente in modo da poterli trasferire a terze parti di tua scelta.Per clienti attualiAccedi al¬†modulo (nuova tabella)¬†con i dati del tuo conto attuale.Da qui, √® necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sar√† valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui riceverai l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sar√† pi√π valido e sar√† necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.Per ex clientiPuoi scaricare i tuoi dati personali anche dopo la data di chiusura del tuo conto. Per richiedere tali informazioni, completa il¬†modulo (nuova tabella)¬†di richiesta dati assicurandoti che le informazioni fornite corrispondano esattamente a quelle di accesso al tuo conto N26. Ti verranno richieste le seguenti informazioni:nome e cognome, numero e data di scadenza del documento d‚Äôidentit√† (documento identificativo nazionale o passaporto) utilizzato per la verifica il contoindirizzo e-mail del conto registratodata (mese e anno) di apertura e di chiusura del conto (controlla la tua posta elettronica)Ti preghiamo di notare che se un campo √® errato o incompleto, la richiesta non andr√† a buon fine.Da qui, sar√† necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sar√† valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui hai ricevuto l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sar√† pi√π valido e sar√† necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.Per ulteriori informazioni riguardanti la raccolta, l‚Äôutilizzo e il trattamento dei dati personali leggi la nostra¬†Informativa sulla privacy (nuova tabella)¬†aggiornata (DEU (nuova tabella)) (EU (nuova tabella)).
