question: N26 peut-elle fermer mon compte ?
answer:
N26 peut fermer votre compte dans des situations exceptionnelles.En tant que banque enti√®rement agr√©√©e, N26 doit effectuer des contr√¥les de routine sur les comptes utilisateurs. En tant qu‚Äôinstitution r√©glement√©e, cela nous permet de prot√©ger les fonds des comptes N26.Parfois, les r√©sultats de ces contr√¥les de routine peuvent exiger que nous mettions fin √† notre relation commerciale avec un titulaire de compte.Dans tous les cas, le titulaire du compte sera pleinement inform√© de la situation par email. Dans tous les cas, N26 ne vous contactera qu‚Äô√† l‚Äôadresse email associ√©e √† votre compte N26. Des instructions claires sur les √©tapes √† suivre seront fournies dans cet email.Soyez toujours vigilant et v√©rifiez que cet email provient bien de N26. Nous ne vous contacterons toujours qu‚Äô√† l‚Äôadresse email associ√©e √† votre compte N26, jamais par SMS ou par t√©l√©phone portable, et nous ne vous demanderons jamais les d√©tails de votre compte N26, de votre mot de passe ou de vos donn√©es de carte.
Comment N26 peut-il fermer mon compte ?Nous pouvons √™tre amen√©s √† fermer votre compte de trois fa√ßons (avec 2 mois de pr√©avis, 14 jours ou imm√©diatement). Ces cl√¥tures de compte sont d√©finitives : notre Service Client ne peut pas annuler cette d√©cision ni donner d‚Äôinformations sur les raisons des cl√¥tures de comptes. Vous pouvez √©galement fermer votre compte √† tout moment et sans raison. 2 mois de pr√©avisNous avons le droit de mettre fin √† toute relation commerciale sans raison, en respectant un pr√©avis de deux mois (voir ¬ß 675h du Code Civil allemand et la section 19 paragraphe (1) de nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales (nouvel onglet). Vous pouvez √©galement mettre fin √† votre relation commerciale avec nous √† tout moment, de fa√ßon imm√©diate et sans raison.14 jours de pr√©avisNous pouvons √©galement mettre fin √† toute relation commerciale avec un pr√©avis de 14 jours (voir la section 19, paragraphe 3) de nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales (nouvel onglet)¬†si une raison pertinente est donn√©e √† cause d‚Äôun non-respect des conditions contractuelles. Cela inclut mais n'est pas limit√© √† :L‚Äôutilisation d‚Äôun compte personnel √† des fins professionnelles.¬†Conform√©ment √† nos Conditions G√©n√©rales, un compte personnel doit uniquement √™tre utilis√© √† des fins priv√©es. Tout virement li√© √† des activit√©s professionnelles de prestation de services et/ou de ventes de produits est consid√©r√© comme une transaction professionnelle. Si vous n‚Äôavez pas encore ouvert de compte, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte pour vos activit√©s professionnelles, veuillez donc ouvrir un compte N26 Business, N26 Business You ou N26 Business Metal.La communication d‚Äôinformations incorrectes ou insuffisantes apr√®s un contr√¥le de routine concernant votre compte ou une transaction.¬†Nous sommes une banque et nous conduisons parfois des contr√¥les de routines sur les transactions. Si vous nous transmettez des informations incorrectes et/ou insuffisantes, nous avons le droit de mettre fin √† notre relation commerciale afin de respecter les exigences des r√©gulations financi√®res allemandes.Une conduite d√©plac√©e envers les employ√©s de N26.¬†Nous ne tol√©rons aucun comportement abusif envers nos employ√©s. Les menaces physiques ou abusives en g√©n√©ral peuvent √™tre consid√©r√©es comme des infractions p√©nales conform√©ment aux lois allemandes et seront signal√©es aux autorit√©s concern√©es, sans aucune exception.Cl√¥ture de compte imm√©diateNous pouvons √©galement mettre fin √† toute relation commerciale de fa√ßon exceptionnelle (voir la section 19, paragraphe (3) de nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales (nouvel onglet). C‚Äôest-√†-dire : √† tout moment, sans pr√©avis, et sans d√©lai de r√©tractation, lorsqu‚Äôil y a une raison suffisante pour la cl√¥ture du compte :Si vous nous fournissez de fausses d√©clarations concernant votre situation financi√®re, tout particuli√®rement dans le cadre d‚Äôune demande de cr√©ditSi vous √™tes dans l‚Äôimpossibilit√© de rembourser votre pr√™t ou l‚Äôargent que vous devez √† N26Si vous ne vous soumettez pas aux demandes de N26 concernant votre pr√™t (voir Constitution our renforcement de s√©curit√©, section 13 (2) de nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales (nouvel onglet)

question: ¬øC√≥mo usar mi tarjeta digitalmente?
answer: Ya puedes realizar compras con tu tarjeta antes de recibirla:Simplemente a√±ade tu tarjeta N26 a tu Apple Pay (pesta√±a nueva) o Google Pay (pesta√±a nueva) wallet para realizar compras en comercios que admitan este m√©todo de pago.Puedes usar tu cuenta N26 de inmediato habilitando esta funci√≥n antes de que tu tarjeta llegue por correo, pero tambi√©n una vez que hayas recibido tu tarjeta y la hayas activado (pesta√±a nueva).Para a√±adir tu tarjeta a tu wallet (pesta√±a nueva), sigue estos pasos:Inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta N26.Ve a 'Tarjetas'.Selecciona 'Configuraci√≥n de la tarjeta' y desliza para seleccionar la tarjeta que deseas a√±adir.Selecciona 'A√±adir a Apple Pay' o 'A√±adir a Google Pay'Debes tener en cuenta:Esta funci√≥n no est√° habilitada si pides tu tarjeta o pasas a un plan premium sin bloquear tu tarjeta actual. En estos casos, tu tarjeta actual seguir√° funcionando con 'Apple Pay' o 'Google Pay' hasta que actives tu nueva tarjeta.¬øC√≥mo ver los detalles completos de mi tarjeta en la app N26?Si necesitas los datos de tu tarjeta pero no la llevas contigo en este momento, no te preocupes. N26 te permite ver los detalles completos de tu tarjeta desde la app siempre que tengas una tarjeta activa y un dispositivo vinculado.Para ver tu tarjeta sigue estos pasos:Inicia sesi√≥n en la app N26.Ve a 'Tarjetas'.Desde la lista de tarjetas, desliza hasta que veas la tarjeta que deseas usar.Pulsa 'Informaci√≥n de la tarjeta'.Confirma con tu huella dactilar, reconocimiento facial o PIN de bloqueo del tel√©fonoPodr√°s ver los detalles completos de tu tarjeta durante 1 minuto. Ten en cuenta que no podr√°s tomar capturas de pantalla mientras se muestran los detalles de tu tarjeta.

question: Come posso far accreditare lo stipendio sul mio conto N26?
answer: Far accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 √® molto semplice: baster√† fornire l‚ÄôIBAN al tuo datore di lavoro, il quale provveder√† a trasferire l‚Äôimporto sul tuo conto tramite bonifico SEPA.Nel caso in cui il tuo datore si rifiutasse di accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA perch√© l‚ÄôIBAN non ha caratteristiche italiane ma tedesche, sta violando una leggi l'articolo "cosa fare se il mio IBAN non viene accettato" del nostro Support Center per sapere cosa fare.

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.¬†How does it work?¬†The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?¬†Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney¬†Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person‚Äôs identity, and it‚Äôs not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.¬†As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.¬†Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: Offenlegungsbericht nach CRR
answer: Was ist das?Bei der Kapitalad√§quanzverordnung (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) handelt es sich um eine EU-Verordnung. Darin ist unter anderem geregelt, dass Kreditinstitute j√§hrlich einen Offenlegungsbericht ver√∂ffentlichen m√ºssen (Artikel 433 CRR).Warum wird der Offenlegungsbericht nicht in unserem Support Center oder an einer anderen Stelle auf unserer Website ver√∂ffentlicht?Die N26 Bank GmbH ist nicht dazu verpflichtet, den auf unserer Website zu ver√∂ffentlichen. Artikel 434 CRR (neuen Tab) stellt Instituten frei, in welchem Medium sie ihren Offenlegungspflichten nachkommen wollen, weshalb die Entscheidung bei den einzelnen Kreditinstituten liegt.N26 Bank GmbH ihre nach CRR geforderte Offenlegung auf www.bundesanzeiger.de (neuen Tab) ver√∂ffentlicht.

answer: V√°lido para Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Pa√≠ses Bajos, Polonia, Portugal, Noruega, Suecia.Puedes suscribirte a N26 Smart durante tu registro inicial o cambiarte despu√©s a trav√©s de la app m√≥vil si tienes una cuenta bancaria est√°ndar en N26.Si quieres pasarte a N26 Smart a trav√©s de la app, solo tienes que ir a la pesta√±a Explorar y seleccionar Pasar a N26 Smart. Puedes escoger uno de estos cinco colores cuando pidas la tarjeta nueva: pomelo, oc√©ano, arena, aguamarina y grafito.A continuaci√≥n, elige el tipo de env√≠o (pesta√±a nueva) que prefieras, acepta los T√©rminos y Condiciones de N26 Smart y te enviaremos tu nueva tarjeta en cuanto haya dinero suficiente en la cuenta como para cubrir la primera mensualidad (4,90¬†‚Ç¨).Los env√≠os est√°ndar tardan hasta 10 d√≠as h√°biles, mientras que los env√≠os expr√©s (pesta√±a nueva) tardan 3 d√≠as h√°biles.El coste de la suscripci√≥n (4,90¬†‚Ç¨/mes) se cobrar√° directamente de la cuenta N26 cada mes en la fecha de contrataci√≥n.Puedes pedir una tarjeta N26 Smart adicional por un pago √∫nico de 10 ‚Ç¨ a trav√©s de la app de N26.

question: Come scaricare il Riepilogo delle spese
answer: Il Riepilogo delle spese fa parte della Direttiva europea sui conti di pagamento che fornisce ai clienti di una banca la possibilit√† di accedere ad una panoramica delle commissioni relative ai servizi collegati al proprio conto.Il Riepilogo delle spese √® disponibile in qualsiasi momento per ognuno dei nostri clienti. Per clienti attuali, effettua l'accesso alla (nuova tabella)webapp (nuova tabella),¬†poi clicca l‚Äôicona di download e scorri fino a ‚ÄúRiepilogo delle spese‚Äù. Riceverai una email (dovrebbe impiegarci circa 5 minuti). Da li segui le istruzioni per scaricare il tuo Riepilogo delle Spese.Per ex clienti, √® possibile scaricare il Riepilogo delle spese¬†fino a 6 mesi dopo la data della chiusura del conto, attraverso il seguente modulo (nuova tabella).Avrai bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:Il tuo nome completo, il numero e la data di scadenza del tuo documento identificativo (carta d'identit√† o passaporto) che hai usato durante la verifica del tuo contol'indirizzo email associato al tuo contola data (mese e anno) in cui hai aperto e chiuso il tuo conto (controlla l'e-mail di verifica nella tua posta elettronica).Ti verr√† chiesto di creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che ti invieremo al tuo indirizzo email registrato. Questo link √® valido solo per 24 ore. Nota in oltre che, se la password verr√† inserita erroneamente per 5 volte, il link non sar√† pi√π valido e dovrai effettuare una nuova richiesta.* Per conti Business - importi rimborsati non verranno mostrati.

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000‚Ç¨,¬†and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500‚Ç¨. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Wo bleibt meine R√ºckerstattung?
answer: Du wartest auf eine R√ºckerstattung und fragst dich, wo sie bleibt? Vielleicht ist sie schon auf deinem Konto! In einigen F√§llen wird deine R√ºckerstattung n√§mlich am Tag der urspr√ºnglichen Transaktion in der N26 App angezeigt ‚Äì und nicht zum Zeitpunkt der Erstattung. Scrolle im Home-Bereich deiner N26 App einfach in der Transaktionsliste nach unten oder pr√ºfe deine Kontoausz√ºge, um deine R√ºckerstattung zu finden. So kannst du deine (vorl√§ufigen und vollst√§ndigen) Kontoausz√ºge einsehen und als PDF herunterladen:In der Web App (neuen Tab):Klicke im Home-Bereich oben links neben dem ‚ÄúGeld erhalten‚Äù Button auf das Download-Symbol (Pfeil nach unten).¬†Im Download-Bereich siehst du links eine √úbersicht mit deinen (vorl√§ufigen) Kontoausz√ºgen.Klicke auf den jeweiligen Monat, um deine Kontoausz√ºge herunterzuladen.Auf deinem Smartphone:Tippe im Home-Bereich oben neben der Lupe auf die drei vertikalen Linien.W√§hle ‚ÄúKontoausz√ºge‚Äù und tippe dann in der Liste auf den jeweiligen Monat, um deine Kontoausz√ºge herunterzuladenWie lange dauert eine R√ºckerstattung bei N26?Wenn du die R√ºckerstattung nicht finden kannst, ist sie m√∂glicherweise noch auf dem Weg. Eine regul√§re R√ºckerstattung einer Kartenzahlung dauert bis zu 12 Tage. Die Kaution f√ºr eine Autovermietung erh√§ltst du nach maximal 30 Tagen zur√ºck. Wie Kartenzahlungen genau funktionieren, kannst du in unserem Artikel nachlesen.Du hast nach 12 Tagen noch keine R√ºckerstattung erhalten? Dann kannst du in deiner N26 App eine Reklamation starten. Folge dazu einfach dieser Anleitung.

question: Comment t√©l√©charger la confirmation d‚Äôun virement SEPA ?
answer: Si vous avez effectu√© un virement bancaire depuis votre compte N26 et que vous avez besoin d‚Äôune confirmation de l‚Äôenvoi ou de la r√©ception, vous pouvez t√©l√©charger le fichier PDF contenant les donn√©es de la transaction depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne. Pour cela :Connectez-vous √† l‚Äôapplication N26Dans la liste de transactions, s√©lectionnez le virement bancaire pour lequel vous souhaitez t√©l√©charger la confirmation.Appuyez sur ¬´ T√©l√©charger une confirmation de virement ¬ª.Une fois cette option choisie, le document sera automatiquement t√©l√©charg√© sur votre smartphone ou votre PC.Quelles donn√©es puis-je trouver dans la confirmation de virement ?Dans la confirmation de virement, vous trouverez les coordonn√©es bancaires de l‚Äôexp√©diteur et du b√©n√©ficiaire du virement, y compris le montant et la date de la transaction.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).¬†¬†How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you‚Äôll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don‚Äôt arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date¬†
In this scenario, Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.¬†You received a delivery, but it doesn‚Äôt correspond with what you ordered¬†
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn‚Äôt receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,¬†I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:¬†Amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.¬†If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help‚Äì‚Äìthis is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:¬†Dear XX,¬†I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:¬†Merchant name: {insert merchant name}¬†Amount of original, authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.¬†The merchant told me that they‚Äôve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven‚Äôt received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.¬†How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That‚Äôs why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits‚Äì‚Äìall right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‚ÄòDiscreet Mode (new tab)‚Äô option to securely access your account in public.¬†Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you‚Äôre always aware of what‚Äôs happening on your account. Plus, we‚Äôre always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.¬†How does card fraud occur?¬†A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that‚Äôs been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:¬†You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase¬†Your online shopping account is hacked¬†Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Smart?
answer: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus f√ºnf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Du kannst N26 Smart mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du mit N26 Smart lieb√§ugelst, beachte bitte unsere AGB (neuen Tab) sowie folgendes:Deine N26 Smart Mastercard hat keine Pr√§gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlie√ülich der Nummer, des CVV-Codes und des 10-stelligen Tokens sind auf der R√ºckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du von N26 Standard zu N26 Smart upgradest, wird die monatliche Geb√ºhr von 4,90 ‚Ç¨ wird beginnend mit dem Datum deines Upgrades jeden Monat direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach der Verifizierung deiner Identit√§t eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Geb√ºhr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende er√∂ffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei Monatsgeb√ºhren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgeb√ºhr monatlich oder im Voraus f√ºr die n√§chsten 6 Monate oder f√ºr 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich f√ºr die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig f√ºr den von dir gew√ºnschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt. Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Prepaid-Abrechnungsoptionen und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.

question: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: Perch√© non posso accedere ad alcuni prodotti e servizi?
answer: Collaboriamo con molti partner, pertanto, per alcuni prodotti e servizi, devi soddisfare anche i loro requisiti. I motivi pi√π comuni per cui potresti non essere idoneo per determinati prodotti sono:Documenti d'identit√† scaduti o non supportati (ad esempio certi passaporti per la mancanza delle caratteristiche di sicurezza).Sei soggetto alle imposte negli Stati Uniti. In tal caso non potrai utilizzare determinati prodotti d‚Äôinvestimento o di risparmio. Se non √® il tuo caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat, che verificher√† i dettagli del tuo conto. Potresti dover cambiare il tuo numero di telefono se inizia con un prefisso del Nord America (+1).Il prodotto o il servizio non √® ancora disponibile nel tuo Paese.

question: Come dichiarare il conto N26 nella mia dichiarazione dei redditi in Francia?
answer: (si applica ai clienti residenti in Francia)Secondo il Codice generale delle imposte francese, tutti i residenti in Francia sono tenuti a dichiarare i conti bancari che hanno aperto, utilizzato o chiuso nell'anno di riferimento della dichiarazione dei redditi. Questo si applica anche al conto N26. Come procedere:nella dichiarazione dei redditi, constrassegna la casella Conto estero aperto, utilizzato o chiuso (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Compila il modulo Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (nuova tabella) e allegalo alla dichiarazione dei redditi.Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni su questo articolo (nuova tabella) del nostro blog

question: Account in conjunction with ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG
answer: The account ICW ¬ß¬ß 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.¬†¬†Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form you‚Äôll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto Klosterstra√üe 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract we‚Äôll open a Basiskonto for you. You‚Äôll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.¬†

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26‚Äôs digital banking products, we will be making a¬†temporary limitation¬†to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.¬†UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: Quando arriver√† la mia carta?
answer:
La consegna standard impiega fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed √® gratuita, se si tratta della tua prima carta dopo l'apertura del conto (eccetto per N26 Standard) o l'aggiornamento ad una sottoscrizione premium.Per rimanere aggiornato sull'avanzamento della consegna, accedi alla schermata principale della tua app mobile N26.La consegna express impiega fino a 3 giorni lavorativi.
Oltre al banner nella schermata principale della tua app mobile N26, riceverai anche un'email con un link di tracciamento per rimanere aggiornato sull'andamento della spedizione della tua carta. Scopri di pi√π nel nostro articolo dedicato alla consegna express (nuova tabella).Ti consigliamo di attendere che sia trascorso il tempo di consegna stimato prima di intraprendere ulteriori azioni. La tua prima carta dopo l'apertura del conto o dopo l'aggiornamento ad una sottoscrizione premium √® sempre gratuita. Per le carte che ordinerai successivamente potrebbe essere applicato un costo aggiuntivo (nuova tabella).Come assicurarti che la tua carta sia stata spedita1. Dovrai verificare la tua identit√† (nuova tabella) quando apri un conto N26. Assicurati di aver completato questo processo accedendo al tuo conto. Una volta completato questo passaggio, il tuo conto sar√† attivato e potrai ricevere la tua carta N26.2. Controlla i dettagli della spedizione: üë§ Il mio conto > Profilo > Indirizzi > Indirizzo di spedizione:L'indirizzo che indichi deve essere residenziale (i recapiti di attivit√† commerciali non sono accettati).¬†¬†Il tuo nome deve essere indicato sulla casella della posta: se fosse presente un nome diverso, aggiungilo alle informazioni sull'indirizzo nella tua app mobile.¬†Inserisci il tuo codice di avviamento postale senza spazi.¬†Se possibile, aggiungi il numero dell'edificio, il numero della tromba delle scale e il codice della porta alle informazioni aggiuntive sull'indirizzo nell'app mobile.¬†Se il tuo indirizzo contiene caratteri speciali, contatta il nostro servizio clienti dall'app.¬†Se ti trasferirai presto, considera l'opzione di consegna express e assicurati di selezionare il tuo nuovo indirizzo di residenza.
Nel caso in cui i tuoi dati fossero errati, aggiornali direttamente nell'app (nuova tabella) mobile.
Se quella che stai aspettando √® la tua prima carta N26, apri una chat dall'app mobile o dall'app web.
Se eri gi√† in possesso di una carta attivata, puoi riordinarla direttamente nell'app.
3. La tua prima carta √® gratuita con N26 Smart, You e Metal. Con N26 Standard sar√† una carta virtuale gratuita (a meno che tu non scelga una carta fisica al costo di 10‚Ç¨). La tua carta verr√† prodotta e spedita a condizione che il saldo del tuo conto sia pari o superiore a 0 ‚Ç¨ dopo l'addebito della commissione mensile. In caso di passaggio a un conto premium, la prima commissione verr√† addebitata immediatamente. Se hai aperto direttamente un conto premium, la prima commissione verr√† addebitata dopo aver trasferito abbastanza denaro sul tuo conto da coprire la commissione ma, al pi√π tardi, 15 giorni in seguito alla convalida dell'identit√†. Se dopo l'addebito della prima commissione il saldo del tuo conto √® negativo, dovrai trasferire denaro sul conto per avviare la produzione e la spedizione della tua carta.Ti verr√† inviata una notifica nell'app tramite i Messaggi e attraverso un banner nella schermata Home che mostrer√† i progressi nella consegna. Ti preghiamo di notare che:L'importo minimo una tantum non √® una commissione, ma un requisito necessario per avviare la produzione e la spedizione della tua carta.Per la consegna express la commissione √® di 25 ‚Ç¨ e verr√† detratta dal tuo conto non appena la carta viene spedita. Assicurati che il saldo del tuo conto copra queste commissioni.Ricorda che:Il saldo minimo richiesto non √® una commissione, ma √® solo necessario per attivare la produzione e la consegna della tua carta.¬†Per i titolari di conto premium: le prime quote mensili vengono addebitate il 15 ¬∞ giorno dall'inizio della sottoscrizione e verranno addebitate sul tuo conto.¬†Per la consegna express: la commissione di 20‚Ç¨ verr√† addebitata sul tuo conto non appena la carta verr√† spedita. Assicurati che il saldo del tuo conto sia sufficiente a coprire anche questa commissione.
Inizia a usare la tua carta anche prima che arrivi 
Anche prima che la tua carta sia consegnata per posta, potrai iniziare a usarla tramite il tuo wallet digitale Apple Pay o Google Pay. In questo modo potrai effettuare acquisti con il tuo smartphone presso i commercianti che supportano questo metodo di pagamento. 
Non hai ricevuto la tua carta entro i tempi previsti? 
Controlla la data di consegna stimata nella schermata principale dell'app N26 o dell'app Web. Se la data di consegna stimata √® stata superata, contattaci tramite live chat dall'app mobile o dall'app web.

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand¬†N26 Insurance¬†allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the ‚ÄúInsurance‚Äù banner you find.¬†You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.¬†How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.¬†Am I eligible?¬†N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can‚Äôt sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?
answer: Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login √ºber mindestens zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Zus√§tzlich zur Eingabe deines pers√∂nlichen Passworts musst du deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch dein verkn√ºpftes Ger√§t oder einen SMS-Code best√§tigen.Mehr zu diesem Thema erf√§hrst du in unserem Artikel: PSD2 - Starke KundenauthentifizierungWenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t einloggst, musst du deinen Login-Versuch zus√§tzlich best√§tigen. Das kannst du tun, indem du entweder eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t best√§tigst oder indem du einen SMS-Code anforderst, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich von deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, liegt damit schon Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung vor. Das bedeutet, der Login-Prozess √§ndert sich bei deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t nicht.Welche Voraussetzungen gibt es?Stell sicher, dass das Betriebssystem deines Handys auf dem neuesten Stand ist und die neueste Version der N26 App installiert ist. Falls du dich nicht mehr einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, versuch bitte, dein Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugang mehr zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Was mache ich, wenn ich mein Passwort vergessen habe?Mehr Informationen dar√ºber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?Was mache ich, wenn mein Handy kaputt oder verloren gegangen ist?Wenn du keinen Zugang mehr zu deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten Handynummer hast, kannst du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen und zur Authentifizierung einen SMS-Code anfordern:Logge dich in die WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t einWenn du aufgefordert wirst, deinen Login-Versuch durch dein verkn√ºpftes Ger√§t zu best√§tigen, w√§hle HilfeW√§hle SMS-Code schickenNachdem du den SMS-Code erhalten hast, gib ihn in der WebApp ein.Dadurch ist die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und du kannst dein neues Ger√§t wieder mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpfen.Was, wenn ich eine neue Handynummer habe oder aus anderen Gr√ºnden keine SMS erhalte?Falls dir deine registrierte Handynummer nicht mehr zur Verf√ºgung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue hast oder dein Handy verloren gegangen ist oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Warum kann ich die neueste Version der N26 App nicht auf mein Handy herunterladen? Wenn du ein √§lteres Smartphone benutzt, das die neueste Version der App nicht mehr unterst√ºtzt, kannst du dich mit diesem nicht mehr in die N26 App einloggen.Du kannst dennoch die WebApp benutzen, um Zugang zu deinem Konto zu erhalten. Daf√ºr musst du deinen Login-Versuch mit einem SMS-Code best√§tigen, den wir dir an deine registrierte Handynummer schicken.Mit deiner Karte kannst du nach wie vor Geld abheben und Zahlungen t√§tigen. Bitte beachte aber, dass du keine √úberweisungen ausf√ºhren und kein CASH26 mehr benutzen kannst, solange du diese in der N26 App nicht best√§tigen kannst.

question: Cosa sono i bonifici istantanei?
answer: Tutti i clienti N26 ora hanno la possibilit√† di inviare bonifici istantanei. Al contrario dei normali bonifici SEPA, che vengono elaborati entro 2 giorni lavorativi, i bonifici istantanei vengono inviati e ricevuti nell'arco di pochi secondi.Bonifici istantanei pu√≤ essere utile per inviare un bonifico urgente (occorrono circa 10 secondi), tuttavia verr√† applicata una commissione per i nostri clienti Standard che utilizzano questo servizio, che verr√† mostrata prima di confermare il bonifico. Quindi, se il pagamento pu√≤ aspettare altri 2 giorni, un bonifico SEPA normale √® probabilmente la soluzione migliore. I nostri clienti premium possono usare bonifici istantanei senza commissioni.Nonostante sia istantaneo, questo tipo di bonifico pu√≤ comunque subire ritardi dovuti a tempi di elaborazione, embarghi ecc. (proprio come un bonifico regolare), per cui √® sempre meglio effettuare pagamenti importanti, ad es. per cauzioni, acconti, con il giusto anticipo per evitare qualsiasi perdita finanziaria dovuta a eventuali ritardi.Come funziona?Per inviare un bonifici istantanei, basta effettuare l'accesso nella tua app mobile e selezionare Invia denaro dal mio conto > Bonifico bancario.Dopodich√© ti verr√† chiesto di inserire il nome e l'IBAN del destinatario, aggiungere un messaggio.Seleziona poi Bonifico istantaneoIl bonifico verr√† elaborato e ricevuto entro circa 10 secondi.Attenzione: se la banca del destinatario non fa parte dello schema SCT per i pagamenti istantanei non potrai inviare questo tipo di bonifici.Informazione importante:Per i conti N26 Standard verr√† applicata una commissione per l'utilizzo di bonifici istantanei. La commissione viene addebitata subito dopo aver effettuato il bonifico come transazione separata e il suo importo varia a seconda del paese:Germania e Austria: 0,49 ‚Ç¨Spagna: 1,99 ‚Ç¨Italia, Francia e resto dell‚ÄôEuropa: 0,99 ‚Ç¨L'importo massimo che puoi inviare con un bonifico istantaneo √® 2.000 ‚Ç¨, 5 volte al giorno per un massimo di 10.000 ‚Ç¨ al giorno.Se utilizzi il bonifico istantaneo per un pagamento importante (cauzione, multa, acconto), ti consigliamo di inviare il pagamento in anticipo per evitare eventuali ritardi a causa di un possibile rifiuto o embargo.Se stai pagando per un prodotto o un servizio tramite bonifico istantaneo, assicurati che i dettagli e le credenziali del destinatario siano corretti prima di confermare la transazione. Fai sempre attenzione a possibili truffe.Ti preghiamo di notare che non tutte le banche hanno adottato lo schema per i bonifici istantanei. Se la banca del destinatario non partecipa allo schema, non ti sar√† possibile inviare il bonifico in maniera istantanea.

question: How can I pay bills and top-up my phone from the app?
answer: Starting from the 1st of September, it will be possible for all the customers with Italian Terms and Conditions to pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and top-up their phone directly from their mobile app with the N26 debit card.This service is provided in collaboration with PayTipper SpA, a payment institution that has been a partner of the Enel X group since 2019.How to make payments to 3rd parties within the N26 mobile app:Log in to the N26 app and click on "Send money"Select "Other payments"In the menu, select the payment you want to make (Phone top-up, PagoPA, Postal bulletins, MAV or RAV, Car tax)You will then be redirected to the website of that service provider and will be able to perform the paymentThe service is not provided directly by N26 but by the 3rd party service providers. For this reason, by using this payment method, you will be subject to the processing of personal data, terms and conditions and any possible commissions not dependent on N26. In some cases the service might be offered only in Italian.If you need assistance with a payment or would like to receive a payment receipt, please get in contact with the customer support of the service provider you have chosen. Click here to get in touch with PayTipper (new tab)Below you can find customer support contacts for the main Italian network providers (please refer to the respective websites for opening hours and service costs):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

question: Come guadagnare soldi invitando amici in N26?
answer: Dall'1 ottobre 2021 abbiamo iniziato a lavorare al miglioramento del nostro programma Invita un amico. Fino a che queste modifiche non saranno definitive, le informazioni a riguardo non saranno pi√π disponibili sull'app. Gli inviti e le iscrizioni avvenuti prima dell'1 ottobre 2021 continueranno a essere ricompensati come prima. Attualmente non sappiamo dire con precisione quando torneremo ad offrire questa funzionalit√†.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password? (new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Residential address and taxes in France
answer:
If you are currently living in France, you are most likely a French tax resident.¬†In general, your tax residence is the country/jurisdiction in which you live.¬†In some cases you may be a tax resident in more than one country/jurisdiction at the same time or not be a tax resident of FranceFor more information on tax residence, please consult your tax adviser or the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).If you have a tax residence outside France, we may be legally obliged to pass on certain information with respect to your financial accounts to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) and they may exchange this information with tax authorities of another jurisdiction or jurisdictions pursuant to intergovernmental agreements to exchange financial account information or local law.¬†
As a financial institution, we are not allowed to provide tax advice.¬†Your personal tax advisor may be able to assist you in answering specific questions related to your tax residence. You can also find out more, including a list of jurisdictions that have signed agreements to automatically exchange information, along with details about the information being requested, on the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).
The Decree n¬∞2016-1683 in date of December 5th, 2016 based on the OECD Common Reporting Standard (‚ÄúCRS‚Äù) requires N26 France to collect and report to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) certain information about an account holder whose has a tax residence outside of France.¬†Each jurisdiction has its own rules for defining tax residence, and jurisdictions have provided information on how to determine if you are resident in the jurisdiction on the following website: OECD AEOI Portal (new tab).¬†

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs ‚Ç¨9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Warum ist meine SEPA √úberweisung fehlgeschlagen?

Kontoname (gilt f√ºr N26 Business).Die IBAN ist falsch.Du erh√§ltst keine Push-Nachricht zur Best√§tigung deiner √úberweisung.Es wurde ein unzul√§ssiger Verwendungszweck festgestellt. N26 ist dazu verpflichtet, routinem√§√üige Transaktionspr√ºfungen durchzuf√ºhren (siehe ¬ß¬†10¬†GwG (neuen Tab)). question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: Perch√© N26 fa controlli sulle transazioni?
answer: N26 ha la responsabilit√† di effettuare controlli su conti e transazioni per garantire la sicurezza del tuo conto corrente (vedi¬†GwG ¬ß 10 (nuova tabella)). Questi controlli vengono avviati automaticamente dal nostro sistema.In seguito a questi controlli, potremmo chiederti di fornire alcuni documenti. In tal caso, sar√† sufficiente inviare quanto richiesto tramite Messaggi da N26. Non ci sono eccezioni o modi per evitare questi controlli. Si tratta di una procedura bancaria di routine ed √® finalizzata a garantire la sicurezza dei nostri clienti. Procedura ed esiti di questi controlli sono confidenziali e gestiti internamente. Qui di seguito troverai alcuni suggerimenti per velocizzare la procedura:Nell'email che riceverai da N26 verr√† specificato quale documento occorre inviare. Accettiamo screenshot, fotografie o scansioni di documenti. Assicurati che il contenuto originale del documento sia leggibile e di allegare una descrizione dettagliata di quanto richiesto Sii preciso nelle tue risposte, nei dettagli e nei documenti. Se quanto inviato non dovesse rispondere ai nostri requisiti, potremmo richiedere ulteriori chiarimenti. In tal caso, la procedura avr√† una durata maggiore. Invia quanto richiesto in risposta alla nostra email il prima possibile o, comunque, entro la scadenza indicata. Il nostro servizio clienti non ha alcuna informazione aggiuntiva su questo argomento.Fornisci documentazione in corso di validit√†.Ecco alcuni esempi:Hai ricevuto aiuto finanziario dalla tua famiglia per completare progetti o hai ereditato terreno o denaro da un familiare deceduto: puoi fornire un documento ufficiale che attesti un prestito, un finanziamento, un'eredit√† (es. documento di vendita di propriet√† per finanziare il prestito oppure l'estratto conto di un garante).Hai venduto una propriet√† o le tue azioni in borsa: puoi fornire la documentazione attestante il trasferimento della propriet√† oppure la vendita delle azioni.Hai inviato o ricevuto denaro per pagare utenze o comprare un prodotto: puoi fornire un estratto conto che attesti la provenienza del denaro oppure altra documentazione che attesti l'uso del denaro e la finalit√†.Hai ricevuto un pagamento dal tuo precedente datore di lavoro: puoi fornire un documento che attesti la natura del pagamento e ulteriori prove sul rapporto terminato.

question: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
answer: No problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. question: How much does an N26 account cost?
answer: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If we‚Äôre not able to offer you an N26 account based on our¬†minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open an¬†N26 Flex account.

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you‚Äôll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10‚Ç¨ to activate the card).¬†An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10‚Ç¨ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‚ÄòGet an additional card‚Äô.Select ‚ÄòVirtual‚Äô at the top, then tap ‚ÄòChoose‚Äô at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‚ÄòGenerate virtual card‚Äô.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‚Äòcards‚ÄôLocate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‚Äòcard details‚ÄôYou will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: Perch√© N26 √® sicuro?
answer: Per proteggere il tuo conto, utilizziamo un‚Äôarchitettura di sicurezza a 3 livelli:Accesso sicuro.¬†I dati di accesso dell‚Äôapp mobile e della¬†WebApp (nuova tabella)¬†sono costituiti da un nome utente e una password o dal riconoscimento delle impronte digitali/del volto (a seconda dello smartphone). Scegli una¬†password sicura¬†e non rivelare i tuoi dati di accesso a nessuno.PIN di conferma.¬†Questo codice a 4 cifre √® necessario ogni volta che invii un bonifico, un MoneyBeam o quando associ/disassoci il tuo smartphone. Dovrai impostarlo la prima volta dopo aver collegato lo smartphone al conto e puoi¬†modificarlo¬†da solo nell‚Äôapp.Messaggi push.¬†Per ogni pagamento in entrata e in uscita, verr√† inviato un messaggio push allo smartphone collegato. Viene utilizzato anche per confermare e finalizzare le tue transazioni. Abbiamo anche implementato 3D Secure per proteggerti dalle frodi online con carta.Ogni volta ci contatti ti chiederemo alcune domande di sicurezza per assicurarci che tu sia realmente l'intestatario del conto. Non ti chiederemo mai il numero della tua carta di debito, il codice di sicurezza della carta (CVV), password, o il tuo PIN della carta o di conferma.Abbiamo anche fatto progressi per proteggere i tuoi dati:¬†custodiamo¬†meno informazioni possibili su di te, solo finch√® siamo legalmente obbligati, e cancelliamo i dati quando non sono pi√π richiesti per un prodotto o un servizio. Puoi¬†scaricare i tuoi dati personali¬†fino a 6 mesi dopo aver chiuso il tuo conto. Puoi trovare pi√π informazioni sulla nostra¬†politica di privacy (nuova tabella).

question: Cos'√® un tentativo di login sospetto?
answer: Perch√© ho ricevuto questa email?Per noi di N26, la sicurezza √® la massima priorit√†. Quando il nostro sistema rileva un tentativo di login insolito, ti avvisiamo immediatamente in modo da poter intraprendere delle misure per mettere al sicuro il tuo conto. Se hai ricevuto un avviso e credi che qualcun‚Äôaltro abbia tentato di accedere al tuo conto, ti baster√† reimpostare velocemente la tua password. Se il tentativo di login mostrato nell'avviso fosse il tuo, puoi semplicemente ignorare il messaggio.Come ripristinare la password?Puoi ripristinare la tua password accedendo al tuo account tramite app o WebApp, andando poi su Il mio conto ‚Üí Impostazioni ‚Üí Sicurezza.Se non riesci ad accedere al tuo conto, clicca su Password dimenticata sulla schermata di login. A questo punto, non dovrai fare altro che inserire il tuo indirizzo email e richiedere un link di ripristino della password.Quando scegli una nuova password, ti ricordiamo di non riutilizzare le password su pi√π piattaforme; ti preghiamo di assicurarti di utilizzare una password unica per ogni tuo account. L‚Äôutilizzo di una password gi√† usata in precedenza o poco sicura pu√≤ causare la violazione del tuo profilo.Quando devo contattare il Supporto Clienti?Dopo aver ricevuto un'email di notifica su un login insolito, dovresti preoccuparti della sicurezza del tuo conto. Ci teniamo a rassicurarti, tuttavia, che cambiare la tua password √® una misura sufficiente per garantire che il tuo account rimanga protetto. Se vuoi discutere di questo argomento con uno dei nostri esperti, il nostro team di Supporto Clienti √® a tua disposizione.

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: Wie lange dauert eine √úberweisung mit Wise?
answer: Wenn du eine √úberweisung mit Wise machst, wird dir ein gesch√§tztes Eingangsdatum angezeigt. Stelle bei sicher, dass der Name des Empf√§ngers exakt mit dem Namen auf seinem Bankkonto √ºbereinstimmt.Falls eine Wise-√úberweisung fehlschl√§gt, benachrichtigen wir dich mit einer Push-Mitteilung. Der Betrag wird einige Tage sp√§ter automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºckgebucht.Du kannst eine √úberweisung nicht manuell abbrechen. Aber wenn du den Kundenservice von Wise kontaktierst, k√∂nnen sie deine √úberweisung f√ºr dich abbrechen. Bitte beachte, dass die √úberweisung nur solange abgebrochen werden kann, bis Wise den Betrag an den Empf√§nger √ºberwiesen hat. Sobald der Betrag √ºberwiesen wurde, kann die √úberweisung nicht mehr abgebrochen werden. Auch die Empf√§ngerdaten k√∂nnen ge√§ndert werden, indem du dich mit Wise in Verbindung setzt. Bitte beachte, dass die Empf√§ngerdaten nur solange ge√§ndert werden k√∂nnen, bis Wise den Betrag an den Empf√§nger √ºberwiesen hat.Weder wir noch Wise berechnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren f√ºr eine R√ºckzahlung. Einige teilnehmende Banken erheben jedoch Geb√ºhren; in diesem Fall zieht Wise gem√§√ü seinen¬†Nutzungsbedingungen (neuen Tab)¬†diese Betr√§ge von dem zur√ºckgezahlten Geld ab.H√§ufige Gr√ºnde f√ºr eine fehlgeschlagene √úberweisung:Fehler in den √úberweisungsangaben (z. B. bei der Eingabe des Empf√§ngernamens oder der Kontoinformationen).Sonderzeichen oder zu viele Zeichen im Namen des Empf√§ngers oder im Feld f√ºr den Zahlungszweck.Limits wurden erreicht oder Online-Zahlungen sind in den Karteneinstellungen nicht aktiv.√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen sind mit dem N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto nicht m√∂glich; zudem darf das Empf√§ngerkonto kein Gesch√§ftskonto sein.

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.¬†How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Shared Spaces - Vertrauensw√ºrdiger Empf√§nger
answer: Vertrauensw√ºrdige Empf√§nger eines Shared Spaces k√∂nnen:Geld von ihren eigenen Spaces (inklusive anderer Shared Spaces, in denen sie Teilnehmer sind) zu einem Shared Space √ºberweisen.Jederzeit frei auf das Guthaben eines Shared Spaces zugreifen.Einen Shared Space jederzeit verlassen.√úberweisungen zwischen vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§ngern und einem Shared Space m√ºssen nicht mit einer PIN und Push-Nachricht autorisiert werden. Das bedeutet, dass die Empf√§nger per Drag-and-Drop Geld verschieben k√∂nnen, √§hnlich wie bei normalen Space-Transaktionen in der N26 App oder WebApp.Warum muss ich einen Besitzer oder einen Teilnehmer als vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger bestimmen?Das europ√§ische Bankrecht regelt, wie Bank√ºberweisungen autorisiert werden m√ºssen. Hiernach ist die Anwendung einer starken Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA) eine Ma√ünahme, um Online-Zahlungen sicherer zu machen.¬†Eine Ausnahme hiervon bildet die Klassifizierung einer Person in einem Shared Space als "vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger". √úberweisungen an diese Person bed√ºrfen keiner starken Kundenauthentifizierung.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

question: Chargeback: H√§ufig gestellte Fragen zu Reklamationen
Comment savoir quel est mon code PIN ?
answer: Tout d‚Äôabord, chez N26, il existe deux codes PIN : le code de validation et le code PIN de votre carte. L'avantage, c'est que vous cr√©ez vous-m√™me ces deux codes.Le code de validation (nouvel onglet) est utilis√© pour confirmer toutes les actions effectu√©es dans l‚Äôapplication N26, comme les virements, les changements de mot de passe, CASH26, etc. Une fois votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√©, vous pouvez d√©finir votre code de validation depuis l‚Äôapplication N26.Vous pouvez le modifier √† tout moment depuis la rubrique Mon compte > S√©curit√© > Changer le code de validation.Le code PIN de votre carte (nouvel onglet) est celui que vous utilisez pour effectuer des retraits et faire des achats avec votre carte N26. Une fois votre carte N26 activ√©e, vous pouvez le d√©finir depuis l‚Äôapplication N26 (si vous n'avez pas encore activ√© votre carte, rendez-vous ici (nouvel onglet)).Vous pouvez changer votre code PIN dans Cartes > Param√®tres de la carte > R√©initialiser le code PIN. Apr√®s avoir d√©fini votre nouveau code PIN, vous devrez d'abord effectuer un retrait √† un guichet automatique pour que le changement de code PIN soit enregistr√© (comme lorsque vous activez votre carte pour la premi√®re fois).Important :Nous ne vous enverrons jamais de code PIN par voie postale ou l‚Äôun de nos canaux de communication. Vous √™tes la seule personne √† devoir conna√Ætre vos codes PIN.Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, les codes de validation compos√©s des √©l√©ments de votre date de naissance, de votre adresse, de r√©p√©titions de chiffres ou de suites de chiffres (par exemple, 1111, 1994, 1331, or 1234) ne sont pas accept√©s. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refus√©, nous vous invitons √† essayer une combinaison de chiffres diff√©rente.Pour plus d‚Äôinformations sur ces codes PIN, consultez les articles du Support Center avec les liens ci-dessus.

question: Pour quelles raisons n‚Äôai-je pas encore re√ßu ma prime de parrainage?
answer: Une fois que votre ami aura bien rempli toutes les¬†conditions n√©cessaires √† l'attribution de la prime de parrainage, nous v√©rifierons la validit√© de votre invitation. Vous pouvez suivre le statut de vos invitations depuis votre application N26 mobile ou sur sa version web.Dans la plupart des cas, si vous n‚Äôavez pas encore re√ßu votre prime, cela signifie que votre ami n‚Äôa pas encore activ√© ou utilis√© sa Mastercard Transaction d‚Äôun montant √©gal ou sup√©rieur √† celui de la r√©compense. Par exemple, pour une r√©compense de 15 ‚Ç¨, la transaction par carte doit √™tre de 15 ‚Ç¨ ou plus. Assurez-vous d‚Äôavoir bien expliqu√© ces conditions √† votre ami pour √™tre s√ªr de recevoir votre prime.La v√©rification de l‚Äô√©ligibilit√© de votre parrainage et le versement de votre prime peuvent √™tre effectu√©s dans un d√©lai de 60 jours ouvr√©s.N26 se r√©serve le droit de ne pas attribuer de prime de parrainage en cas de suspicion d‚Äôactivit√©s qui violeraient les¬†Conditions d‚Äôutilisation du programme de parrainage (nouvel onglet).

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
answer: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.¬†This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We‚Äôre sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We‚Äôd love to keep you as a customer‚Äîtell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.¬†If you‚Äôve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here‚Äôs what to do:Make your account balance ‚Ç¨0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is ‚Ç¨0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You‚Äôll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you‚Äôre unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or ‚Äúas soon as possible‚ÄùYour full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we‚Äôll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. question: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zur√ºckzahlen kann?
