question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as ‚ÄúDocuSign‚Äù.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

question: Warum pr√ºft N26 Transaktionen?
answer:
Wir haben die Aufgabe, Routinepr√ºfungen von Transaktionen durchzuf√ºhren, um die Sicherheit deines Kontos zu gew√§hrleisten (siehe¬†GwG ¬ß 10 (neuen Tab)). Diese √úberpr√ºfungen betreffen einzelne Transaktionen und werden automatisch von unseren Systemen initiiert.Aus diesem Grund kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen. Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erh√§ltst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen f√ºr solche √úberpr√ºfungen, und sie k√∂nnen auch nicht umgangen werden.¬†Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken √ºblich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gew√§hrleisten.Der genaue Pr√ºfvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:In der E-Mail, die du von uns erh√§ltst, werden wir dir genau erkl√§ren, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir ben√∂tigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Bitte gib uns auch eine genaue Beschreibung √ºber den Inhalt des Dokuments.Du kannst einen Beleg, eine Rechnung, einen Vertrag oder ein √§hnliches Dokument einreichen, das es uns erm√∂glicht, die jeweilige Transaktion und deren Herkunft und Zweck eindeutig zu identifizieren. .Sei pr√§zise in deinen Antworten, Details und Dokumenten. Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie f√ºr die √úberpr√ºfung ausreichend sind. In einigen F√§llen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu Verz√∂gerungen f√ºhren kann.Antworte so fr√ºh wie m√∂glich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit.¬†Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.Du musst die je nach deiner Situation g√ºltigen Dokumente vorlegen. 
Einige Beispiele:Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschlie√üen oder hast Grundst√ºcke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein Gew√§hrungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument √ºber die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer ver√§u√üerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder Kontoausz√ºge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).Du hast eine Immobilie ver√§u√üert oder deine Aktien an der B√∂rse verkauft.Den Vertrag √ºber die vereinbarten Gesch√§fte oder notarielle Beurkundung des Eigentums√ºbergangs.Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.Kontoausz√ºge √ºber die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines Arbeitsverh√§ltnisses belegen, mit einer Zahlungsbegr√ºndung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines fr√ºheren Arbeitgebers.

question: Pourquoi mon virement bancaire est toujours en attente dans mon application N26 ?
answer: Pour proc√©der √† des virements, utiliser les services¬†MoneyBeam,¬†CASH26¬†et effectuer des virements permanents, vous devez les confirmer avec votre Code de validation. Vos virements restent en attente jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous les confirmiez ou annuliez depuis l‚Äôapplication.Votre Code de validation est n√©cessaire pour confirmer vos transactions, il n‚Äôa donc pas la m√™me fonction que le code¬†PIN de votre carte (nouvel onglet). Vous choisissez votre Code de validation lors de la cr√©ation de votre compte, et le code PIN de la carte lors de son activation.Si vous entrez un Code de validation erron√© √† 6 reprises, il sera bloqu√© pour des raisons de s√©curit√©. Vous pouvez le restaurer en le¬†changeant (nouvel onglet)¬†depuis votre application mobile en cliquant sur.

question: N26 pu√≤ chiudere il mio account?
answer: N26 limiter√† o chiuder√† un conto solo come ultimo provvedimento.In quanto banca in possesso di piena licenza bancaria, N26 √® tenuta a effettuare controlli tecnici di routine sui conti dei clienti. Essendo un'istituzione regolamentata, ci√≤ ci aiuta a garantire che i depositi contenuti nei conti N26 siano al sicuro.Occasionalmente, i risultati di questi controlli di routine possono determinare l'interruzione della nostra relazione commerciale con il titolare di un conto.Ogni volta che ci√≤ accade, informeremo il titolare del conto dettagliatamente in merito alla situazione tramite email. In ogni caso, N26 ti contatter√† solo all'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto. In questa email verranno fornite istruzioni chiare sui successivi passaggi da seguire.Fai sempre attenzione e verifica che queste email provengano da N26. Ti contatteremo solo all'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26 e mai per SMS o telefono e non ti chiederemo mai le coordinate bancarie del tuo conto N26, password o dati della carta.Per maggiori informazioni sui motivi per cui possiamo chiudere un conto, fare riferimento alla sezione 5.2 dei nostri Termini e Condizioni (nuova tabella)Cosa succede se il mio conto viene chiuso?Di solito informiamo per iscritto (email) i nostri clienti se intendiamo chiudere il loro conto, spiegando loro come trasferire i propri fondi ad un'altra banca.¬†Qualora non riuscissi a trasferire i tuoi fondi, o se dovessimo essere obbligati a chiudere il conto con effetto immediato, e non sussistono ragioni legali per trattenere i tuoi fondi, faremo del nostro meglio per farti riavere il tuo denaro il prima possibile. Ti preghiamo di tenere d'occhio le email che riceverai da noi, che ci consentiranno di inviarti i tuoi fondi rimanenti. Quasi l'80% dei casi in cui non siamo riusciti a trasferire i fondi sono stati causati dal fatto che il cliente non ha fornito una prova dell'IBAN a proprio nome (o di un conto congiunto) aperto preferibilmente nello stesso paese in cui √® stato aperto il conto, o nelle aree UE o del Nord America.Ho ricevuto una notifica che il mio conto verr√† chiuso. Cosa devo fare?Se hai domande relative allo stato del tuo conto o ai tuoi fondi rimanenti, ti preghiamo di contattarci rispondendo direttamente all'email che ti ha notificato la chiusura del tuo conto. Ecco come:1. ¬† ¬† Effettua l'accesso nell'App N262. ¬† ¬† Vai a Il mio conto > Aiuto > Messaggi 3. ¬† ¬† Apri il messaggio in questione e premi il pulsante Rispondi in fondo al messaggio.Se non riesci pi√π ad accedere al tuo conto tramite l'app N26, puoi anche rispondere direttamente dalla tua email.Ricorda che i nostri specialisti del Supporto Clienti non saranno in grado di assisterti tramite chat, poich√© non possiamo condividere informazioni relative a questo processo tramite un messaggio di chat per motivi legali e di protezione dei dati.

question: I was overcharged at the gas station
answer: N26 operates in real-time. That means you‚Äôll receive push notifications as soon as a transaction appears on your account. However, this also means that when you make a payment at a gas station, the amount that appears to be taken from your account‚Äîi.e. the amount shown in the push notification‚Äîmay not match the amount displayed at the gas pump.¬†This happens because sometimes a gas station will place an authorization hold on your N26 debit card. This authorization hold blocks the maximum amount the pump can deliver‚Äîusually between ‚Ç¨100 and ‚Ç¨150‚Äî as a deposit to ensure that you‚Äôve got enough funds in your account to cover the final transaction amount. But fear not! Although it appears that the full sum is being deducted from your account, this isn't actually the case.¬†This is what‚Äôs known as a ‚ÄúPending‚Äù charge, and you‚Äôll only pay for the gas you‚Äôve actually purchased in the end. The real transaction amount will normally appear on your transaction list within a few hours of the purchase‚Äîand within 48 hours at maximum. If you discover that you‚Äôve been charged more than what you paid, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact our Customer Support.If the transaction failed, despite appearing on your transaction list in the N26 app, the charge will expire within 12 days and the amount on the hold will be automatically refunded.

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?¬†N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift r√ºckg√§ngig machen?
answer: Eine R√ºcklastschrift bedeutet nicht, dass dein Vertrag mit dem H√§ndler gek√ºndigt wurde.Du hast die M√∂glichkeit, eine Lastschrift in der App bis zu 8 Wochen nach der Belastung selbst r√ºckg√§ngig zu machen. Nachdem du in der App auf R√ºcklastschrift getippt hast, dauert es bis zu 2 Bankarbeitstage, bis Lastschriftbetrag wieder gutschrieben wird.Lastschrift in meinem Hauptkonto r√ºckg√§ngig machen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 ein√ñffne deine Umsatzliste und w√§hle die entsprechende Lastschrift ausTippe auf R√ºcklastschriftLastschrift in einem Space mit IBAN (Unterkonto) r√ºckg√§ngig machen:Du kannst in der App auch eine SEPA-R√ºcklastschrift f√ºr deine Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN beantragen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf Spaces (Unterkonten)Gehe zum Space, in dem du eine Lastschrift r√ºckg√§ngig machen willstW√§hle die entsprechende Transaktion ausTippe auf R√ºcklastschrift*F√ºr L√§nder mit einer anderen Hauptw√§hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Das gilt f√ºr folgende L√§nder: Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tschechien, D√§nemark, Ungarn, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Rum√§nien, Schweden, Schweiz

question: Was sind IBANs f√ºr Spaces (Unterkonten)?
answer: Verf√ºgbar f√ºr Premium-Kunden in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Island, Irland, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Schweden und die Schweiz.IBANs f√ºr Spaces-Unterkonten:Mit unserem Feature ‚ÄûIBANs f√ºr Spaces‚Äú werden deine einzelnen Spaces noch n√ºtzlicher. Bisher konnten Spaces keine eingehenden √úberweisungen empfangen oder zur Zahlung deiner ausgehenden Lastschriften verwendet werden. Sobald du einem Space eine IBAN zuweist, kannst du aber eingehende √úberweisungen direkt in dem Space empfangen. Zudem kannst du einen Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN verwenden, um deine ausgehenden Lastschriften zu bezahlen. Wie funktionieren IBANs f√ºr Spaces?Mit dem Feature ‚ÄûIBANs f√ºr Spaces‚Äú k√∂nnen Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, You oder Metal), die ihr N26 Konto in Deutschland er√∂ffnet haben und √ºber eine deutsche IBAN verf√ºgen, einem Space eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen und somit darauf √úberweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften erstellen.Im Folgenden findest du eine √úbersicht √ºber die Funktionen im Rahmen der Zuweisung einer IBAN zu deinem Space bzw. deinen Spaces:Eine IBAN zu deinen Spaces hinzuf√ºgen: Du kannst einem bestehenden oder neu angelegten Space eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen ‚Äì und zwar bis zu maximal 10 Mal. Shared Spaces kann keine IBAN zugewiesen werden.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces erstellen, jeder mit einer eigenen individuellen IBAN, wodurch du noch mehr Kontrolle √ºber deine Finanzen hast. Bitte beachte, dass nach der Zuweisung von IBANs an 3 Spaces ein Zeitlimit von 24 Stunden aktiviert wird, bis einem Space eine neue individuelle IBAN zugewiesen werden kann.√úberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst √úberweisungen direkt in einen Space mit zugewiesener IBAN empfangen.Ausgehende √úberweisungen: Du kannst √úberweisungen direkt aus einem Space, dem du eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, t√§tigen. Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift t√§tigen: Du kannst die individuelle IBAN deines Spaces verwenden, um ausgehende wiederkehrende Lastschriften direkt von deinem Space aus abzuwickeln. Solltest du nicht genug Guthaben auf dem Space haben, um den Betrag der Lastschrift zu decken, wird die √úberweisung abgelehnt und eine Geb√ºhr von deinem Hauptkonto abgebucht.IBAN deines Spaces anzeigen: Du kannst die jeweilige IBAN deiner Spaces einsehen, mit der du √úberweisungen empfangen und deine Lastschriften abwickeln kannst. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder N26 Web-App ein, √∂ffne den ‚ÄûSpaces‚Äú-Tab und w√§hle den Space aus, dessen IBAN du einsehen m√∂chtest. Gehe zu den Space-Einstellungen. Dort findest du die IBAN und den BIC.So f√ºgst du zu einem Space eine IBAN hinzu:Du kannst eine IBAN zu deinen Spaces hinzuf√ºgen, indem du die folgenden Schritte ausf√ºhrst:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein.√ñffne den ‚ÄúSpaces‚Äù-Tab.W√§hle den Space, dem du eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen m√∂chtest.Tippe auf das Zahnrad-Symbol oben rechts im Fenster, um zu den Spaces-Einstellungen zu gelangen.Folge dem Ablauf in der App:W√§hle ‚ÄûIBAN erstellen‚ÄúLies dir die Informationen durch und tippe anschlie√üend auf ‚ÄûIBAN hinzuf√ºgen zu ...‚Äú Nimm die AGBs anGib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN einTippe im letzten Fenster auf ‚ÄûAlles klar‚ÄúSo l√∂schst du einen Space, dem eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde:Um eine IBAN aus einem Space zu entfernen, musst du den Space komplett l√∂schen und das verbleibende Guthaben entweder auf dein Hauptkonto oder einen anderen Space √ºberweisen. Um einen Space mit einer IBAN zu l√∂schen, gehe bitte wie folgt vor:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf ‚ÄûSpaces (Unterkonten)‚ÄúW√§hle den Space mit einer IBAN, den du l√∂schen willst (denke daran, dass dadurch der Space komplett gel√∂scht wird und jegliches verbleibende Guthaben vorher auf ein anderes Konto √ºberwiesen werden muss).Gehe auf ‚ÄûSpaces-Einstellungen‚Äú (klicke auf das Zahnrad-Symbol oben rechts).Unter ‚ÄûVerwalten‚Äú findest du die Option ‚ÄûRestguthaben auf ein anderes Konto √ºberweisen & Space l√∂schen‚Äú.Klicke auf diese Option und best√§tige, dass du den Space l√∂schen m√∂chtest.W√§hle dein Hauptkonto oder einen anderen Space aus, auf das/den du das verbleibende Guthaben √ºberweisen m√∂chtest.Tippe zum Schluss zur Best√§tigung im Fenster auf ‚ÄûL√∂schen‚Äú.Du kannst von deinen Spaces, denen eine IBAN zugeordnet ist, ausgehende SEPA-√úberweisungen durchf√ºhren. Befolge dazu bitte die untenstehenden Schritte:Gehe in den Space, von dem du eine √úberweisung durchf√ºhren m√∂chtest und tippe auf "Geld senden".W√§hle "Bank√ºberweisung" ausW√§hle den Kontakt aus, an den du Geld √ºberweisen m√∂chtest.Best√§tige den Betrag, den du √ºberweisen m√∂chtest und gib eine Referenz ein (optional).Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein und best√§tige, um die √úberweisung abzuschlie√üen.√úberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst eingehende √úberweisungen direkt in einem Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN empfangen. Bitte beachte, dass alle √úberweisungen, die an dich gerichtet sind, immer auf den Namen des Kontoinhabers lauten sollten.

question: Cosa succede se il mio saldo √® negativo?
answer: Il tuo saldo pu√≤ diventare negativo se devi pagare delle commissioni N26, ad es. per la nostra consegna express o la membership premium. Inoltre, il tuo saldo pu√≤ diventare negativo se arrivano pagamenti offline con carta da addebitare. Questi sono, per esempio, i pagamenti effettuati su aerei o navi, che non possono essere detratti dal saldo del tuo conto nel momento in cui vengono autorizzati ma che devono comunque essere addebitati.Ai sensi dei nostri Termini e Condizioni sei tenuto a restituire la somma in essere. Riceverai un promemoria tramite email in cui ti pregheremo di compensare il saldo negativo sul tuo conto il prima possibile. Fintanto che il saldo del tuo conto rimane negativo non potrai effettuare altri pagamenti o prelievi.Che succede se il saldo del mio conto rimane negativo?Il tuo conto rimane attivo per 60 giorni da quando diventa negativo. In questo periodo:Riceverai altri due promemoria.Se hai un conto N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You, tutti i servizi verranno disdetti dopo 60 giorni e il tuo conto verr√† tramutato in un conto standard.Se non effettui nessuna azione in questi 60 giorni, possiamo chiudere il tuo conto.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest ‚ÄúSplit the bill‚Äù feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you‚Äôre sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‚ÄòHome‚Äô tab, tap it and choose ‚ÄòSplit the bill‚ÄôAdd the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you‚Äôll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can‚Äôt be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: Bank documents‚Äîa guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason‚Äîyou can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they‚Äôre perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here‚Äôs how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and‚Äîif you wish‚Äîit can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here‚Äôs how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you‚Äôve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You‚Äôll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient‚Äôs full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation‚Äîthe PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relev√© d'Identit√© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information‚Äîfull name, legal address, IBAN and BIC‚Äîspecific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‚ÄòAdd money‚Äô button.

question: Perch√© il mio bonifico non √® andato a buon fine?
answer: Per ricevere un bonifico dovrai fornire al mittente il tuo nome completo (come scritto sul documento d'identit√† fornito per la verifica) e il tuo IBAN. Puoi trovare il tuo IBAN sui tuoi estratti conto o su üë§ Il mio conto (nell'app mobile o su N26 Web (nuova tabella)).Il nome del destinatario sull'ordine del bonifico √® diverso dal nome sul suo conto (deve essere quello scritto sul documento d'identit√†).Il nome del destinatario √® un nome aziendale invece che un nome/conto personale (valido per N26 Business).L'IBAN non √® corretto.Non ricevi la notifica push per confermare il tuo bonifico.√à stato identificato un uso improprio. N26 ha l'obbligo di eseguire controlli di routine sulle transazioni (vedi l'art. 10 del GWG, la legge tedesca sul riciclo di denaro (nuova tabella)). Di conseguenza, possiamo chiedere documenti per verificare l'origine o la fonte di queste transazioni. Questo pu√≤ portare a un ritardo o alla mancata realizzazione del trasferimento del credito.Bonifici in entrata supportatiBonifici SEPABonifici SEPA istantaneiBonifici in valuta estera con WiseBonifici SWIFTBonifici in uscita supportatiBonifici SEPABonifici SEPA istantaneiBonifici in valuta estera con WiseTi preghiamo di tenere in considerazione le diverse tempistiche previste per ogni tipologia di bonifico.

question: Bank information‚Äîyour N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‚ÄòAdd Money‚Äô button.

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it‚Äîyou can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you‚Äôve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‚ÄòCards‚Äô from the bottom right-handTap ‚ÄòCard Settings‚Äô and select the relevant cardSelect ‚ÄòReset PIN‚ÄôEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you‚Äôll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction‚Äîin a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences‚Äîsuch as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn‚Äôt accepted, simply try again a different combination.¬†If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you‚Äôve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: Warum habe ich meinen Verkn√ºpfungscode nicht per SMS erhalten?
answer: F√ºr iOS-Nutzer, die unsere Pairing-SMS nicht erhalten, ist evtl. eine SMS-Filter-Funktion aktiviert. Um unsere Nachricht in iMessage wiederzufinden, gehen Sie oben links auf die Option "Filter" und w√§hlen Sie den Ordner Unbekannte Absender aus.Du brauchst einen Verkn√ºpfungscode, um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verkn√ºpfen. Falls du die SMS mit dem Code nicht erh√§ltst, kannst du einen neuen bis zu f√ºnf Mal in der App anfordern. Bitte warte 30 Sekunden, bevor du es nochmal versuchst. Wenn du bereits alle f√ºnf Codes angefordert hast und die Verkn√ºpfung noch immer nicht funktioniert, werden weitere Anfragen aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden f√ºr 24 Stunden blockiert. Wenn das geschieht, kannst du entweder warten, oder unseren Customer Support per Chat kontaktieren - wir helfen dir gerne weiter. Wenn deine L√§ndervorwahl au√üerhalb der EU liegt, ist es wahrscheinlich dass du die SMS mit dem Code nicht bekommst und du uns kontaktieren musst.

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it‚Äîthis can be done at any time (see below). We‚Äôll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn‚Äôt affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you‚Äôll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month‚Äôs time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you‚Äôll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you‚Äôve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven‚Äôt received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you‚Äôve proved your identity, we‚Äôll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you‚Äôve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee.¬†You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, we‚Äôll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, you‚Äôll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above ‚Ç¨150 will be charged with a 12.50‚Ç¨ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than ‚Ç¨150.The maximum fee is ‚Ç¨100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn‚Äôt apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: ¬øPor qu√© ha fallado mi transferencia SEPA?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†V√°lido en todas las regiones a excepci√≥n del Reino UnidoPara recibir una transferencia, tienes que proporcionarle al remitente tu nombre completo (tal y como figura en el documento de identidad que nos has proporcionado para la verificaci√≥n) y tu IBAN. Puedes encontrar tu IBAN en tus extractos y en üë§ Mi cuenta (en la app del m√≥vil o la WebApp (pesta√±a nueva)).El nombre del beneficiario en la orden de transferencia es diferente del nombre de su cuenta (debe ser su nombre tal y como figura en su documento de identidad).El nombre del destinatario es el nombre de una empresa en lugar de un nombre particular/de cuenta (esto se aplica a N26 Business).El IBAN es incorrecto.No has recibido la notificaci√≥n push para confirmar tu transferencia.Se ha detectado un uso indebido. N26 tiene la obligaci√≥n de llevar a cabo inspecciones rutinarias de las transacciones (v√©ase el art√≠culo 10 de la GwG (pesta√±a nueva)). Por ello, es posible que te pidamos documentos para verificar el origen de estas transacciones. Esto puede acarrear que la transferencia se retrase o no se ejecute.Qu√© transferencias entrantes ofrecemosTransferencias SEPATransferencias SEPA inmediatasTransferencias en divisas extranjeras con WiseTransferencias SWIFTQu√© transferencias salientes ofrecemosTransferencias SEPATransferencias SEPA inmediatasTransferencias en divisas extranjeras con WiseTen en cuenta los plazos estimados para los distintos tipos de transferencia.

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000‚Ç¨,¬†and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500‚Ç¨. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Qual √® il limite massimo di spesa?
answer: Pagamenti con carta in negozi e onlineLimite giornaliero: 5.000 ‚Ç¨Limite mensile: 20.000 ‚Ç¨Prelievi ATMIl limite giornaliero di 1.000 ‚Ç¨ si applica in: Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Polonia, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Portogallo, Spagna, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Svezia e Svizzera.Il limite giornaliero di 400 ‚Ç¨ si applica in: Togo, Congo, Benin, Costa d‚ÄôAvorio, Kenya, Camerun, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Repubblica Centrafricana, Gambia, Ghana, Ruanda, Tunisia e Uganda.Il limite settimanale di 2.500 ‚Ç¨ si applica in tutti i paesi. BonificiLimite giornaliero per MoneyBeam: 1.000 ‚Ç¨Bonifici SEPA in entrata: nessun limite¬†Bonifici SEPA in uscita: nessun limiteBonifici SEPA istantanei in entrata: 100.000 ‚Ç¨ per bonificoBonifici SEPA istantanei in uscita: 2.000‚Ç¨ per bonificoCash26L'importo minimo √® di 50 ‚Ç¨ per deposito e quello massimo √® di 999 ‚Ç¨ ogni 24 ore.Il limite massimo √® di 200 ‚Ç¨ per ogni prelievo e di 900 ‚Ç¨ ogni 24 ore. Non c'√® un importo minimo di prelievo. Puoi anche prelevare soltanto un centesimo.Il limite combinato di prelievi e depositi √® di 999‚Ç¨ ogni 24 ore.I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti per un massimo di 2000‚Ç¨ a settimana.

question: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
answer: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.‚ÄùAll of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

question: What are Instant transfers?
answer: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipient‚Äôs bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you won‚Äôt have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49‚Ç¨Spain - 1,99‚Ç¨Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99‚Ç¨The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000‚Ç¨ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000‚Ç¨ per day). If you‚Äôre using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If you‚Äôre paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiver‚Äôs details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

question: Wie kann ich einen Dispokredit anfragen?
answer:
Verf√ºgbar in Deutschland und √ñsterreich.Du kannst einen Dispokredit nur in der mobilen N26-App beantragen. Du erf√§hrst in Echtzeit, ob du dazu berechtigt bist, ohne dass Formalit√§ten zu erledigen sind. So beantragst du einen N26-Dispokredit:Melde dich bei der mobilen N26-App an.Tippe im Homescreen auf die Registerkarte ‚ÄûEntdecken‚Äú.Scrolle nach unten zu ‚ÄûFinanzielle Produkte‚Äú.Wische zur Seite und tippe auf ‚ÄûN26-Dispokredit‚Äú. Befolge die in der App angezeigten
Schritte.Dort kannst du auch die Limits des Dispokredits √§ndern, deine anfallenden Zinsen einsehen oder deinen Dispokredit jederzeit k√ºndigen. Der Zinssatz liegt bei 10,15% p.a. Die anfallenden Zinsen ziehen wir am Ende jeden Quartals von deinem Konto ab.Bei der Beantragung eines N26-Dispokredits pr√ºfen wir Informationen zu deiner pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wir entscheiden dann mit einem mathematisch-statistischen Verfahren und entsprechend unserer Risikobereitschaft zum jeweiligen Zeitpunkt automatisch, ob du Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit hast und welchen Rahmen wir dir anbieten k√∂nnen. Diesbez√ºglich gilt:Wir ber√ºcksichtigen mehrere Faktoren und bewerten die personenbezogenen Daten, die
wir √ºber dich haben, um unsere Entscheidung √ºber deinen N26-Dispokreditantrag zu
treffen, wie in unserer Datenschutzrichtlinie genauer beschrieben.Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung zu deinem Anspruch oder zu den Limits f√ºr
deinen N26-Dispokredit anfechten und m√∂chten, dass diese automatisierte Entscheidung von einem Menschen √ºberpr√ºft wird, kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice-Team in Verbindung setzen, entweder per Live-Chat √ºber die mobile N26-App, Web-App oder √ºber das N26-Support-Center. Bitte beachte, dass wir kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur von einer E-Mail-Adresse aus besprechen k√∂nnen, die in deinem N26-Konto registriert ist, oder √ºber deinen sicheren Posteingang in der App.Wenn du beschlie√üt, deinen N26-Dispokredit zu aktivieren, melden wir dies der SCHUFA.Warum habe ich keinen Dispokredit bekommen?Wie oben erw√§hnt, wenden wir ein mathematisch-statistisches Verfahren an, um zu beurteilen und zu entscheiden, ob wir dir einen Dispokredit anbieten k√∂nnen. Das Ergebnis wird automatisch in Echtzeit ermittelt.Wenn du die obigen Schritte befolgt hast und keinen Dispokredit erhalten hast, bedeutet dies, dass wir dir derzeit wahrscheinlich keinen Dispokredit anbieten k√∂nnen. Letzteres kann insbesondere dann der Fall sein, wenn du eine aktive Pf√§ndung hast oder deinen Zahlungsverpflichtungen zuvor nicht nachgekommen bist. Wenn du N26-Konto zu deinem Hauptkonto, machst, wirkt sich dies auch positiv auf deine Berechtigung aus.Wenn du in Deutschland lebst, ber√ºcksichtigen wir bei der Entscheidung √ºber deinen Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit und den zugeh√∂rigen Rahmen deinen SCHUFA-Score, der bis zu drei Jahre alt sein kann. Wenn er √§lter ist, fordern wir deinen neuesten SCHUFA-Score an, nachdem du unser N26-Dispoantragsverfahren durchlaufen hast. Dies kann auf deiner SCHUFA-Auskunft erscheinen, hat jedoch keinen Einfluss auf deinen SCHUFA-Score und ist nur f√ºr dich sichtbar. In diesem Fall wird dir m√∂glicherweise kein N26-Dispokredit angeboten. Wenn du in √ñsterreich lebst, sehen wir uns deinen CRIF-Score an.Wenn du keinen Dispokredit erh√§ltst, kannst du es zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt erneut versuchen. Wenn du keinen Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit haben, werden wir dich auf jeden Fall benachrichtigen, sobald du berechtigt bist. Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung √ºber deine Berechtigung anfechten m√∂chtest, siehe oben, wie du mit uns in Kontakt treten k√∂nnen. Bei weiteren Fragen √∂ffne bitte direkt in der mobilen N26-App oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab) einen Live-Chat.Weitere Informationen findest du in unseren Dispokredit-Bedingungen (neuen Tab).Warum bekomme ich keinen h√∂heren Dispokredit bekommen?Wie oben erw√§hnt, wenden wir ein mathematisch-statistisches Verfahrensmodell an, um die Betragsgrenze zu ermitteln, die wir dir f√ºr einen Dispokredit anbieten k√∂nnen. Das Ergebnis wird automatisch in Echtzeit ermittelt und h√§ngt von den pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Informationen ab, die wir √ºber dich gespeichert haben, sowie von unserer Risikobereitschaft zu dem Zeitpunkt.Wir werden dich benachrichtigen, sobald wir dir ein h√∂heres Limit f√ºr deinen N26-Dispokredit gew√§hren k√∂nnen. Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung √ºber das Limit das wir dir anbieten k√∂nnen anfechten m√∂chtest, siehe oben wie du mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst. Bitte setze dich in diesem Fall mit uns in Verbindung, bevor du das von uns angebotene Dispolimit akzeptierst.Warum wurde mein √úberziehungsrahmen reduziert oder gek√ºndigt?Wir √ºberpr√ºfen unsere √úberziehungsrahmen regelm√§√üig, um unseren Kunden und Kundinnen angemessenen Schutz zu bieten. Diese √Ñnderung ist nicht in jedem Falle dauerhaft und du kannst m√∂glicherweise zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt eine Erh√∂hung deines √úberziehungsrahmens in der App beantragen. F√ºr mehr Infos kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice-Team per Live-Chat √ºber die mobile N26-App, Web-App oder √ºber das N26-Support-Center in Verbindung setzen.Kann sich mein √úberziehungsrahmen √§ndern? Warum wurde mein √úberziehungsrahmen herabgesetzt?Wir √ºberpr√ºfen unsere √úberziehungsrahmen routinem√§√üig, um unseren Kunden und Kundinnen angemessenen Schutz zu bieten. Wir k√∂nnen √úberziehungsrahmen √§ndern oder aufheben, wenn:wir unsere Kreditrichtlinien anpassendu wiederholt vergisst, deine Konto√ºberziehung innerhalb von 90 Tagen auszugleichendu deine Konto√ºberziehung wiederholt versp√§tet ausgleichstdeine Kreditw√ºrdigkeit signifikant herabgestuft wurdedu deinen √úberziehungsrahmen f√ºr betr√ºgerische oder illegale Aktivit√§ten nutztFalls dich unsere √Ñnderungen direkt betreffen, informieren wir dich dar√ºber selbstverst√§ndlich.Was passiert, wenn ich bei negativem Kontostand meinen Dispo k√ºndige?Dein in Anspruch genommener Dispokredit sowie die angefallenen Zinsen werden sofort f√§llig.Du verlierst die M√∂glichkeit, dir Geld zu leihen, wenn dein Kontostand auf Null steht.Um erneut einen Dispokredit in Anspruch nehmen zu k√∂nnen, musst du das Bewerbungsverfahren neu durchlaufen. Eine Reaktivierung kann nicht garantiert werden.Nach der K√ºndigung m√ºssen sowohl der in Anspruch genommene Dispokredit sowie die anfallenden Zinsen direkt bezahlt werden, um weitere Kosten gegen√ºber N26 aufgrund einer verz√∂gerten R√ºckzahlung zu vermeiden. Au√üerdem wirst du fortan Zahlungserinnerungen erhalten, bis dein Kontostand ausgeglichen ist.Kann ich meinen √úberziehungsrahmen anheben lassen?Aktuell bieten wir keine Erh√∂hung von √úberziehungsrahmen an. Jedoch arbeiten wir daran, das in Zukunft zu erm√∂glichen.Was kann ich tun, wenn ich die Konto√ºberziehung nicht innerhalb der Frist ausgleichen kann?Deine aktuelle Konto√ºberziehung ist von √úberziehungsrahmen √Ñnderung nicht betroffen. Du kannst den √úberziehungsbetrag weiterhin mindestens einmal alle 90 Tage zur√ºckzahlen, solange dein Dispokredit unter der H√∂chstgrenze liegt.

question: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúCard transfer‚ÄùChoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 450‚Ç¨ per top-up, for a maximum of 450‚Ç¨ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚ÄùSelect ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùChoose an amount¬†Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
answer: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to¬†ideas@n26.com (new tab). We‚Äôre always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

question: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
answer: You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app.

question: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: Come riordinare una carta?

Puoi controllarlo in ogni momento dalla schermata principale della tua app mobile.Puoi richiedere una nuova carta nel caso in cui la tua sia smarrita, rotta, rubata o se ci fosse un problema con l'invio della tua prima carta (nuova tabella).Se hai bisogno di riordinare la tua carta, ti consigliamo di controllare prima il tuo indirizzo di spedizione nell'app, da üë§ Il mio Conto > Profilo > Indirizzi > Indirizzo di spedizione. Ricorda che:L'indirizzo che indichi deve essere residenziale (i recapiti di attivit√† commerciali non sono accettati).¬†¬†Il tuo nome deve essere indicato sulla casella della posta: se fosse presente un nome diverso, aggiungilo alle informazioni sull'indirizzo nella tua app mobile.¬†Inserisci il tuo codice di avviamento postale senza spazi.¬†Se possibile, aggiungi il numero dell'edificio, il numero della tromba delle scale e il codice della porta alle informazioni aggiuntive sull'indirizzo nell'app mobile.¬†Se il tuo indirizzo contiene caratteri speciali, contatta il nostro servizio clienti dall'app.¬†Se ti trasferirai presto, considera l'opzione di consegna express e assicurati di selezionare il tuo nuovo indirizzo di residenza.Se la tua prima carta N26 non √® arrivata entro il periodo di tempo stimato, apri una chat dall'app mobile o dall'app Web e saremo felici di assisterti.Se eri gi√† in possesso di una carta attiva, segui questi passaggi:1. Dalla schermata principale, vai su Carte.2. Seleziona Impostazioni della carta.3. Dall'elenco delle carte, scorri fino a visualizzare la carta che desideri riordinare¬†4. Selezionare Riordina.Inizia a usare la tua carta anche prima che arriviAnche prima che la tua carta sia consegnata per posta, potrai iniziare a usarla tramite il tuo wallet digitale Apple Pay o Google Pay. In questo modo potrai effettuare acquisti con il tuo smartphone presso i commercianti che supportano questo metodo di pagamento.¬†Quanto costa riordinare la mia carta?Consegna standard: N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 You: 10‚Ç¨ N26 Metal: 45‚Ç¨Consegna express: N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 You: 30‚Ç¨ N26 Metal: 65‚Ç¨Se stai aspettando la tua prima carta e il tuo indirizzo di spedizione era corretto dall'inizio, contatta per favore il nostro Servizio Clienti. (nuova tabella)

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.¬†Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.¬†
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

Les invitations et les adh√©sions effectu√©es avant le 1er¬†octobre 2021 donneront toujours le droit √† des primes. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de communiquer une date pr√©cise pour la reprise des parrainages.

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: ‚Ç¨5,000Monthly limit: ‚Ç¨20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of ‚Ç¨1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of ‚Ç¨400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of ‚Ç¨2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of ‚Ç¨1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: ‚Ç¨1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit¬†Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: ‚Ç¨2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is ‚Ç¨200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 in any 24-hour period. There‚Äôs no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is ‚Ç¨50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999‚Ç¨ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000‚Ç¨ per week.

question: Perch√© il mio trasferimento √® ancora in sospeso nell'app di N26?
answer: Ogni volta che invii un bonifico, dovrai completare l'operazione inserendo il tuo PIN di conferma. Il bonifico rimarr√† in sospeso fino a quando non lo confermerai o lo annullerai tramite un messaggio push nell‚Äôapp.Il PIN di conferma √® diverso dal¬†PIN della carta, ma √® possibile utilizzare lo stesso numero per entrambi. Ti verr√† chiesto di scegliere un PIN di conferma appena¬†colleghi lo smartphone¬†(invece il PIN della carta potrai selezionarlo dopo aver attivato la carta).Se inserisci il PIN di conferma in modo errato per 6 volte di seguito, il PIN verr√† bloccato per motivi di sicurezza. Puoi ripristinare il PIN¬†cambiandolo¬†nell'app.

question: Vorauszahlung f√ºr Premium-Mitgliedschaften
answer: Der Vertrag f√ºr deine Mitgliedschaft gilt f√ºr ein Jahr und wird danach automatisch auf unbestimmte Zeit verl√§ngert, bis du ihn k√ºndigst. Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jederzeit k√ºndigen (siehe unten). Wir benachrichtigen dich 2 Monate vor der Verl√§ngerung auf unbestimmte Zeit.Welche Zahlungsweisen stehen mir zur Verf√ºgung?Du kannst dein Jahresabo monatlich bezahlen oder f√ºr mehrere Monate (z. B. 6 oder 12 Monate) im Voraus zahlen, um einen Rabatt zu erhalten. Das beeinflusst aber nicht die Vertragslaufzeit.Beispiel: Du entscheidest dich daf√ºr, 6 Monate im Voraus zu zahlen und t√§tigst bei Vertragsbeginn eine einmalige Zahlung f√ºr die ersten 6 Monate deines Jahresabos. 6 Monate sp√§ter, wenn die zweite H√§lfte deines Jahresvertrags beginnt, zahlst du die zweite Rate.Wie und wann kann ich zahlen?Deine Mitgliedschaft beginnt, sobald du die erste Zahlung get√§tigt hast. Erst dann hast du vollen Zugriff auf deine Premiumvorteile. Du kannst die erste Mitgliedsgeb√ºhr wahlweise per Debit- oder Kreditkarte, Apple Pay oder Google Pay zahlen. So erh√§ltst du sofort Zugriff auf deine Premiumvorteile (vorausgesetzt, du hast deine Identit√§t schon verifiziert). Alternativ kannst du Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen und wir heben die Mitgliedsgeb√ºhr direkt von deinem N26 Konto ab. Falls wir die Geb√ºhr (z. B. die monatliche Zahlung oder die erste Vorauszahlung) innerhalb von 15 Tagen nach Identit√§tspr√ºfung nicht erhalten haben, buchen wir sie automatisch von deinem N26 Konto ab und schalten deine Premiumvorteile frei. Danach wird die Mitgliedsgeb√ºhr automatisch von deinem N26 Konto abgebucht ‚Äì nat√ºrlich entsprechend der Zahlungsweise, die du ausgew√§hlt hast.Wie kann ich meine N26 Mitgliedschaft k√ºndigen?Automatische Verl√§ngerung beenden: Du kannst die automatische Verl√§ngerung deiner Mitgliedschaft jederzeit w√§hrend der ersten 12 Vertragsmonate beenden, indem du uns √ºber den Kundenservice-Chat kontaktierst. Wenn du dich daf√ºr entscheidest, die Verl√§ngerung zu beenden, kannst du deine N26 Mastercard und alle Vorteile deines Premiumkontos bis zum Ablauf deiner Mitgliedschaft weiterhin nutzen. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Versicherungsschutz (bei N26 You und N26 Metal) so lange beh√§ltst, wie du deine Mitgliedschaftsgeb√ºhr zahlen musst.Mitgliedschaft jederzeit k√ºndigen: Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jederzeit und unmittelbar k√ºndigen, indem du uns kontaktierst. Wenn du ein N26 Smart, N26 You oder N26 Metal Konto hast und diese Option w√§hlst, wird deine N26 Premium-Mastercard deaktiviert, dein Konto auf ein N26 Standard Konto umgestellt und eine Virtual Card f√ºr dich ausgestellt. Wenn du ein N26 You oder N26 Metal Konto hast, werden au√üerdem unmittelbar deine Versicherungsleistungen eingestellt.Widerruf: Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der gesetzlichen 14-t√§gigen Frist widerrufen. Dieser Zeitraum beginnt mit der Abbuchung der ersten monatlichen Geb√ºhr. Deine N26 Premium-Mastercard wird deaktiviert und wir stellen dir eine Virtual Card aus, die du mit deinem N26 Standard Konto nutzen kannst.Bekomme ich mein Geld zur√ºck?Falls du deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist √ºber den Chat k√ºndigst, erstatten wir dir die erste Geb√ºhr. Falls du deine im Voraus bezahlte Mitgliedschaft nach Ablauf der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist k√ºndigst, erstatten wir dir die restlichen, im Voraus bezahlten Monate.Falls du deine Mitgliedschaft im Voraus zu einem reduzierten Preis bezahlt hast, erstatten wir dir die restlichen Monate. Die genutzten Monate ziehen wir aber zum vollen Preis ab. Du profitierst von dem Rabatt nur, wenn deine Mitgliedschaft w√§hrend der gesamten Dauer deiner Vorauszahlung bestehen bleibt.

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: How to block contactless payments on my card?
answer: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.¬†If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you‚Äôve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If you‚Äôre experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

question: Quali sono i vantaggi di N26 You?
answer: Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nell‚Äôapp!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.¬†Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 You online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni all‚Äôestero in tutto il mondo. In pi√π, puoi prelevare gratuitamente in tutto il mondo, anche in valuta estera.Pacchetto assicurativo di Allianz Global Assistance*: assicurazione che include un‚Äôampia gamma di vantaggi personali e finanziari come:Assicurazione di viaggio: rimborso di spese mediche all‚Äôestero, per cancellazioni dei viaggi in seguito a un‚Äôemergenza medica, spese sostenute durante ritardo di volo superiore a 4 ore, spese in caso di ritardo bagagli imbarcati di pi√π di 6 ore e spese di rimpatrio medico.Salvataggio neve e montagna: ricevi una copertura per ricerca, salvataggio, costi di primo trasporto e spese mediche in caso di incidenti durante una gita in montagna.Condivisi auto, bici e scooter: copertura in caso di danni o furto di veicoli affittati da aziende di car sharing.Confronta N26 YOU con gli altri piani (nuova tabella) per vedere quale √® pi√π adatto a te!Tieni presente quanto segue se prendi in considerazione¬†N26 You (nuova tabella):La Mastercard N26 You non ha i numeri in rilievo: i dati della carta, incluso il numero, il codice CVV e il token a 10 cifre sono stampati sul retro.Se passi a N26 You, il canone mensile di 9,90 ‚Ç¨ verr√† detratto direttamente dal tuo conto N26 ogni mese a partire dalla data dell'upgrade. Se sei un nuovo cliente, il primo canone sar√† detratto 15 giorni dopo l‚Äôaccertamento dell'identit√†. Da quel momento in poi, il canone mensile verr√† addebitato alla data di iscrizione. Ci√≤ significa che, se hai aperto il tuo conto alla fine del mese, le prime due quote mensili verranno addebitate il mese successivo.Da ora in poi puoi decidere se pagare la tua commissione premium mensilmente, oppure in anticipo per i prossimi 6 mesi o un anno di contratto. Se scegli l'opzione di pagamento anticipato, beneficerai di uno sconto sul costo mensile del tuo conto premium (Smart / You / Metal) proporzionale al periodo di fatturazione che vuoi pagareDopo aver effettuato l'iscrizione, troverai le opzioni di fatturazione con il pagamento anticipato e i costi correlati nella tua app N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe √® un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: Quali sono i vantaggi di N26 Metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏èDisponibile in Germania, Austria, Francia, Spagna, Italia, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Olanda, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Islanda e Liechtenstein.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra tre nuovi colori: Ambra, Nero e Ardesia.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nell‚Äôapp!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.¬†Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 Metal online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni all‚Äôestero in tutto il mondo. Da quel momento in poi, il canone mensile verr√† addebitato alla data di iscrizione.Per ricevere la carta, ricorda di effettuare una ricarica dopo aver completato l‚Äôapertura del conto.
