question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You‚Äôll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism¬†As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26‚Äôs public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API¬† & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as ‚Äúpending‚Äù will be classified as ‚Äúbooked‚Äù transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We‚Äôve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

question: Come cambiare il PIN della mia carta N26?
answer: Al momento dell‚Äôattivazione, ti verr√† chiesto di impostare il ‚Äã‚ÄãPIN della tua nuova carta di debito. N26 non imposta mai un codice PIN predefinito per la tua carta, quindi se lo dimentichi o vuoi semplicemente cambiarlo, puoi facilmente ripristinarlo dall'app N26.Prima di impostare o modificare il tuo PIN, assicurati che il tuo smartphone sia associato al tuo conto e di aver attivato la tua carta. Quindi segui questi passaggi:Apri l'app N26 e scegli "Carte" in basso a destraScegli la carta di tuo interesse e tocca "Impostazioni"Seleziona "Reimposta PIN"Inserisci il numero di 10 cifre che trovi sul fronte o sul retro della tua cartaScegli un nuovo codice PIN e confermaRicorda, per abilitare i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e utilizzare la carta per i tuoi acquisti online, dovrai prima effettuare una transazione con chip e codice PIN presso un negozio o uno sportello ATM.PIN errato o non validoPer ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non √® valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Se inserisci il PIN sbagliato per tre volte di seguito, la carta verr√† automaticamente bloccata per motivi di sicurezza. Se ti succede questo, apri una chat con il Supporto Clienti tramite app, cos√¨ potremo aiutarti.Il codice PIN della tua carta non √® lo stesso del tuo PIN di conferma (nuova tabella), ma se vuoi puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.Se hai cambiato il PIN ma riscontri un errore durante il pagamento, vedi il punto 6 sopra.

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: How to upgrade to Metal?

To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.¬†¬†Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules¬†As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.¬†Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.¬†Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.¬†For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating ‚Äúpermanent home‚Äù as a stronger form of attachment than ‚Äútemporary residence‚Äù). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number¬†Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country‚Äôs tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.¬†¬†The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities¬†As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.¬†Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.¬†We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.¬†Our recommendation¬†Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.¬†We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù, indicate whether you‚Äôre a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you‚Äôre tax resident in more than one country), click ‚ÄúAdd new tax country‚Äù and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.¬†

question: How to upgrade to N26 You?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal¬†contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you‚Äôre now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you‚Äôll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.¬†RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.¬† At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of ‚Ç¨10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: How to protect my identity?
answer: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
answer: No problem, we got your back!¬†If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.¬†If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you‚Äôd like to receive your replacement card.¬†My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

question: What are the benefits of N26 You?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.¬†Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.¬†If you‚Äôre a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: How does N26 Business Smart work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs ‚Ç¨4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C‚Äôs).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of ‚Ç¨4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you‚Äôre a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Was sind IBANs f√ºr Spaces (Unterkonten)?
answer: Verf√ºgbar f√ºr Premium-Kunden in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Island, Irland, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Schweden und die Schweiz.IBANs f√ºr Spaces-Unterkonten:Mit unserem Feature ‚ÄûIBANs f√ºr Spaces‚Äú werden deine einzelnen Spaces noch n√ºtzlicher. Bisher konnten Spaces keine eingehenden √úberweisungen empfangen oder zur Zahlung deiner ausgehenden Lastschriften verwendet werden. Sobald du einem Space eine IBAN zuweist, kannst du aber eingehende √úberweisungen direkt in dem Space empfangen. Zudem kannst du einen Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN verwenden, um deine ausgehenden Lastschriften zu bezahlen. Wie funktionieren IBANs f√ºr Spaces?Mit dem Feature ‚ÄûIBANs f√ºr Spaces‚Äú k√∂nnen Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, You oder Metal), die ihr N26 Konto in Deutschland er√∂ffnet haben und √ºber eine deutsche IBAN verf√ºgen, einem Space eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen und somit darauf √úberweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften erstellen.Im Folgenden findest du eine √úbersicht √ºber die Funktionen im Rahmen der Zuweisung einer IBAN zu deinem Space bzw. deinen Spaces:Eine IBAN zu deinen Spaces hinzuf√ºgen: Du kannst einem bestehenden oder neu angelegten Space eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen ‚Äì und zwar bis zu maximal 10 Mal. Shared Spaces kann keine IBAN zugewiesen werden.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces erstellen, jeder mit einer eigenen individuellen IBAN, wodurch du noch mehr Kontrolle √ºber deine Finanzen hast. Bitte beachte, dass nach der Zuweisung von IBANs an 3 Spaces ein Zeitlimit von 24 Stunden aktiviert wird, bis einem Space eine neue individuelle IBAN zugewiesen werden kann.√úberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst √úberweisungen direkt in einen Space mit zugewiesener IBAN empfangen.Ausgehende √úberweisungen: Du kannst √úberweisungen direkt aus einem Space, dem du eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, t√§tigen. Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift t√§tigen: Du kannst die individuelle IBAN deines Spaces verwenden, um ausgehende wiederkehrende Lastschriften direkt von deinem Space aus abzuwickeln. Solltest du nicht genug Guthaben auf dem Space haben, um den Betrag der Lastschrift zu decken, wird die √úberweisung abgelehnt und eine Geb√ºhr von deinem Hauptkonto abgebucht.IBAN deines Spaces anzeigen: Du kannst die jeweilige IBAN deiner Spaces einsehen, mit der du √úberweisungen empfangen und deine Lastschriften abwickeln kannst. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder N26 Web-App ein, √∂ffne den ‚ÄûSpaces‚Äú-Tab und w√§hle den Space aus, dessen IBAN du einsehen m√∂chtest. Gehe zu den Space-Einstellungen. question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. question: How to repay my loan early?

question: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
answer: Deine N26 Karte kam heute mit der Post? Bevor du sie nutzen kannst, musst du deine Karte aktivieren. Die Aktivierung deiner N26 Karte ist in wenigen Schritten erledigt. Stelle vorher jedoch sicher, dass du dein Smartphone bereits mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft hast.Um deine Karte in der N26 App zu aktivieren, f√ºhre folgende Schritte vom Startbildschirm aus:Gehe zum "Karten"-Tab.W√§hle "Einstellungen" und wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du aktivieren m√∂chtest.Tippe auf "Aktivieren".Gib den Token ‚Äì die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte ‚Äì ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der R√ºckseite.Um deine Karte in der Web-App zu aktivieren, klicke einfach im Startbildschirm auf "Karte aktivieren".Du willst eine neue Karte bestellen, weil deine alte verloren gegangen, gestohlen oder besch√§digt worden ist? Oder hast du dir ein Upgrade auf N26 Smart, You oder Metal geholt? In allen F√§llen musst du die oben genannten Schritte zur Aktivierung deiner neuen Karte wiederholen.¬†Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in Gesch√§ften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem Gesch√§ft vollst√§ndig aktivieren. Hierf√ºr muss die Karte in ein Kartenleseger√§t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.Falls du mehrere Karten derselben Art hast (zum Beispiel, weil sich die Lieferung verz√∂gert hat und du mehr als eine Karte bestellt hast), kannst du nur die neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle √§lteren Karten werden deaktiviert, wenn du eine neue bestellst. Das trifft nicht auf Zusatzkarten f√ºr Premiumkonten zu.

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.¬†Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.¬†Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.¬†

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp (new tab)¬†to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: ¬øC√≥mo hacer una transferencia SEPA?

Questo succeder√† quando avrai trasferito denaro sul tuo conto per coprire la prima commissione, comunque entro 15 giorni dopo aver comprovato la tua identit√†. Da quel momento in poi, la commissione mensile ti verr√† addebitata ogni mese in quello stesso giorno.Da ora in poi puoi decidere se pagare la tua commissione premium mensilmente, oppure in anticipo per i prossimi 6 mesi o un anno di contratto. Se scegli l'opzione di pagamento anticipato, beneficerai di uno sconto sul costo mensile del tuo conto premium (Smart / You / Metal) proporzionale al periodo di fatturazione che vuoi pagare. Dopo aver effettuato l‚Äôiscrizione, troverai le opzioni di fatturazione con il pagamento anticipato e i costi correlati nella tua app N26.Per ricevere la carta, subito dopo aver completato la registrazione, trasferisci sul tuo conto un importo minimo pari al canone mensile.

question: Was ist ein N26 Standard-Konto?
answer: Das N26 Standard-Konto ist ein sicheres und intuitives digitales Girokonto, das du in wenigen Minuten direkt von deinem Smartphone aus er√∂ffnen kannst. Es ist wunderbar einfach und transparent und erm√∂glicht es dir, Geld problemlos und sicher zu empfangen, zu senden und auszugeben. Das N26 Standard-Konto ist kostenlos* und bietet dir eine einfache und erschwingliche L√∂sung f√ºr alle deine finanziellen Bed√ºrfnisse. Was sind die Vorteile eines ein N26 Standard-Kontos?Unser N26 Standard-Konto bietet die folgenden Vorteile und Funktionen:Kostenloses* Girokonto: Die Nutzung unseres N26 Standard-Kontos ist kostenlos (*ab einem Guthaben von 50.000 ‚Ç¨ oder h√∂her kann ein Verwahrentgelt (neuen Tab) anfallen).Virtuelle Karte: Das Konto beinhaltet eine kostenlose virtuelle Karte mit einer vollst√§ndigen PAN-Nummer und kann zusammen mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay online oder im Gesch√§ft f√ºr Eink√§ufe verwendet werden.Physische N26 Mastercard: F√ºr eine zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨ kannst du eine physische N26 Standard-Debitkarte anfordern (bitte beachte, dass dein Konto nach der Bestellung einmalig mindestens 10 ‚Ç¨ Guthaben aufweisen muss, um die Produktion und den Versand der Karte auszul√∂sen).Zahlungen und √úberweisungen: Du kannst SEPA-√úberweisungen mit der mobilen App von N26 senden und empfangen. Au√üerdem kannst du √ºber Moneybeam sofort Geld an andere N26 Kunden senden.Weitere Finanzprodukte: Wenn sie f√ºr dich erh√§ltlich sind, kannst du auch unsere weiteren Finanzprodukte beantragen, z. B. Overdraft, Kredit, N26 Savings usw.CASH26: Abheben und Einzahlen von Bargeld mit CASH26 (AGB f√ºr DE, AT und IT).Kundenservice: Du kannst dich mit unserem tollen Kundenservice-Team in Verbindung setzen, indem du die Chat-Funktion in der App nutzt oder einen Chat √ºber unsere Website oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab) startest.¬†Eine Anleitung zur Er√∂ffnung eines N26 Standard-Kontos findest du in diesem Artikel.Unser neues N26 Standard-Konto ist mit einer kostenlosen virtuellen Debitkarte ausgestattet. Mit einem aktiven Standard-Konto kannst du online und im Gesch√§ft bezahlen. Au√üerdem kannst du deine virtuelle Karte zu deinem Apple oder Google Pay Wallet hinzuf√ºgen.¬†W√§hrend der Registrierung werden dir 2 Optionen angezeigt:Virtuelle Karte: Du kannst eine virtuelle Karte ausw√§hlen, die ohne Mindestguthaben aktiviert werden kann (wenn du dich zu Beginn f√ºr eine virtuelle Karte entscheidest, kannst du dir f√ºr 10 ‚Ç¨ sp√§ter immer noch eine physische N26 Debitkarte zulegen).Physische Karte: F√ºr denselben Preis von 10 ‚Ç¨ kannst du dich auch von Anfang an f√ºr eine physische N26 Debitkarte entscheiden (bitte beachte aber, dass du bei dieser Option auch sp√§ter keine virtuelle Karte bekommen kannst).¬†Die Details zu deiner virtuellen Karte kannst du in deiner N26 App finden, darunter deine vollst√§ndige PAN-Nummer und alles, was du f√ºr den Online-Einkauf wissen musst.

question: What is a N26 Business Account?
answer: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you can‚Äôt have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of ‚Ç¨50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional ‚Ç¨10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least ‚Ç¨10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&C‚Äôs, can order a Maestro card for an additional ‚Ç¨10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:¬†ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2,500	In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5,000¬†The monthly limit for payments is ‚Ç¨20,000.¬†You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expenses¬†The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:¬†MoneyBeam to N26 customers: ‚Ç¨1,000Instant transfers: ‚Ç¨100,000Outgoing transfers: No limits¬†N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.¬†Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏èVerf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Island und Liechtenstein.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: W√§hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus drei neuen Farben: Bernstein, Schwarz und Schiefer.Zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zus√§tzliche virtuelle Karte!Zus√§tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle √ºber deine N26 App eine zus√§tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 10 ‚Ç¨.Spaces: 10 zus√§tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in Gesch√§ften, vermeide versteckte Bankgeb√ºhren und profitiere von geb√ºhrenfreien Auslands√ºberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst dar√ºber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit geb√ºhrenfrei Bargeld in jeder W√§hrung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: R√ºckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, f√ºr Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Versp√§tung des aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten f√ºr medizinische R√ºcktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erh√§ltst eine Versicherung f√ºr Such- und Rettungsma√ünahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unf√§llen w√§hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz f√ºr Sch√§den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Du kannst N26 Metal mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Denke an Folgendes, wenn du dich f√ºr N26 Metal (neuen Tab)interessierst:Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach deiner Identit√§tspr√ºfung berechnet. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Geb√ºhr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet.Bitte √ºberweise nach deiner Verifizierung genug Guthaben auf dein Konto, damit die erste monatliche Geb√ºhr abgedeckt ist, um deine Metal Karte zu erhalten.Wenn du vorher N26 You Mitglied warst, bleiben alle Eink√§ufe und Reisen versichert, die du mit deiner N26 You Mastercard bezahlt hast.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgeb√ºhr monatlich oder im Voraus f√ºr die n√§chsten 6 Monate oder f√ºr 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich f√ºr die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig f√ºr den von dir gew√ºnschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt.Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Abrechnungsoptionen (monatlich, halbj√§hrlich oder j√§hrlich) und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.

question: Ingresa mediante tarjeta, Apple Pay y Google Pay
answer: Ahora puedes ingresar dinero utilizando una tarjeta de d√©bito o cr√©dito, as√≠ como Apple o Google Pay. Esta es la forma m√°s r√°pida y f√°cil de ingresar dinero en tu cuenta N26.Para ingresar dinero con una tarjeta de d√©bito o cr√©dito:Abre tu app N26 y ve a la pesta√±a de ¬´Tarjetas¬ªPulsa en ¬´Recibir dinero¬ª y selecciona ¬´Tarjeta de d√©bito¬ªElige una cantidad y rellena con los datos de la tarjeta como nombre, n√∫mero, fecha de vencimiento y CVC (no almacenamos la informaci√≥n de la tarjeta)Sigue los pasos para confirmar el pago.El dinero estar√° disponible en tu cuenta al instanteLa cantidad que puedes pasar a tu cuenta debe estar comprendida entre un m√≠nimo de 20 ‚Ç¨ y un m√°ximo de 450 ‚Ç¨ por cada transacci√≥n recurrente (pesta√±a nueva), hasta un m√°ximo de 450 ‚Ç¨ al mes.Para ingresar dinero mediante Google y Apple Pay:Abre tu app de N26 y ve a la pesta√±a de¬† ¬´Tarjetas¬ªSimplemente pulsa ‚ÄúRecibir dinero‚Äù y selecciona ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù o ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚ÄùElige una cantidadSigue los pasos para confirmar el pago.El dinero estar√° disponible en tu cuenta al instanteTarjetas aceptadas: las tarjetas Visa y Mastercard que tengan 16 d√≠gitos de n√∫mero de tarjeta. No se aceptan tarjetas de prepago (por ejemplo, marca A, marca B, etc.). Para obtener m√°s informaci√≥n sobre la diferencia entre tarjetas de d√©bito, cr√©dito y prepago, lee este art√≠culo (pesta√±a nueva) (ingl√©s).Coste:Aunque esta es la forma m√°s r√°pida y f√°cil de ingresar dinero en tu cuenta N26, para nosotros, procesar este tipo de transacciones tiene un coste mayor que los m√©todos de ingreso que ya ofrecemos.¬†Para ambos m√©todos, el primer ingreso es siempre gratuito,¬† para los ingresos¬† adicionales se¬† cobra una comisi√≥n del 3% de la cantidad ingresada. Al utilizar estos m√©todos,¬† mediante tarjeta o plataforma digital de pago, tu dinero no se env√≠a al instante a N26, por lo que la comisi√≥n cubre los costes reales asociados al servicio de ingreso autom√°tico ofrecido por N26.

B. Flug- oder Gep√§ckversp√§tung, Handydiebstahl, Garantieverl√§ngerung oder Reisestornierung)Deine N26 Kontoinformationen, sowie die Nummer deiner Allianz Versicherungspolice Die M√∂glichkeit, dich bei einem medizinischen Notfall direkt an die Allianz zu wendenHalte im Notfall bitte folgende Informationen bereit:Die vollst√§ndige Adresse und Telefonnummer deines aktuellen AufenthaltsortesNamen aller offiziellen Ansprechpartner (√Ñrzte, Krankenh√§user und/oder Polizei)Eine genaue Beschreibung der Situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist ein Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.

question: ¬øQu√© son las transferencias inmediatas?
answer: Ahora, todos los clientes y clientas de N26 pueden enviar transferencias inmediatas. A diferencia de las transferencias SEPA ordinarias, que se tramitan en un plazo de dos d√≠as laborables, las transferencias inmediatas se env√≠an y reciben en cuesti√≥n de segundos.Las transferencias inmediatas pueden resultarte √∫tiles si necesitas enviar una transferencia urgente (tarda unos 10 segundos), pero los clientes y clientas del plan Est√°ndar pagan una comisi√≥n por la transferencia inmediata, que se muestra antes de confirmarla. Por tanto, si puedes esperar hasta 2 d√≠as a que llegue el dinero, te recomendamos una transferencia SEPA ordinaria. Nuestros clientes y clientas premium pueden enviar una inmediata sin comisiones.Si bien es inmediata, este tipo de transferencia puede sufrir retrasos debido a la tramitaci√≥n, embargos, etc. (al igual que las transferencias ordinarias), as√≠ que si tienes que hacer un pago importante (p. ej., fianzas, entradas), te aconsejamos que no esperes al √∫ltimo momento para evitar p√©rdidas financieras debido a los retrasos.¬øC√≥mo funciona?Si quieres enviar una transferencia inmediata, inicia sesi√≥n en la app del m√≥vil y selecciona Enviar dinero > Transferencia bancaria.A continuaci√≥n, se te pedir√° que introduzcas el nombre y el IBAN del beneficiario/a, a√±adas un mensaje y confirmes la transacci√≥n.Selecciona Transferencia inmediataLa transferencia se tramitar√° y recibir√° aproximadamente en 10 segundos.Nota: si el banco del beneficiario/a no forma parte del programa de transferencias inmediatas, no tendr√°s la opci√≥n de enviarla.Informaci√≥n importante:Los clientes y clientas de N26 Est√°ndar pagan una comisi√≥n por las transferencias inmediatas. La comisi√≥n se cobra justo despu√©s como transacci√≥n independiente y var√≠a dependiendo del pa√≠s:Alemania y Austria: 0,49 ‚Ç¨Espa√±a: 1,99 ‚Ç¨Italia, Francia y el resto de Europa: 0,99 ‚Ç¨El importe m√°ximo que puedes enviar con una transferencia inmediata es de 2.000 ‚Ç¨, 5 veces al d√≠a por un m√°ximo diario de 10.000 ‚Ç¨.Si utilizas la transferencia inmediata para un pago importante (fianzas, multas, entradas), te aconsejamos que no esperes al √∫ltimo momento para evitar retrasos debido a un posible rechazo o embargo.Si pagas un producto o servicio mediante una transferencia inmediata, recuerda comprobar los datos y las credenciales del beneficiario/a antes de confirmar la transacci√≥n. Hay que estar siempre al tanto de posibles timos.Nota: No todos los bancos participan en el programa de transferencias inmediatas. Si el banco beneficiario no participa en el programa, no tendr√°s la opci√≥n de enviar la transferencia inmediata.

question: How to protect my identity?
answer: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.¬†Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?¬†Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you‚Äôre asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.¬†If you have a feeling that something is off, don‚Äôt ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don‚Äôt click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender‚Äôs identity.If you‚Äôve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you‚Äôd like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: Wie benutze ich meine Karte digital?
answer: Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterst√ºtzen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein.Gehe zu Karten.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen und w√§hle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, auf die du wartest.Tippe auf Zu Google Wallet hinzuf√ºgen bzw. Zu Apple Pay hinzuf√ºgen.Wie kann ich meine Karteninformationen in der N26 App sehen?Wenn du deine Karteninformationen ben√∂tigst, aber deine N26 Karte momentan nicht dabei hast, kein Problem! N26 erm√∂glicht dir, deine kompletten Karteninformationen in der mobilen N26 App einzusehen, sofern deine Karte aktiviert und dein Handy verkn√ºpft ist. Es ist ganz einfach:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein.Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten.W√§hle aus der Liste deiner Karte diejenige Karte aus, die du sehen willst.Tippe auf Karteninformationen.Best√§tige mit deinem Fingerabdruck, deiner Face-ID oder deiner Handy-PIN.Deine kompletten Karteninformationen kannst du jetzt f√ºr 1 Minute sehen. Bitte beachte, dass du w√§hrenddessen keine Screenshots machen kannst.

question: How to order my Maestro card?
answer: Only applies to Germany, Austria and the NetherlandsYou need our German, Austrian or Dutch Terms & Conditions to order a¬†Maestro (new tab) card. Just login to your account and go to:Cards Tap: Get an additional Card Then tap: Maestro Then tap Choose to order the card The Maestro card is free of charge only for N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal customers, while it costs 10‚Ç¨ for N26 Standard customers. Maestro is a widely adopted payment system which allows you to make payments using a Maestro card in stores. All our Mastercards as well as our Maestro cards are debit cards.For more information about the delivery timeline please go to our dedicated article.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you‚Äôve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you‚Äôll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‚ÄòCards‚Äô tab. You can mark the reason as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you‚Äôll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).¬†¬†How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you‚Äôll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don‚Äôt arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date¬†
In this scenario, Mastercard‚Äôs chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.¬†You received a delivery, but it doesn‚Äôt correspond with what you ordered¬†
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn‚Äôt receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,¬†I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:¬†Amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.¬†If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help‚Äì‚Äìthis is the fastest way to get your money back. Here‚Äôs a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:¬†Dear XX,¬†I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:¬†Merchant name: {insert merchant name}¬†Amount of original, authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.¬†The merchant told me that they‚Äôve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven‚Äôt received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.¬†How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That‚Äôs why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits‚Äì‚Äìall right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‚ÄòDiscreet Mode (new tab)‚Äô option to securely access your account in public.¬†Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you‚Äôre always aware of what‚Äôs happening on your account. Plus, we‚Äôre always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.¬†How does card fraud occur?¬†A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that‚Äôs been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:¬†You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase¬†Your online shopping account is hacked¬†Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?¬†Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks¬†Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly¬†Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†*applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten
answer: Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!¬†Wenn du deine Adresse bereits best√§tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen.¬†Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht best√§tigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu best√§tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen.¬†Meine Karte l√§uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte f√ºr meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?

question: Wie √§ndere ich meine Kartenlimits?

question: ¬øPor qu√© no se puede vincular mi cuenta Wise?
